column1: 41001001 Iwu jiwu mukanda wamaking'u aYesu kilisitu, mwana kaDavidi, mwana kaAbarahama.
41001002 Abarahama wavweli Isaka, Isaka wavweli Yakoba, Yakoba walweli yuda nianakwiji.
41001003 Yuda  pelezi nizela nang'ojinji tamali, pelezi wavweli Hezeloni, Hezeloni wavweli Alama.
41001004 Alama wavweli Aminadabi, Aminadabi wavweli Nashoni, Nashoni wavweli Salimoni.
41001005 Salimoni wavweli Bowazi nang'ojinji Rahaba, Bowazi wavweli Obedi nang'ojinji Luti, Obedi wavweli Jesi.
41001006 Jesi wavweli mwanta Davidi.Davidi wavweli solomoni nanowu wajing'i ing'onda Uliya.
41001007 Solomoni wavweli Rehobwami, Wavweli Abiya,Abiya Wavweli
41001008 Asa Wavweli Yehashafwati, Yehashafwati Wavweli Yeholami,Yeholami Wavweli Uziya.
41001009 Uziya wavweli Yotami, Yotami wavweli Ahazi, Ahaz wavweli Hezekiya.
41001010 Hezekiya wavweli Manase, Manase wavweli Amoni, Amoni wavweli Yosiya.
41001011 Yosiya wavweli Yekoniya nianakwinji  hayitweluwu kuBabiloni.
41001012 Cheliluwu anayitwali jehi kuBabiloni, Tekoniya akvwala Seyaleteli, Seyaleteli wavweli Zelubabe.
41001013 Zelubabe wavweli Abiyudi, Abiyudi wavweli Eliyakimi, Eliyakimi wavweli Azoli.
41001014 Azoli wavweli Sadoki, Sadoki wavweli Akimi, Akimi wavweli Eliyudi.
41001015 Eliyudi wavweli Eleyazali, Eleyazali wavweli Matani, Matani wavweli Yakoba.
41001016 Yakoba wavweli Yosefu mfumwa Maliya wavweli Yesu atenang'awu nawu kilisitu.

41001017 Jichi majing'u ezhima akufumisha kuji Abalahama nakushika kuji Davidi making'u ikumi nawana, kufumisha kuji Davidi nakushika hayitweluwu ku Babiloni nakushika kuji kilisitu, making'u ikumi nawana.
41001018 Tiyenu mwavwalikililiyi Yesu kilisitu chamwoteluwu maama yinji Maliya kuji Yosefu, henohu kanda amusokezhi, amuweni wuji nevumu jaku sipilitu wazhila.
41001019 Ilang'a Yosefu, mfumwinji wajing'a, muntu walong'a hakeng'eli kumusawisha kumesu awantuku, hakutong'ozhoka ninji amulekeli kumbandi.

41001020 Chajing'a nakutong'ozhokayi yumiyi, kang'elu ka mwata hakumwekana kuji yena mukulota, ninji, ''Yosefu mwana kaDavidi, bayi wutiya woma wakutambula ng'ojeyi Maliyaku, mulong'a iji ivumu janabaabiyi jaku sipilitu wazhila.
41001021 Wakavwela mwana  weyala, wakamuntumba  izhina jinji neyi Yesu, mulong'a yena jiyi wakaamwina antu inji kunshiji zhawu.''
41001022 Mwezhimimu elili kulonda mwahosheliyi Mwata muji kapolofwetu mwakalumbuluki, mweliliyi ninji,
41001023 ''Tiyenu, muzhiki wakabaaba ivumu wakavwala mwana weyela, akamutumba izhina jinji nawu Emanuweli'' ___jaya mukwila nawu, ''Nzambi wuji nanetu.''
41001024 Yosefu hakunjuka mutulu hakwila mwamulezheluwu kuji kang'elu kaMwata, hakutambula ing'ojinji.
41001025 Hajimweni ninduku ching'a navwali jehi mwana weyela. akumutumba izhina jinji nindi Yesu.
41002001 Henohu havwalikiliyi Yesu kuBetelemi wamu Yudeya hanyaka yajing'iyi mwata Helodi, kwenzhili akwamaana afumini kumusela hiyakushika ku Yelusalema nawu,
41002002 ''Owu mwata wawa Yudeya wunavwaliki wuji kujihi? mulong'a twamweni katumbwa kinji kumusela tunenzi nakujifukula kuji yena.''
41002003 Mwata Helodi chanachitiyiyi, hakwakama, hama nawakwa Yelusalema ezhima.
41002004 Helodi hakupompesha akulumpi zhawatupulisitu niansoneki ezhima, hakuyihula ninji, ''kuji kwamba kavwalikilayi kilisitu?''
41002005 Hiyakumwila nawu, ''kuBetelemi wamu Yudeya, mulong'a jichi chasonekeliyi kapolofwetu,
41002006 Ilang'a eyi Betelemi wamwitung'a jaYuda, hiwakehela mukachi kawatulamba amuYudaku, mulong'a mujeyi jimu mwakafuma nyuuli, wakela kabing'a kawantu amu Isalela.''
41002007 Henohu helodi hakutambika akwamaana kwakankawawu hakuyihula chakashinshi hamwekeni katumbwa.
41002008 Hakuyitemesha kuBetelemi, ninji, ''yenu mukeng'akeng'i chachiwahi nakashishi owu mwana wanyany. Neyi munamumoni, jehi mumfuntishili izu kulong'a ninami nakayi nakujifukula kuji yena.''
41002009 Wena chanamutiyuwu mwata, hiyakuya, nawu atali komana katumbwa kamwenuwe kumusela hikakutwamina kumbidi yawu ninochuchikayili nakwimana hajing'i owu mwana wanyanya.
41002010 Chamwenuwu katumbwa, hiyakuzang'alala muzang'alu wanajika nankashi.

41002011 Eng'ila nimwitala oju hiyakumona owu mwana wanyanya hamu navwali yinji Maliya. Hiyakujinata heseki nakujifukula kuji mwana hiyakuzhikula mwajing'i yuma yalema, hiyakumulambula nyilambu yawulu, nilibona, nimora.
41002012 Chanayilezhuwu mukulota nawu bayi afunta kuji Heloduku, hiyakuya kwitung'a jawu nzhila yacheng'i.

41002013 Cheliluwu wena anayi jehi, kang'elu kaMwata hikakumwekana kuji Yosefu mulota ninji, ''Nyamukaku wutwali iwu mwana wanyanya nivwali yinji ,wutemukili kuEjipitu. Wakashakami kwenoku kufumaka ching'a nakulezhi, mulong'a Helodi wakakeng'akeng'a iwu mwana wanyanya ninji amukisang'ani.''
41002014 Hakunyamuka hakutwala owu mwana wanyanya nivwali yinji nawufuku hakuya kuEjipitu.
41002015 Hakushakama kwenoku ninichi chafwiliyi Helodi. kulonda mwahosheliyi Mwanta muji Atupolofwetu mwakalumbuluki, mweliliyi ninji, ''Natambikili mwanami kufuma muEjipitu mwajing'iyi.''

41002016 Henohu Helodi, chanamoniyi ninji anamujiwuli kuji aakwamaana, hakuswezha kuzuwa nankashi. Hakutemeshaku nzhita yakuzhaha anyana amayala ezhima ajing'i muBetelemi niajing'i kung'inza zhawu zhezhima nianyaka yiyeji niabulili kushika munyaka yiyeji, nakweseka mwatiyililiyi chakashinshi kuji akwamaana.
41002017 Henohu mwahosheliyi kapolofwetu Yelemiya himukulumbuluka, mweliliyi ninji,
41002018 ''Atiyili izu kuLama, jakutumpa nimakumbibaweni, Lacheli hakujila anyaninji, kumukundezha kwonti kwinji, mulong'a anyanindi kosi.''
41002019 Ilang'a chanafwiye Helodi, kang'elu kaMwata hakumwekana kuji Yosefu mukulota omu muEjipitu ninji,
41002020 ''Nyamukaku wutwali iwu mwana wanyanya nimama yinji wuyi mwitung'a jaIsalela, mulong'a antu akeng'eli kuzhaha iwu mwana wanyanya afwa jehi.
41002021 ''Yosefu hakunyamuka, hakutwala owu mwana wanyanya nivwali yinji wamumbada, hakwinza mwitung'a jaIsalela.
41002022 Ilang'a chanatiyiyi na Akelawusi naswani jehi wanta watata yinji Helodi muYudeya, hakutiya woma wakuya kwenoku. chanamulezhuwu mukulota, hakutondolwela nakuya kumbaji yang'aliliya.
41002023 Hakuya nakushakama kumukala izhina jawu Nazaleta. kulonda mwahosheluwu atupolofwetu mulumbuluki, mweliluwu nawu akamutena nawu kaNazaleta.
41003001 Wena Mafuku  Owu  Hikukwinza Yowanu  Nzhimiki Nakushimuna Muchinkalampampata Chamu Yudeya,
41003002 ''Ninji, Balumukenu, Munyichima Yenu,Mulonga Wanta Wamwiwulu Wunashiki Jehi Kwakwihi.
41003003 ''Jiyi Atenanuwu Muji Kaplofwetu Isaya Nawu Izu Jamukwakubijika Muchinkalampata Ninji,'Longenshenu Nzhila Ya Mwanta  Ololenu  Njila yinji jatulolu.''
41003004 Yowanu Wavwelang'a Mahina  Amavuji Anjameli, Nimuye Wachimembi Mumayinji, Kudya Kwinji Wajiilang'a Tubola Niwuchi Wachikalampata.
41003005 Jichu Antu Akuyelusalema Niamu Yudeya Mwezhima Niamumpata Yezhima Anyengumuka Yodana, Hiyakuya Kuji Yena.
41003006 Hiyakuyezhimika Kuji Yena Mukalong'a Yodana, Hiya Kwitezha Nshiji Yawu
41003007 Chanamoyi Afwalisewu Nawu Sadusi Amavulu Hiyakwinza Kwajingi Nakujimikayi, Hakuyila Ninji, ''Enu Anyana Katubanjayula Wayilejeli   Kutemuka Kuzuwa Kwamba  Kenza Hinyi?''
41003008 Song'enu nyikabu Yatelela antu anabalumiki Mumichima.
41003009 Bayi Mutongo'joka  Kuhosha Mumichima Yenu n enu, 'Tukweti nkakulula Yetu Abalahamaku.' Tiyenu niyilezhi, Nzambi natweshi kutetula mumalolawa anyana kaAbalahama
41003010 Katataka anashi jehi chizembi kunyizhi yanyitondu, jichu nyitondu yezhima yikubula kusong'a nyikabu yayiwahi akuyitemamu, akuyinatila mukesi.

41003011 Ami niji nakuyizhimika mumenzhi kulonda mubalumuki mumichima, ilang'a owu wamba kenza munyima yami wambajika ng'ovu nkwabilu zhinji ami kutela kuzhisenda nehi. Yena wakayizhimika muji sipilitu wazhila nimukesi.
41003012 Muchikasa chinji muji lupi wakatookesha mwitala jinji jakuhulilu to.o chikupu wakupompeshele  tidiku munkalang'a. Hakwila mafulu wakayocha mukesi kabulang'a kuzhima chikupu.''
41003013 Henohu Yesu hakufuma kung'aliliya hakwinza kuYodana kuji Yowanu kulonda akamuzhimiki kuji yena.
41003014 Yowanu wakeng'eli kumulekesha, ninji, ''Ami yami nateli kunzhimika kujeyi, inji eyi winza kujami?''
41003015 Yesu akumwakula ninji , ''kumina jakwitezha katataka, mulong'a kuwanisha kulong'a kwezhima.'' Yowanu hakumwitezha.
41003016 Yesu chanamuzhimikuwu, hohenohu azambuka nimumenzhi, kutala  mawulu hiyakumwenzhulukila. Hakumona sipilitu waNzambi wuji nakuwila haji yena.
41003017 Kutiya, mumawulu himukufuma izu ninji, ''Jiyi mwanami nakeng'a. Natiyang'a kuwaha nankashi muji yena.''
41004001 Henohu Yesu hiyakumutwala muchinkalampata kuji sipilitu kulonda akamweseki kuji jiyabolu.
41004002 Cheliliyi naleki jehi kunja mafuku makumi awana nimwaana niwufuku, nkumininaku hakutiya nzala.
41004003 Mukakwiseka hakwinza kuji yena hakumwila ninji, ''Neyi eyi wumwana kaNzambi, kalumunaku malola habalumuki jikendi.''
41004004 ilang'a Yesu hakwakula ninji, ''Ananjiki nawu, 'muntu hahandang'a najikenjihoku ching'a namazu afumang'a mukanwa kaNzambi.''
41004005 Jiyabolu hakumutwala mung'anda yazhila hakumusha hewulu jambang'u yaTembeli,
41004006 Hakumwila ninji, ''Neyi eyi wumwana kaNzambi jinati mwishina, ananjiki nawu, 'wakakulezhala ang'elu  zhinji, 'wena akakwaka namakasawu wakenza kahuma mwendu weyi kwilola.''
41004007 Yesu hakumwila ninji, ''Ananjiki nawu, 'Bayi wakamweseka Yewova Nzambi yeyuku.''
41004008 Jiyabolu hakumutwala hampidi yayilehi nankashi hakumulezha mawanta ampata yamunu mwishina ezhima nilubanji lwakulema kwawu.
41004009 Hakumwila ninji, ''Neyi wukujinata heseki  nakujifukula kujami, nukukwika yezhimiyi.''
41004010 Yesu hakumwila ninji, ''Fumaku  eyi, Satana! mulong'a ananjiki nawu, 'kajifukulang'a kuji Mwanta Nzambi yeyi, wakamukalakelang'a yena hohu kankawinji.
41004011 Henohu jiyabolu hakumushiya kutala ang'elu hiyakwinza nakumukalakela.
41004012 Yesu chanatiyiyi nawu Yowanu anamukwati nakumusha mukaleya, hakufumaku hakuya mung'aliliya.
41004013 Chanafumiyi kuNazaleta hakuya nakushakama kukapelinamu, wuji wuji kwizhiya mung'inza jaZebuluni na Nafwatali.
41004014 Kulonda mwahosheliyi kapolofwetu Isaya mulumbuluki,
41004015 ''Itung'a jaZebuluni, nitung'a jaNafwatali kunzhila yakukalung'alwizhi, kumbaji yamuzhika ya Yodana, ng'aliliya yawazhentili!
41004016 Antu ashakamini mumwijima amweni chezhezhi chacheni, ninawa ashakamini mwitung'a jawulelu wakufwa, amweni chezhezhi chakucha.''
41004017 Kufuma henohu Yesu hakutachika kushimuna  ninji, ''Balumukenu, mulong'a  wanta wamwiwulu wunashiki jihi kwakwihi.''

41004018 Chajing'i nakwenjayi kwizhiya jang'aliliya, hakumona amayala ayeji ivumu jawu jimu,  iwu Shimona atumbiluwu nawu Petulu, iwu manakwinji Andeli ajing'i nakuumba kaleng'i mwizhiya, mulonga ajing'i  yibinda yanshi.
41004019 Yesu hakuyila ninji, ''Inzenu, mulondami, nikuyilisha ayibinda wawantu.''
41004020 Hohenohu ashiya nituleng'i twawu hiyakumulondela.

41004021 Hakuswilaku cheng'i hakumona amayala amakwawu ayeji niwena nawa ivumu jawu jimu. Iwu mwana kaZebedewu Yakoba nimanakwinji Yowanu aji muwatu natata yawu Zebedewu aji nakung'ulula tuleng'i twawu. Hakuyitambika.
41004022 Hohenohu ashiya niwatu nitata yawu hiyakumulondela.
41004023 Yesu hakwenduzhala mwahita ng'aliliya yezhima  nikushimuna nsang'u yayiwahi  yawanta nikuuka  nyisong'u yenu  nayeng'i niyikatu yeng'i nayeng'i yajing'i nawantu.

41004024 Mpuhu yinji yitiyakana nimuSiliya mwezhima ti-li-li niwena hiyakumuletela antu akaata ezhima akwachika  nyisong'u yeng'i nayeni niamona yihung'u  niakweti anjemoni niakwachinkonya, niakwakalepa yena hakuyikolesha.
41004025 Mazaza awantu hijiyakumulondela afumini kungaliliya, nikujekapoli niku Yelusalema nikuYudeya nikwishinaji ja Yadana.
41005001 Chanamoniyi mazaza awantu hakukanjuka hampiji, chanashakamiyi, atumbanzhi twiji hiyakwinza kuji yena.
41005002 Hakuhosha nakuyitang'isha, ninji,
41005003 'Anakooleki atuzweng'i musipilitu, mulong'a wanta wamwiwulu wunekali wawu.
41005004 Anakooleki ajilang'a, mulong'a akayikunjezha.
41005005 Anakooleki ovwaha mumichima, mulong'a akaswana mpata.
41005006 Anakooleki atiyang'a nzala nampwila yakulong'a, mulong'a akayikutisha.
41005007 Anakooleki akwaluwi, mulong'a akayitiyila luwi.
41005008 Anakooleki atooka mumichima, mulong'a akamona Nzambi.
41005009 Anakooleki akwakuleta kuwunda, mulong'a  akayitena nawu anyana kaNzambi.
41005010 Anakooleki akukabishalawu hansang'u yakulong'a, mulong'a wanta wamwiwulu wunekali wawu.
41005011 ''Akooleka enu anatukuwu chatama  nakuyikabisha nakuyitung'ula mazu atama ezhima nikuyitwambila hansang'u yamami.
41005012 Zang'alalenu lung'enu chacheni, mulong'a amba kayinka wufwentu weneni mwiwulu. Mulong'a jichi
41005013 ''Enu yenu mung'wa wahanu heseki, ilang'a neyi mung'wa wunasamuki akuwutowesha nanka? Hiwukweti nawa cheng'i mudimuku, wakunata tuhu hanzi, awujatoli kuji antu.
41005014 Enu yenu chezhezhi champata yamunu mwishina. Mukala wakutung'ila hampiji hiyatweshang'a kuwuzhinjaku.
41005013 Enu yena mun'wa wahanu heseki, ilang'a neyi mung'wa wunasamuki akuwutowesha nanka? Hiwukweti cheng'i muji,muku, wakunata tuhu hanzhi. awujatoli kuji antu.
41005014 Enu yenu chezhezhi chamunu mwishina. musumba wakutung'ila hampinji hiyatweshang'a kuwujinjaku.
41005015 Hela inong'u hiyadibutulaŋa adisweka mwihebuku, chiŋa kudisha hawimenu wadu ditoŋekeli ejima adi mwitala.
41005016 Ninenu nawa chezhezhii chenu chitozhekang'a kumesu awantu, kulonda amonang'a nyijimu yenu yayiwahi, alemeshang'a Tata yenu wuji mwiwulu.
41005015 Hela inong'u hiyajibutang'a ajisweka mwihebuku, ching'a kujisha hawimenu waju jitong'ekeli ezhima aji mwitala.
41005016 Ninenu nawa chezhezhi chenu chitong'ekeng'a kumensu awantu, kulonda amonang'a nyijimu yenu yayiwahi, alemesheng'a taata yenu wuji mwiwulu.
41005017 Bayi mutong'ozhoka nenu ami nenzi nakukisang'ana Nshimbi hela mazu awatuplofwetu; hinenzi nakuzhikisang'anaku, nenzi nakuzhikolesha.
41005018 Nukuyilezha chalala nami iwulu namaseki amba kahita, ilang'a kazhotu hela kamufunda kanyanya nankashi hikamba kafuma kunshimbuku, ching'a yuma yezhima yinalumbuluki jehi.
41005017 Bayi enu mutong'ozhoka nenu ami nenzi nakukisang'ana Nshimbi hela mazu awa Tupolofwetu, hinenzi nakujikisang'anaku, nenzi nakujikolesha.
41005018 Nukuyilezha chalala nami iwulu namaseki amba kahita, ilang'a kajotu hela kamufunda kanyanya nankanshi hikamba kafuma kunshimbuku, ching'a yyuma yezhima yinalumbuluki jehi.

41005019 Jichi muntu wukumotoka kachuma kamu kinayilezhi, hakutang'ishamu niakwawu, muwanta wamwiwulu akamutena nawu waswezha kukeha; hakwila muntu wukwilamu, hakutang'ishamu niakwawu, muwanta wamwiwulu akamutena nawu muneni.
41005020 Muloŋa nukuyilezha nami, kulong'a kwenu ching'a kubajika kwawansoneki nikwawaFwarisewu, mukunkulwayi himwakatwesha kwing'ila muwanta wamwiwulu nihantuku.

41005019 Jichi muntu wukumotoka kachuma kamu kinayilezhi, hakutang'ishamu niakwawu, muwanta wamwiwulu akamutena, nawu waswezha kukeha, hakwila muntu wukwilamu, hakutang'ishamu niakwawu, muwanta wamwiwulu akamutena nawu muneni.
41005020 Mulong'a nukuyilezha nami, kulong'a kwenu ching'a kubajika kwawakakwajika nikwawaFwalisewu, mukunkulwayi himwakatwesha kwing'ila muwanta wamwiwulu  nihantuku.
41005021 '' Munatiyi chayililuwu antu ahashankulu nawu, Kuzhaha muntu chinzhila; nawu, yowu wukuzhaha muntu keng'a ashiki kukusompeshewa.

41005022 Ilang'a ami nukuyilezha nami yowu wukuzuwa namanakwiji keng'a ashiki kukusompeshewa; yowu wukusozha manakwiji keng'a ashiki muchota; yowu wukwila ninji, Eyi chisupi, wuji kwakwihi nakumona kesi kakalung'a kachinana
41005021 ''munatiyi  chayililuwu antu ahashankulu nawu, 'kuzhaha muntu chinzhila,' nawa, 'Yowu wukuzhaha muntu keng'a ashiki kukusompeshewu.'

41005022 Ilang'a ami nukuyilezha nami yowu wukuzuwua namanakwinji keng'e ashiki kukusompeshewu; 'yowu  wukusozha manakwinji!' keng'a ashiki muchota yowu mukwila ninji, 'Eyi chisupi' wuji kwakwihi nakumona kesi kakalung'a kachinana.
41005023 Jichi neyi wuji nakutwala mulambu weyi kukameng'a kakulambwila, kwenoku hiwukwanuka neyi niji namulong'a namanakwami,
41005024 shiyaku mulambu weyi kwenoku kukameng'a, wuyi wusambili kutiyang'ana namanakweyi; winzi jinu nakulambula.
41005023 Jichi neyi wuji nakutwala  mulambu weyi kukameng'a kukulambwila kwenoku hiwukwanuka neyi ninji namulong'a namanakwami,
41005024 Shiyaku mulambu weyi kwenoku kukameng'a, wuyi. Wusambili kutiyang'ana namanakweyi winzi jinu nakulambula.
41005025 Tiyang'ana swayi nachilumbu cheyi hiwuchiji ninji munzhila, kulonda chilumbu cheyi abuli kukutwala kuji mukwakusompesha, mukwakusompesha hakukwinka kuji nhembi, yena hakukusha mukaleya.
41005026 Nukukulezha chalala nami hiwamba kafuma mwokuku, kufumamu ching'a wunafuti mulong'a wezhima, nikajali kanyanya kushalaku nehi.
41005025 Tiyangana swayi nachilumbu  Cheyi Hiwuchiji Ninji Munzhila, Kulonda  Chilumbu Cheyi abuli kukutwala Kuji mukwakusompesha hakukwinka mukaleya.
41005026 Nukukulezha chalala ami hiwamba kufumamu chinga wunafuti mulonga wejima,Nikajali kanyanya  kushalaku nehi.
41005027 Munatiyi cheliluwu nawu, Kwila wuvumbi chinjila.
41005028 Ilang'a ami nukuyileja nami muntu wukutala mumbanda namesu akumufwila, neli jehi ninji wuvumbi mumuchima winji.
41005027 Munatiyi cheliliwu nawu, kwila wuvumbi chinjila.
41005028 Ilanga ami mukuyilezha nami muntu wakutala mumbanda namesu akumufwila, neli jehi ninji wuvumbi mamuchima winji.
41005029 Neyi jisu jeyi jachijiilu jikukujimbwisha, jitubuli wujinati; chinawahi chiji cheyi chimu kukisika kubajika kunata muzhimba weyi wezhima mukalung'a kachinana.
41005030 Neyi chikasa cheyi chachijiilu chikukujimbwisha, chiketuli wuchinati; chinawahi chiji cheyi chimu kukisika kubajika muzhimba weyi wezhima kuya mukalung'a kachinana.
41005029 Neyi jisu jeyi jachijiilu jikukujimbwisha, jitubuli wujinati, chinawahi chiji cheyi chimu kukisika kubajika kunata muzhimba weyi wejima mukalunga kachinana.
41005030 Neyi chikasa cheyi chachijiilu  chikukujimbwisha,cheketuli wuchinati, chinawahi chiji cheyi chimu kukisika kubajika mujimba weyi wejima kuya mukalunga kachinana.
41005031 Elili cheng'i nawu, Yowu wukuseng'a ing'ojinji, amwinki mukanda wakumuseng'a nachu.
41005032 Ilang'a ami nukuyilezha nami yowu wukusenga ing'ojinji, ching'a  hamulong'a wawuzhila hohu, namubalumuni jehi kwikala chivumbi; muntu wukusumbula owu mumbanda analekuwu, neli wuvumbi.
41005031 Elili chengi nawu, yowu wukuseng'a ing'ojinji, amwinka mukanda wakumuseng'a nachu.
41005032 Ilanga ami mukuyilezha nami yowu wawuzhila hohu, namubalumuni jehi kwikala chivumbi, muntu wukusumbula owu mumbaja analekuwu, neli wuvumbi.
41005033 Cheng'i nawa munatiyi chayililuwu ankakulula ahashankulu nawu, Kusanyika chakujimbana chinzhila, ching'a wumukong'ela MWANTA yiwamusanyikilili.
41005034 Ilaŋa ami nukuyileja nami bayi wusanyika nihantuku; hela kutena iwulu, muloŋa hiitanda daNzambi dawanta;
41005035 hela kutena iseki, mulong'a hiitanda dakunyenju yinji; hela kutena Yelusalema, mulong'a hing'anda yaMwanta muneni.
41005033 ''Cheng'i nawa munatiyi chayililuwu ankakulula ahashankulu nawu, 'kusanyika chakujimbana chinzhila, ching'a wumukong'ela MWANTA yiwamusanyikilili.'
41005034 Ilang'a ami nukuyilezha, hela kutena iwulu, mulong'a hitanda jaNzambi jawanta;
41005035 Hela kutena iseki, mulong'a hiitanda jakunyendu yinji hela kutena Yelusalema, mulong'a hing'anda ya Mwanta muneni.
41005036 Bayi wusanyika hela mutu weyuku, mulong'a hiwukutwesha kutookesha nsuki yimuku, hela kuyiyilishaku.
41005037 Chimukuhoshaŋa, kuminenu jakwila nenu, Eng'a, eng'a; Nehi, nehi; neyi mukushaku mazu acheng'i, chinafumi kuji watama.
41005036 Bayi wusanyika hela mutu weyuku, mulong'a hiwukutwesha kutookesha nsuki yamuku, hela kuyiyilishaku.
41005037 Chimukuhoshang'a kuminenu jakwila nenu, 'Eng'a, eng'a, 'Nehi, nehi.' nenyi mukushaku mazu acheng'e chinafumi kuji watama.
41005038 Enu munatiyi cheliluwu nawu, jisu naisu, izhii nezhi.
41005039 Ilang'a ami nukuyilezha nami bayi muleta ng'ovu nawátamaku, muntu wukukweta kwikiji jachijiilu, mushetumwini nizhikwawu.
41005039 ''Enu munatiyi cheliluwu nawu jisu naj
41005040 Neyi anakuholokeli kuji muntu ninji atambuli chikowelu cheyi, mwitezhi atambuli nikahuma keyi nawa.
41005041 Muntu wukukukakela ninji wuyi ninji mpata yimu, yaku ninji nizhiyeji nawa.
41005042 Muntu wukukulomba, mwinki; muntu wukukeng'a kusondama kuzheyi, bayi wumufutalelaku.
41005043 Munatiyi cheliluwu nawu, Keng'aku mukwenu, helaku chilumbu cheyi.
41005044 Ilang'a ami nukuyilezha nami keng'enu ayilumbu jenu, ninawa ayikabishang'a, yilombelelenu;
41005045 kulonda mwikali anyana kaTata yenu wuji mwiwulu, mulong'a yena watuntwishaŋa itang'wa jinji nihaji atama nihaji amawahi, wanokeshang'a nvula nihadi along'a nihazhi aheng'a
41005046 Mulong'a neyi mukukeng'a antu ayikeng'ang'a hohu, mwakajiila mwoji? Hijimu mwelang'a ansonkeshuku?
41005047 Neyi mukwimusha anakwenu hohu munabajikili akwenu hajihi?
41005048 Hijimu mwelang'a azhentiluku? Jichi enu ching'a mwikala antu alala chikupu, neyi chajiyi Tata yenu wamwiwulu niyena walala chikupu.
41006001 Babalenu mubuli kwinka yamukunkulu yenu kulonda ayimoni kuji antu, neyi mukwila ochu himwakamona wulooku kuji tata yenu wuji mwiwulu.

41006002 Jichi neyi wukwinka yamukunkulu, bayi wimbisha mpung'a  kuwukaya neyi chelang'awu amfwikizhi mumaSinagogi nimunyikwakwaku, nawa atiyakani mpuhu kuji antu, nukuyilezha chalala nami, antaumbuli jehi wulooku wawu.
41006003 Ilang'a eyi, neyi wukwinka yamukunkulu, chikasa cheyi chachimunswa bayi chiluka chikwila chikasa cheyi chachidiluku
41006004 Kulonda yamukunkulu yeyi yikali yakumbaji nitata yeyi wamonang'a kumbaji wakakwinka wulooku weyi
41006005 "Neyi mukulombela, bayi mwilang'a neyi chelang'awu amfwikizhiku, mulong'a wena afwila kwimana nakulombela kumaSinagogi hela Kumaakenu amikwakwa, kulonda ayimoni kuji antu.

41006006 Chalala nukuyilezha nami,  anatambuli wulooku wawu. Ilang'a eyi, chuwukulombelang'a, ing'ilaku kukapeka keyi. Wushinkiku wulombeli kuji tata yeyi, wakumbaji. Nitata yeyi wamonang'a kumbaji wakakwinka wulooku.
41006007 Neyi mukulombelang'a, bayi mwila yamukunkulwayi, neyi chelamg'a Azhentiliku, mulong'a wena atong'ozhokang'a nawu akuyitila kukuvulisha kwamazu.
41006008 Jichi, bayi mwikala neyi wenaku, mulong'a tata yenu neluki yuma yimunakekeng'a henohu kanda mulombi kuji yena.
41006009 Komana lombenung'a nenu, "Tata yetu wekala mwiwulu, Nzhina jeyi jizhili,
41006010 Wanta weyi winzi, kukeng'a kweyi kwili hamaseki neyi chikwelang'a mwiwulu.
41006011 Twinki kujya kwetu lelu.
41006012 Twanakeni mikuji yetu, neyi chitwanakenang'a akweti mikuji nanetu.
41006013 Bayi wututwala mukuteshaku, ilang'a twamwini kuji ona watama.
41006014 Mulong'a neyi mukwanakena antu milong'a yawu nitata mwiwulu wukuyanakena ninenu.
41006015 Ilang'a neyi mukubula kwanakena milong'a yawu, nitata yenu niyena hakuyanakena milong'a yenuku.

41006016 "Chimukuzhing'a nakuleka kujya, bayi mwikala ajiwomba kumensu neyi amfwikizhiku, mulong'a wena atamishang'a kumensu awu kulonda ayimoni kuji antu nawu anazhing'i nakuleki kujya, Nukuyilezha chalala nami anatambuli jehi wuloku wawu.
41006017 Ilang'a eyi chiwukujilng'a nakulek kujya, wayishaku mutu weyi nukuwela jumensu eyi.
41006018 Kulonda wubuleng'a kumwekana kuji antu neyi wanazhing'i nakuleka kujya, ilang'a ching'a kuji Nzambi yeyi hohu niTata yeyi wamonang'a kumbaji wakakwinka wulooku wuyi.
41006019 "Bayi mulumbikang'a maheta enu hamu hamasekiku, haji tububu ninjala yakisang'anang'a, nimakombi alokolang'a nikwing'ilila nakwiya.
41006020 Ilang'a ching'a mulumbikang'a maheta enu mwiwulu, mwabula tububu hela njala yakisang'anang'a , mwabula makombi alokolang'a ni kwing'ilila nakwiya.
41006021 Mulong'a jiku kuji maheta eyi, jiku kukekala nimuchima weyi nawa.
41006022 Jinsu jiyi ng'ombu yamuzhimba. Ilang'a, neyi jinsu jeyi jajiwahi, muzhimba wezhima wenzalang'a nachezhezhi.
41006023 Ilang'a neyi jinsu jeyi jatama, muzhimba weyi wezhima wezala namwijima. Jechi neyi chezhezhi chiji mujayi chikwikala mwijima, owu mwijima wukuswezha!
41006024 Kosi hela wumu wukutwesha kukalakela anyanta ayeji, ching'a yohela wumu akeng'ahu wumu, hela yokakelahu wumu yojiwulahu mukwawu. Hiwukutwesha kukalakela Nzambi nimahetaku.
41006025 Jichi nikuyilezha nawi, bayi mwakama wumi wenu nenu tukujyaji hela tukunwaji, hela muzhimba nenu tukuvwalaji. Wumi hiwabajika kujyaku, hela muzhimba wabajika yakuvwalaku?
41006026 Talaku atujya ahaluzwizu. Hiyakuwang'aku, hiyamunang'aku, hiyalung'ang'a mukalong'aku, ilang'a ayijyishang'a kuji Tata wekala mwiwulu.
41006027 Mwinenwiyi wukwila akame-e anung'a kuchiminu chinji chikunku chakweseka munkotweli yimu?
41006028 Inji jinu mwakamang'aji yakuvwala? tong'ozhokenu wuluya muwujimi, chiwakulang'a, hiwakabakanang'aku hiwajipikulang'aku.
41006029 Ilang'a nukuyilezha nami mwalemeneni iyi Solomoni mwezhima havweli chakweseka hela nawuluya iwu wumuku.
41006030 Jichi Nzambi wavwikang'a matahu muwujimi, achiji koku nilelu nikumajiki hiyakuyinatila hamaseki, Inji wukukuvwika ng'ahi chakubajika eyi wuji nachikuhwelela chantesha?
41006031 Jichi kwakama nenu, " tukujyaji? " hela "Tukunwaji?" hela nawu "Tukuvwalaji?"
41006032 Mulong'a Azhentili ayakeng'akeng'a yumiyi, Tata yeyi wamwiwulu neluki chiwunakukeng'a.
41006033 Ilang'a sambilenu kukeng'a wanta winji nikulonga kwinji, niyuma yezhimiyi akayishilaku.
41006034 Jichi, bayi mwakama kumajikiku, hakwila zhakumajiki jakamena jajeni. Kutama kwefuku jimu kunamani.
41007001 "Bayi musompeshaku, ninenu bauli kuyisompesha.
41007002 Mulong'a kusompeshewa kumwasompeshang'a, jiku kwakayisompeshawu nachu ninenu, nichesekelu chimwakesekela nachu, jichu chakayesekelawu nachu ninenu.
41007003 Wukutalilaji kachibalu kaji mujinsu jamanakweyi, kwinza chibalu cheneni chiji mujinsu jeyi eyi aweni hiwajimonang'aku?
41007004 Inji wukumwililaji manakweyi neyi, "Tala nukufumishi kachibalu kaji mujinsu jeyi, Iku chibalu cheneni chiji mujinsu jeyi eyi aweni?
41007005 Eyi nfwikizhi! Sambilaku kufumisha chibalu cheneni chiji mujinsu jeyi eyi aweni, hakwila wumoni chachiwahi kufumisha kachibalu kaji mijinsu jamanakweyi.
41007006 Bayi mwinka yuma yazhila atuwaku, hela kunatila anguli malola enu awuseya weneni, akuyibalumukila enu nakuyisansola.
41007007 "Lombenu akuyinka. Keng'akeng'enu mukuwana. Jonjomwenenu akuyishinkwila.
41007008 Ezhima akulomba, akutambula; ezhima akukeng'akeng'a, akuwana; nikuji muntu wukujonjomwena, akumushinkwila.
41007009 Mwinenwinyi wukwila mwaninji weyala namulombi jinkenji, yena yamwinka ilola.
41007010 Hela namulombi inshi amwinka kapela?
41007011 Jichi neyi, enu mweluka kwinka anyanenu yamukunkulu yayiwahi, inji Tata yenu wuji mwiwulu yabuli kadika kuyinka akumulomba yuma yayiwahi?
41007012 Jichi, yezhima yimunakeng'a antu kuyilila enu, ninenu nawa yililenu mwomumu, mulong'a jimu mwaya nshimbi niAtupolofwetu.
41007013 "Ing'ililaku kuchinsu chanyanya. Mulong'a chinsu cheneni hinzhila yabwambwankana yaya kukuzhilumuka, mweng'ilang'a  antu amavulu.
41007014 Mulong'a chinsu chanyanya hinzhila yaya kuwumi, nawa ayimonang'a antesha.
41007015 "Ikalenu asong'ama nawa Atupolofwetu akutwamba, ezhang'a kujenu avwala yitembi yanyikoku, ilang'a mukachi hayatunwidi atuhuka.
41007016 Kunyikabu yawu, mukuyiluka. Antu akamonang'a nyikabu yavinyu kunying'a? hela yikuyu kunzonzonzu tahiji?
41007017 Jichi nyitondu yayiwahi yezhima yasong'ang'a mikabu yayiwahi, ilang'a mutundu watama hiwasong'ang'a mikabu yayiwahiku.
41007018 Mutondu wamuwahi hiwukutwesha kusong'a nyikabu yatamaku, hela mutondu watama kusong'a mukabu wawuwahi.
41007019 Mutondu wezhima wabulang'a kusong'a nyikabu yayiwahi akawitema nikuyinatila mukesi.
41007020 Jichu jinu mukuyilukila kumikabu yawu.
41007021 Bayi ezhima akutenatena nawu, 'Mwanta, Mwanta', akengila muwanta waNzambiku, ching'a owu welang'a mwaya kukeng'a kwaTata yami wuji mwiwulu.
41007022 Antu amavulu ambakang'ila hefuku odu nawu, 'Mwanta Mwanta, hitwapolofweteli mwizhina jeyiku, hitwafumishili anjemoni mwizhina jeyiku, hitwakong'eli yihayamisha mwijina jeyiku?'
41007023 Henohu nakayakula nami, hinayilukaku! Fumenu kujami, enu mwakong'ang'a yakuluwa!
41007024 "Jichi, ezhima akutiya mazu nakovwahila aji neyi iyala mukwamana watung'ilili itala jinji helola.
41007025 Ninvula yaholokeli, jibazhi jenzhili nimpepela yakunkili, zheteli hetala oju, hijahumukiliku, mulong'a ajitung'ilili helola.
41007026 Ilang'a ezhima akutiya mazu ama nakubula kuyovwahila akekala neyi iyala wabula maana watung'lili itala jinji hawusekulula.
41007027 Ni nvula yaholokeli, nidibazhi denzhili, nimpepela yakunkilili hetala oju, jaholokeli nikukisankana jezhima.
41007028 Chelili Yesu nakumishi jehi mazu awa, mazaza awantu hiyakuhayama kutang'isha kwinji,
41007029 Mulong'a wajing'i nakuyitang'isha neyi wukweti wanta bayi neyi ang'anjikiku.
41008001 Chanakunkumukiyi hampiji, mazaza hiyakumulonjela.
41008002 Mukwambumba hakwinza nakujifukula kuji yena ninji, "Mwanta, neyi wunatezhi, wukutwesha kuntookesha".
41008003 Yesu hakolola chikasa chinji, hakuhosha ninnji, "netezhi,  tookaku". Hohenohu wambumba yatooka nikutooka.
41008004 Yesu hakumwila ninji, "bayi wulezhamu muntuku. Jiyili kweyi, wukajimwekeshi kuji Kapilisiyu, wakamwinki mulambu wayilezheliyi kuji Mosi, kulonda chakayilili antu wunsahu".
41008005 Chaneng'iliyi muKapelunamu, hikukwinza mukulumpi wamashijika kuji yena,
41008006 Hakuhosha ninji, "Mwanta ng'amba yami nakami kwitala jami wakata kalepa wuji nakukaba nankashi".
41008007 Yesu hakumwila ninji, "nukwinza nakumuuka".
41008008 Mukulumpi wamashijika hakumwakula ninji, "Mwanta, ami hinatela ami kwing'ila mwitala jamiku. Kuminaku jakuhosha kwezu hohu ning'amba yami wukukola.

41008009 Mulong'a ninami nawa nikweti anyanta zhami, nikweti mashijika ang'ovwahilang'a. Nelang'a iwu nami,  'yang'a' hakuya, mukwawu nami, 'Izang'a, hakwinza, njung'u yami hinukukwila nami, "ilaku ichi, hakwaila".
41008010 Yesu chanachitiyiyi, hakuhayama, hakuyila ajing'a nakumulonjela ninji, "nukuyilezha chalala nami, kanja nimoneng'ahu jehi kukuhwelela kwatoha chochichiku, hela muIsarela mwamweni.
41008011 Nukuyilezha, amavulu amba kafuma kumusela nikumuzhika, akashakama naAbalahama, Isaka naYakoba muwanta wamwiwulu.
41008012 Hakwila anyana kamwanta akayumbila kumwijima wahanzi, kwakekala kutumpa nikujisumona kumazhi".
41008013 Yesu hakumwila owu mukulumpi wamashijika ninji, "yang'a kweyi muwunakuhweleli jimu mwakukwililawu". Owu ing'amba wakoleli mpinji yoyenoyu.
41008014 Yesu cheng'ililiyi mwitala jaPetulu, wamweni mwukuwa Petulu wamumbanda nakami wakata mashika.
41008015 Yesu wamukwatili kuchikasa chinji, nimashika amufumini nikumufuma, hakuhinjuka nakumukalakela.
41008016 Chikuneli melela, hiyakumuletela amavulu ajing'a nanjemoni. Hakufumisha asipilitu nezu hakuuka ajing'a akata ezhima.
41008017 Kulonda mwahosheliyi kaPolofwetu Isaya mwakalumbuluki mweliliyi ninji, "Yomweni watambwili kuzeyazeya kwetu wasenjeli ni mising'u yetu".
41008018 Nochu Yesu cahnamoniyi mazaza awntu amavulu hiyakumuwuling'ila, hakwila ninji tuyenu kwishinaji jezhiya jaNg'alaliya.
41008019 Hikukwinza ng'ajiki hakumwila ninji, "mwalimu, nukukulonjela kwezhima kuwukuya".
41008020 Yesu hakumwila ninji, "anyumbu akweti menawu, niAtuja ahaluzwizu akweti yisakala, hakwila mwana kamuntu hakweti nihakusachila mutu winjiku.
41008021 Kambazhi mukwawu hakumwila ninji, "Mwanta, nleki nisambili kuya nakazhiki tata yami".
41008022 "Ilang'a Yesu, hakumwila ninji, nlonjeng'a ;yileki afu ajizhiiki awenawu".
41008023 Yesu chaneng'liyi muwatu, Atumbazhi twinji hiyakumulonjela.
41008024 Hikukwinza mpepela yeneni nankashi hamenzhi hiyakwila watu, hiwukujimina mumankanda. Ilang'a Yesu wajing'i mutulu.
41008025 Atumbanzhi hiyakwinzha kuji yena hiyakumuhindwisha nawu, "Mwanta twamwini tunafwi!"
41008026 Yesu hakuyila ninji, "Enu mukweti chikuhwelelu chanti munatiyi woma wanka?" Hakuhinjuka nikuhoshola mpepela nimankanja awunda ninzo-o.
41008027 Antu hiyakuhayama nawu, "Yeniwu iyala wekala ng'ahi, hiyakumovwahila kuji mpepela nimankanja?

41008028 Yesu chanashikiyi mwishinaji mwitung'a jawaGadaleni, antu ayeji akweti njimoni hiyakumubulakana. Ajing'a nakufuma kumazhamu aswezha kuzuwa nankashi , kuzuwa kwakukang'esha antu kuhita nzhiloyu.
41008029 Kutiya, wena hiyakubilela nawu, "Tukwilaji naneyi, eyi mwana kaNzambi? Eyi wunenzi kunu nakutukabisha hachiji mwaka kanja wushiki, tahinji?"
41008030 Jichi izanvu jawanguli amavuli ajing'a nakujya kwenoku.
41008031 Anjemoni hiyakumulembelela nawu, "Neyi wukutufumishamu  twitemeshi mwizanvu dawanguli!"
41008032 Yesu hakumwila ninji, "Yenu!" anjemona hiyakufumamu hiyakwing'ila muji izanvu jawanguli izanvu jizanvu jezhima janjuka nikwanjuka, hijikuya mwakunkumuka nankashi nimwizhiya, afwa nimumenzhi.
41008033 Owu ayijishileng'a hiyakutemuka, hiyakuya mumikala hiyakulezha antu yuma, yiyamweniwu owu ajing'a nanjemona.
41008034 Kutala antu ezhima amumukala owu hiyakwinza nawu amubulakani Yesu. Chiyamumweniwu, hiyakumulebelela nawu yafumi mwilung'a jawu.
41009001 esu hakwiŋila muwatu, nakufunta cheŋi kwishinadi, hakushika mumukala windi yomweni.
41009002 Kutala hiyakumuletela muntu wakata kalepa, nakami hakajiji. Yesu chanamoniyi kukuhwelela kwawu, hakumwila owu wakata kalepa nindi, Eyi mwanami, tiyaku kuwaha; anakwanakeni nyiloŋa yeyi.
41009003 Ansoneki amu hiyakwila munyichima yawu nawu, Iwu muntu wuji nakutuka Nzambi.
41009004 Yesu hakwiluka yitoŋojoka yawu, hakuyila nindi, Muloŋanyi mudi nakutoŋojokela yatama munyichima yenu?
41009005 Chaswayi kumwila muntu nami, Anakwanakeni nyiloŋa yeyi, tahindi chaswayi kumwila nami, Hindukaku, endaku?
41009006 Ilang'a nalondi mwiluki nenu Mwana kaMuntu wukweti wanta wakwanakena antu nyilong'a hanu hamaseki. Hakumwila owu wakata kalepa nindi, Hindukaku, nonaku kajiji keyi wuyi kwitala jeyi.
41009007 Hakuhinduka, hakuya kwitala jinji.
41009008 Mazaza awantu chanamonuwu ochu, hiyakutiya woma, hiyakumulemesha Nzambi wenkeli antu wantowu.
41009009 Chading'i nakupandakanayi Yesu nakufuma kwenoku, hakumona muntu izhina dindi Matewu, nashakami kwakutambwila nyombu, hakumwila nindi, Nlondi. Hakunyamuka, hakumulondela.
41009010 Chashakaminiyi mwitala nakujya, kutala ansonkeshi nawakwanshidi amavulu hiyakwinza nakushakama chimu naYesu niatumbanji twindi.
41009011 Chanachimonuwu aFwarisewu, hiyakuyila atumbanji twindi nawu, Nkuluing'aing'a yenu wadiilaing'adi nawansonkeshi nawakwanshidi?
41009012 Chanachitiyiyi, hakwila nindi, Akola hiyakeŋakeŋaŋa chimbukuku, chiing'a ákata.
41009013 Yenu mwakashinshiki mazu elawu nawu, Nakeing'i luwi, bayi chimuna chakuketulaku; muloing'a hinenzi nakutambika along'aku, nenzi nakutambika akwanshidi.
41009014 Henohu atumbanzhi twaYowanu hiyakwinza kuji yena nawu, Etu nawatumbanzhi twawaFwarisewu twasweja kujiŋujoka nakuleka kujya, hakwila atumbanzhi tweyi hiyajiing'aing'aku. Chafumaŋa hanka?
41009015 Yesu hakuyila nindi, Ádi nakalemba akuneing'a ing'ahi hachiduwu nakalemba? Mafuku akenza akafumishawu kalemba kudi wena, dihu hakajiing'ujokawu nakuleka kujya.
41009016 Hikudi muntu wukusha chitabu chehina jajiha kuchikowelu chachikuluku; mukunkulwayi ochu chajiing'i chakuzhikamu nachu chikutabula chikowelu, chiloku chikuswezha kutoha.

41009017 Hikuji muntu wukuloing'a vinyu yayiha mumapakumuna ayitembi yayikuluku; neyi wukwila ochu, mapakumuna ayitembi akubusika, vinyu yikumwaŋala, niipakumuna dachitembi jikukisika; vinyu yayiha ayilong'ang'a mwipakumuna jajiha, jichi yezhima yikwikala yayiwenyi.

41009018 Chahoshelaŋayi nawu yumiyi, kutala hikukwinza nyuuli wumu, hakujifukula kudi yena ninji, Mwanami wamumbanda nafwi jehi katatakichi; hela chochu, inzaku wumunaing'iki chikasa cheyi, wukuhanda.
41009019 Yesu hakunyamuka, hakumulondela niatumbanzhi twindi hamu.
41009020 Kutala mumbanda wapwekelaŋa mashi nyaka ikumi nayiyedi (12), hakwinza kunyima yindi, hakukunka kumukundulu wehina jinji;
41009021 muloŋa welili mumuchima winji ninji, Hela nukukunka kwakwihina jinji hohu, nukukola.
41009022 Ilang'a Yesu hakushetumuka, hakumumona; hakumwila nindi, Eyi mwanami, tiyaku kuwaha; kukuhwelela kweyi kunakukoleshi jehi. Kufuma hampinji oyu owu mumbanda akola nikukola.
41009023 23 Chanenziyi Yesu mwitala danowu nyuuli, hakumona akwakwimba yisanji, niizaza dawantu adi nakuleta ipumba.
41009024 24 Hakuyila ninji, Fumenumu; mwana hanafuku, wuji mutulu. Hiyakumuseha chakumujiwula.
41009025 Izaza chidinediki, yena hakwiing'ilamu, hakumukwata kuchikasa, owu mwana wamumbanda hakunyamuka.
41009026 Mpuhu yachumochu yitiyakana nimwituŋa jezhima.
41009027 27 Chajiing'i nakuhitayi Yesu nakufuma kwenoku, amayala amputamesu ayeji hiyakumulondela nakubilela nawu, Eyi Mwana kaDavidi, tutiyili luwi.
41009028 Chaneŋiliyi mwitala, owu amputamesu hiyakwinza kudi yena; Yesu hakuyila nindi, Enu munakuhweleli nenu ami natweshi kwila chumichi, tahinji? Hiyakumwila nawu, Eng'a Mwanta.
41009029 29 Dichi hakuyikunka kumesu awu nindi, Mwashika kukuhwelela kwenu dimu mwakuyililawu.
41009030 Nimesu awu atona nikutona. Yesu hakuyileja chakola nankashi nindi, Bayi achiluka kuji muntuku.
41009031 Ilang'a wena hiyakuya nakutiyakesha mpuhu yinji mwitung'odu jezhima.
41009032 Hayilang'awu, kutala hiyakumuletela kamama wukweti njemoni.
41009033 Owu ndemoni chanafumiyi, kamama hakuhosha; mazaza awantu hiyakuhayama nawu, muIsarela kanda amonaŋahu dehi chuma chidi neyi ichuku.
41009034 Ilang'a aFwarisewu nawu, Wuji nakufumisha anjemoni naŋovu jamwanta wawandemoni.
41009035 Yesu hakuhitang'ana munyikala yejima, niyamaneni niyanyanya, nakutang'isha mumashikolawu, nakushimuna nsaŋu yayiwahi yawanta, nakuuka nyisoŋu yejima niyikatu yezhima.
41009036 Ilang'a chanamoniyi mazaza awantu, hakuyitiyila wushona, mulong'a akabakeni, apalang'eni neyi nyikoku yakaji kabing'a.
41009037 Henohu hakuyila atumbanzhi twinji ninji, Chalala mbutu zhazhivulu zhinahi jehi, ilang'a akwakukalakala anakehi.
41009038 Dichi lombelenu kuji Mwanta wakumuna atemeshi akwakukalakala kukumuna kwinji.
41010001 Hakutambika atumbanji twindi ikumi nayei (12), hakuyinka wanta wakufumisha aspiritu azonda, niwakuuka nyisoŋu yezhima niyikatu yezhima.
41010002 Tiyenu mazhina anowu apostolu ikumi nayeji (12): watachi Shimona, atumbiluwu nawu Petulu, namanakwinji Anderi; mwana kaZebedewu Yakoba, namanakwinji Yowanu;
41010003 Fwilipu naBatolomewu; Tomasi nansonkeshi Matewu; mwana kaAlafwewu Yakoba, naTadewu;
41010004 mukwaKenani Shimona, naYudasi Isakaroti, jiyi wamufukezheli nawa.
41010005 Yesu hakutemesha wenawa ikumi nayeji (12), hakuyilezha ninji, Bayi muya munzhila zhawaZhentili, hela kwing'ila munyikala yawaSamariyaku;
41010006 ching'a kuya kuji anyikoku amutaŋa waIsarela azhimbala.
41010007 Chimukuya, muyang'a nakushimuna nenu, Wanta wamwiwulu wuji kwakwihi.
41010008 Kayuukenu akata, kasang'ulenu afu, katookeshenu akwambumba, kafumishenu anjemoni. Kutambula, munatambuli chamukunkulu; kwinka, kenkenu nawa chamukunkulu.
41010009 Bayi mujikeng'ela hela wuru, hela siliva, hela wuneng'u muyikwama yenuku;
41010010 hela ipakumuna jakuya nachu munzhila yenu, hela tuhuma tuyedi, hela nkwabilu, hela mukombu nehi, mulong'a mukwakukalakala watela yakujya yinji.
41010011 Nimunyikala yezhima yimwakeng'ila, hela yeneni, hela yanyanya, mwakakeŋakeŋamu yowu wujumu watela, kwoku kumwakashakama nichimwakafumaku.
41010012 Chimwakeŋila mwitala mwakemusha akwetaloju.
41010013 Neyi akwetalodu atela, kuwunja kwenu kwakekalumu; ilang'a neyi hiyatelaku, kuwunja kwenu kwakayifuntili cheng'i.
41010014 Yowu wakabula kuyitambula hela kutiyilila mazu enu, chimwakafuma mwitalodu, hela mumukalowu, mwakadikumuna lunkuŋu luji kunyendu yenu.
41010015 Nukuyileja chalala nami, hefuku dakusompesha ihung'u jetung'a daSodoma naGomora jakakuminamu, Jamukalowu jakabajika.
41010016 Tiyenu, hinukuyitemesha neyi anyikoku mukachi kawatuŋwidi, jichi ikalenu namaana neyi atupela, kuwunda wunjenu neyi atutela.
41010017 Hakwila antu yibabelenu, mulong'a akayitwala kuyota, akayivupola mumashikolawu;
41010018 mwamweni, akayitwala nikumesu awanyuuli, nikumesu awanyanta, kukoola nsaŋu yamami, kulonda chakayilili wunsahu niwena niazhentili.
41010019 19 Ilaŋa chakayitwalawu kudi antu, bayi mwakaakama nenu tukuhoshadi? hela nenu tukuhosha mazwinyuku? Mulong'a akayinka mazu akuhosha yoyena mpinji oyu.
41010020 Mulong'a hiyenu mwakahoshaku, Spiritu waTata yenu jiyi wakahosha mujenu.
41010021 Muntu wakafukezha manakwindi kuji akwawu akamuzhahi, nitata yawantu wakafukezha mwaninji; nianyana akanyamukila anvwali zhawu nakuyizhahisha.
41010022 Ninenu akayihela kuji antu ezhima kukoola izhina jamami; ilang'a muntu wakakakela nikunsa diyi wakahanda.
41010023 Chakayikabishawu mumukala wumu mwakatemukila mumukala wukwawu; mulong'a nukuyilezha chalala nami, chakenzayi Mwana kaMuntu, yena wakawana kanda muhiti munyikala yawaIsarela yejimaku.
41010024 Kambanzhi habajikaŋa nkulung'ang'a yinduku, hela nduŋu habadikaŋa nkaka yinjuku.

41010025 Kambanzhi wukukumina dakwesekana nankuluŋaŋa yinji, nindung'u wukwesekana nankaka yindi. Neyi mwanta wetala anamuteni nawu Belezebuli (mwanta wawandemoni), indi akwetala dindi hiyakubadika kuyitena chochochuku?
41010026 Dichi bayi muyitiyaŋa womaku, mulong'a hikwekala chuma chabutang'awu chikubula kujikukaku, hela chajindang'awu chikubula kutiyakanaku.
41010027 Chuma chinukuyilejela mumwijima, chihoshelenu hamwaana; chuma chimukutiyila mwitu, chibijikilenu hamawulu amatala.
41010028 Dichi bayi mutiyaŋa woma ájahang'a mujimbaku, hiyanatweshi kuzhaha muntu wamukachuku; ilang'a tiyenu woma Owu natweshi kukisang'ana nimuntu wamukachi nimujimba mukaluva kachinana.
41010029 Tuja twanyanya tuyeji hiyatulandishang'a nakadaluku? Hosi kakada kamu kaholokelaŋa heseki chakadi Tata yenu kuchitejaku;
41010030 ilang'a ninsuki jakunyitu yenu jajeni azhichinda jehi jejima.
41010031 Dichi bayi mutiyang'a womaku; enu mwalema chakubadika tuja twatuvulu.
41010032 Dichi yowu wakaŋiteja kumesu awantu, ninami nawa nakamwiteja kumesu aTata yami wudi mwiwulu.
41010033 Ilaŋa yowu wakadikalami kumesu awantu, ninami nawa nakadikalayi kumesu aTata yami wudi mwiwulu.
41010034 Bayi mutong'ozhoka nenu nenzi nakuleta kumwena hanu hesekuku, hinenzi nakuleta kumwenaku, ching'a mpoku yakabali.
41010035 Mulong'a nenzi, Nakwambula iyala natata yindi, Mwana wamumbanda namama yindi, Nimukuwindi wamumbanda namukuwindi wamumbanda.
41010036 Akwankunyi namuntu akekala wowu amwitala jinji yomweni.
41010037 Muntu wakeŋa tata yindi hela mama yindi chakubadika chankeng'ayi ami, hananteleli amuku; niwákeng'a mwanindi weyala, hela mwanindi wamumbanda chakubajika chankeng'ayi ami, hananteli amuku.
41010038 Muntu wukubula kunona kulusu yindi nakunlondelami, hananteleli amuku.
41010039 Muntu nawani wumi winji wakawujimbesha; niwúkujimbeshela wumi windi hansang'u yamami wakawuhemba.
41010040 Muntu wukuyitambulenu nantambulami, muntu wukuntambulami natambuli niyena wantemesheli.
41010041 Muntu wukutambula kaprofwetu hansau yejina dakaprofwetu, wakatambula wulooku wakaprofwetu; wúkutambula muntu walong'a hansang'u yejina damuntu walong'a, wakatambula wulooku wamuntu walong'a.
41010042 Yowu wukwinka iwu wanyanya wumu lupasa lwamenji atuuta hansang'u yejina dakambanzhi, nukuyilezha chalala nami, hakabula wulooku winjuku.
41011001 Chelili Yeesu nakumishi jehi kutang'isha atumbanzhi kwinji ikumi nayeji (12), hakufuma kwenoku nakuya nakutang'sha nimunyikala yawu.
41011002 Chachiteyeliyi Yowanu mukaleya hayilwilu yaKilisitu, watumini mazu nawaTumbanzhi.
41011003 Nakuyila ninji, "Eyi yeyi wunakwinza inji, tuhembeleli wacheng'i?
41011004 Yesu hakuyakula nakuyilezha ninji, "yenu mukamulezhi Yowanu yimunamoni na kutiya.
41011005 Amputamensu anakutona, ayifwayi anakwenda, akwambumba anatooki, azhika matelu hiyakutiya, afu anakusang'uka, atuzweng'i hiyakuyishimwina nsang'u yayiwahi.
41011006 Muntu wukubula kumona mujami chuma chakujimbwisha nakooleki.
41011007 Chanayiwu amayala munzhila yawu, Yesu hakutachika kwihula mazaza awantu nsang'u yaYowanu, "mwayili muchikalampata nakutalaji? Iteti jatepokang'a nampepela tahinji?"
41011008 Inji mwayili nakumonaji-muntu navwali yayiwahi tahinji. Mwamweni, nukuyilezha nami, avwalang'a yayiwahi ekalang'a ekalang'a mumatala awanyanta.
41011009 Inji mwayililiji nakumona-Kapolofwetu? mwamweni, nukuyilezha nami, yena wabajika nankashi Kapolofwetu.
41011010 Jiyi yeniwu iyanjikiliwu 'talenu nukutemeshang'ahu jehi ntemesha yami henohu eyi kanja. Wakalong'esha inzhila yeyi henohu eyi kanja.
41011011 Chalala nukuyilezha nami haji antu anavwaliki kuji ambanda, hikuji wunamwekani kubajika Yowanu nzhimikiku. Hela chochu nakehi muwanta wamwiwulu wamwiwulu nakubajiki yena.
41011012 Kufumisha kumafuku aYowanu nzhimiki nakushika kumafuku anu akatataka, wanta wamwiwulu aji nakuwukwata nang'ovu kuji akwang'ovu.
41011013 Mulong'a Atupolofwetu ezhima ninshimbi apolofweteli kushika nikuji Yowanu;
41011014 Jichi neyi wunakufwila kwitezha ichi, jiyi Elizha wateleli kwinza.
41011015 Yowanu wuji namatelu akutiya, atiyi.
41011016 Chumanyi chinateli kufwikizha nachu iwu munza? chinafwani neyi tatwansi anashakami kuwulanjishilu nakubijika akwawu.
41011017 Nawu 'tunayimbili mapeleli enu,
41011018 Yowanu chizhileyi chakubula kuja jinkenji nikunwa vinyu, cheng'i ahosheli nawu, 'wuji na jemoni!
41011019 Mwana kamuntu wenzhili nakuja nikunwa ni kuhosha nawu, 'tala, talenu muntu wafwa waswezha kunwa walwa, ibwambu jawansonskeshi nawkwanshiji! Maana naying'i namijimu yinji".
41011020 Hohenohu Yesu atachikanihi kuhoshola nyikala mwelileng'ayi yihayamisha, mulonga ajanakeneninwanyi.

41011021 "Oyu yihung'u yiwakamona eyi, Kolazini! Oyu yihung'u yiwakamona , Betiseda! Neyi yihayamisha yineliki jehi Mutila na muSodoni yelikili muji eyi, mutenowu abalumukili munyichima yeyi nakovwahila yikelayi nikujisukwila mawuti.
41011022 Ilang'a nikuyilezha nami yikavula hefuku jakusompesha  yihung'u yaTila naSodoni.
41011023 Eyi, Kapelinamu, wutong'ozhoki neyi akukutumbakesha kwiwulu? Inehi, akakuleta mwishina na mujeyi.
41011024 Neyi ayililili muSodoma muyelileng'awu yihamisha muji eyi, mutenowu wujikoku nilelu. Ilang'a nikuyilezha nami, mukala waSodoni hefuku jakusompesha kubajika eyi".
41011025 Hampinji oyu Yesu hakuhosha ninji, nakulemeshi, taata, mwanta wewulu niiseki, nakusakilili chiwajinjili yumiyi kuji akwamaana, nikujimwekesha kuji anyikeki.
41011026 Ilang'a, taata, jichi chakuhamekeleliwu.
41011027 Ananyinki yuma yezhima kuji tata yami; cheng'i kosi muntu wamwiluka mwanaku ching'a yowu tata, cheng'i kosi nawa wamwiluka tata wukuyimwekeshela.
41011028 Inzenu kujami, enu ezhima muji nakukabakana mwasenja yalema, ami nukuyinookesha,
41011029 Jitwikenu mpanja yami, mujinzhili kujami mulong'a ami nawunda, najizoza mumuchima ninenu mukumona kunooka munyima yenu.
41011030 Mulong'a mpanja yami yaswayi nichisenda chami chapepela.
41012001 Hamafuku owu Yesu wahitili mumaha atijiku haSabata. Atumbanzhi twiinji chinatuyiwu nzala hiyakutachika kukotola nyitu yatijiku nakujya.
41012002 Jichi afwalisewu chachimwenuwu, ahosheli kuji Yesu nawu, "Tala, atumbazhi hiyakwila chuma chuluwa haSabata".
41012003 Yesu wahosheli kuji wena, "Humunatangi'i cheliliyi Davidi hatiyili nzala, ninantu ajing'ayi nawu?
41012004 Cheng'ililiyi mwitala jaNzambi nakuja mankenji akutenteka, ajing'i azhila kuyija kuji yena ninowu ajing'iyi nawu, ilang'a yambala yawatuPulisitu.
41012005 Himunatang'iku munshimbi mwelawu haSabata ni natuPulisitu muTembeli chakaji hakuyinkela , ilang'a Sabata mulong'aku?
41012006 Ilang'a nukuyilezha nami, kunu kuji wabajika Tembeli.
41012007 Neyi mweluka mwaya mazu, 'nakeng'a luwi bayi kujihanaku, 'himwaji kuhishang'a muntu wakaji mulong'aku.
41012008 Mulong'a mwana kamuntu jiyi mwanta waSabata.
41012009 Hohenohu Yesu yafuma nikwenoku hakwing'ila nimuSinagogi.
41012010 Tala, kwajing'i muuntu wukweti chikasa chakalepa, Afwalisewu hiyakumwila Yesu nawu, "Hinshimbi kukila haSabata?" kulonda amwinki mulong'a.
41012011 Yesu hakuyila ninji, "Hajihu hinyi, wukwila neyi mukoku, winji wumu naholokeli mwibuku haSabata, yabula kumukwata yamutupulamu?
41012012 Kulemanyi kwatela, kulema muntu wabajika mukoku! Jichi kwila chachiwahi haSabata".
41012013 Yesu hakumwila muntu, "Ololaku chikasa cheyi hakucholola, chakola jehi, neyi chikalasa chikwawu".
41012014 Ilang'a Afwalisewi hiyakwijikamu hiyakukwata mpuhu yakumuzhaha.
41012015 Yesu, chinachilukiyi, hakufuma kwnoku, antu amavulu amulonjeleli, nawa wayukili ezhima.
41012016 Hakuyilezha nang'ovu ninji, bayi muntiyakeshaku.
41012017 Kulonda mwashimwinewu kapolofwetu Isaya mulumbuluki, nawu,
41012018 "Tala, kambung'ami inatonji; wunakeng'a, muji yena natiyang'amu kuwaha. Nakasha Sipilitu yami haji yena, wakashimwina Azhentili wuhaku.
41012019 Hakatiyakana hela kubilelaku, Hela izu jinji hosi wakajitiya munyikwakwaku.
41012020 Iteti jachikeka akajikotolaku, wanja wuji nakufwinda wishi, Akawizhikamu nichakashikizhayi wuhaku wimiki mushinju.
41012021 Azhentili akakuhwelela izhina jinji".
41012022 Hohenohu hiyakumuletela muntu wukweti njimini, wela niwumputamensu, niwumaama hakumona kuuka kwakwila owu kamaama hakuhosha nikumona.
41012023 Mazaza awantu ezhima hiyakuhayama nankashi, yeniwu jiyi mwana kaDavidi tahinji?"
41012024 Afwalisewu chanachitiyiwu nawu kuji yihayamisha, ahosheli nawu, "iwu muntu wafumushang'a njemoni nang'ovu zhamwanta wawanjemoni Belezebuli".
41012025 Ilang'a Yesu welukili yitong'ozhoka yawu nakuyilezha ninji, "Mawanta ezhima akujambula, akushala kwamahembi ninyikala yezhima hela matala akujambula hiyakukolaku.
41012026 Satana neyi wukumisha yomweni Satana, najambuli jehi wanta winji wukukola ng'ahi?
41012027 Neyi ami nukufumishang'a njemoni nang'ovu zha Belezebuli, inji anyanenu ayifumishang'a nang'ovu zhanyi? Jichi wena jiwu akayisompesha.
41012028 Hakwila neyi ami nafumishang'a anjemoni naSipilitu waNzambi, komana wanta wanzambi wunayiwani jehi.
41012029 Inji wukutwesha kwing'ila mwitala jamukwang'ovu nakubuwa yuma yinji ching'a yasambila kumakasa owu muntu mukwang'ovu?
41012030 Wunabuli kwikala hamu nanami, hichilumbu chami niwabulang'a kupompesha chimu nanami wapalang'esha.
41012031 Jichi nukuyilezha nami, nyilong'a yezhima nimatuka akutukawu Nzambi ezhima akayanakena antu, hakwila mutuka akatuka Sipilitu hiyakayanakenaku.
41012032 Wezhima wakahosha izu haji mwana kamuntu, Owu akamwanakena. Ilang'a wukuhosha haji Sipilitu wazhila, Owu hiyakamwanakenaku, hela makonu, hela kunyanka yamba kenza.
41012033 Mutondu ching'a wikala wawuwahi ninyikabu yawu yikuwaha, neyi  wukwikala watama ninyikabu yawu yikutama mulong'a mutondu awilukilang'a kunyikabu yawu.
41012034 Enu anyana katubanda yuula, enu atama, mukuhoshang'ahi yuma yayiwahi? mulong'a kanwa kahoshang'a yuma yinalumbami mumuchima.
41012035 Muntu wamuwahi wukwijisha yuma yayiwahi kuyuma yinji yayiwahi, nimuntu watama yinji yatama.
41012036 Nukuyilezha nami mazu ezhima abula kutela iyakahoshawu antu amba kayilumbulula hetang'wa jakusompesha.
41012037 Mulong'a akakuying'ishi namazu eyi, akakuhisha  namazu eyi nawa".
41012038 Hohenohu ang'anjiki amakwawu niAfwalisewu hiyakumwakula nawu, "Eyi mwalimu, tunakeng'i tumoni chinjikizhilu chiwukwila".
41012039 Ilang'a Yesu hakuyakula ninji, "chisaka chatama chawuvumbi hiyakukeng'a chinchikizhilu chakaPolofwetu Yona.
41012040 Mulong'a chajing'iyi Yona mwivumu janshi muneni mafuku asatu, nimwaana niwufuku jichi chakekala nimwana kamuntu asatu nimwaana niwufuku.
41012041 Antu akuNinive amba achisakachi hakusompesha. Mulong'a wena abalumukili mumuchima, hiyayishimwininiwu kuji Yona, talenu kunu kuji wabajika Yona.

41012042 Mwanta wamumbanda wakukabeta kakuchijiilu wamba kemama nakuhisha antu achisakaichi hakusompesha, Mulong'a yena wafumini kwakumina hamaseki enzi nakutiya maama aSolomoni, talenu, kunu kuji wabajika Solomoni.
41012043 Sipilitu wazonda chakufumayi muji muntu, wukuhitahita mwamuvulu mwakaji menzhi nakukeng'akeng'a kwakunookela.
41012044 Chakukang'anyi ninji, 'tali nifunti mwitala jami munafunamini'. Chakwinzayi, kuwana mwamukunkulu - anakombumu anapong'omwenumu jehi.
41012045 Hakuya nakukeng'akeng'a Asipilitu amakwawu atanu nayeji hiyakwing'ilamu, hiyakushakamamu kunkuminina kwanowu muntu kukubajika kutama chajing'iyi hakusambila".
41012046 Iku Yesu wuchiji kuhosha namazaza awantu, hohenohu, kutala mama yinji nawanakwinji anemani hanzhi, anakukeng'a kuhosha nayena.
41012047 Wumu hakumwila ninji, "tala, mama yeyi nawanakweyi awa anemani hanzhi, anakukeng'a kuhosha naneyi".
41012048 Yena Yesu hakwakula owu muntu wamulezheli ninji, "Mama yami hinyi, anakwami anyi?"
41012049 Hakwolola chikasa chinji kuji atumbanzhi twinji, Talenu mama yami nianakwami!
41012050 Mulong'a yowu wukwila muchima watata yami wuji mwiwulu, jiyi manakwami, jiyi mama yami.
41013001 Ifuku jojenoju Yesu hakwijika mwitala hakushakama kuchikumu chezhiya.
41013002 Maza awantu hiyakumupompela, jichi hiyakwing'ila nakushakama muwatu kuchikumu.
41013003 Hakuhosha nawu yuma yayivulu muyishimu. Ninji, "mukwakukuwa mbutu wayili nakukuwa.
41013004 Chakuwiliyi, zhikwawu zhoholokeleli kunsa yanzhila, atuja hiyakwinza nakuzhijya.
41013005 Zhimbutu zhikwawu zhaholokeleli hamalola, habulili maseki amavulu, zhibaluka nihohenohu mulong'a habulili maseki amavulu kwishina.
41013006 Itang'wa chijinashiki mwiwulu, hizhikubabika hizhikuuma mulong'a zhabulili nyizhi.
41013007 Zhikwawu zhaholokeleli munying'a, oyu nying'a hiyikuzhika mbutu.
41013008 Mbutu zhikwawu zhaholokeleli hamaseki amawahi hizhikusong'a mbutu, zhakwawu nkulakazhi (100), zhikwawu makumi atanu najimu (60) zhikwawu makumi asatu (30).
41013009 Yowu wukweti matelu akutiya, yatiyi.
41013010 Atumbanzhi hiyakwinza nakumwila nawu, "Yesu wahoshelang'aji nawu muyishimu?"
41013011 Yesu yena hakuyakula ninji, "Enu anayitezhi kwiluka nsang'u zhawanta wamwiwulu zhazhinjawu, hakwila wena hiyanayitezhiku.
41013012 Wukweti akamwinka wakaheta yayivulu, hakwila wabula akamutambula ninoku kajiyi naku
41013013 Jichi nahoshelang'a nawu muyishimu: Mulonga chamanang'awu, hiyakumonang'aku, chiyatiyang'awu hiyakuchitiying'aku, hela kwiluka heyelukang'aku.
41013014 Kuji wena hansang'u yawena wupolofwetu waIsaya, wayilili ninji, 'kutiya mwakatiya, ilang'a himwakashinshika nihantiku; Kumona, mwamona, ilang'a himwakelukaku.

41013015 Mulong'a antu awa michima yawu anayisupishi, namatu awu anazhiki, nimensu awu anazhima, Akenja kumona namensu awu, Akenja katiya namatelu awu, akenja kashimuna mumichima yawu kulonda akabalumuki cheng'i nakayuki.
41013016 "Hakwila mensu enwenu anakooleki, mulong'a amonanang'a, namatelu enu, mulong'a atiyang'a.
41013017 Chalala nukuyilezha nami Atupolofwetu amavulu niantu along'a akengeli nawu amoni yumiyi yimukumonenu hiyayimwenuku. nawu atiyi yuma yimukutiyenu hiyayitiyiliku.
41013018 Jichi tiyenu chishimu chamukwakukuwa mbutu.
41013019 Tiya muntu wukwila chakutiyayi mazu awanta yena kumulumbulukila nehi, watwma hakwinza nakuhukula yanakuwuwu mumuchima winji. Jiyi wunakuwuwu kunsa yanzhila.
41013020 Anakuwuwu hamalola jiyi wukwila chakutambulayayi mazu namuzang'alu hohenohu.
41013021 Ilang'a hakweti muzhi muji yomweninjiku wukukakelahu chanti. Chikukwinza lukaji hela ikabisha jahansang'u yamazu, hohenohu yojimbuka nikujimbuka.
41013022 Anakuwuwu mukachi kanying'a, jiyu muntu wukwila chakutiyayi mazu, kwakama kwamakonu nikujimbana kwamaheta hikukuvumbisha mazu, niyena hakasong'ang'aku.

41013023 Anakuwuwu hamaseki amawahi, jiyi muntu wukwila chakutiyayi mazu, hiyakumulumbulukila, chalala jiyi wukusong'a, iwu nkulakazhi (1000) iwu makumi atanu najimu (60), iwu makumi asatu (30). Chayikuwiliwu".
41013024 Yesu hikuyitila chishimu chikwawu. ninji, " Wanta wamwiwulu wuji neyi muntu wakuwili mbutu yayiwahi mwiha jinji.
41013025 Ilang'a antu chakaminuwu tulu, mukwankunyi ninji hakwinza nakukuwa mbutu yamatahu mukachi katijiku hakujiyila kwinji.
41013026 Ilang'a chabalukili mitondu, hiyikusakumuna matahu hiyakumwekana nawa.
41013027 Ang'amba zhamwini itala hiyakwinza nakumwila nawu, 'Mwanta, hiwakuwili mbutu yayiwahi mwiha jeyiku?'
41013028 "Yena hakuyila ninji, 'Anachili kuji mukwankunyi nami".
41013029 "Ilang'a mwini mukala ninji, nehi, mwakenza kwila chimubwita matahu, mukubwita kumu nizhimbutu.

41013030 Zhikulili tuhu hamu kumuzhezhima nihakumuna hachilaaka chakumuna nakayila akwakumuna nami, sambilenu kukung'ulamu matahu, muyikasi yita mwakayochi, hakwila tijiku muyikung'wili munkalang'a yami.""
41013031 Yesu hakuyitila chishimu chikwawu. ninji, " Wanta wamwiwulu wuji neyi kambutu kanyanya kaMusitaji kamu kanoneliyi muntu, hakukatumba mwiha jinji.

41013032 Chalala jiku kambutu kakuminamu kukeha hambutu zhezhima, ilang'a chikakukula hikakubajika yiputa yakutumba yezhima, mutondu yinji. Wakwila niatuja ahaluzwizu hiyakwinza nakutung'ila yisakala yawu kunyitayi yinji."
41013033 Yesu hakuyitila chishimu chikwawu ninji, "Wanta wamwiwulu wuji neyi ilung'i janoneli mumbanda, hakusha mumahebi asatu awung'a, wung'a wezhima wing'ila niilung'i".
41013034 Yesu walezheli mazaza awantu yuma yezhimiyi nayishimu hohu; hayilezheli chakaji chishimuku.
41013035 Kulonda mwahosheliyi kapolofwetu mwakalumbuluki, mweliliyi ninji, Nakahosha nayishimu, nakahosha yuma yazhinjiliwu kufumisha hiyaliliwu chilulu champata yamunu mwishina".
41013036 Yesu hakushiya mazaza hakufunta mwitala. Atumbanzhi twinji hiyakwinza kuji yena nawu, Tulumbulwili chishimu chamatahu amwiha".
41013037 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, "Wakuwang'a mbutu yayiwahi jiyi mwana kamuntu.
41013038 Iha jiyi mpata yamunu mwishina; mbutu yayiwahi jiwu anyana kawatama,
41013039 Mukwankunyi wayikuwili jiyi Jiyabolu. kumuna jihu-hamba kakuma nyaka yinu, akwakumuna jiwu aang'elu.
41013040 Chakung'ulawu matahu nakuyocha mukesi, jichi chichakela nihamba kakuma nyaka yinu.
41013041 Mwana kamuntu wakatemesha Ang'elu zhinji, akafumisha muwanta winji yuma yajimbwishang'a yezhima nialuwang'a.
41013042 Akayinatila muluteng'u lwakesi, mwakekala kujila nikujisumona kumazewu.
41013043 Hohenohu along'a akatong'eka muwanta watata yawu neyi itang'wa. Yowu wukweti matelu akutiya atiyi.

41013044 "Wanta wamwiwulu wuji neyi chuma chalema wuseya chaswekawu mwiha, chanachiwaniwu kuji muntu hakuchisweka cheng'i. namuzang'alu watiyiliyi hakuya nakulanjisha yajing'ayi nayu yezhima hakulanda ihoju.
41013045 Cheng'i nawa, wanta wamwiwulu wuji neyi nakukeng'akeng'a mpelola zhazhiwahi.
41013046 Chanawaniyi mpelola yimu yaswezha kulema wuseya, hakuya nakulanjisha yuma yajing'iyi nayu yezhima, hakuyilanja.
41013047 Cheng'i nawa, wanta wamwiwulu hwuji neyi kaleng'i kalalumwinawu makalung'alwizhi, hiyakupompeshelamu anshi zhanyichiji yezhima.
41013048 Chikanenzali mbe-e, hiyakukunkumukila kuchikumu; hiyakushakama, hiyakupompeshela yayiwahi mumahembi, yatama hiyakuyinata.
41013049 Jichi chichakela nihamba kakuma nyaka yinu. Ang'elu amba kenza nakwambula atama kuji along'a.
41013050 Amba kayinatila muluteng'u lwakesi, mwamba kekala kuji nakujiumona kumazewu.
41013051 Yuma yezhimiyi yinayilumbulukili, tahinji Hiyakumwila nawu, eng'a.
41013052 Yena hakuyilezha ninji, Jichi ang'anjiki ezhima anlezhiwu yawanta wamwiwulu, aji neyi mukwetala wukwijisha yuma yinji yalema yaswekeliyi, niyayiha niyayikulu.
41013053 Cheliliyi Yesu nakumishi jehi yishimu iyi, hakufuma kwenoku.
41013054 Chanenziyi mwilung'a jinji yomweni, hakuyitang'isha mushikola yawu; hiyakuhayama nankashi nawu, Iwu muntu, awmaana niniyi nyijimu yang'ovu nayiwanihi?
41013055 Injiwu mwana kamukwakusong'aku? Mama yinji hiyamutenang'a nawu Maliyaku?
41013056 Niahelinji hituji nawu wezhima wawuku? inji iwu muntu, iyi yuma yezhimiyi nayiwanihi?
41013057 Hiyakumona muji yena chuma chakuyijimbwisha. Ilang,a Yesu hakuyila nanji, Kapolofwetu hayamujiwulang'aku, kumujiwula ching'a mwilung'a jinji yomweni, nimwitala jinji yomweni.
41013058 Chelili wena kukuhwelela nehi, yena nawa kwila nyijimu yang'ovu yayivulu kwenoku nehi.
41014001 Wena mwakowu nyuuli Herodi hakutiya mpuhu yaYesu;
41014002 hakuyila ang'amba zhindi ninji, Jiyi Yowanu Njimiki, nasang'uki muji afu, dihu hanafumi nyijimu iyi yang'ovu yenda yikong'eka muji yena.
41014003 Mulong'a henohu Herodi wamukwata jehi Yowanu, wamukasa jehi, wamusha dehi mukaleya hansang'u yaHerodiya iŋodamanakwindi Fwilipu.
41014004 Muloŋa Yowanu wamwilili nindi, Chinjila eyi kwikala nindi.
41014005 Chakeŋeliyi kumujaha, hakutiya woma wezaza dawantu, mulova amutong'ojokeli nawu hikaprofwetu.
41014006 Ilaŋa chashikili itaŋwa dakwanuka kuvwalika kwaHerodi, mwana kaHerodiya wamumbanda hakuhang'ana mukachi kawu, hakumutiyisha Herodi kuwaha.
41014007 Henohu hakumukana chakusanyika ninji, Nukukwinka yejima yiwukulomba.
41014008 Niyena amuleja dehi kudi mama yinji ninji, Nyinki kunu mutu waYowanu Njimiki hacheng'a.
41014009 Mwanta hakuneng'a, ilang'a ochu cheliliyi yena nasanyiki dehi, ninowu ashakaminiyi nawu nakudya, hakuyilezha antu ninji, Mwinkenuwu.
41014010 Hakutemesha antu, hiyakumuketula Yowanu mutu omu mukaleya.
41014011 Mutu windi hiyakuwuletela hacheng'a, hiyakumwinkawu owu mwana wamumbanda, yena hakuwutwala kuji mama yindi.
41014012 Atumbanji twindi hiyakwinza nakunona chivunvuma, hiyakuchizhiika, hiyakuya nakumulezhamu Yesu.
41014013 Yesu chanachitiyiyi, hakufuma kwenoku muwatu, hakuya kwakankawindi. Mazaza awantu chanachitiyuwu, hiyakufumafuma munyikala yamaneni, hiyakumulondela hamaseki.
41014014 Yesu hakwijika, hakumona izaza jeneni, hakuyitiyila wushona, hakuuka antu awu akata.
41014015 Chikuneli melela, atumbanji hiyakwinza kuji yena nawu, Munu mumpata mwaana wunahiti jehi; yili awa mazaza ayi kwawu, akapawuli yakudya yawu munyikala.
41014016 Ilaŋa Yesu hakuyila nindi, Akuyiladi? Yinkenu enu aweni yakudya.
41014017 Wena hiyakumwila nawu, Kunu tukweti kwamankendi atanu hohu, ninshi jiyedi.
41014018 Yena nindi, Yiletenu kunu kudami.

41014019 Hakulezha mazaza awantu ninji ashakami hamatahu; hakutambula owu mankenji atanu ninozhu inshi jiyedi, hakutala kwiwulu, hakukiswila nkisu, hakuhumuna mankendi, hakuyinka atumbanzhi, atumbanji hiyakwinka mazaza.
41014020 Adiili wezhima wawu; ekutili; anoneni yibalu yasheluhu mahebi ikumi nayedi (12) ato-o.
41014021 Ádiili ading'i amayala kwiji neyi makombakaji atanu (5000), kubombelaku niambanda nianyana.
41014022 Hohenohu hakushinjila atumbanji nindi eng'ili muwatu, ayang'ahu dehi kwishinadi; kulonda yena ayilezhi mazaza ayi kwawu.
41014023 Chanayilejiyi mazaza ayi kwawu, hakukanduka hampidi kwakadi antu, nakulombela; chikuneli melela sang'a ashakaminayi kwenoku kwakankawindi.
41014024 Henohu watu wunashiki dehi mukachi kezhiya, hiwukukabakana namankanda, mulozha mpepela yading'i nakufuma kwakuyawu.
41014025 Hachilu chawufuku chamuchiwana yena hakwinza kuji wena nakwenda hewulu jamenzhi.
41014026 Atumbanzhi chamumwenuwu nakwenda hewulu damenji, hiyakwakama nawu himujimu, hiyakukaloka nawoma watiyiluwu.
41014027 Ilaŋa Yesu hakuhosha nawu hohenohu nindi, Tiyenu kuwaha, yami; bayi mutiya womaku.
41014028 Petulu hakumwakula nindi, Mwanta, neyi yeyi, ng'ili ninami ninzi kudeyi hewulu damenzhi.
41014029 Yena nindi, Inzang'a. Petulu hakufuma muwatu, hakwenda hewulu damenji, nindi ayi kudi Yesu
41014030 Ilang'a chamweniyi mpepela, hakutiya woma, hakutachika kunekama, hakukaluka nindi, Mwanta, nhandishi!
41014031 Yesu olola nichikasa chindi hohenohu, hakumukwata, hakumwila ninji, Eyi wukweti kukuhwelela kwantesha, wunalulutiji?
41014032 Chanakandamuwu muwatu, mpepela yimwena ninzo-o.
41014033 Áding'i muwatu hiyakumufukamina nawu, Chalala yeyi Mwana kaNzambi.
41014034 Chanazambukuwu kwishinadi, ashika nikuchikumu chakwituŋa daGenesareta.
41014035 Chanamwilukuwu kuji amayala akwenoku, hiyakutemesha temesha mazu kumutamba wezhimowu kwi-ndo, hiyakumuletela antu akata ejima;
41014036 hiyakumulembelela nawu akunki hela kumukunjulu wehina dindi hohu, ezhima akunkiluku akoleli.
41015001 KuYerusalema hikukufuma aFwarisewu nawansoneki,
41015002 hiyakwinza kudi Yesu nawu, Atumbanzhi tweyi amotokelaŋadi chaaku chawakulumpi, chadyaŋawu chakadi kwisuka?
41015003 Yena hakuyakula nindi, Indi enu nawa mwamotokelaŋadi mwayilejeliyi Nzambi, mulemeshi chaaku chenu?
41015004 Nzambi wayilejeli nindi, Lemeshaku tata yeyi namama yeyi; ninji, Wúkutena tata yinji hela mama yinji chatama afwi kwinji.
41015005 Hakwila enu nenu, Neyi muntu wukumwila tata yindi hela mama yinji ninji, Chuma chadiŋi chakukukwasha nachu nachinki dehi Nzambi;
41015006 nenu bayi alemesha nawa tata yinjuku. Munapepeleshi nshimbi yaNzambi nachaaku chenu.
41015007 Enu amfwikiji! Komana chaprofweteliyi Isaya waprofweteli chachiwahi,
41015008 chayiteneniyi nindi, Antu awa anlemeshaŋa nanyivumbu yawu, Hakwila nyichima yawu yiji kwakulehi nanami.
41015009 Ajifukulang'a tuhu kudami, Chataŋishang'awu akwawu yijila yawantu nawu diku kutaŋisha kwalala.
41015010 Hakutambika izaza dawantu, hakuyila nindi, Tiyililenu mwiluki chachiwahi.
41015011 Chéng'ilaŋa mukanwa hidichi chatamishang'a muntuku; cháfumang'a mukanwa dichi chatamishang'a muntu.
41015012 Atumbanji hiyakwinza nakumwila nawu, Eyi wuneluki neyi aFwarisewu chatiyawu mazu awa ahila, tahinji?
41015013 Yena hakuyakula nindi, Nyitondu yejima yabulili kutumba Tata yami wamwiwulu, akayibwitamu.
41015014 Yilekenu tuhu kwawu, hiyanlomboli amputamesu. Neyi mputamesu wukulombola mukwawu mputamesu, mwayeji wawu akuholokela mwibuku.
41015015 Petulu hakumwila ninji, Tulumbulwiluku chishimu ichi.
41015016 Yena ninji, Enu nawa nihanu kanda mukwati maana?
41015017 Yezhima yayaŋa mukanwa yayaŋa mwivumu, yanatewaŋa kumpata. Enu kuchiluka nehi?
41015018 Yuma yedikaŋa mukanwa jiyi yatamishaŋa muntu.
41015019 Mulong'a kumuchima jiku kwafumang'a yitong'ojoka yatama, niwubanzhi, niwuvumbi, nikubazhama, niwukombi, niwunsahu wakutwamba, nikutukana.
41015020 Yeniyi jiyi yuma yatamishang'a muntu, hakwila kujya namakasa akaji kwisuka chachiwahi, hichatamishang'a muntuku.
41015021 Yesu hakufuma kwenoku, hakuwombolokela kumutamba waTira naSidoni.
41015022 Kutala mumbanda wakuKenani hakufuma kumutambowu, hakubilela ninji, Eyi Mwanta, mwana kaDavidi, ntiyili luwi; mwanami wamumbanda hakukaba nankashi nandemoni.
41015023 Yena kumwakula izu nidimu nehi. Atumbanzhi twinji hiyakwinza nakumulembelela nawu, Mulezhi afumuku, wuji nakutulondela nakubilela.
41015024 Yena hakwakula ninji, Antemesheli kunyikoku yajimbala yetala daIsarela hohu.
41015025 Yena mumbanda hakwinza nakumufukamina ninji, Mwanta, nkwashuku.
41015026 Yena hakwakula ninji, Hichinawahi kunona mankenji awanyana nakunatila atuwaku.
41015027 Yena mumbanda nindi, Mwamweni Mwanta, hela atuwa adyaŋa nkuuku zhaholokaŋa kumesa yawankaka jawu.
41015028 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Eyi mumbanda, kukuhwelela kweyi kwaswezha; akukwilila muwunakeŋi. Mwaninji wamumbanda akola niyoyena mpinji oyu.
41015029 Yesu wafumini kwenoku hakuya nakukulisha izhiya daŊaliliya; hakukanjuka hampidi, hakushakamaku.
41015030 Kuji yena hikukwinza mazaza awantu amavulu, anasenji niakwakubalakata, niamputamesu, niatumama, niayifwayi, niacheng'i amavulu, hiyakuyitenteka kunyendu yinji, hakuyuuka.
41015031 Izaza dawantu hiyakuhayama chanamonuwu atumama hiyakuhosha, ayifwayi hiyakukola, akwakubalakata hiyakwenda, amputamesu hiyakumona. Hiyakulemesha Nzambi yaIsarela.

41015032 Yesu hakutambika atumbanzhi twinji ninji, Natiyili izaza dawantu wushona, mulong'a anashakami jehi nanami mafuku asatu hiyakweti yakudyaku; hinakeng'i kuyimwang'a nanzalaku, akenda kafwa chinzeya munzhila.
41015033 Atumbanzhi hiyakumwila nawu, Mankenji amavulu akwikutisha izaza dawantu dikumaha munu mumpata tukuyiwanahi?
41015034 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Mukweti mankenji ang'ahi? Nawu, Atanu nayedi, ninshi zhanyanya zhantesha.
41015035 Hakulezha izaza jawantu ninji shakamenu hamaseki.
41015036 Hakunona owu mankenji atanu nayeji ninozhu inshi, hakusakilila, hakuhumuna, hakwinka atumbanzhi, atumbanji hiyakwinka mazaza awantu.
41015037 Ajiili wezhima wawu, ekutili. Hiyakunona yibalu yasheluku yimpaya yitanu nayiyeji yato-o.
41015038 Ájiili ading'i makombakazhi awana (4000) awamayala, kubombelaku niambanda nianyana.
41015039 39 Hakuyila mazaza nindi ayi kwawu. Hakwing'ila muwatu, hakuya kumutamba waMang'adana.
41016001 AFwarisewu nawaSadusi hiyakwinza nakumweseka, hiyakumulomba nawu ayilezhi chinjikihilu chamwiwulu.
41016002 Yena hakuyakula ninji, Chikwelang'a melela nenu, Mwakacha, mulong'a mavu anachinani.
41016003 Habudidi nenu, Lelu muji muzowa, chalala mavu achinana hiyakudikuŋa. Enu mweluka kushinshika yámwekanaŋa mwiwulu, hakwila yinjikijilu yamafuku awa kutwesha kuyiluka nehi.
41016004 Chisaka chela nikutama niwuvumbi hichikulomba chinjikizhilu, hiyakayileja chinjikijiluku, ching'a chochinzhikijilu chaYona hohu. Hakuyishiya hakufumaku.
41016005 Atumbanzhi hiyakushika kwishinaji, analalameni jehi kusenda mankendi.
41016006 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Shinshikenu, mubabeli ilung'i jawaFwarisewu nawaSadusi.
41016007 Wena hiyakujihuzhola nawu, Chochu chitunabuli kusenda mankenji?
41016008 Yesu chanachilukiyi, hakuyila ninji, Enu mukweti kukuhwelela kwantesha, muji nakudihujolelaji chochu chimwabula kusenda mankenji?
41016009 Nihanu saŋa mwayambila hohu, munalalameni jehi ana mankendi atanu anana makombakazhi atanu awantu (5000), mwanonenuku mahebi azhahi?
41016010 Hela ana mankenji atanu nayedi anana makombakazhi awana awantu (4000), mwanonenuku yimpaya ying'ahi?
41016011 Munabulilidi kwiluka? Chinading'i nakuhosha nanenu hinading'i nakutena mankenduku. Nading'i nakwila nami babelenu ilung'i dawaFwarisewu nawaSadusi.
41016012 Eluka nikwiluka nawu komana anatulezhi kubabela ilung'i damankenduku, natulezhi kubabela kutang'isha kwawaFwarisewu nawaSadusi.
41016013 Yesu chanashikiyi kumutamba waKesareya Fwilipi, hakuyihula atumbanzhi twindi ninji, Ami Mwana kaMuntu, antu elaŋa nawu yaminyi?
41016014 Wena nawu, Amakwawu elang'a nawu yeyi Yowanu Njimiki; amakwawu nawu yeyi Elija; acheng'i nawu yeyi Yeremiya, inji kwizhi wumu wahadi atuprofwetu.
41016015 Hakuyila ninji, Inji enu aweni mwelaŋa nenu yaminyi?
41016016 Shimona Petulu hakwakula ninji, Yeyi Kristu, Mwana kaNzambi wamumi.
41016017 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Eyi Shimona mwana kaYowanu wunakooleki, mulong'a anakumwekeshelichu kudi Tata yami wudi mwiwulu, bayi kudi muntuku.
41016018 Ninami nukukulezha nawa nami, yeyi Petulu, helolidi jihu nakatung'ila chipompelu chami, niyenzelu yakalung'a yakakang'anya kudikang'a nachu.
41016019 Nakakwinka nsapi zhawanta wamwiwulu, yonsu yiwakakasa hanu hamaseki, nimwiwulu akayikasa; yonsu yiwakasubula hanu hamaseki, nimwiwulu akayisubula.
41016020 Henohu hakuyilezha atumbanzhi chakola ninji, Bayi mulezha muntu nenu yami Kristuku.

41016021 Kufuma henohu Yesu hakutachika kulezha atumbanzhi twinji ninji, Ching'a nakaya kuYerusalema, nakakaba yuma yayivulu kuji akulumpi, nikuji akulumpi jawatupristu, nikuji ansoneki; akanzhaha, hetang'wa damuchisatu nakasaŋuka muji afu.
41016022 Petulu hakumutwala kumbadi, hakutachika kumuhosha ninji, Chinzhila Mwanta. Bayi wakamona yumiyuku!
41016023 Yena hakushetumuka hakumwila Petulu nindi, Eyi Satana hitaku kunyima yami, keng'a wunlabishi, mulong'a hiwunashi muchima kuyuma yaNzambuku, wunashi muchima kuyuma yawantu.
41016024 Yesu hakuyila atumbanji twindi henohu ninji, Muntu nakeng'i kunlonjami, ajibonji, anyamuni kulusu yinji, anlondaŋa.
41016025 Mulong'a muntu wukukeng'a kuhemba wumi windi wakawuzhimbesha; niwúkuzhimbesha wumi winji hansang'u yamami wakawuwana.
41016026 Neyi muntu wukuheta mpata yamunu mwishina yezhima, ajimbeshelamu wumi winzhi, wakadiila kwoji? Chumanyi chakenkayi muntu akahimpi nawumi winji?
41016027 Mulong'a Mwana kaMuntu wakenza mulubanji lwakulema kwaTata yinji nawaŋelu jindi, wakenka antu ejima mwashikila nyijimu yawu.
41016028 Nukuyilezha chalala nami kuji amakwawu anemani kunu, hiyakafwaku ching'a anamoni jehi Mwana kaMuntu chakwinzayi muwanta winji.
41017001 Chimwahitili mafuku atanu najimu, Yesu hakutwala Petulu niYakoba nimanakwinji Yowanu, hakuyikandwisha hampiji yayilehi kwakankawawu.
41017002 Hiyakumumona hakubalumuka mwacheng'i, kumesu inji hikukutong'eka neyi itaŋwa, nimahinindi hiyakutooka neyi mwaana.
41017003 Kutala, kuji wena hikukumwekana aMosi naElija, hiyakuhanzhika ninzhi.
41017004 Petulu hakumwila Yesu nindi, Mwanta, chachiwahi chituji kunu; neyi wuneteji, nitung'i kunu yisolu yisatu, chimu cheyeyi, chimu chaMosi, chimu chaElija.
41017005 Iku wuchiji kuhosha, kutala ivu ditooka hidikuyizeng'amina; kutiya niizu hijikufuma mwivu odu ninji, Jiyi Mwanami nakeng'a, natiyang'a kuwaha nankashi mudi yena; mutiyililenu.
41017006 Atumbanzhi chanajitiyuwu, hiyakujinata chamesu awu hamaseki, atiya niwoma nankashi.
41017007 Yesu hakwinza hakuyikunka ninji, Nyamukenu, bayi mutiya womaku.
41017008 Chanafumbuluwu mesu, kumona muntu nehi, ching'a yowu Yesu hohu.
41017009 Chading'i nakukunkumukawu hampiji, Yesu hakuyileja nindi, Bayi mulezha muntu chuma chimunamonuku, ching'a Mwana kaMuntu nasang'uki jehi muji afu.
41017010 Atumbanzhi twinji hiyakumwila nawu, Inji ichi chelang'awu ansoneki, nawu ching'a Elija akasambila kwinza?
41017011 Yena hakuyakula ninji, Chalala Elija wakenza, wakafuntisha cheŋi yuma yezhima muyajing'i.
41017012 Ilang'a nukuyilezha nami Elija wenza dehi, hiyamwilukiluku, amukong'eli mwatweluwu nyichima yawu mwezhima. Chenochu nawa jichi chakamukabishawu Mwana kaMuntu.
41017013 Jichi atumbanzhi hiyakwiluka nawu nateni Yowanu Nzhimiki.
41017014 Chanashikuwu kwizaza dawantu, hikukwinza muntu wumu nakumufukamina,
41017015 ninji, Mwanta, amutiyili mwanami luwi, mulong'a himukwachinkonya, wakabang'a nankashi, wadimbukilang'a kakavulu mukesi, kakavulu nawa mumenzhi.
41017016 Namuleta kuji atumbanzhi tweyi, anakang'anyi kumuuka.
41017017 Yesu hakwakula ninji, Enu chisaka chela nikubula kukuhwelela, nikuluwa, nukwikala nenu nyaka ying'ahi? Nukukabakana nenu nyaka ying'ahi? Muletenu kunu kudami.
41017018 Yesu hakumuhoshola, njemoni amufuma nikumufuma; owu kansi akola nihohenohu.
41017019 Atumbanzhi hiyakwinza kuji Yesu kwakankawawu nawu, Etu twakaŋenyadi kumufumisha?

41017020 Yena hakuyila ninji, Mulong'a wowu wakukuhwelela kwenu kwantesha; mulong'a nukuyilezha chalala nami, neyi mukweti kukuhwelela kwakweseka nakambutu kanyanya, mwaji kuyila mpidi iyi nenu, Tutulukaku kunu wuyi kuna, yaji kututuluka. Kwosi chuma chimwadi kukaŋanyaku.
41017021 Ilang'a wuji neyi iwu hiyafumang'a tuhuku; kufuma ching'a nakulombela nakuleka kudya.
41017022 Chashakaminuwu muŊaliliya, Yesu hakuyila ninji, Mwana kaMuntu akamwinka mumakasa awantu,
41017023 akamujaha; hetang'wa damuchisatu wakasang'uka mudi afu. Wena hiyakuneng'a nankashi.
41017024 Chanashikuwu kuKaperinamu, owu atambwilang'a musonku hiyakwinza kuji Petulu nawu, Nkulung'ang'a yenu walambulang'a musonku waTembeli, tahindi?

41017025 Yena nindi, Eng'a walambulang'a. Chaneŋiliyi mwitala, Yesu hakusambila kumwihula nindi, Eyi Shimona, inji eyi wunatong'ojokiji? Anyanta ahanu hamaseki atambulang'a musonku hela mulambu kudanyi? Kuji anyanawu tahinji kuji antu acheng'i?
41017026 Cheliliyi nindi, Kudi antu acheng'i, Yesu hakumwila ninji, Komana anyana anaying'i kwawu.
41017027 Hitunakeŋi kuyihilishaku, dichi yaku kwizhiya, wakombilumu ilowa, inshi yiwukusambila kulowa wakayasamishi mukanwa, wakawanamu mali, wakayinonumu, wakayinki, himusonku wetu nineyi ninami.
41018001 Mpinji yoyenoyu atumbanji hiyakwinza kudi Yesu nawu, Nabadiki akwawu muwanta wamwiwulu hinyi?
41018002 Hakutambika mwana wanyanya, hakumusha mukachi kawu,
41018003 nindi, Nukuyileja chalala nami chiŋa mubalumuka, mwikali neyi anyana anyanya, mukunkulwayi himwakatwesha kwiŋila muwanta wamwiwuluku.
41018004 Dichi yowu wukujizoza neyi mwana wanyanyiwu, jiyi nabajiki muwanta wamwiwulu.
41018005 Nimuntu wukutambula mwana wanyanya wumu wuji neyi iwu mwijina jami, nantambulami;
41018006 hakwila muntu wukujimbwisha wanyanya wumu wahaji wenawa ankuhwelelami, chikuwaha kumukasila ilola jakuhalila deneni kunshiŋu, hikumuzhiyisha mwinying'i jamukalung'alwiji.
41018007 Oyu yihung'u yakamona matung'a ahanu hamaseki nansang'u jakudimbwisha! Mulong'a nsang'u jakudimbwisha jakenza hohu; ilang'a oyu yihung'u yakamona muntu wukujileta!

41018008 Neyi chikasa cheyi, hela mwenju weyi wakudimbwishang'a wuketuli, wuwunatili kwakulehi naneyi; chinawahi kwing'ila muwumi nawufwayi hela nakubalakata kubadika kukunatila mukesi kahayanyaka wudi namakaseyi ayeji, hela nanyendu yeyi yiyeji.
41018009 Neyi jisu jeyi dakudimbwishang'a jitubuli, wujinatili kwakulehi naneyi; chinawahi kwing'ila muwumi najisu jimu kubajika kukunatila mukesi kamukalung'a kachinana namesu ayeji.
41018010 Babalenu mubuli kujiwula hela mwana wanyanya wumu wuji neyi iwu; mulong'a nukuyilezha nami akweti ang'elu zhawu atalang'a mafuku ezhima kumesu aTata yami wekala mwiwulu.
41018011 Mulong'a Mwana kaMuntu nenzi nakwamwina azhimbala.

41018012 Munatong'ozhoki ŋahi? Neyi kuji muntu wukweti nyikoku yinji nkulakazhi (100), neyi hanapwapuki wumu, abuli kushiya makumi atanu nawana natanu nawana (99), ayi kumapiji nakukeng'akeng'a owu napwapuki, tahindi?
41018013 Wamba kela wukumuwana, nukuyilezha chalala nami, wukuzang'alala namukoku owu chakubajika awa makumi atanu nawana natanu nawana (99) abulili kupwapuka.
41018014 Dichi muchima waTata yenu wuji mwiwulu hanakeng'i mwana wanyanya wuji neyi iwu kunong'aku.
41018015 Neyi manakweyi nakuputoli, yaku wumukonkololi mwanaluwiyi kwakankawenu; neyi wukukutiya, wunamukoki jehi manakweyi.
41018016 Ilaŋa neyi kwonti kwinji kukutiya, yakuku namuntu wumu hela nawantu ayedi, kulonda mazu ezhima akakoleli kutunwa twawayinsahu ayeji hela asatu.
41018017 Neyi kwonti kwinji kutiyilila wena nawa, lezhaku chipompelu; neyi sang'a adikaŋilayi, kutiyilila chipompelu nehi, mufwanishi kweyi neyi himukwanshidi, hela neyi nsonkeshi.
41018018 Nukuyileja chalala nami, yuma yimwakakasa hanu hamaseki, nimwiwulu akayikasa; yuma yimwakasubula hanu hamaseki, nimwiwulu akayisubula.
41018019 Cheng'i nawa nukuyileja nami, neyi haji akwenu ayeji akutiyaŋana kulombela chuma hanu hamaseki, akayililachu kuji Tata yami wudi mwiwulu.
41018020 20 Mulong'a kúnapompi hela ayeji hela asatu mwizhina jami, jiku kuniji mukachi kawu.
41018021 Henohu Petulu hakwinza nakumwila ninji, Mwanta, mapampa kang'ahi akamputolayi manakwami, ami nimwanakenang'a ho-o? Kakashika mumapampa katanu nakayeji, tahindi?
41018022 Yesu hakumwila nindi, Hinukukuleja nami kakashiki mumapampa katanu nakayeji hohuku; ilang'a nami kakashiki mumakumi atanu nayeji, mapampa katanu nakayedi (70x7).
41018023 Dichi wanta wamwiwulu wuji neyi mwanta wumu wakeng'eli kushinshika nyikuji yawandung'u zhinji.
41018024 Chatachikiliyi kuyishinshika, hiyakumuletela muntu wamudiilili mukuji wamali, makombakaji ikumi (10,000).
41018025 25 Chizhinamukang'i kufuta, nkaka yinji hakuyileja ninji mulandishenu niyena, ning'ojinji, nianyaninji hamu, niyahetayi yezhima, akafuti.
41018026 Dichi owu ndung'u hakujinata hamaseki, hakumulembelela ninji, Mwanta awunjishi muchima, nakakufuta yezhima.
41018027 Nkaka yanowu ndung'u hakumutiyila wushona, hakumuumbaku, hakumwanakena mukuji owu.
41018028 Ilang'a owu ndung'u chanedikiyi, hakumona mukwawu nduŋu ninji wading'i ninji namukuji wankulakazhi (100) yamali, hakumukwata, amukwata nihanyijiwu, ninji, Futaku mukuji weyi.
41018029 Dichi owu mukwawu ndung'u ninji hakudinata hamaseki, hakumulembelela ninji, Wunjishaku muchima, nakakufuta.
41018030 Yena kwonti kwindi, hakuya nakumusha mukaleya, ninji kufumamu ching'a wunafuti mukuji wezhima.
41018031 Akwawu andung'u ninji chanamonuwu ochu cheliliyi, hiyakuneng'a nankashi, hiyakwinza nakumulezha nkaka yawu yuma yezhima.
41018032 Nkaka yindi hakumutambika, hakumwila ninji, Eyi ndung'u watama, ami nakwanakena mukuji wuna wezhima nachina chiwanlembelela;
41018033 eyi kutiyila mukwenu njung'u neyi luwi, neyi china chinakutiyilami nehi?
41018034 Nkaka yindi hakumuzuwila, hakumwinka kuji akwakubabesha, ninji kufumamu ching'a nafuti mukuji wezhima.
41018035 Dichi chakayilayi nawa niTata yami wamwiwulu, neyi enu mukubula kwanakena anakwenu nyilong'a yawu munyichima yenu.
41019001 Dichi chelili Yesu nakumishi jehi mazu awa, hakufuma kuŊaliliya, hakuya kumutamba wawaYudeya wakwishinadi jaYodana.
41019002 Mazaza awantu aweni hiyakumulonjela; hakuyuukila kwenoku.
41019003 AFwarisewu hiyakwinza kuji yena nakumweseka nawu, Muntu kuseng'a iŋodindi hansang'u zhezhima chalong'a, tahinji?
41019004 Yena hakuyakula ninji, Himunatang'i nsang'u yakwila nawu, wáyileng'eli hatachi, Wayileng'eli niiyala nimumbandaku, tahing'i?
41019005 ninji, Dichi iyala ashiyi tata yinji nimama yinji, Akakeli ing'odindi, Niwena ayeji akekali wumu.
