41019006 Hiyaji cheng'i ayeduku, aji wumu. Dichi ánabombuwu kuji Nzambi, bayi ayambula kuji muntuku.
41019007 Wena hiyakumwila nawu, Inji Mosi wayilejelelidi ninji ayinki mukanda wakuseng'a, akamuseng'i tuhu?
41019008 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Mosi kuyiteja kuseŋa ang'odijenu chafumini hanyichima yenu yachinchika; ilang'a kufumisha hatachi hichading'i chochochuku.
41019009 Nukuyilezha nami, yowu wukuseng'a ing'ojinji, ching'a namulong'a wawuzhila hohu; hakusumbula wacheng'i, neli wuvumbi, nimuntu wukusumbula mumbanda anaseng'uwu neli wuvumbi niyena.
41019010 Atumbanzhi hiyakumwila nawu, Neyi nsang'u yamuntu nang'odindi yiji chochichi, komana kusumbula hichachiwahuku.
41019011 11 Ilang'a yena hakuyila nindi, Antu ejima hiyakutwesha kwiteja izu ijuku, ching'a anenkuwu hohu.

41019012 12 Mulong'a kuji afwa mwitala chakuvwalika nachu mumavumu awamama jawu; kudi afwa mwitala chakuyila kuji antu; kuji nawa anajilishi awenawu kwikala neyi afwa mwitala hansang'u yawanta wamwiwulu. Yowu natweshi kutambula izwiji, atambuli.
41019013 Henohu hiyakumuletela anyana anyanya, kulonda ayinaŋiki makasindi ayilombeleli; atumbanzhi hiyakuyihoshola.
41019014 Yesu ninji, Itejenu anyana anyanya, bayi muyilekesha kwinza kujamuku, mulong'a wanta wamwiwulu wawena adi chochichi.
41019015 Hakuyinaŋika makasindi, hakufumaku.
41019016 Kutala, kuji yena hikukwinza muntu wumu nindi, Eyi Nkulung'ang'a, chumanyi chachiwahi chinakela kulonda nakamoni wumi wahayanyaka?
41019017 Yena hakumwila ninji, Wunang'ihwilidi yuma yayiwahi? Muwahi wuduku wumu hohu; neyi wunakeŋi kwing'ila muwumi, hembaku nshimbi.
41019018 Hakumwila ninji, Nshimbinyi? Yesu ninji, Kuzhaha muntu chinzhila; Kwila wuvumbi chinzhila; Kwiya chinzhila; Kushimuna wunsahu wakutwamba chinzhila.
41019019 Lemeshaku tata yeyi nimama yeyi; niniyi yakwila nawu, Keng'aku mukwenu neyi chiwadikeng'a eyi aweni.
41019020 Owu mukwenzi weyala hakumwila ninji, Yuma yezhimiyi nayihemba jehi, kunashaliji?
41019021 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Neyi wukukeng'a kwikala walala chikupu, yaku wulanjishi yiwuji nayu, wakayinki atuzweng'i, wakaheti maheta amwiwulu, winzi wunlonjang'a.
41019022 Owu mukwenzi chanatiyiyi izu odu, hakufumaku nakuneŋa; mulong'a wading'i muntu waheta maheta amavulu.
41019023 Yesu hakuyila atumbanzhi twinji ninji, Nukuyilezha chalala nami, mukwakuheta kwing'ila muwanta wamwiwulu chakala.
41019024 Nukuyileja cheng'i nami, ng'ameli kuhanuka mujisu dandong'u chaswayi, hakwila mukwakuheta kwing'ila muwanta waNzambi chakala.
41019025 Chanachitiyuwu, atumbanzhi hiyakuhayama nankashi nawu, Inji dinu wukutwesha kuhanda hinyi?
41019026 Yesu hakuyitala, hakuyila ninji, Chumichi chikukang'anya muntu, hakwila yuma yejima yinatwesheki kuji Nzambi.
41019027 Petulu hakumwakula henohu ninji, Tala, etu tunashiyi yuma yejima, tunakulonjeli; indi etu twakatambulaji?

41019028 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Nukuyilezha chalala nami, hakuleng'a kwakwiha chakashakamayi Mwana kaMuntu hetanda jawanta jalubanji lwakulema kwinji, enu nawa munanlondami mwakashakama hamatanda awanta ikumi nayeji (12), nakusompesha nyunza yaIsarela ikumi nayiyeji (12).

41019029  Ejima anashiyi hela matala, hela anakwawu, hela ahelawu, hela atata zhawu, hela amama jawu, hela anyana, hela maha, hansang'u yejina jami, akatambwilamu nkulakazhi (100), akaswana niwumi wahayanyaka.
41019030 Ilaŋa amavulu akusambila akekala akukuminina, niákukuminina akekala akusambila.
41020001 Mulong'a wanta wamwiwulu wuji neyi njimi, wamenekeli bujiji nakufumba akwakukalakala kulonda ayitemeshi mwitempa jinji janyivinyu.
41020002 Chanatiyang'aniyi nawakwakukalakala kuyinka idali jimu jimu mwifuku, hakuyitemesha mwitempa jinji janyivinyu.
41020003 Hakwidika cheng'i kwakwihi nampinji yamuchisatu (09:00 hrs), hakumona amakwawu enjemazhala tuhu kuwulanjilu.
41020004 Hakuyila ninji, Ninenu nawa yenu mwitempa janyivinyu, nukuyifweta mwalong'a. Hiyakuya.
41020005 Hakwijika cheng'i kwakwihi nampinji yamuchitanu nayimu (12:00 hrs), nimpinji yamuchitanu nayiwana (15:00 hrs), hakwila mwomumu.
41020006 Kwakwihi nampinji yamwikumi nayimu (17:00 hrs) hakwijika, hakuwana amakwawu anemani, hakuyila ninji, Muji nakwimazhalilaji kunu mwaana wezhima chakaji nyijimu?
41020007 Hiyakumwila nawu, Hikuji muntu natwinki mujimuku. Hakuyila ninji, Ninenu nawa yenu mwitempa.
41020008 Chikuneli melela, owu mukwetempa hakumwila nhembi yinji ninji, Tambikaku akwakukalakala wuyinki wulooku wawu, wutachikili kuji ákuminina, ndo-o nikuji ásambila.
41020009 Chanenzuwu owu enkeluwu mujimu kwakwihi nampinzhi yamwikumi nayimu (17:00 hrs), hiyakutambula idali jimu jimu.
41020010 Chanenzuwu owu asambilili, hiyakutong'ozhoka nawu tukutambula wulooku wabajika, niwena nawa hiyakutambula mwomumu, idali jimu jimu.
41020011 Chanatambuluwu, hiyakumutobela mweni itempa,
41020012 nawu, 'Awa akuminina anakalakali mpinji yimu hohu, eyi wuyesekezhi nanetu tunakabakani mwaana wezhima ninkanza yetu.'
41020013 ''hakwakula, hakwila mwinawu wumu ninji, 'Eyi mukwetu, hinakutamishuku, hitwatiyang'ana naneyi ijali jimuku?
41020014 Nonaku ijali jeyi, wuyang'a kweyi ami aweni nakeng'i kuyinka awa akuminina neyi chinakwinkeyi.
41020015 Chinzhila kwila muchima wami nayuma yami tahijdi? Wunatiyi ichima nanichi chinabula wuzhinju, tahinji?
41020016 Jichi ákukuminina akekala akusambila, ákusambila akekala akukuminina.
41020017 Yesu chayilang'ayi nakukanjuka kuYelusalema, hakutwala atumbanzhi ikumi nayeji (12) hambaji omu munzhila,
41020018 hakuyila jinji, Talenu, hitukuya nakukanjuka kuYelusalema. Mwana kaMuntu akamufukezhela kuji akulumpi zhawatuplistu nikuji ansoneki, akamwinka mulong'a wakwila nawu afwi hohu.
41020019 Akamwinka nikuji azhentili akamusehi, akamuvupoli, akamupopeli hakulusu; itang'wa jamuchisatu wakasang'uka.
41020020 Kuji yena hikukwinza mama yawanyana kaZebedewu hamu nawanyaninji, hakufukama kuji yena, amulombi chuma chimu.

41020021 Yena hakumwila ninji, Wunakeng'iji? Yena mumbanda hakumwila ninji, Hoshaku izu jakushakamisha awa anyanami ayeji muwanta weyi, wumu kuchikasa cheyi chachijiilu, mukwawu kuchikasa cheyi chachimunswa.
41020022 Yesu hakwakula ninji, Chuma chimunalombi himunachilukuku. Mukutwesha kunwa mulupasa lunukukeng'a kunwami, tahinji? Hiyakumwila nawu, Tukutwesha.

41020023 Hakuyila ninji, Chalala mwakanwa mulupasa lwami, hakwila kushakama kuchikasa chami chachijiilu, hela kuchikasa chachimunswa, hichuma chakuyinkamuku, chambala chawálong'eshelawu jehi kuji Tata yami.
41020024 Awa ikumi chanachitiyuwu, hiyakutiya kutama nankashi nanowu ayeji avwalika ivumu jimu.
41020025 Yesu hakuyitambika ninji, Mweluka jehi anyanta zhawazhentili chayiyuulang'awu, niantu awu alema chekalang'awu nawanta haji wena.
41020026 Ilang'a mukachi kenu bayi chakekala chochochuku; yowu wukukeng'a kwikala muneni mukachi kenu ekali mukwakuyikalakela;
41020027 yowu wukukeng'a kwikala mukwakubajika mukachi kenu ekali ndung'u yenu.
41020028 Mulong'a chalala chenzhiliyi Mwana kaMuntu halondeli ninji akamukalakeluku, ilang'a ninji akakalakeli akwawu, akenki wumi winji wakukuula nachu antu amavulu.
41020029 Chajing'i nakufumawu muYeliku, izaza jawantu hijikumulondela.
41020030 Kutala amputamesu ayeji anashakami kunsa yanzhila, chanatiyuwu nawu Yesu hakuhita, hiyakubilela nawu, Eyi Mwanta, mwana kaDavidi, tutiyili luwi.
41020031 Izaza hijikuyihoshola nawu, Mwenenu nzo-o. Ilang'a wena aswezha nikubilela nawu, Eyi Mwanta, mwana kaDavidi, tutiyili luwi.
41020032 Yesu hakwimana ku-ka, hakuyitambika ninji, Munakeŋi niyilili chumanyi?
41020033 Hiyakumwila nawu, Mwanta, atutoneshi mesu etu.
41020034 Yesu hakuyitiyila wushona, hakuyikunka kumesu awu atona nihohenohu, hiyakumulondela.
41021001 Chanaswiluwu kwakwihi naYerusalema, anashiki dehi kuBetefwaji, kumpidi yaOliveta, Yesu hakutemesha atumbanzhi ayedi, 12
41021002 ninji, Yenu mumukala wudi kumbidi wuna, chimukushika mukuwana chimbulu anamukasi, wudi namwanindi, mwakayikasununi, mwakanleteluwu.
41021003 Neyi hadi muntu wukuyihula, mukwila nenu, Mwanta jiyi nayikeng'i; wukuyitemesha hohenohu.
41021004 Chumochu chalondeli kulumbulula mwahosheliyi kaprofwetu,
41021005 nindi, Mulezhenu mwana kaZiyona wamumbanda nenu, Tala, Mwanta weyi hakwinza kudeyi, Wadizoza, wudi nakwenjela hachimbulu, Hamwana kachimbulu.
41021006 Atumbanzhi hiyakwila mwayilezheliyi Yesu;
41021007 hiyakuleta chimbulu nimwaninji, hiyakunona mahinawu, hiyakushahu; yena hakukandamahu.
41021008 Antu amavulu amwizaza jawantu hiyakwala mahinawu munzhila, amakwawu hiyakukunkula nyitayi kunyitondu hiyakwala munzhila.
41021009 Mazaza atwamininuku, nialondelelaŋa munyima hiyakubilela nawu, Kisu kisu, wamwinu winzi eyi Mwana kaDavidi! Wakiswilewa iwu wukwinza mwijina daMWANTA! Kisukisu mwiwulu dakubajika!
41021010 Chaneŋiliyi muYerusalema, ŋanda yejima yivwakuka niipumba nawu, Yeniwu hinyi?
41021011 Mazaza nawu, Diyi kaprofwetu Yesu wakuNazareta wamuŊaliliya.
41021012 Yesu hakwiŋila muTembeli yaNzambi, hakutemunamu ezhima alandishilaŋa nialanjililang'a muTembeli, hakuhinona nijimesa jawakwakuhimpa mali, nimatanda áwading'i nakulandisha tutela.
41021013 Hakuyila ninji, Anasoneki nawu, Itala dami akaditena nawu itala dakulombela, hakwinza enu munadibalumuni dehi kwikala iyeŋu dawamakombi.
41021014 Amputamesu niayifwayi hiyakwinza kuji yena muTembeli, hakuyuuka.
41021015 Akulumpi jawatupristu niansoneki chanamonuwu yuma yakuhayama yeliliyi, nianyana akubilela muTembeli nawu, Kisu kisu, wamwinu winzi eyi mwana kaDavidi; hiyakutiya kutama nankashi.

41021016 Hiyakumwila nawu, Eyi wunatiyi chakuhoshawu? Yesu hakwakula nindi, Eng'a; ochu cheliluwu nawu, Wunawanishi kuhameka kwakufuma mutunwa twawanyikeki, nitwawakwakwamwa; kanda muchitang'uhu dehuku?
41021017 Hakuyishiya, hakufuma muYerusalema, hakuya nakukama kuBetani.
41021018 Chadiŋi nakufuntayi kung'anda nabujiji, hakutiya nzala.

41021019 Hakumona mutondu wachikuyu kumbadi yanjila, hakuyaku, kuwanaku chuma nehi, kwamafu hohu. Hakuwuhosha ninji, Kunyaka yezhima bayi wakasong'a cheng'i nyikabuku. Hohenohu mutondu wachikuyu wuuma nichawu.
41021020 Atumbanzhi chanachimonuwu hiyakuhayama nawu, Iwu mutondu O chiwunanyakali kuuma!

41021021 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Nukuyileja chalala nami, neyi mukweti kukuhwelela kwakadi kutajika, himukwila ichi chaneluwu mutondu wachikuyu hohuku; hela kwila mpijiyi nenu, Tutulukaku, natikaku mwijiya; chikwikala.
41021022 Yuma yezhima yimukulombela nakukuhwelela mukuyitambula.
41021023 Chaneŋiliyi muTembeli, akulumpi jawatupristu niakulumpi jawantu hiyakwinza kuji yena hajing'i nakutaŋishayi antu nawu, Eyi welaŋa yumiyi nawantanyi? Inji nakwinki wanta wakwila yumiyi hinyi?
41021024 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Ninami nawa nukuyihula kajizu kamu; neyi mukung'akula, ami nawa nukuyilezha wanta wunelang'a nachu yumiyi.

41021025 Nami, kuzhimika kwaYowanu kwafumini kujihi? Kwakwiwulu, tahinji kwakuji antu? Hiyakujihuzhola muntu namukwawu nawu, Neyi tukwila netu kwakwiwulu, wukutwila ninji, Inji jinu mwalekeleliji kumukuhwelela?
41021026 Kwinza neyi tukwila netu kwakuji antu, chikweti woma wezaza dawantu, mulong'a antu ejima elang'a nawu Yowanu hikaprofwetu.
41021027 Hiyakumwakula Yesu nawu, Kwizhi, etu kwiluka nehi. Niyena hakuyila ninji, Ninami nawa hinukuyilezha wanta wunelang'a nachu yumiyuku.
41021028 Indi enu munatong'ozhokiji? Muntu wumu wading'i nawanyaninji amayala ayeji. Hakwinza kuji wakusambila ninji, Mwanami, yaku nakukalakala mwitempa janyivinyu lelu.
41021029 Yena ninji, Kwonti kwami. Kutwala muna hakubalumuka hakuya.
41021030 Hakwinza kuji wamuchiyeji, hakumwila mwomumu. Yena hakumwakula ninji, Nukuya mwanta. Ilang'a kuya nehi.

41021031 Awa ayeji, welili muchima watata yawu wumwojihi? Nawu, Wákusambila. Yesu hakuyila nindi, Nukuyileha chalala nami, ansonkeshi nawayivumbi akwing'ilang'ahu jehi muwanta waNzambi, enu mukushalahu.
41021032 Mulong'a Yowanu wenzhili kujenu munzhila yakulong'a, enu himwamwitiyiluku, ilang'a ansonkeshi nawayivumbi amwitiyili; enu chimwachimweni, kubalumuka munyichima yenu mumwitiyi nehi.

41021033 Tiyenu chishimu chikwawu nawa. Kwajing'i mwiniitala wumu wang'imini itempa janyivinyu, hakukolekaku ikoli, hakupunja mwakukamwina vinyu, hakutung'a kaposhi, hakujishila akwakujima, hakuya kwitung'a jacheng'i.
41021034 Chakeng'eli kushika chilaaka chanyikabu, hakutemesha anjung'u zhinji kuji akwakujima ninji akamutambwili nyikabu yinji.
41021035 Akwakujima hiyakukwata anjung'u zhinji, wumu hiyakumweta, mukwawu hiyakumuzhaha, mukwawu hiyakumwasa malola.
41021036 Hakutemeshaku cheng'i nawa anjung'u amakwawu aswezha kuvula, ákusambila antesha, hiyakuyikong'a mwomumu.
41021037 Ilang'a nkumininaku hakuyitemeshela mwaninji, ninji, Akamwakama mwanami.
41021038 Ilang'a owu akwakudima chanamonuwu mwaninji, hiyakuhosha muntu namukwawu nawu, Iwu jiyi nswana; tumujahenu, tutambuli wuswana winji.
41021039 Hiyakumukwata, hiyakumunatila hanzi yetempa janyivinyu, amuzhaha nikumuzhaha.
41021040 Inji chakenzayi owu mukwetempa janyivinyu, wakayila ng'ahi owu akwakujima?
41021041 41 Hiyakumwila nawu, Owu antu atama wakayizhilumuna chakaji luwi, itempa danyivinyu wakajishila akwakujima acheng'i akamwinkang'a nyikabu yinji hayilaaka yayu.

41021042 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Chasonekawu munyikanda yajila nawu, Ilola dalekeluwu antung'i, Dodinekali jaswezha kwoloka nankashi dakwiwombu; Ichi chafumini kuji MWANTA, Chakuhayama kumesu etu; kanja mutang'ang'ahu jehi, tahinji?
41021043 Dichi nukuyilezha nami, wanta waNzambi akayamukawu, akawinka munza wakasong'ang'a nyikabu yawu.
41021044 Muntu wukuholokela helolidi wukukotoka kotu kotu; hakwila muntu akaholokelawu kudi ilolidi dakamufukumuna neyi lunkung'u
41021045 Akulumpi zhawatupristu niaFwarisewu, chanatiyuwu yishimu yinji eluka nikwiluka nawu nateni etu.
41021046 Chakeng'eluwu kumukwata, atiyili woma wamazaza awantu, mulong'a antu elilang'a nawu hikaprofwetu.
41022001 Yesu hakuyakula cheng'i nayishimu,
41022002 ninji, Wanta wamwiwulu wunafwani neyi mwanta wumu, watelekeleli mwaninji weyala mawizha akusumbwisha.
41022003 Hakutemesha ang'amba zhindi ayi nakutambika ákaninuwu jehi kwinza kumawizha; wena kwonti kwawu kwinza.

41022004 Hakutemeshaku cheng'i ang'amba amakwawu ninji, Kayilezhenu ákanawu nenu, Mawizhami nalong'eshi jehi, nazhahi jehi aŋombi zhami, niayimuna zhami anuna, yuma yezhima yinawahi jehi, inzenu kumawizha.
41022005 Ilang'a wena hiyakuchijiwula, hiyakujiyila iwu kwiha jinji, mukwawu kumawuseyinji.
41022006 Ánashali hiyakukwata aŋamba jinji, hiyakuyikong'a chatama, hiyakuyizhahola.
41022007 Owu mwanta hakuzuwa, hakutemesha mashijika inji, hakuzhilumuna wenowu ambanzhi, ocha ning'anda yawu.
41022008 Hakuyila ang'amba jindi henohu ninji, Mawizhami anawahi jehi, hakwila awa akaninuwu hiyanateluku.
41022009 Dichi yenu kumaakenu anyikwakwa; ezhima mukumona muyitambiki enzi kumawizha.
41022010 Owu ang'amba hiyakuya munyikwakwa nakupompesha antu amwenuwu ezhima, niatama niamawahi; kumawizha kwinzala nienyi to-o.
41022011 Owu mwanta chaneng'iliyi nakutala enyi, hakumonamu muntu nabuli kuvwala chikowelu chamawija akusumbwisha.
41022012 Hakumwila ninji, Eyi mukwetu, munu wuneng'ilumu ng'ahi chakaji chikowelu chamawizha? Yena kumona mwakuhosha nehi.
41022013 Mwanta hakuyila ang'amba jinji henohu ninji, Mukasenu nikumakasa nikunyendu, mumunatili kumwijima wahanzi, kwakekala kujila nikujisumona kumazhi.
41022014 Mulong'a kutambika anatambiki amavulu, hakwila kutonda anatonji antesha.
41022015 Henohu aFwalisewu hiyakuya nakutiyashana mwakumutila kunsang'u jakuhoshayi.

41022016 Hiyakumutemeshela atumbanzhi twawu hamu nawakwaHelodi nawu, Eyi Nkulung'ang'a, etu tuneluki netu eyi wumuntu walala, watang'ishang'a antu nzhila yaNzambi mwalala hohu, hiwaakamang'a muntuku, hiwatalang'a kumesu amuntuku.
41022017 Jichi tulezhi; kusonka kuji Kesali wunachitong'ozhoki neyi chalong'a, tahinji?
41022018 Yesu welukili mwataminawu, hakuyila ninji, Mukung'esekelaji, enu amfwikizhi?
41022019 Nlezhenu mali akusonka nachu. Hiyakumuletela jali jimu.
41022020 Hakuyila ninji, Ichi chifwikizha chanyi? Ninizhi nsona zhanyi?
41022021 Hiyakumwila nawu, jaKesali. Yena hakuyila ninji, Jichi yuma yaKesali inkenu Kesali; yuma yaNzambi inkenu Nzambi.
41022022 Chanachitiyuwu hiyakuhayama, amushiya nikumushiya, hiyakuya.
41022023 Ifuku oju kuji yena hikukwinza aSadusi, elang'a nawu afu hiyasang'ukang'aku;
41022024 hiyakumwihula nawu, Eyi Nkulung'ang'a, Mosi welili ninji, Neyi muntu wukufwa chakaji kushiya anyana, ing'ojinji akamusumbuli kuji manakwinji kulonda akavweli manakwinji anyana.
41022025 Jichi etu twajii nawamayala atanu nayeji ivumu jawu jimu; wákusambila wasumbwili mumbanda, wafwili chakaji kushiya anyana, hakumushiyila manakwinji ing'ojinji.
41022026 Niwamuchiyeji, niwamuchisatu mwomumu, ndo-o nikuji wamuchitanu nachiyeji.
41022027 Nkumininaku nimumbanda afwa nikufwa.
41022028 Jichi hamba kasang'ukawu afu, awa atanu nayeji, yeniwu mumbanda wakekala ing'odawumwojihi? Mulong'a wezhima wawu amusumbwili.
41022029 Yesu hakwakula ninji, Mwenda muluwa  kuluwa kwenu kunafumi hakubula kwiluka nyikanda yazhila, hela ng'ovu yaNzambi.
41022030 Mulong'a hamba kasang'uka afu hikwakekala kusumbula hela kusumbukaku akekala neyi chaduwu ang'elu mwiwulu.
41022031 Hakwila nsang'u yakusaŋuka kwawafu, ochu chahosheliyi Nzambi nanenu,
41022032 ninji, Yami Nzambi yaAbalahama, Nzambi yaIsaka, Nzambi yaYakoba, himunachitaŋuku? Jichi Nzambi hiNzambi yawafuku, hiNzambi yawamomi.
41022033 Mazaza awantu chanachitiyuwu hiyakuhayama kutang'isha kwinji.
41022034 AFwarlsewu chanatiyuwu nawu namweneshi aSadusi, hiyakujipompesha.
41022035 Mwinawu mukwanshimbi wumu, hakumwihula mazu akumweseka,
41022036 ninji, Eyi Nkulung'ang'a, nshimbi yabajika nshimbi zhezhima nshimbinyi?
41022037 Hakumwila ninji, Keng'aku MWANTA Nzambi yeyi namuchima weyi wezhima, Nawumi weyi wezhima, Namaaneyi ezhima.
41022038 Jiyi nshimbi yakusambila  kulema.
41022039 Kuji nawa yamuchiyeji yafwana neyi iyi nawu, Keng'aku mukwenu neyi chiwajikeng'a eyi aweni.
41022040 Hanshimbi izhi zhiyeji jihu halemena nshimbi yezhima niatuplofwetu ezhima.
41022041 Hajing'uwu aFwalisewu achiji ajipompela hamu, Yesu hakuyihula,
41022042 ninji, Klistu munamutong'ozhoki nenu wuji ng'ahi? Himwana kanyi? Wena hiyakumwakula nawu, Himwana kaDavidi.
41022043 Hakuyila ninji, Inji Davidi hajing'iyi nakuhosha muji Spilitu namuteneniji ninji Mwanta?
41022044 heliliyi ninji, MWANTA wamwilili Mwanta wami ninji, Shakamaku kuchikasa chami chachijiilu, Nichinakasha akwankunyi neyi kwishina janyendu yeyi.
41022045 Davidi amutena ninji Mwanta, wukutwesha ng'ahi kwikala mwanindi?
41022046 Hikwajing'i muntu watwesheli kumwakula izu nijimuku kufuma kwifuku odu hikwajing'i muntu wajing'i nawulobu wakumwihula yuma yikwawuku.
41023001 Henohu Yesu hakuhosha namazaza awantu niatumbanzhi twinji hamu,
41023002 ninji, Ansoneki nawaFwalisewu ashakama hetanda jaMosi,
41023003 Jichi ilenung'a yuma yezhima yakuyitang'ishawu muyihembi, ilang'a bayi mwimbuzholang'a mwelang'awuku mulong'a akuminang'a jakuhosha hohu, kwilamu nehi.
41023004 Mwamweni, akasang'a yisenda yalema yakala kusenda, hiyakutwika antu hamafwizhi, hakwila awenawu kwonti kwawu kuyiswizha hela namunu wawu.
41023005 Nyijimu yawu yezhima ayililang'a yowu kwila nawu ayimoni kuji antu, enda atohesha tunyikanda twakukasa hamahamawu, ninyikundulu yakumahinawu.
41023006 Kuyawizha akeng'a kushakama halema, nimumashikola akeng'a kushakama hamatanda alema.
41023007 7 Akeng'a kuyimwosha kuwulanjilu, akeng'a kuyitena kuji antu nawu 'Rabi.'
41023008 Enu kwenu bayi ayitenang'a nawu Rabuku, mulong'a Nkulung'ang'a yenu wumu hohu, wezhima wenu ivumu jenu jimu.
41023009 Bayi mutenang'a muntu hanu heseki nenu tata yetuku, mulong'a Tata yenu wuduku wumu hohu, yowu wamwiwulu.
41023010 Bayi ayitenang'a nawa nawu anlomboluku, mulong'a Nlomboli yenu wuduku wumu hohu, jiyi Klistu.
41023011 Ilang'a wábajika mukachi kenu ekali mukwakuyikalakela.
41023012 Muntu wukujitohesha akamukehesha, muntu wukujikehesha akamutohesha.

41023013 Oyu yihung'u yimwakamonenu ansoneki nawaFwalisewu, amfwikizhi! Mwenzelelang'a akwenu hanzi yawanta wamwiwulu; mulong'a enu aweni himweng'ilang'a mwoku, hela akeng'a kwing'ila himwayitezhang'a kwing'ilaku.
41023014 Oyu yihuŋu yimwakamonenu ansoneki nawaFwalisewu, amfwikizhi! Mwadyang'a matala awambanda amfwila, himukulombela kulombela kwakujimbana kwakwila lombele-e; jichi akayitanyisha chakubajika.

41023015 Oyu yihung'u yimwakamonenu ansoneki nawaFwalisewu, amfwikizhi! Mwahitang'anang'a nikumenzhi nikumpata kulonda kubalumuna muntu wumu ekali kaYudeya; chakwilayi chochochu, himukumwilisha mukwakalung'a kachinana wakubajika enu muyeji.
41023016 Oyu yihung'u yimwakamonenu anlomboli amputamesu! Mwelang'a nenu, Muntu wukusanyika Tembeli hakweti nsaŋuku hakwila wúkusanyika wulu waTembeli, nenu jiyi wukweti nsang'u.
41023017 Enu mwabula maana, amputamesu! Yabajika yika? Wulu, tahinji Tembeli yazhilika wulu?
41023018 Cheng'i nenu, Muntu wukusanyika kameng'a kakulambwila hakweti nsang'uku; hakwila wúkusanyika chamukunkulu chiduhu, nenu jiyi wukweti nsang'u.
41023019 Enu amputamesu, yabajika yika? Chamukunkulu, tahinji kameng'a kakulambwila kazhilika chamukunkulu?
41023020 Dichi muntu wukusanyika kameng'a kakulambwila nasanyikili kumu niyuma yejima yiduhu.
41023021 Nimuntu wukusanyika Tembeli nasanyikili kumu niwáshakamamu.
41023022 Nimuntu wukusanyika iwulu nasanyikili kumu niitanda daNzambi dawanta, niwáshakamahu.

41023023 Oyu yihuŋu yimwakamonenu ansoneki nawaFwarisewu, amfwikiji! Mwamwinkang'a Nzambi mulambu wandúng'u wamwikumi, niwanyitondu yamavumba amawahi, niwakasakwa; munaleki kwila yuma yanshimbi yalema, kwokusompa, niluwi, nikukuhwelela. Neyi mwelaŋa yeniyi, niyikwawu himwaji kukang'anya kuyilaku.
41023024 Enu anlomboli amputamesu! Mwakelulang'a ng'weneni, hakwila ng'ameli himukuminya.
41023025 Oyu yihung'u yimwakamonenu ansoneki nawaFwarisewu, amfwikizhi! Mwatookeshang'a hanzi yalupasa nacheng'a, hakwila mukachi chochimwadisoma nanyilami nikubajama.
41023026 Eyi kaFwarisewu wamputamesu, sambilaku kutookesha mukachi kalupasa nacheng'a, kulonda nihanzi hatooki nawa.
41023027 Oyu yihuŋu yimwakamonenu ansoneki nawaFwarisewu, amfwikizhi! Muji neyi majamu akupembezha, amwekana lubanji hanzi, hakwila mukachi mwenzala mafwaha awafu, niwuzondu wejima.
41023028 Dichi ninenu nawa, hanzi mwamwekana kulong'a kuji antu, hakwila mukachi mwenzala niwumfwikzhi nikuluwa mbe-e.
41023029 Oyu yihung'u yimwakamonenu ansoneki nawaFwarisewu, amfwikizhi! Mwatung'ang'a majamu awatuprofwetu, mwawahishang'a mazhamu awakwakulong'a;
41023030 30 mwelang'a nenu, Neyi twading'i hamafuku ading'uwu ankakulula zhetu, mutenowu hitwatiyashanini nawu kupwekesha mashi awatuprofwetuku.
41023031 Dichi munadishimuni wunsahu enu aweni, nenu muyanyana kanawa azhahili atuprofwetu.
41023032 Dichi wanishenu kwenu mwesekeleli ankakulula zhenu.
41023033 Enu atupela, enu anyana katubandayula, mukupuluka ŋahi kukutanya kwamukalung'a kachinana?

41023034 Talenu, nukuyitemeshela atuprofwetu, niakwamaana, niansoneki; amakwawu mwakayijaha nakuyipopela hamakulusu; amakwawu mwakayivupolela mumashikolenu, mwakayikabisha, aya mukaliwu ayikabisha, aya mukaliwu ayikabisha;

41023035 kulonda mwakamoni mulong'a wamashi awantu along'a ezhima apwekesheluwu hanu hamaseki, kufumisha kumashi aAbeli, wading'i muntu walong'a, ndo-o nikumashi aZekariya mwana kaBarakiya, mwazhahilili hakachi kamwazhila nakameng'a kakulambwila.
41023036 Nukuyilezha chalala nami chisakichi chakamona yuma yezhimiyi.

41023037 Eyi Yerusalema, Yerusalema, wazhahang'a atuprofwetu, waasaŋa malola antu akutemeshelang'awu! O mapampa kuvula inakeng'eli kukung'wija anyaneyi neyi chakung'wijaŋayi chaadi anyaninji mumpuula zhinji, enu kwenu kwonti kwenu!
41023038 Talenu itala denu anayishilidu jehi, jineli jehi kwachihembi hohu.
41023039 Mulong'a nukuyilezha nami, kufumisha hanu himwakanmona cheng'uku, kunmona ching'a himwakela nenu, Wakiswilewa iwu wukwinza mwijina daMWANTA.
41024001 Yesu hakwijika muTembeli. Hading'iyi nakuya munzhila yinji, atumbanzhi twinji hiyakwinza kuji yena nakumulezha matala aTembeli.
41024002 Yena hakwakula ninji, Munamoni yuma yezhimiyi? Nukuyilezha chalala nami, kunu hikwamba kashala ilola nijimu dakanaŋamana helola dikwawu dakabula kunatika hesekuku.

41024003 Chashakaminiyi hampiji yaOliveta, atumbanzhi hiyakwinza kuji yena kwakankawawu nawu, Tulezhi hamba kela yumiyi, nichinzhikijilu chakwiluka nachu hiwamba kenzeyi, nihamba kakuma nyaka yamakonu.
41024004 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Babalenu akenda kayiluwaŋesha kuji antu.
41024005 Muloŋa mwizhina jami mwakenza amavulu akela nawu, yami Kristu, akaluwang'esha amavulu.
41024006 Mwakatiya nsang'u zhamazhita, nimbonzhi zhamazhita, ilang'a jinu bayi mwakaakamaku, mulong'a yumiyi ching'a yimwekana hohu, hakwinza kukumisha kuchiji kanda.
41024007 Mulong'a munza wumu wakanyamuka nakulwa namunza wukwawu, wanta wumu nawanta wukwawu. Kwamba kaholoka nzala ninyitentanshi kweng'i nakweng'i.
41024008 Ilang'a yuma yezhimiyi jiyi yihung'u yakutachika.
41024009 Henohu akayitwala mwakamoni yihung'u, akayizhahola, akayihela kuji nyunza yezhima kukoola izhina dami.
41024010 Henohu amavulu akajimboka, akajifukezha nikuhelang'ana.
41024011 Kwakamwekana atuprofwetu akutwamba amavulu, akaluwang'esha antu amavulu.
41024012 Mulong'a kuluwa chikwakavula, kukeng'a kwawantu amavulu kwakaya nakukeha.
41024013 Muntu wakakakela nikunsa ng'iyi wakahanda.
41024014 Ninsaŋu iyi yawanta yayiwahi akayishimwang'ena mwahita matung'a ezhima mwashakamawu antu, kulonda yakayilili nyunza yezhima wunsahu; henohu jihu hakenza kukumisha.
41024015 Dichi chimwakamona chishimashima chakaletesha mahembi, chanatenuwu kuji kaprofwetu Danyeli, chinemani jehi mwazhila; muntu wukutang'a ashinshiki;
41024016 henohu antu akekala muYudeya akatemukili kumapidi;
41024017 muntu wakekala hewulu jetala bayi akasuluka nakwidisha yuma yamwitala dinduku;
41024018 nimuntu wakekala mwiha bayi akafunta nakunona kahuma kinduku.
41024019 Oyu yihuŋu yakamonawu ákekala namavumu niákaamwisha hamafuku owu!
41024020 Lombelenu kulonda chimwakatemuka chakabuli kwikala hamashika hela haSabata.
41024021 Mulong'a henohu hamba kekala yihung'u yasweja, yakwila kufumisha kutachi yamatung'a kushika nikulelu, kanda ayimonang'ahu jehi, hela kumbidi hiyamba kayimona cheŋuku.
41024022 Neyi akabula kukehesha wena mafuku owu, hikwakekala antu akahandaku. Ilang'a mafuku owu akayikeheshela hanyizhimba yawátondewa.
41024023 Henohu neyi akayila kudi antu nawu, Talenu, Kristu wuji kunu; hela nawu, kuna; bayi mwaketiyaku.
41024024 Mulong'a mwakenza aKristu akutwamba niatuprofwetu akutwamba, akalezha antu yinjikizhilu yamaneni niyuma yakuhayamisha, kulonda akeseki kuluwaŋesha hela aweni atondewa, neyi chinatwesheki.
41024025 Tiyenu, nayilejang'ahu jehi.
41024026 Dichi neyi akayila nawu, Talenu, ona wuji muchinkalampata ona; bayi mwakaya mwoku. Hela nawu, Talenu, iwu wuji mukapekiwu; bayi mwaketiyaku.
41024027 Mulong'a china chakenang'a nzazhi kumusela yimwekana nikumujika, dichi chamba kela nihamba kenzayi Mwana kaMuntu.
41024028 Kunafwili kanyama diku kukupompela makubi.
41024029 Mafuku akalondashana muyihung'u oyu chakaji nikuleha, itang'wa jakeyila, nikakwezhi hikakatong'ekaku, nitutumbwa twakaholoka mwiwulu, ning'ovu zhamumawulu zhakakanka.

41024030 Kulondela henohu, mwiwulu mwakamwekana chinjikizhilu chaMwana kaMuntu; kulonjela henohu nyunza yahamaseki yezhima akatumpa, akamona Mwana kaMuntu wuji nakwinza hamavu amwiwulu, nang'ovu nilubanji lwakulema kwasweja.
41024031 Wakatemesha ang'elu hindi nampùng'a yaswezha kuvuma, akapompeshi indi atondewa, mwahita iseki dezhima, kufumisha kunsa yewulu yimu, ndo-o nikunsa yikwawu.
41024032 Dichi kwatilenu maana kumutondu wachikuyu. Chiwelang'a neyi mutayi wawu wunovwahi jehi, hiwukusapuka mafu awu, himukwiluka nenu nkanza yiji kwakwihi.
41024033 Dichi ninenu nawa chimwakamona yuma yezhimiyi, kelukenu nenu Yena wudi kwakwihi, kwokuyisu kachi.
41024034 Nukuyilezha chalala nami chisakichi hichakahitaku, ching'a yuma yezhimiyi yinamani.
41024035 Iwulu neseki amba kahita, mazu ami hiyamba kahitaku.
41024036 Ilang'a itang'wodu hela mpinji oyu hosi wayilukaku, hela ang'elu amwiwulu, hela Mwana ching'a Tata hohu.
41024037 Chadiŋi hamafuku aNowa, dichi chakela nihakenzayi Mwana kaMuntu.
41024038 Mulong'a chakela neyi mafuku ading'i akuleta kujibazhi, ajiilang'a, anwinang'a, asumbwilang'a, asumbwishilang'a, nikwifuku jeng'ililiyi Nowa muwatu,
41024039 nichenzhili jibazhi nakuyikumpula wezhima wawu, wena kuchiluka nehi; dichi chakela nihakenzayi Mwana kaMuntu.
41024040 Henohu amayala ayeji akekala mwiha, wumu akamutwala, mukwawu wakashala
41024041 Ambanda ayeji akekala kwiyanda, wumu akamutwala, mukwawu wakashala.
41024042 Dichi tonenu, mulong'a himuneluki ifuku jakenzayi Mwanta wenuku.
41024043 Kuminenu jakwiluka nenu neyi mwiniitala welukili chilu chikwinza ikombi, mutenowu watoneni, haji kwiteja kumulokwela itala dinduku.
41024044 Dichi ninenu nawa babalenu, mulong'a mpinji yimukubula kutong'ozhoka jiyi yakenzayi Mwana kaMuntu.
41024045 Inji ng'amba washinshika wukweti maana, anenkuwu kuji mwanta winji mujimu wakuhemba mukala winji, akenkang'a akwetala jinji yakudya yawu hayinkelaŋawu hayinkelang'awu, hinyi?
41024046 Owu ng'amba akawanawu nakwila mwenomu hakenzayi mwanta winji, diyi wakakooleka.
41024047 Nukuyilezha chalala nami wakamwinka mujimu wakuhemba yuma yinji yahetayi yezhima.
41024048 Ilang'a neyi kuji ng'amba watama wakela mumuchima winji ninji mwanta wami hakulaba,
41024049 hakutachika kweta akwawu ang'amba ninng'i, hakudya nakunwa nawakwakusheta;
41024050 mwanta wayenowu ng'amba hakwinza hefuku jakubula kutalilayi, nihampinji yakubula kwilukayi;
41024051 wakamuvupola chacheni, wakamusha kwizhiku dawamfwikizhi akadyang'a nawu; kwakekala kutumpa nikudisumona kumazhi.
41025001 Henohu wanta wamwiwulu akawufwikizha neyi ikumi dawambanda azhiki asenjeli manong'u awu, hiyakuya nakukinkilila nsumbuli.
41025002 Atanu ading'i abula maana, atanu ading'i namaana.
41025003 Ábula maana asendeli manong'u akadi manzhi.
41025004 4 Hakwila áding'i namaana asendeli manoŋu awu nimanzhi muyipunja yawu.
41025005 Chalabiliyi kalemba, hiyakunong'oka wejima wawu, akama nitulu.
41025006 Mukachi kawufuku hiyakutiya ipumba nawu, Tiyenu, kalemba owu! Ijikenu muyi nakumukinkilila!
41025007 Owu azhiki ezhima ahindoka nihohenohu, awahisha nimanong'u awu.
41025008 Abula maana hiyakuyila akweti maana nawu, Twinkenuhu manzhi, mulong'a manong'u etu hiyakuya nakuzhima.
41025009 Akweti maana hiyakwakula nawu, Hadaha hitukuwaninaku; yenu mwakadilanjili enu aweni kuji alanjishang'a.
41025010 Hayilang'awu nakulanja, kalemba enza nikwinza; ájing'i nakumutalila eng'ila nimumawizha, enzela nichenzelu.
41025011 Nkumininaku owu ang'iki amakwawu hiyakwinza, hiyakwila nawu, Mwanta, Mwanta, twenzulwiluku.
41025012 Yena hakuyakula ninji, Nukuyileja chalala nami hinayilukaku.
41025013 Dichi jinu tonenu, mulong'a himuneluki hela ifuku hela mpinji yakenzayi Mwana kaMuntuku.
41025014 Mulong'a chidi neyi muntu wukukeng'a kuya kwitung'a dacheng'i, hakutambika ang'amba zhindi, hakuyishiila yuma yinji.
41025015 Wumu hakumwinka mali atanu, mukwawu ayeji, mukwawu jimu, mwomwesekela ng'ovu zhawu; hakuya nimunzhila yinji.
41025016 Hohenohu owu watambwili mali atanu hakunyamuka, hakuya nakuyilanduzhola, hakuwaninahu amakwawu atanu.
41025017 Chochimu nawa niwátambwili ayeji, waheteleluhu nawa amakwawu ayeji.
41025018 Ilang'a owu watambwili jimu hakuya nakupunda heseki, hakuswekahu mali ankaka yinji.
41025019 Chihanalehi nankashi, mwanta wanowu ang'amba hakwinza, hakuchinda mali awu.
41025020 Owu watambwili mali atanu hakwinza, hakumuletela amakwawu atanu, ninji, Eyi mwanta, wanyinkeli mali atanu, tala, naheteluhu amakwawu atanu.
41025021 Mwanta winji hakumwila ninji, Chachiwahi, wung'amba wamuwahi washinshika; wunashinshiki nayuma yantesha, nukukwinka wanta wayuma yayivulu; ing'ila mumuzang'alu wankaka yeyi.
41025022 Wátambwili mali ayeji hakwinza nawa, ninji, Eyi mwanta, wanyinkeli mali ayeji; tala, naheteluhu mali amakwawu ayeji.
41025023 23 Mwanta winji hakumwila ninji, Chachiwahi, wung'amba wamuwahi washinshika; wunashinshiki nayuma yantesha, nukukwinka wanta wayuma yayivulu; ing'ila mumuzang'alu wamwanta weyi.
41025024 Wátambwili ijali dimu hakwinza nawa, ninji, Eyi mwanta, nakwilukili nami wumuntu wakala, wamunang'a kuwabulili kukuwa, wakung'ulang'a kuwabulili kumwang'ila.
41025025 Dichi natiyili woma, hinukuya nakuvumbika ijali jeyi heseki, tala, yuma yeyi iyi.
41025026 Mwanta winji hakumwakula ninji, Eyi ng'amba watama wakatala, welukili neyi namunang'a kunabulili kukuwa, nakung'ulaŋa kunabulili kumwang'ila;
41025027 walekeleliji kusha mali ami mubanki, kulonda ichi chinenzi nitambuli yami niyakunshilahu?
41025028 Dichi mutambulenu ijali jajing'iyi naju, mwinki wúkweti mali ikumi.
41025029 Mulong'a wúkweti akamwinka, wakaheta yayivulu; hakwila wábula akamutambula ninaka kajiyi naku.
41025030 Iwu ng'amba wamukunkulwayi muumbilenu kumwijima wahanzi; kwakekala kujila nakujisumona kumazewu.
41025031 Ilang'a chakenzayi Mwana kaMuntu mulubanji lwakulema kwinji, hamu nawang'elu zhinji ezhima, wakashakama hetanda dawanta jalubanji lwakulema kwinji.
41025032 Akapompesha nyunza yezhima kumesu inji; wakaambola munza namunza, neyi chaambulaŋayi kabing'a anyikoku nawampembi.
41025033 Anyikoku wakayisha kuchikasa chinji chachijiilu, ampembi kuchimunswa.

41025034 Henohu Mwanta wakayila ákuchikasa chinji chachijiilu ninji, Inzenu enu anakoolekeshuwu kuji Tata yami, swanenu wanta wenu wayilong'esheleluwu kufumisha haaliluwu chikuku champata yamunu mwishina.
41025035 Mulong'a hinatiyili nzala, enu mwanyinkeli yakudya; hinatiyili mpwila, enu mwanyinkeli yakunwa; hinajing'i mwenyi, enu mwantambwili;
41025036 hinading'i nawuvu, enu mwanvwikili; hinakatili, enu mwenzhili nakuntala; hinajing'i mukaleya enu mwenzhili kujami.
41025037 Henohu along'a akamwakula nawu, Mwanta, ifukwinyi twakumweni nanzala, etu tukujiishi? hela nampwila, etu tukunwishi?
41025038 Ifukwinyi twakumweni nawenyi, etu tukutambuli? hela nawuvu, etu tukuvwiki?
41025039 Ifukwinyi twakumweni nakukata hela mukaleya, etu twinzi kujeyi?
41025040 Mwanta wakayakula ninji, Nukuyilezha chalala nami, chimwakalakeleli manakwami wumu, chalala yowu wading'i wakehelamu, mwakalakelelami.
41025041 Henohu wakayila akuchikasa chachimunswa ninji, Mfumenu enu mwashing'ewa, yenu mukesi kahayanyaka kalong'esheleluwu jiyabolu nawang'elu zhinji.
41025042 Mulong'a hinatiyili nzala, enu kunyinka yakudya nehi; hinatiyili mpwila, enu kunyinka yakunwa nehi;
41025043 hinading'i mwenyi, enu kuntambula nehi; hinading'i nawuvu, enu kunvwika nehi; hinakatili, nihinading'i mukaleya, enu kwinza nakuntala nehi.
41025044 Henohu niwena nawa akaakula nawu, Mwanta, ifukwinyi twakumweni nanzala, hela nampwila, hela nawenyi, hela nawuvu, hela nakukata, hela mukaleya, etu tubuli kukukalakela?
41025045 Henohu hakuyakula ninji, Nukuyilezha chalala nami, chimwabulili kukalakela wumu wahaji awa akehelamu, mwabulili kunkalakelami.
41025046 Wenawa akaya kwawu mukubabesha kwahayanyaka; along'a akaya muwumi wahayanyaka.
41026001 Chelili Yesu nakumishi jehi mazu ezhimawa, hakuyila atumbanji twindi ninji,
41026002 Muneluki chimukuhita mafuku ayeji hiChipandakenu, Mwana kaMuntu akamulubula nakumupopela hakulusu.
41026003 Henohu akulumpi zhawatupristu niakulumpi zhawantu anapompi jehi kuchipang'u chakapristu muneni, izhina dindi Kayafwasi.
41026004 Hiyakumushakamina Yesu hampúng'a, kulonda amukwati mwakudimbana, amujahi.
41026005 Hiyakwila nawu, Bayi mumafuku achawizhaku, antu akenza kaleta ipumba.
41026006 Chadiŋiyi Yesu muBetani, mwitala damukwambumba Shimona,
41026007 kuji yena hikukwinza mumbanda, namanji evumba jajiwahi abajika kulema wuseya muchipunda chelola dalubanzhi; hakuyihung'unwina kumutu winji, iku nashakami nakudya.
41026008 Ilang'a atumbanzhi chanachimonuwu hiyakutiya kutama nankashi nawu, Nayikisaŋenidi chenichi?
41026009 Manjawa, neyi ayilanjisha, adi kufwika wuseya weneni, ayinki atuzweng'i.
41026010 Yesu chanachilukiyi hakuyila ninji, Mukumukabishilaji mumbanda? Nankong'eli mujimu wawuwahi.
41026011 Mulong'a atuzweng'i mwekala nawu mafuku ezhima, ilang'a ami hiniji nenu mafuku ezhimaku.
41026012 Mulong'a ichi chanahung'unwiniyi manjawa hamuzhimba wami, nalonji kunlong'eshela kunzhiika.
41026013 Nukuyileja chalala nami, mumatung'a ezhima amba kashimunawu iyi nsang'u yayiwahi, amba katena nawa ninichi chuma chaneliyi mumbandiwu, kulonda kumwanakana nachu.
41026014 Henohu wumu wahekumi nayeji (12), izhina jinji Yudasi Isakaroti, hakuya kuji akulumpi jawatupristu,
41026015 nindi, Mukwitezha kunyinkaji kulonda nakayinkiyi? Wena hiyakumwesekela makumi asatu (30) amali asiliva.
41026016 Kufuma henohu hakukeng'a hatela kumulubwila.
41026017 Dichi hefuku damuchimu damankendi akaji ilung'i, atumbanzhi hiyakwinza kuji Yesu nawu, Wunakeng'i kudiila Chipandakenu kujihi, kulonda tulong'eshi?

41026018 Yena hakuyila ninji, Yenu mung'anda, mukuwana muntu wumu, mumwili nenu, Nkulung'ang'a ninji, Mpinji yami yinashiki dehi kwakwihi; nakeng'i kwinza kwitala deyi nijiiluku Chipandakenu hamu nawatumbanzhi twami.
41026019 Atumbanzhi hiyakwila mwayilezheliyi Yesu, hiyakulong'esha Chipandakenu.
41026020 Dichi chikuneli melela hakushakama nakudya hamu nawatumbanzhi ikumi nayeji (12).
41026021 Hading'i nakudyawu hakwila ninji, Nukuyilezha chalala nami haji mwinenu wumu wukumfukeja.
41026022 Wena hiyakusweja kuneng'a nankashi, hiyakutachika kumwila wezhima wawu nawu, Mwanta, yami tahinji?
41026023 Yena hakwakula ninji, Muntu wuji nakutanta nanami mucheng'a, diyi wukumfukezha.
41026024 Mwana kaMuntu hakuya mwomwamusonekeleluwu, ilang'a Oyu yihung'u yakamonayi owu muntu wukufukezha Mwana kaMuntu! Owu muntu neyi havwalikiluku, mutenowu chawahili.
41026025 Yudasi, wamufukejeli hakwakula ninji, Rabi, yami tahinji? Yena hakumwila ninji, Mwomu muwunahoshi.
41026026 Hading'i nakudyawu, Yesu hakunona dinkenji, hakudikiswila nkisu, hakujihumuna, hakuyinka atumbanzhi nindi, Tambulenu mudyi, weniwu diwu muzhimba wami.
41026027 Hakunona lupasa, hakusakilila, hakuyinka ninji, Nwenumu wezhima wenu;
41026028 mulong'a jiwu mashi ami achitiyang'enu, akupwekela antu amavulu kulonda kuyanakena nachu nyilong'a.
41026029 Nukuyilezha nami, kufuma hanu hinukunwa cheng'i yanyikabu yamuvinyuku, kuyinwa ching'a ifuku jinakanwa nenu yayiha muwanta waTata yami.
41026030 Chanembuwu kamina, hiyakwijika, hiyakuya kumpidi yaOliveta.
41026031 Henohu Yesu hakuyilezha atumbanzhi twindi ninji, Wufuku iwu wejima wenu mukudimboka hansang'u yami; muloŋa anasoneki nawu, Nakatapa kabing'a, Nyikoku yeyinda akayipalang'esha ndu-ndu.
41026032 Chinakela nasang'uki jehi muji afu, nakayang'ahu jehi kuNg'aliliya.
41026033 Petulu hakumwakula nindi, Neyi antu ezhima akudimboka hansang'u yeyeyi, ami kwami hinamba kajimbukaku.
41026034 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Nukukulezha chalala nami wufuku iwu, hakela ikombu kanda eteli, eyi wakajikala kasatu neyi hinamwiluka Yesuku.
41026035 Petulu hakumwila ninji, Hela kufwa naneyi, ami hinakadikaleyuku. Niatumbanji ezhima ahosheli mwomumu nawa.
41026036 Henohu Yesu hakuya chimu nawu kwatenang'awu nawu Ng'esemani; hakuyila atumbanzhi twinji ninji, Shalenu kunu, ami niyi nakulombela kuna.
41026037 Hakuya naPetulu nianyana kaZebedewu ayeji, hakutachika kuneng'a kwakutiya nikumuchima bwi-i.
41026038 Henohu hakuyila ninji, Muchima wami wunaneng'i chakubajika, neyi keng'a nifwi; shalenu kunu, mutoneni hamu nanami.

41026039 Hakuswila kumbidi chanti, hakujinata chamesu heseki, hakulombela ninji, Eyi Tata yami, neyi chinatwesheki itejaku lupasa lunu lumfumi; hela chochu, bayi chinakeŋamuku, ching'a chiwunakeng'eyi.
41026040 Hakwinza kuji atumbanzhi kuyiwana aji mutulu; hakumwila Petulu ninji, Aka! kutwesha kutonena hamu nanami hela mpinji yimu nehi?
41026041 Tonenu mulombeli, kulonda mubuli kwing'ila mukutesha; spiritu chalala yinakeng'i, ilang'a muzhimba wunazeyi.
41026042 Hakufumaku cheng'i kamuchiyeji, hakulombela ninji, Eyi Tata yami, neyi lupasilu kutwesha kumfuma nehi, ching'a nilwinwa hohu, kumina jakwila muwunakeng'i.
41026043 Hakwinza cheng'i, kuyiwana sang'a akaminawu tulu, mulong'a mesu awu alemeni natulu.
41026044 Hakuyishiya cheng'i, hakufumaku, hakulombela kamuchisatu, hakuhosha cheng'i mazu wowamu.
41026045 Hakwinza kuji atumbanji twinji, hakuyila ninji, Kamenu tulu twenu munooki; talenu, mpinji yami yinashiki jehi kwakwihi, Mwana kaMuntu hiyakumulubula kumakasa awakwanshiji.
41026046 Nyamokenu tuyenu; talenu, wúkumfukeja haji kwakwihi.

41026047 Iku wuchiji kuhosha, kukasumuka Yudasi wahekumi nayeji (12) nenzi jehi, nezaza dawantu jajeni, anasenji nimpoku zhakabali ninyitondu, anafumi kuji akulumpi jawatupristu nikuji akulumpi jawantu.
41026048 Yena wamufukejeli wayilezha jehi chinjikizhilu ninji, Yowu nakapwepujola, jiyi mwakakwata.
41026049 Hohenohu hakwinza kuji Yesu, hakumwila ninji, Kolenu Rabi. Hakumupwepujola.
41026050 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Eyi mukwetu, ilaku chiwunenjili. Dichi enza nikwinza, amukwata nikumukwata, hiyakumutwala.
41026051 Kutala mwinawu wumu wading'i naYesu, hakwolola chikasa chinji, hakuhola mpoku yinji yakabali, hakutapa ndung'u yakapristu muneni, kutapa kwakumuketula itu jinji.
41026052 Yesu hakumwila henohu ninji, Somekaku cheng'i mpoku yeyi yakabali muchindalu chayu; mulong'a antu ezhima akukwata kumpoku yakabali akafwa kumpoku yakabali.
41026053 Eyi wunatong'ozhoki neyi ami nikang'anyi kumulembelela Tata yami, antemesheli katatakichi aŋelu akubajika nyikanka ikumi nayiyeji (12)?
41026054 Inji nyikanda yazhila yelawu nawu jichi chakelawu, yakalumbulukila hadihi?
41026055 Yena mpinji oyu Yesu hakuyila mazaza awantu ninji, Munenzi nakunkwata nampoku zhakabali ninyitondu! Ami niikombi? Nashakamini muTembeli hefuku hefuku nakutang'isha antu, enu kunkwata nehi.
41026056 Ilang'a yuma yezhimiyi yinalonji nyikanda yawatuprofwetu yazhila yakalumbuluki. Hohenohu atumbanzhi ezhima amushiya nikumushiya, atemoka nikutemoka.
41026057 Awa akwatili Yesu amutweli kwitala jakapristu muneni Kayafwasi, kwadipompela jehi ansoneki nawakulumpi.
41026058 Ilang'a Petulu wamulondeleli munyima kwakulehi, lwe-e nikuchipang'u chakapristu muneni, hakushakama nawamashing'ika, kulonda atali muchakakumina.
41026059 Dichi akulumpi zhawatupristu, niakwachota ezhima, hiyakukeng'akeng'a nsaŋu yakumutwambila Yesu, kulonda amujahi nachu;
41026060 hiyayimwenuku, hela kwenzhili ayinsahu akutwamba amavulu. Nkumininaku hikukwinza ayedi,
41026061 elili nawu, Iwu iyala welaŋa ninji, Ami nukutwesha kusanda Tembeli yaNzambi, hinukuyitung'a cheng'i mumafuku asatu.
41026062 Kapristu muneni hakwimana, hakumwila ninji, Eyi niizu diwukwakula nehi? Iyi yuma yiji nakukushimunawu hiyumanyi?
41026063 Yesu sang'a amwenenayi nzo-o. Kapristu muneni hakumwila ninji, Nakusanyikishi Nzambi wamumi, tulezhi neyi yeyi Kristu, Mwana kaNzambi.
41026064 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Mwomwenomu muwunahoshi; nukuyilezha nami, mwamba kamona Mwana kaMuntu nashakami kuchikasa chachidiilu chang'ovu, hakwinza hamavu amwiwulu.
41026065 Kapristu muneni hakutabola mahinindi ninji, Nahoshi mazu akutuka Nzambi, tukukeng'elaji nawa ayinsahu amakwawu? Enu aweni munatiyi chanatukaniyi.
41026066 Munatong'ozhoki ng'ahi? Wena hiyakwakula nawu, Nateli kufwa.
41026067 Hohenohu hiyakumufwijila mazeng'i kumesu inji, hiyakumweta zhinkonyi, amakwawu hiyakumweta makaha,
41026068 nawu, Eyi Kristu, tuprofweteli, nakweti hinyi?
41026069 Henohu Petulu nashakami muchipang'u hanzi; kuji yena hikukwinza chang'adima wumu, hakumwila ninji, Eyi nawa wajing'i naniwu kaNg'aliliya Yesu.
41026070 Yena hakujikala kumesu awu wezhima wawu ninji, Ichi chiwunahoshi ami kwami kuchiluka nehi.
41026071 Chanejikiyi mwikeki, mukwawu nawa hakumumona, hakuyila owu ading'uku ninji, Iwu muntu niyena wajing'i nakaNazareta Yesu.
41026072 Hakudikala cheng'i nikusanyika chikupu ninji, Yeniwu muntu ami kwami hinamwilukaku.
41026073 Chihanahiti kampinji kantesha antu emenuku hiyakwinza, hiyakumwila Petulu nawu, Chalala yeyi mwinawu; mulong'a ijimi jeyi jinakushimuni.
41026074 Hohenohu atachika nikudishing'ola nikusanyika chikupu ninji, Yeniwu muntu ami kwami hinamwilukaku. Hohenohu ikombu etiyila nikwitiyila.
41026075 Petulu hakwanuka izu damwililiyi Yesu ninji, Eyi wakadikala kasatu hakela ikombu kanda etiyili. Hakwijika nakujila nankashi.
41027001 jichi chikuneli bujiji, akulumpi zhawatupristu ezhima, niakulumpi zhawantu hiyakumushakamina Yesu hampúng'a, kulonja amuzhahi;
41027002 hiyakumukasa, hiyakumutwala nakumushikizha kuji nyuuli Pilatu.

41027003 Henohu owu Yujasi wamufukezheli, chamweniyi anamuhishi jehi, hakubalumuka mumuchima winji, hakufuntisha cheng'i owu mali asiliva makumi asatu (30) kuji akulumpi zhawatupristu nikuji akulumpi,
41027004 ninji, Chinafukezhi mashi akaji mulong'a naputoli. Wena hiyakumwila nawu, Hinsang'u yetuku; ozhi zheyi.
41027005 Hakunatila owu mali asiliva muTembeli, hakufumaku, hakuya nakujikujika.
41027006 Akulumpi zhawatupristu hiyakunona owu mali asiliva, hiyakwila nawu, kuyisha mwaswekelang'awu mali azhila chinzhila, mulong'a hiwuseya wamashi.
41027007 Hiyakutiyang'ana, hiyakulanja nachu kampata kakang'emi, kulonja azhiikang'amu enyi.
41027008 jichi kampatoku hiyakukatumba izhina nawu, Kampata kamashi; nikwifuku jalelu.
41027009 Henohu mwahosheliyi kaprofwetu Yeremiya mwalumbulukili, mweliliyi ninji, Anoneni mali asiliva makumi asatu (30), jiwu wuseya wayena esekeleluwu, Wuseya wafuukwiluwu kuji aIsarela;
41027010 alanjili nachu kampata kakang'emi, mwomwanlezheliyi MWANTA.
41027011 Yesu hakwimana kumesu anyuuli; nyuuli hakumwihula ninji, Eyi yeyi Mwanta wawaYujeya, tahinji? Yesu hakumwila ninji, Mwomwenomu muwunahoshi.
41027012 Chamwinkeluwu mulong'a kuji akulumpi zhawatupristu nikuji akulumpi, haakwili izuku.
41027013 Pilatu hakumwila henohu ninji, Iyi yuma yayivulu yiji nakukushimunawu hiwunayitiyuku?
41027014 Hamwakwili hela izu nijimuku; nyuuli hakuhayama nankashi.
41027015 jichi hachawizhochu nyuuli wombililang'a antu muntu wamukaleya wumu akutonjawu.
41027016 Henohu ajing'i namuntu wamukaleya wumu watiyakana, izhina jinji Baraba.
41027017 jichi chanapompuwu, Pilatu hakuyila ninji, Munakeng'i niyumbilinyi? Baraba, tahinji Yesu atenang'awu nawu Kristu?
41027018 Mulong'a welukili ninji anamulubwili hansang'u yechima janatiyuwu.

41027019 Chanashakamiyi hetanja jakusompela, ing'ojinji hakumutemeshela muntu ninji, Bayi wukwata hansang'u zhanowu muntu walong'aku, mulong'a nsang'u yinji lelu nayimweni yuma yakala yayivulu mukulota.
41027020 Akulumpi zhawatupristu niakulumpi hiyakukanzhikizha mazaza alombi Baraba, Yesu amuzhahi.
41027021 Nyuuli hakuyakula ninji, Awa ayeji munakeng'i niyumbiluhu wumwojihi? Nawu, Baraba.
41027022 Pilatu hakuyila ninji, Inji Yesu atenang'awu nawu Kristu nukumwila ng'ahi? Wezhima wawu nawu, Amupopeli hakulusu.
41027023 Yena ninji, Mulong'anyi? Chuma chatama chanakong'iyi chumanyi? Wena aswezha nikubijeka nawu, Amupopeli hakulusu.

41027024 Pilatu chanamoniyi nayikang'anyi jehi, hihakuswezha niipumba, hakutambula menzhi, hakwisuka kumakasinji, iku izaza jiji nakumutala, ninji, Ami hiniji namulong'a wamashi aniwu muntu walong'aku; hinsang'u yenu.
41027025 Antu ezhima hiyakwakula nawu, Mashi inji atukumini etu aweni nawanyanetu.
41027026 Ayumbilaku niBaraba. Chanamuvupoliyi Yesu yikoti, hakuyinkayu ninji amupopeli hakulusu.
41027027 Mashijika anyuuli hiyakumutwala Yesu mwibulu jawu, amupompeshela nichenju chezhima.
41027028 Amuvuula nimahininji, hiyakumuvwika ihina jawusombu; (ihina javwelang'awu anyanta)
41027029 atung'a nichibaaba chanying'a, hiyakuchisha kumutu winji; amusha niiteti muchikasa chinji chachijiilu, hiyakumufukamina, hiyakumuseha nawu, Kolenu, Mwanta wawaYujeya!
41027030 Hiyakumufwizhila mazeng'i, hiyakumutambula cheng'i iteti oju, hiyakumweta nachu kumutu.
41027031 Chanamanishuwu kumuseha, hiyakumuvuula oju ihina jamuvwikiluwu, hiyakumuvwika cheng'i mahininji, hiyakumutwala nakumupopela hakulusu.
41027032 Hajing'i nakwijikawu, hiyakuwana muntu wakuKireni, izhina jinji Shimona, hiyakumukwata nawu amusenjeluku kulusu yinji.
41027033 Chanashikuwu kwatenang'awu nawu, Gologota; chaya mukwila nawu Kuchang'u;
41027034 hiyakumwinka vinyu yabatuka yakubombashana nanjulu anwi; chanayitompiyi, kuyinwa kwonti kwinji.
41027035 Chanamupopeluwu hakulusu, ajanzhang'ena nimahininji.
41027036 Hiyakushakama kwenoku nakumuhemba.
41027037 Kwiwulu jamutu winji ashiluku mukanja wamulong'a wamwinkeluwu; awusonekeli nawu, IWU jIYI YESU MWANTA WAWAYUjEYA
41027038 Henohu apopeleli hamakulusu chimu nayena atuponju ayeji, wumu kuchikasa chinji chachijiilu, mukwawu kuchimunswa.
41027039 Hiyakumutukola kuji antu ahitilang'aku, hiyakumulembola nanyitu yawu,
41027040 nawu, Eyi wasanjang'a Tembeli, hiwukuyitung'a cheng'i mumafuku asatu, jamwini; neyi wuMwana kaNzambi, sulukaku hakulusu.
41027041 Niakulumpi zhawatupristu amuseheli nawa mwomumu, niansoneki niakulumpi,
41027042 elili nawu, Waamwinini akwawu, yomweni hanatweshi kujamwinaku. Yena hiMwanta wawaIsarela, asuluki hakulusu katataka, tumukuhweleli.
41027043 Wakuhwelelang'a Nzambi; neyi namukeng'i amupulwishi katataka; mulong'a yena welang'a ninji niMwana kaNzambi.
41027044 Niatuponju, ápopeleluwu hamakulusu chimu ninji, amuhosholeli nawa mwomumu.
41027045 jichi kufuma hampinzhi yamuchitanu nayimu (12:00 hrs), mwitung'a jezhima mushishita nimwijima, kushika nikumpinzhi yamuchitanu nachiwana (15:00 hrs).

41027046 Chelili neyi hikwakwihi nampinzhi yamuchitanu nachiwana (15:00 hrs), Yesu hakubilela nezu jang'ovu ninji, Eli, Eli, lama sabakatani; chaya mukwila nawu, Nzambi yami, Nzambi yami, wunanshiyiliji kankawami?
41027047 Amakwawu emenuku, chanachitiyuwu, hiyakwila nawu, Iwu iyala hakutambika Elizha.
41027048 Wumu hakunyakala kunona sponzhi, hakuyisha muvinyu yabatuka hakuyisha kwiteti, hakumwinka ninji anwi.
41027049 Anashali nawu, Leka tutali neyi Elizha wukwinza nakumwamwina.
41027050 Yesu hakubilela cheng'i nezu jang'ovu, yotula niwumi winji.
41027051 Ihina jajing'i jakuzhika muTembeli mwazhila jitabuka nihakachi, kufumisha kwiwulu njo-o nikwishina; maseki hiyakukanka, nimalola hiyakubaloka;
41027052 kumazhamu hikukwenzuluka, akwakuzhila akamini jehi tulu amavulu hiyakusang'uka nanyizhimba yawu.
41027053 Helili Yesu nasang'uki jehi hiyakwing'ila mung'anja yazhila, hiyakumwekana kuji antu amavulu.
41027054 Mukulumpi wawaMashijika ninowu ahembelang'ayi nawu Yesu, chanamonuwu mutentanshi niyuma yahitiluku, hiyakutiya woma nankashi, nawu, Chalala iwu wajing'i Mwana kaNzambi!
41027055 Kwajing'i ambanja amavulu emeni kwakulehi nakumutala, wowu afumini naYesu kung'aliliya, amukalakelelang'a.
41027056 Hajing'i niMariya Manjaleni, niMariya mama yaYakoba naYosesi, nimama yawanyana kaZebejewu.
41027057 Chikuneli melela hikukwinza muntu waheta, wafumini kuAramateya, izhina jinji Yosefu, niyena nawa wajing'i kambanzhi kaYesu.
41027058 Yena muntu iwu hakuya nakulomba muzhimba waYesu kuji Pilatu; Pilatu hakuyila ninji mwinkenuwu.
41027059 Yosefu hakutambula muzhimba, hakuwuvung'avung'a mwihina jitooka jakaji mazhilu,
41027060 hakuwukamika mwizhamu jinji jajiha japokweliyi yomweni mwilola; kuchisu chezhamu hakukunkumwinaku ilola jeneni, hakufumaku.
41027061 NiMariya Manjaleni wajing'i kwoku, niMariya mukwawu, ashakamini nakutala mesu kwizhamu.
41027062 Chashikili ifuku jalonjelang'a mwifuku jakulong'esha kwaSabata, akulumpi zhawatupristu niaFwarisewu hiyakupompa kuji Pilatu,
41027063 nawu, Eyi Mwanta tunaanuki jehi netu iwu mukwakujimbana hajing'iyi wamumi welilang'a ninji, Neyi munahiti jehi mafuku asatu nakasang'uka muji afu.

41027064 jichi lezhenu antu akakoleshi kwizhamu kushika nikwifuku jamuchisatu; mukunkulwayi atumbanzhi twinji akenza nakumwiyamu, akalezha antu nawu nasang'uki muji afu; kuluwang'esha kwakukuminina kwakabajika kwakusambila.
41027065 Pilatu hakuyila ninji, Mashijika akwakuhemba muji nawu, yenu mwakakoleshuku mwonsu mumunatwesheli.
41027066 jichi wena hiyakuya, hiyakukolesha kwizhamu: hiyakusha chilamiki kwilola, enkaku nimashijika akuhemba izhamu.
41028001 Ifuku jaSabata chijelili hijikukeng'a kuhita, chikuneli hikwakwihi nankunku yakucha yamulungu, jojifuku jatachi, Mariya Manjaleni niMariya mukwawu hiyakwinza nakutala kwizhamu.
41028002 Kwahitili mutentanshi waweni; mulong'a kang'elu kaMWANTA wasulukili kwiwulu, wenzhili nakulang'umuna ilola, hakushakamahu.
41028003 Kumutala wuji neyi chikwanzazhi, mahininji atooka to-o neyi chikwampeza;
41028004 akwakuhemba hiyakumuzaala woma, hiyakwila neyi afu hohu.
41028005 Kang'elu hakuyila owu ambanja ninji, Bayi mutiya womaku, neluki nami muji nakukeng'akeng'a Yesu apopelawu hakulusu.
41028006 Haji munuku, wasang'uka jehi neyi chayilezheliyi. Inzenu mutali mwakamayi Mwanta.
41028007 Yenu mwakalezhi atumbanzhi twinji swayi nenu, Nasang'uki jehi muji afu. Tiyenu, wukuyang'ahu jehi kung'aliliya; jiku kumwakamumwena. Tiyenu, nayilezhi jehi.
41028008 Hiyakufuma kwizhamu swayi, iku nawoma, iku namuzang'alu waweni. Hiyakuya nakutwala nsang'u kuji atumbanzhi twinji lufuchi.
41028009 Kukasumuka Yesu nayibulakani jehi, hakuyila ninji, Kolenu. Hiyakwinza nakumukwata kunyenju yinji, hiyakumufukamina.
41028010 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Bayi mutiya womaku; yenu mwakalezhi anakwami akayi kung'aliliya, jiku kwakanmwenawu.
41028011 Chayilang'awu, mashijika akwakuhemba amakwawu hiyakwinza mung'anja, hiyakulezha akulumpi zhawatupristu mwamwenuwu mwezhima.
41028012 Chanapompuwu chimu nawakulumpi, hiyakutiyang'ana kwinka mashijika mali amavulu,
41028013 nawu, Ilenu nenu atumbanzhi twinji enza nawufuku hitwajing'i etu mutulu, hiyakumwiyamu.
41028014 Neyi nyuuli wukutiya nsang'u iyi, etu twakayimenaku kulonja mwakabuli kwakama.
41028015 jichi wena hiyakutambula mali owu, hiyakwila mwayilezheluwu; jichi izu iji jitiyakana nimuji aYujeya kushika nikwifuku jalelu.
41028016 Hakwila atumbanzhi ikumi nawumu (11) hiyakuya kumpiji yakung'aliliya yayikaniniyi Yesu.
41028017 Chanamumonuwu, hiyakujifukula kuji yena, ilang'a amakwawu hiyakuzhinoka.
41028018 Yesu hakwinza kuji wena, hakuhosha nawu; ninji, Wanta wamwiwulu niwahamaseki wezhima anawunyinki.
41028019 jichi yenu mwakelishi atumbanzhi munyunza yezhima, mwakayizhimiki mwizhina jaTata, nijaMwana, nijaSpilitu Wazhila.
41028020 Mwakayitang'ishi kulonja ahembi yuma yezhima yinayilezhenu; tiyenu, ami niji nenu mafuku ezhima nikwakakumina nyaka.
42001001 Iku jiku kutachika kwa nsang'u ya hiwahi ya Yesu Kilisitu, mwana ka Nzambi.
42001002 Nehi chasonekahi mu mukanda wa kapolofwetu Isaya," talaku, ami hina kutemesha ntemesha wami ku Mesu ehi.
42001003 Jizu ja humu jina kujila mu Masang'a nahu,' lengenu njeye nzhila ya mwanta. lengenu nzhila hindi ikale yokola."
42001004 Yowanu enzhili apapatishileng'a muchikalampata na kutang'isha kupapatisha kwa wanakena wa nshiji.
42001005 Jitung'a jezhima ja yudeya na Antu ezhima aku yelusalema ayiji ezhima kunji yena. Aipapatishili kuji yena mu Yodani.
42001006 Yowanu wavweli Mahina ya mavuzhi ya An'ameli ni muya wa chitembi mumbunda yinji, wajileng'a Tubola ni Wuchi wa Mwisang'a.
42001007 Hakushimuna ninji," umu unakwinza hanyima yami wabajika ng'ovu yami, ami hinateli kusubula nyiya ya Nkwabilu zhinduku.
42001008 Na hipapatishili mu Menzhin hilang'a yena haku ipapatisha na kesi ka Sipilitu wazhila"
42001009 Chamwekeni mu Mafuku hana Yesu wenzhili hakufuma ku Nazaleta mu Ng'alaliya, na hipapatisha kuji Yowanu mu Kalong'a ka Yodani.
42001010 Chanjing'ahi na kufuma Yesu mu Menzhi, wamweni iwulu njinenzuluki na Sipilitu wenzhilang'a mwishina anji yena nehi katela.
42001011 Izu jafumini mwiwulu nindi," yeyi mwanami nakeng'a. Nakutiyang'a kuwaha nankashi."
42001012 Hohenohu Sipilitu hakumutwala muchinkalampata.
42001013 Hanjing'a muchinkalampata hakumutesha kuji Satana Mafuku makumi awana. Hanjing'a hamu na wanyama hamwisang'a, na hang'elu hiyakumukalakela.
42001014 Chanamukwatuwu Yowanu na kumusha mukaleya Yesu wenzhili mu Ngalileya hakushimuna nsang'u yayiwahi ya Nzambi.
42001015 Hakushimuna ninji," minji yinashiki jehi na wanta wa Nzambi wuji kwakamwihi.
42001016 Chajin'i nakuhitayi kwizhiya da Ng'alileya, hakumona Shimona nimanakwinji andeli ajinakuumba kaleng'i mwizhiya, mulong'a ajina ayimbinda yanshi.
42001017 Yesu hakuwoshela ninji,' nanami, na yisukuli kwikala wubinda wa Wantu.
42001018 Hohenohu ashiya nituleng'i twawu na kulondela yena.
42001019 Chinayiyihu Yesu kumbiji chanti hamweni Yakoba mwana ka Zebedewu na Yowanu nimanakwinji, ajing'a muwantu nakutungula Tuleng'i.
42001020 Hakuyitambika na wena ashili a Tata yawu Zebedewu muwatu nihang'amba zhawu afumbiliwu, hiyakuya ninj.
42001021 Hiyakwinza ku Kapenamu, hetan'wa ja Sabata hakwing'ila mu Sinagogi nakuyitangisha.
42001022 Hiyakuhayama chayitangisjiliyi,  mulong'a neyi wukweti wanta baji neyi ansonekiku.
42001023 Henohu mu Sinagogi yawu mwajing'i  Muntu wukweti Sipilitu wazonda hakujila.
42001024 Ninji," tukwila ngahi nayi, Yesu waku Nazaleta? wulezhi nakutuki sang'ana? nakwiluki. Yeyi mukakuzhila wambala wa Nzambi!"
42001025 Yesu hakumuhoshola ninji," mwenaku na kufumaku muji yena!"
42001026 Sipilitu wazonda hakumukonyesha hakubilela nezu ja Ngovu amufuma  nikumufuma.
42001027 Antu enzhima hakuhayama, hohnohu hakuhayama kwakujiwula nawu, chenechi chika"?
42001028 hohenohumpuhu yinji yitiyakana nikutiyakana mwezhima mwahita itang'a ja Ng'alileya jezhima kwi_ndo.
42001029 Chedikulihu mu Sinagogi enzhili mwitala ja Shimona na Andeli, hamu nawa Ykoba na Yowan.
42001030 Hohenohu mukuwa Shimona wajing'a wakama  nakukata mashika, hohenohu hamulezhamu ni Yesu.
42001031 Hakwinza, hakumukwata ku Chikasa, hakumu hindwisha, Mashika hakumufuma nikumufuma, hakuyikalakla.
42001032 Melela hahumini itan'wa amuletelili akana ezhima ela akweti Ademoni.
42001033 Mukala wezhima wupompa nikuchisufwi.
42001034 Hakunka hamavulu anjing'i akata nyisong'u yeng'i hakufumisha Andemoni kuhoshaku  mulong'a wena hamwilukili.
42001035 Hakuhinduka hankunku yakucha hakwidika hakuya kwaanka winji nakulombola.
42001036 Shimona nanohu anjing'iyi nawu hiyakulondela nakumutoonda.
42001037 Chanamuwaniwu hiyakumwila nawu," Antu ezhima aji nakukukeng'akeng'a."
42001038 Hakuyila ninji, tulnu kunyikala yacheng'i, yiji kwakwihi, nishimuni nikwe yacheng'i  jiyi kwakwihi nishimuni nikwenoku naw, mulong'a jichi chinenzhili.
42001039 Hakwing'ila mwezhiwa mu Ng'alileya nakutang'isha mu Masinagoga yawu nikufumisha Andemoni.
42001040 Mukwambumba wenzhili kuji yena. Hakumulmbelela, hakumufukamina nakuhosha ninji," neyi wunetezhi unatweshi kuntokesha."
42001041 watiyili wushona Yesu wolweli chikasa chindi wamukunkili, hakumwila ninji netezhi tokaku.
42001042 Hohenohu mbumba yimufuma nikimufuma Yotooka nikutooka.
42001043 Yesu hakumuhosha nan'ovu na kumulezha kuya kwindi.
42001044 Hakumwila ninji," babalaku baji wulezha mu Muntuku, yanh'a kweyi, wakajimwekeshi kuji Kapulisitu wakamwinki mulambu wakujitokesha nachu wayilezheliwu kuji Mosi kulonda kuyilila wunsahu.

42001045 Ilang'a yena hakufumaku hakutachika kuchishimuna nankashi hakutiyakesha nsang'u oyu kwezhima dichi Yesu hakwikala muma nkalampata mwakaji Antu hatwesheli kwijika chin'i hamukala hatokaku Antu hiyakufumang'a kumbaji zhezhima hiyakuyan'a kuji yena.
42002001 Chimwahitili mafuku, mwata Yesu weitili chen'i mu Kapelinama, atiyili nawa wuji mwitala.
42002002 Antu amavulu ampompeli kwenoku, Hikweji n'ilun'a ku, bayi nimuchisu ku, hakuyitanisha izu.
42002003 Antu iyakutwala Muntu wakata Kalepa kuji yena, anamwelili kuji Antu  awana.
42002004 Lyakulan'anya kushika kwakwihi nayena namalen'a wezaza, hiyakubutulula hewulu detela mwajin'iyi Yesu, chineli hanashikule jehi, halili hina, halamini wakatili Kalepa.
42002005 Yesu chanamoniyi, chikuhwelela kwawa, hakumwila wakata kupola niji," mwanami, nshiji zhiye anakwanakeni.
42002006 "Ilan'a mwenomu mwashakamini ansoneki, hiyakujihuzhola munyachima yawu,
42002007 Hiji,lwu Muntu nahosholiji chochichi? natli Nzambi! wakutwesha kwanakena Antu nshiji zhawu hinyi?" chin'a Nzambi hotu.
42002008 Hohenohu Yesu eluka nimu Spilitu yiji, chinakujihuzholawu mu Michima yawu. Hakuyila niji," mukujihu zholelayi yumiyi mumichima yenu?
42002009 Chaswayi kumwila mukwa Kalepa nami; Anakwankeni nshinji zheyi, tahiji kumwila nami Hizhkaku, nyamukaku hakajiji kayi, ejaku?
42002010 Ilan'a naloji mwiluki nenu mwana ka Muntu wuji nalusesa wakwanakena Antu nshiji hanu hamaseki, hakwila wakata Kalepa."
42002011 Niji, nakwili nami, hizhakaku, nyamukaku hakajiji keyi, jiyili kwitala jeyi."
42002012 Halunyamuka, hohenohu yonyamuna nikajiji kiji, ejika nimwitala hayanikubiji ya Wantu hezhima, hiyakulemesha Nzambi nawa," kaja tuchimonan'ahu jehi ichuku."
42002013 Wayili chen'i kuchikuma Yezhima, Izaza yezhima hiji ku muompela, yena hakuyitan'isha.
42002014 Chahitiliyi, hakumona Levi mwana ka Alafwewu nashakami kwakutambwila nyombu, hakumwila niji," hakunyamuka hakumulojala.
42002015 Chajin'ayi mwitala ja Levi na kuja, asonkeshi amavulu nakwanshiji hiyeku shakama na Yesu nawatumbazhi twiji, mulon'a wena wa amavulu amulojelan'a.
42002016 Ansoneki, zhawa Fwalisewa, chanamumonawa nakuja hamu nawakwanshiji newa sonkeshi, hiya kuyila atumbazhi twiji nawa," mulon'aji yena hakuja nawa sonkeshi niakwanshinji?"
42002017 Yesu chanachitiyi hakuyila niji," Antu akola hiyakegakegaga chimbukuku; China Antu akata, hinezhili nakutambika alogaku, ching'a akwonshiji.

42002018 Atumbazhi twa Yowana nawa Fwalisewa ajin'i nakuzhing'a naluleka kaji. Antu hiyakwinza nakwihula nawa," Antumbazhi twa Yowana niatumbazhi twawa Fwalisewa azhin'an'a nakuleka kuya, hakwila atumbazhi tweyi hizhin'an'a chafuma
42002019 hanka?"Yesu wahosheli kuji wena," chinateleli anapompi kuchawuzha kuzhila nakuleka kujya henohu nsombuli wuji mukachi kawo, hayakutweshaku.
42002020 Ilan'a mafuku amba kanza akela nsumbuli akamufumisha mukachi kawa, Hefuku oju jihu, homba kazhin'awu  nakuleka kuja.

42002021 Kwosi Muntu wukuchimina chitabu chehina jajiha kujilaya jajikuluku. Mukunkulwayi ochu chajin'i  chakuzhikamu nachu, chikutatabula chachikulu, chachiha chikutabula chachikulu. Chilaku chikuswezha kutoha.

42002022 Kwosi Muntu wukusha vinyu yayiha mumapakumuna ayitembi yayikuluku. Neyi chochochu, vinyu yikubusa yetembi, nivinya niyetembi yikukisika. Ilan'a, alon'en'a vinyu yayiha mumapakuna ayitembi yayiha."
42002023 Hefuku Jasabata esu wajin'a nakuhita muwajimu watijiku chajin'i nakuhitawa atambazhi twiji hiyakutachika kunona nyitu yatijiku.
42002024 Afwalisewu hiyakwihula nawa," tala, aji nakwililaji chuma chazhila kwil hafuku Jasabata?"
42002025 Yena hakwila niji, kaja mutan'enahu jehi chelili davida habuliliyi yakuja, hatiyiliyi nzala_niyena Niantu ajin'iyi nawu_
42002026 Chen'ililiyi mwatala ja Nzambi hajin'ayi kapilitu muneni, abiyatali, chajiliyi mankeji akutenteka  kumesa anzambi, azhila kuja Antu achen"i atuplistu hohu, hakwinahu niwowu ajin'iyi nawa."
42002027 Yesu hakuyilanin'a," Sabata hiyelili Muntu, Muntu hiyamwilili Sabataku,"
42002028 jichi, mwaana wa Muntu himwata, wa Sabata nawa."
42003001 Cheng'i Yesu wenjeli kuya muSinagogi, Momwenomu mwajing'a iyala wakalepa.
42003002 Antu makwawu hiyakumutalishisha neyi wukumuuka haSabata kulonja amwinki mulong'a.
42003003 yesu wahosheli neyala wachikasa chakalepa ninji "hinjukaku, imanaku hakachi kawu".
42003004 Hakuyila ninji, "Chalong'a kwila chachiwahi haSabata inji chaluwa, kuhanjisha muntu tahinji kumuzhaha?" Ilang'a amweneni nzo-o.
42003005 Hakuyitala wezhima wawu nakuzuwa, hakuneng'a hakuchinchika kwa michima yawu, hakumwila ona iyala ninji, " ololaku chikasa cheyi" yacholola nikucholola, choloka nikoloka.
42003006 Afwalisewu hiyakwijika hohenohu hiyakumukwatila nikafuta nawaHelodi nawu, tukumukisang'ana ng'ahi?
42003007 Yesu nawatumbanzhi twinji, hiyakuya kwizhiya, izaza jeneni jamulonjeleli jafumini kuNg'alaliya, nikuYudeya,
42003008 NikuYelusalema, nikuEdomi, nikukabaji kamusela yaYodana, nikuTira naSodomi, Izaza jajeni chijinatiyi yuma yamaneni yeliliyi, hinjikwinza kuji yena.
42003009 Hakuyilezha atumbanzhi twinji  ninji, amushili kawatu kanyanya kwakwihi, kulonda kukang'esha izaza kumuhumahuma.
42003010 Mulong'a wokeli amavulu, jichi ezhima ajing'i namisong'u kujishinjekela haji yena kulonja kuyuka.
42003011 NiaSipilitu azonja chiyakumumonawu, hiyakujinatola hamaseki kumensu inji, hiyakubilela nawu, "Eyi wuji mwana kaNzambi".
42003012 Hakuyihoshela ninji, bayi mwakantiyakeshaku.
42003013 Hakukanjuka hampinji, hakutambika ana akeng'eliyi yomweni, hiyakuya kuji yena.
42003014 Hakutonjahu ikumi naayeji (12) atumbili atuPositolu kulonda kwikala ninji, akayitemeshang'a nikushimwina nsang'u.
42003015 Nawa kwikala nalesesa lwakufumisha anjemoni.
42003016 Watonjeli ana ikumi naayeji (12): Shimona, watumbiliyi ninji, Petulu;
42003017 Yakoba mwana kaZebedewu, naYowanu manakwa Yakoba, watumbiliyi ninji, Bowanezi, nawu naya kachivuminina chanvula.
42003018 niAndeli, niFwilipu, niBatolomewu, Nimatewu, niTomansi, niYakoba mwana kaAlafwelu, niTeda, niShimona kenani,
42003019 niYudasi Isakaliyoti, wumufukezheleli nawa.
42003020 yena wayili kumukala ni izaza jabulakeni cheng'i hsmu, kulonda kukang'anya nukijya jinkenji.
42003021 Antang'a zhinji chachitiyiliwu, ayili nawu amukwati, mulong'a elili nawu, "naandali".
42003022 Niang'anjiki afumini kuYelusalema ahosheli nawu, "wukweti Bezebuli" nachiyulu chawanjemona wukufumishang'a njemona".
42003023 Yesu wayitambikili nanakuyilezha chishimu, "Jiyabolu wuteshi kufumisha Jiyabolu?"
42003024 Neyi wanta wukujizung'isha waweni, owu wanta hiwukwimanaku.
42003025 Neyi itala jikujizung'isha jajeni, oji itala hijikwamanaku.
42003026 Neyi jiyabolu wukujinyamukila yomweni nakujizung'isha, jichi hakutwesha kwimanaku, ilang'a nenzi kunkuminina.
42003027 Ilang'a hikuji muntu hela wumu wukutela kwing'ila mwitala jaiyala mukwang'ovu nikwiya yamunjama chakaji kumweseka iwu iyala wang'ovu, nikubuwa mwitala jinji.
42003028 Chalala nikuyilezha nami, nshiji zezhima zwawanyana kawantu akayanakenazhu, nimatukawu atukang'awu Nzambi,
42003029 Ilang'a Wezhima wukatuka Sipilitu wazhila hiyakamwanatenaku ilang'a wukazatishewa nanshiji yahayanyaka".
42003030 Yesu wahosheli izhi mulong'a niwena ajing'a nakuhosha "wuji nazhiSipilitu zhazonda".
42003031 Mama yinji nawanakwinji enzhili nawa emeni hanzhi. Hiyakutemesha muntu wakumutambika.
42003032 Izaza jawantu jashakamini nakupompela, hiyakumwila nawutala mama nianakweyi aji hanzhi anakukeng'a.
42003033 Hakuyakula ninji, "mama yami hinyi? anakwami anyi?
42003034 Hakutala antu ashakamini nakumuzhing'umuka ninji, "talenu mama yami nianakwami".
42003035 Owu muntu wezhima wukwila mwaya muchima wanzambi jiyi manakwami, diyi muhelami nawa diyi mama yami.

42004001 Cheng'i watachikili kutan'isha kuchikumu chejiya, kwamupomelelo Izaza jeneni nankashi, jichi yena hakwinila mu wantu wajinga hezhiya, ashakamanini. Kazajejima hijikwikala kuchikumu  kwakwihi nejiya.
42004002 Hakuhitan'isha yuma yayillulu nayishimu,
42004003 "Tiyenu! mukakukuwa mbutu wayilili ninji, tiyililenu. Talenu, mukwakuwa wayilili nakuvuwa mbuta.
42004004 Chakuwilili, jikwawu jaholokeleli kunsa yanjila, atuja hiyakwiinza nakujija.
42004005 Jikwawu jaholokeleli Hamalola habulili Maseki amavulu, zhibaluka nihohenohu, mulon'a habulili Maseki amavulu kwishina.
42004006 Itan'wa chijinashiki mwiulu hijikubabika, hijikuma, mulon'a zhabulili nyizhi  womeni.
42004007 Jikwawu jaholokeleli mukachi kanyin'a. Oyu nyin'a hiyikukula, hiyikujika mbutu, hijason'eluku.
42004008 Jikwawu jaholokeleli Hamaseki amawahi, hijikuson'a nakukula nakukula nakusemunwina; Jason'eli jikwawu makumi asatu(30), jikwawu makumi atanu najimu(60), jikwawu nkalakazhi( 700)," "
42004009 Hakuhila ninji, yowu mukweti matu akutiya, atiya."
42004010 Hanging'a Yesu ikweji, owu ajiniyi nawa nukumi nayeji(12), hiyakumwiula mwaya oyu yishimu.
42004011 Hakuyila ninji," enu anayinki kwiluka chijinjilu chawantu wa Nzambi. Hakwila awa aji hanzhi yuma yejima ayilejan'a muyishimu,
42004012 kubija kumona akamona, akabuli kushinshika, kutiya akatiya, akabuli kwiluka, akenja kabalumuka chen'i  hiyakuyanakena."
42004013 Hakuyila ninji," chishimu ichi himunachilukuku? inji mwakeluka n'ahi yishimu yejima?"
42004014 Mukwakukuwa wakuwan'a izu.
42004015 Awa aji kunsu yanjila, kwana kuwuwa izu, wowu akwila chanatiyuw, hohenohu jiyabolu hakwinza nakufumisha izu jana kuwuwu munji wena.
42004016 Chochimu ninawa anakuwuwu hazhi Malola; wowu, akwila chanatiyuwu izu hikuji tambula namuzan'alu hohenohu.
42004017 Muji wena muzhi mwosi, ilang'a akukakelamu chantesha. Nkuminikaku chikukwinza yihunu hiya kujimbuka hohenowu.
42004018 Amakwawu anakuwewu munying'a. Wowu akutiya izu,
42004019 kwakama kwamakonu nikujimbana kwamaheta nikufwila yuma yikwawu hikukujin'ilamu hikukulumbisha izu, izhikubula kuson'a.
42004020 Awa akuwiluwa Hamaseki amawahi wowu akutiya izu, hiyakuchitambula hiyakuson'a, awa makumi asatu(30), awa makumi atanu najimu(60), awa nkulakaji(100).
42004021 Yesu hakuyila nintu," ilong'a ajiletang'a kulonja atisweka mwihebi hela muchalilu tahindi? hiyalonjaing'a kujisha hawimenku.
42004022 Mulong'a hikwekala chuma chakusweka nichimu, chakabula kwijika hatokaku.
42004023 Muntu mukweti matelu, akutiya atiyi!"
42004024 Hakuyila ninji," Babelenu yimukutiya, chesekelu chimukwesekela akwena jichi chakayesekelawu ninenu nawa ayishilaku nikuyishilku.
42004025 Mulon'a mukwetu, akamwinka yayijulu, wbla ninaka kasiyi naku, nenaka kakweteyi akamutambula."
42004026 Nehina wahosheli ninji," Wantu wa Nzambi wuji neji Muntu wukukuwa mbutu heseki.
42004027 Hakukama nawufuku ne kuzhika na mwana, ni mbutu hikubaluka ni kubula, yena kwiluka mazhina kuleli nehi.
42004028 Maseki ajisoneshelan'a awenawu: Kasambila mbali, kulonjelamu nyitu, kukuminaku hitiyiku  yayeni munyitu.
42004029 Ilan'a mbutu chizhikuha, hohenohu hakutwalamu chikwacha mulon'a chilaka chakwang'a chinashiki jehi."
42004030 Chen'i hakuhosha ninji," wantu wanzambi tukuwufwikija neyi chumanyi, inji hela tukuhushimuna nachishiminyi?
42004031 wuji neyi kambutu kanyanya, kamostandi kelng'a chakukatumbawu heseki hela kabajika kukeha hambutu zhamunu mwishina jezhima.
42004032 Chakukatumbawu, hikakula, hikokutona chakabajika yipata yakutuba yejima, hikakwila ninyatayi, yamaneni yakwila atuja  ahaluzwizu hiyakushakama muwulelu wayu."
42004033 Wayilezhilang'a Mazu nayishimu yayilulu yiji nei iyi, mwatwezheli kutiyilaw,
42004034 Hahosheli nawa chakaji chishimuku. Ilang'a chajingayi nkaweji wajing'a nakuyilumbulwila yuma yezhima kumbazhi.
42004035 Yena ifuku oju, chikuneli melela, hakuyila ninji," tuzambukenu kwishinaji.
42004036 "Hiya kushiya izaza ja Wantu, hiyakumutwala, tuhu muwantu. Wayili na Maantu amakwawu nawa.
42004037 Hikukwinza Mpepela yeneni nankashi, makanja hiyakusumpokela mu Wantu, Wantu hiwukuken'a nikwizala.
42004038 Yomweni wajingi kuntoni yakunyima, nakamitulu hamusawu. hiyakumuhiniwisha, nawa, eyi" kulun'an'a, hiwunakami hitukujilu mukaku?"
42004039 hakuhinjuka, hakuhoshola mpempela, hakumwila ijiya ninji, mwekaku," wunjaku! nzo_o!" nimpempela suji_i, kumwena nibe_te_te_e.
42004040 Hakuyila ninji," munatiyi woma wanka? kanja mukuhweli nihanu?" hiyakutiya woma nankashi,
42004041 hiyakujila Muntu namukwanju nawu," inji iju jine hinyi, mwaka amwovwaili nikuji mpempela nikuji Menzhi?"
42005001 Hiyakushika kwishinadi Jeliya, Mwitung'a jawa Gelaseni.
42005002 Chanafumuyi muwatu, Hohenohu, hiyakumubulkana kuji Muuntu wuji nakufuma mumalalu wukweeti Sipilitu wazonda.
42005003 Washakaminan'a ku Malalu. Antu ezhima amukan'anya Jehi ku Makasa, hela nelen'i kumutweesha nehi.
42005004 Muloon'a amukasa jehi kakavula nampoompa ni maleni. Maleni wayikotoleli kotu kotu, mpoompa wayibalwili balu balu. Hikwajin'i Muuntu wajin'a wajimu nan'ovu jakumufwomonaku.
42005005 Wajini nakubilela mafuku ejina mwakufuka nimwaana nikumalalu nikumapidi, nakujitapola namalola.
42005006 Chanamumoniyi Yesu kwakulehi, Yeena wanyile kuji yeena afukama nihi.
42005007 Hakubilela neza jan'ovu ninji," eyi Yesu, mwaanta wa Nzambi mukwakubajika, nikweeti nsan'winyi naneyi? Nakwili mwizhina ja Nzambi nami bayi wunkabishaku."
42005008 Mulon'a Yesu namwiili dehi ninji," Eyi Spilitu wazonda, fumaku mujiwu Muntu."
42005009 Hakumwihulu ninji, izhinz jeyi yeyinyi? " yeena ninji, izhina jami yami Mazaza, mulon'a tuji amavulu."
42005010 Hakumulembelela nankashi ninji, Bayi watulemuna neyi tufumi mwituun'aku.
42005011 Henohu Hambavu yampidi kwajini izanvu jawa Ngulu jajen'i nakuja,
42005012 Hiyakumulembelela nawu," tulemshi tuyi muji An'ulu, kulan'a twin'ilumu."
42005013 Hakuyiteja: Owu a Spilitu a zonja hiyakufuma, hiyakwin'ila muji an'alu, izanvu hijikwanduka, hijikukumukila nimivijiya, Chu_u, afwili mwijiya. Ajin'i kwiji neyi makombakaji ayedi(2,000).
42005014 Antu ayijishilaan'a hiyakutemuka hiyakuchishimununa mumukala nimumata, hiyakwinza nawu amoni chuma chaneluwu.
42005015 Hiyakushika kuji Yesu, kumuwana owuwaji wajin'i nandemoni, nashakami navwali chachiwahi, mu Meesu munamunji jehi; Yoyenowu wajin'i na Mazaza, wena atiya niwoma.
42005016 Antu achimweni hiyakuyileja chamwiliwu owa Muntu wajin'i na Ndemoni. Ninsan'u yawan'alu.
42005017 Hiyakutachika kumulembelela naw afumi Mwituun'a jawu.
42005018 Yesu chaken'eliya kwin'ila muwantu, yenowa wajin'a na Ndemoni hakumulembelela ninji chimu ninji.
42005019 Ilan'a yeena kumwiteja nehi, hakumwila ninji," yan'a kwitala jeyi kuji akwenu wuyileji yuma yanakwililiyi luwi."
42005020 Hakuya kwiindi hakutachika kushimuna ku Dekapoli yuma yanamwiliyi Yesu kutoha, Antu ejima hiyakuhayama.
42005021 Yesu chanazambukili chen'i kwishinaji muwantu, kwishinaji muwantu hikukumuhimpela, Izaza ja Wantu jajeni. Yena wajin'a kwakwihi nejiya.
42005022 Hikuwinza Nyuuli Sinagogi wumu ijina jinji jajilusa, chanamumoniyi Yesu, hakujinatola ku Nyendu yinji.
42005023 Hakumulembelela nankashi ninji," mwanami wamumbanda mwani wamunan'aki makaseyi kuloonda wumuuki, kuhanda nawumi."
42005024 Hakuya nindi, Izaza jawantu jajen'i hidikumulondela, hiji  kukunka kuunka.
42005025 Kwajin'i nimumbanda wumu wapwekelan'a Mashi nyaka ikumi nayiyeji(12).
42005026 Wamona jehi kukala kwakuvulu kuji ayimbuki amavulu namanishi jehi yuma yinji yelima to_o, kujitiya ku nihanti nehi yosweja nikusweja.
42005027 Chanatiyiyi nsan'u ya Yesu, hakwiinza mu nyima yinji mwizaza, hakukwanta kwihina jinji.
42005028 Mulon'a welili ninji " neyi nukukumina jakukunka kumahininji, nakukola." "
42005029 Hohenohu hapwekelan'a Mashi homa nichawu, hakutiya mumujimba winiji muson'u wunamufumi jehi."
42005030 Honenohu Yesu eluka nikwiluka chinafumini n'ovu muji yena hakushetumuka mwizaza ninji, nakunki kumahinami hinyi?
42005031 Atumbanji twiinji hiyakumwila nawu," wunamoni Izaza jiji."
42005032 Hakutala niniku amoni Muntu neli chumochu.
42005033 Ilan'a yena mumbanda, hakutiya woma nikuzala, neluki deyi chuma chanamwiliyi, hakwinza nakujinatu hamaseki ku Meesu inji, hakumuleja nsan'u yeyima.
42005034 Yesu hakumwila ninji," eyi mwanami,"kukuhwelela kweyi kunakukoleshi jehi. Yaanga nakuuwunda, muson'u weyi wukufumi,"
42005035 Iku wuchidi kukosha, Antu hiyakufuma kwitala yanyulu ya singogi nawu, mwaneyi wamumbanda nafwi jehi. wukumukabishi aji nawa nkulun'ama?"
42005036 Ilan'a Yesu chanatiyiyi muzhimbu anahoshuwu, hakumwila nyuuli ya Sinagogi ninji," bayi wutiya womaku.kumina jakuhwelela hohu."
42005037 Hetejeli Muntu kumulondeleku, chin'a apetulu, na yakoba, namanakwa Yakoba, ni Yowanu.
42005038 Hiyakushika kwitala janowu nyuuli ya Sinagogi hiyakulila nakutuumpa chacheni;
42005039 Chanen'iliyi mwitala, hakuyila ninji," muji nakuletelaji ipumba nikujila? mwaana hanafuku nakami tulu."
42005040 Hiyakumuseha yeen chanayijishiyi wejima yindi ninawa ajin'iyi nawa, hakwin'ala mwain'iyi owu mwaana.
42005041 Hakumukwata mwana kuchikasa, hakumwila ninji, nakwili nami, hinjukaku."
42005042 Honenohu owa mwana yohinjuka nikuhinjuka hakwenja( mulona wajin'a wanyaka ikumi nayiyeji)12. Wena ahayama nikuhama nankashi.
42005043 Hakuyileja nangovu, ninji mwinikenu yakujya.
42006001 Wafuminimu na kwinza mumukala winji, Atumbanzhi twinji amulondeleli.

42006002 Chelili Sabata yinashiki jehi, hakuyilezha mu Sinagogi. Antu amavulu amutiyili ni kuzang'alala. Ahosheli nawu, "inji iyi ntang'ishilu wayifumishili kujihi?" "awa mana amwinkeliwu amuchijinyi?" "inji welili yihayamishanyi namakasa inji?"
42006003 "iwu himukakusong'asong'a, mwana ka maliyaku hajiyi manakwa Yakobaku na Yosesi naYuda niShimonaku? Ahelinji hituji nawuku? Amweni muji yena chuma chakuyijimbwisha.
42006004 chalonjelelimu wahosheli ninji, "Kapolofwetu hiyamujiwulang'aku, kumujiwula ching'a mwilung'a jinji yomweni, nikuji antang'a jinji, nimwitala jinji.
42006005 Kwenoku wakang'enyi kwila mijimu yang'ovu, Wakuminini jakunang'ika makasanji haji antu antensha nikuyihanjisha.
42006006 Wahayamini chabuliluwu kukuhwelela. Hwnohu yesu hakuhitang'ana mumikala yakwenoku nakutang'isha.
42006007 Inkumininaku watambikili owu ikumi naayeji watachikilili kuyitemesha ayeji ayeji; hakuyinka wanta ha ji ma Sipilitu atama,
42006008 Hakuyilezha ninji bayi musenda yuma yakuya nachu munzhilaku, ching'a kwamukombu hohu-yakujya nehi, fukuta nehi, mashiling'i muchikwama nehi-
42006009 Ilang'a vwalenu nkwabilu; Bayi muvwala yikobelu yiyejiku.
42006010 Hakuyilezha ninji, "kwezhima kumukuya mwakashakama mwitala jimwakashikena, kufumahu ching'a himukunyamuka.
42006011 Mukala wuji wezhima wakabula kuyitambwila hela kuyitiyilila enu, chimukufumamu, mukajitotomoni lukung'u luji kumajatilu enu kulonda kutyikonkolola nichu".
42006012 Ejika ni kwijika hiyakushimuna nawu Balumukenu mumichima.
42006013 Hiyakufumisha anjemoni amavulu, muji antu amavulu ajing'i akata nakuyiwahisha manyi hiyakuyuka.

42006014 Mwanta Helodi hakutiya mpuhu, mulong'a ijina jinji jinelukewi jehi. Amakwawu hiyakuhsha nawu, "Yowanu nzhimiki nasang'uki jehi muji afu, jihu hanafumi kukong'a minjimu iyi yang'ovumuji yena".
42006015 Ilang'a amakwawu nawu, "jiyi Elizha". Amakwawu nawu hikaolofwetu,  "wuji neyi kapolofwetu wumu hampinji yawankakulula".
42006016 Ilang'a Helodi chatiyiliyi, "ninji Yowanu, inaketwili mutu, jiyi wunasang'uki jehi".
42006017 Mulong'a yomweni Helodi jiyi watemesheli antu nakumukwata Yowanu nakumunatila mukaleya nansang'u yaHelodiya (ng'oja manakwinji fwilipu), mulong'a wamusumbwili.
42006018 Mulong'a Yowanu wamwilili Helodi ninji, "kusumbula ng'oja manakweyi hichinateleliku".
42006019 Helodiya hakumushila nkunyi nakukeng'a kumuzhaha, ilang'a kutwesha nehi,

42006020 Mulong'a Helodi wamutiyili Yowanu woma; welukili ninji hiiyala walong'a wazhila, nawa akukumina jakumuhemba chachiwahi. chamutiyiliyi nakuzhinoka nankashi, hela chochu watiyili kuwaha hakumutiya.
42006021 ifuku jajiwahi chijashikili. Herodi hakwanuka nakuzang'alala kumesemuka chinji hakuteleka chawizha chakujisha ayilolu zhinji nawakulumpi amaneni amazhita nawantu alema amung'alaliya.

42006022 Mwana ka yomweni Helodiya wamumbanda cheng'ililiyi nakuhang'ana hakumutiyisha Helodi kuwaha hamu nanowu ashakaminiyi nawu nakujya. Mwanta hakumwila owu chang'ajima wamumbanda ninji, "Nlombi yuma yezhimayiwunakeng'i nukukwinka".
42006023 Hakumusanyikila ninji, "yuma yezhima yiwukulomba, nikukwinka, hela kukwanzang'enaku chikunku chawanta wami hakachi nakachi".
42006024 Hakwijika nakuya kuji mama yinji nakwihula ninji, "Chumanyi chinukulomba kuji yena?" Yena ninji, "lombaku neyi, nyinki mutu waYowanu nzhimiki"
42006025 Henohu yeng'ila nimuji mwanta lufuchi, Hakumulomba ninji, nakeng'i wunyiki mutu wa Yowanu nzhimiki hacheng'a.
42006026 Mwanta hakuneng'a nankashi, ilang'a ochu cheliliyi nasanyiki jehi nichamweniyi owu ashakamini nakujya, hamweni hakumukanishilaku.
42006027 Jichu mwanta atemesha nimushijika hakachi kamashijika amuhembeleng'a, hakumulezha ninji, yaku wuleti mutu wayowanu hacheng'a. mushijika wayili nakumuketula mutu winji muna mukaleya.
42006028 Hakuleta mutu winji hacheng'a nakumwinka ona chang'ajima wamumbanda, chang'ajima yeniwu hakumwinka mama yinji.
42006029 Atumbanzhi twinji chatiyiliwu ichi, ayili nakunona muzhimba winji, nikuwisha mwizhamu.
42006030 Apositolu hiyakupompa hamu naYesu hiyakumulezha yuma yezhima niyeliliwu nayajing'a nakutang'ishawu antu.

42006031 Yena hakuyila ninji, "twayenung'a enu aweni kwakankawenu kulonda munokeluku chanti". Mulong'a kwajing'i antu amavulu nankashi, awa anakwinza awa anakuya, awa hiyajing'i nampinji yakwila ajyiku.
42006032 Jichi hiyakufuma kwenoku muwatu nakuya kwilung'a jankakayawu.
