42006033 Ilang'a chayileng'awu antu ajing'a nakumona, amavuku elukili, hiyakufuma munyikala hiyakuyaku lufuchi hamaseki, hiyakushikang'ahu jehi henohu wena kanja.
42006034 Chanejikiwu muwatu, hakumona izaza jeneni hakuyitiyila wushona  mulong'a ajing'a neyi anyikoku akaji kabing'a. Hakutachika kuyilezha yuma yayivulu.
42006035 Chelili itang'wa hijikuya nakuteng'uluka, atumbazhi twinji  hiyakwiza  kuji yena nawu, ''munu mumpata itang'wa jahita jehi.
42006036 Yimwang'i antu ayi mumaha nimumikala yanyeng'umukaku akajilanjili yakujya yawu.
42006037 Ilang'a yena hakuyakula ninji, "Enu yinkenu yakujya". Wena hiyakwila nawu, "Tunayi nakulanja manknji amali nkulakazhi zhiyeji (200) twakayinki ajyi.
42006038 Hakuhosha ninji, "muji namankenji ang'ahi? Yenu mutali". Chanelukiwu, hiyakwila nawu, atanu ninshi zhiyeji.
42006039 Hakuyilezha ninji, antu ezhima ashakami hamatahu amunyemvu mumazamvu.
42006040 Hiyakushakama mamazamvu awantu kulakazhi ni mazamvu awantu makumi atanu.

42006041 Hakutambula owu mankenji atanu ninowu anshi ayeji, hakutala mwiwulu nakukiswila nikuhumona mankenji inkumininaku hakwinka atumbazhi twinji hohenohu antu onsu kanja. Wayanzangeneni nawa anshi ayeji ezhima wawu,
42006042 Wezhima wawu ajiili ekutili.
42006043 Hiyakumona mahebi, ikumi naayeji ambe-e ayizotu yamankenji, niinshi nawa.
42006044 Antu ajiili makenji ajing'i mayala makombakazhi atanu
42006045 Hohenohu hakukanjikizha atumbazhi twinji ninji eng'ili muwatu ayang'ahu jehi kwishinaji kubeteseda hajing'iyi wuchiji kuyila antu ninji ayi kwawu.
42006046 Cheliliyi najishaliki jehi nawu, hakufunaku hakuya haminji alombeleli.
42006047 Chikuneli melela, watu wuji mukachi kezhiya, yena wuji kankawinji mumpata

42006048 Chanamoniyi aji nakuyanja nakuvuwa, mulong'a mpepela yajing'i nakufuma kwayilang'awu. Yena hakuya kuji wena nakwenja hewulu jamenzhi . Chikuneli neyi hiwuchilu chaawufuku chamuchiwana hakwila neyi wukukeng'a kuyipanjakana.
42006049 Ilang'a wena chamimwenuwu nakwenja hewulu jamenzhi, hiyakutong'ozhoka neyi muzhimu hiyakukaloka,
42006050 Tiyenu kuwaha! yami! Bayi mutiya womaku!"
42006051 Hakukanjama nawu muwatu, mpepela yimwena nikumwena, Hiyakuhayama nankashi mumichima yawu.
42006052 Mulong'a abulili kwiluka mwayila nsang'u yamankenji, michima yawu yachinchikili.
42006053 Chiyanawukiwu, hiyakushika kwitung'a jaGenesaleta hiyakukunjika watu kuchikumu.
42006054 Chanafumiwu muwatu, hohenohu antu amwiluka nikumwiluka,
42006055 Hiyakuya lufuchi kumatamba wezhimowu, hiyakutachika kweleka akata hatujiji twawu hiyakuyitwala kwezhima kwamutiyiliwu nawu jiyi kujiyi.

42006056 Mwezhima mweng'ilileng'ayi mumikala, hela muzhimbaka, helatuhu mumatung'a, hiyakutenteka akata kuwulanjilu. Hiyakumulembela nawu akumini jakukunka hela mukunjulu wehina jinji, Antu amavulu amukwatili ezhima akoleli.
42007001 Afwalisewi nawaang'anjiki ezhili kufuma kuYelusalema hiyakumupompela.
42007002 Amweni atumbanzhi anji nakujya yakujya yakubula kwisuka kumakasa,
42007003 Afwalisewi nawa Yudeya ezhima kujya hakujya ching'a esuka kumakasa awu, mulong'a kuhemba chimemwa chawakulumpi.
42007004 Afwalisewi afumini kuchisankanu , kujya ching'a ajiwesha awenawu, akuwela muzhima zhikwawu zhazhivulu zhatambuli zhavwang'a neyi kukosa nkomeki, mba. (yimbwempu yaneng'a yakujila).
42007005 Afwalisewi nawaang'ajiki, hiyakumwihula yesu nawu atumbanzhi tweyi alekelang'aji kwenjela mwaya chisemwa chawakulumpi ajang'a yakujya yawu namazhilu kumakasa?
42007006 Wayilezheli ninji, kapolofwetu Isaya aji afukezhi neyi  Komana chazhifukulang'awu kujami, nikujifukula kwamukunkulwalayi chatang'ishawu hinyishaila yawantu hohu.
42007007 Komana chajifukulang'awu kujami, hikujifukula kwamukunkulwayi chatang'ishawu  hinyishila yawantu hohu.
42007008 Mwanjiwiliwu zhinshimbi zhaNzambi nakuhemba chisemwa chawantu.
42007009 Hakuyila ninji, "chalala mwenja muleka Nshimbi yaNzambi, ilang'a mwahemba chisemwa.
42007010 Hakwila Mosi ninji, "Lemeshenuku taata ni maama yeyi, wukuhosha yuma yatama hiji tata na mama yinji wukufuma hohu.
42007011 Neyi muntu wukumwila tata yinji hela mama yinji ninji, "ichi chajing'a chakukwashaku nachu chinekali jehi korabani" (chinahoshi nawu chawana),
42007012 Ilang'a enu mukumwitezha kwila chiji chezhima kuji tata yinji hela mama yinjiku.
42007013 Mwenja kupeka Izu jaNzambi na chisemwa chenu chimunatang'ishi kuji antu nayuma yajifwana yimwelang'a
42007014 Watambikili izaza jawantu, tiyililenu kujami, wezhima wenu, mulong'a mutiyishishi.
42007015 Kosi chuma chafumang'a hanzhi yamuntu chineli muji yena chikufuma mukachi kamutu jichu chamutemeshang'a yena.
42007017 Yesu chafuminiyi nezaza jawantu, weng'ilili mwitila, taumbanzhi twinji hiyakumwihula yishimu.
42007018 Yesu wahosheli ninji, ninenu nawa mwachitiyisha wanyi? muneluki nawu yuma yikwikwing'ila miji muntu hanzhi yinelang'a muntu. hiyatweshang'a kumutamishaku.
42007019 Mulong'a yeng'ilang'a mumuchimaku, yeng'ilang'a  mwivumu nakwijikila musalanyi. nanaichi chinahoshiwu Yesu watokesheli yakuja Yonsu.
42007020 Welili ninji chuma chikufuma muji muntu jichu chatamishang'a yena.
42007021 Mulong'a mukachi mumuchima wamuntu, mwafwung'a yiyong'ozhoka yatama.
42007022 Wuzhila nilwisu, niwukombi, wuvumbi, namakasu nikwila yatama, nijisu jatama, nikutukana, nikujinka wanta niwusupi.
42007023 Yuma yatama yafumang'a mukachi jiyi yatamishang'a muntu.
42007024 Hakunyamuka kwenoku, hiyakuya Tayile naSidomi, hakwing'ila mwitala jimu. Hakeng'eli muntu hela wumu kulukaku, ilang'a wateleli kuswamaku.
42007025 Hohenohu wamumbanda wumu wajing'a namwaninji wamumbanda wanyanya wajing'a naSipilitu yazonda watiyili kujiana enzhili nakuholekela kunyenju yinji.
42007026 Wamumbanda wajing'i kaGriki, wakumunza wakuSirofwenisa. hakumulembelela ninji, afumishi njemoni muji mwaninji wamumbanda.
42007027 Hakumwila mumbanda ninji, sambilenu kujisha anyana anyanya yukujya hichinawahi kunona mankenji awanyana nakunatila atuwaku.
42007028 Mumbanda wakwili nakuhosha ninji, Yesu, mwanta hela atuwa mwishina jamesa ajang'a nkuuku yawanyana.
42007029 Yena hakumwila mumbanda ninji, ochu chiwunahoshi ochu yang'a kweyi. Yang'a kweyi wunakasuluki. Njemoni nafumi hehi muji eyi.
42007030 Ona mumbanda wafuntili kwitala jinji hakuwana mwaninji nakami hakajiji, njemoni nafumi jehi muji yena.
42007031 Hakufuma cheng'i kung'iza ya Tila, hakuya kuSidoni kukalung'alwizhi yaNg'alaliyakung'iza yaDekopolisa.
42007032 Amuleteli muntu wazhika matelu wakabakana munhoshelu, hiyakumulembelela nawu yamunang'iki makasa inji.
42007033 Amusenjeli kumbanji kwabulili izaza, washili makasa mumatelu inji, wamuwahishili nakumukwata hejimi.
42007034 Henohu watalili mwiwulu hakumuhameka hakuhosha ninji, "Efwata" chaya mukwila nawu "kwenzunuka".
42007035 Hohenohu matelu inji ashinkukili nikalika kinji kaketukili atachika nikuhosha chalumbuluka.
42007036 Yesu hakuyilezha nang'ovu ninji, bayi wulezha muntuku, ilang'a chaswezheleyi kuyilezha nang'ovu, wena aswezha nikuchishimuna.
42007037 Hiyakuswezha kuhayama, nakuhosha, "neli yumaya yezhima yiwahi hohu. Hela wazhika matu nakutiya hela kamama nakuhosha
42008001 Munowu mafuku, kwajingi izaza jeneni, hi yana jingi naa kuja ku. Yesu yotambika ni atumbazhi twinji nakuilezha,
42008002 "Ni nji natiyi izaza mulonga ji twaleki kushaka na nam nafuku asatu na zhala.
42008003 Neyi niku yi tuma Ezhima ku uyi kala au chaka ji ya kuja, kuhwijila muzhila. Amakwa u ana fumi kwa kulehi."
42008004 Yotu mbazh twinji tumwakula ninji, "Tutumbi kuwa na kuji makena amunu mwiluna da chikalampata konda kuikuchisha awantu?"
42008005 Yoyi hula, "mukwei makendi zhinah?" yihosha, "Ninji, tukweti zhitanu na zhiyeji.''
42008006 Welezheli izaza kushama hamaseki. Yonona makend izhi tanu na zhi yeji, yoisakilila, aitebola, yoyi nka atumbazhi kuyinca. Niwena Yitwalila izaza.
42008007 Anjingi chengi na tushi twanti, chengi yoyi sakilila aleza atumbazhi inkenu ni zhenizhi.
42008008 Yajili yi, hiyikunona ibalu ya shalilihu yimpaya zhitanu na zhiyesi.
42008009 Ajinhi awana mako mbakazhi awantu, Hakulezha ajiyili kwau.
42008010 Hohenuhu yokandama muwatu hamu ni atumbazhi twinji hi yakuya kumutumba wa dalamanuta.
42008011 Ni afauseo yejikili hazi hi yakumutadikisha. Hi yakumutonggo zhokela chinjikizhilu chamwiulu kulonda kumweseka nachu.
42008012 Hakujishimuna nakashi musipilitu inji ha ku osha, "Chumanyi ni kuilezha kosi chinjikizhiluka kunichi chisaka.
42008013 "Nawa wayishili, yokanama muwatu chingi wayishili yoya kwishinaji.
42008014 Kachawichi avulameni kusenda makenji hiyajingi namakenji kubanjika hayimu muwatuka.
42008015 Hakuilezha, nakuosha, "Babalenu na nyi lungi yawa Faliseo na nyi lungi ya Heloda."
42008016 Atumbazhi ajina nakujitajika umu namakwa u hakubula kwikala na jikendi.
42008017 Chelukiluich, wayihwili, niji mwe nda mujihozhola zha chimuna buli makenji? ni hanu kanda muchiluki muji na nyichima ya chichika?
42008018 Mukweti mensu, himwamonaku mukweti matelu, hi mwatelelangaku himwanukanaku?
42008019 China chana balwili atanu makondi mukachi ka wa tanu makombakazhi, mwanoneli yimpaya ingahi ye zala yayi balu yamakendi yimwanoneli?" amwakwili ninji,'' ikumi na ayenji.
42008020 "Chinabalwili atanu naayedi makendi mukachi kawa mako mbakazhi awana, ajingi impaya ingahi yama kondi yi mwanoneli?" hiyi kumwakula, ninji "itanu nazhiyeji!
42008021 Hakuyila ninji nihanu kanda mwiluki?"
42008022 Hiyakwizha ku Beteseda antu aleteli akuna iyala amputa mensu na kulemba kulonda Yesu amukuamukunki.
42008023 Yesu hakukwata ona iyala hachikasa nakumutwa minina kumufumisha mumukala. Yofwizhila mazeni hamengu hakwolola chikasa, "Yomwihula, wunanon chumany?''
42008024 Wambandukili mwiulo naku hosha, ''Namoni antu anakwenda neyi nyitondu.''
42008025 Dichi chenggi ha kololo chikasa na kumukunka ha mensu, ni yala wezhwinini mensu, mensu injashakamini chi wahi, cheng wamwen chachi wahi.
42008026 Yesu wamutumini kuya kumukala winji kwingila mu nyikala yaku keseleya fwilipi. Muzhila wa yi hwili atumbazha, Antu antenanga nawu yami nyi?''
42008027 Yesu hakufumaku nawa tumbazh twinji kwingila mu nyikala keselenya fwilipi. Muzhila wa yi hwili atumbazhi, antu antenanga nawu yami nyi?''
42008028 Hiya kumulezha ninji, yowanu zhimiki amakwawu nawu yeyi elija na amakwawu ninji yeyi umu muji atupolofwetu.
42008029 Hakuyihula ninji, inji enu aweni mwatenanga yami inyi?'' detulu ninji, yeyi Kilishitu.''
42008030 Hakulezha nangovu ninji bayi lezha kuji antuku.

42008031 Ha kutachika kuyi tangisha ninji mwana kamuntu chinga akakaba yuma yayivulu akamuleka kuji akulumpi, nikuji akulumpi zhawatu pilishitu nikuji asoneki, ilanga akamuzhaha chimwakahi ta mafuku asatu wa kasanguka muji afu.
42008032 Wahosheli kulezha hatoka. petulu wa musendeli hambanji hakutachika kulezha nanggovu.
42008033 "jinu Yesu washetumukili hakutala atumbazhi twinji haku muhoshola petulu ninji, Eyi satana hitaku kunyima yami, eyi hi washa itongozho ka kuyuma ya nzambuku ilanga shanga kuyu ma yawantu,''
42008034 Jichi watambikili izaza ni atumbazhi twinji hamu, na kuilezha ha kuila ninji muntu ukukensa kunlondami ajibonji, anyamuni mutondu waku sempakesha inji anlondelenga.
42008035 Mulonga muntu wukukenga kuhemba umi winji uku uzhimbesha hakwila muntu zhimbesha mumi winji hamuzhimba wamami nihansangu yayi wahi wakauhemba.
42008036 Mulonga muntu neyi wukuheta mpata yamunu mwishina yezhima azhimbeshelamu umi wini wa kajila mwoji.
42008037 Chumanyi chakahimpayi nachu muntu muwumiwinji?
42008038 Yo wenowu muntu ukutiyilami ni mazu ami nsonyi chisa ka chauvumbi ni shiji mwana kamuntu niyena wa kamutiyila nsonyi hakenzayi mulubanji lwakulema kwatata yinji na wangela Azhila.
42009001 Wa hosheli kuji wena," chachen'i nakuhosha kuji eyi, amu anemani kuna  hiyakafwaku ching'a anamoni Wanta w Nzambi wunenzi jehi na ng'ovu."
42009002 kuhita Mafuku atanu na jimu, Yesu hakutwala Petulu na Yakoba na Yowanu hakuyikandamisha ha Mutumba wawulehi kwakankawawa. Hiyakumumona na abalumuki mwacheng'i ku mesu awa.
42009003 Mahinanji hiyakukekma, hiyakubajika kutoma, munu mukayi himuji mukwatu tokesha mahina ni wumu natweshi kuyi tokesha chochochuku.
42009004 Elizha na Mosi hiyakujimwekesha ku Mesu awu, hiyakushimwitila na Yesu.
42009005 Petulu akumwasuka Yesu ninji, eyi" nkulung'ang'a," chinateli chituji kunu, tutungi yisolu yisatu, chimu cheyi, chimu cha Mosi, chimu cha Elizha."
42009006 ( Helukili ni mwakutwalaku, mulong'a aswejeli kukwatisha woma nankasji.)
42009007 Ivu hijikwinza nakuyizeng'a mena. mwivu himukufuma izu," iwu jiyi mwanami nasweza ku keng'a, mutelelenu."
42009008 Hohenohu, chanambazumukuwu, atalajala, hiyawenuhu muntuku. chinga Yesu kakawinji hohu.
42009009 Chajingi'wu nakukukumuka ha Mutumba, hakuhikaji  kizha wosu wawunakuyilezha niji bayi mwakahoshi kuji Muntu yuma yimunamoni kuching'a mwana ka  Muntu nasanyuki jehi muji afu.
42009010 Aswekeli mazu owu munyichima yawu awenu, hiyakuji huzhola mukachi kawunawu," kuhinduka muji afu" chaya mukwila nawuji?
42009011 Amwihwili nawa," ansoneki helang'ajinawa Elizha atendeki kwinza?
42009012 wayihwili ninji," Elizha chacheni wakasambila kwinza nakutung'ulula yuma yonsu. Iji mwana ka Muntu anamusonekeliji nawu ching'a yokamba mu yuma yayivulu, aka mujiwuli.
42009013 Ilang'a ami nukuyilezha nami Elizha wenza jehi, ana mukong'i monsumwezhima mwakeng'awu, neyi momwa mwanamu kwanji kawu.
42009014 Chezhiliwa kuji atumbazhi, hiyaku tala kunayinwe muki izaza deleni, niang'ajika aji nakuhihozhola.
42009015 Hehonohu Antu onsu chanamumoniwu Yesu, hiyakuyama nankashi nawa hiyakuya kuji yena lufuchi na kumwimusha.
42009016 Wajing'a nakuhihula atumbazhi twinji," muji nakuhihuzhola enu a wena yumanyi?
42009017 Wumu wahamukaka wa Wantu wumu," hakumwakula niji," mwalimu naleti mwanami kuwuli eyi. Wuji na Splitu yakumbula kuhosha.
42009018 Konsu kwamutwalang'ayi wamunatolan'g'a kwaha Maseki, hakwijisha kwa kafulolu mukanwa, hakujisumona kumaji keletikeleti, hakoloka su_u. Nalezha atumbaji tweyi nami amufumishi ilang'anya."
42009019 Yoyakula nikuyakula onsu wawu niji," enuwa along'a mwambula kukuhwela, nukwikala newuwa myaka ying'ahi? muletelenu kunu kujami."
42009020 Hiyakumuleta owu mukwezi kuji yena. Owu spilitu chanamoniyi Yesu, hohenohu owu sipilitu hakumukonwesha nankashi. owu mukwezi yonjinata ni hamaseki yotachika nikulwisha ni kafulolu mukanwa.
42009021 Yesu hakumwiula Tata yiji niji," munahiti jehi nyaka ying'ahi hakwila ekali chenichi?" Tata yiji hakumwkula Yesu niji," kufumisha kuwasi wiji.
42009022 Mapampa kakavulu washikang'a nakumunata ni mukesi hela mumezhi kulonda kumukisang'ana. Neyi eyi wukutwesha kwilhu chuma, tutiyili wushona kutukwasha."
42009023 Yesu hakwakula niji,"komana wukutwesha'? yuma yonsu wukutwesha neyi Muntu onsu wkukuhwelela."
42009024 Hohenohu Tata yanowa isongwalume hakutambka ninji," enga nakuhweleli! nkwashiku ami chinakanganyi kukuhwelela?

42009025 Yesu chanamoniyi izaza ya Wantu hiji kupompa na kwinza lufuchi, hakumutukola owu Sipilitu watama nakumulezha niji," Eyi Sipilitu watama nakumulezha niji yawuchizhika Matwi, hakumukajikizha niji, fukaku muji iwu insongwalume, nawa baji wakengili muji ena nawa chengiku."
42009026 Chanakalukili jehi nakumutunyisha 0wa isong'walume hakufuma muji yena. owa isong'walume hakukalumuka neyi fumu wafwa jehi, ni yatu amavulu yohosha nawu," nafwi jehi,"
42009027 ilan'a Yesu yomukwata kumakasa iji yomunyamuna, nakumunyamuna yonya mu kani kunyamuka.
42009028 Chanengiliyi Yesu mwitala, atumbaji twiji yotachika nikumwihula kumbaji," nawa iji etu tunakang'enyinji kumufumisha"?
42009029 Hakuyilezha onsu wawu niji," wuji neyi lwu hatweshang'a kufumishe wa chakumbula kulomba na kuleka kujaku."
42009030 Afuma nikwenoku hiyakuhita niku ngalaliya. Hakengeli Muntu hela wumu kwiluka kujiwu wanyi,

42009031 Mulong'a yena wajing'i nakutangisha atumbaji twinji. Wayilezheki niji," mwana wa Nzambi weyala wuji nakumuhana kumakasa a wantu,cheng'i nawa akamuzhahi. nawa neyi anamuzhahi.Nawa nehi anamuzhahi jeji mwakahita mafuku asatu wakahiduka cheng'i."
42009032 Wena hiyachilukiliku munayi owu mazu, nawa atiyili ni woma wayikwatili wakumwihula cheng'i nawa.
42009033 Cheng'i nawa ezhili ku Kapelanamu. Chaneng'iliyi mwitala wayihwili onsu wawa ninji, " yum manyi mwahajikang'a mu Mukwakwa?"
42009034 Onsu wawu hiyakumwena kulu_u. Mulong'a ading'i nakuditandikisha Muntu na mukwawu mu Mukwakwa nawu hinyi wabanjika mukwawu.

42009035 Yashakama ni kushakama, yatambika ni ikumi nayeji(12) hamu yotacika niku hosha kuji onsu wawu," niye Muntu nakukeng'a kwikala wa kusambila, ching'a yokala wakukumininaku haji akwawu onsu na kwikala Iga'amba yawakwawu onsu."
42009036 Yoshakama ni mwana munyanya yomush ni mukachi kawu. Yomunyamuna nina Makasiji yotachika niku hoha kuji onsu wawu ninji,awaonsu wukutambwila yeniwa mwana munyanya mwizhina jami;
42009037 Wonsu natambwili yami kutambwili owu watemesheli."
42009038 Yowanu wahosheli kuji yena ninji," eyi mwalimu, tunawani Muntu wuji nakuhang'a Ademoni mwizhina jenu ytu nawa twamulekesha, mulong'a hendang'a nanetu nawaku."
42009039 Ilang'a Yesu yohosha ninji," bayi mumukekeshaku, mulong'a kosi watela kulong'a nyijimu ya ng'ovu mwizhina jami hanuma yachu yotachika kuhosha zhatama haji ami.
42009040 Wonsu Muntu wukumbula ntanji nanetuwa jiyi wetutu.
42009041 Wonsu wukuyika Nkomoki ya Menji na kunwa mwizhina jami nanochu chimuji a Kilisitu, chalong'a nakuyilezha nami, hakmbula kutambula wufwetuku.
42009042 Wonsu wukuletesha kujimbwisha mwana wanyanya muling'a wakuhwelela muji ami chinateli kumukasila ilolwa kushing'u yiji nakumunatila mu Kaling'alwiji.
42009043 Neyi chikasa cheyi chakuletelang'a kukala,chiketuluku. Chunateli eyi kwing'ila mu Wantu wa Nzambi wuchifwayi kubanjika kwing'ila na Makasa  ayeji mu kalang'a, mukesi kakambulang'a kuzhima.
42009044 Omu muji nyizambu yawu yambulang'a kufwa, ni kesi hikazhinang'a moku.
42009045 Neyi mwenju weyi wa  kuletelang'a  kukala, wuketuluku. Chinateli eyi kwing'ila mu Wantu wa Nzambi wuchifwayi kubanjika kwing'ila mukalung'a nanyenji yeyi yiyeji.
42009046 Owu muji nyizambu yawa yambulang'a kufwa, ni kesi hikazhimang'a moku.
42009047 Neyi jisu jeji jakuletelang'a kujitutula jitambulimu. Chimateli eyi kwingila mu Wantu wa ntambi na jisu jimu kubanjika kukuntila mu kalung'a na mesu eyi ayeyi.
42009048 Mwenemu omu muji nyizambu yawu ya mbulang'a kufwa, ni kesi hikazhimang'a moku.
42009049 Mulong'a Antu onsu akayikwita mung'wa wa kesi.
42009050 Mung;wa wawukwahi, ilanga neyi mung'wa wukumbatuka, mukuwitowesha naka_a? nkalenu na mung'wa mujenu shakamenu nakuwunda wumuana mukwawu.
42010001 Yesu wanyamukili nakuya mwitung'a ja Yudeya nimwishinaji ja Yodana, mazaza awantu hiyakumuomela cheng'i. hakuyitang'isha cheng'i neyi ochu chelileng'ayi.
42010002 Afwalisewu hiyakwinza kuji yena, nakumwihula mazu akumweseka nawu, "chalong'a iyala kuseng'a ing'ojiji tahinji?"
42010003 Yena hakuyakula ninji, inji Mosi wayilezheli ninjinji?
42010004 Wena nawa, "Mosi watejeli kusoneka mukanja wakusong'a nachu hikumuseng'a mumbanda".
42010005 Yesu hakuyila ninji, chayilezheliyi chimuchi chafumini hakuchinchinka kwanyima yenu".
42010006 Kwinza kufuma kutachi kwaleng'eliwu yuma Nzambi wayileng'eli iyala nimumbanda.
42010007 Jichi iyala ashiyi tata yinji ni mama yinji, akekali ng'ojinji?
42010008 Niwena ayeji akekala wumu, hiyaji cheng'i ayejiku, aji wumu.
42010009 Nichiyanabombiwu kuji Nzamba , bayi ayambula kuji muntuku.
42010010 Atumbazhi hiyakumwihula nsang'u iyi mwitala.
42010011 Hakuyila ninji, "yowu wukuseng'a ng'ojinji hakusumbula wacheng'i namwili ng'ojinji nakusumbula mubanda mukwawu neli wuvumbi.
42010012 Mumbanda wukuseng'a mfumwinji hasumbuka kuji nawawacheng'i , neli jehi wuvumbi.
42010013 Amuleteli anyana anyanya kulonda ayinang'iki makasa, ilang'a atumbazhi hiyakuyihoshela.
42010014 Yesu chanichimoniyi, hakutiya kutmama nankashi, hakuyila ninji, itezhenu anyana anyanya kwinza kujami, bayi muyilekeshaku, mulong'a wanta waNzambi wawena aji chochichi.
42010015 Chalala nukuyilezha nami, muntu wukubula kutambula wanta waNzambi neyi mwana wanyanya hakwing'ila nihantiku.
42010016 Hakuyakata nakuyinang'ika makasa nukuyikiswila nkisu.
42010017 Cheliliyi ninji aholokeli munzhila, iyala hakwinza kuji yena lufuchi, hakumufukamina nikumwihula ninji, "eyi mwalimu muwahi, nukwila ng'ahi kulonda nakaswani wanta wahaya nyaka?"
42010018 Yesu hakuhosha ninji, mulong'a wankahi mwantambikilang'a nenu muwahi? hikwekala muwahiku ching'a Nzambi hohu.

42010019 Nshimbi  wazhiluka jeji nawu; kuzhaha muntu chinzhila, kwila wuvumbi chinzhila, kwiya chinzhila, kushimuna wunsahu wakutwamba chinzhila. Kujila mukwenu ya wukombi chinzhila  lemeshaku tata yeyi nimama yeyi".
42010020 Yena hakuhosha ninji, "mwalimu, yuma yezhima nayihemba jeyi kufuma kuwukwenzi wami".
42010021 Yesu hakumushinshika, hakumukeng'a hakumwila ninji, "Kunashali chuma chimu hohu yang'a wukalanjishi yuma yeyi yezhima winki atuzweng'i, eyi wakaheta maheta mwiwulu.
42010022 Ilang'a yena hakujihomba kumensu oju, hakujiyila kwinji, nakuneng'a mulong'a wajing'a muntu waheta maheta amavulu nankashi.
42010023 Yesu hakutalatala nikuhosha nawatumbanzhi twinji, ochichakala, asamaheta kwing'ila muwanta waNzambi".
42010024 Atumbanzhi hiyakujihayamina nankashi mazu inji. Ilang'a yesu hakuyila cheng'i ninji, "Nyanami, ochichakala akwamaheta kwing'ila muwanta wanzambi!
42010025 Chaswahi ngameli kwing'ila mujinsu jandong'u kabajika kwing'ila muwanta waNzambi.
42010026 Wena hiyakuswezha kuhayama nankashi nawu, inji jinu "wukutwesha kwamina
42010027 hinyi?" Yesu hakuyitala ninji, "chakukang'anya muntu, Nzambi wukutwesha. Mulong'a yuma yezhima yinatwesheki kuji Nzambi.
42010028 Petulu hakutachika kumwila ninji, "tala, etu tunashiyi yuma yejima tunakulonji eyi".
42010029 Yesu ninji, "Nukuyilalezha chalala nami, hikuji muntu nashiyi itala hela anakwinji, hela ahelajiji hela mama yinji, hela tata yinji, hela anyana hela maha kukola ami ninsang'u yayiwahi.
42010030 Wukubula kutambwila nkulakazhi (100) mumakonu nimatala nianakwinji, niahelazhinji, niamama, nianyana, naimaha, kubombelaku nikuyikabisha, hanyaka yakenzaku wumi wahaya nyaka.
42010031 Ilang'a amavulu akusambila akekala akukuminina, niakakuminina akekala akusambila.

42010032 Ajing'ileng'a munzhila yakukanjuka kuYelusalema Yesu hakutwaminina kumbiji. Hiyakuhayama , ning'ovu alonjeleleng'a munyima hiyakutiya woma. Hakupompesha cheng'i owu ikumi na ayeji(12) nakutachika kuyilezha yuma yakamonayi.
42010033 Talenu hitukukanjuka kuYelusalema, mwana kamuntu akamumbila kuji akulumpi jawatupilisitu nikuji ang'anjiki. Akamufwishi nanyilong'a kulonda yafwi. Akamulubula kuji azhentili.
42010034 Akamusutola, akamufwizhila mazeng'i, akamuvupola Amuzhaha. Chimwaka hita mafuku asatu wakasang'uka muji afu.
42010035 Yakoba na Yowanu, anyana kaZebedewu, hiyakuswila kwakwihi nayena hiyakuhosha nawu mwalimu, tunakeng'i atwililuku chuma chezhimachitukukulombang'a eyi.
42010036 Yena hakuyila ninji, "munakeng'i niyilili chumanyi?"
42010037 Wena hayakuhosha nawu, "twitezhi twakashakami mukumbanji lwakulema kweyi, iwu kuchikasa cheyi chachijilu, iwu kuchikasa cheyi chachimunswa".
42010038 Yesu hakuyila ninji, chuma chimunalombi hamu hinachilukiku. Enu mutweshi kunwa mulupasa lunukunwami. Mukutwesha kuzhimikewa nachizhimikila chakuzhimikilawu nachu ami?
42010039 Wena hiyakumwila nawu, tukutwesha. Yesu hakuyila ninji, lupasa lunukunwa mwakanwamu nichinjikizhilu chakajimikawu nachi ami, ninenu nawa akyizhimika nachu.
42010040 Hakwila kushakama kuchisaka chami chachijilu hela chikasa chachimunswa hichuma chami mwaka nichitezhiku , chambala chanawa along'eshelawu jehi.
42010041 Ninawa ikumi chanachitiyiwu, hiyakutiya kutama nankashi na Yowanu Yowanu niYakoba.
42010042 Yesu hayikuyitambika hakuyihoshela ninji, "mweluka jehi, anyanta zhawa zhentili chayiyulang'awu, niantu awu alema chekalang'awu nawanta haji wena.
42010043 Ilang'a hadichi chatelela kudenuku, ilang'a anakeng'i kwikala mukulumpi hajenu ching'a yekali mukakukakela akwawu,
42010044 Owu wukukeng'a kwikala mukachi ching'a yekali injung'u yawakwawwu.
42010045 Mulong'a chalala chenzhili mwana kamuntu, halong'eli ninji akamukalakeluku, ninji yakakalakeli akwawu, akalambuli wumi winji wakukula nachu antu amavulu".
42010046 Hiyakwinza kuYeliko, chajing'a nakufumayi muyeliko nawa tumbanzhi twinji nizaza jeneni, mwana kaTimewu Balatimewu, mputamesu, mukwakulomba yamukunkulu waji ng'a washakama kunsa yanzhila.
42010047 Chanatiyiyi nawu, jiyu Yesu wakuNazaleta, hakutachika kubilela ninji, "eyi Yesu mwana kaDavidi intiyilili luwi.
42010048 Antu amavulu, hiyakumuhoshola nawu, mwenaku ilang'a yena hakuswezha kubilela nankanshi, ninji, Eyi mwana kadavidi ntiyili luwi!"
42010049 Yesu yomana kuka, ninji mutambikenu, hiyakumutambika owu mputa mensu, hayakumwila nawu, Kolaku! nyemukaku! anakukutambika.
42010050 Yena hakunata chikowelu chinji, yotakumuka nikutakumuka yonza kuji Yesu.
42010051 Yesu yamwihula ninji, "Wunakeng'i nikwililiji?" mputamensu ninji, Raboni, nakeng'i nimoni"
42010052 Yesu yomwila ninji, yang'a chikuhwelelu cheyi chinakuhanjishi jehi. Hohenohu yamona nikumona yomulonjela nimunzhila.
42011001 Ochu chezhiliwu ku Yelusalema, ajing'i kwakamwihi nakushika ku Betefwena na betefwanji hapinji ya oliveta, wutumi atambanzhi twinji,
42011002 hakuyila ninj," yenu kumukala  wanajitalishi nanetu. Ochu chimukeng'ila hohenohu mwaamba kawana chimbulu ochu chambulahu dehi kukandamahu, wukachikasululi nakuchileta kujami.
42011003 Neyi wujiwezhima wukakuhoshela ninji, mulong'aji,' Nzambi yomwehi nakuchikeng'a tukachifucisha cheng'i katataka hohenahahu.
42011004 Ezhima wawu apalen'eni nakuwana chimbulu chakukasa ha Chinsu hanzhi muzhila kachi, hiyakumukasulula.
42011005 Antu amakwawu ajinga emena kwena kuna hiyakuyihoshela nuwa," munakwilaji, hakukasulula ochu chimbulu?"
42011006 Ahosheli nawena kwesekezha na mwanta Yesu chayilezheliyi, mukayileki Antu akajiyili iwu namwiji iwu namwiji.
42011007 Aleteli chimbulu kuji mwanta Yesu hiyakwala mahina haji yena, mwanta Yesu hakushakamahu.
42011008 Antu amavulu hiyakwala mahina awuhazhila, amakwawu hiyakukotola nyitayi muwuji mi, hiyakwala muzhila.
42011009 Ninawa atwaminini kumbiji ninawa alondeleli munyima hiyakubilela nawu," kisu kisu! wakoleka Muntu wezanga mwizhima ja mwata wetu.
42011010 Kisu kisu wanta wukwinza owu watata yetu Davida! kisu kisu mwiwulu  jakubajika!"
42011011 Cheng'ililiyi mu Yelusalema ni mutembeli hakutala hayum yezhima. Chamanini ipinji wayili ku Betani nekumi na tuyeji.
42011012 Chikunachi helili anafumi dehi ku Betani, hakutiya Nzala.

42011013 Hakumona Mutonju wachikuyu kwakulehi wukweti Mafu, hakuya nakutala neyi nateli kuwanaku mukabu wuji wazhima, chashikiliyi mukamwihi, wawanini kwamafu hohu. Mulong'a hihajing'i hichilaka chayikuyuka.
42011014 Hakuhosha mu Mutondu ninji," kosi Muntu hela wuwu wakajahu mukala weyi wudi wezhima," niatumbazhi twindi atiyili.

42011015 Chezhiliwu ku Yelusalema, hakwing'ila matembeli hakufumisha Antu ezhima akakulanja  niku lanjulula mu tembeli. Hakuhimona ni zhimesa zhawakwakuhipa Mali ni nimatanda anawa alandishileng'a  Tupompa.
42011016 Wetezheli Muntu hela wumuku kusenja hela chuma hela chimuku mu tembeli oyu yatela kuladishewa.
42011017 Yochilezha noyilezha ninji," chazhikawa wangi, ' itala  jami jakatambikewa Itala damalombelu ku nyinza yezhima'? ilang'a munadikalumuni kwikala itala jawamakombi"
42011018 Akulumpi zhawatupulisitu ni ang'anjiki chachitiyiluwu ochu chahosheliwu, nikumutalila hahalehi mulong'a woma mulong'a we zaaza dezhima datiyili kuwaha hakutang'isha kwinji.
42011019 Chashikili wufuku, afumini mumusumba wuna.
42011020 Chajing'iwu nakwenda natetemena, hiyakumona owu mutondu wachikuyu wunomi jehi chawu kufimisha kunyizhi.
42011021 Petulu hakwanuka nakumwila nindi," eyi Rabi, tala! mutontu wchikuyu  wuwashing' wunomi dehi chawu."
42011022 Yesu hakuyakula ninji," mukuhwelelnu Nzambi.

42011023 Nukuyilezha chalala nami neyi Muntu wukwila iyi mpiji ninji,' nyemukaku wulumbili mwizhiya,' neyi wukuzhinoka wanyi mu Muchima winji ilang'a  wukukuhwelela zhahosheliyi ninji zhikelika, Nzambi diyizhakelayi.
42011024 Dichu nikuyilezha nami: Yuma yezhima yimukulomba nikuleng'a, kuhwelelnu nenu munayitambwili jehi nawa cheng'i yikekala yenu.
42011025 Neyi chimukwimanang'a nakulomba mafuku ezhima, anakenenu ezhima ayiluwang'esha, mulong'a Nzambi yenu wekala mwiwulu niyena atli kuyanakena zhishindi  zhenu."
42011027 Hiyakwinza cheng'i ku Yelusalema. Chajing'a nakwendayi mwanta yesu mu tembeli, akulumpi jawatupulisitu, Niansoneki niakulumpi hiyakwinza kudi yena.
42011028 Hiyakumwiula nawu," indi ing'ovwinyi yiwazatishang'a yakukalakala iyi yuma, niwakwikeli iyi ing'ovu yakwila iyi yuma?"
42011029 Mwanta Yesu hakuyila ninji," nakuyihula lwihu lumu. Ilezhenu ninami nukuyilezha ing'ovu yinekala nayu yakukala kala iyi yuma.
42011030 Chijimikilu cha Yowanu, chakwiwula tahinji chakuji Antu? nyakulenu.
42011031 Hiyakujihujola Muntu namukwawu nawa," neyi tukwila netu chakwiwula' wukutwila ninji,' inji jinu mwalekeleliji kumukuhwelela?'
42011032 Ilang'a neyi tuhosha netu, ' chakuji Antu',... ." Ajing'i nakutiya woma wawantu, hakwila antu ezhima etezheli chalala nawu Yowanu hikapolofwetu.
42011033 Hiyakumwakula Yesu nawu," kwizhi etu kwwiluka nehi." Yesu niyena hakuyila ninji," ninami nawahinu kuyileja wantu wunelang'a nachu iyi yuma."

42012001 Jichi Yesu wantendekeli kuyitang'isha muyishimu. ninji, "iyala wumu watumbili itempa jinji, yojisha ni mwikoli, yopundaku niibuku. yotung'aku ni kaposhi cheng'iyojihana nikuji akakukulusha. yenda ninzhila yinji.
42012002 Hampinji yalong'a, watumini ng'amba yinji kuji ankong'i zhinji etempa kulonda kusendaku nyikabu yamwitempa.
42012003 Ilang'a amusendeli, hiyakumweta, nikumufuntishamu makasakasa.
42012004 Cheng'i nawa wayitemesheli ng'amba mukwamu, niyena amutapoleli kumutu, nikumukong'a chatama chansonyi nawa.
42012005 Watuminiku cheng'i ng'amba mukwawu, iwu jinu amuzhahilinikwila cheng'i antu amakwawu mwatama, kuyeta hampinji yoyimu nikuyizhaha.
42012006 Washeleli namuntu wumu wakutuma, mwaninji weyala waswezhayi kukeng'a. Jiyi wajing'i wakukumishakukutuma. Wahosheli ninji akamulemesha manami.
42012007 Ilang'a owu akwakujima hiyakuhosha mukachi kawu nawu, iwu jiyi nswana, twayenu tumuzhahenu kulonda jinu wikali wuswana wetu.
42012008 Hiyakumukwata nakumuzhaha nakumunatila hanzhi yetema.
42012009 Jichi owu mwanta mwini itema jamivinyu wakela ng'ahi? Wakenza nakuzhilumuna owu akwakudima itema; jamivinyuwakayinka antu acheng'i.
42012010 Munating'i mazu amumukanda wazhila nawu! "ilolwa jajiwiluwu kuji mukwakutung'a leli anajilishi kwaikala ilolwa jakola.
42012011 Ichi chafumini kuji mwanta, chakuhayama kumensu etu".
42012012 Hakukumisha yumiyi akaulumi zhawaYudeya amu sendeli Yesu nakumukasa mulong'a eluki nawu wahosheleng'a chaji wena. Ilang'a ajing'a nawoma mulong'a wezaza. Hiyakumushiyahiyakuya kwawu.
42012013 hakumutemeshela afwalisewi amakwawu niakwa Helodi kulonda amukwati namazu akuhoshayi.
42012014 Chenzhiliwu hiyakumwila nawu, "eyi mwalimu, etu tuneluki netu eyi wumuntu walala. Chalala watang'ishang'a nzhila yalala ya Nzambi. chalong'a kuwinka Kesali tahinji nehi?"
42012015 Ilang'a yena welukili wufwikizhi wawu hakuyila ninji "mukunyesekelaji? nletelenu ishiling'i nijitali".
42012016 Aleteli jimu kuji Yesu. Hakuhosha ninji, "ichi chifwikizha niniyi nsona yanyi?" "ahosheli kuji yena "Kesali".
42012017 Yesu hakuhosha ninji, "mwinkenu Kesali zhawukesali, mwinkenu Nzambi zhawuNzambi" Hiyakumuhayama nankashi.
42012018 Jichi Yudasi, wahoaheli ninji kosi kusang'uka, hakwinzha kuji yena. Hiyakumwihula nakuhosha ninji,

42012019 "Mwalimu. mosi wanjikili kuji etuwa, Neyi manakwamuntu wukufwa nakushiya wamumbanda hanyima yinji cahkubula mwana, owu iyala akasumbuli ona ng'nja manakwinji., kulonda kukulisha anyana kamanakwinji.
42012020 Kwajing'a amayala atanu naayeji Watachi wasenjeli wamumbanda yafwa,  chakubula nyama.
42012021 Wamuchiyeji wasumbwili wamubanda yofwa chakubula kushiya mwana, wamuchisatu niyena chochimu.
42012022 Ezhima atanu na ayeji ashili chakubula anyana. kunsa ya yuma yonsu, wamumbanda yofwa nikufwa.
42012023 Hakusang'uka afu, wakekala ing'ojanyi? mulong'a ezhima na ayeji wajing'i ng'ojawu.
42012024 Yesu hakuhosha ninji, "chimwabula kwiluka mikanda yezhima hela ng'ovu zhaNzambi?
42012025 Hamba kasang'ukawu antu onsu muji afu, hiyakasumbula hela kusumbukaku, ilang'a akekala neyi chekalawu ang'elu mwiwulu.

42015015 Palatu wakeng'eli kutiyisha izamvu kuwaha, hakuyikasulwila Balaba. chanamwetiyi Yesu, hakumulubula nunji amupopihamutonju wakusempashana.
42015016 Mashijika hiyakumutwala mwibuku jawu jatenang'awu nawu, palitoliya. hiyakutambika izaza jezhima jamashijika.
42015017 Hiyakumuvwika ihina chawusombu, hiyakutung'a chibang'ula chaming'a yamibambang'oma, hiyakubuta kumutu winji,
42015018 Hiyakutachika kumwimusha nawu, "kalombo mwani, eyi mwanta wawaYudeya".
42015019 Hiyakumweta kumutu namutondu, hiyakumufwizhila mazeng'i hiyakufukama nakujifukula kuji yena.
42015020 Chanamusehiwu hiyakumuvula cheng'i mahininji. hiyakumutwala yena nakumupopa.
42015021 Hiyakukwata muntu wajing'a nakuhita, yowu Shimona wakukeleng'i, tata yaAlekizandeli naLusifasi, wajing'i nakufuma mumpata, ayi amusenjeliku mutondu wakusempakeshawinji.
42015022 Mashijika hiyakumuleta Yesu kwilung'a jatenawu Gologota, chaya mukwila nawu kuchang'u".
42015023 Hiyakumwinka vinyu hiyakubombashana nayihemba yamola, ilang'a yena hayinwinuku.
42015024 Hiyakupopela hamutondu wakusempang'esha hayakujipang'ila mahininji naklujisakwila nachinjikizhilu chakutambulawu, nachi hamuntu hamuntu.
42015025 Hamupopeleluwu, hamutondu wakusempashana hajing'i hampinji yamuchisatu.
42015026 Mukanda wamulong'a winji washiluwu hewulu ang'anjikili nawu mwanta wawayudeya.
42015027 Hiyakupopela atupondu ayeji, hanyitondu yakusempashana, hamu naayeji, hamutondu wakesempashana, hamu naayejiwumu kuchikasa chinji chachijilu, mukwawu kuchikasa chachimunswa.
42015028 Mukanda washikizhili chahosheliwu nawu, Yena amujilili hamu nawakwakubula kuzhila.
42015029 Antu ajing'i nakuhita, hiyakumutukola, nakumulembola, nanyitu yawu, eyi wasandang'a tembeli hiwukuyitung'a cheng'i, mumafuku asatu,
42015030 Jamwini sulukaku hamutondu wakusepashana".
42015031 Chochimu nawa niakulumpi jawatupilisitu amuseheli mukachi kawu hamunawa ang'ajiki nawu, wamwinini akwawu yomweni hanatweshi kujamwinaku.
42015032 Mulekenu Kilisitu, mwanta wawaIsalela, asulukihamutondu wakusempakesha, katataka, tumoni kulonda kukuhwelela". Ninawa apopeleliwu hamutondu hamu naajing'i ahosheli chatama.
42015033 Chiyashikili mpinji yamuchitanu nayimu, mwikala nimwijima mwitung'a jejima kushika ni kumpinji yamuchitanu nachiwana.
42015034 Hampinji yamuchitanu nachiwana hakubilela nazu jang'ovu ninji, Eloyi Eloyilama sabakatanyi jaya mukwila nawu, "Nzambi yami wunanshiyiliji kankawami?"
42015035 Amakwawu emenuku chanachitiyiwu, hiyakwila nawu tiyenu, hakutambika Elizha".
42015036 Wumu hakuya lufuchi nakwinzesha siponji navinyu yabatuka hakuyisha kwiteti, hakumwinka anwi, ninji mulukenu tutali neyi Elizha wukwinza nakumukulula.
42015037 Yesu hakubijika nezu dang'ovu, atula niwumi winji.
42015038 Ihina jamutembeli jatabukili hakachi kufuma hewulu kushika nikwishina.
42015039 Mukulumpi wamashijiki wemenuku hakutalanzhana nayena, chamweniyi chanatuluyi wumi winji chochenochu, hakwila ninji, mwalala iwu muntu wanjing'i mwana kaNzambi.
42015040 Kwanjing'i nawa ambanda anjing'i nakutalila kufuma hahalehi. Hawena hana Maliya Mandelena Maliya (mama yayaKoba mwanyika Yosesa) niSalomi.
42015041 Wowu amulonjezheleli nakumukalakela hajing'iyi mung'alaliya, niambanda amakwawu amavulu enzhiliyi nawu kuYelusalema.
42015042 Chelili kuneli jehi melela, nanochu chelili hiifuku jakulong'esha, jojifuku jatambakana naSabata.
42015043 Hikukwinza Yosefu waku Alamateya muntu walumbwa muchota niyena wajing'i nakutalila wanta waNzambi. Hakuya mwjing'i Pilatu chakaji woma hakulomba mujima waYesu.
42015044 Pilatu hakuhayama ninji nafwi jehi? Hakutambika owu mukulumpi wamashijika, hakumwihula ninji, "hanafwiyi hanalehi jehi tahinji?"
42015045 Chanateyiyi kuji owu mukulumpi wawamashijika, hakumwinka Yosefu muzhimba waYesu.
42015046 Yena hakulanja ihina jitooka, hakumukulula hakumuzhinazhina mwihinoju jitooka, hakumukamika mwinzhamu japoyawu jehi mwilola, kuchinsu chezhamu hakwalumwinaku ilola.
42015047 Maliya Mandelina niMaliya mama yaYosesi amweni kwamukamikililiyi.
42016001 Chamanini Ifuku da Sabata, Maria magdalene, Maria Mama ya Yakoba,ni Salomi alangili mitondu ye Yumba jajiwahi nawu awayishi muzhimba wa Yesu.
42016002 Ntetemena heifuku jakutachika mu mulungu, ayili kwizhamu akwinduka kwa muteba,
42016003 Ajin'a na kuji hula nawu" wafumisha iji Ilola kwa kwinilila kwi zhamu inyi?"
42016004 chiyataliliwu heulu, amweni nawu Ilola anji fumishihu, ja jin'a jenni.
42016005 Chaneng'ili mwijamu hiya kumona mukwenzi weyala nashakami kubandi yzhamu, nyakutiya woma.
42016006 Yena hakuyila nindi," bayi mutiya womaku; Muji nakuken'a Yesu Kanazareta apopeleluwu ha kulusu; Wasang'uka jehi! haji munuka. Talenu hamukamikiluwu.
42016007 Jiyilenu, mwakaleji atumbban'i twingi, ni Petulu, hakuya nawu ku N'aliliya. jiku kumwaka mumwena, mwomwanjin'a nakumilezha.
42016008 Ajijikilimu, hiyakufuma kwizhamu, lufuchi; Ajing'a nakutiya woma nikuhayama.
42016009 Chajini Ifuku ja kutachika mu Mulung'u, ajing'ayi na sang'ukijehe, wajimwikesheli kuji Maria Magdaleni, wafumishiliyi majimoni atau na ayeji.
42016010 Wena wayili nakulezha Antu ajin'ahi nawu ajinen'eli nikujila.
42016011 Wena chiyachitiyilu nawu wamumi niyena Maria na mumoni dehi, hiyakumweleleli kwawuku.
42016012 Kulondela hayumiyi, mwamwekeni mwachen'i kuji akwawu ayedi chajin'a nakufumawu kunang'a nakuya ku mukala wawu.
42016013 Niwena ajiyilili nakulen'ga na kuya ku mukala wawu. Niwena ajiyilili nakuleng'a akwawu, wena jinu kwa ajikanini.

42016014 Nkuminaku wamwekeni kuji awenawu ikumi nawumu chashaka miniwu nakuja, wahihoshola nasan'u ya ntang'i yawu. nikuchinchinka kwa Michima yaulu. Nanochu chabulilwu kukuhwelela wejima wamumweni hakusan'uka kwiji.
42016015 Hakuyila ninji,"yena mumatun'a, ejima amata yamunu mwishin nakushimuna nsan'u yayiwahi kudi ejima alen'awu.
42016016 Muntu wukukuhwelela, wukujimikew, wakahanda, Muntu wukubula kukuhwelela wakatang'a.
42016017 Tiyenu yinjikijilu yakalonjela muji wena akakuhwelela: Akafumisha anjemona mwizhina yami. Akahosha namadimi amaha.
42016018 Akanyamuna tupela namakasa awu, neyi akanwa yafwana, hiyakayikatisha nihantuku. Akananika Makasawu hanji akata akakola.
42016019 Cheleli mwanta nahoshi, jeji nawu, hiya kumutambula mwiwulu hakushakama kuchikasa cha Nzambi chachijilu.
42016020 Tupanzha twajiyilili mwitun'a nakushimuna kwejima,mwanta wajin'a nakuzata nawu chimu. Hakukolesha mazu nayinjikijilu yalondelumu.
43001001 Antu amavulu anakwati kumujimu wakusoneka nikushimuna nsang'u yakutena yuma yitunakuhweleli chikupu mukachi ketu netu yalala;
43001002 mwomwatulezheleluwu kuji ayinsahu amweni namesu hatachikilili nsang'u, ajing'i akwakukalakala mujimu wezu jaNzambi.
43001003 jichi neli nami chachiwahi nikusonekeli nawa, eyi Tiyofwilu waswezha kulema, mulong'a nashinshiki jehi chakashinshi mwaya nsang'u yezhima hachuma hachuma, kufumisha hatachikilili nsang'u;
43001004 kulonja wiluki yuma yakulezheluwu, neyi akulezheli mwalala chikupu.
43001005 Hajing'i mwanta wawaYujeya Heroji kwajing'i kapristu wumu, izhina jinji Zakariya, wakwizanvu jaAbiya, ing'ojinji wakuji anyana kaAroni, izhina jinji Elizabeta.
43001006 Mwayeji wawu ajing'i antu along'a kumesu aNzambi, enjelang'a mwaya nshimbi nimuyijika yaMWANTA yezhima chakaji hakuyinkela mulong'a.
43001007 Hiyajing'i namwanaku, mulong'a Elizabeta wajing'i nshinta, mwayeji wawu aswezha jehi kukula.
43001008 Chakong'elang'ayi Zakariya mujimu winji wawupristu kumesu aNzambi, mwomwakalakelang'a akwezanvu jinji,
43001009 mwomuchaaku chamujimu wawupristu, chakwila kapristu wukwing'ila muTembeli yaMWANTA nakwocha insensi, ching'a yowu wakusakula nachinzhikizhilu chakusakula nachu hohu.
43001010 Izaza jawantu jezhima jajing'i nakulombela hanzi hampinzhi yakwocha insensi.
43001011 Kuji yena hikukumwekana kang'elu kaMWANTA nemani kukameng'a kakwochela insensi, kumbaji yachikasa chachijiilu.
43001012 Zakariya chanamumoniyi hakwakama, niwoma wumukwata nikumukwata.
43001013 Kang'elu hakumwila ninji, Eyi Zakariya, bayi wutiya womaku; kulembelela kweyi, anakutiyi, ing'ojeyi Elizabeta wakakuvwela mwana weyala, wakamutumba izhina jinji neyi Yowanu.
43001014 Eyi wakazang'alala wakatiya kuwaha; amavulu akazang'alala hakavwalikayi mulong'a akamumona kulema kuji MWANTA.
43001015 Bayi akanwang'a vinyu hela walwa washetanaku; wakenzala naSpiritu Wazhila kufumisha hakavwalikayi.
43001016 Wakabalumuna anyana kaIsarela amavulu akatali kuji MWANTA Nzambi yawu.

43001017 Wakayang'ahu jehi kumbiji nimuSpiritu nimung'ovu yaElizha, Kulonja kubalumuna nyichima yawatata zhawantu yakatali kuji anyanawu, ázhikwa akenji namaana awálong'a; akamulong'esheli MWANTA antu akawani amulong'eshelawu jehi.
43001018 Zakariya hakumwila kang'elu ninji, Chumichi nukuchiluka ng'ahi? Ami niipala jeyala, ning'ojami naswezhi jehi kukula.
43001019 Kang'elu hakumwakula ninji, Ami yami Gabireli, nemanang'a kumesu aNzambi; anantemeshi ninzi nihoshi neyi nikulezhi nsang'u iyi yayiwahi.
43001020 Tiya, eyi wukwikala kamama, hiwukutwesha kuhoshaku, kushika nihamba kamwekana yumiyi, mulong'a wunabuli kukuhwelela mazu ami, akalumbuluka hakakwezhi kawu.
43001021 Antu sang'a emenawu nakumuching'ilila Zakariya, hiyakuhayama chajing'i nakulabilayi muTembeli.
43001022 Chanejikiyi kutwesha kuhosha nawu nehi, kwakwinyeka namakasinji hohu, kukanwa chochikwamwena nzo-o. Eluka nikwiluka nawu namoni chuma muTembeli.
43001023 Chelili mafuku inji akong'elang'ayi mujimu anawanini jehi, hakuya kwitala jinji.
43001024 Mafuku alonjeli mumafuku owu, ing'ojinji Elizabeta abaaba niivumu, hakujizhinja tukwezhi tutanu,
43001025 ninji, jichi chanang'iliyi MWANTA chanenziyi nakuntala mafuku anu, amfumishi nsonyi yinatiyang'a kuji akwetu antu.
43001026 Hakakwezhi kamuchitanu nakamu, owu kang'elu Gabireli amutemesheli kuji Nzambi kumukala wamung'aliliya wumu, izhina jawu Nazareta.
43001027 Hakwinza kuji mumbanja wumu wakaji kujimonang'ahu jehi neyala, anakumini jakumwota kuji iyala izhina jinji Yosefu, wakumutang'a wajaviji; izhina janowu muzhiki jiyi Mariya.
43001028 Kang'elu hakwing'ila mwajing'iyi, hakumwila ninji, Kolaku, eyi anakutiyili luwi lwakubajika, MWANTA wuji naneyi; yeyi wunakooleki hakachi kawakwenu ambanja.
43001029 Yena chanatiyiyi izu oju hakwakama nankashi, hakuzhinoka mumuchima winji ninji anang'imushi ng'ahi?
43001030 Owu kang'elu hakumwila ninji, Eyi Mariya, bayi wutiya womaku; wunawani wuselewa kuji Nzambi.
43001031 Tiya, wakabaaba ivumu, wakavwala mwana weyala, wakamutumba izhina jinji neyi YESU.
43001032 Yena wakekala muneni, akamutena nawu Mwana kaMukwakubajika Mwiwulu, MWANTA Nzambi wakamwinka itanja jawanta jatata yinji javiji;
43001033 wakekala mwanta wakumutang'a waYakoba hayanyaka; wanta winji hiwamba kakumaku.
43001034 Mariya hakumwila kang'elu ninji, Chumichi chikutwesheka ng'ahi, ichi chinabuli iyala?
43001035 Kang'elu hakumwakula ninji, Spiritu Wazhila wakenza hajeyi; ng'ovu zhaMukwakubajika Mwiwulu zhakakuzeng'amina; jichi Ona Wazhila iwakavwala, akamutena nawu hiMwana kaNzambi weyala.
43001036 Tiya, nintang'a yeyi Elizabeta niyena nawa nabaabi jehi ivumu jamwana weyala muwushinakazhi winji, mumbanja atenenang'awu nawu nshinta; kakwezhi kanu jiku kaneli jehi kamuchitanu nakamu.
43001037 Mulong'a kwosi chuma chakukang'anyayi Nzambuku.
43001038 Mariya hakwila ninji, Tala ami kambung'ambala kaMWANTA; mwonsu muwunahoshi mumwekani kujami. Kang'elu hakufuma kuji yena.
43001039 Wena mafuku owu Mariya hakunyamuka hakuya swayi kwilung'a jamapiji, kumukala wamuYuja wumu;
43001040 hakwing'ila mwitala jaZakariya, hakumwimusha Elizabeta.
43001041 Elizabeta chanatiyiyi kwimusha kwamwimushiluwu kuji Mariya, mwana wajing'i mwivumu jinji hakutuntoka. Elizabeta hakwinzala naSpiritu Wazhila.
43001042 Hakubijika nezu jang'ovu ninji, Yeyi wunakooleki hakachi kawakwenu ambanja, niwákafuma mwivumu jeyi nakooleki.
43001043 Ichi chanenziyi mama yaMwanta wami kujami chinafumi hanka?
43001044 Talenu, izu jiwunang'imushi, chijineng'ili mumatu ami, mwana wuji mwivumu jami hakutuntoka namuzang'alu.
43001045 Iwu mumbanja wakuhwelela nakooleki, mulong'a yuma yanamulezhuwu kuji MWANTA yakamwekana.
43001046 Mariya hakwila ninji, Muchima wami hiwukumutohesha MWANTA.
43001047 Spiritu yami yinazang'alali naNzambi Chamwinu chami.
43001048 Mulong'a yena namoni chinabula kulema ami kambung'inji. Tiyenu, kufumisha kulelu making'u ezhima amba kantenang'a nawu wakooleka.
43001049 Mulong'a mukwang'ovu nang'ilili yuma yamaneni; Niizhina jinji jazhila.
43001050 Luwi lwinji lwamba kashikang'a kumaking'u ezhima amba kamwakamang'a.
43001051 Namwekeshi ng'ovu nachikasa chinji; Napalang'eshi ájifuukwili nawu alema.
43001052 Nafumishi anyanta hamatanjawu awanta, Natuumbakeshi akaji kulema.
43001053 Nekutishi ajing'i nanzala nayuma yayiwahi, Nahang'i akwakuheta makasakasa.
43001054 Nakwashi kambung'inji Isarela aanuki luwi lwinji,
43001055 Lwatiyililiyi Abarahama nianyaninji, mwomwakanininiyi ankakulula zhetu kufumisha kunyaka.
43001056 Mariya hakushakama naElizabeta kafwampi neyi tukwezhi tusatu, hakufunta cheng'i kumukala wawu.
43001057 Chawaninini mafuku akusampuluka; Elizabeta hakuvwala mwana weyala.
43001058 Akwawu atung'ayi ninji kwakwihi, niantang'a zhinji, chanatiyuwu nawu MWANTA namutong'i nankashi, hiyakuzang'alala chimu ninji.
43001059 Chelili ifuku jamuchitanu nachisatu jinashiki jehi, hiyakwinza nawu amwalamishi mwana; elili nawu amutumbi izhina jatata yinji Zakariya.
43001060 Kuchinka mama yinji ninji, Nehi, mutumbenu nenu Yowanu.
43001061 Hiyakumwila nawu, Kwosi ntang'a yeyi atumbawu jehi izhinojuku.
43001062 Hiyakumukobola tata yinji kulonja ayilezhi janakeng'iyi kumutumba.
43001063 Hakulomba ilola kulonja asonekuhu; hakusoneka ninji, Izhina jinji jiyi Yowanu. Wezhima wawu hiyakuhayama.
43001064 Kanwa kinji kazhikuka nihohenohu, niijimi jinji jilamuka nikulamuka, hakuhosha mazu akumusakilila Nzambi.
43001065 Woma wuyikwata niantu ezhima atung'ili mbaji oyu; yumiyi yitiyakana nimwahita itung'a jaYujeya jamapiji jezhima ti-li-li.
43001066 Antu ezhima ayitiyili, hiyakuyisweka munyichima yawu nawu, Iwu mwana wamba kela ng'ahi? Mulong'a chikasa chaMWANTA chajing'i nayena.
43001067 Tata yinji Zakariya hakwinzala naSpiritu Wazhila, hakuprofweta, ninji,
43001068 MWANTA Nzambi yaIsarela akiswilewi, Mulong'a nenzi nakutala antu inji ayikuuli;
43001069 Natunyamwini jehi wamwinu wang'ovu Wakumutang'a wakambung'inji javiji,
43001070 Mwomwahosheliyi jehi kutunwa twawatuprofwetu twinji azhila kufumisha kunshankulu.
43001071 Wamwinu wakutwamwina kuji akwankunyi netu, Nikumakasa awantu ezhima atuhelang'a;
43001072 kulonja akatiyili ankakulula zhetu luwi Hakwanuka kutiyang'ana kwinji kwazhila.
43001073 Kwokusanyika kwasanyikililiyi nkakulula yetu Abarahama;
43001074 Kulonja chakutwamwinayi kumakasa awakwankunyi netu, Twakamukalakelang'a kumesu inji chakaji woma,
43001075 Nimukuzhila nimukulong'a mafuku etu ezhima.
43001076 Nineyi mwana akakwilang'a nawu wuji Kaprofwetu kaMukwakubajika. Wakatwaminang'ahu jehi kumbiji yaMWANTA, kulonja kumulong'eshelang'ahu jehi nzhila zhinji;
43001077 Kulonja chiwakayitang'isha neyi anayanakeni jehi nyilong'a yenu, Akeluki nawu anatuhanjishi jehi,
43001078 naluwi lwaNzambi yetu lwawushona. Naluwi olu twakamona nachu kucha kwakufuma mwiwulu, kwakwinza nakututala;
43001079 Kucha kwakutong'ekela ashakama mumwijima nimuwulelu wakufwa, Kwakalomboli nyenju yetu yakaholokeli munzhila yakumona kuwunja.
43001080 Mwana wakulili, wakwatili ng'ovu muspiritu, hakwikalang'a muchinkalampata kushika nikwifuku jamumwekesheluwu kuji aIsarela.
43002001 Wena mafuku owu kuji Agusitusi Kesari hikukufuma izu jakwila nawu asoneki antu amumatung'a ezhima.
43002002 jiku kusoneka kwatachi kweliluwu hajing'iyi Kerini nyuuli yaSiriya.
43002003 jichi antu ezhima hiyakuya nakuyisoneka, iwu hamukala winji, iwu hamukala winji.
43002004 Yosefu niyena hakunyamuka mung'aliliya, kumukala waNazareta, hakuya muYujeya kumukala wajaviji, izhina jawu Betelemi, mulong'a wajing'i wakwivumu jamutang'a wajaviji;
43002005 akamusoneki hamu naMariya oteliyi, henohu nakulishi jehi ivumu.
43002006 Chajing'uwu kwenoku, mafuku akusampuluka awanina nikuwanina.
43002007 Hakuvwala weji winji weyala, hakumuvung'avung'a mwihina, hakumukamika mwajiishililang'awu ayimuna, mulong'a mwitala jawenyi mwabulili hakukama.
43002008 Kwena kwitung'oju kwajing'i atubing'a twawanyikoku, ajing'i mumpata nakuhemba nyikoku yawu nawufuku.
43002009 Kang'elu kaMWANTA hakwimana kwajing'uwu; lubanzhi lwakulema kwaMWANTA hilukuyitong'ekela chezhezhi kwi-njo; atiya niwoma nankashi.
43002010 Kang'elu hakuyila ninji, Bayi mutiya womaku; tiyenu, nayileteli nsang'u yayiwahi yamuzang'alu waswezha, wakekala kuji antu ezhima.
43002011 Mulong'a ifuku jalelu, mumukala wajaviji, munavwaliki jehi Chamwinu, jiyi Kristu, Mwanta.
43002012 Chinzhikizhilu chimukumwiluka nachu, mukuwana mukeki anamuvung'avung'i mwihina, nakami mwajiishililang'awu ayimuna.
43002013 Kukasumuka haji owu kang'elu, hihaji izaza jawakwamwiwulu hiyakuhameka Nzambi,
43002014 nawu, Kuji Nzambi mwiwulu jakubajika kwikali lubanzhi lwakulema, Heseki hekali kuwunja hakachi kawantu atiyang'ayi kuwaha.
43002015 Chelili ang'elu anayishiyi jehi anayi jehi mwiwulu, atubing'a hiyakujilezha wumu namukwawu nawu, Tuyenu kuBetelemi katataka, tutali ichi chuma chinamwekani chanatulezhuwu kuji MWANTA.
43002016 Hiyakuya lufuchi, hiyakuwana Mariya niYosefu, nimukeki nakami mwajiishililang'awu ayimuna.
43002017 Chanachimonuwu hiyakutiyakesha nsang'u yaniwu mwana yayilezheluwu.
43002018 Antu ezhima chanatiyuwu yuma yayilezheluwu kuji atubing'a hiyakuhayama.
43002019 Hakwila Mariya wahembeli yuma yezhimiyi, hakuyitong'ashana mumuchima winji.
43002020 Atubing'a hiyakufunta nakulemesha Nzambi, nikumuhameka nayuma yatiyiluwu niyamwenuwu yezhima, mwomwayilezheluwu.
43002021 Chawaninini mafuku atanu nasatu akumwalamisha mwana, amutumbili izhina jinji nawu YESU, mwomwamutumbiluwu kuji kang'elu helili wuchiji kanja amubaabi mwivumu.
43002022 Chawaninini mafuku akuyizhilika amwaya nshimbi yaMosi, amuleteli mwana kuYerusalema kulonja kumushikizha kuji MWANTA;
43002023 mwomwasonekeluwu munshimbi yaMWANTA nawu, Anyana amayala asambilang'a kuvwalika ezhima, Akayitenang'a nawu azhila, ambala aMWANTA;
43002024 Akalambuli chimuna chakuketula chasonekawu munshimbi yaMWANTA, Hela tutela tuyeji, hela anyana katupompa ayeji.

43002025 MuYerusalema mwajing'i muntu wumu izhina jinji Simeyona; yena muntu iwu wajing'i walong'a, wukweti kalemesha kakulemesha Nzambi, wajing'i nakutalila chamba kayikunjezhawu aIsarela; Spiritu Wazhila wajing'i haji yena.
43002026 Henohu amumwekeshela jehi kuji Spiritu Wazhila ninji hakafwaku, kufwa ching'a namoni jehi Kristu waMWANTA.
43002027 Hakwing'ila muTembeli chakumwenjesha kuji Spiritu. Chamuleteluwu mwana Yesu kuji anvwali zhinji kulonja amwili mwaya chaaku chakunshimbi,
43002028 hohenohu hakumutambula mumakasa, hakuhameka Nzambi,
43002029 ninji, Ichi jinu eyi MWANTA, ng'itezhi ami kambung'eyi niyi chawunja, mwomuwahosha jehi;
43002030 Mulong'a namoni jehi namesu ami wamwinu weyi,
43002031 Wuwunalong'eshi jehi kumesu anyunza yezhima;
43002032 Chezhezhi chakutong'ekela azhentili, nilubanzhi lwakulema kwawantu eyi aIsarela.
43002033 Nitata yinji namama yinji hiyakuhayama yuma yatenenenuwu mwana.

43002034 Simeyona hakuyikiswila nkisu, hakumwila mama yinji Mariya ninji, Tiya, iwu mwana anamutong'oli jehi kwikala wakujimbwisha niwakuhinjwisha aIsarela amavulu; kulonja akekali chinzhikizhilu chakutenawu chatama.
43002035 Eng'a, mpoku yakabali yakapwika mumuchima weyeyi aweni nzwa-a, kulonja kumwekesha yitong'ozhoka yazhinjawu antu amavulu munyichima yawu.
43002036 Hajing'i nawa kaprofwetu wamumbanja Ana, mwana kaFwanuweli, wakumunza waAsheri; wajing'i waswezha jehi kukula, kufuma hasumbukiliyi washakamini namfumwinji nyaka yitanu nayiyeji,
43002037 henohu wela jehi mfwila wanyaka makumi atanu nasatu nanyaka yiwana (84); hafuminang'a muTembeluku, wafukaminang'a niwufuku nimwaana, nakulembelela kwakuzhing'uzhoka nanzala yakuleka kujya.
43002038 Yena mpinzhi oyu hakwinza, hakusakilila Nzambi, hakumushimuna kuji antu ezhima ajing'i nakutalila kukuula kwamba kakuulawu Yerusalema.
43002039 Chanamanishuwu yuma yakunshimbi yaMWANTA yezhima, hiyakufunta kung'aliliya kumukala wawu awenawu kuNazareta.
43002040 Mwana hakuya nakukula, akwata ning'ovu, aswezha nimaana; luwi lwaNzambi lwajing'i haji yena.
43002041 Anvwali zhinji ayilang'a kuYerusalema hamwaka hamwaka hachawizha chaChipanjakenu.
43002042 Helili nashiki jehi munyaka ikumi nayiyeji (12), hiyakukanjuka kuYerusalema mwomuchaaku chachawizhochu.
43002043 Chanawanishuwu mafuku owu hiyakufunta, mukwenzi Yesu hakushala muYerusalema. Anvwali zhinji kuchiluka nehi,
43002044 atong'ozhokeli nawu wuji muchenju. Hiyakwenja lwenju lwefuku jimu, hiyakumukeng'akeng'a haji antang'a zhawu, nihaji akwawu ajilukiluwu nawu.
43002045 Chabuliluwu kumumona, hiyakufunta cheng'i kuYerusalema nakumukeng'akeng'a.
43002046 Chimunahiti mafuku asatu hiyakumuwana muTembeli, nashakami mukachi kawankulung'ang'a nakutiyilila nikuyihuzhola.
43002047 Ezhima ajing'i nakumutiya ahayamini kashinshi kinji nimwakuyakulayi.
43002048 Chanamuwanuwu hiyakuhayama; mama yinji hakumwila ninji, Mwanami wunatukong'eliji mwenimu? Nitata yeyi ninami tunakukeng'akeng'i nawushona.
43002049 Hakuyila ninji, Mwankeng'elang'aji? Munabuliliji kwiluka nenu ami ching'a niikalang'a mwitala jaTata yami?
43002050 Oju izu jahosheliyi nawena hijayilumbulukililuku.
43002051 Hakukunkumuka nawu, hakushika nawu kuNazareta; hakuyovwahilang'a. Mama yinji hakusweka yuma yezhimiyi mumuchima winji.
43002052 Yesu hakukula mumaana nikuchiminu, amumona nikuwaha kuji Nzambi nikuji antu.

43003001 Chanashakamiyi Kesari Tiberusi muwanta nyaka ikumi nayitanu (15), hajing'iyi Pontusi Pilatu nyuuli yamuYujeya, hajing'iyi Heroji mwanta wakung'aliliya, manakwinji Fwilipu mwanta wakumpata yakuItureya naTarakonita, niLisaniyasi mwanta wakuAbileni;
43003002 hajing'uwu aAnasi naKayafwasi muwupristu weneni, izu jaNzambi hijikwinza kuji mwana kaZakariya, Yowanu, hajing'iyi muchinkalampata.
43003003 Yena hakwinza mumatung'a ezhima ajing'i kwakwihi naYojana, nakushimuna kuzhimika kwakubalumuka mumuchima kulonja kwanakena antu nshiji;
43003004 neyi chanasonekuwu mumukanja wamazu akaprofwetu Isaya nawu, Mbila yamuntu wukubijika muchinkalampata ninji, Long'eshenu mwakenjelayi MWANTA, Ololenu nzhila zhinji zhatulolu.
43003005 Akashikili yinekineki yezhima, Akashikumuni mapiji ezhima ninyikanju yezhima; Akololi haheng'a, akesekezhi nzhila zhamankulokela.
43003006 Antu ezhima akamoni chakayamwinawu kuji Nzambi.
43003007 jichi yena hakuyila mazaza ayili kuji yena nakuyizhimika ninji, Enu anyana katubanjayula, wayilezheli kutemuka kuzuwa kwakenza hinyi?

43003008 Song'enu nyikabu yatelela antu anabalumuki munyichima. Bayi mutachika kuhosha munyichima yenu nenu tukweti nkakulula yetu Abarahamaku. Tiyenu niyilezhi, nami Nzambi natweshi kutetula anyana kaAbarahama mumalolawa.
43003009 Katataka anashi jehi chizembi kunyizhi yanyitonju; jichi nyitonju yezhima yikubula kusong'a nyikabu yayiwahi akayitemamu, akayinatila mukesi.
43003010 Mazaza hiyakumwihula nawu, Inji jinu ching'a twila ng'ahi?
43003011 Hakuyakula ninji, Muntu wukweti yikowelu yiyeji amwinkuhu mukwawu nabuli, niwùkweti yakujya eli mwomumu nawa.
43003012 Ansonkeshi hiyakwinza kuji yena nawu ayizhimiki, hiyakumwila nawu, Eyi nkulung'ang'a, etu tukwila ng'ahi?
43003013 Hakuyila ninji, Bayi mujyang'a yanyilami nakubajisha mwayilezhawuku.
43003014 Mashijika niwena nawa hiyakumwihula nawu, Etu nawa tukwila ng'ahi? Hakuyila ninji, Bayi mukabisha muntuku, hela kutwambila muntu; kuminenu jakutiya kuwaha nawulooku wenu.
43003015 Chajing'i nakuzhinokawu antu, antu ezhima hiyakutong'ozhoka munyichima yawu nawu Yowanu kwizhi jiyi Kristu.

43003016 Yowanu hakuyakula wezhima wawu ninji, Chalala ami nayizhimikang'a mumenzhi, ilang'a kuji nakwinza wambajika ng'ovu, muya wankwabilu zhinji ami kutela kuwukasununa nehi; jiyi wakayizhimika muji Spiritu Wazhila ninakesi.
43003017 Muchikasa chinji muji lwalu lwakutookesha nachu mwitala jinji jakuhulila, akapompesheli tijiku munkalang'a yinji, hakwila muzùng'u wakawocha mukesi kakázhimang'a.
43003018 jichi hakuyishimwina antu nsang'u yayiwahi, nikuyikunjezha namazu amakwawu amavulu.
43003019 Ilang'a Mwanta Heroji, chanamukonkololuwu kuji Yowanu hansang'u yaHerojiya ing'ojamanakwinji, niyuma yikwawu yatama yelilang'ayi Heroji yezhima,
43003020 hakulunzhikaku nichuma chikwawu chakumusha Yowanu mukaleya.
43003021 Chelili namanishi jehi kuzhimika antu ezhima to-o, niYesu anamuzhimiki jehi, yena Yesu hakulombela, iwulu hijikwenzuluka;
43003022 Spiritu Wazhila hakuzelumukila haji yena namuzhimba wuji neyi katela; mwiwulu himukufuma izu nawu, Yeyi Mwanami nakeng'a, natiyang'a kuwaha nankashi mujeyi.
43003023 Henohu Yesu nashiki jehi kafwampi munyaka makumi asatu (30), hiyakumutong'ozhoka nawu mwana kaYosefu; ankakulula zhinji ajing'i iwu Heli,
43003024 iwu Matata, iwu Levi, iwu Meliki, iwu Yanayi, iwu Yosefu,
43003025 iwu Matatiyasi, iwu Amosa, iwu Nahumi, iwu Eseli, iwu Nang'ayi,
43003026 iwu Mayata, iwu Matatiyasi, iwu Semeni, iwu Yoseki, iwu Yoja
43003027 wu Yowanani, iwu Resa, iwu Zerubabeli, iwu Sheyaleteli, iwu Neri,
43003028 iwu Meliki, iwu Aji, iwu Kosama, iwu Elimajama, iwu Eri,
43003029 iwu Yoshuwa, iwu Eliyezeri, iwu Yorimi, iwu Matata, iwu Levi,
43003030 iwu Simeyona, iwu Yujasi, iwu Yosefu, iwu Yonama, iwu Eliyakimi,
43003031 iwu Meleya, iwu Mena, iwu Matata, iwu Natani, iwu javiji,
43003032 iwu zhesi, iwu Obeji, iwu Bowazi, iwu Salemoni, iwu Nashoni,
43003033 iwu Aminajabi, iwu Arama, iwu Hezeroni, iwu Perezi, iwu Yuja,
43003034 iwu Yakoba, iwu Isaka, iwu Abarahama, iwu Tera, iwu Nahori,
43003035 iwu Seruga, iwu Rewu, iwu Peleka, iwu Eberi, iwu Shela,
43003036 iwu Kenani, iwu Arafwasaji, iwu Shemi, iwu Nowa, iwu Lameki,
43003037 iwu Metusela, iwu Enoki, iwu Yareja, iwu Mahaleli, iwu Kenani,
43003038 iwu Enosi, iwu Seti, iwu Ajama, mwana kaNzambi.
43004001 Yesu hakufuma kuYojana kwayiliyi, wenzala jehi Spiritu Wazhila, hiyakumutwala kuji Spiritu muchinkalampata.
43004002 Mafuku makumi awana (40), hiyakumutesha kuji jiyabolu. Wena mafuku owu hajiili chumaku; nkumininaku hakutiya nzala.
43004003 jiyabolu hakumwila ninji, Neyi wuMwana kaNzambi, hoshaku iloliji jibalumuki jinkenji.
43004004 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Anasoneki nawu, Muntu hahanjang'a namankenji hohuku.
43004005 Hakumutwala hewulu, hakumulezha mawanta amunu mwishina ezhima yena mpinzhi oyu.
43004006 jiyabolu hakumwila ninji, Nukukwinka mawantawa ezhima nilubanzhi lwakulema kwawu, mulong'a ananyinkuwu ami; yowu muntu inakeng'i kwinka nukumwinkawu.
43004007 jichi neyi eyi wukujifukula kujami, ezhima akwikala eyi.
43004008 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Anasoneki nawu, Kajifukulang'a kuji MWANTA Nzambi yeyi, jiyi wakakalakelang'a kankawinji hohu.
43004009 Hakumutwala kuYerusalema, hakumusha hewulu jaTembeli, hakumwila ninji, Neyi wuMwana kaNzambi, jinati mwishina;
43004010 mulong'a anasoneki nawu, Wakakulezhela ang'elu zhinji akakuhembang'a;
43004011 Akakwaka namakasawu wakenja kahuma mwenju weyi kwilola.
43004012 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Aneli nawu, Bayi wakamweseka MWANTA Nzambi yeyuku.
43004013 jiyabolu chanamanishiyi kutesha kwezhima, hakufuma kuji yena, ninji amoni hekwawu hakamuteshelayi.
43004014 Yesu hakufunta kung'aliliya mung'ovu yaSpiritu; mpuhu yinji hiyikutiyakana mwahita mbaji yezhimoyu.
43004015 Hakutang'isha mumashikolawu, hiyakumuhamekang'a kuji antu ezhima.
43004016 Hakwinza kuNazareta kwamuleleleluwu; hakwing'ila mushikola hefuku jaSabata neyi chelilang'ayi jikalu, hakwimana nakutang'a.
43004017 Hiyakumwinka mukanja wakaprofwetu Isaya. Hakubakula mukanja, hakuwana hanasonekuwu nawu,

43004018 Spiritu waMWANTA wuji hajami, Mulong'a wanwayisha jehi manzhi nishimwini atuzweng'i nsang'u yayiwahi; Nantemeshi kulonja nibijiki ankoli nsang'u yakuyisubula, niamputamesu atoni; Kulonja kuyumbaku antu anachikuwu,
43004019 Nishimuni mwaka waMWANTA wunawahi jehi.
43004020 Hakuvung'a mukanja, hakumwinkawu cheng'i mukwakuwimena, hakushakama; antu ezhima ajing'i mushikola hiyakumuhung'unwina mesu, hiyakumushinshika swi-i.
43004021 Hakutachika kuyila ninji, Nsang'u iyi yasonekeluwu yinalumbuluki kumatu enu lelu.
43004022 Antu ezhima hiyakumwitezha, hiyakuhayama mazu amawahi afumini kukanwa kinji; hiyakwila nawu, Hijiyi mwana kaYosefuku?
43004023 Hakuyila ninji, Keng'a muntili chishimu chakwila nenu, Eyi chimbuki, juuki eyi aweni. Yezhima yitunatiyi yiwuneli kuKaperinamu, yili nikunu kwilung'a jeyeyi aweni nawa.
43004024 Hakuyila ninji, Nukuyilezha chalala nami, kwosi kaprofwetu etezhang'awu mwilung'a jinji yomwenuku.

43004025 Mwalala nukuyilezha nami hanyaka yajing'iyi Elizha, hákwatiluwu nvula nyaka yisatu natukwezhi tutanu nakamu, háholokeli nzala yeneni mwitung'a jezhima, muIsarela, mwajing'i ambanja amfwila amavulu.
43004026 Ilang'a hiyatemesheli Elizha kuji wenaku, ching'a kuZarefwati hohu, mwitung'a jaSijoni, kuji mumbanja wamfwila.
43004027 Nihajing'i kaprofwetu Elisha, muIsarela mwajing'i akwambumba amavulu, hosi atookesheluwuku ching'a kaSiriya Nayamani hohu.
43004028 Ezhima ajing'i mushikola chanatiyuwu ochu, nyichima yawu yiswezha nikuzuwa;
43004029 avwavumoka nikuvwavumoka, hiyakumushinzheka nawu afumi mumukala; hiyakumutwala kumukumu wampiji yatung'iluwu mukala wawu, kulonja amukunwinuku.
43004030 Yena hakuhanuka mukachi kawu, hakujiyila kwinji.
43004031 Hakukunkumuka kuKaperinamu, mukala wakung'aliliya. Hakutang'isha haSabata.
43004032 Hiyakuhayama kutang'isha kwinji, mulong'a mazu inji ajing'i nawanta.
43004033 Mushikola mwajing'i muntu wukweti spiritu wanjemoni wazonja, hakubilela nezu jang'ovu,
43004034 ninji, Aka! Eyi Yesu wakuNazareta, tuji neyi nansang'winyi? Wunenzi jehi nakutukisang'ana, tahinji? Nakwiluki yeyi Mukwakuzhila wambala waNzambi.
43004035 Yesu hakumuhoshola ninji, Mwenaku, fumaku muji yena. Njemoni amunata ninowu muntu mukachi kawu, afuma nimuji yena, nikumukatisha nehi.
43004036 Antu ezhima hiyakuhayama, hiyakuhosha muntu namukwawu nawu, Iku hikuhosha kwamuchijinyi? Hakulezha aspiritu azonja nawanta ning'ovu, hiyakufuma muji antu.
43004037 Mpuhu yinji yitiyakana nikwezhima ti-li-li.
43004038 Hakunyamuka, hakufuma mushikola, hakwing'ila mwitala jaShimona. MukuwaShimona wajing'i wakata mashika aweni, hiyakumulembelela nawu amuuki.
43004039 Hakwimana kwajing'iyi yena, hakuhoshola mashika, amufuma nikumufuma; hohenohu yohinjuka nikuhinjuka, hakuyikalakela.
43004040 Chelili itang'wa hijikuya nakuhuma, ezhima ajing'i nawakwawu akata nyisong'u yeng'i nayeng'i, hiyakumuletelawu; hakuyinang'ika makasinji wezhima wawu, hakuyuuka.
43004041 Anjemoni niwena hiyakufuma muji antu amavulu nakukaloka nawu, Yeyi Mwana kaNzambi. Hakuyihoshola, hayitezheli kuhoshaku, mulong'a amwilukili nawu jiyi Kristu.
43004042 Chikunachi, hakwijika hakuya kwakankawinji, mazaza awantu hiyakumukeng'akeng'a. Chanamuwanuwu, hiyakukeng'a nawu amwimiki abuli kufuma kuji wena.
43004043 Yena hakuyila ninji, Ching'a nishimwina nsang'u yayiwahi yawanta waNzambi nikunyikala yikwawu yinashali nawa; mulong'a jichi chantemesheleluwu.
43004044 Hakushimunang'a mumashikola amung'aliliya.
43005001 Chelili izaza jawantu hijikujishinzhekela haji yena nawu atiyi izu jaNzambi, yena wajing'i wemana kwizhiya jaGenesareta.
43005002 Hakumona maatu ayeji anayikung'iki kuchikumu chezhiya; ayibinja yanshi anafumumu jehi, aji nakukosa tuleng'i twawu.
43005003 Hakwing'ila muwatu waShimona, hakumwila ninji swizhaku kwakulehi chanti nachikumu. Hakushakama, hakutang'isha mazaza awantu mwenomu muwatu.
43005004 Chanakumishiyi kuhosha, hakumwila Shimona ninji, Swizhenu kwakunama, mulalumuni tuleng'i twenu, mukwati inshi.
43005005 Shimona hakumwakula ninji, Mwanta, tunakabakani wufuku wezhima, kabakane-e, kukwata nehi, ilang'a ichi chiwunahosheyi nukukumina jakulalumuna tuleng'i.
43005006 Chaneluwu mwenimu, apompeshelelumu ilembu janshi jajeni; nituleng'i twawu hitukukeng'a kuketuka.
43005007 Hiyakuyikobola akwawu ayibinja nawu ajing'i muwatu wukwawu, nawu enzi ayikwashuku. Hiyakwinza, hiyakwinzesha maatu ezhima ayeji, hiyakukeng'a nikuzhiya.
43005008 Shimona Petulu chanachimoniyi, hakujinata kumanung'u aYesu ninji, Mwanta, afumi mwani kujami, mulong'a ami nimukwanshiji.
43005009 Mulong'a niyena ninowu akwawu ajing'iyi nawu ahayamini anshi akwatiluwu kuvula;
43005010 akwawu ayibinja nayena Shimona, wowu anyana kaZebejewu aYakoba naYowanu, ahayamini. Yesu hakumwila Shimona ninji, Bayi wutiya womaku; kufumisha hanu wukwikala chibinja chawantu.
43005011 Chanashikizhuwu maatu awu kuchikumu, hiyakushiya yuma yezhima hiyakumulonjela.

43005012 Chajing'iyi mumukala weneni wumu, kutala iyala wumu wazemoka jehi namusong'u wambumba; yenowu chanamumoniyi Yesu, hakujinata chamesu heseki, hakumulembelela ninji, Mwanta, neyi wunetezhi, wukutwesha kuntookesha.
43005013 Yesu hakwolola chikasa chinji, hakumukunka ninji, Netezhi, tookaku. Hohenohu musong'u winji wambumba wumufuma nikumufuma.

43005014 Yesu hakumukonkomwena nang'ovu ninji, Bayi wulezhamu muntuku; yaku wujimwekeshi kuji kapristu, wakamwinki mulambu wakujitookesha nachu wayilezheluwu kuji Mosi, kulonja wikali wunsahu kuji wena.
43005015 Mpuhu yinji yiswezha nikutiyakana; mazaza amaneni hiyakupompela kuji yena amutiyi, ayuuki yikatu yawu.
43005016 Yena hakuwombolokela kwilung'a jakankawinji nakulombela.

43005017 Ifuku jimu wajing'i nakutang'isha; kwashakamini aFwarisewu niankulung'ang'a zhanshimbi, anafumi kunyikala yakung'aliliya yezhima, nikuYujeya, nikuYerusalema; ng'ovu yaMWANTA yakuyuuka yajing'i kwoku.
43005018 Kutala amayala hiyakuleta mukwakalepa hachikang'a, hiyakukeng'a nawu amwing'izhi amukamiki kumesu inji.
43005019 Chanakang'anyuwu kumona hawing'izhilu nansang'u yezaza jajing'uku, hiyakukanjama hewulu jetala, hiyakumuhanwisha hamateya nakumuzelumuna mukachi kawu hachikang'a chinji, ashiki kumesu aYesu.
43005020 Yesu chanamoniyi kukuhwelela kwawu hakwila ninji, Eyi iyala, anakwanakeni nshiji zheyi.
43005021 Ansoneki nawaFwarisewu hiyakutachika kujihuzhola nawu, Yeniwu wuji nakutuka Nzambi hinyi? Natweshi kwanakena nshiji hinyi? HiNzambi hohuku?
43005022 Yesu welukili mwajing'i nakujihuzholawu, hakuyakula ninji, Mukujihuzholelaji munyichima yenu?
43005023 Chaswayi kumwila muntu nami, Anakwanakeni nshiji zheyi, tahinji chaswayi kumwila nami, Hinjukaku, wenji?
43005024 Kulonja mwiluki nenu Mwana kaMuntu wukweti wanta wakwanakena nshiji hanu hamaseki; hakumwila mukwakalepa ninji, Nakwili nami hinjukaku, wunyamuni chikang'a cheyi, wuyi kwitala jeyi.
43005025 Hohenohu yonyamuka nikunyamuka kumesu awu wezhima wawu, hakunona niniyi yakaminiyi, hakuya nikwitala jinji nakuhameka Nzambi.
43005026 Antu ezhima hiyakuhayama, hiyakutiya woma nankashi nawu, Lelu tunamoni yuma yacheng'i.
43005027 Kulonjela hayumiyi, Yesu hakuya munzhila, hakumona nsonkeshi wumu, izhina jinji Levi, nashakami kwakutambwila nyombu; hakumwila ninji, Nlonjang'a.
43005028 Yena hakushiya yuma yezhima, hakunyamuka, hakumulonjela.
43005029 Levi hakumutelekela chawizha cheneni mwitala jinji; himukwikala izaza jawansonkeshi jeneni, niantu amakwawu ashakaminuwu nawu nakujya.
43005030 AFwarisewu nawansoneki zhawu hiyakutobela atumbanzhi twinji nawu, Mwajiilang'aji nakunwa nawansonkeshi niakwanshiji?
43005031 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Akola hiyakeng'akeng'ang'a chimbukuku, ching'a akata.
43005032 Hinenzi nakutambika along'aku, nenzi nakutambika akwanshiji abalumuki munyichima.
43005033 Hiyakumwila nawu, Atumbanzhi twaYowanu aswezha kuzhing'uzhoka nakuleka kujya nikulembelela; niatumbanzhi twawaFwarisewu hamu; hakwila atumbanzhi tweyeyi, kwakujya hohu nakunwa.
43005034 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Amayala aji nakalemba akutwesha ng'ahi kuleka kujya hachijuwu nakalemba?
43005035 Mafuku akenza akafumishawu kalemba kuji wena, jihu hakazhing'uzhokang'awu nakuleka kujya.

43005036 Hakuyitila chishimu ninji, Kwosi muntu wukutabula chitabu kuchikowelu chachiha achisha kuchikowelu chachikuluku. Neyi wukwila chochochu, wukutabula nichachiha nichachikulu, chitabu chikufuma kuchikowelu chachiha hichikuya mumu nachachikuluku.
43005037 Kwosi muntu wukulong'a vinyu yayiha mwipakumuna jayitembi yayikuluku. Neyi wukwila chochochu, vinyu yikubusa yitembi, nivinyu yayeni yikumwang'ala, niyitembi yikufwila kumu.
43005038 Vinyu yayiha ching'a ayilong'a mwipakumuna jayitembi yayiha.
43005039 Kwosi muntu wukwila nanwi jehi vinyu yayikulu akeng'a yayihaku; ninji, Yayikulu jiyi yayiwahi.
43006001 Chamwekeni hasabata yesu nakuhitahita muwujimi watidiku, atumbanzhi twinji ajing'a nakunonanona nyitu yatidiku, hiyakuyichikita mumakasa awu, ni kuja.
43006002 Ilang'a afwalisewu amakwawu hiyakuhosha nawu, ''chumanyi chimuji nakwilila yuma yambula kwitezhawu hefuku jasabata?''
43006003 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Himunatang'i cheliliyi javiji, hatiyiliyi nzala hamu nanowu ajing'iyi nawuku, tahinji?
43006004 Heng'ililiyi mwitala jaNzambi, hakutambula mankenji akutenteka kumesu aNzambi, hakujya, hakwinkaku ninawa ajing'iyi nawu, ajing'i azhila, akujya ching'a atupristu hohu.
43006005 Hakuyila ninji, Mwana kaMuntu jiyi Mwanta waSabata.
43006006 HaSabata yacheng'i nawa, hakwing'ila mushikola nakutang'isha; mwajing'i muntu wakalepa wachikasa chachijiilu.
43006007 Ansoneki nawaFwarisewu hiyakumutala, amoni neyi wukuuka haSabata, kulonja amoni hakumwinkela mulong'a.
43006008 Yena welukili yitong'ozhoka yawu; hakumwila owu muntu wachikasa chakalepa ninji, Nyamukaku, wimani mukachi. Yena hakunyamuka, hakwimana mukachi.
43006009 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Nayihuli nami, haSabata chalong'a kwila chachiwahi, tahinji kwila chatama? kuhanjisha muntu, tahinji kumuzhaha?
43006010 Hakuyitala wezhima wawu kwi-njo, hakumwila owu muntu ninji, Ololaku chikasa cheyi. Olola nikwolola, chikasa chinji chikola nikukola.
43006011 Wena aswezha nikuzuwa, hiyakutiyang'ana muntu namukwawu mwakamukong'awu Yesu.
43006012 Wena mafuku owu hakuya hampiji nakulombela, hakuchiisha nakulombela kuji Nzambi wufuku wezhima.
43006013 Chikunachi hakutambika atumbanzhi twinji, hakutonjahu ikumi nayeji (12), hakuyitumba ninji apostolu.
43006014 Shimona hakumutumba izhina jikwawu ninji Petulu, namanakwinji Anjeri, Yakoba naYowanu, Fwilipu naBatolomewu,
43006015 Matewu naTomasi, Yakoba mwana kaAlafwewu naShimona atenang'awu nawu kaZeloti,
43006016 niYuja waYakoba, niYujasi Isakaroti jiyi wamufukezheli.

43006017 Hakukunkumuka nawu, hakwimana hesekana nezaza jawatumbanzhi twinji jajeni; niantu amavulu nankashi afumafumini mwahita Yujeya yezhima, nikuYerusalema, nikuchikumu chakalung'alwizhi chakuTira naSijoni, enzhili nakumutiya kulonja akayuuki ninyisong'u yawu.
43006018 Hakuuka ákabishilang'awu kuji aspiritu azonja.
43006019 Izaza jezhima hijikukeng'ang'a yowu kumukunka hohu; mulong'a muji yena mwejikilang'a ng'ovu yakuuka wezhima wawu.
43006020 Yena hakufumbula mesu inji haji atumbanzhi twinji, hakuyila ninji: Munakooleki enu atuzweng'i , mulong'a wanta waNzambi wunekali wenu.
43006021 Munakooleki enu muji nakutiya nzala katataka, mulong'a mwakekuta. Munakooleki enu muji nakujila katataka, mulong'a mwakaseha.
43006022 Munakooleki chakuyihelawu kuji antu, nichakuyikinzhikawu, nichakuyisawulawu, nichakuyitenawu nawu mwatama kukoola Mwana kaMuntu.
43006023 Kazang'alalenu jena ifuku oju, nikukiloka chikupu. Tiyenu, amba kayinka wulooku weneni mwiwulu, mulong'a jichi chayililuwu atuprofwetu kuji ankakulula.
43006024 Oyi yihung'u yimwamba kamona enu mwaheta! mulong'a anayikunjezhi jehi.
43006025 Oyi nzala yimwamba katiya enu munekuti katataka! Oyi yihung'u yimwamba kamonenu muji nakuseha katataka! mwamba kajila nikutumpa.
43006026 Oyi yihung'u yimwamba kamonenu aji nakuhamekawu kuji antu ezhima! mulong'a jichi chahamekeluwu atuprofwetu akutwamba kuji ankakulula.
43006027 Ilang'a enu muji nakutiya, nukuyilezha nami keng'enu ayilumbu zhenu, kong'enu chachiwahi antu akuyihela.
43006028 Antu akuyishing'a yikiswilenu nkisu; ákuyikong'a chatama yilombelelenu.
43006029 Muntu wukukweta kwikiji jimu, mwinki nijikwawu nawa; muntu wukukutambula chikowelu cheyi, atambuli nikahuma keyi nawa.
43006030 Yinkenung'a antu ezhima akuyilomba; muntu wukunona yuma yeyi, bayi wakamwihulayi nawa cheng'uku.
43006031 Mwomumukukeng'a antu kuyililenu ninenu nawa yililenu wena chochimu.
43006032 Neyi mukukeng'a áyikeng'enu hohu, akuyihamekela hajihi? Hela akwanshiji akeng'ang'a ayikeng'a nawa.
43006033 Neyi mukwilang'a chachiwahi awa akuyilenu chachiwahi hohu, akuyihamekela hajihi? jichi chelang'awu niakwanshiji.
43006034 Neyi mukusonjamishang'a antu nakuching'ezha nenu akayifuntishila cheng'i, akuyihamekela hajihi? Hela akwanshiji asonjamishang'a akwawu akwanshiji, atambuli cheng'i yayinkeluwu.

43006035 Ilang'a keng'enu ayilumbu zhenu, ilenung'a chachiwahi, sonjamishenung'a chakaji kwakama; wulooku wenu wakatoha, mwakekala nianyana kaMukwakubajika; mulong'a yena watiyilang'a luwi niantu abulang'a kusakilila, niatama.
43006036 Ikalenu akwaluwi neyi chekalayi Tata yenu mukwaluwi.

43006037 Bayi musompeshang'a akwenuku, kulonja ninenu akabuli kuyisompesha. Bayi mutanyishang'a akwenuku, kulonja ninenu nawa akabuli kuyitanyisha. Anakenenung'a akwenu, kulonja akayanakeni ninenu nawa.

43006038 Inkenung'a, kulonja ninenu nawa akayinki; chesekelu chakushikizha chakunyikumuna, chenja chisumpoka, akayinki muwutambwilu wenu. Mulong'a chesekelu chimukuyesekela akwenu, jichi chakayesekelawu ninenu nawa.
43006039 Hakuyitila nawa chishimu ninji, Mputamesu wukutwesha kulombola mukwawu mputamesu, tahinji? Mwayeji wawu hiyakukulukila mwibukuku?
43006040 Kambanzhi habajikang'a nkulung'ang'a yinjuku; ilang'a muntu himuntu neyi najizi jehi, wukwesekana nankulung'ang'a yinji.
43006041 Wukutalilaji kachibalu kanalakumukili mujisu jamanakweyi, hakwila ipulang'a jiji mujisu jeyeyi aweni hiwunajilukuku?

43006042 Inji eyi wukutwesha kumwila manakweyi ng'ahi neyi, Eyi manakwami, tali nikutumbuli kachibalu kanalakumukili mujisu jeyi; hakwila ipulang'a jiji mujisu jeyeyi aweni hiwunajilukuku? Eyi mfwikizhi, sambilaku kufumisha ipulang'a jiji mujisu jeyeyi aweni, mwaka winzi wumoni kutumbula chachiwahi kachibalu kanalakumukili mujisu jamanakweyi.
43006043 Hikwekala mutonju wawuwahi wasong'ang'a nyikabu yatamaku; hela mutonju watama hiwasong'ang'a nawa nyikabu yayiwahuku.

43006044 Mulong'a nyitonju yezhima ayilukilang'a kwokunyikabu yayu, iwu nanyikabu yawu, iwu nanyikabu yawu. Antu hiyakumunang'a mawunju achikuyu kunying'aku; hiyakumunang'a nyikabu yavinyu kuchikwataku.
43006045 Muntu wamuwahi wukwijisha nawa yuma yayiwahi yaswekayi mumuchima winji; muntu watama wukwijisha nawa yoyuma yatama, mulong'a kanwa kinji kahoshang'a yoyuma yalumbama mumuchima.
43006046 Mwantenenang'aji nenu, Mwanta, Mwanta; hakwila yuma yinahoshang'a himwayilang'aku?
43006047 Ezhima akwinza nakutiya mazu inahoshang'a, hiyakwilamu, tiyenu niyilezhi anafwanuwu.

43006048 Anafwani neyi muntu watung'ili itala, wapunjili chakunama, hakusha chikuku helola. Chenzhili jibazhi, chezhi hichikweta hetaloju, hichatwesheli kujinyinkeshaku, mulong'a ajitung'ilili helola.

43006049 Hakwila wátiyang'a chakaji kwilamu, nafwani neyi muntu watung'ili itala hamaseki chakaji kwala chikuku. Chezhi chichineti italoju, hohenohu jihumuka nikuhumuka buvu; kuhumuka kwetaloju kwaswezheli kutoha.
43007001 Chelili nakumishi jehi kuhosha yihosha yinji yezhima kumatu awantu, hakuya muKaperinamu.
43007002 Mukulumpi wamashijika wumu wajing'i nanjung'u yinji aswezheliyi kukeng'ayi nankashi, wakatili hakukeng'a kufwa.
43007003 Chanatiyiyi mpuhu yaYesu, hakumutemeshela akulumpi zhawaYujeya, kulonja enzi nakuhanjisha njung'u yinji.
43007004 Wena chanashikuwu kuji Yesu, hiyakumulembelela nankashi nawu, Himuntu watela kumwilila chumichi kujeyi;
43007005 mulong'a wakeng'a munza wetu, jiyi nawa watutung'ilili shikola yetu.

43007006 Yesu hakuya nawu. Chanashikiyi kwakwihi netala, owu mukulumpi wamashijika hakutemeshaku amabwambu zhinji akamwili nawu, Eyi Mwanta, bayi wujikabakeshaku, mulong'a ami hinimuntu wakutela kwing'ileyi mwitala jamuku.
43007007 jichi chinabuli kwinza ami aweni kujeyi, najimoni nami ami hinimuntu wakutela kwinza kujeyuku; jichi ahoshi mwani kwezu hohu, mukwenzi wami wukukola.

43007008 Mulong'a ninami nawa nimuntu nikweti anyanta zhami, hela ami aweni nikweti mashijika ang'ovwahilang'a. Nelang'a iwu nami, Yang'a; hakuya. Mukwawu nami, Inzang'a; hakwinza. Njung'u yami nami, Ilaku chumichi; hakuchila.

43007009 Yesu chanatiyiyi yumiyi hakumuhayama, hakushetumuka, hakwila izaza jajing'i nakumulonjela ninji, Nayilezhi nami, kanja nimonang'ahu jehi kukuhwelela kwaswezha chikumahichuku, chalala hela muIsarela mwamweni.
43007010 Owu atemesheluwu, chanafuntuwu kwitala, hiyakuwana owu njung'u nakoli jehi.
43007011 Chihanalehi chanti, hakuya kumukala wumu izhina jawu Nena; wayili niatumbanzhi twinji, niizaza jeneni.
43007012 Chanashikiyi kwakwihi nachisu chamukala, kutala anatembeki mufu, himwana weyala wasemuka kankawinji, mama yinji wajing'i mfwila nawa; hiyakumutwalaku kuji antu amavulu ahamukalowu.
43007013 Mwanta chanamumoniyi, hakumutiyila wushona, hakumwila ninji, Bayi wujilaku.
43007014 Hakuswila kwakwihi hakukunka kumutembu; átembekeli hiyakwimana ku-ka. Hakwila ninji, Eyi mukwenzi, nakwili nami hinjukaku.
43007015 Owu wafwili ashakama nikushakama, atachika nikuhosha; hakumwinkayi mama yinji.
43007016 Woma wuyikwata niwezhima wawu; hiyakumuhameka Nzambi nawu, Mukachi ketu munamwekani jehi kaprofwetu muneni. Cheng'i nawa nawu, Nzambi nenzi jehi nakutala antu inji.
43007017 Mpuhu yinji yitiyakana nimwahita Yujeya yezhima, nikumutamba wezhimowu.
43007018 Atumbanzhi twaYowanu hiyakumulezha Yowanu yuma yezhimiyi.
43007019 Yowanu hakutambika atumbanzhi twinji ayeji, hakuyitemesha kuji Mwanta amwihuli nawu, Eyi yeyi elang'awu nawu wakenza, tahinji tutalili wacheng'i?
43007020 Wenowu amayala chanashikuwu kuji Yesu, hiyakumwila nawu, Yowanu Nzhimiki natutemeshi nakukwihuleyi ninji, Yeyi elang'awu nawu wakenza, tahinji tutalili wacheng'i?
43007021 Yena mpinzhi oyu hakukolesha niantu amavulu ajing'i nanyisong'u, niajing'i nayipupu, niajing'i nawaspiritu atama, hakutonesha niamputamesu amavulu.

43007022 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Yenu mwakamulezhi Yowanu yuma yimunamoni niniyi yimunatiyi; amputamesu hiyakutona, akwakubalakata hiyakwenja chachiwahi, akwambumba hiyakutooka, azhika matu hiyakutiya, afu hiyakuyisang'ula, atuzweng'i hiyakuyishimwina nsang'u yayiwahi.
43007023 Muntu nabuli kumona mujami nsang'u yakumujimbwisha nakooleki.
43007024 Chineli antemesha zhaYowanu anayi jehi, hakutachika kuhosha namazaza awantu nsang'u yaYowanu ninji, Mwayili nakutalaji muchinkalampata? Iteti jatepokang'a nampepela, tahinji?
43007025 Mwayili nenu mwakamoniji? Muntu navwali mahina amawahi, tahinji? Ávwalang'a yawanta, álung'ang'a, wowu ekalang'a muyipang'u yawanyanta ankanu.
43007026 Mwayili nenu mwakamoniji? Kaprofwetu, tahinji? Eng'a, nayilezhi nami hikaprofwetu wabajika nankashi atuprofwetu ezhima.
43007027 jiyi yeniwu asonekeluwu nawu, Tiya, nukutemesha ntemesha yami kuwukuya, Akalong'eshang'ahu jehi nzhila yeyi kumbiji kuwakaya.
43007028 Tiyenu niyilezhi, ánavwaliki kuji ambanja, hosi niwumu wamubajika Yowanuku; ilang'a muntu nakehi muwanta waNzambi namubajiki yena.
43007029 Chanachitiyuwu, antu ezhima niansonkeshi azhimikawu jehi nachizhimikilu chaYowanu, hiyakumwitezha Nzambi nawu walong'a.
43007030 Hakwila aFwarisewu nawakwanshimbi, chalekeluwu kuyizhimika kuji Yowanu, alekeli mpúng'a yayifuukwililuwu kuji Nzambi.
43007031 Yena ninji, Awa antu achisakichi nukuyifwikizha neyi anyi? Anafwani neyi anyi?
43007032 Anafwani neyi atwansi ashakama kuwulanjilu akujitambeka nawu, Tunayimbili mahululu, enu kuhang'ana nehi; Tunatumpi, enu kujila nehi.
43007033 Mulong'a Yowanu Nzhimiki nenzi chakaji kujya mankenji, hela kunwa vinyu, enu nenu wukweti njemoni.
