43007034 Mwana kaMuntu nenzi nakujya nakunwa, enu nenu, Talenu, muntu wafwa hakujya, wanwang'a vinyu, ibwambu jawansonkeshi nawakwanshiji.
43007035 jichi maana amuying'ishang'a nawanyaninji ezhima.
43007036 KaFwarisewu wumu wamwilili Yesu ninji enzi nakujya kwitala jinji. Yesu hakwing'ila mwitala janowu kaFwarisewu, hakushakama nakujya.
43007037 Kumukalowu kwajing'i mumbanja mukwanshiji, chelukiliyi ninji Yesu nashakami nakujya mwitala jakaFwarisewu, hakuleta manzhi evumba jajiwahi amuchipunja chelola jalubanzhi.
43007038 Hakwimana kunyima nakujila kumajatilu aYesu, hakuwelesha majatilu aYesu namajilu inji, hakuyikombola nansuki zhinji, hakupwepuzhola kumajatilu inji, hakuyiwayisha wenowu manzhi.
43007039 Chanachimoniyi owu kaFwarisewu wamutambikili kwitala jinji, hakuhosha mumuchima winji ninji, Iwu neyi hikaprofwetu, mutenowu neluki chajiyi iwu mumbanja mukwanshiji namukunki.
43007040 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Eyi Shimona, niji nakajizu kakuhosha naneyi. Yena ninji, Hoshang'a Nkulung'ang'a.
43007041 Ninji, Kwajing'i akwanyikuji ayeji ajiili yambala yamukwakusonjamisha wumu; iwu wajiili mukuji wankulakazhi zhitanu (500) zhamali, mukwawu wamakumi atanu (50).
43007042 Mwayeji wawu chanakang'anyuwu zhakufuta, hakuyanakena tuhu kwinji. Wukubajika kumukeng'a nankashi wumwojihi?
43007043 Shimona hakumwakula ninji, Natong'ozhoki nami owu aanakeneniyi yayivulu. Yesu hakumwila ninji, Wunahoshi mwalala.

43007044 Hakushetumukila kwajing'i owu mumbanja, hakumwila Shimona ninji, Wunamoni iwu mumbanja? Ami neng'ili mwitala jeyi, eyi kunyinka menzhi akunwelesha kunyenju yami nehi, hakwila iwu mumbanja naweleshi majatilu ami namajilu inji, nayikomboli nansuki zhinji.
43007045 Eyi kumpwepuzhola nehi, hakwila iwu mumbanja, kufumisha hineng'ila hanaleki kupwepuzhola kumajatilu amuku.
43007046 Eyi kunwayisha manzhi kumutu wami nehi, hakwila iwu mumbanja nawayishi majatilu ami manzhi evumba jajiwahi.
43007047 jichi nukukulezha nami nshiji zhinji zhazhivulu anamwanakenizhu; jihu hanafumi kunkeng'a nankashi. Hakwila muntu anaanakenuwu yantesha, wukukeng'a nawa chantesha.
43007048 Hakumwila owu mumbanja ninji, Nshiji zheyi anazhanakeni.
43007049 Antu ashakamini nakujya, hiyakutachika kuhosha munyichima yawu nawu, Iwu muntu wukwanakena nshiji, jiyinyi?
43007050 Yena hakumwila owu mumbanja ninji, Kukuhwelela kweyi kunakwamwini jehi; yang'a nakuwunja.
43008001 Chihanalehi chanti, Yesu hakuya nakuhitahita nimunyikala yamaneni nimunyikala yanyanya, hakuyishimwina nikuyitwela nsang'u yayiwahi yawanta waNzambi, hamu nekumi nayeji (12),
43008002 niambanja amakwawu okayi jehi aspiritu atama, niyikatu; Mariya atenang'awu nawu Manjaleni, mwafumini anjemoni atanu nayeji;
43008003 niYowana ing'ojaChuza nhembi yaHeroji, niSuzana, niakwawu amavulu ajing'i nakumukalakela namahetawu.
43008004 Chikunapompi izaza jajeni, niantu amunyikala yamaneni ezhima chanapompeluwu kuji yena, hakuyitila chishimu, ninji,
43008005 Mukwakukuwa wayili nakukuwa mbutu yinji. Chakuwiliyi, yikwawu yaholokeleli kunsa yanzhila, hiyakuyijata nanyenju, hiyakuyijya kuji atuja ahaluzwizu.
43008006 Yikwawu yaholokeleli hamalola, chiyinabaluki hohenohu yuma nikuuma, mulong'a yabulili menzhi.
43008007 Yikwawu yaholokeleli munying'a, nying'a hiyikukulila hamu nambutu, hiyikuyizhika.
43008008 Yikwawu yaholokeleli hamaseki amawahi, hiyikukula hiyikusong'a, yajing'i ihebi jimu hiyikwikala nkulakazhi (100). Chanahoshiyi yumiyi hakubijika ninji, Yowu wukweti matu akutiya atiyi.
43008009 Atumbanzhi twinji hiyakumwihula mwaya chishimu ichi.

43008010 Yena hakuyila ninji, Enu anayitezhi kwiluka nsang'u zhawanta waNzambi zhazhinjawu, hakwila kuji acheng'i yiji muyishimu hohu, kulonja Hela akumona, abuli kumona zhiika, Kutiya, akutiya kushinshikamu nehi.
43008011 jichi tiyenu mwaya chishimu ichi. Mbutu hiizu jaNzambi.
43008012 Yákunsa yanzhila wowu antu akwila chakuyitiyawu, jiyabolu hakwinza nakuhukula mazu munyichima yawu, akenja kukuhwelela hiyakwamwinewa.
43008013 Yáhamalola, wowu antu akwila chakuyitiyawu, hiyakutambula izu namuzang'alu; wena muzhi nehi, akwitiya kampinzhi kanti, chakamonawu yuma yakuyeseka, hiyakusenukamu.
43008014 Yáholokeleli munying'a, wowu antu akwila chakutiyawu, hiyakujiyila kwawu; kwakama, nimaheta, nikutiya kuwaha nayuma yawumi wunu, hiyikuyizhika, kusong'a chalala nehi.
43008015 Yáhamaseki amawahi, wowu antu atiyang'a izu namuchima wawu wawuwahi walumbuluka, hiyakujikwata nang'ovu, hiyakusong'a nikutatakenamu chikupu.
43008016 Muntu habutulang'a inong'u ajisweka mwihebi hela muchaliluku, wajishang'a hawimenu kulonja antu akwing'ila mwitala akamoni to-o.
43008017 Mulong'a hikwekala chuma chabutang'awu chikubula kumwekana hatookaku; hela chuma chakuzhinja chikubula kutiyakanaku, chikwijika hatooka.
43008018 jichi babelenu chimukutiya; mulong'a muntu wukweti jiyi akwinkawu; muntu wabula, akamutambula aka kanamoniyi ninji wuji naku.
43008019 Kuji yena hikukwinza mama yinji nawanakwinji, hiyakukang'anya kushika kuji yena naluntu lwajing'uku.
43008020 Hiyakumulezha nawu, Mama yeyi nawanakweyi anemani hanzi, anakukeng'i.
43008021 Hakuyakula ninji, Mama yami nawanakwami wowawa akutiya izu jaNzambi hiyakwilamu.
43008022 Wena mafuku owu, ifuku jimu hakwing'ila muwatu wumu, niyomweni niatumbanzhi twinji. Hakuyila ninji, Tuzambukenu kwishinaji jezhiya; ashinzhika niwatu.
43008023 Chajing'i nakuyenjeshawu kuji mpepela yena aya nimutulu; hezhiya hihakukunka mpepela yaswezha ng'ovu, watu hiwukuya nakwinzala menzhi, hiyakukeng'a kufwa.
43008024 Hiyakwinza nakumuhinjwisha nawu, Mwanta, Mwanta, tunafwi! Hakuhinjuka, hakuhoshola mpepela nimenzhi ajing'i nakubwankang'ila, amwena ninzo-o, kúwunja nibe-te-te-e.
43008025 Hakuyila ninji, Kukuhwelela kwenu kwokujihi? Atiya niwoma, hiyakujihayamina, hiyakujila wumu namukwawu nawu, Yeniwu akwovwahilawu kuji mpepela nimenzhi hinyi?
43008026 Ashika nikwitung'a jawaGeraseni, jomba mesu kung'aliliya.

43008027 Chanafumiyi muwatu, hiyakumubulakana kuji iyala wuji nakufuma mumukalowu, wukweti anjemoni; halekeliyi kuvwala mahina hela kushakama mwitala haleha jehi chacheni, ching'a kushakama kumazhamu hohu.
43008028 Chanamumoniyi Yesu, hakukaluka, hakujinata kumesu inji, hakubijika nang'ovu, ninji, Nikweti nsang'winyi naneyi Yesu Mwana kaNzambi Mukwakubajika? Nalembi, bayi wunkabishaku.

43008029 Mulong'a henohu wamwila jehi yenowu spiritu wazonja ninji fumaku muji muntu. Mulong'a wamukwatilang'a kakavulu; wajing'i muntu wakuhemba kuji akwawu hohu, wakukasa namaleng'i nimpompa zhayikung'u; chakukotolayi yena yumoyu, hiyakumupwapwila mumasang'a kuji njemoni.
43008030 Yesu hakumwihula ninji, Izhina jeyi yeyinyi? Ninji, Yami Mazaza; mulong'a muji yena mweng'ila anjemoni amavulu.
43008031 Hiyakumulembelela nawu, Bayi wutuhang'ila mwikelaku.
43008032 Kwenoku kwajing'i izanvu jawang'ulu ajing'i nakujiila hampiji, hiyakumulembelela nawu ayitezhi kwing'ila muji ang'ulu. Hakuyitezha.
43008033 Anjemoni afuma nimuji muntu, eng'ila nimuji ang'ulu; izanvu jawang'ulu janjuka nikwanjuka, hijikuya mwakunkumuka nankashi, nimwizhiya chu-u, afwa nimumenzhi.
43008034 Áyijiishilang'a chanachimonuwu, hiyakutemuka, hiyakuya nakulezha antu ajing'i mumukala nilung'oju.

43008035 Hiyakuya nawu atali chuma chinamwekani; chanenzuwu kuji Yesu, hiyakuwana owu muntu múnafumi anjemoni, nashakami jehi kunyenju yaYesu, navwali chachiwahi, maaninji anamufuntili jehi; atiya niwoma.
43008036 Antu achimweni hiyakulezha akwawu chanamukoleshuwu owu wajing'ilang'a nanjemoni.
43008037 Antu ajing'i kumutamba wetung'a jawaGeraseni ezhima hiyakumwila Yesu nawu afumuku; mulong'a woma wunaswezhi jehi kuyikwata; yena hakwing'ila muwatu hakufunta cheng'i kwafumayi.
43008038 Owu iyala múnafumi anjemoni, hakumulembelela ninji niyang'a neyi; ilang'a yena hakumufuntisha,
43008039 ninji, Funtaku kumukala weyi wulezhi akwenu yuma yanakwililiyi Nzambi kutoha. Hakuya nakutiyakesha mumukala wezhima yuma yamwilililiyi Yesu kutoha.
43008040 Chafuntiliyi Yesu, izaza hijikumushikizha chachiwahi, mulong'a wezhima wawu ajing'i nakumutalila.
43008041 Kutala hikukwinza iyala izhina jinji zhayirusa nyuuli yashikola, hakujinatila kunyenju yaYesu, hakumulembelela ninji ayi kwitala jinji;
43008042 mulong'a wajing'i namwaninji wamumbanja wumu hohu, wanyaka kafwampi ikumi nayiyeji (12), hakukeng'a kufwa. Hajing'i nakuyayi, mazaza awantu hiyakumushinzheka.
43008043 Mumbanja wumu wapwekelang'a mashi nyaka ikumi nayiyeji (12), wamanisha jehi yuma yinji yezhima kuji ayimbuki, kutwesha kumuuka nehi,
43008044 hakwinza kunyima yaYesu, hakukunka kumukunjulu wehina jinji; hohenohu mashi inji apwekelang'a oma nichawu.
43008045 Yesu hakwihula ninji Anankunki kujinyi? Chajikaliluwu antu ezhima, Petulu nawakwawu ajing'i ninji hiyakwila nawu, Mwanta, mazaza enja akushinzheka nikukuhumahuma.
43008046 Yesu hakwila ninji, Haji muntu nankunki; mulong'a neluki nami, mujami munafumi ng'ovu.

43008047 Owu mumbanja, chanamoniyi nakang'anyi jehi kubatama, hakwinza nakuzaala, hakujinata hamaseki kumesu inji, hakushimuna hatooka kumesu awantu ezhima nsang'u yamukunkililiyi, ninichi chanakoliyi jehi hohenohu.
43008048 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Mwanami, kukuhwelela kweyi kunakukoleshi jehi; yang'a nakuwunja.
43008049 Iku wuchiji kuhosha, kwitala janyuuli yashikola hikukufuma muntu hakumulezha ninji, Mwaneyi nafwi jehi; bayi wumukabisha Nkulung'ang'aku.
43008050 Yesu chanachitiyiyi, hakumwakula ninji, Bayi wutiya womaku; kuminaku jakukuhwelela hohu, wukukola kwinji.
43008051 Chanashikiyi kwitala, hetezheli kwing'ilamu namuntu wacheng'uku, ching'a aPetulu naYowanu niYakoba, nitata yamwana namama yinji.
43008052 Ajing'i nakumujila nikutumpa kuji antu ezhima; yena hakuyila ninji, Bayi mujilaku; hanafuku, wuji mutulu.
43008053 Hiyakumuseha chakumujiwula, mulong'a amumweni nafwi chikupu.
43008054 Yena hakumukwata kuchikasa, hakumutambika ninji, Eyi mwana, nyamukaku.
43008055 Wumi winji wufunta nikufunta, yohinjuka nihohenohu; Yesu hakuyila ninji, Mwinkenu yakujya.
43008056 Anvwali zhinji hiyakuhayama nankashi; hakuyikonkomwena ninji, Bayi mulezha muntu chumichuku.
43009001 Hakutambika ikumi nayeji (12) hamu, hakuyinka ng'ovu niwanta wakufumisha anjemoni ezhima nikuuka nyisong'u.
43009002 Hakuyitemesha nakushimuna wanta waNzambi, nikuuka akata.
43009003 Hakuyila ninji, Bayi musenja yuma yakuya nachu munzhila yenuku; hela mukombu, hela ipakumuna, hela yakujya, hela mali; hela kwikala nayikowelu yiyeji.
43009004 Itala jimwakeng'ila mwakashakama mwomwenomu, jiku nawa kumwakanyamukila.
43009005 Antu akabula kuyitambula, chimwakanyamuka mumukalowu, mwakajikumuna lunkung'u luji kunyenju yenu, kulonja lwinzi lwakayikonkololi.
43009006 Hiyakunyamuka, hiyakuya nakushimuna nsang'u yayiwahi mwahita nyikala yezhima, nikuuka hamu.
43009007 Mwanta Heroji chanatiyiyi yuma yeliluwu yezhima, hakuswezha kuzhinoka; mulong'a amakwawu elili nawu Yowanu nasang'uki muji afu;
43009008 amakwawu nawu Elizha jiyi namwekani jehi; acheng'i nawu kaprofwetu wakunyaka jiyi nasang'uki.
43009009 Kuchinka Heroji ninji, Yowanu yowu naketwili jehi mutu, inji iwu niji nakutiya nsang'u izhi hinyi? Hakukeng'a ninji amumoni.
43009010 Apostolu chanafuntuwu, hiyakumulezha yuma yeliluwu. Hakuyitwala kumbaji kwakwihi namukala weneni wumu, izhina jawu Beteseja.
43009011 Mazaza awantu chanachimonuwu hiyakumulonjela; hakuyishikizha chachiwahi, hakuhosha nawu zhawanta waNzambi, ákeng'eli kuyuuka hakuyuuka.

43009012 Chelili itang'wa hijikuya nakuteng'uluka, ikumi nayeji (12) hiyakwinza nakumwila nawu, Mwang'aku izaza jawantu, ayi mutunyikala nimumalung'a aji kwakwihi, akamuku, kulonja akajipawili yakujya yawu, mulong'a munu tuji kwakulehi nanyikala.
43009013 Yena hakuyila ninji, Yinkenu yakujya enu aweni. Wena hiyakumwila nawu, Tuji namankenji atanu ninshi zhiyeji hohu, kwizhi tuyi nakulanjila izaza jezhima yakujya.
43009014 Mulong'a amayala ezhima ajing'i kafwampi neyi makombakazhi atanu (5,000). Yena hakuyila atumbanzhi twinji ninji, Yilezhenu ashakami aha makumi atanu (50), aha makumi atanu (50).
43009015 Ela nimwenomu, ayishakamisha niwezhima wawu.
43009016 Hakutambula owu mankenji atanu, ninozhu inshi zhiyeji, hakutala mwiwulu, hakukiswilahu nkisu, hakuyihumuna; hakuyinka atumbanzhi enki izaza jawantu.
43009017 Ajiili, ekutili wezhima wawu. Yibalu yasheluku, hiyakuyinona mahebi ikumi nayeji (12).
43009018 Chajing'iyi Yesu nakulombela kwakankawinji, atumbanzhi hiyakwinza kuji yena; hakuyihula ninji, Mazaza elang'a nawu yaminyi?
43009019 Wena hiyakwakula nawu, Amakwawu elang'a nawu yeyi Yowanu Nzhimiki; amakwawu nawu yeyi Elizha; acheng'i nawu kaprofwetu wakunyaka wumu jiyi nasang'uki.
43009020 Yena hakuyila ninji, Inji enu aweni mwelang'a nenu yaminyi? Petulu hakwakula ninji, Yeyi Kristu waNzambi.
43009021 Yena hakuyilezha nang'ovu ninji, Bayi mulezha muntuku;
43009022 mulong'a Mwana kaMuntu ching'a yokaba yuma yayivulu, ching'a akamuleka kuji akulumpi, nikuji akulumpi zhawatupristu, nikuji ansoneki, akamuzhaha, akamusang'ula hetang'wa jamuchisatu.
43009023 Hakuyila wezhima wawu ninji, Muntu wukukeng'a kunlonjami, ajibonji yomweni, anyamunang'a kulusu yinji hefuku hefuku, anlonjelami.
43009024 Mulong'a muntu wukukeng'a kuhemba wumi winji, jiyi wakawuzhimbesha, hakwila wúkuzhimbeshela wumi winji hamuzhimba wamami, jiyi wakawuhemba.
43009025 Mulong'a muntu, hela naheti matung'a ezhima ajizhimbesha yomweni nakukisika, wukujiilaku chumanyi?
43009026 Mulong'a muntu wukuntiyami nimazu ami nsonyi, niMwana kaMuntu nawa wakamutiya yena nsonyi hakenzayi mulubanzhi lwakulema kwinji yomweni, nilwaTata yinji nilwawang'elu azhila.
43009027 Tiyenu niyilezhi mwalala nami, awa amakwawu anemani kunu, hiyakusambilang'ahu jehi kumona kufwaku, ching'a anamoni wanta waNzambi.
43009028 Chelili munahiti jehi mafuku atanu nasatu nanohu hahosheliyi yumiyi, hakutwala aPetulu naYowanu niYakoba, hakukanjuka nawu hampiji kulonja alombeli.
43009029 Hajing'i nakulombelayi, kumesu inji hikukubalumuka mwacheng'i hohu, mahininji hiyakuswezha kutooka, kutwesha kutalaku nehi.
43009030 Kutala hakuhanzhika nawamayala ayeji, jiwu aMosi naElizha;
43009031 hiyakumwekana mulubanzhi lwakulema, hiyakutena kufwa kwinji kwakuYerusalema kwakukeng'a kufumayi nachu hamaseki.
43009032 Petulu nawakwawu ajing'iyi nawu kwakunong'oka tulu hohu. Chanatonuwu chikupu, hiyakumona lubanzhi lwakulema kwinji, niwenowu amayala ayeji emeniyi nawu.

43009033 Cheliluwu hiyakwambuka ninji, Petulu hakumwila Yesu ninji, Mwanta chachiwahi chituji kunu; tutung'i yisolu yisatu; chimu cheyeyi, chimu chaMosi, chikwawu chaElizha; helukili ninimu mwahoshelang'ayuku.
43009034 Iku wuchiji kuhosha mazu awa, ivu hijikwinza nakuyizeng'amina, atiya niwoma ochu chaneng'iluwu mwivu.
43009035 Mwivu himukufuma izu nawu, jiyi Mwanami nakeng'a, mutiyililenu yena.
43009036 Izu chijinamweni, hiyakumona kwaYesu hohu kankawinji. Amwena ninzo-o; wena mafuku owu hiyalezheli muntu yuma yamwenuwuku.
43009037 Chikunachi chaneluwu anakunkumuki jehi mwishina jampiji, izaza jeneni hijikwinza nakumukinkilila.
43009038 Mwizaza himukubijika muntu wumu ninji, Eyi Nkulung'ang'a, nalembi mwani wuntalili mwanami, mulong'a himwanami wumu hohu;
43009039 amukwatang'a kuji spiritu, kukasumuka hakukaloka; hakumukonyesha, hakwijisha nimafulolu kukanwa, hakumuchika nankashi, kumufuma swayi nehi.
43009040 Nayilembelela atumbanzhi tweyi nami amufumishi; akang'anya.
43009041 Yesu hakwakula ninji, Enu antu akuchisakichi, mwabula kukuhwelela, mwaheng'a, nyaka yinukwikala nanenu nakukabakana nanenu ying'ahi? Muleti mwaneyi kunu.
43009042 Iku wuchiji kwinza, njemoni amunata nihamaseki, hakumukonyesha nankashi. Yesu hakuhoshola spiritu wazonja, yomuuka ninowu mwana, amufuntisha nikuji tata yinji.
43009043 Antu ezhima hiyakuhayama ng'ovu yawanta waNzambi yinamwekani.
43009044 ninji, Tong'ozhokenu chachiwahi mazu inukukeng'a kuyilezha, nami, Mwana kaMuntu akamulubula kumakasa awantu.
43009045 Wena kwiluka izu oju nehi, ayizhinjiliju kulonja abuli kushinshika mujaya; hiyakutiya woma wakumwihulaju.
43009046 Mukachi kawu himukuvulumuka ntaji yakwila nawu nabajiki akwawu hinyi?
43009047 Yesu chanamoniyi muji nakutong'ozhokawu munyichima yawu, hakunona mwana wanyanya, hakumwimika kwakwihi nachikasa chinji;
43009048 hakuyila ninji, Muntu wúkutambula mwana wanyanyiwu mwizhina jami nantambulami; wukuntambulami natambuli niyena wantemesheli; muntu nakehi mukachi kenwenu ezhima, jiyi muneni.
43009049 Yowanu hakwakula ninji, Mwanta, twamona muntu wuji nakufumisha anjemoni mwizhina jeyi; twamulekesha mulong'a hekalang'a nanetuku.
43009050 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Bayi mumulekeshaku; mulong'a wábula kuyihela jiyi mwinenu.
43009051 Chelili mafuku akumutambula mwiwulu hiyakukeng'a kushika, atalisha nimesu nimuchima winji munzhila yakuya kuYerusalema.
43009053 Hakutemeshang'ahu jehi antemesha kwakuyayi; hiyakuya, eng'ila nimumukala wawaSamariya wumu, nawu amulong'esheli kwakushikena.
43009052 Ilang'a wena kumutambula nehi, nanochu chamwenuwu mesu inji anatali kuYerusalema.
43009054 Chanachimonuwu, atumbanzhi twinji aYakoba naYowanu hiyakumwila Mwanta nawu, Wunakeng'i tutambiki kesi kaholoki mwiwulu kayizhilishi neyi cheliliyi Elizha, tahinji?
43009055 Yena hakushetumuka, hakuyihoshola ninji, Himweluka chekala spiritu yenuku.
43009056 Mwana kaMuntu henzhili nakuzhilisha antuku, wenzhili nakuyamwina. Hiyakuya kumukala wukwawu.
43009057 Hayilang'awu munzhila, muntu wumu hakumwila ninji, Nukukulonjang'a kwezhima kuwukuya.
43009058 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Anyumbu akweti menawu, niatuja ahaluzwizu akweti yisakala yawu; hakwila Mwana kaMuntu hakweti hakusachila mutu winjuku.
43009059 Hakumwila muntu mukwawu ninji, Nlonjang'a; ilang'a yena ninji, Mwanta, nleki nisambili kuya nakazhiiki tata yami.
43009060 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Yileki afu azhiiki afu zhawu awenawu; eyi yang'a nakushimuzhola wanta waNzambi.
43009061 Mukwawu niyena nawa hakumwila ninji, Mwanta, nukukulonja; nleki niyi nakashaliki akwetala jami.
43009062 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Muntu wukwila nakwati jehi kwitemwa jiji nakukokawu ang'ombi, hakutala hanyima, hanateli wanta waNzambuku.

43010001 Kulonjela hayumiyi, hakutonja amakwawu makumi atanu nayeji (70), hakuyitemeshang'ahu jehi kumbiji, ayeji ayeji, kwahita nyikala yamaneni yezhima, nimwitung'a jezhima mwakukeng'a kuyayi yomweni.
43010002 Hakuyila ninji, Mbutu yinahi yayivulu, ilang'a akwakukalakala anakehi. jichi lombelenu kuji Mwanta jiyi mukwakwang'ula, atemeshi akwakukalakala kumujimu wakwang'ula mbutu yinji.
43010003 Yenung'a kwenu; tiyenu, chiji neyi niji nakutemesha anyana kanyikoku mukachi kawatung'wiji.
43010004 Bayi musenja hela chikwama, hela ipakumuna, hela nkwabiluku; bayi mwimusha muntu munzhilaku.
43010005 Itala jimwakeng'ila, mwakasambila kwilamu nenu, Mwitaliji mwikali kuwunja.
43010006 Neyi muji muntu wawunja, kuwunja kwenu kwakekala haji yena; neyi nehi, kuwunja kwenu kwakafunta cheng'i kujenu aweni.
43010007 Itala jimwakashakama, kajyenu nikunwa yuma yakayinkawu yezhima, mulong'a mukwakukalakala nateli wulooku winji. Bayi mwakatuntuzhoka mufuma italiji muya itala jacheng'uku.
43010008 Nyikala yezhima yimwakeng'ila yakayitambulawu, kajyenu yuma yezhima yakayinkawu;
43010009 kayuukenu akata ajumu; kayilenu nenu, Wanta waNzambi wunenzi jehi kwakwihi nanenu.
43010010 Hakwila nyikala yezhima yimwakeng'ila yakabula kuyitambulawu, mwakayi munyikwakwa yayu,
43010011 mwakayili nenu, Tunayijikumwini nilunkung'u lwakumukala wenu lunalamati kunyenju yetu. Hela chochu, ilukenu nenu wanta waNzambi wunenzi jehi kwakwihi.
43010012 Tiyenu niyilezhi, hefuku jakusompesha, yihung'u yakamona mukalowu yakabajika yihung'u yakamonawu akwaSojoma.

43010013 Oyi yihung'u yiwakamoneyi Korazini! Oyi yihung'u yiwakamoneyi Beteseja! Nyijimu yang'ovu yaneliluwu mujenu, neyi ayililili muTira naSijoni, mutenowu abalumukili jehi munyichima yawu, ashakama jehi nimumawuti avwala jehi niyikeleyi.
43010014 Hakusompesha, ihung'u jaTira naSijoni jakakuminamu, jenwenu jakabajika.
43010015 Eyi Kaperinamu, nineyi nawa akakutúmbakesha chashika nikwiwulu, tahinji? Akakukunkumwisha mukalung'a.
43010016 Muntu wukutiyenu nantiymi, wukulekenu nanlekami, wukunlekami naleki yena wantemesheli
43010017 Owu makumi atanu nayeji (70) hiyakufunta namuzang'alu nawu, Mwanta, hela anjemoni aweni, kuyitenena izhina jeyi anatwovwahili.
43010018 Hakuyila ninji, Namweni Satana kuholoka kwiwulu neyi chikwanzazhi.
43010019 Tiyenu, nayinki wanta wakujata nihatupela nihatunzhimbu, nayinki wanta wakufwomona ng'ovu yachilumbu yezhima; hikuji chuma chakayikatisha hela hantuku.
43010020 Hela chochu, bayi muzang'alala nanochu chanayovwahiluwu kuji anjemonuku; ilang'a zang'alalenu nanochu chanasonekuwu mazhinenu mwiwulu.

43010021 Hampinzhi oyu, Yesu nenzali namuzang'alu wakufuma kuji Spiritu Wazhila ninji, Eyi Tata, Mwanta wewulu niiseki, nakusakilili chiwayizhinjili akwamaana niakwakashinshi yumiyi, hiwukuyimwekesha kuji anyikeki; mwamweni Tata, jichi chiwamweni kuwaha.
43010022 Tata yami nankunzhiki yuma yezhima; hikwekala wamwiluka Mwanaku, ching'a Tata hohu; hikwekala nawa wamwiluka Tataku, ching'a Mwana hohu, nimuntu anetezhiyi Mwana kumumwekeshelayi.
43010023 Hakushetumuka kuji atumbanzhi twinji kumbaji kwakankawawu, hakuyila ninji, Mesu amonang'a yuma yimwamonang'enu anakooleki.
43010024 Nukuyilezha nami, atuprofwetu amavulu nawanyanta ankanu akeng'elang'a nawu amoni yuma yimwamonang'enu, hiyayimwenuku; akeng'elang'a nawu atiyi yuma yimwatiyang'enu, hiyayitiyiluku.
43010025 Kutala kunemani jehi mukwanshimbi wumu, hakumweseka ninji, Eyi Nkulung'ang'a, nukwila ng'ahi kulonja niswani wumi wahayanyaka?
43010026 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Munshimbi anasoneki nawuji? Watang'ang'amu ng'ahi?
43010027 Hakwakula ninji, Nawu, Keng'aku MWANTA Nzambi yeyi namuchima weyi wezhima, nawumi weyi wezhima, nang'ovu yeyi yezhima, namaaneyi ezhima; Keng'aku nawa mukwenu neyi chiwajikeng'a eyi aweni.
43010028 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Wunaakuli chachiwahi, ilang'a kweyi mwomwenomu, wukuhanja.
43010029 Yena hakukeng'a kumwekesha kulong'a kwinji, hakumwila Yesu ninji, Mukwetu yowinyi?

43010030 Yesu hakwila ninji, Muntu wumu wajing'i nakufuma kuYerusalema ninji akunkumuki kuYeriku. Kukasumuka anamukwati jehi kuji atuponju; hiyakumuvuula, hiyakumweta, hiyakuya kwawu, kumushiya wuji kwakwihi nakufwa.
43010031 Kapristu wumu hakukunkumuka nzhiloyu, chanamumoniyi hakumutonjolwela.
43010032 Kushika nawa nikaLevi, niyena nawa chanamumoniyi hakumutonjolwela.
43010033 Ilang'a kaSamariya wumu wajing'i nakuya munzhila yinji, hakushika kwajing'iyi; chanamumoniyi, hakumutiyila wushona,
43010034 hakuya kuji yena, hakuhung'unwina hayitu yinji manzhi nivinyu; hakukasakasahu. Amusha nihakanyama kinji yomweni hakumuleta kwitala jakamang'a enyi, hakumuhemba.
43010035 Chikunachi, hakunona mali ayeji, hakumwinka mwiniitala ninji, Muhembi; neyi yiwakamwinka yakabajikahu, chinakafunta nakakuhing'ishilamu yacheng'i.
43010036 Awa asatu nanowu aholokeleluwu kuji atuponju, eyi wunatong'ozhoki neyi wamukwashili yowu wumwojihi?
43010037 Yena ninji, Owu wamutiyilili luwi. Yesu hakumwila ninji, Nineyi nawa yang'a wakelang'a mwomumu.
43010038 Hajing'i nakuyawu munzhila yawu, hakushika hamukala wumu; mumbanja wumu, izhina jinji Mata, hakumutambula mwitala jinji.
43010039 Yenowu nawa wajing'i namwanyikinji wamumbanja, izhina jinji Mariya; yena Mariya hakwinza nakushakama kunyenju yaMwanta nakutiyilila mazu ajing'i nakuhoshayi.
43010040 Ilang'a Mata wajing'i nakubimba nanyijimu yayivulu; hakwinza kuji yena ninji, Mwanta, chananlekeliyi mwanyikami nyijimu kankawami, hiwunashuku muchima weyuku? Mwili enzi ankwashuku.
43010041 Mwanta hakumwakula ninji, Mata, Mata, yuma yayivulu wuji nakwakama, wuji nakujikabisha tuhu kweyi;
43010042 ilang'a kuji chuma chimu hohu chikukeng'eka. Chuma chanatonjiyi Mariya, jichi chuma chaswezha kuwaha, hiyakamutambulachuku.
43011001 Chajing'iyi nakulombelayi kumu, chelili nakumishi jehi, kambanzhi kinji wumu hakumwila ninji, Mwanta, tutang'ishi kulombela neyi chalezheliyi Yowanu atumbanzhi twinji.
43011002 Hakuyila ninji, Chimukulombela ilenung'a nenu, Tata yetu wekala mwiwulu, izhina jeyi jizhili. Wanta weyi winzi. Muchima weyi awili hamaseki neyi chawilang'awu mwiwulu.
43011003 Twinkang'a hefuku hefuku kujya kwetu kutunakeng'i.
43011004 Twanakeni nshiji zhetu, Mulong'a ninetu nawa twaanakenang'a antu ezhima akweti nyilong'a nanetu. Bayi wututwala mukwesekaku; Twamwini kukutama.
43011005 Hakuyila ninji, Hajenu haji mwinenwinyi wukweti ibwambu jinji wukuya kuji yena mukachi kawufuku ninji, Eyi ibwambu jami, nsonjamishuku mankenji asatu;
43011006 kunenzi ibwambu jami munzhila yinji, hinikweti yakumujiishaku.
43011007 Yena amwakuli omu mukachi mwajiyi eli ninji, Kuchisu kwakwenzela jehi; nakama jehi kwami hakajiji, nianyanami nawa, kutwesha kuhinjuka nakukwinka nehi.
43011008 Nukuyilezha nami, hela kwonti kwinji kuhinjuka nakumwinka nansang'u yawubwambu, wukuhinjuka nakumwinka yuma yezhima yanakeng'iyi nansang'u yakumukakelayi.
43011009 Nukuyilezha nami, lombenung'a akuyinka; keng'akeng'enung'a mukuwana; jonjomwenenung'a akuyenzulwila.
43011010 Mulong'a ezhima akulombang'a akutambula; muntu wukukeng'akeng'ang'a wukuwana; wúkujonjomwenang'a akumwenzulwila.
43011011 Mwinenwinyi wukwila neyi hitata yawantu, amulomba jinkenji kuji mwaninji weyala, amwinki ilola? Hela nalombi inshi amwinki kapela?
43011012 Hela nalombi iteta amwinki kanzhimbu?
43011013 jichi neyi enu atama muneluki kwinka anyanenu yamukunkulu yayiwahi, Tata yenu wamwiwulu wukubajika kuyinka awa akumulomba Spiritu Wazhila.
43011014 Wajing'i nakufumisha njemoni wakamama. Njemoni chanafumiyi muji muntu, owu kamama hakuhosha; mazaza awantu hiyakuhayama.
43011015 Amakwawu hiyakwila nawu, Wafumishang'a anjemoni nang'ovu yamwanta wawanjemoni Belezebuli.
43011016 Acheng'i hiyakukeng'a chinzhikizhilu chakufuma mwiwulu kulonja amweseki nachu.
43011017 Yena hakwiluka yitong'ozhoka yawu, hakuyila ninji, Mawanta ezhima akujambula akulwang'ana, akushala kwamahembi hohu; hela akwetala jimu akujambula hiyakukolaku.
43011018 NiSatana niyena nawa neyi wukujambvula yomweni, wanta winji wukukola ng'ahi? Nahoshi nanochu chimuji nakwila nenu nafumishang'a anjemoni nang'ovu yaBelezebuli (mwanta wawanjemoni).
43011019 Neyi ami nafumishang'a anjemoni nang'ovu yaBelezebuli, inji awa anyanenu ayifumishang'a nang'ovu yanyi? jichi wena jiwu akekala akwakuyisompesha.
43011020 Neyi ami nafumishang'a anjemoni namunu waNzambi, komana wanta waNzambi wunashiki jehi kujenu.
43011021 Mukwang'ovu namanyeki jehi, neyi wukuhemba chipang'u chinji yomweni, yuma yinji yikwikala yayiwenyi;
43011022 neyi kuji yena kukwinza wámubajika ng'ovu hakumufwomona, wukumutambula yitwa yinji yezhima yakuhwelelang'ayi, yuma yinji yanamupuupiyi hakwanzhang'ena akwawu.
43011023 Muntu wabulang'a kwikala mwinetu, wanhelang'a; nimuntu wabulang'a kupompesha hamu nanami, wapalang'eshang'a.
43011024 Spiritu wazonja chakufumayi muji muntu, hakuya nakutambatamba kwakaji menzhi, amoni kwakunookela; chakukang'anyayi kumona kwakunookela, wukwila ninji, Nifunti mwitala jami munafumini.
43011025 Chakwinzayi hakuwana akombakombamu jehi, apong'omwenamu jehi.
43011026 Hakuya nakutambula akwawu aspiritu atanu nayeji amubajika yomweni kutama, hiyakwing'ilamu, hiyakushakamamu; kutama kwanowu muntu kukubajika hajing'iyi hatachi.
43011027 Hajing'i nakuhoshayi mazu awa, mwizaza himukubijika mumbanja wumu ninji, Ivumu jakuvweli, nimayeli waamwini anakooleki.
43011028 Yena ninji, Chalala antu akutiya izu jaNzambi hiyakwilamu, anakooleki.

43011029 Hajing'i nakupompela mazaza awantu kuji yena, hakutachika kuhosha ninji, Awa antu achisakichi chatama hiyakukeng'a chinzhikizhilu, hiyakayilezhachuku, akayilezha chochinzhikizhilu chaYona hohu.
43011030 Mulong'a chabalumukiliyi Yona kwikala chinzhikizhilu kumesu awakwaNiniva, jichi chakelayi niMwana kaMuntu kumesu awantu achisakichi.

43011031 Mwanta wamumbanja wakukabeta kakuchijiilu wamba kemana nakutanyisha antu achisakichi hakusompesha; mulong'a yena wafumini kwakumina iseki, enzi nakutiya maana aSolomoni; talenu, kunu kuji wabajika Solomoni.
43011032 Antu aku Niniva amba kemana nakutanyisha antu achisakichi hakusompesha, mulong'a wena abalumukili munyichima hayishimwininuwu kudi Yona, talenu kunu kudi wabadika Yona.
43011033 Hikwekala muntu wabutulang'a inong'u ajisha muchisweku, hela kujikuvumika ihebuku; wukujisha hawimenu kulonja antu akwing'ila akamoni to-o.
43011034 Inong'u jamuzhimba weyi jojisu; neyi jisu jeyi jikutalang'a mumu hohu, nimumuzhimba weyi wezhima mukutooka to-o; neyi jatama, mumuzhimba weyi wezhima mukwikala kwamwijima hohu.
43011035 jichi babalaku wutali chachiwahi ochu chezhezhi chiji mujeyi, hajaha himwijima.
43011036 jichi neyi mumuzhimba weyi wezhima mukwikala kwachezhezhi hohu, nihaji mwijima hosi, mukwikala kwachezhezhi to-o, neyi chelang'a inong'u jaswezha kutong'eka, hijikukutong'ekela to-o.
43011037 Henohu hajing'i nakuhoshayi, kaFwarisewu wumu hakumutambika ninji ajyi ninji; hakwing'ila, hakushakama nakujya.
43011038 Owu kaFwarisewu chanamoniyi wuji nakujya chakaji kusambila kwisuka, hakuhayama.
43011039 Mwanta hakumwila ninji, Enu aFwarisewu mwatookeshang'a hanzi yalupasa nicheng'a, hakwila mukachi kenu chochimwajisoma nanyilami nikutama.
43011041 Enu O kusupa! Waleng'eli chahanzi hijiyi waleng'eli nichamukachi nawaku, tahinji?
43011040 Kwila yuma yayiwahi yowu wukutookesha mukachi, jichi mukumona yuma yezhima yikutooka.

43011042 Oyi yihung'u yimwakamona enu aFwarisewu! Mwamulambulang'a Nzambi tumafu twamwikumi twamavumba amawahi twezhima, hakwila kusompesha nikukeng'a kwaNzambi kuchisha kumuchima nehi; neyi mwelang'a yeniyi, ninoyu yikwawu himwaji kuyikang'anya kuyilaku.
43011043 Oyi yihung'u yimwakamona enu aFwarisewu! Mwakeng'ang'a kushakama mumashikola hamatanja alema, nikuyimwosha kuwulanjilu.
43011044 Oyi yihung'u yimwakamona! Mulong'a muji neyi mazhamu akaji kumwekana, akaji kwiluka antu akwenjahu.
43011045 Mukwanshimbi wumu hakumwakula ninji, Eyi Nkulung'ang'a, ichi chiwunahoshi wunasawuli ninetu nawa.
43011046 Hakumwila ninji, Oyi yihung'u yimwakamona ninenu akwanshimbi nawa! Mulong'a mwatwikang'a akwenu yisenja yakala kusenja, enu aweni kwitezha kukunkaku hela namunu wenu nehi.
43011047 Oyi yihung'u yenu! Mwalong'eshang'a chachiwahi mazhamu awatuprofwetu azhahiluwu kuji ankakulula zhenu.
43011048 jichi munekali jehi ayinsahu, muji nakwitezha nyijimu yelili ankakulula zhenu; mulong'a wena ayizhahili, enu mwenja mutung'ulula mazhamu awu.
43011049 Mwomwahosha jehi maana aNzambi ninji, Nukuyitemeshela atuprofwetu nawapostolu; amakwawu akayizhaha nikuyikabisha,
43011050 kulonja mashi atuprofwetu ezhima apwekesheluwu kufumisha haaliluwu chikuku champata yamunu mwishina, amba kayihwilawu antu achisakichi,
43011051 kufumisha kumashi aAbeli kushika nikumashi aZekariya azhahililuwu hakachi kakameng'a kakulambwila namwazhila. Eng'a, nukuyilezha nami amba kayihwilawu antu achisakichi.
43011052 Oyi yihung'u yimwakamona enu akwanshimbi! Munafumishi nsapi yakwiluka nachu maana; enu aweni kwing'ilamu nehi, himukulekesha ninawa akukeng'a kwing'ilamu.
43011053 Chanejikiyi mwenomu, ansoneki nawaFwarisewu atachika nikujikang'a ninji nang'ovu nankashi, hiyakumuvuloka kulonja ahoshi yuma yayivulu;
43011054 hiyakumuta namazu akukanwa kinji, atiyi chuma chakuhoshayi, amwinkeluhu mulong'a.

43012001 Henohu hajing'i nakwilawu ochu, kúpompa nimakombakazhi awantu akwila hiyakujijata nikujijata; hakutachika kulezha atumbanzhi twinji chakusambila, ninji, Babelenu ilung'i jawaFwarisewu, wowu wufwikizhi.
43012002 Mulong'a hikwekala chuma chabutang'awu chibula kumwekana hatookaku; hela chazhinjang'awu chibula kutiyakanaku.
43012003 jichi yuma yezhima yimwakahoshela mumwijima yakatiyakana hamwaana; niyimwakashawutila mwitu mutupeka twamukachi, akayibijika hewulu jetala.
43012004 Enu amabwambu zhami nukuyilezha nami, bayi mutiya woma wena azhahang'a muzhimbaku, akuminang'a mwomwenomu hohu, kutwesha kwila chuma chikwawu nehi.
43012005 Nukuyilezhang'ahu jehi imukutiya woma; tiyenu woma yena wukweti wanta wakwila azhaha anatila muntu mukalung'a kachinana; eng'a, nukuyilezha nami mutiyenu yena woma.
43012006 Tuja twanyanya tutanu hiyatulanjang'a natumali tuyejuku? Hela chochu, hikwekala hela kamu kalalamenang'awu kuji Nzambuku.
43012007 Hela nsuki zhenu zhazheni azhichinja jehi zhezhima. jichi bayi mutiyang'a womaku, kulema kwenu kwabajika kulema kwatuja twatuvulu.
43012008 Nukuyilezha nami antu ezhima akung'itezha kumesu awantu, Mwana kaMuntu niyena wakayitezha kumesu awang'elu zhaNzambi.
43012009 Muntu wukujikala kumesu awantu ninji hang'ilukaku, niyena nawa akajikalayi kumesu awang'elu zhaNzambi.
43012010 Muntu wukuhosha izu jakutena Mwana kaMuntu chatama, akamwanakenaju; hakwila wúkuhosha Spiritu Wazhila chatama hiyakamwanakenaku.
43012011 Chakayitwalawu nakuyimika mumashikola kumesu awanyuuli nawanyanta, bayi mwakaakama mwakwakwila hela mwakuhoshelaku.
43012012 Spiritu Wazhila wakayitang'isha mwatela kuhosha henohu.
43012013 Muntu wahezaza jawantu wumu hakumwila ninji, Eyi Nkulung'ang'a, mwili manakwami twambuli ninji wuswana wetu.
43012014 Yena hakumwila ninji, Eyi iyala, ananyinki kujinyi mujimu wakuyisompesha, hela wakuyanzhang'ena?
43012015 Hakuyila ninji, Babalenu, jihembenu muleki lwisu lwezhima, mulong'a wumi wamuntu hiwekalang'a kukuvula kwamahetinjuku.
43012016 Hakuyitila chishimu ninji, Maha amukwakuheta wumu aswezheli kusong'a nankashi;
43012017 hakuhosha mumuchima winji ninji, Nukwila ng'ahi chinabuli kwakuswekela kujya kwami?
43012018 Hakwila ninji, Nukusanja nkalang'a zhami, nitung'i zhamaneni, nakaswekumu tijiku yami yezhima nimahetami.
43012019 Nili wumi wami nami, Eyi wumi wami, wunalumbiki jehi maheteyi amavulu anyaka yayivulu; nookaku kweyi; jyang'a, nwang'a, lung'ang'a.
43012020 Nzambi hakumwila ninji, Eyi chisupi, anakeng'i kutambula wumi weyi wufuku owu, inji iyi yuma yiwunalong'eshi yikushala nanyi?
43012021 Chochakekala muntu wajilumbikilang'a maheta amavulu, ninji inji yomweni hohu, ilang'a hikazweng'i kumesu aNzambi.
43012022 Hakuyila atumbanzhi twinji ninji, Nukuyilezha nami lekenu kwakama wumi wenu nenu tukujyaji? hela kwakama nyizhimba yenu nenu tukuvwalaji?
43012023 Wumi wabajika yakujya, muzhimba wabajika yakuvwala.

43012024 Tong'ozhokenu makololu, hiyakuwang'aku, hiyamunang'aku; hiyaheta hela nkalang'a hela itala jakuswekelaku; ayijiishang'a kuji Nzambi hohu. Komana kulema kwenwenu hikwabajika nankashi kwatujaku?
43012025 Mwinenwinyi wukwila akame-e, anung'a kuchiminu chinji chikunku chakweseka munkotweli yachikasa?
43012026 Chuma chantesha muchikang'anya kuchila, inji mwaakaminang'aji yuma yinashaluku?
43012027 Tong'ozhokenu wuluya chiwakulang'a; hiwakabakanang'aku, hiwashintang'aku; nukuyilezha nami mwalemeneniyi Solomoni mwezhima, havweli chakweseka nawuluyiwu wumuku.
43012028 Nzambi yovwika matahu amwiha chochichi, akwila lelu aji kwoku, kumajiki hiyakuyinatila mukesi, abuli kubajika kuvwikenu? Enu mukweti kukuhwelela kwantesha.
43012029 Bayi musha muchima kuyakujya hela kuyakunwaku; bayi mululutang'aku.
43012030 Mulong'a yuma yezhimiyi jiyi yakeng'ang'a nyunza yamunu mwishina. Tata yenu neluki chimunakaankili yumiyi.
43012031 jichi shenu muchima kuwanta winji, iyi yuma yezhimiyi akayishilaku.
43012032 Enu kamukanka kawanyikoku kantesha, bayi mutiyang'a womaku, Tata yenu watiyang'a kuwaha kuyinka wanta.
43012033 Lanjishenu yimuji nayu muyinki atuzweng'i; mutung'i yikwama yenu yabulang'a kutoka, maheta amwiwulu hiyanong'ang'aku, mwiwulu himwashikang'a ikombi nakwiyaku, hela kabubu kakukisang'ana.
43012034 Mulong'a kukwikala mahetenu jiku kukwikala ninyichima yenu nawa.
43012035 Pimpilenu mahinenu, manong'u enu abutukang'a.
43012036 Enu aweni ikalenu neyi antu aji nakutalila mwanta wawu wukufuma kumawizha kwayiliyi, kulonja hakenzayi nakujonjomwena akamwenzulwili hohenohu.
43012037 Anjung'u akawanawu kuji nkaka yawu aji nakumutalila anakooleki; nukuyilezha chalala nami nkaka yawu wakavwala chachiwahi, wakayishakamisha nakujya, wakenza nakuyikalakela.
43012038 Neyi wakenza hachilu chamuchiyeji hela chamuchisatu, kuyiwana chochichi, anakooleki.
43012039 Tiyenu mwiluki, mwiniitala neyi welukili mpinzhi yikwinza ikombi, mutenowu watoneni, haji kwitezha kumulokwela itala jinjuku.
43012040 jichi ninenu nawa babalenu, mulong'a mpinzhi yimukubula kutong'ozhoka, jiyi yakenzayi Mwana kaMuntu.
43012041 Petulu hakumwila ninji, Mwanta, ichi chishimu wunatili etu hohu, tahinji munatili niantu ezhima?
43012042 Mwanta ninji, Nhembi washinshika wukweti maana yowinyi, akushilawu kuji mwanta winji mujimu wakutala mukala winji, enkang'a ang'amba zhinji yakujya yawu hayinkelang'awu?
43012043 Njung'u akawanawu kuji nkaka yinji wuji nakwila mwenimu nakooleki.
43012044 Nukuyilezha chalala nami, wakamukunzhika mujimu wakuhemba yuma yahetayi yezhima.
43012045 Hakwila owu njung'u, neyi wakahosha mumuchima winji ninji, Nkaka yami wuchiji kulaba; hakutachika kweta akwawu anjung'u amayala nawambanja, hakujya, hakunwa, hakusheta,
43012046 mwanta wanowu njung'u hakumukasumwisha mwifuku jakubula kumutalilayi, hela mumpinzhi yakubula kwilukayi; wakamuvupola nankashi, hakumusha kwizhiku jawakaji kukuhwelela.
43012047 Njung'u welukili mwakeng'a kwilayi mwanta winji, yena kulong'eshamu nehi, hela kwilamu nehi, akamweta yikoti yayivulu;

43012048 hakwila muntu wabulili kwiluka, neyi neli yuma yatela kumwetela, akamweta yikoti yanti. Muntu anenkuwu yayivulu, akakeng'elaku nawa yayivulu; muntu anashiluwu yayivulu, akehwilaku nawa yaswezha kuvula.
43012049 Ami nenzi nakunatila kesi hanu hamaseki, nakeng'i nami kabutuki; inji neyi kanabutuki jehi, ami nakela ng'ahi?
43012050 Niji nachizhimikilu chakanzhimikawu nachu; chinankatishi kumuchima nankashi nami chimani.
43012051 Munatong'ozhoki nenu ami nenzi nakuleta kumwena hanu hamaseki, tahinji? Nukuyilezha nami, ami hinenzi nakuleta kumwenaku, nenzi nakwambola.
43012052 Mulong'a kufumisha hanu, mwitala muji antu atanu, asatu akaambuka kuji akwawu ayeji, ayeji akaambuka kuji asatu.

43012053 Tata yamuntu wakajambula namwaninji weyala, mwana weyala wakajambula natata yinji; mama yamuntu wakajambula namwaninji wamumbanja, mwana wamumbanja wakajambula namama yinji; mukuwamuntu wakajambula namukuwinji wamumbanja, mukuwamumbanja wakajambula namukuwinji.
43012054 Hakuyila mazaza awantu ninji, Mwelang'a chimukumona ivu hijikusela kumuzhika, himukuhosha nenu, Kukunoka kavula, chalala kwaamu mwomwenomu.
43012055 Chimukumona mpepela yikukunka nakufuma kukabeta kakuchijiilu, himukuhosha nenu, Kukuholoka nkanza yaswezha iyena; chalala kwaamu mwomwenomu.
43012056 Enu amfwikizhi! Muneluki kulumbulula nsang'u zhayuma yahamaseki niyamuluzwizu, inji munakang'enyiji kulumbulula mukuya nsang'u zhamakonu?
43012057 Enu aweni mwakang'enyang'aji kwiluka mukuya yuma yalong'a?

43012058 Neyi wuji nakuya kuji mukwakusompesha namuntu nakwinki mulong'a, esekaku kumanisha mulong'a hiwuchiji ninji munzhila; mukunkulwayi wukukutwala kuji mukwakusompesha, mukwakusompesha hakukwinka kuji mukwakaleya, niyena hakukusha mukaleya.
43012059 Nukukulezha nami hiwamba kafuma mwokuku, kufumamu ching'a wunafuti mulong'a wezhima, nikajali kanyanya kakushalaku nehi.
43013001 Chena chilaakochu, antu amu amulezheli nsang'u yawantu amung'aliliya abombashaniniyi Pilatu mashi awu hamu namashi ayimuna yawu yaketwiluwu.
43013002 Yena hakuyakula ninji, Enu munatong'ozhoki nenu awa ang'aliliya ajing'i akwanshiji abajika ang'aliliya ezhima, nanochu chakabiluwu yumiyi tahinji?
43013003 Nukuyilezha nami, nehi; ching'a mubalumuka munyichima yenu; neyi nehi, jichi mwamba kanong'a ninenu nawa.

43013004 Hela antu awa ikumi natanu nasatu (18) aholokeleluwu kuji kaposhi kamuSilowami hikakuyizhaha, enu munatong'ozhoki nenu kuluwa kwawu kwabajikili kuluwa kwawantu ezhima ashakama muYerusalema, tahinji?
43013005 Nukuyilezha nami, nehi; ching'a mubalumuka munyichima yenu; neyi nehi, jichi mwamba kanong'a ninenu nawa.
43013006 Hakuyitila chishimu ichi ninji, Muntu wumu watumbili mutonju wachikuyu mwitempa jinji janyivinyu; hakwinza nakukeng'akeng'aku nyikabu, kuwana kwosi.

43013007 Hakumwila mukwakuhemba nyivinyu ninji, Nyaka yezhima yisatu iyi nenzang'a nakukeng'akeng'aku nyikabu kumutonju iwu wachikuyu, kuyiwanang'a nehi; wutemumu, inji wuvumbishang'a tuhu kwawu heseki?
43013008 Yena hakwakula ninji, Mwanta, wuleki mwaka wunu nichipachipuku, ninkuku wushi;
43013009 neyi wukusong'a chikuwaha, neyi kusong'a nehi wakawutemi kweyi.
43013010 HaSabata wajing'i nakutang'isha mushikola yimu.
43013011 Kutala muji mumbanja wukweti spiritu yawufwayi wanyaka ikumi nayitanu nayisatu (18); wakuminang'a jakubanjang'ila hohu, kutwesha kubanjuka hela chanti nehi.
43013012 Yesu chanamumoniyi, hakumutambika ninji, Eyi mumbanja, wufwayi weyi wunakusubuki jehi.
43013013 Hakumunang'ika makasinji, hohenohu oloka nikwoloka, hakumulemesha Nzambi.

43013014 Nyuuli yashikola hakutiya kutama nankashi nanochu chokiluwu muntu kuji Yesu haSabata; hakwila izaza jawantu ninji, Mafuku akukalakalang'awu antu nyijimu yawu atanu najimu, jiwu mwaji kwinzang'a nakuyuuka, bayi haSabataku.
43013015 Mwanta hakuyakula ninji, Enu amfwikizhi! Komana enu himwasubulang'a ng'ombi yenu, hela chimbulu chenu mwitang'a, mumutwala nakumunwisha menzhi haSabataku?
43013016 Inji iwu mwana kaAbarahama wamumbanja, anakasuwu kuji Satana nyaka ikumi nayitanu nayisatu (18) yezhimiyi, chitami kumukasununa munyonzhi haSabata?
43013017 Chanahoshiyi mazu awa, akwankunyi ninji atiya ninsonyi; izaza jawantu jezhima hijikuzang'alala nayuma yalema yeliliyi yezhima.
43013018 jichi hakuhosha cheng'i ninji, Wanta waNzambi wunafwani neyi chumanyi? Nukuwufwikizha nachumanyi?
43013019 Wunafwani neyi kambutu kanyana kamostaji katumbiliyi muntu mwitempa jinji; hikakukula, hikakwikala mutonju waweni; atuja ahaluzwizu hiyakutuntama kunyitayi yinji.
43013020 Hakwila cheng'i ninji, Wanta waNzambi nukuwufwikizha nachumanyi?
43013021 Wunafwani neyi ilung'i janonenuwu kuji mumbanja, hakusha muwung'a wamahebi asatu, wung'a wezhima wing'ila niilung'i.
43013022 Aholokela nimunzhila yakuya kuYerusalema; hiyakuya nakuhitahita nimunyikala yamaneni, nimunyikala yanyanya, nakutang'isha ho-o.
43013023 Muntu wumu hakumwila ninji, Eyi Mwanta, antu akamwinawu antesha hohu, tahinji?
43013024 Yena hakuyila ninji, Kabilenu kwing'ila kuchisu chanyanya; nukuyilezha nami amavulu amba kakeng'a kwing'ilamu, amba kakang'anya.

43013025 Chamba kela mwanta wetala nanyamuki jehi, nenzeli jehi chenzelu, enu mwakatachika kwimana kuchisu hanzi nakujonjomwena, nakubijika nenu, Mwanta twenzulwiluku. Yena wakayakula ninji, Ami kwami kuyiluka nehi, hela kumwafuma.
43013026 Himwakatachika kuhosha nenu, Twajing'i nakujya nakunwa kumesu eyi, eyi nawa wajing'i nakutang'isha munyikala yetu.
43013027 Yena wakayila ninji, Nukuyilezha nami, ami kwami kuyiluka nehi, hela kumwafuma. Mfumenu, enu akwakuluwa ezhima.
43013028 Kwamba kekala kujila nikujisumona kumazhi himwamba kamona Abarahama naIsaka naYakoba niatuprofwetu ezhima muwanta waNzambi, hakwila enu anayumbili jehi hanzi.
43013029 Antu akumusela niakumuzhika niakukabeta nakabeta, amba kenza nakushakama muwanta waNzambi.
43013030 Tiyenu, ákukuminina jiwu akekala akusambila; ákusambila jiwu akekala akukuminina.
43013031 AFwarisewu amakwawu hiyakwinza nakumwila yena mpinzhi oyu nawu, Fumaku kunu, yaku kwacheng'i; mulong'a Heroji wuji nakukufunyina kukuzhaha.
43013032 Hakuyila ninji, Yenu mwakamulezhi mumbu ona nenu, Yena neli ninji, Talenu, nukufumisha anjemoni nikuuka nilelu nikumajiki, ifuku jakalonjelamu jijakamanishawu nsang'u zhami zhonsu.
43013033 Nzhila yami ching'a niyenja lelu nikumajiki nikwifuku jikwawu, mulong'a kaprofwetu kumuzhahila kwacheng'i kutwesha nehi, ching'a muYerusalema hohu.

43013034 Eyi Yerusalema, Yerusalema! Wazhahang'a atuprofwetu, waasang'a malola awa akutemeshelang'awu! O mafuku kuvula inakeng'ang'a nami nikung'wizhi anyaneyi mumpuula, neyi chakung'wizhang'ayi chaaji anyaninji mumpuula zhinji yomweni, enu kwenu kwonti kwenu!
43013035 Talenu, itala jenu anayishiyiliju jineli jehi ihembi hohu. Nukuyilezha nami, kunmona cheng'i ching'a kwifuku jimwakela nenu, Kisu kisu iwu wukwinza mwizhina jaMWANTA.
43014001 HaSabata yimu, cheng'ililiyi mwitala janyuuli yawaFwarisewu wumu ajyi ninji, hiyakumushinshika swi-i.
43014002 Kwatalishiliyi mesu inji kuji muntu wukweti musong'u wanjonju.
43014003 Yesu hakuhosha nawakwanshimbi nawaFwarisewu ninji, Kuuka haSabata chalong'a, tahinji nehi?
43014004 Wena chochamwenawu kwanzo-o. Hakumukwata, hakumuuka, hakumwila ninji, Yang'a kweyi.
43014005 Hakuyila ninji, Mwinenwinyi wukwila neyi wukweti chimbulu hela ng'ombi, aholokela mwishima haSabata, alabazhala nakumukokamu?
43014006 Hiyamweni mwakumwakwila cheng'i mazu awaku.
43014007 Chamweniyi owu antu atambikiluwu hiyakutonja kushakama halema hohu,
43014008 hakuyitila chishimu ninji, Neyi anakutambiki kuchawizha chakusumbwisha, bayi wutonja kushakama halemaku, hajaha anatambiki jehi muntu wabajikeyi kulema;
43014009 chakwinzayi owu natambiki nineyi niyenowu, hakukwila ninji, Aha hambala haniwu. Chiwukutachika kuya habula kulema, O zhinsonyi!

43014010 Neyi anakutambiki, sambilaku kushakama habula kulema; chakwinzayi owu nakutambiki akwili ninji, Eyi ibwambu jami, inzaku wushakami hanu halema; akakumona kulema kuji akwenu ezhima wunashakami nawu nakujya.
43014011 Mulong'a muntu wukujitohesha akamukehesha; nimuntu wukujikehesha akamutohesha.

43014012 Hakumwila owu muntu wamutambikili, ninji, Neyi wukuteleka chawizha chamwaana hela chamelela, bayi wutambika amabwambu zheyi hela anakweyi hela antang'a zheyi, hela akwenu ahetaku; akenja kakutambika nineyi nawa, akakuhing'ishilamu.
43014013 Neyi wukuteleka chawizha cheyi, katambiki atuzweng'i, niayifwayi, niakwakubalakata, niamputamesu,
43014014 kulonja wukooleki; mulong'a wena hiyakweti yakukuhing'ishilamuku, akakuhing'ishilamu hamba kasang'uka akwakulong'a.
43014015 Mazu awa chanayitiyuwu kuji muntu wumu, wajing'i hamu nawenowu ashakaminiyi nawu nakujya, hakumwila ninji, Muntu wakajya muwanta waNzambi nakooleki.
43014016 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Muntu wumu watelekeli chawizha cheneni, hakukana antu amavulu.
43014017 Mpinzhi yakujya chawizha chiyinashiki, hakutemesha njung'u yinji ninji, Yang'a wutambiki akanawu jehi neyi, Inzenung'a, yuma yezhima along'esha jehi.
43014018 Wezhima wawu hiyakutachika kuleyaleya namuchima wawu wumu hohu. Watachi ninji, Nalanji iha jami, nakeng'i niyi nakujitala; ang'itezhi mwani kushala.
43014019 Mukwawu nawa ninji, Nalanji ikumi jang'ombi zhakujimisha, nakeng'i niyi nakuzheseka; ang'itezhi mwani kushala.
43014020 Mukwawu nawa ninji, Nasumbuli ing'ojami, hinukutwesha kuyaku.

43014021 Owu njung'u hakwinza, hakumulezha nkaka yinji yumiyi. Owu mwanta wetala hakuzuwa, hakumwila njung'u yinji ninji, Yaku swayi munyikwakwa nimutuzhila twamumukala, wuletaleti atuzweng'i, niayifwayi, niamputamesu, niakwakubalakata, wuying'izhumu.
43014022 Owu njung'u hakumwila nkaka yinji ninji, Mwanta, neli jehi muwunanlezhi, ilang'a munashali mwakushakama antu amakwawu.
43014023 Mwanta hakumwila njung'u yinji ninji, Yaku munzhila zhakula, nimutunyilamba, wuyikanzhikizhi eng'ilumu, kulonja mwitala jami mwinzali to-o.
43014024 Mulong'a nukuyilezha nami, awa antu akaninuwu, hosi niwumu wakatompa kuchawizha chamuku.
43014025 Mwajing'i nakuyayi himukuya nimazaza awantu amavulu, yena hakushetumuka,

43014026 hakuyila ninji, Muntu wukwinza kujami chakaji kuhela tata yinji, nimama yinji, ning'ojinji, nianyaninji, nianakwinji, niahelinji, eng'a, hela wumi winji yomweni, hakutwesha kwikala kambanzhi kamuku.
43014027 Muntu wukubula kusenja kulusu yinji nakunlonjelami, hakutwesha kwikala kambanzhi kamuku.
43014028 Mwinenwinyi wukwila neyi wukukeng'a kutung'a itala jeneni, wukubula kusambila kushakama nakuchinja mali amujimowu, atali neyi wukweti mali akujimanisha nachu?
43014029 Wamba kela wukwala kwachikuku hohu, kumanisha nehi, antu ezhima akutalaku hiyakutachika kumuseha,
43014030 nawu, Iwu muntu wakuminini jakutachika kutung'a hohu, kumanisha nehi.

43014031 Hela mwantanyi wukwila neyi wukukeng'a kuya nakulwa nzhita namwanta mukwawu, wukubula kusambila kushakama nakutong'ozhoka ninji, ami niji namakombakazhi ikumi (10,000) hohu; nukutwesha kuya nakumonang'ana namwantowu wuji nakwinza namakombakazhi makumi ayeji (20,000) kwaamu, tahinji?
43014032 Neyi hanatweshuku, wukunyakala kutemeshang'ahu jehi antu alema akwihula mwakuvumbikilawu ikala, hohachijiyi mukwawu kwakulehi nankashi.
43014033 jichi nimwinenu wukubula kuleka yajiyi nayu yezhima, hakutwesha kwikala kambanzhi kamuku.
43014034 Mung'wa wawuwahi; neyi mung'wa wuneli jehi wasamuka, akutwesha kuwutowesha cheng'i nanka?
43014035 Hiwukukwasha nawa maseki hela wushuku, akuwunata tuhu. Yowu wukweti matu akutiya atiyi.
43015001 Ansonkeshi ezhima niakwanshiji hiyakukunjama kwakwihi nayena kulonja amutiyi.
43015002 AFwarisewu nawansoneki hiyakutoba nawu, Iwu muntu watambulang'a akwanshiji, hakujya nawu.
43015003 Hakuyitila chishimu ichi,

43015004 ninji, Mwinenwinyi wukwila neyi wukweti nkulakazhi (100) yanyikoku, hazhimbala wumu, wukubula kushiya owu makumi atanu nawana nanyikoku yitanu nayiwana (99) mumpata, hakuya nakukeng'akeng'a owu nazhimbali, keng'e-e nichakumuwanayi?
43015005 Chakumuwanayi, wukumusha hamafwizhi nakuzang'alala.
43015006 Chakushikayi kwiinji, hakutambika amabwambu zhinji niakwawu atung'ayi nawu kwakwihi, hakuyila ninji, Tuzang'alalenu enu akwetu, mukoku wami wazhimbala namuwani jehi.

43015007 Nukuyilezha nami, mwiwulu, neyi akumona mukwanshiji wumu nabalumuki mumuchima, mukwikala muzang'alu wakubajika muzang'alu wakuzang'alala namakumi atanu nawana nawantu atanu nawana (99) awantu along'a anabuli nsang'u yakubalumuka mumuchima.
43015008 Hela mumbanjanyi wukwila neyi wukweti ikumi jamali, neyi azhimbeshahu ijali jimu, wukubula kubutula inong'u, akombakomba mwitala, nakujikeng'akeng'a chacheni nichakujiwanayi?
43015009 Chakujiwanayi hakutambika amabwambu zhinji niakwawu atung'ayi nawu kwakwihi, hakwila ninji, Tuzang'alalenu enu akwetu, nawani ijali jinazhimbesheli.
43015010 Nukuyilezha nami, kumesu awang'elu aNzambi kwekalang'a muzang'alu hansang'u yamukwanshiji wumu nabalumuki mumuchima.
43015011 Hakwila nawa ninji, Kwajing'i muntu wumu wajing'i nawanyaninji amayala ayeji.
43015012 Wakansi wamwilili tata yinji ninji, Tata, nyinki iseka jayuma yinatela kutambula. Hakuyanzhang'ena maheta inji.
43015013 Hakaji nikuleha mafuku, owu mwana wakansi hakupompesha yuma yezhima, hakujiyila kwinji kwitung'a jakwakulehi, kwenoku hakukisang'ana mahetinji nakwenja nakubazhama.
43015014 Chanamanishiyi yuma yezhima, mwitung'oju muholoka ninzala yeneni, hakutachika kufwa nzala.
43015015 Hakuya nakushakama namwenimbu wetung'oju; yena hakumutemesha mumahinji ajiishi ang'ulu.
43015016 Wakeng'eli nankashi kwikuta namafulu ajiilang'a ang'ulu, hikwajing'i muntu wakumwinka chuma, hela wumuku.
43015017 Chanawunjishiyi mumesu, hakwila ninji, Ang'amba zhatata O kuvula akweti yakujya yayivulu, enja ashiyahu, hakwila ami kunu hinukufwa nanzala.
43015018 Nukunyamuka kwami niyi kuji tata, nakamwili nami, Tata, namuputoli Nzambi wamwiwulu, nakuputoli nineyi nawa;
43015019 hinateli kwami kuntena cheng'i nawu mwaneyuku; ang'itezhi mwani kwikala neyi ng'amba yeyi wumu.
43015020 Anyamuka nikunyamuka, aya nikuji tata yinji. Ilang'a hajing'iyi wuchiji maaya, tata yinji hakumumona, hakutiya wushona, hakuya lufuchi, hakumukumbata kunshing'u, hakumupwepuzhola.
43015021 Mwaninji hakumwila ninji, Tata, namuputoli Nzambi wamwiwulu, nakuputoli nineyi nawa; hinateli kwami kuntena cheng'i nawu mwaneyuku.
43015022 Ilang'a tata yinji hakuyila anjung'u zhinji ninji, Letenu swayi chikowelu chachilehi chochaswezha kuwaha, mumuvwikichu; mumushi nikazeya kumunu winji, ninkwabilu kunyenju yinji.
43015023 Letenu mwana kang'ombi wanuna, mumuzhahi; tujyenu, tulung'enu;
43015024 mulong'a iwu mwanami iwu wafwili, nahanji cheng'i; wazhimbeli, namwekani. Atachika nikulung'a.
43015025 Ilang'a mwaninji wamukulumpi wajing'i mwiha. Chajing'i nakwinzayi, hakushika kwakwihi netala hakutiya nikwimba nikuhang'ana.
43015026 Hakutambika mukwenzi weyala wumu, hakumwihula ninji, Kunasong'iji?
43015027 Yena hakumwakula ninji, Manakweyi nenzi jehi; tata yeyi namuzhahili jehi mwana kang'ombi wanuna, nanichi chanamutambuliyi cheng'i wamuwenyi, wakola
43015028 Ilang'a yaya yinji hakuzuwa, kwonti kwinji kwing'ilamu. Tata yinji hakwijika, hakumulembelela.
43015029 Ilang'a yena hakumwakula ninji, Nyaka yezhimiyi nakukalakelang'a ho-o, kanja jehi nimotokuhu izu jeyuku; eyi kunyinka hela mwana kampembi, kulonja nilung'i chimu nawamabwambu zhami, nehi.
43015030 Hakwila chanenziyi iwu mwaneyi iwu, yena wakisang'ana jehi maheta eyi nawayivumbi, hiwukumuzhahila nimwana kang'ombi wanuna.
43015031 Yena hakumwila ninji, Eyi mwanami, twekala neyi mafuku ezhima, yuma yami yezhima yeyeyi hohu.
43015032 Twaji kwila ng'ahi? Tubuli kulung'a nikuzang'alala? Iwu manakweyi wafwili, nahanji cheng'i; wazhimbeli, namwekani.
43016001 Hakuyila nawa atumbanzhi twinji ninji, Kwajing'i muntu waheta wumu, wajing'i nankong'i yinji; yena nkong'i hiyakumushimuna kuji akwawu, nawu wuji nakukisang'ana yuma yambala yamwanta winji.
43016002 Yena hakumutambika, hakumwila ninji, Iyi nsang'u yeyi yiniji nakutiya yanka? Lumbululaku mwahita wunkong'i weyi; mulong'a wunkong'i weyi wunakumi jehi.
43016003 Owu nkong'i hakwila mumuchima winji ninji, Ichi chakuntambulayi mwanta wami wunkong'i wami, nukwila ng'ahi? ng'ovu zhakujima kwosi; kulomba chikweti nsonyi.
43016004 Neluki jehi chinukwila, kulonja chakumfumishawu muwunkong'i akantambuli mumatalawu.
43016005 Hakutambika akwanyikuji yamwanta winji ezhima; hakumwihula watachi ninji, Mukuji weyi namwanta wami washika mujihi?
43016006 Yena ninji, Manzhi akweseka muzhilita 3000. Hakumwila ninji, Nonaku mukanja weyi wamukuji, shakamaku swayi wusoneki zhilita 1500.
43016007 Hakumwihula mukwawu nawa ninji, Inji eyi mukuji weyi namwanta wami washika mujihi? Yena ninji, 17,000 kg yatijiku. Hakumwila ninji, Nonaku mukanja weyi wamukuji, wusoneki 14,000 kg.
43016008 Mwanta winji hakumuhameka owu nkong'i waheng'a chababeliyi; mulong'a antu ampata yamunu mwishina amakonu, anabajiki akwachezhezhi kubabala.
43016009 Ami nukuyilezha nami, mukong'eshi maheta amunu mwishina akuwana nachu amabwambu, kulonja chiyakamana maheta, akayitambuli mwakushakama hayanyaka.
43016010 Muntu wukushinshika nakachuma kaswezha kukeha, wukushinshika nawa ninayuma yayivulu; muntu wukuheng'a nakachuma kaswezha kukeha, wukuheng'a nawa ninayuma yayivulu.
43016011 jichi neyi munabuli kushinshikila maheta amunu mwishina, wukuyishila kuhemba maheta alala hinyi?
43016012 Neyi munabuli kushinshikila chuma chamukwenu, wukukwinka cheyeyi aweni hinyi?
43016013 Ng'ambanyi wukutwesha kukalakela anyanta ayeji? Ching'a yohelahu wumu, yokeng'a mukwawu; hela yokalakela wumu, yojiwula mukwawu. Himunatweshi kukalakela niNzambi nimahetaku.
43016014 AFwarisewu ájing'i akwalwisu, chanatiyuwu yuma yezhimiyi hiyakumuseha.
43016015 Hakuyila ninji, Enu yenu mwajishimunang'a kuji antu nenu twalong'a; ilang'a Nzambi neluki nyichima yenu. Mulong'a chuma chalemeshang'awu kuji antu, kumesu aNzambi hichishimashima.
43016016 Nshimbi niatuprofwetu anakumini haji Yowanu, ilang'a kufuma henohu ashimunang'a nsang'u yayiwahi yawanta waNzambi, niantu ezhima anakulwisha kulonja eng'ilumu.
43016017 Chaswayi iwulu niseki kuhita, chakala kuholoka kamufunja kakunshimbi kamu.
43016018 Muntu wukuseng'a ing'ojinji asumbula wacheng'i, neli wuvumbi; wúkusumbula mumbanja anaseng'uwu kuji mfumwinji neli wuvumbi.
43016019 Kwajing'i mukwakuheta wumu wavwelang'a mahina amawahi awusombu niatooka, washakaminang'a nakulung'a hefuku hefuku.
43016020 Kwajing'i nawa kazweng'i, izhina jinji Lazaru, amukamikilang'a kuchisu chinji, muzhimba wezhima kwayilonja hohu;
43016021 wakeng'elang'a ninji amujiishang'a nkuuku zhikuholokang'a kumesa yanowu mukwakuheta; chalala niatuwa hiyakwinzang'a nakulasha hayilonja yinji.
43016022 Owu kazweng'i hakufwa, amweleka nikuji ang'elu, amutwala nihantulu yaAbarahama. Mukwakuheta niyena hakufwa, amuzhiika nikumuzhiika.
43016023 Hakufumbwila mesu mukalung'a mwajing'iyi, hakukaba nankashi, hakumumwena Abarahama kwakulehi, niLazaru wuji hantulu yinji.
43016024 Hakubilela ninji, Tata Abarahama, antiyili luwi, atemeshi Lazaru atumpiki insa yamunu winji mumenzhi, enzi awunjishi ijimi jami; ami niji nakumona yihung'u mumuzuzu iwu.

43016025 Kutiya Abarahama ninji, Eyi mwanami, anukaku eyi chiwajing'i mumi, watambwilang'a yuma yeyi yayiwahi, chochajing'i nakutambulayi Lazaru yuma yinji yatama; hakwinzichi yena anamukunjezhi jehi, eyi hiwukumona yihung'u.

43016026 Haji nichuma chikwawu; hakachi ketu nanenu ashahu ikela jaswezha kutoha, kulonja muntu wukukeng'a kufuma kunu enzi kujenu, akakang'anyi; hela muntu wukukeng'a kufuma oku amotokeli kujetu, akang'anyi nawa.
43016027 Yena ninji, Komana neyi chijochu, nalembi tata, mutemeshi Lazaru kwitala jatata yami;
43016028 mulong'a nikweti anakwami atanu; ayi akayilezhi, akabuli niwena kwinza munu mwakukaba nankashi.
43016029 Ilang'a Abarahama ninji, Akweti nyikanja yaMosi niyatuprofwetu, ayitiyi.
43016030 Ilang'a yena ninji, Nehi tata Abarahama, neyi muntu afuma muji afu aya kuji wena, akabalumuka munyichima.
43016031 Abarahama hakumwila ninji, Neyi akubula kutiya Mosi niatuprofwetu, hela muntu wukusang'uka muji afu hiyaketiya nihantuku.
43017001 Hakuyila atumbanzhi twinji ninji, Nsang'u zhakujimbwisha antu hizhikutwesha kubula kwinzaku, ching'a zhinza hohu; hakwila owu wukuzhileta, oyi yihung'u yakamonayi!
43017002 Muntu wukujimbwisha mwana wanyanya wumu iwu, chikuwaha kumukasa ilola jeneni jakuhalila kunshing'u yinji, hikumunatila mukalung'alwizhi.
43017003 Babalenu enu aweni. Neyi manakweyi nakuputoli, muhosholi; neyi nabalumuki mumuchima, mwanakeni.
43017004 Neyi ifuku jimu wukukuputola mapampa katanu nakayeji, afunta kujeyi mapampa katanu nakayeji nawa nakwila ninji, Nalembi; kamwanakeni.
43017005 Apostolu hiyakumwila Mwanta nawu, Tuvulishili kukuhwelela kwetu.
43017006 Mwanta ninji, Neyi mukwikala nakukuhwelela kwanti kwakweseka nakambutu kanyanya kamu, mwaji kumwila iwu chilembalemba nenu, Bwitikaku, wujitumbi mukalung'alwizhi; waji kuyovwahila.
43017007 Haji mwinenwinyi wukweti ng'amba yinji wajimang'a, inji kwizhi wajiishang'a nyikoku, chakufumayi kwiha amwili ninji, inzang'a swayi wushakami nakujya?
43017008 Abuli kumwila ninji, Long'eshaku yakujya nijyi, vwalaku chachiwahi wung'imeni, nijyi, ninwi. Neyi wunakumishi jehi, nineyi aweni wakajyi wakanwi?
43017009 Chakwilayi yuma yakumulezhawu, wukumusakilila owu ng'amba, tahinji?
43017010 jimu mukwila ninenu nawa, neyi muneli yuma yayilezhawu yezhima, mukuhosha nenu, Tuyang'amba amukunkulwayi; tunakumini jakwila kwanyijimu yetu hohu.
43017011 Cheliluwu aji munzhila yawu yakuya kuYerusalema, yena wajing'i nakuhita muneli Samariya iku, ng'aliliya iku, yena mukachi.
43017012 Chayiliyi mumukala wumu, hikukumubulakana amayala ikumi akweti musong'u wambumba, hiyakwimana hahalehi;
43017013 hiyakubijeka nang'ovu nawu, Yesu, Mwanta, tutiyili luwi.
43017014 Chanayimoniyi, hakuyila ninji, Yenu mwakajimwekeshi kuji atupristu. Chajing'i nakuyawu, atooka nikutooka.
43017015 Wumu, chanamoniyi nakoli jehi, hakufunta nakulemesha Nzambi nezu jang'ovu.
43017016 Hakujinata chamesu heseki kunyenju yaYesu nakumusakilila; yenowu muntu wajing'i kaSamariya.
43017017 Yesu hakumwihula ninji, Hiyanatookeshi ikumuku? Inji awa atanu nawana aji kujihi?
43017018 Kwosi nafunti nakumulemesha Nzambi, ching'a yoyeniwu mwenyi wamwitung'a jacheng'i hohu?
43017019 Hakumwila ninji, Nyamukaku, yang'a kweyi kukuhwelela kweyi; kunakukoleshi jehi.
43017020 Chamwihwiluwu kuji aFwarisewu hamba kenza wanta waNzambi, hakuyakula ninji, Wanta waNzambi hiwukwinza nakuwutala namesuku,
43017021 hela nakuhosha nawu, Iwu! hela, Owu! Nehi. Talenu, wanta waNzambi wuji mujenu.
43017022 Hakuyila atumbanzhi ninji, Mafuku akenza imwakakeng'a kumona ifuku jaMwana kaMuntu jimu, himwakajimonaku.
43017023 Chakahoshawu nawu, Owu! hela, Iwu! bayi mwakafumahu hela kuyilonjelaku.
43017024 Hefuku jaMwana kaMuntu, yena wakela neyi nvula yikukena kumutamba wumu wewulu, kutooka nikumutamba wukwawu.
43017025 Ilang'a ching'a yosambila kukaba yuma yayivulu, amuhela kuji antu achisakichi.
43017026 Cheliluwu hamafuku aNowa, jichi chakelawu nihamafuku aMwana kaMuntu nawa.
43017027 Ajiilang'a, anwinang'a, asumbwilang'a, asumbwishilang'a, njo-o nikwifuku jeng'ililiyi Nowa muwatu; jibazhi jinza nikwinza, jiyizhilumuna niwezhima wawu.
43017028 Cheliluwu hamafuku aLoti, ajiilang'a, anwinang'a, alanjilang'a, alanjishilang'a, ajiminang'a, atung'ilang'a;
43017029 ilang'a hefuku jafuminiyi Loti muSojoma, kwanokeli kesi, nikesi kakufuma mwiwulu kuji Nzambi, kayizhilumwini wezhima wawu.
43017030 Mwomumu nawa jimu mwakelawu ifuku jakamwekana Mwana kaMuntu.
43017031 Ifuku oju muntu wakekala hewulu jetala, yuma yinji yiji mwitala, bayi asuluka nakuyitwala kwacheng'uku. Chochimu nimuntu wakekala mwiha, bayi afunta cheng'uku.
43017032 Anukenu ing'ojaLoti.
43017033 Muntu wukukeng'a kumona wumi winji wakawuzhimbesha; muntu wukuzhimbesha wumi winji wakawumona wawuwenyi.
43017034 Nukuyilezha nami, hawufuku wenowu antu ayeji akekala hakajiji kamu; wumu akamutwala, mukwawu wakashala.
43017035 Antu ayeji akekala nakutwa hamu; wumu akamutwala, mukwawu wakashala.
43017036 Antu ayeji akekala mwiha; wumu akamutwala, mukwawu wakashala.
43017037 Hiyakumwihula nawu, Kujihi Mwanta? Yena hakuyila ninji, Kunafwili kanyama, jiku kukupompela makubi.
43018001 Hakuyitila chishimu kulonja alombelang'a mafuku ezhima chakaji kuzeya,
43018002 ninji, Mumukala weneni wumu mwajing'i nsompeshi wumu wabulili kutiya Nzambi woma, hela kubang'a antu nehi.
43018003 Mumukalowu mwajing'i mumbanja wamfwila wumu; yena mumbanja hakuzebang'a kuji owu nsompeshi ninji, Nhosheli mulong'a nasamulong'a wami.
43018004 Hahitili mafuku yena kwonti kwinji; nkumininaku hakwila mumuchima winji ninji, Ami hinatiyang'a Nzambi womaku, hela antu kuyibang'a nehi;
43018005 hela chochu, chakuswezhayi mumbanja iwu kunzebela, keng'a anzeyeshi tuhu, chakwilayi zebe-e ichi, nukukumina jakumuhoshela mulong'a winji tuhu.
43018006 Mwanta wahosheli ninji, Tiyenu chahosheliyi owu nsompeshi waheng'a.
43018007 Nzambi abuli kutenja antu inji atonjayi jehi, amubilelang'a nimwaana niwufuku, wakabula kuyitiyilila?
43018008 Nukuyilezha nami hakalaba nakuyitenjaku. Hela ochu, chakenzayi Mwana kaMuntu, wakawana kukuhwelela hamaseki, tahinji?
43018009 Hakutila nawa chishimu antu ajikuhwelelang'a awenawu nawu twalong'a, hiyakujiwula akwawu ezhima,
43018010 ninji, Antu ayeji akanjukili muTembeli akalombeli, iwu kaFwarisewu, iwu nsonkeshi.
43018011 KaFwarisewu hakwimana nakujilombelela mumuchima winji ninji, Eyi Nzambi, nakusakilili chinabuli kwikala neyi antu acheng'i, akwanyilami, aheng'a, ayivumbi, hela tuhu neyi iwu nsonkeshi iwu.
43018012 Nazhing'ang'a nakuleka kujya hamulungu kayeji, hamulungu kayeji; nalambulang'a yamwikumi yayuma yinahetang'a yezhima.
43018013 Ilang'a nsonkeshi hakwimana kwakulehi, kumona zhakufumbula mesu inji atala kwiwulu nehi; ilang'a hakukwata hantulu yinji nakuneng'a ninji, Eyi Nzambi, antiyili luwi, ami mukwanshiji.

43018014 Nukuyilezha nami, yeniwu muntu jiyi wakunkumukili kwitala jinji anamuying'ishi jehi nakumutena walong'a, bayi iwu mukwawuku; mulong'a muntu wukujitohesha akamukehesha, ilang'a muntu wukujikehesha akamutohesha.
43018015 Hiyakumuletela anyanawu anyanya kulonja yena ayinang'iki makasa; atumbanzhi chanachimonuwu, hiyakuyihoshola.
43018016 Ilang'a Yesu hakuyitambika ninji, Yitezhenu anyana anyanya enzi kujami, bayi muyilekeshaku; mulong'a wanta waNzambi wawena aji chochichi.
43018017 Nukuyilezha chalala nami, muntu wukubula kutambula wanta waNzambi neyi mwana wanyanya, hakwing'ilamu nihantuku.
43018018 Nyuuli wumu hakumwihula ninji, Eyi Nkulung'ang'a muwahi, nukwila ng'ahi kulonja nakaswani wumi wahayanyaka?
43018019 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Wukuntenenaji neyi muwahi? Hosi muwahuku ching'a Nzambi hohu.
43018020 Nshimbi wazhiluka jehi nawu, Kwila wuvumbi chinzhila. Kuzhaha muntu chinzhila. Kwiya chinzhila. Kushimuna wunsahu wakutwamba chinzhila. Lemeshaku tata yeyi namama yeyi.
43018021 Yena ninji, Yuma yezhimiyi nayihemba jehi kufumisha kuwansi.
43018022 Yesu chanachitiyiyi, hakumwila ninji, Kunashali chuma chimu; lanjishaku yiwuji nayu yezhima, wuyinki atuzweng'i, wuheti maheta amwiwulu; winzi wunlonjang'a.
43018023 Ilang'a yena chanachitiyiyi, hakuneng'a nankashi, mulong'a wajing'i waswezha kuheta.
43018024 Yesu hakumutala, hakwila ninji, O chamonang'awu akwakuheta kukala kwing'ila muwanta waNzambi!
43018025 ng'ameli kwing'ila mujisu janjong'u chaswayi; mukwakuheta kwing'ila muwanta waNzambi chakala.
43018026 Antu achitiyili hiyakwila nawu, Inji wamba kamwinewa hinyi?
43018027 Yena ninji, Yuma yikukang'anya antu, Nzambi wukuyitwesha.
43018028 Petulu ninji, Tala, etu tunashiyi yuma yetu yezhima, tunakulonjeli.
43018029 Yena hakuyila ninji, Nukuyilezha chalala nami, muntu wukushiya itala, hela ing'ojinji, hela anakwinji, hela anvwali, hela anyana hansang'u yawanta waNzambi,
43018030 wukutambula makonu akubajikawa, nihanyaka yakenza wakatambula wumi wahayanyaka.
43018031 Hakupompesha ikumi nayeji (12) kwajing'iyi yena, hakuyila ninji, Tiyenu, hitukuya nakukanjuka kuYerusalema; yuma yezhima yakutena Mwana kaMuntu munyikanja yawatuprofwetu yakalumbuluka.
43018032 Mulong'a akamulubula kuji azhentili, akamuseha, akamutiyisha nsonyi nankashi, akamufwizhila mazeng'i,
43018033 akamuvupola, akamuzhaha; ifuku jamuchisatu wakasang'uka muji afu.
43018034 Wena, yuma yezhimiyi kuyilumbulukila nehi; izu iji ayizhinjiliju, kwiluka yuma yahosheliyi nehi.
43018035 Chelili naswili jehi kwakwihi naYeriku, mputamesu wumu washakamini kunsa yanzhila nakulomba yamukunkulu.
43018036 Chanatiyiyi izaza jawantu hijikuhita, hakwihula ninji, Kunasong'iji?
43018037 Hiyakumulezha nawu, Yesu wakuNazareta hakuhita.
43018038 Hakubilela ninji, Eyi Yesu, Mwana kajaviji, ntiyili luwi.
43018039 Átwamininuku hiyakumuhoshola nawu, Mwenaku. Ilang'a yena hakuswezha kubilela ninji, Eyi Mwana kajaviji, ntiyili luwi.
43018040 Yesu hakwimana, hakuyila ninji, Muletenu kujami. Chanashikiyi kwakwihi,
43018041 hakumwihula ninji, Wunakeng'i nikwilili chumanyi? Yena ninji, Mwanta nakeng'i nimonang'a.
43018042 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Monaku; kukuhwelela kweyi kunakukoleshi jehi.
43018043 Hohenohu yomona nikumona; hakumulonjela Yesu nakulemesha Nzambi. Antu ezhima chanachimonuwu, hiyakuhameka Nzambi.
43019001 Eng'ila nimuYeriku, hakuya nakupanjakanamu.
43019002 Kutala iyala wumu, izhina jinji Zakewu, mukulumpi wawansonkeshi waheta,
43019003 wakeng'elang'a kumumona Yesu amwiluki chajiyi, ilang'a wakang'enyi nansang'u yezaza jawantu, mulong'a yena wajing'i wakiya.
43019004 Hakutemukang'ahu jehi lufuchi, hakukanjama kuchilembalemba kulonja amumoni, mulong'a jiku kwakukeng'a kuhitilayi Yesu.
43019005 Chanashikiyi Yesu kwenoku, hakutala kwiwulu, hakumwila ninji, Eyi Zakewu, sulukaku swayi; lelu ching'a nishakama kwitala jeyi.
43019006 Hakusuluka swayi, hakumutambula namuzang'alu.
43019007 Antu chanachimonuwu, hiyakunyinyita wezhima wawu nawu, Nayi nakukama kuji iyala mukwanshiji.
43019008 Zakewu hakwimana, hakumwila Mwanta ninji, Mwanta, tala, nukubalula mahetami hakachi, chibalu chimu nanzhang'eni atuzweng'i; neyi haji muntu najiila yawukombi, nukumufuntishila yiwana.
43019009 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Lelu wamwinu wunenzi kwitaliji, nanochu chaneliyi niyena himwana kaAbarahama.
43019010 Mulong'a Mwana kaMuntu nenzi akakeng'akeng'i, akaamwini wazhimbeli.
43019011 Chanatiyuwu yumiyi, hakunung'aku chishimu mulong'a haji kwakwihi naYerusalema. Antu ajing'i nakutong'ozhoka nawu wanta waNzambi keng'a wumwekani hohenohu.
43019012 jichi hakwila ninji, Chilolu wumu wayili kwitung'a jakwakulehi, ninji akatambuli wanta winji akafunti cheng'i.
43019013 Hakutambika ang'amba zhinji ikumi, hakuyanzhang'ena mali ikumi, hakuyila ninji, Lanjululenu kushika nichinakenza cheng'i.
43019014 Ilang'a akwamukala winji ajing'i amuhela, hiyakumutemeshela antu alema nawu, Kwonti kwetu yeniwu kwikala mwanta wetu.
43019015 Chanafuntiyi cheng'i, natambuli jehi wanta, hakutambika ang'amba enkeliyi mali, kulonja eluki yanawanuwu kukulanjulula.
43019016 Watachi hakwinza kuji yena ninji, Eyi mwanta, kujali jeyi nawenuku amakwawu ikumi.
43019017 Hakumwila ninji, Chachiwahi, eyi wung'amba wamuwahi; chiwunashinshiki nakachuma kantesha, ikalaku mwanta wanyikala ikumi.
43019018 Wamuchiyeji hakwinza ninji, Eyi mwanta, kujali jeyi nawenuku atanu.
43019019 Hakumwila niyena nawa ninji, Nineyi nawa ikalaku mwanta wanyikala yitanu
43019020 ukwawu hakwinza ninji, Eyi mwanta, tala ijali jeyi iji, najiswekeli mwihina.
43019021 Nakutiyili woma nanochu chiwazuwa; wenja wunona yiwabulili kutenteka, wenja wumuna kuwabulili kukuwa
43019022 Hakumwila ninji, Eyi ng'amba watama, nukukusompesha namazu amukanwa keyeyi aweni. Welukili neyi ami nimuntu wazuwa, nenja ninona yinabulili kutenteka, nenja nimuna kunabulili kukuwa;
43019023 walekeleliji kusha mali ami mubanki, kulonja ichi chinenzi, niwani niyakushilahu?
43019024 Hakuyila antu emenuku ninji, Mutambulenu ijali jinji, mwinkenu iwu wukweti mali ikumi.
43019025 Hiyakumwila nawu, Mwanta, iwu wukweti mali ikumi.
43019026 Ninji, Nukuyilezha nami wúkweti akamulunzhikila, wábula akamutambula ninaka kajiyi naku.
43019027 Ilang'a awa akwankunyi nami abulili kukeng'a ami kwikala mwanta wawu, yiletenu kunu, muyizhahili kumesu ami.
43019028 Chanahoshiyi ochu, hakutwaminang'ahu jehi, hakukanjuka kuYerusalema.
43019029 Chayilang'ayi nakushika kwakwihi naBetefwazhi naBetani, kwokumpiji yaOliveta, hakutemesha atumbanzhi twinji ayeji,
43019030 ninji, Yenu kumukala wuji kumbiji wuna. Chimukushika mukumona mwana kachimbulu wakaji kwenjelang'ahu jehi muntu, anamukasi; mwakamukasununi mumuleti kunu.
43019031 Neyi muntu wukuyihula ninji, Mukumukasunwinaji? mwakamwila nenu, Anamukeng'i kuji Mwanta.
43019032 Átemesheluwu hiyakuya, hiyakuwana mwomwayilezheliyi.
43019033 Chajing'i nakukasununawu mwana kachimbulu, ámuheteli hiyakuyila nawu, Muji nakumukasunwinaji mwana kachimbulu?
43019034 Hiyakuyila nawu, Mwanta jiyi namukeng'i.
43019035 Hiyakumuleta kuji Yesu, hiyakusha mahinawu hamwana kachimbulu, amukanjamishahu niYesu.
43019036 Chajing'i nakuyayi, hiyakwala mahinawu mumukwakwa.
43019037 Chayilang'ayi nakushika kwakwihi nakwakunkumukila mpiji yaOliveta, izaza jawatumbanzhi jezhima hijikutachika kuzang'alala nakuhameka Nzambi nezu jang'ovu, nanyijimu yanamonuwu jehi yezhima.
43019038 Nawu, Kisu kisu Mwanta wukwinza mwizhina jaMWANTA; Mwiwulu mwikali kuwunja, Mwiwulu jakubajika mwikali lubanzhi lwakulema.
43019039 AFwarisewu amakwawu ajing'i mwizaza hiyakumwila nawu, Eyi Nkulung'ang'a, yihosholi atumbanzhi tweyi.
43019040 Kuchinka yena ninji, Nukuyilezha nami, neyi wena akumwena malola awa akuvwakuka.
43019041 Chayilang'ayi nakushika kwakwihi, amona niYerusalema, hakuyijilila,
43019042 ninji, Lelu neyi wajing'i weluka yuma yikukuletela kuwunja! Ilang'a anayizhinji wubuli kuyimona.
43019043 Mulong'a mafuku amba kakuwana, amba kakupunjila mpwembu kuji akwankunyi neyi kwi-njo; amba kakuzhikilila niniku niniku mbaji zhezhima;
43019044 amba kakunatila heseki kumu nawanyaneyi; mujeyi himwamba kashala ilola jimu jakunang'amana hajikwawuku; nanochu chiwabulili kwiluka mpinzhi yanakuhempuluwu.
43019045 Hakwing'ila muTembeli, hakutachika kutemunamu ájing'i nakulanjishilamu.
43019046 Hakuyila ninji, Anasoneki nawu, Itala jami jakela itala jakulombelela; ilang'a enu kwenu munajibalumuni kwikala iyeng'u jawamakombi.
43019047 Hakutang'isha hefuku hefuku muTembeli. Akulumpi zhawatupristu niansoneki nawantu alema hiyakukeng'a hakumuzhahila;
43019048 ilang'a akang'enyi kumona mwakwila, mulong'a antu ezhima hiyakujung'umika nakumutiyilila.
43020001 Wena mafuku owu, ifuku jimu wajing'i nakutang'isha antu muTembeli nikushimuna nsang'u yayiwahi, kuji yena hikukwinza akulumpi zhawatupristu niansoneki niakulumpi.
43020002 Hiyakumwila nawu, Tulezhi, eyi welang'a yumiyi nawantanyi? Inji nakwinki wantiwu hinyi?
43020003 Hakuyakula ninji, Ninami nawa nukuyihula kajizu kamu, munlezhi.
43020004 Chizhimikilu chaYowanu chakwiwulu, tahinji chakuji antu?
43020005 Wena hiyakujihuzhola nawu, Neyi tukwila netu chakwiwulu, yena wukwila ninji, Mwalekeleliji kumukuhwelela?
43020006 Neyi tukwila netu chakuji antu, akutwasola malola kuji antu ezhima; mulong'a wena etezhang'a nawu Yowanu wajing'i kaprofwetu.
43020007 jichi hiyakwakula nawu, Kwizhi; hituneluki kuchafuminuku.
43020008 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Hela ami hinukuyilezha wanta wunelang'a nachu yumiyuku.
43020009 Hakutachika kuyitila antu chishimu chakwila ninji, Muntu wumu wajimini itempa janyivinyu; hakujishila akwakujima, hakuya kwitung'a jacheng'i haleheli chacheni.
43020010 Hachilaaka chanyikabu hakutemeshela akwakujima njung'u wumu, kulonja amwinki nyikabu yamwitempa. Ilang'a akwakujima hiyakumweta, hiyakumufuntisha makasakasa.
43020011 Hakutemeshaku ninjung'u mukwawu; niyena nawa hiyakumweta, hiyakumukong'a chatama, amufuntisha nimakasakasa.
43020012 Hakutemeshaku wamuchisatu; niyena nawa hiyakumukatisha, amunata nikumpata.
43020013 Mwiniitempa janyivinyu ninji, Nukwila ng'ahi? Nukutemesha mwanami nakeng'a nankashi, wamba kela akamwakama yena.
43020014 Ilang'a akwakujima chanamumonuwu, hiyakutiyang'ana nawu, Iwu jiyi nswana; tumuzhahenu, kulonja wuswana wikali wetwetu
43020015 Hiyakumwijisha mwitempoju, hiyakumuzhaha. jichi mwiniitempa wakayila ng'ahi?
43020016 Wakenza nakuzhilumuna awa akwakujima, oju itempa wakenka antu acheng'i. Chanachitiyuwu, hiyakwila nawu, Chinzhila!
43020017 Ilang'a yena hakuyitala ninji, Iji izu janasonekuwu jakwila nawu, Ilola jalekeli antung'i, jojinekali jaswezha kwoloka nankashi jakwiwombu, jaya mujihi?
43020018 Antu ezhima akuholokela heloloju, akukotoka kotu kotu; hakwila muntu akaholokelawu kuji iloloju, akamufukumuna neyi lunkung'u.
43020019 Yena mpinzhi oyu ansoneki niakulumpi zhawatupristu akeng'eli nawu amukwati, ilang'a hiyakutiya woma wawantu; mulong'a wena elukili nawu, Chishimu ichi natili etu.
43020020 Hiyakumweba, hiyakutemeshaku akwakumwenjesha ajimbeni kumwekana neyi antu along'a, kulonja amukwati namazu akuhoshayi, amoni zhakumulubula kung'ovu nikuwanta wanyuuli.
43020021 Hiyakumwihula nawu, Eyi Nkulung'ang'a, tuneluki netu eyi wahoshang'a nikutang'isha mwalong'a, hiwatiyang'a muntu womaku, watang'ishang'a nzhila yaNzambi muwalala.
43020022 Chalong'a etu kusonka kuji Kesari, tahinji nehi?
43020023 Ilang'a yena wamweni makasu awu,
43020024 hakuyila ninji, Nlezhenu ijali. jikweti chifwikizha chanyi, ninsona yanyi? Nawu, YaKesari.
43020025 Kuchinka yena ninji, jichi mwinkenu Kesari yuma yaKesari; mwinkenu Nzambi yuma yaNzambi.
43020026 Chanahoshiyi mazu owu kumesu awantu, hiyamweni hakumushintakeshelaku; akuminini jakuhayama mwakwiliyi, amwena ninzo-o.
43020027 Kuji yena hikukwinza aSajusi amakwawu, elang'a nawu afu hiyasang'ukang'aku.

43020028 Hiyakumwihula nawu, Eyi Nkulung'ang'a, Mosi watusonekeleli ninji, neyi muntu wukweti manakwinji ofwa chakaji kumushiya ing'ojinji namwana, manakwinji akatambuli mumbanja, akamuvweli manakwinji mwana.
43020029 jichi kwajing'i amayala atanu nayeji ivumu jawu jimu. Watachi wasumbwili mumbanja, wafwili chakaji anyana;
43020030 niwamuchiyeji, niwamuchisatu chochu.
43020031 Wezhima wawu atanu nayeji chochu nawa, afwili, kushiya anyana nehi.
43020032 Nkumininaku mumbanja niyena ofwa nikufwa.
43020033 jichi hamba kasang'ukawu afu, mumbanja wakela ing'ojawumwojihi? Mulong'a ezhima wawu atanu nayeji amusumbwili.
43020034 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Antu anyakiyi asumbulang'a, asumbukang'a;
43020035 ilang'a antu anafuukuluwu nawu anateli kushika kunyakoyu, nikukusang'uka muji afu, hiyakasumbula hela kusumbukaku.
43020036 Mulong'a hela kufwa, hiyakatwesha kufwa cheng'uku; anesekani nawang'elu, hiyanyana kaNzambi anasang'uki jehi.
43020037 Hakwila nsang'u yakusang'uka, hela Mosi wayilezheli, oku kwasonekawu nsang'u yachiputa, hateneniyi MWANTA ninji, Ami Yami Nzambi yaAbarahama, Nzambi yaIsaka, Nzambi yaYakoba.
43020038 Yena hiNzambi yawafuku, hiNzambi yawamomi; mulong'a ezhima amuhanjilang'a yena.
43020039 Ansoneki amakwawu hiyakwakula nawu, Eyi Nkulung'ang'a, wunahoshi chachiwahi.
43020040 Mulong'a atiyili woma wakumwihula cheng'i chuma chikwawu.
43020041 Hakuyila ninji, Chelang'awu nawu Kristu himwana kajaviji, chaya mujihi?
43020042 Mulong'a javiji yomweni namuteni mumukanja waMasamu ninji, MWANTA wamwilili Mwanta wami ninji, Shakamaku kuchikasa chami chachijiilu,
43020043 Nichinamba kayila ayilumbu zheyi hiyaji itanja jakunyenju yeyi.
43020044 javiji wamutenang'a ninji Mwanta; wukwikala mwaninji ng'ahi?
43020045 Hakuyila atumbanzhi twinji, iku antu ezhima aji nakumutiya,
43020046 ninji, Babelenu ansoneki, atiyang'a kuwaha kuvwalavwala mahina akuluka, akeng'a kuyimwosha kuwulanjilu, akeng'a matanja alema mumashikola, akeng'a kushakama halema kuyawizha;
43020047 hiyakulombela lombelele-e kulombela kwakujimbana nachu, iku aji nakujya maheta awambanja amfwila. jiwu amba kamona kubabesha kwaswezha.
43021001 Hakubanjuka, hakumona akwakuheta aji nakuumbila nyilambu yawu muchikasha chakuswekela mali.
43021002 Hakumona mumbanja mfwila kazweng'i wumu, hakuumbilamu tumali twanyanya tuyeji.
43021003 Hakwila ninji, Nukuyilezha chalala nami, mumbanjiwu mfwila kazweng'i, nombilumu yabajika akwawu ezhima.
43021004 Mulong'a awa ezhima anombilumu nyilambu yakumahetawu amavulu; ilang'a yeniwu mumbanja nombilumu yawuzweng'i winji, yezhima yajing'i yakujikwasha nachu.
43021005 Antu amakwawu ajing'i nakutena Tembeli, chayiwahishiluwu namalola amawahi niyamukunkulu yikwawu yakumwekesha lubanzhi.
43021006 Hakuyila ninji, Yumiyi yimukutala, mafuku amba kenza hiyamba kashiya ilola nijimu jakanang'amana helola jikwawu, jakabula kunatika hesekuku.
43021007 Hiyakumwihula nawu, Eyi Nkulung'ang'a, inji yumiyi yamba kashika hamwaakanyi? Hakakeng'a kumwekana yumiyi, hamba kekala chinzhikizhilu chanka?
43021008 Yena hakuyila ninji, Babalenu akenja kayiluwang'esha. Mulong'a amavulu akenza mwizhina jami nakwila nawu, jiyi ami; nawu, Mwaka wunashiki jehi kwakwihi. Bayi mwakayilonjelaku.
43021009 Chimwakatiya nsang'u zhamazhita nimapumba, bayi mwakafwa mutentuku; mulong'a yumiyi ching'a yisambila kumwekana; hakwinza kukumisha kuchiji kanja.
43021010 Henohu hakunung'aku ninji, Munza wakanyamuka nakulwa namunza wukwawu, wanta nawanta wukwawu.
43021011 Kwakaholoka nyitentanshi yayeni, ninzala, niyipupu kwacheng'i nakwacheng'i. Kwakekala yuma yafwana yakufwisha antu mutentu, niyinzhikizhilu yamaneni yakufuma kwiwulu.

43021012 Hakela yuma yezhimiyi yichiji kanja yishiki, akasambila kuyikwatenu, akayikabisha, akayilubula kuyota yawu, akayisha mutuleya, akayikokela kumesu awanyanta ankanu nawanyuuli kukoola izhina jami.
43021013 Chakabalumuka chuma chakuyishimwina nachu antu wunsahu.
43021014 jichi kuminenu jakuwunja munyichima yenu, muleki kutong'ozhokang'ahu jehi mumwakaakula;
43021015 mulong'a ami nakayinka kanwa nimaana, kulonja akwankunyi nenu ezhima akakang'anyi hela kujikang'ilamu, hela kutajikamu.
43021016 Anvwali zhenu, hela anakwenu, hela antang'a zhenu, hela amabwambu zhenu akayifukezha; enu amakwawu akayizhahisha.
43021017 Akayihela kuji antu ezhima kukoola izhina jami.
43021018 Kwosi nsuki yakunyitu yenu niyimu, yakakisikaku.
43021019 Mukukakela kwenu, jimu mumukumwena wumi wenu.
43021020 Ilang'a himwakamona Yerusalema anayikuchiki jehi namazhita kwi-njo, henohu kelukenu nenu keng'a ayibalumuni yikali ihembi.
43021021 Henohu áji muYujeya akatemukili kumapiji; áji mukachi kamukala akafumumu; áji mumaha bayi akeng'ila cheng'i mung'anjaku.
43021022 Mulong'a wenawa jiwu mafuku akutenja, kulonja yuma yasonekeluwu yezhima yakalumbuluki.
43021023 Oyi yihung'u yakamonawu ákekala namavumu, niákaamwisha hamafuku owu! Mulong'a mwitung'a mwakaholoka ihung'u jaswezha hamafuku owu, nikuzuwila nankashi antu ambala awa.
43021024 Akayitapa nampoku yakabali, akayitwala muwunkoli munyunza yezhima; ng'anja Yerusalema akayijata kuji azhentili, nichamba kamana nyaka yawazhentili.
43021025 Mwitang'wa mwakekala yinzhikizhilu, nimukakwezhi, nimututumbwa; nyunza yakakaba nankashi heseki, hiyakuhayama lushinju lwamankanja akalung'alwizhi.
