43021026 Antu akahwijizhela nawoma munyichima yawu, nakutalila yuma yiji nakwinza hamatung'a, mulong'a ng'ovu zhamawulu zhakakanka.
43021027 Henohu akamona Mwana kaMuntu hakwinza mwivu, nang'ovu yayeni, nalubanzhi lwakulema kwaswezha.
43021028 Yumiyi chiyakatachika kumwekana, banjulenu nyitu yenu, talenu kwiwulu, mulong'a kukuula kwenu hikukushika kwakwihi.
43021029 Hakuyitila chishimu ninji, Talenu iwu mutonju wachikuyu ninyitonju yezhima.
43021030 Chiyinasapuki ichi, munachimoni, muneluki enu aweni nenu nkanza yiji kwakwihi.
43021031 Chochimu ninenu nawa, chimwakamona yumiyi hiyikumwekana, kelukenu nenu wanta waNzambi keng'a wushiki.
43021032 Nukuyilezha chalala nami, chisakichi kuhita ching'a yuma yezhima yinamani jehi.
43021033 Iwulu jakahita, niiseki nawa; mazu ami hiyamba kahitaku.
43021034 Ilang'a babalenu enu aweni, nyichima yenu yakenja kaswezha kwikuta, nakusheta walwa, nikwakama yuma yawumi wunu, ifuku oju jakenja kayikasumwisha neyi muhetu.
43021035 Mulong'a jichi chijakashikena antu ezhima ashakama heseki jezhima.
43021036 Tonenung'a kwenu hayilaaka yezhima nakulembelela, kulonja mwakemiki mushinju, mwakapuluki kuyuma yezhimiyi, mwakemani kumesu aMwana kaMuntu
43021037 Hefuku hefuku wajing'i nakutang'isha muTembeli namwaana; hawufuku wejikilang'a nakuya nakukama kumpiji yaOliveta.
43021038 Antu ezhima amenekelang'a bujiji kuji yena muTembeli amutiyi.
43022001 Henohu Chawizha chaMankenji Akaji Ilung'i, chikweti izhina jaChipanjakenu, hichikuswila kwakwihi.
43022002 Akulumpi zhawatupristu niansoneki hiyakukeng'a hakumuzhahila Yesu, mulong'a atiyili antu woma.
43022003 Satana hakwing'ila muji Yujasi atumbawu izhina jikwawu jaIsakaroti, wajing'i wahekumi nayeji (12).
43022004 Hakuya, hakutiyang'ana nawakulumpi zhawatupristu niakulumpi zhanzhita, mwakumulubwila kuji wena.
43022005 Atiya nikuwaha; hiyakutiyang'ana ninji kumwinka mali.
43022006 Yena hakwitezha, hakukeng'a hatela kumulubwila kuji wena hakaji izaza jawantu.
43022007 Chijinashiki Ifuku jaMankenji Akaji Ilung'i, jazhahang'awu mwana kamukoku waChipanjakenu,
43022008 Yesu hakutemesha aPetulu naYowanu ninji, Yenu mutulong'esheli Chipanjakenu, twakajyi.
43022009 Wena hiyakumwihula nawu, Wunakeng'i tulong'esheli kujihi?
43022010 Yena hakuyila ninji, Chimukushika mung'anja, kukuyibulakana iyala nasenji nsaba yamenzhi; mwakamulonjeli mwitala mwakwing'ilayi.
43022011 Mwakamwili mwiniitala nenu, Nkulung'ang'a nehuli ninji, Itala jawenyi jinakajiila Chipanjakenu nawatumbanzhi twami jijihi
43022012 Yena wakayilezha itala jahewulu jeneni, muji yuma yakupong'omwena jehi; jimu mwakalong'eshela.
43022013 Hiyakuya, hiyakuwana mwomwayilezhayi jehi; along'esha niChipanjakenu.
43022014 Chiyinashiki mpinzhi, hakushakama hamu nawapostolu.
43022015 Hakuyila ninji, Nafwili kujya nenu Chipanjakenu ichi, hinichiji kanja nikabi.
43022016 Mulong'a nukuyilezha nami, kuchijya cheng'i, ching'a chinalumbuluki jehi chalala muwanta waNzambi.
43022017 Hakutambula lupasa, chanasakililiyi hakwila ninji, Tambulenu lwenilu munwi wezhima wenu.
43022018 Ami nukuyilezha nami, kufumisha kulelu hinakanwa cheng'i yanyikabu yamuvinyuku, kunwa cheng'i, ching'a wanta waNzambi wunenzi jehi.
43022019 Hakunona jinkenji, chanasakililiyi hakujihumuna, hakuyinka, ninji, Weniwu jiwu muzhimba wami wanenkuwu hanyizhimba yenwenu; ilenung'a mwenimu mung'anakanang'a nachu.
43022020 Mwomumu nawa, cheliluwu anajyi jehi, hakunona lupasa ninji, Lupasilu jichi chitiyang'enu chachiha chamumashi ami, awa akuyipwekela.
43022021 Talenu, chikasa chamfukezhi chiji hamu nachami hamesa.
43022022 Mulong'a Mwana kaMuntu chalala hakuya, mwomwatong'weluwu jehi; oyi yihung'u yakamona muntu wukumufukezha!
43022023 Wena hiyakutachika kujihuzhola nawu mukwetwinyi wukwila chumichi?
43022024 Mukachi kawu himukuvulumuka ntaji yakwila nawu mwinetwinyi aketezhawu nawu nabajiki akwawu?
43022025 Yena hakuyila ninji, Anyanta zhawazhentili ayiyuulang'a; niákweti wanta mukachi kawu ayitenang'a nawu akwakuwahisha akwawu.
43022026 Ilang'a enu bayi mwilang'a omuku. Nábajiki akwawu mukachi kenu ekali neyi kansi, niwálema ekali neyi mukwakukalakela akwawu.
43022027 Mulong'a nabajiki hinyi, wákalakalang'a, tahinji iwu nashakami nakujya? Netu, iwu nashakami nakujya. Ilang'a ami niji mukachi kenu nimukwakuyikalakela.
43022028 Enu yenu munankakelami mwahita kweseka kwami kwezhima;
43022029 ami nukuyikunzhika wanta wenu, neyi chankunzhikiluwu ami kuji Tata yami,
43022030 kulonja mwakajyi nakunwa kumesa yami muwanta wami, mwakashakami hamatanja awanta nakusompesha nyunza yaIsarela ikumi nayiyeji (12).
43022031 Eyi Shimona, Shimona, Satana nayilombi jehi kulonja ayisaali neyi tijiku;
43022032 ilang'a ami nakulombeleli kulonja kukuhwelela kweyi kubuli kukang'anya. Nineyi, chiwakabalumuka mumuchima, wakakoleshang'a anakweyi.
43022033 Petulu hakumwila ninji, Mwanta netezhi kuya naneyi hela mukaleya hela tuhu kufwa.
43022034 Hakumwila ninji, Eyi Petulu, nukukulezha nami, ikombu kwitiyila lelu ching'a eyi wunasambili jehi kujikala kasatu neyi hinamwiluka Yesuku.
43022035 Hakuyila ninji, Chinayitemesheli chakaji hela chikwama hela ipakumuna hela nkwabilu, mwakaankilili chuma, tahinji? Nawu, Nehi.
43022036 Hakuyila ninji, Ichi jinu, yowu wukweti chikwama asenji, niipakumuna chochimu; nábuli mpoku yakabali alanjishi kahuma kinji kulonja alanji yimu.

43022037 Mulong'a nukuyilezha nami, chuma chasonekeluwu chakuntenami chakwila nawu, Amubombeli hamu nawakwakuputola; keng'a chilumbulukili mujami. Mulong'a nsang'u zhasonekawu jehi zhezhima zhakuntenami keng'a zhimani.
43022038 Wena nawu, Mwanta, tala mpoku zhakabali zhiyeji izhi. Yena hakuyila ninji, zhinawanini.
43022039 Hakwijika, hakuya kumpiji yaOliveta neyi chelilang'ayi; atumbanzhi niwena hiyakumulonjela.
43022040 Chanashikiyi kwayilang'ayi, hakuyila ninji, Lombelenu mubuli kwing'ila mukutesha.
43022041 Hakwambuka nawu kuleha neyi mwakunatila ilola, hakufukama nakulombela,
43022042 ninji, Eyi Tata, neyi wunetezhi amfumishi lupasilu; ilang'a bayi ela munakeng'amuku, ching'a muwunakeng'eyi.
43022043 Hikukumumwekena kang'elu wakufuma mwiwulu nakumukolesha.
43022044 Hakulwisha nankashi, hakuswezha kulombela; masulwilinji hiyakwila kafwampi neyi malekileki amashi aweni hiyakuholokela hamaseki.
43022045 Hakunyamuka kukulombela kwinji, hakwinza kuji atumbanzhi, hakuyiwana anakami jehi tulu twakuneng'a.
43022046 Hakuyila ninji, Munakaminiji tulu? Hinjukenu mulombeli, mubuli kwing'ila mukutesha.
43022047 Iku wuchiji kuhosha, kutala izaza jawantu, ninowu wahekumi nayeji (12) wukweti izhina jaYujasi, natwaminuku. Hakwinza kwakwihi naYesu amupwepuzholi.
43022048 Ilang'a Yesu hakumwila ninji, Eyi Yujasi, wufukezhi Mwana kaMuntu nakumupwepuzhola?
43022049 Ájing'i ninji, chanamonuwu chakukeng'a kwilawu, hiyakwila nawu, Mwanta tutapani nampoku yakabali, tahinji?
43022050 Mwinawu wumu hakutapa ng'amba yakapristu muneni, kutapa kwakumuketula itu jachijiilu.
43022051 Yesu hakwila ninji, Kunahu, lekenu. Yokwata niitu jinji, yomukuswisha nikumukuswisha.
43022052 Yesu hakuyila akulumpi zhawatupristu niakulumpi zhamashijika akuTembeli, niakulumpi zhawantu enzhili nakumukwata, ninji, Munenzi nampoku zhakabali nanyitonju neyi chakukwata ikombi?
43022053 Chinajing'i nenu muTembeli hefuku hefuku, enu himwolweli makasenu nakunkwataku. Ilang'a iyi himpinzhi yenu niyachiyuulu chamwijima.
43022054 Hiyakumukwata, hiyakumutwala nakumwing'izha mwitala jakapristu muneni. Petulu hakulonjela hahalehi.
43022055 Chanabutuluwu kesi muchipang'u, hiyakushakama hamu, Petulu niyena hakushakama nawu.
43022056 Chang'ajima wumu chanamumoniyi nashakami kuchezhezhi chakesi, hakumushinshika ninji, Iwu muntu niyena wajing'i ninji.
43022057 Yena hakujikala ninji, Eyi mumbanja, hinamwilukaku.
43022058 Chihanalehi chanti, mukwawu hakumumona, ninji, Nineyi wumwinawu. Petulu ninji, Eyi iyala, ami hinimwinawuku.
43022059 Chihanahiti neyi mpinzhi yimu, mukwawu hakumulamata ninji, Iwu muntu, chalala wajing'i ninji, mulong'a niyena hikang'aliliya.
43022060 Petulu ninji Eyi iyala, ami kwami kwiluka chiwuji nakuhosha nehi. Iku wuchiji kuhosha, ikombu etiyila nikwitiyila.
43022061 Mwanta hakushetumuka, hakumutala Petulu. Petulu hakwanuka mazu aMwanta amwililiyi ninji, Lelu hakela ikombu wuchiji kanja etiyili, wakajikala kasatu neyi hinamwilukaku.
43022062 Hakwijika muchipang'u nakujila chacheni.
43022063 Amayala ajing'i amukwata Yesu hiyakumuseha nikumweta.
43022064 Amukasa niihina hamesu, hiyakumwila nawu, Profwetaku! Nakweti hinyi?
43022065 Amuhosheli chatama yuma yikwawu yayivulu, nikumutuka.
43022066 Chikunachi akulumpi zhawaYujeya hiyakupompa nawakulumpi zhawatupristu niansoneki; hiyakumutwala muchota chawu,
43022067 nawu, Neyi wuKristu, tulezhi. Hakuyila ninji, Neyi nukuyilezha, himukukuhwelelaku.
43022068 Hela nukuyihula, himukung'akulaku.
43022069 Kufumisha hanu, Mwana kaMuntu akamushakamisha kuchikasa chaNzambi chachijiilu chang'ovu.
43022070 Wezhima wawu hiyakwila nawu, Komana, eyi wuMwana kaNzambi? Yena ninji, Mwomwenomu mumunahoshi, mulong'a jichi chiniji.
43022071 Wena nawu, Tukeng'i nawa wunsahu wukwawu? Tunamutiyi jehi etu aweni kukanwa kinji yomweni.
43023001 Izaza jawantu jezhima hijikunyamuka, hijikumutwala kuji Pilatu.
43023002 Hiyakutachika kumwinka nyilong'a nawu, Muntu iwu tunamuwani wuji nakuluwang'esha munza wetu, nakulekesha kusonka kuji Kesari, nakwila ninji yomweni jiyi Kristu, Mwanta wankanu.
43023003 Pilatu hakumwihula ninji, Komana eyi wuMwanta wawaYujeya? Yena hakumwakula ninji, Mwomwenomu muwunahoshi.
43023004 Pilatu hakuyila akulumpi zhawatupristu nimazaza awantu ninji, Muntu iwu hinamumoni namulong'aku.
43023005 Wena hiyakuswezha kuzuwa nawu, Wayikoleshang'a antu hamesu, nakutang'isha muYujeya mwezhima, kutachika kung'aliliya nikunu
43023006 Pilatu chanachitiyiyi hakwihula ninji, Iwu muntu hikang'aliliya, tahinji?
43023007 Chanelukiyi ninji himuntu wakwilung'a jaHeroji, hakumutemesha kuji Heroji, mulong'a yena wajing'i kuYerusalema hawena mafuku owu.

43023008 Heroji chanamumoniyi Yesu, hakutiya kuwaha nankashi, mulong'a hakeng'eleliyi kumumona hanalehi jehi, mulong'a wamutiyila jehi nsang'u zhazhivulu. Hakukuhwelela ninji kwizhi keng'a amumoni nakwila chinzhikizhilu chimu.
43023009 Hakumwihula mazu amavulu, yena kumwakula nehi.
43023010 Akulumpi zhawatupristu niansoneki hiyakwimana kwenoku nakumwinka nyilong'a nang'ovu yayeni.
43023011 Heroji hakujibomba namashijikinji nakumusawula nikumuseha. Hakumuvwika mahina awanta, hakumufuntishilayi cheng'i Pilatu.
43023012 Heroji naPilatu akwata niwubwambu jena ifuku oju, mulong'a hasambilili ajing'i ajikwata nkunyi.
43023013 Pilatu hakupompesha akulumpi zhawatupristu nianyuuli niantu hamu.
43023014 Hakuyila ninji, Munanleteli muntu iwu nenu himuntu waluwang'eshang'a antu; talenu, munamoni chinamweseki jehi muntu iwu, ami hinamumoni namulong'a wansang'u yimunamwinkeli mulong'aku.
43023015 Kang'anyahu Heroji; natufuntishiliyi. Tiyenu, hanakong'i chuma chakutela kufwaku.
43023016 jichi nukukumina jakumuvupula, nimuumbuku.
43023017 Hachawizhochu wenzhilila jehi kuyumbilaku muntu wamukaleya wumu.
43023018 Wezhima wawu avwakuka niipumba nawu, Iwu muntu waaji! Tuumbiluku Baraba;
43023019 yena amushili mukaleya hansang'u yakuleta nzhita mung'anja, niyawubanzhi.
43023020 Pilatu hakuyihosha cheng'i, mulong'a wakeng'eli kumuumbaku Yesu.
43023021 Wena hiyakubijika nawu, Mupopelenu hakulusu! Mupopelenu hakulusu!
43023022 Hakuyila kamuchisatu ninji, Mulong'anyi? Chuma chatama chanakong'iyi iwu muntu, chumanyi? Hinamumoni nachitelaku. Nukukumina jakumuvupula, nimuumbuku.
43023023 Wena aswezha nikuvwakuka nang'ovu, hiyakulomba nawu amupopeli hakulusu. Mwahosheluwu muswezha ning'ovu.
43023024 Pilatu hakuketula nsang'u ninji eli mwanalombuwu.
43023025 Hakumuumbaku owu alombeluwu, ashiluwu mukaleya hansang'u yanzhita niwubanzhi; hakwinza Yesu hakumulubula ninji amwili mwomwaya nyichima yawu.
43023026 Chajing'i nakumutwalawu, hiyakukwata muntu, Shimona wakuKireni, wajing'i nakufuma mumpata, hiyakumutwika kulusu amusenjeluku Yesu nakumulonjela munyima.
43023027 Hikukumulonjela izaza jawantu jeneni, nijawambanja hiyakutumpa makumbu akumujila.
43023028 Yesu hakushetumuka kuji wena ninji, Enu anyana awambanja amuYerusalema, bayi munjilamuku, jijilenu enu aweni, nianyanenu.
43023029 Tiyenu, mafuku akenza akelawu nawu, Anakooleki anshinta, nimavumu abulili kuvwala nimayeli abulili kwamwisha.
43023030 Henohu amba katachika kuyila mapiji amaneni nawu, Tuhinukilenu; Nimpiji zhanyanya nawu, Tubutenu.
43023031 Mutonju wutuuta awila chochichi, inji mutonju wawuma amba kawila ng'ahi?
43023032 Kwajing'i amakwawu ayeji, akwanyilong'a, atweluwu hamu ninji kulonja ayizhahi.
43023033 Chanashikuwu oku kwatenang'awu nawu, Kuchang'u, hiyakumupopela hakulusu kwenoku, niakwanyilong'a, wumu kuchikasa chinji chachijiilu, mukwawu kuchimunswa.
43023034 Yesu hakwila ninji, Tata, yanakeni; chaji nakwilawu hiyanachilukuku. Hiyakujanzhang'ena mahininji nachinzhikizhilu chakusakula nachu.
43023035 Antu hiyakwimana nakutalaku. Anyuuli niwena hiyakumuseha nawu, Waamwinini akwawu, muleki ajamwini yomweni, neyi jiyi Kristu waNzambi, winji atonjayi.
43023036 Mashijika niwena nawa hiyakumuseha, hiyakwinza kuji yena nakweseka kumwinka vinyu yabatuka,
43023037 nakwila nawu, Neyi wuMwanta wawaYujeya, jamwini.
43023038 Hewulu hajing'iyi ashiluku mukanja wakusoneka nawu, IWU jIYI MWANTA WAWAYUjEYA.
43023039 Mukwanyilong'a wumu wawena apopeleluwu hamakulusu, hakumutuka ninji, Eyi hiwuKristuku? jamwini eyi aweni ninetu kumu.
43023040 Mukwawu hakumuhoshola ninji, Eyi kweyi, hela Nzambi hiwamutiyang'a womaku? kutong'a nineyi anakuhishili kumu.
43023041 Etu kwetu chinatuteleli, hitukutambula wulooku wanyijimu yetu; hakwila iwu muntu hakweti kamulong'a nikantuku.
43023042 Hakumwila Yesu ninji, Eyi Mwanta, wakang'anukang'a chiwakenza muwanta weyi.
43023043 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Nukukulezha chalala nami, lelu nukwikala neyi muParajisa.
43023044 Henohu hashika jehi neyi kwizhi mpinzhi yamuchitanu nayimu (12:00 hrs), mwijima wuholoka nimwitung'a jezhima, njo-o nikumpinzhi yamuchitanu nayiwana (15:00 hrs).
43023045 Itang'wa jiiyila nibwi-i, niihina jakuzhika muTembeli mwazhila jitabuka nihakachi.
43023046 Yesu chanabileliyi nezu jang'ovu, hakwila ninji, Tata, nashi spiritu yami mumakaseyi. Chanahoshiyi mwenomu yotula niwumi winji.
43023047 Mukulumpi wamashijika chanamoniyi yuma yezhimiyi, hakulemesha Nzambi ninji, Iwu chalala wajing'i muntu walong'a.
43023048 Mazaza ezhima awung'ili nakutala chumichi, chanamonuwu yuma yeliluwu, hiyakufunta kwaawu nakujetola hantulu zhawu nakuneng'a.
43023049 Ezhima ajilukiliyi nawu niambanja afuminiyi nawu kung'aliliya, hiyakwimena hahalehi nakutala yumiyi.
43023050 Kutala iyala izhina jinji Yosefu, wakumukala wawaYujeya izhina jawu Aramateya,
43023051 wajing'i mukwachota chawu; muntu wamuwahi walong'a, hetezheli mpúng'a yawu, hela mwakong'eluwuku; wajing'i nakutalila wanta waNzambi.
43023052 Yeniwu Yosefu hakuya kuji Pilatu, hakumulomba muzhimba waYesu.
43023053 Hakuwukulula, hakuwuzhing'azhing'a mwihina jitooka, hakuwukamika mwizhamu jakupokola mwilola, kanja azhiikang'amu jehi muntuku.
43023054 jajing'i Ifuku jakulong'esha; Sabata hiyikuswila kwakwihi.
43023055 Ambanja afuminiyi nawu kung'aliliya, hiyakulonjela munyima, hiyakutala izhamu nichakamikiluwu muzhimba winji.
43023056 Hiyakufunta nakulong'esha nyitonju yamavumba amawahi, nimanzhi evumba jajiwahi. HaSabata hiyakunooka mwaya nshimbi.
43024001 Hamulungu jojifuku jatachi, hiyakwinza kwizhamu hankunku yakucha, anasenji nyitonju yamavumba amawahi yanalong'eshuwu.
43024002 Hiyakuwana ilola anajilang'umuni jehi, anajifumishi kwizhamu.
43024003 Hiyakwing'ilamu, kuwana muzhimba waMwanta Yesu mwosi.
43024004 Chajing'i nakuzhinokawu chumichi, kutala amayala ayeji anemani kwakwihi, anavwali mahina atong'eka chezhezhi.
43024005 Ambanja hiyakutiya woma, anong'ama nimesu awu hamaseki. Owu amayala hiyakwila nawu, Muji nakukeng'elaji wamumi mukachi kawafu?
43024006 Haji munuku, wasang'uka jehi muji afu. Anukenu chayilezheliyi hajing'iyi mung'aliliya,
43024007 ninji, Mwana kaMuntu ching'a akamulubula kumakasa awakwanshiji, akamupopela hakulusu, wakasang'uka muji afu hefuku jamuchisatu.
43024008 Hiyakwanuka mazu inji,
43024009 hiyakufuma kwizhamu kwayiluwu, hiyakulezha ikumi nawumu (11) niakwawu ezhima yuma yezhimiyi.
43024010 Owu ambanja ajing'i niMariya Manjaleni, niYowana, niMariya mama yaYakoba, hamu nawambanja amakwawu nawa, hiyakulezha apostolu yumiyi.
43024011 Mazu awa hiyakuyitiya neyi aji nakuhosha tuhu; kuyikuhwelela kwawu nehi.
43024012 Petulu hakunyamuka, hakuya lufuchi kwizhamu, hakubanjama nakutalamu; hakumona mahina atooka aji hakankawawu. Hakufunta kwiinji nakuzhinoka yuma yanamoniyi.
43024013 Kutala akwawu ayeji aji nakuya ifuku jojenoju kumukala izhina jawu Emawusi, wekala chintampu naYerusalema kafwampi neyi 11 km.
43024014 Ajing'i nakuhanzhika yuma yinamwekani yezhima.
43024015 Chajing'i nakuhanzhikawu nakujihuzhola, yomweni Yesu hakukunjama kwakwihi, hakwenja nawu.
43024016 Ilang'a mesu awu akang'enyi kumwiluka.
43024017 Hakuyila ninji, Oyu nsang'u yimuji nakuya nakuhosha, hinsang'winyi? Wena hiyakwimana ku-ka nakujihomba.
43024018 Wumu izhina jinji Kilopa, hakumwakula ninji, Eyi yeyi mwenyi kankaweyi muYerusalema, wunabuli kwiluka yuma yinamwekanumu mafuku anu?
43024019 Hakuyila ninji, Yumanyi? Wena hiyakumwakula nawu, YaYesu wakuNazareta, wajing'i kaprofwetu waswezha nikunyijimu yinji nikumazu inji, kumesu aNzambi nikumesu awantu;
43024020 ninichi chamulubulawu kuji akulumpi zhawatupristu hamu nawanyuuli zhetu, akamuhishi namulong'a wakumuzhaha, amupopela nihakulusu.
43024021 Ilang'a etu twajing'i nakukuhwelela netu jiyi wukukeng'a kukuula Isarela. Eng'ang'i, hayuma yezhimiyi hanalunjami ninsang'u yikwawu; lelu ifuku jamuchisatu kufumisha helawu yumiyi.
43024022 Akwetu ambanja amenekela kwizhamu anatuhayamishi.
43024023 Chanawanuwu muzhimba winji mwosi, hiyakwinza nakwila nawu amona chimwenu chawang'elu ela nawu yena wamumi.
43024024 Akwetu amakwawu twajing'i nawu aya kwizhamu, amona mwomwashimunawu ambanja, ilang'a yena kumumona nehi.
43024025 Yena hakuyila ninji, Mayalenu, O chimwabula kashinshi, O chimwalemenjenja kukuhwelela yuma yezhima yahosheli atuprofwetu!
43024026 Hichawahilili Kristu kukabakana yumiyi, akeng'ili nimulubanzhi lwakulema kwinjuku?
43024027 Hakuyilumbulwila munyikanja yazhila, kutachika haji Mosi niatuprofwetu ezhima, yuma yamutenenuwu yomweni.
43024028 Cheliluwu hiyakushika kwakwihi namukala kwajing'i nakuyawu, yena hakwila ninji apanjakani.
43024029 Ilang'a wena hiyakumushinzhila nawu, Kamaku hanu hetu, mulong'a kuneli jehi melela, itang'wa jahita jehi. Yena hakwing'ila ashakami nawu.
43024030 Chanashakamiyi nawu nakujya, hakunona jinkenji, hakukiswila nkisu, hakujihumuna, hakuyinka.
43024031 Mesu awu atona nikutona, amwiluka nikumwiluka. Yena hakuzhimina kumesu awu.
43024032 Hiyakujilezha wumu namukwawu nawu, Twatiyilahu nyichima yetu mumavumu bu-su, chajing'i nakutulezhayi munzhila, hajing'i nakutulumbulwilayi nyikanja yazhila.
43024033 Hiyakunyamuka mpinzhi yoyenoyu, hiyakufunta kuYerusalema, kuwana ikumi nawumu (11) anapompi jehi hamu, ninawa ajing'uwu nawu.
43024034 Wena nawu, Chalala Mwanta nasang'uki muji afu, wamwekana jehi nikuji Shimona.
43024035 Akwawu ayeji hiyakushimuna yuma yanamonuwu munzhila, nichanamwilukuwu hakuhumuna jinkenji.
43024036 Hajing'i nakuhoshawu yumiyi, kukasumuka yomweni Yesu nemani jehi mukachi kawu. Hakuyila ninji, Kuwunja kwikali nanenu.
43024037 Ilang'a wena hiyakutiya woma, afwa nimutentu, hiyakutong'ozhoka nawu tunamoni musaalu.
43024038 Yena hakuyila ninji, Munaakaminiji? Mukujihuzholelaji munyichima yenu?
43024039 Talenu makasami ninyenju yami, yami aweni hohu. Nkwatakwatenu muntiyi, musaalu hakweti musunyi nimafwaha, neyi ichi chimunanmonamuku.
43024040 Chanahoshiyi ochu, hakuyilezha makasinji nimajatilu inji.
43024041 Iku achiji kanja akuhweleli namuzang'alu wawu nikuzhinoka, yena hakuyila ninji, Kunu mukweti yakujya?
43024042 Hiyakumwinka chibalu chanshi chakuteleka jehi, nimutu wawuchi.
43024043 Yena hakutambula, hakujya, iku aji nakumutala.

43024044 Hakuyila ninji, jiwu mazu nahosheli hinajing'i nanenu, akwila nami, yuma yasonekeluwu munyikanja yazhila yezhima, yamunshimbi yaMosi, nimuji atuprofwetu, nimumasamu yantenenuwu, ching'a yakalumbuluka hohu.
43024045 Hakuzhikula kashinshi kawu kulonja eluki mwalumbulukila nyikanja yazhila.
43024046 Hakuyila ninji, Anasoneki nawu Kristu ching'a akakaba, akasang'uka muji afu ifuku jamuchisatu;
43024047 akashimwang'ena mwizhina jinji nsang'u yakubalumuka mumuchima, nikuyanakena nshiji, mwahita nyunza yezhima, kutachikila kuYerusalema.
43024048 Ninji, Enu yenu ayinsahu yayumiyi.
43024049 Tiyenu, nukutemesha hajenu Kukana kwakaniniyi Tata yami; ilang'a ching'ililenu mung'anja, kushika nihakayivwikawu ng'ovu yakufuma kwiwulu.
43024050 Hakuyilombola nichashikiluwu kwakwihi naBetani. Hakwolola makasinji kwiwulu, hakuyikiswila nkisu.
43024051 Iku wuji nakuyikiswila nkisu hakwambuka nawu, amutwala nimwiwulu.
43024052 Wena hiyakujifukula kuji yena, hiyakufunta kuYerusalema namuzang'alu waweni.
43024053 Hiyakwikalang'a muTembeli hefuku hefuku nakumukiswila Nzambi nkisu
44001001 Hatachi hajing'a izu, izu jajing'a naNzambi. Izu jajing'i Nzambi.
44001002 Jiyi wajing'a naNzambi hamu kufumisha kutachi.
44001003 Yuma yezhima ayileng'eli kuji yena, Hikwekala chuma chaleng'awu chakubula yena kuchileng'aku.
44001004 Muji yena mwajing'i wumi, wumi owu wajing'i chezhezhi chawantu.
44001005 Chezhezhi ochu chatong'ekang'a mumwijima, mwijima hiwatwesheli kuzhima chezhezhiku.
44001006 Kwenzhili iyala wumu atemesheluwu kuji Nzambi, izhina jinji Yowanu.
44001007 Yeniwu wenzhili ekala chinsahu chchezhezhi ochu, kulonda ezhima akakuhweleli chakushimunayi yena Yowanu.
44001008 Yena hajing'i jiyi chezhezhiku, wenzhili kulonda akekali chinsahu chachezhezhi ochu.
44001009 Chalala chezhezhi, chenzang'a mumpata yamunu mwishina.
44001010 Yena wajing'a munu mwishina, mpata yamunu mwishina, chatong'ekelang'a antu ezhima.
44001011 Wenzhili mwiinji yomweni, antu inji yomweni hiyamutambwiliku.
44001012 Ilang'a ezhima amutambwili, wayinkeli wanta wakwikala anyana kaNzambi, wowenawa akukuhwelela izhina jinji.
44001013 Wena hiyavwalikilili mumashiku, hela mwatong'welang'awu hela mwavwalikang'awu antuku, avwalikilili kuji Nzambi.
44001014 Ilang'a izu hijikwikala muntu, washakamini mukachi ketu, hitukubanjila lubanji lwakulema kwinji, lubanji lwakulema kwa mwana katata wumu hohu, wenzala luwi niwalala.
44001015 Yowanu hakwikala chinsahu chakumushimuna, hakubijika ninji, yeniwu jiyi nateneni, mulong'a yena wajing'i kwoku ami kanja wezhima wetu tunatambuluku, niluwi lwakulunjika haluwi.
44001016 Kukwinzala kwinji wezhima wetu tunakutambuluku, niluwi lwakulunjika haluwi.
44001017 Mulong'a nshimbi yenzhilili muji Mosi, hakwila luwi niwalala wenzhilili muji Yesu Kilisitu.
44001018 Hikwekala muntu wamonahu jehi nzambiku; Owu mwana wumu hohu wekala muntuulu yatata, jiyi namulumbululi chachiwahi.
44001019 Jiwu wunsahu washimwini Yowanu hatemeshawu a Yudeya aTupilisitu nawaLevi afumi kuYelusalema ayi kuji yena, amwihuli nawu, "Yeyinyi?"
44001020 Hakuyileng'a hakulumbuluka-hakukana chikupu ninji, Ami hiniKilisituku.
44001021 Wena hiyakumwihula nawu, inji jinu yeyinyi? Yeyi Elizha tahinji? Yena ninji, nehi. Nawu, wuyenowu kapolofwetu tahinji? yena hakwakula ninji, "Nehi."
44001022 Jichi hayakumwihula nawu , "yeyinyi mulong'a tunakeng'i kutwala mazu kuji antu atutemesha? Eyi aweni wajitenang'a neyiji?
44001023 Wahosheli ninji, "Yami mbila nabijikang'a muchikalampata nami: ololenu nzhila yaMWANTA, 'mwomwahosheliyi kapolofwetu Isaya."
44001024 Haji owu atemesheliwu hajing'a Afwalisewu,
44001025 Hiyakumwihula nawu, "Neyi eyi hiwu Kilisitu hela Elizha yenowu Kapolofwetu ochu wazhimikilang'aji?
44001026 Yowanu hakuyakula ninji, "Ami nazhimikang'a mumenzhi mukachi kenu munemani muntu mwabula kwiluka.
44001027 Yena wabajika , ami hinatela kumusubula nkwabilu zhinjiku.
44001028 Yumiyi ayilili muBeani hambaji yamusela ya Yodana, kwazhimikilang'ayi Yowanu.
44001029 Chikunachi Yowanu hakumona Yesu wuji nakwinza kuji yena ninji, "Talenu, mwana kamukoku waNzambi mukwakufumisha nshiji yawakwampata yamunu mwishina.
44001030 Jiyi iwu nateneni nami, 'kukunlonjela iyala wabajikami, mulonga yena wajing'a kwoku henohu ami kanja nivwaliki.
44001031 Hela ami hinamwilukiliku, chinenzhili nakunzhimika mumenzhi, nalonjeli nami nakamwekeni kuji aIsarela."
44001032 Yowanu hakushimuna wunsahu ninji, "Namweni Sipilitu nakusuka mwiwulu, neyi Katela, hakushakama haji yena.

44001033 Hela ami hinamwilukiliku, ilang'a owu wantemesheli nakumuzhimika mumenzhi, jiyi wanlezheli ninji, muntu iwakamona Sipilitu ' hakusuluka nkushakama haji yena, jiyi mukwakuzhimika muji Sipilitu wazhila!
44001034 Ami nachimoni namensu hikukwikala chinsahu nami jiyi mwana kaNzambi."
44001035 Chikunachi nawa cheng'i, Yowanu hakwimana nawaTumbanzhi ywinji ayejihamu, Hakushinshika Yesu chakwinzayi ninji, Talenu mwana Kamukoku waNzambi !"
44001036 Awa atumbanzhi twinji ayeji hiyakumutiya chakuhoshayi, niwena hiyakumulonjela Yesu.
44001037 Awa atumbanzhi twinji ayeji hiyakumutiya chakuhoshayi, niwena hiyakumulonjela Yesu.
44001038 Yesu hakushetumuka hakuyimona chajing'i nakumulonjelawu, hakuyila ninji, Muji nakukeng'aji? Wena hiyakumwakula nawu, Eyi labi; chaya mukwila nawu Ntang'ishi; washakama kujihi?
44001039 Yena hakuyila ninji, Inzenu mutali. jichi ayili amweni kwashakaminang'ayi; ifuku oju hiyakushakama ninji; kwela jehi melela.
44001040 Wenawa ayeji atiyili chahosheliyi Yowanu amulonjeli Yesu, wumu wajing'i Anjeli, manakwaShimona Petulu.
44001041 jiyi wasambilili kuwana manakwinji yomweni, Shimona, hakumulezha ninji, Tunawani jehi Mesiya; chaya mukwila nawu, Klistu.
44001042 Yena hakumuleta kuji Yesu. Yesu hakumutala swi-i, ninji, Eyi wuShimona, mwana kaYowanu, akakutumba nawu, Kefwasi; chaya mukwila nawu, Petulu (ilola).
44001043 Chikunachi cheng'i, hakwila ninji, Tukuya mung'aliliya. Awana niFwilipu. Yesu hakumwila ninji, Nlonji.
44001044 Fwilipu wajing'i muntu wakuBeteseja, mukala waAnjeli naPetulu.
44001045 Fwilipu hakuwana Nataneli hakumwila ninji, Tunawani muntu atenenuwu kuji Mosi munshimbi, nikuji atuplofwetu, jiyi Yesu wakuNazaleta, mwana kaYosefu.
44001046 Nataneli hakumwila ninji, Chuma chachiwahi chitweshi kufuma muNazaleta? Fwilipu hakumwila ninji, Inzaku wutali.
44001047 Yesu hakumona Nataneli wuji nakwinza kuji yena, hakumutena ninji, Talenu kaIsalela kakeni wakaji makasu.
44001048 Nataneli hakumwila ninji, Wunang'iluki ng'ahi? Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Chiwajing'i mwishina jachikuyu, Fwilipu kanja akutambiki, nakumona.
44001049 Nataneli hakumwakula ninji, Eyi labi, yeyi Mwana kaNzambi, yeyi Mwanta waIsalela.
44001050 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Wunakuhweleli nanochu chinakwili nami nakumona mwishina jachikuyu, tahinji? Wamba kamona yacheng'i yakubajika yeniyi.
44001051 Hakumwila ninji, Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, mwamba kamona iwulu hijikwenzuluka, niang'elu aNzambi hiyakukanjama nakusuluka haji Mwana kaMuntu.
44002001 Hefuku jamuchisatu, hikukwikala chawiza mu Cana kwilung'a ja Ng'alaliya, nimama ya Yesu wajing'a kwenoku.
44002002 Yesu natumbanzhi twinji ayitambikili kuchawiza.
44002003 Chelili vinyu yinamani, mama ya Yesu hakuhosha ninji, "hayakweti vinyuku."
44002004 Yena hakumwila ninji, "eyi mumbanda, hinsang'u yetuku. Mpinji yami kanja yishiki.
44002005 Mama  yinji hakuyila ang'amba ninji, mwonsu mwakuyilezhayi, ilenu.
44002006 Henohu hajing'i nsaba zhamololwa zhitanu nayimu zhakutenteka jehi, zhajing'i zhakujizhilika nachu aYudeya; munsaba mwayang'a zhilita 80 hela 120.
44002007 Yesu hakuyila ninji, inzeshenu nsaba namenzhi. Hiyakuzhinzesha to-o nikunyivumbu.
44002008 Hakuyila ninji, Hung'ununenu jinu mumutwalili yamweni mawizha. Hiykutwla.
44002009 Yamweni mwizha chanatompiyi menzhi, anabalumuki jehi vinyu, helukili kuyinafumuku ang'amba atehwini menzhi diwu elukili. Owu yamweni mwawizha hakutambula kalemba
44002010 hakumwila ninji, Antu ezhima asambilang'a kwidisha vinyu yayiwahi eyi antu ananwi jehi yayivulu aletng'a yatama. Ilang'a eyi wunasweki vinyu yayiwahi nihanu.
44002012 Chneliyi yumiyi, yena namama yinji, nianakwinji, niatumbanzhi ywinji hamu ayili kuKaperinamu ashakamnikwenoku mafuku antesha hohu.
44002014 Chipanakenu chawaYudeya hichikushika kwakwihi, Yesu hakukanjuka kuYerusalema. Hakuwana
44002015 Hakushinta chikoti chamfung'a, hakuyihang'a wezhima wawu muTembeli, hamu nanyikoku niang'ombi; hakumwang'a mali awakwakuhimpa, hakuhinuna nizhimesa zhawu.
44002016 Hakuyila ajing'i nakulanjisha tupompa ninji, Yumiyi yifumishenu munu; bayi mubalumuna itala jaTata yami jiikali itala jakulanjulwilaku.
44002017 Atumbanzhi twinji hiyakwanuka chasonekeluwu nawu, Iyena jetala jeyi jikung'ujya kumuchima.
44002018 jichi aYujeya hiyakumwakula nawu, Tulezhi chinzhikizhilu chakwiluka nachu hanafumi ng'ovu zheyi zhakwila yumiyi.
44002019 Yesu hakwakula ninji, Sanjenu Tembeli iyi, mafuku asatu nakayitung'ulula cheng'i.
44002020 jichi aYujeya nawu, Tembeli iyi yakutung'a nyaka makumi awana nanyaka yitanu nawumu (46), eyi wuyitung'ululi mafuku asatu?
44002021 Ilang'a yena wajing'i nakutena Tembeli yamuzhimba winji.
44002022 jichi chamusang'wiluwu muji afu, atumbanzhi twinji hiyakwanuka mwahosheliyi, hiyakukuhwelela nyikanja yazhila, nimwahosheliyi Yesu.
44002023 Hajing'iyi muYelusalema kuchawizha chaChipanjakenu, antu amavulu hiyakukuhwelela mwizhina jinji chamwenuwu yinzhikizhilu yeliliyi.
44002024 Ilang'a Yesu hayikuhweleleluku, mulong'a yena wajing'i weluka chekalawu antu ezhima.
44002025 Mulong'a yena hakeng'eli wákumulezha chekalawu antuku, yomweninji jiyi welukili yekala muji antu.
44003001 Kwajing'i iyala wumu, kaFwalisewu, nyuuli yawaYujeya, izhina jinji Nikojemu.

44003002 Yeniwu wayili kuji Yesu nawufuku, hakumwila ninji, Eyi labi, etu tuneluki netu eyi wuntang'ishi wafuma kuji Nzambi; mulong'a yinzhikizhilu iyi yiwelang'eyi kwosi muntu niwumu wukutwesha kuyila, ching'a Nzambi ekala ninji.
44003003 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Chalala chalala, nukukulezha nami, muntu kutwesha kumona wanta waNzambi ching'a avwalika chachiha.
44003004 Nikojemu hakumwila ninji, Muntu wakula jehi wukutwesha kuvwalika ng'ahi? Wukutwesha kwing'ila mwivumu jamama yinji kamuchiyeji avwaliki cheng'i, tahinji?
44003005 Yesu hakwakula ninji, Chalala chalala, nukukulezha nami, muntu kutwesha kwing'ila muwanta waNzambi, ching'a avwalika nikumenzhi nikuji Spilitu.
44003006 Chávwalikang'a kumuzhimba himuzhimba; chávwalikang'a kuji Spilitu hispilitu.
44003007 Bayi wuhayama chinakwili nami ching'a muvwalika chachihaku.
44003008 Mpepela yakunkang'a kwokuyinakeng'i kuya kwoku, eyi watiyang'a chiyikuvuma, ilang'a kwiluka kuyikufuma, hela kuyikuya nehi, jichi chajuwu ezhima akuvwalika kuji Spilitu.
44003009 Nikojemu hakumwihula ninji, Yumiyi yikutwesheka ng'ahi?
44003010 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Eyi yeyi ntang'ishi yawaIsalela, wubuli kushinshika mwalumbulukila yumiyi?
44003011 Chalala chalala, nukukulezha nami, twahoshang'a yitweluka, twashimunang'a wunsahu wayuma yakumona namesu, enu kukuhwelela mutwashimunang'a nehi.
44003012 Chinayilezhi yuma yahamaseki enu kukuhwelela nehi, inji chinukuyilezha yuma yamwiwulu mukukuhwelela ng'ahi?
44003013 Hikuji muntu wakanjamahu jehi mwiwuluku, ching'a yowu wasulukili mwiwulu, jiyi Mwana kaMuntu wekala mwiwulu.
44003014 Chanyamwiniyi Mosi kapela hewulu muchinkalampata, jichi chakanyamunawu nawa niMwana kaMuntu hewulu;
44003015 kulonja muntu wukukuhwelela aheti muji yena wumi wahayanyaka.
44003016 Chaswezheliyi Nzambi kukeng'a mpata yamunu mwishina, wenkeli Mwaninji wumu hohu, kulonja muntu wukumukuhwelela aheti wumi wahayanyaka, akabuli kunong'a.
44003017 Chatemesheliyi Nzambi Mwaninji mumpata yamunu mwishina, halonjeli kusompesha antu ampata yamunu mwishinaku, walonjeli ninji antu amunu mwishina ahanjili muji yena.
44003018 Muntu wukumukuhwelela hakufwa namulong'aku; muntu wukubula kumukuhwelela nafwi nachu, mulong'a naleki kukuhwelela izhina jaMwana kaNzambi wumu hohu.
44003019 Kufwa namulong'a kunafumi hakwila chezhezhi chenzhili jehi mumpata yamunu mwishina, ilang'a antu hiyakeng'eli chezhezhuku, akeng'eli mwijima mulong'a nyijimu yawu yatama.
44003020 Mulong'a antu ezhima akong'ang'a yatama ahelang'a chezhezhi, hiyenzang'a kuchezhezhuku kulonja nyijimu yawu abuli kuyikonkolola.
44003021 Ilang'a muntu wakong'ang'a yalala wenzang'a kuchezhezhi kulonja nyijimu yinji akayimwekeshi nawu anayikong'i muji Nzambi.
44003022 Kulonjela hayumiyi Yesu niatumbanzhi twinji hiyakuya mwilung'a jaYujeya; hakulaba nawu kwenoku nakuzhimika.
44003023 Yowanu niyena wajing'i nakuzhimika kuEnoni kwakwihi naSalimi, mulong'a kwajing'i menzhi amavulu. Antu hiyakwinza akayizhimiki.
44003024 Henohu Yowanu wuchiji kanja amushi mukaleya.
44003025 jichi hasang'umukili ntaji haji atumbanzhi twaYowanu nakaYujeya wumu hansang'u yakujitookesha.
44003026 Wena hiyakwinza kuji Yowanu nakumwila nawu, Eyi labi, ona wajing'i naneyi hambaji yamusela yaYojana, iwashimwineyi wunsahu, tiya jinu, niyena hakuzhimika, antu ezhima hiyakuya kuji yena.
44003027 Yowanu hakwakula ninji, Muntu kutwesha kutambula chuma, ching'a anamwinkichu kwiwulu.
44003028 Enu aweni mukunshimwina wunsahu chinahoshelang'a nami, ami hiniKlistuku, nami anantemeshang'ahu jehi kumbiji.
44003029 Muntu wukweti mumbanja jiyi kalemba; ilang'a ibwambu jakalemba, chakwimanayi nakumutiya, wazang'alalang'a nankashi chakutiyayi izu jakalemba. jichi iwu muzang'alu wami wunawanini jehi.
44003030 Ching'a yena atohi, ami nikehi.
44003031 Wáfuma mwiwulu wabajika ezhima; wáhamaseki hiwahamaseki kwinji, watenang'a yahamaseki. Wáfuma mwiwulu wabajika ezhima.
44003032 Washimunang'a mwanamoniyi nimwanatiyiyi; ilang'a kwosi muntu wakuhwelelang'a mwashimunang'ayuku.
44003033 Muntu nakuhweleli mwakushimunayi, nashuku mufunja wakwila ninji, Nzambi walala.
44003034 Mulong'a iwu atemesheluwu kuji Nzambi wahoshang'a mazu aNzambi, mulong'a Nzambi henkang'a Spilitu nakwesekelaku.
44003035 Tata wakeng'a Mwana, nenki yuma yezhima muchikasa chinji.
44003036 Muntu wukukuhwelela Mwana wukweti wumi wahayanyaka; hakwila muntu wabulang'a kwovwahila Mwana hakamona wumuku, kuzuwa kwaNzambi kwashakama haji yena.
44004001 jichi Mwanta chelukiliyi ninji aFwalisewu anatiyi jehi nawu Yesu hakutambika nakuzhimika atumbanzhi amavulu akubajika aYowanu;
44004002 ilang'a yomweni Yesu hijiyi wazhimikiluku, atumbanzhi twinji jiwu azhimikilang'a;
44004003 yena hakufuma muYujeya, ayi cheng'i mung'aliliya.
44004004 Ching'a yohita muSamaliya.
44004005 Hakuya kumukala wamuSamaliya izhina jawu Sika, kwakwihi nakampata kenkeliyi Yakoba mwaninji Yosefu.
44004006 Ishima jaYakoba jajing'i kwenoku. jichi Yesu, nazeyi jehi nanzhila yanenjiyi, hakushakama chochina kwishima. Kuneli jehi neyi mpinzhi yamuchitanu nayimu (12:00 hls).
44004007 Mumbanja wamuSamaliya hakwinza nakutaha menzhi. Yesu hakumwila ninji, Anyinkuhu menzhi ninwi.
44004008 Mulong'a atumbanzhi twinji aya jehi kumukala nakulanja yakujya.
44004009 jichi owu kaSamaliya wamumbanja hakumwila ninji, Eyi wukaYujeya, ami nimumbanja nikaSamaliya nawa, inji ami wunanlombeliji menzhi? Mulong'a aYujeya hiyakunjang'anang'a nawaSamaliyaku.
44004010 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Neyi weluka chamukunkulu chaNzambi, ninowu nakwili ninji nyinkuhu menzhi ninwi, mutenowu yeyi waji kumulomba yena, waji kukwinka menzhi amomi.
44004011 Mumbanja hakumwila ninji, Mwanta, eyi hiwukweti chakutaha nachuku, niishima jakunama; inji owu menzhi amomi wunayiwani kujihi?
44004012 Yeyi wabajika tata yetu Yakoba, watwinkeli iji ishima, wanwinumu niyomweni, nianyaninji, niyimuna yinji, tahinji?
44004013 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Antu ezhima akunwa menzhi awa akutiya cheng'i mpwila;
44004014 ilang'a muntu wukunwa menzhi nukumwinkami, hakatiya cheng'i mpwilaku, ilang'a menzhi nukumwinkami akwikala muji yena kaseloki kamenzhi kakusefukila kuwumi wahayanyaka.
44004015 Mumbanja hakumwila ninji, Mwanta, nyinki menzhi owu, kulonja nibuli kutiya mpwila, nakabuli kwinzang'a kwezhima kunu nakutaha.
44004016 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Yaku katambiki mfumweyi, winzi cheng'i kunu.
44004017 Mumbanja hakumwakula ninji, Hinikweti mfumwamuku. Yesu hakumwila ninji, Chiwuneli neyi hinikweti mfumwamuku, wunahoshi chalala.
44004018 Mulong'a wajing'i nawamfumu zheyi atanu, niniwu wuji ninji katataka himfumweyuku, ochu chiwunahoshi chalala.
44004019 Mumbanja hakumwila ninji, Mwanta, nakushinshiki jehi, komana wuji kaplofwetu.
44004020 Ankakulula zhetu ajifukwililang'a kuji Nzambi kumpiji iyi; hakwila enu aYujeya nenu muYelusalema jimu mwawahila kujifukwila kuji Nzambi.
44004021 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Eyi mumbanja, nkuhweleli chinukukulezha, nami kukwinza mpinzhi yakabula kujifukwilawu antu kuji Tata kumpiji iyi, hela muYelusalema.
44004022 Chuma chimwajifukulang'a himwachilukaku; etu tweluka chitwajifukulang'a; mulong'a wamwinu wafuma kuji aYujeya.

44004023 Ilang'a mpinzhi yikwinza, eng'a yashika jehi, yakwila akwakujifukula alala akajifukula kuji Tata muSpilitu nimuwalala; mulong'a antu ajochu jiwu aji nakukeng'akeng'ayi Tata kujifukula kuji yena.
44004024 Nzambi hiSpilitu; ákujifukula kuji yena ching'a ajifukulang'a muSpilitu nimuwalala.
44004025 Mumbanja hakumwila ninji, Neluki nami Mesiya, jiyi atenawu nawu Klistu, wakenza; chakenzayi wakatulezha yuma yezhima.
44004026 Yesu hakumwila ninji, jiyi ami niji nakuhosha naneyi.
44004027 Henohu atumbanzhi twinji ashika nikushika; hiyakuhayama chaji nakuhoshayi namumbanja; hela chochu, kwosi wamwihwili ninji, Wunakeng'iji? Inji kwizhi ninji, Wuji nakuhoshelaji nayena?
44004028 Mumbanja ashiya ninsaba yinji, hakuya kumukala, hakuyila amayala,
44004029 ninji, Inzenu mutali iyala nanlezhi yuma yinakong'eli yezhima; yeniwu hijiyi Klistuku, tahinji?
44004030 Wena hiyakufuma mumukala,
44004031 Mwezhimomu atumbanzhi twinji aji nakumulembelela nawu, Eyi labi, jyang'a.
44004032 Yena hakuyila ninji, Nikweti yakujya yimwabula kwilukenu.
44004033 jichi atumbanzhi hiyakujihuzhola nawu, Haji muntu namuleteli yakujya, tahinji?
44004034 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Kujya kwami yowu kwila muchima wayena wantemesheli, nakamanishi mujimu winji.
44004035 Enu mwelang'a nenu, kunashali tukwezhi tuwana hikwakenza chilaaka chakumuna. Talenu, nukuyilezha nami, fumbulenu mesu mutali mumaha, chimwatookashana jehi to-o, ashika jehi hakumuna.
44004036 Wámunang'a watambulang'a wulooku, wapompeshelang'a mbutu yakutwala kuwumi wahayanyaka; kulonja niwákuwang'a niwámunang'a akazang'aleli hamu.
44004037 jimu munalumbulukili chishimu chelang'awu nawu, Wumu wakuwang'a, wacheng'i wamunang'a.
44004038 Ami nayitemesheli nakumuna kumwabulili kukalakala; kwakalakeli acheng'i, enu munajiili kunyijimu yawu.
44004039 ASamaliya amavulu amumukalowu amukuhweleleli nezu janowu mumbanja washimwini ninji, Nanlezhi yuma yinakong'eli yezhima.
44004040 jichi chenzhiluwu aSamaliya kuji Yesu, hiyakumulembelela nawu akamuku mafuku. Hakuzhing'ilaku mafuku ayeji.
44004041 Amakwawu amavulu hiyakukuhwelela namazu ahosheliyi yomweninji.
44004042 Hiyakumwila owu mumbanja nawu, Ichi tunakuhweleli, hichinafumi hakutulezha kujeyuku, tunamutiyi etu aweni; tuneluki netu chalala jiyi Chamwinu champata yamunu mwishina.
44004043 Wenowu mafuku ayeji chanahituwu, hakufuma kwenoku hakuya mung'aliliya.
44004044 Mulong'a yomweni Yesu washimuna jehi ninji, Kaplofwetu hiyamulemeshang'a mwilung'a jinji yomwenuku.
44004045 jichi chayiliyi mung'aliliya, ang'aliliya hiyakumutambula chachiwahi, amona jehi yuma yezhima yeliliyi kuYelusalema kuchawizha; mulong'a niwena nawa ayili kuchawizha.
44004046 jichi hakufunta cheng'i kuKana wamung'aliliya, oku kwabalumwiniyi menzhi ekali vinyu. KuKapelinamu kwajing'i nhembi yamwanta, wajing'i namwaninji weyala wakata.
44004047 Chatiyiliyi nawu, Yesu wafuma jehi muYujeya, nenzi mung'aliliya hakuya kuji yena, hakumulembelela ninji akunkumuki akamuuki mwaninji, mulong'a hakukeng'a kufwa.
44004048 jichi Yesu hakumwila ninji, Ching'a mumona yinzhikizhilu niyihayamisha, neyi nehi himukukuhwelelaku.
44004049 Nhembi hakumwila ninji, Mwanta kunkumukaku hohanu hachijiyi mwanami kanja afwi.
44004050 Yesu hakumwila ninji, jiyilang'a kweyi, mwaneyi nahanji jehi. Owu iyala hakukuhwelela izu jahosheliyi Yesu, hakujiyila kwinji.
44004051 Chajing'i nakukunkumukayi, anjung'u zhinji hiyakumukinkilila nawu, Mwaneyi wahanja jehi.
44004052 Hakuyihula mpinzhi yatachikayi kukola. Hiyakumulezha nawu, Haloshi mpinzhi yamuchitanu nachiyeji (13:00 hls) jihu hamufuma chishika.
44004053 jichi tata yinji hakwiluka ninji komana yoyu mpinzhi yamulezhayi Yesu ninji, Mwaneyi nahanji jehi. Yomweni hakukuhwelela niakwetala jinji ezhima.
44004054 jichi chinzhikizhilu chamuchiyeji cheliliyi Yesu hafuminiyi muYujeya, hayiliyi mung'aliliya.
44005001 Kulonjela hayumiyi, kwajing'i chawizha chawaYujeya; Yesu hakukanjuka kuYelusalema.
44005002 MuYelusalema, kuChisu chaNyikoku, kwekala izhiya izhina jaju mwijimi jaHebelu nawu Beteseja, jikweti makeki atanu.
44005003 Mwenomu mwakaminang'a izaza jawantu akata, niamputamesu, niayifwayi, niakwakalepa. [hiyakuching'ililang'a hakuvunjulawu menzhi;
44005004 mulong'a kang'elu wasulukilang'a nakuvunjula menzhi; hakuvunjulawu menzhi, muntu wukusambilang'ahu jehi kujatamu hakukola kumusong'u winji ngu-u.]
44005005 Kwenoku kwajing'i iyala wumu wakata jehi nyaka makumi asatu nanyaka yitanu nayisatu (38).
44005006 Yesu chamumweniyi nakami, welukili ninji wakata jehi hanalehi, hakumwihula ninji, Wukukeng'a wukoli tahinji?
44005007 Owu iyala wakata hakumwakula ninji, Mwanta, hinikweti muntu wakung'ing'izha mwizhiya hakuvunjuka menzhuku; hinelang'ami nami niyumu, muntu wacheng'i hakunyakala kwing'ilamu.
44005008 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Hinjukaku, senjaku chikang'a cheyi, wenji.
44005009 Hohenohu iyala akola nikukola, hakusenja chikang'a chinji, hakwenja nikwenja.
44005010 jena ifuku oju jajing'i jaSabata. jichi aYujeya hiyakumwila muntu anakoleshuwu jehi, nawu, Lelu hiSabata, kusenja chikang'a cheyi chinzhila.
44005011 Ilang'a yena hakuyakula ninji, Muntu nankoleshi jiyi nang'ili ninji, Senjaku chikang'a cheyi, wenji.
44005012 Wena hiyakumwihula nawu, Iyala wakwila ninji, Senjaku chikang'a cheyi, wenji; hinyi?
44005013 Ilang'a owu muntu kwiluka wámukolesha nehi; Yesu nawomboloki jehi nezaza jawantu jajing'uku.
44005014 Chihanalehi chanti Yesu hakumuwana muTembeli, hakumwila ninji, Tala, eyi anakukoleshi jehi, bayi wakaputola cheng'uku, chuma chabajika kutama chakamba kakuwana.
44005015 Owu iyala hakujiyila kwinji, hakulezha aYujeya ninji, Yesu jiyi wankolesha.
44005016 Cheliliyi Yesu yumiyi haSabata jichi chamukabishililuwu kuji aYujeya.
44005017 Ilang'a Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Tata yami wuchiji kukalakala nihanu, ninami nawa niji nakukalakala.
44005018 Henohu jihu hafumini aYujeya kukeng'a nankashi kumuzhaha nawu, Hanakumini jakuzhilola kwaSabataku, ilang'a nateni niNzambi ninji, Tata yamami; hakujibwambula naNzambi.

44005019 jichi Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, Mwana hatweshang'a kwila chuma chakankawinjuku, ching'a amona chaji nakwilayi Tata. Yuma yelang'a Tata yezhima, jiyi yelang'a niMwana nawa.
44005020 Mulong'a Tata wakeng'a Mwana, wamulezhang'a yuma yezhima yelang'ayi yomweni; wakamulezha ninyijimu yakubajika yeniyi, kulonja enu mwakahayami.
44005021 Mulong'a chasang'ulang'ayi Tata afu nakuyihanjisha, jichi nawa chahanjishang'ayi Mwana antu anafuukuliyi.
44005022 Tata hasompeshang'a muntuku, nakunzhiki kusompesha kwezhima kuji Mwana;
44005023 kulonja antu ezhima alemeshi Mwana mwomwalemeshelang'awu Tata. Muntu wabulang'a kulemesha Mwana wabulang'a kulemesha Tata yinji wamutemesheli.
44005024 Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, muntu wukutiya izu jami, hakukuhwelela yena wantemesheli, wukweti wumi wahayanyaka; hakamona kumusompeshaku, nafumi jehi mukufwa, neng'ili jehi muwumi.
44005025 Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, mpinzhi yikwinza, yashika jehi, mwakutiyilawu afu izu jaMwana kaNzambi, ákutiya akuhanja.
44005026 Mulong'a chahetayi Tata wumi muji yomweni, jichi chanamwinkiyi niMwana kuheta wumi muji yomweni.
44005027 Namwinki niwanta wakusompesha nanochu chajiyi Mwana kaMuntu.
44005028 Bayi muhayama chumichuku; mpinzhi yakenza henohu antu ezhima aji mumazhamu akatiya izu jinji;
44005029 akejikamu; élili chachiwahi akasang'ukila wumi, ákong'eli chatama akasang'ukila kuyisompesha.

44005030 Ami hinukutwesha kwila chuma chakankawami hela chimuku. Múnatiyang'a jimu nasompeshelang'a, nikusompesha kwami kwalong'a; mulong'a hinalonjang'a muchima wamami awenuku, ching'a muchima waTata wantemesheli.
44005031 Ami neyi nukujishimwina wunsahu wamami aweni, wunsahu wami hiwukwikala walalaku.
44005032 Wunsahu wami awushimunang'a kuji wacheng'i; ami neluki mwakunshimunayi mwalala.
44005033 Mwatemesheli antu kuji Yowanu, yena washimwini mwalala hohu.
44005034 Ilang'a wunsahu wunetezhang'ami hiwakuji antuku; chinahoshang'a mazu awa nalonji mwamwinewi.
44005035 Yena Yowanu wajing'i inong'u, jela nikubutuka nikutong'eka; enu mwetezheli kuzang'alala chilaaka chimu muchezhezhi chinji.
44005036 Ilang'a wunsahu wunikwetami wabajika waYowanu, nyijimu yanyinkeliyi Tata kumanisha, yena nyijimu iyi yinelang'a, jiyi yanshimunang'a wunsahu, nawu antemesheli kuji Tata.
44005037 NiTata wantemesheli jiyi nekali chinsahu chami, jiyi nanshimuni jehi; enu kanja mutiyang'ahu jehi izu jinji, hela kumumona chekalayi.
44005038 Izu jaNzambi hijashakamang'a mujenuku, mulong'a ona atemesheliyi himwamukuhwelelang'aku.
44005039 Enu mwatalatalang'a munyikanja yazhila, mulong'a mwatong'ozhokang'a nenu jimu mumukumwena wumi wahayanyaka; yeniyi jiyi yanshimunang'ami.
44005040 Ilang'a enu kwenu kwonti kwenu kwinza kujami kulonja mumoni wumi.
44005041 Ami hinetezhang'a kunlemesha kuji antuku.
44005042 Ilang'a ami nayiluki, nami mujenu himwekala kukeng'a kwaNzambuku.
44005043 Ami nenzi mwizhina jaTata yami, himunantambuluku; neyi wacheng'i wukwinza mwizhina jinji yomweni, mukumutambula.
44005044 Enu mwetezhang'a kuyilemesha kuji akwenu, ilang'a kuyilemesha kuji Nzambi wumu hohu himwachikeng'ang'aku, mukutwesha kukuhwelela ng'ahi?
44005045 Bayi mutong'ozhoka nenu ami yami nukuyiholokela kuji Tataku; kuji wumu wayiholokelang'a, jiyi Mosi, imwetiyang'a.
44005046 Mulong'a neyi enu mwamukuhweleleli Mosi mutenowu mwaji kunkuhwelela ninami nawa, mulong'a yena wasonekeli nakuntenami.
44005047 Ilang'a neyi mukubula kukuhwelela nyikanja yazhila yasonekeliyi yena, inji mazu inahoshang'ami mukuyikuhwelela ng'ahi?
44006001 Hanyuma yayumiyi, Yesu hakuya kwishinaji jikwawu jezhiya Jang'alaliya, jatenang'awu ching'i nawu Tibelasi.
44006002 Izaza jeneni hijikumulonjela mulong'a amweni yanjikizhilu yeliliyi haji owu ajing'a akata.
44006003 Yesu hakukanjuka hampinji, hakushakama kwenoku nawatumbanzhi twinji.
44006004 (Hohenohu chipanjakenu, chawiza chawa Yudeya, chashika jehi kwakwihi.
44006005 Jichu Yesu hakufumbula mensu hakumona izaza jeneni jinakwinza kuji yena, hakumwila Fwilipu ninji, "tukulanja kujihi mankenji kulonda antu awa ajyi?"
44006006 (Chenochu Yesu wachihosheli mulong'a kumweseka nachu Fwilipu, ilang'a yomweni neluki chakukeng'a kwilayi.)
44006007 Fwilipu hakumwakula ninji, "makenji yakulanja namali nkulakazhi zhiyedi (200) kulonda ezhima atambuli kanti kanti hiyakuwaninaku.
44006008 Kambanzhi kinji wumu, Andeli, manakwa Shimona Petulu, hakumwila Yesu ninji,
44006009 "Kunu kuji kakansi keyala kaji namankenji atanu, ninshi zhiyeji, ilang'a yeniyi antu amavulu akutwesha kuyiwanina?"
44006010 Yesu hakwila ninji, "yishakamishenu antu." Hohenohu hajing'i matuhu amavulu. Amayala ashakamini, akushika kumakombakazhi atanu, (5,000) mukuchinda.
44006011 Yesu hakutambula owu mankenji chanasakililiyi, hakwinka antu ashakamini ninshi nawa mwomumu mwonsu mwakang'eleluwu.
44006012 Antu chanekutiwu, hakiyilezha atumbazhi twinji, "Nonenu yibalu yinashali kulonda tubuli kuyikisang'ana."
44006013 Ayinona nikuyinona hiyakwinzesha mahebi ikumi nayedi (12) nayibalu yamankenji atunu yashiliwu antu heliliwu anajyi jehi.
44006014 Jichi antu chanamoniwu chinjikizhilu cheliliyi, hiyakwila nawu "chalala yeniwu jiyi kapolofwetu wuyelang'awu nawu wakenza mumpata yamwinu mwishina."
44006015 Yesu chanamoniyi hiyakukeng'a kwinza nakumukwata nang'ovu amukanjikizhi kumwinka wanta, hakuhomboloka kumpinji yakankawinji.
44006016 Chikwelili melela, atumbanzhi twinji hiyakukunkumukila kwizhiya.
44006017 Eng'ilili muwatu, hiyakuzambuka hezhiya nawa ayi kuKapelinamu. Henohu kuneyili jehi Yesu niyena wuchiji kanda ezhi kuji wena.
44006018 Nimpepela yeneni yatachika nikukunka, Izhiya hijikutachika kwila mankanda amaneni.
44006019 cheliliwu wena anavung'i jehi neyi makumi ayeji natutanu hela makumi asatu, amweni Yesu nakwenda wuji kwakwihi nawatu, atiyili woma.
44006020 Ilang'a hakuyila ninji, "Yami! bayi mutiya womaku."
44006021 Henohu ajing'a nakukeng'esha kwikala ninji mukachi kawatu, hohenohu watu wushika nikuchikumu kwajing'a nakuyawu.
44006022 Chikunachi, izaza jasheli kwishinaji jezhiya amona nawu kwajing'a watu wumu hohu, nawu Yesu yeng'ila nimuwatu owu hamu nawatumbanzhi twinjiku afumaku kankawawu.
44006023 Ilang'a kwajing'a mawatu mawatu afumini kuTebelasi, hiyakushika kwakwihi nakwajililiwu mankenji helili mwanta nasakilili jehi
44006024 Jichi izaza chijabulili kumona Yesu, hela atumbanzha twinji, wena hiyakwing'ila muwatu iyakuya nakumukeng'akeng'a Yesu kukapelinamu.
44006025 Chanamuwanuwu kwishinanji jezhiya hiyakumwila nawu, ''Eyi Rabi, wenza ifukwinyi kunu?''
44006026 Yesu  hakuyakula ninji, nukuyelezha      nami , ''chlala, chalala, chimunankeng'akeng'i hichinafumi hakumona yinzikizhiluku, chinafumi hakwikuta mankenji mwanji.
44006027 Bayi mukalakelang'a yakuja yanong'ang'aku, ching'a yakuja yashikang'a nikuwumi wahayanyaka yakuyinkayi mwana kamuntu, jiyi anafunjuwu mufuda kuji TataNzambi.''
44006028 Hiyakumwihula nawu, "ching'a twili ng'ahi kulonda tukalakalang'a mijimu yaNzambi?"
44006029 Yesu hakwakula ninji, "mujimu wakumukalakela Nzambi yowu kukuhwelela yena atemesheliyi.''
44006030 Jichi wena hiyakumwihula nawu, ''wukwila chinzhikinzhilwiyi tuchimoni, tukukulweleli wukukong'aji?''
44006031 Atata zhitu ajiilang'a manina muchikalampata, neyi chasonekawun, 'wayekeli jinkendi jakufuma mwiwulu na kunji.''
44006032 Yesu akuyakula niji, ''chalala, chalala, mosi hijiyi wayinkeeli jinkendi jakufuma mwiwuku, ilang'a Tata yami jiyi wayinkang'a jinkendi jalala jakufuma mwiwulu.
44006033 Mulong'a jinkendi jaNzambi jinji Owu jasulukili mwiwulu nikwika akwampata yamunu mwishina wumi.''
44006034 Hiyakumwila nawu, ''Mwata, atwiki jinkendi oju mafuku  ezhima.''
44006035 Yesu hakuyila ninji, ''Ami yami jinkendi jawumi; wunji wezhima wukwinza kujami hakutiya nzalaku,ni wukunkuhwelela hamba katiya cheng'i mpwilaku.
44006036 Ilang'a nayilenzhi nami nikumona jehi, Enu kukuhwelela nehi.
44006037 Ezhima akunyinkayi Tata jiwu akwiza kujimi, ami hinakamuumbaku.
44006038 Ichi chinasuluki mwiwulu hinalonji kwila muchima wamami awenuku, nalonji kwila muchima wayena wantemesheli.
44006039 Muchima wayena wantemesheli, nakeng'i yuma yezhima yananyinkiyi nibuli kuzhimbeshahu hela chimu, ching'a nakachisang'ula hefuku jakukuminina.
44006040 Mulong'a weniwu jiwu muchima waTata yami, nakeng'i ninji antu ezhima áshinshikang'a Mwana nakumukuhwelela, muntu himuntu, amoni wumi wahayanyaka, ninami nakamusang'ula hefuku jakukuminina.
44006041 AYujeya hiyakumutobela nanochu cheliliyi ninji, Yami jinkenji jasulukili mwiwulu.
44006042 Hiyakwila nawu, Yeniwu hijiyi Yesu, mwana kaYosefuku? Tata yinji namama yinji twayiluka. Inji yena welang'a ng'ahi ninji, Ami nasulukili mwiwulu?
44006043 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Bayi mutobang'aku.
44006044 Kwosi muntu natweshi kwinza kujami chakaji kumukoka kuji Tata wantemesheluku, ninami nakamusang'ula hefuku jakukuminina.
44006045 Anasoneki munyikanja yawatuplofwetu nawu, Antu ezhima akayitang'isha kuji Nzambi. Antu ezhima anatiyilili Tata, anashinshikumu, jiwu akwinza kujami.
44006046 Hikwekala muntu wamonahu jehi Tataku, ching'a iwu wafumini kuji Nzambi, jiyi namoni Tata.
44006047 Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, muntu wukunkuhwelela wukweti wumi wahayanyaka.
44006048 Ami yami jinkenji jawumi.
44006049 Ankakulula zhenu ajiili manina muchinkalampata; afwili jehi.
44006050 jinkenji jakujyayi muntu abuli kufwa, jiju jinasuluki mwiwulu.

44006051 Ami yami jinkenji jikweti wumi jasulukili mwiwulu. Neyi muntu wukujya kujinkenjiji wakahanjang'a hayanyaka. Eng'a, jinkenji jinakayinka antu ampata yamunu mwishina kulonja ahanji, jiwu musunyi wami.
44006052 AYujeya hiyakutajika ntaji mukachi kawu, nawu, Muntu iwu wukutwesha kutwinka musunyi winji ng'ahi, mwaka tuwijyi?
44006053 jichi Yesu hakuyila ninji, Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, neyi mukubula kujya musunyi waMwana kaMuntu, mubula kunwa nimashi inji, himukwikala nawumi mujenu awenuku.
44006054 Muntu wajyang'a musunyi wami, wanwang'a nimashi ami, jiyi wukweti wumi wahayanyaka; ami nakamusang'ula hefuku jakukuminina.
44006055 Mulong'a musunyi wami hikujya kwalala, mashi ami hikunwa kwalala.
44006056 Muntu wajyang'a musunyi wami, wanwang'a nimashi ami, jiyi washakamang'a mujami, ninami muji yena.
44006057 Chantemesheliyi Tata wamumi, ninami chinahanjilang'a kuji Tata, jichi chakahanjang'ayi nimuntu wang'ujyang'a.
44006058 jeniji jiju jinkenji jasulukili mwiwulu; hijiji neyi jajiili ankakululaku, niwena afwa jehi; muntu wukujya jinkenjiji wakahanja hayanyaka.
44006059 Mazu awa wayihosheli mushikola chajing'i nakutang'ishayi kuKapelinamu.
44006060 Chachitiyiluwu atumbanzhi twinji amavulu hiyakwila nawu, Mazu awa akala, wukutwesha kutiyamu hinyi?
44006061 Yesu welukili mumuchima winji chajing'i nakutobawu atumbanzhi hachumichi; hakuyila ninji, Munamoni chumichi kukala, tahinji?
44006062 Inji neyi mwakamona Mwana kaMuntu hakukanjama kwajing'ilang'ayi?
44006063 Spilitu jiyi wahanjishang'a, kumusunyi hiwukumwenaku chumaku. Mazu awa inahoshi nanenu, jiwu spilitu, jiwu wumi.
44006064 Ilang'a hajenu haji amu abula kukuhwelela. Mulong'a Yesu welukili kufumisha kutachi, ninawa abulili kukuhwelela, niwamba kamufukezha.
44006065 Yena ninji, jichi nayilezhi nami, kwosi muntu wukutwesha kwinza kujamuku, ching'a amwinkachu kuji Tata.
44006066 Henohu atumbanzhi twinji amakwawu hiyakufuntamu, kwenja nawa cheng'i ninji nehi.
44006067 jichi Yesu hakwihula ikumi nayeji (12) ninji, Ninenu nawa keng'a muyi kwenu, tahinji?
44006068 Kuchinka Shimona Petulu ninji, Tukuya kujinyi? Eyi yeyi wukweti mazu awumi wahayanyaka.
44006069 Tunakuhweleli, tuneluki netu eyi yeyi Wazhila waNzambi. 70 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Ami hinayitonjeli enu ikumi nayejuku? Ilang'a mwinenu wumu hijiyabolu.
44006070 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Ami hinayitonjeli enu ikumi nayejuku? Ilang'a mwinenu wumu hijiyabolu.
44006071 Komana hakutena Yujasi, mwana kaShimona Isakaloti, mulong'a jiyi wamba kamufukezha, jiyi wahekumi nayeji (12).
44007001 Kulonjela hayumiyi, Yesu hakwenja mung'aliliya; walekeli kwenja muYujeya mulong'a aYujeya akeng'eli kumuzhaha.
44007002 Henohu chawizha chawaYujeya chamuyisolu chashika jehi kwakwihi.
44007003 jichi anakwinji hiyakumwila nawu, Fumaku kunu, yang'a kweyi muYujeya kulonja atumbanzhi tweyi niwena akamoni nyijimu yeyi yiwelang'a.
44007004 Muntu wakeng'a kutiyakana, helilang'a yuma kumbajuku. Neyi eyi welang'a yumiyi, kajimwekeshi eyi aweni kuji antu.
44007005 Mulong'a hela anakwinji niwena hiyamukuhweleleluku.
44007006 jichi Yesu hakuyila ninji, Mpinzhi yami kanja yishiki; hakwila enu mpinzhi zhezhima zhenu hohu.
44007007 Antu ampata yamunu mwishina hiyanatweshi kuyihela enuku; hakwila ami anhelang'a, mulong'a yami nayishimunang'a nami nyijimu yawu yatama.
44007008 Enu kwenu yenu kuchawizha, ami kwami kukanjuka kuchawizhichi kanja, mulong'a mpinzhi yami kanja yishiki chikupu.
44007009 Chanayilezhiyi yumiyi hakushakama tuhu mung'aliliya.
44007010 Chanakanjukuwu anakwinji kuchawizha, niyena nawa hakuya kwenoku; hayili hatookaku, ilang'a chakumbaji hohu.
44007011 jichi aYujeya hiyakumukeng'akeng'a kuchawizha, nawu, Wuji kujihi?
44007012 Hamazaza awantu hajing'i kumunyinyita nankashi; amu nawu, Himuntu muwahi; amakwawu nawu, Nehi, wuji nakuluwisha antu.
44007013 Hela chochu, hikwajing'i muntu wamuteneni hatookaku, nawoma wawaYujeya.
44007014 Chihanashiki hakachi kachawizha, Yesu hakukanjuka ayi muTembeli nakutang'isha.
44007015 jichi aYujeya hiyakuhayama nawu, Muntu iwu neluki ng'ahi kutang'a chakaji kujiza?
44007016 jichi Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Ntang'ishilu yami hiyamami awenuku, yambala yanona wantemesheli.
44007017 Neyi kuji muntu nakeng'i kwila mwaya muchima winji, wakeluka ntang'ishilu iyi, neyi yinafumi kuji Nzambi, hela neyi nahoshi chakumuchima wamami aweni.
44007018 Wáhoshang'a chakumuchima winji yomweni, jiyi walonjang'a kujilemesha yomweninji; ilang'a iwu wakeng'ang'a kulemesha wámutemesheli, jiyi walala, muji yena himwekala kuheng'aku.
44007019 Mosi wayinkeli nshimbi, ilang'a hikwekala mwinenu wahembang'a nshimbuku. Muji nakukeng'a kunzhahilaji?
44007020 Izaza hijikumwakula nawu, Eyi wuji nanjemoni. Anakeng'i kukuzhaha kujinyi?
44007021 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Nela mujimu wumu, himukuhayama wezhima wenu.
44007022 jichi chayinkeliyi Mosi kwalama; hichafumini kuji Mosuku, chafumini kuji ankakulula; mwalamishang'a antu haSabata.
44007023 Neyi muntu amwalamisha haSabata kulonja nshimbi yaMosi abuli kuyimotoka, inji enu muzuwang'a nanami nanichi chinakoleshi muntu chikupu haSabata?
44007024 Bayi musompeshang'a chakumesuku, ching'a musompeshang'a kusompesha kwalong'a.
44007025 jichi antu akuYelusalema amakwawu hiyakwila nawu, Hijiyi aji nakukeng'a kuzhahawuku, tahinji?
44007026 Iwu wukuhosha hatooka iwu; izu nijimu jakumwilawu kwosi. Anyuuli aneluki jehi chalala nawu jiyi Klistu, tahinji?
44007027 Hakwila etu tuneluki kwafumayi iwu iyala. Chamba kenzayi Klistu hikwakekala muntu wakeluka kwakufumayuku.
44007028 jichi Yesu hakubijika muTembeli, iku wuji nakutang'isha, ninji, Mwang'iluka, mweluka nikunafumini. Ami hinajinzhila ami awenuku, ilang'a yena wantemesheli jiyi walala, himwamwilukaku.
44007029 Ami namwiluka, mulong'a jiku kunafumini, yena jiyi wantemesheli.
44007030 jichi hiyakukeng'a kumukwata, ilang'a hikwajing'i muntu wakumwolwela chikasaku, mulong'a henohu mpinzhi yinji kanja yishiki.
44007031 Ilang'a antu amavulu amwizaza hiyakumukuhwelela, nawu, Chakenzayi Klistu, wakela yinzhikizhilu yakubajika yaneliyi iwu iyala, tahinji?
44007032 AFwalisewu hiyakutiya mwajing'i nakumunyinyita izaza. Akulumpi zhawatuplistu niaFwalisewu atemesha nianhembi amukwati.
44007033 jichi Yesu hakwila ninji, Nichiji nanenu mafuku antesha, hinakaya kuji yena wantemesheli.
44007034 Mwakankeng'akeng'a, kunwana nehi; iku kunakekalami, himwakatwesha kushika kwoku.
44007035 AYujeya hiyakuhosha mukachi kawu, nawu, Iyaliwu keng'a ayi kujihi kutukubula kumuwana? Wukuya kuji aYujeya amakwawu apalang'ena jehi mukachi kawaGliki nakutang'isha aGliki, tahinji?
44007036 Iji izu janahoshiyi jakwila ninji, Mwakankeng'akeng'a, kunwana nehi; iku kunakekalami, himwakatwesha kushika kwoku; jaya mujihi?
44007037 Hefuku jakukuminina, jojifuku jalemena chawizha, Yesu hakwimana nakubijika, ninji, Neyi kuji muntu natiyi mpwila, enzi kujami anwi.
44007038 Muntu wukunkuhwelela, mumuchima winji mukufumang'a tulong'a twamenzhi akweti wumi, mwomunahoshi mukanja wazhila.
44007039 Chahosheliyi ochu wateneni Spilitu, akukeng'a kutambulawu antu akumukuhwelela; henohu Spilitu wuchiji kanja enzi, mulong'a Yesu wuchiji kanja amulemeshi.
44007040 Amakwawu amwizaza chatiyiluwu mazu owu hiyakwila nawu, Chalala jiyi owu kaplofwetu.
44007041 Amakwawu nawu, jiyi Klistu. Ilang'a amakwawu nawu, Aka! Klistu afumi mung'aliliya, tahinji?
44007042 Mukanja wazhila wunahoshi nawu, Klistu wukufuma kumutang'a wajaviji, nikuBetelemi, kumukala kwajing'iyi javiji.
44007043 Izaza jambuka nihansang'u yinji.
44007044 Amakwawu akeng'eli nawu amukwati; ilang'a hikwajing'i muntu wakumwolwela makasaku.
44007045 Anhembi hiyakufunta kuji akulumpi zhawatuplistu nawaFwalisewu; wena hiyakuyihula nawu, Munabuliliji kumuleta?
44007046 Anhembi hiyakwakula nawu, Hikuji muntu wahoshahu jehi neyi iwuku.
44007047 Kuchinka aFwalisewu nawu, Ninenu nawa anayijimbi jehi, tahinji?
44007048 Kunamwekani nyuuli wumu hela kaFwalisewu namukuhweleli, tahinji?
44007049 Ilang'a antu awa amavulu anabuli kwiluka nshimbi ashing'ewa.
44007050 Nikojemu, owu wenzhili jehi kuji Yesu, wajing'i mwinawu niyena,
44007051 hakuyila ninji, Nshimbi yetu yasompeshang'a muntu chakaji kusambila kutiya mwakuhoshayi yomweni, hela kwiluka mwakwilayi, tahinji?
44007052 Wena hiyakumwakula nawu, Komana nineyi nawa wumuntu wakung'aliliya, tahinji? Talatalaku munyikanja yazhila, wiluki kung'aliliya hikwafumang'a kaplofwetuku.
44007053 [Ayili wezhima wawu, iwu kwitala jinji, iwu kwitala jinji.
44008001 Ilang'a Yesu wayili kumpiji yaOliveta.
44008002 Hakwing'ila cheng'i muTembeli bujiji yayeni; antu ezhima hiyakwinza kuji yena, yena hakushakama nakuyitang'isha.
44008003 Ansoneki nawaFwalisewu hiyakumuletela mumbanja akwatawu jehi nakwila wuvumbi.
44008004 Chanamushuwu mukachi hiyakumwila nawu, Eyi Ntang'ishi, mumbanjiwu anamukwati nakwila wuvumbi, anamushintakeshi wakushintakesha.
44008005 Kunshimbi yaMosi atulezha nawu muntu wuji ichi ching'a kumwasa malola; inji eyi neyi tumwili ng'ahi?
44008006 Chahosheluwu chenochu alonjeli kumweseka, kulonja amoni hakumwinkela mulong'a. Ilang'a Yesu hakubanjama, hakusoneka namunu winji hamaseki.
44008007 Chanamwihuluwu ihule-e, hakubanjuka, hakuyila ninji, Muntu nabuli nshiji hakachi kenu asambili kunona ilola amwasi.
44008008 Hakubanjama cheng'i nakusoneka namunu winji hamaseki.
44008009 Wena chanachitiyuwu, hiyakwijikamu, wumu, wumu, kutachikila kuji mukulumpi, njo-o nikuji kansi. Yesu yoshala nikankawinji, namumbanja sang'a ajiyi mukachi.
44008010 Yesu hakubanjuka, hakumwihula ninji, Eyi mumbanja, antu anakwinki mulong'a aji kujihi? Kwosi muntu nakuhishuku?
44008011 Mumbanja ninji, Kwosi Mwanta. Yesu ninji, Hela ami hinakuhishuku; yang'a kweyi, ilang'a kufumisha kulelu bayi wufunta cheng'i munshijuku.]
44008012 jichi Yesu hakuhosha cheng'i nawena, ninji, Ami yami chezhezhi champata yamunu mwishina, muntu wukunlonjelami hakenjela mumwijimaku, ilang'a wakekala nachezhezhi chawumi.
44008013 jichi aFwalisewu hiyakumwila nawu, Wajishimunang'a eyi aweni; wunsahu weyi hiwalalaku.
44008014 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Hela neyi najishimunang'a ami aweni, wunsahu wami walala; mulong'a neluki kunafumini nikunukuya, ilang'a enu himweluka kunafumini hela kunukuyaku.
44008015 Enu mwasompeshang'a mwasompeshang'awu antu. Ami hinasompeshang'a muntuku.
44008016 Chalala, hela neyi nasompeshang'a, kusompesha kwami kwalala; mulong'a hinekala kankawamuku, niji naTata wantemesheli.
44008017 Chalala, hela munshimbi yenu anasoneki nawu, Wunsahu wawantu ayeji walala.
44008018 Ami najishimunang'a ami aweni, niTata wantemesheli hakunshimuna wunsahu.
44008019 jichi hiyakumwihula nawu, Tata yeyi wekala kujihi? Yesu hakwakula ninji, Hela ami, hela Tata yami himwatwilukaku; neyi mwang'ilukami mwaji kwiluka niTata yami.
44008020 Mazu awa wayihosheleli mwitala jakuswekela mali, chajing'i nakutang'ishayi muTembeli. Hikwajing'i muntu wamukwatiluku, mulong'a henohu mpinzhi yinji kanja yishiki.
44008021 jichi hakuyila cheng'i ninji, Ami hinukufumahu, enu mwakankeng'akeng'a, mwakafwa munshiji zhenu. Kunukuyami himukutwesha kushika kwoku.
44008022 AYujeya hiyakwila nawu, Chaneliyi ninji, Kunukuyami himukutwesha kushika kwoku, keng'a ajizhahi, tahinji?
44008023 Yena hakuyila ninji, Enu muji antu ampata yamunu mwishina, ami niji wamwiwulu; enu muji ampata yinu, ami hiniji wampata yinuku.
44008024 jichi chinayili nami, Mwakafwa munshiji zhenu. Mulong'a neyi mukubula kunkuhwelela nenu, Ami Yami, mwakafwa munshiji zhenu.
44008025 jichi hiyakumwihula nawu, Ochu yeyinyi? Yesu hakuyila ninji, Nayilezha jehi kufumisha kutachi.
44008026 Niji nayuma yayivulu yakuhosha yakuyisompeshenu; hakwila yena wantemesheli walala, ami nahoshang'a nawantu ampata yamunu mwishina mazu inatiyili kuji yena.
44008027 Wena hiyelukili nawu nateni Tata yinjuku.

44008028 jichi Yesu hakuyila ninji, Chimwamba kanyamuna Mwana kaMuntu kwiwulu, henohu jihu mwamba kelukila nenu Ami Yami; nenu hinelang'a chuma chakankawamuku, ilang'a nahoshang'a mazu awa mwomwanlezheluwu kuji Tata.
44008029 Yena wantemesheli nekala hamu ninji, hananshiyi kankawamuku; mulong'a nelang'a yuma yamutiyishang'a kuwaha mafuku ezhima.
44008030 Chajing'i nakuhoshayi ochu antu amavulu amukuhwelela nikumukuhwelela.
44008031 Yesu hakuhosha nawaYujeya anamukuhweleli ninji, Neyi mukushakama mwizu jami, mukwikala atumbanzhi twami chalala;
44008032 mukwiluka walala, niwalala wukuyikasununa.
44008033 Wena hiyakumwakula nawu, Etu anyana kaAbalahama, kanja tushakamang'ahu jehi muwujung'uku, inji eyi wunahoshi ng'ahi neyi, Akuyikasununa?
44008034 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, antu ezhima aputolang'a, jiwu anjung'u zhanshiji.
44008035 Njung'u hashakamang'a mwitala hayanyakaku; mwana washakamang'a hayanyaka.
44008036 jichi jinu, neyi Mwana wukuyikasununa, mukukasunuka chikupu.
44008037 Neluki nami enu muji anyana kaAbalahama; hela chochu, enu mwafwilang'a kunzhaha, mulong'a izu jami hijikweti hawushakaminu mujenuku.
44008038 Ami nahoshang'a yinamweni kuji Tata yami, enu mwelang'a yuma yimwatiyili kuji tata yenu.
44008039 Wena hiyakumwakula nawu, Tata yetu Abalahama. Yesu hakuyila ninji, Neyi mwajing'i anyana kaAbalahama, mutenowu mwaji kwila nyijimu yaAbalahama.
44008040 Ilang'a jinu enu mwafwilang'a kunzhaha, ami muntu nayilezha jehi mwalala múnatiyili kuji Nzambi; hijichi chelili Abalahamaku.
44008041 Enu mwelang'a nyijimu yatata yenu. Hiyakumwila nawu, Hituji anyana amuchiputaku, tukweti tata yetu wumu, yowu Nzambi.
44008042 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Neyi Nzambi hitata yenu mwaji kunkeng'ami, mulong'a ami nafumini kuji Nzambi, jiku nenzhili; ami hinajinzhila ami awenuku, yena jiyi wantemesheli.
44008043 Munakang'enyiji kwiluka munahoshang'a? Chinafumi hakubula kutiya izu jami.

44008044 Enu tata yenu jiyabolu; mwakeng'ang'a kwila mwafwilang'ayi tata yenu. Yena wajing'i mbanzhi kufumisha kutachi; yena hemanang'a muwalalaku, mulong'a muji yena himwekala walalaku. Chahoshang'ayi yakutwamba wahoshang'a yinji yomweni, yena hintwambi, hitata yachu.
44008045 Enu mwabulang'a kunkuhwelela mulong'a nahoshang'a walala.
44008046 Mwinenwinyi wukunkonkolola ninji ami neli nshiji? Neyi nahoshang'a walala mwalekelang'aji kunkuhwelela?
44008047 Muntu waNzambi watiyang'a mazu aNzambi. Chimunabuli kwikala antu aNzambi, jihu hanafumi kubula kutiya mazu inji.
44008048 AYujeya hiyakwakula nawu, Chitwakutenang'a netu eyi wukaSamaliya wuji nanjemoni, hitwakutenang'a mwalalaku?
44008049 Kuchinka Yesu ninji, Hinikweti njemonuku; ami nalemeshang'a Tata yami, enu mwansawulang'a.
44008050 Ilang'a hinakeng'i kujilemesha ami awenuku; wákeng'ang'a kunlemesha yowu mukwakusompesha.
44008051 Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, muntu wahembang'a izu jami hamba kamona kufwaku.
44008052 AYujeya hiyakumwila nawu, Ichi jinu tuneluki netu wuji nanjemoni. Abalahama wafwa jehi, niatuplofwetu nawa, hakwila eyi hiwukwila neyi, Muntu wahembang'a izu jami hamba katompa kufwaku.
44008053 Eyi wunabajiki tata yetu Abalahama niatuplofwetu afwili, tahinji? Wuji nakujitena neyi yeyinyi?
44008054 Yesu hakwakula ninji, Neyi nukujilemesha ami aweni, kulema kwami kwamukunkulwayi. Tata yami jiyi wanlemeshang'a, iwu mwatenang'a nenu Nzambi yenu.
44008055 Enu himunamwilukuku, ilang'a ami namwiluka. Neyi nukwila nami hinamwilukaku, nukwikala ntwambi neyi enu. Ilang'a namwiluka, nahembang'a izu jinji.
44008056 Tata yenu Abalahama walung'ili chamweniyi ifuku jami; chajimweniyi hakuzang'alala.
44008057 jichi aYujeya hiyakumwila nawu, Kanja wushiki munyaka makumi atanu (50), wunamoni jehi niAbalahama?
44008058 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, hajing'i Abalahama kanja avwaliki, Ami Yami.
44008059 jichi hiyakunona malola nawu amwasi; ilang'a Yesu hakubatama, ejika nimuTembeli.
44009001 Chajing'i nakuhitayi, hakumona iyala wajing'i mputamesu kufumisha havwalikiliyi.
44009002 Atumbanzhi twinji hiyakumwihula nawu, Eyi labi, wakong'eli nshiji hinyi, iwu iyala, tahinji anvwali zhinji, mwaka avwaliki mputamesu?
44009003 Yesu hakwakula ninji, Hela iyala iwu hela anvwali zhinji hiyakong'eli nshijuku; Nzambi walonjeli nyijimu yinji yakamwekeni muji yena.
44009004 Ching'a tukalakalenu nyijimu yayena wantemesheli hikuchiji mwaana; wufuku keng'a winzi mwabulang'a kukalakalawu nyijimu.
44009005 Hohanu hinichiji mumpata yamunu mwishina, ami yami chezhezhi champata yamunu mwishina.
44009006 Chanahoshiyi ochu, hakufwizha mazeng'i hamaseki, hakuvuba maseki namazeng'i, hakumulambawu hamesu inji,
44009007 hakumwila ninji, Yaku wuweli mwizhiya jaSilowami; chaya mukwila nawu, Kutemesha. jichi hakuya, hakuwela, hakufunta enja amona chachiwahi.
44009008 jichi akwawu atung'ayi ninji kwakwihi niakwawu amumweni hakusambila hajing'iyi mukwakulomba, hiyakwila nawu, Hijiyi washakaminang'a nakulombaku?
44009009 Amakwawu nawu, jiyi. Amakwawu nawu, Nehi, wamufwana tuhu. Yena ninji, Yami.
44009010 jichi wena hiyakumwihula nawu, Inji mesu eyi anayitoneshi ng'ahi?
44009011 Hakwakula ninji, iyala izhina jinji Yesu, wavuba maseki, hakulamba hamesu ami, hakung'ila ninji, Yaku kuSilowami wuweli. Hinukuya, chinaweli hinukumona.
44009012 Hiyakumwihula nawu, Wuji kujihi? Ninji, Kwizhi.
44009013 Hiyakutwala muntu owu wajing'i mputamesu kuji aFwalisewu.
44009014 jenoju ifuku japutiliyi Yesu maseki, jamutonesheliyi muntu mesu, jajing'i jaSabata.
44009015 jichi aFwalisewu niwena hiyakumwihula cheng'i nawu, Watona ng'ahi? Yena hakuyila ninji, Washa maseki akuputa hamesu ami, chinaweli hinukumona.

44009016 jichi aFwalisewu amakwawu hiyakwila nawu, Iwu muntu hafuma kuji Nzambuku, mulong'a hazhilikang'a Sabataku. Ilang'a amakwawu nawu, Mukwanshiji wukutwesha ng'ahi kwila yinzhikizhilu yiji neyi iyi? Henohu ajambula nikujambula.
44009017 jichi hiyakumwihula cheng'i owu mputamesu, nawu, Atulezhi, ichi chanakutoneshiyi mesu, wunatong'ozhoki ng'ahi? Wukumutena neyinyi? Yena ninji, Hikaplofwetu.
44009018 jichi aYujeya kwitezha nawu jiyi mputamesu anatoneshuwu nehi, ching'a anatambiki anvwali zhamuntu anatoneshuwu.
44009019 Hiyakuyihula nawu, Yeniwu jiyi mwanenu, mwelang'a nenu wavwalikili mputamesu, tahinji? Ichi jinu namoni ng'ahi?
44009020 Anvwali zhinji hiyakwakula nawu, Tuneluki netu jiyi mwanetu, wavwalikili mputamesu;
44009021 ilang'a ichi chanamoniyi hitunachilukuku; hela wámutonesha mesu inji hitunamwilukuku. Mwihulenu yomweni, wakula jehi, yomweni wukujishimwina kwinji.
44009022 Anvwali zhinji ahosheli ochu nawoma wayitiyiluwu aYujeya, mulong'a aYujeya atiyang'ana jehi nawu, neyi muntu wukwitezha ninji yeniwu jiyi Klistu, akamuhang'a mushikola yawu.
44009023 jihu hafumini anvwali zhinji kuhosha nawu, Wakula jehi, mwihulenu yomweni.
44009024 jichi hiyakutambika owu iyala wajing'i mputamesu kamuchiyeji, hiyakumwila nawu, Mulemeshi Nzambi, etu tuneluki netu iwu iyala himukwanshiji.
44009025 Hakuyakula ninji, Neyi himukwanshiji ami kwiluka nehi; neluki chuma chimu hohu nami, ami najing'i mputamesu, katataka niji nakumona chachiwahi.
44009026 jichi hiyakumwihula cheng'i nawu, Wakwila ng'ahi? Mesu eyi wayitonesha ng'ahi?
44009027 Hakuyakula ninji, Ami nayilezhi katataka, enu kutiya nehi. Munakeng'i mutiyumu cheng'i, tahinji? Enu aweni munakeng'i mubalumuki kwikala atumbanzhi twinji nawa, tahinji?
44009028 Hiyakumutuka nawu, Eyi yeyi kambanzhi kinji, etu kwetu tuyatumbanzhi twaMosi.
44009029 Tuneluki netu Nzambi wahosheli naMosi, hakwinza iwu iyala hituneluki kwafumayuku.
44009030 Owu iyala hakuyakula ninji, Aka! Munanhayamishi chimunabuli kwiluka kwafumayi, kutong'a jiyi natoneshi jehi mesu ami.
44009031 Etu tuneluki netu Nzambi hatiyililang'a akwanshijuku; ilang'a neyi kuji muntu mukwakulemesha Nzambi, welang'a nimuchima winji, Nzambi wukumutiyilila.
44009032 Kufumisha kushankulu kanja achitiyang'ahu jehi nawu, kuji muntu watoneshahu jehi mesu amukwawu wavwalikili mputamesu.
44009033 Neyi iwu iyala hafumini kuji Nzambuku, haji kutwesha kwila chumaku.
44009034 Wena hiyakumwakula nawu, Eyi wavwalikili munshiji chikupu, wutulezhang'etu? Hiyakumuhang'a mukachi kawu.
44009035 Yesu hakutiya nawu anamuhang'i jehi mukachi kawu. Chanamuwaniyi, hakumwihula ninji, Eyi wunamukuhweleli Mwana kaNzambi, tahinji?
44009036 Yena hakwakula ninji, jiyinyi Mwanta; kulonja nimukuhweleli?
44009037 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Wunamumoni jehi, jiyi iwu wuji nakuhosha naneyi.
44009038 Yena hakwila ninji, Mwanta nakuhweleli. Hakujifukula kuji yena.
44009039 Yesu hakwila ninji, Chinenzhili mumpata yamunu mwishina nalonjeli kusompa, kulonja ábulang'a kumona amoni, niámonang'a abalumuki amputamesu.
44009040 AFwalisewu amakwawu ajing'iyi nawu chanatiyuwu mazu owu, hiyakumwila nawu, Ninetu nawa tuyamputamesu, tahinji?
44009041 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Neyi mwajing'i amputamesu, himwaji kwikala nanshijuku; ichi jinu chimuji nakwila nenu, Twamonang'a; komana nshiji yenu yayiwenyi.
44010001 Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, muntu wukubula kwing'ilila mwiyinja jawanyikoku kuchisu, ilang'a hakukanjamina hacheng'i, jiyi ikombi, jiyi mukwakubuwa.
44010002 Ilang'a muntu wukwing'ilila kuchisu, jiyi kabing'a kawanyikoku.
44010003 Mukwakuhemba chisu wukumwenzulwila; anyikoku atiyang'a izu jinji, niyena watambikang'a anyikoku inji yomweni hezhina, hezhina, hakuyilombolang'a hanzi.
44010004 Chakwijishayi anyikoku inji ezhima, hakutwaminaku; anyikoku hiyakumulonjela, mulong'a eluka izu jinji.
44010005 Ilang'a muntu wacheng'i hiyakumulonjelaku, akumutemuka; mulong'a hiyeluka izu jawantu acheng'uku.
44010006 Yesu hakuyilezha chishimu ochu, ilang'a wena kwiluka mwayilezheliyi nehi.
44010007 jichi Yesu hakuyila ninji, Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, Ami yami chenzelu chawanyikoku.
44010008 Antu ezhima ansambilili hiyamakombi, hiyakwakubuwa; ilang'a anyikoku hiyayitiyiluku.
44010009 Ami yami chenzelu; neyi muntu wukwing'ilila mujami wukwamwinewa, wukwing'ilang'a wukwijikang'a, wukuwanang'a kuwujiilu.
44010010 Ikombi wenzhilang'a ching'a yowu kwiya nakuzhaha nakukisang'ana. Ami nenzhili kulonja akamoni wumi, akawumoni wakubajika kuwaha nankashi.
44010011 Ami yami kabing'a walala; kabing'a walala wukutula wumi winji haji anyikoku.
44010012 Mukwakukong'ela wulooku hohu, hikabing'a wukweti nyikoku yinjuku; chakumonayi kang'wiji hakwinza, hakushiya nyikoku, hakutemuka; kang'wiji hakuyikwata nakuyipalang'esha,
44010013 mulong'a wakong'elang'a kwawulooku hohu, haakamang'a nyikokuku.
44010014 Ami yami kabing'a walala, neluka amami aweni, niwena ang'iluka.
44010015 Chang'ilukayi Tata, ninami namwiluka Tata. Ami nukutula wumi wami haji anyikoku.
44010016 Nikweti anyikoku acheng'i, hiyamwiyinja jinuku; ching'a nakayileta niwena; wena akatiya izu jami; akekali mukanka wumu nikabing'a wumu.
44010017 jichi chankeng'elayi Tata mulong'a nukutula wumi wami kulonja nakawutambuli cheng'i.
44010018 Kwosi wawuntambulang'aku, nawutulang'a ami aweni. Nikweti wanta wakuwutula, nikweti nawa wanta wakuwutambula cheng'i. jimu mwananlezhuwu kuji Tata yami.
44010019 jichi aYujeya hiyakujambula cheng'i hamazu owu.
44010020 Amavulu nawu, Wuji nanjemoni, wanjala. Mukabang'a tuhu nakumutiyilila?
44010021 Amakwawu nawu, Wenawa himazu ahoshang'a muntu wukweti njemonuku. Njemoni atweshi kutonesha mesu amputamesu?
44010022 Henohu kuYelusalema kwajing'i Chawizha Chakuzhilika, hachilaaka chachishika.
44010023 Yesu wajing'i nakwenja muTembeli mwikeki jakuchisu chaSolomoni.
44010024 jichi aYujeya hiyakumupompela kwi-njo, hiyakumwila nawu, Wukutushakamisha mafuku ang'ahi nakululuta nakuzhinoka? Neyi yeyi Klistu, lumbululaku chikupu.
44010025 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Nayilezheli, enu kukuhwelela nehi. Nyijimu yinelang'a mwizhina jaTata yami, jiyi yanshimunang'a wunsahu.
44010026 Chimunabuli kukuhwelela chinafumi hakubula kwikala anyikoku ami.
44010027 Anyikoku ami atiyang'a izu jami, ami nayiluka, niwena anlonjelang'a.
44010028 Hinukuyinka wumi wahayanyaka, hiyamba kanong'aku; kwosi wakayihukula muchikasa chamuku.
44010029 Tata yami wányinkeluwu wabajika ezhima; kwosi wukutwesha kuyihukula muchikasa chaTataku.
44010030 Ninami niTata twekala wumu.
44010031 AYujeya hiyakunona cheng'i malola nawu amwasi.
44010032 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Nayilezha jehi nyijimu yayiwahi yayivulu yakuji Tata, mujimwinyi mukung'asila malola?
44010033 AYujeya hiyakumwakula nawu, Hitukukwasila hamujimu wawuwahuku, ilang'a hakutuka Nzambi, mulong'a eyi wumuntu wunajimoni neyi, NiNzambi.
44010034 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Anasoneki munshimbi yenu nawu, Ami nami enu muji anzambi.
44010035 Inji neyi antu atiyili izu jaNzambi wayiteneni ninji enu muji anzambi; ochu mukanja wazhila hiyatweshang'a kuwumotokaku;
44010036 mumwili yena ázhilikawu jehi kuji Tata, átemeshayi mumpata yamunu mwishina, nenu, Wunatuki Nzambi; nanochu chineli nami, NiMwana kaNzambi?
44010037 Neyi nabulang'a kwila nyijimu yaTata yami bayi munkuhwelelaku.
44010038 Ilang'a neyi nayilang'a, hela munabuli kunkuhwelela ami aweni, kuhwelelenu kwanyijimu, kulonja mwakeluki mwakashinshiki nenu Tata wuji mujami, ninami niji muji Tata.
44010039 Hiyakweseka cheng'i kumukwata, hakuyiwomboloka.
44010040 Hakuya cheng'i kumbaji yamusela yaYojana, kwazhimikilang'ayi Yowanu hatachi, ashakama nikwenoku.
44010041 Amavulu hiyakwinza kuji yena nawu, Yowanu hakong'eli yinzhikizhiluku, ilang'a mazu ezhima amutenenuwu muntu iwu kuji Yowanu, komana alala.
44010042 Kwenoku antu amavulu hiyakumukuhwelela.
44011001 Kwajing'a muntu wakata, Lazalu ku Betani, wakumukala waMaliya namanakwinji wamunbanda Mata.
44011002 Jiyi Maliya wawayishili mwanta manzhi evumba jajiwahi, wakombweli majatilu inji nansuki, jiyi wukweti manakwinji Lazalu wakata.
44011003 Jichu ahelinji hayakumutemesha Yesu mazu, nawu, "Eyi Mwanta, tiya , mukwenu wakeng'a wakata.
44011004 Yesu chanachitiyiyi hakwila ninji, kukatiku hikwakufwaku, kwakulemesha nachu, mwana kaNzambi.
44011005 Yesu wakeng'eli Mata nimanakwinji wamumbanda ni Lazalu.
44011006 Jichi chanatiyiyi nawu wakata, hakushakama kwenoku mafuku ayeji.
44011007 Henohu hakuyila atumbanzhi twinji ninji, tuyenu cheng'i mu Yudeya.
44011008 Atumbanzhi hiyakumwila nawu, "Eyi Rabi, aYudeya mafuku awa akeng'a kukwasa malola, wuyuka nawa cheng'i?
44011009 Kuchinka Yesu ninji hikwekala mpinji ikumi neji (12) jamwaanaku, tahinji? Neyi muntu wukwenja namwaana hakuhukanaku, nanochu chanamoniyi namwaana wamunu mwishina.
44011010 Ilang'a neyi muntu wukwenja nanyijima wukujitula, mulong'a nabuli chezhezhi muji yomweni.
44011011 Chanahoshiyi mazu awa, hakunung'aku ninji ibwambu jetu Lazalu nayi jehi mutulu, ami hinukuya nkamuhinjwishi mutulu. Jichi atumbanzhi hiyakumwila nawu, Eyi mwanta, neyi nayi mutulu wukuhanja?
44011012 jichi atumbanzhi hiyakumwila nawu, Eyi Mwanta, neyi nayi mutulu wukuhanja.
44011013 Komana Yesu nateni kufwa kwinji; hakwila wena ajing'i nakutong'ozhoka nawu nateni kunooka mutulu.
44011014 jichi Yesu hakuyilezha chalumbuluka chikupu ninji, Lazalu wafwa jehi.
44011015 Chinabuli kwikala kwenoku natiyi kuwaha hansang'u yenu, kulonja enu mwakakuhweleli. Hela chochu, tuyenu kuji yena.
44011016 jichi Tomasi, atenawu nawu Mpamba, hakuyila akwawu atumbanzhi ninji, Tuyenu ninetu nawa, twakafwili hamu ninji.
44011017 Yesu chanashikiyi hakuwana Lazalu wakama jehi mwizhamu mafuku awana.
44011018 KuBetani kwajing'i kwakwihi naYelusalema, kafwampi neyi 3 km.
44011019 Henohu aYujeya amavulu enza jehi nakukunjezha Mata naMaliya nansang'u yamanakwawu.
44011020 jichi Mata chatiyiliyi nawu Yesu wuji nakwinza, hakuya nakumukinkilila, ilang'a Maliya hakushakama tuhu mwitala.
44011021 jichi Mata hakumwila Yesu ninji, Eyi Mwanta, neyi eyi wajing'i kunu, mutenowu manakwami haji kufwaku.
44011022 Hela katataka neluki nami Nzambi wukukwinka chezhima chiwukumulomba.
44011023 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Manakweyi wukusang'uka mukufwa.
44011024 Mata hakumwila ninji, Neluki nami wamba kasang'uka, hamba kasang'ukawu afu hefuku jakukuminina.
44011025 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Ami yami chisang'ukilu niwumi. Muntu wankuhwelelami, hela wukufwa wakahanja.
44011026 Muntu wamumi nankuhwelelami hamba kafwaku. Eyi wunakuhweleli mwenimu?
