44011027 Yena hakumwila ninji, Eng'a Mwanta, nakuhweleli nami yeyi Klistu, Mwana kaNzambi, yowu elang'awu nawu wakenza mumpata yamunu mwishina.
44011028 Chahosheliyi omu hakuya kwinji, hakutambika mwanyikinji Maliya hambaji ninji, Ntang'ishi wuji kunu, nakutambiki.
44011029 Niyena chanachitiyiyi, hakunyamuka swayi, hakuya kuji yena.
44011030 Henohu Yesu kanja ashiki mumukala, wuchiji kwamukinkilililiyi Mata.
44011031 AYujeya ajing'i naMaliya mwitala nakumukunjezha, chamwenuwu Maliya hakunyamuka swayi hakwijika, hiyakumulonjela, atong'ozhokeli nawu kwizhi wuji nakuya nakujilila kwizhamu.
44011032 jichi Maliya chashikiliyi kwajing'iyi Yesu, chamumweniyi hakujumbila kunyenju yinji, hakumwila ninji, Mwanta, neyi eyi wajing'i kunu, mutenowu manakwami haji kufwaku.
44011033 jichi Yesu chamumweniyi wuji nakujila, niaYujeya enzhiliyi nawu aji nakujila, hakujishishimuna muspilitu, atiya nikukala.
44011034 Ninji, Munamukamiki kujihi? Hiyakumwila nawu, Mwanta, inzang'a wutali.
44011035 Yesu hakujila.
44011036 jichi aYujeya hiyakwila nawu, Talenu chamukeng'eliyi!
44011037 Ilang'a hajing'i amakwawu nawu, Yeniwu watonesheli mesu anowu wajing'i mputamesu, akang'anyi kulekesha iwu iyala kufwa, tahinji?
44011038 jichi Yesu, iku wuji nakujishishimuna, hakwinza kwizhamu. jajing'i iyeng'u, akunzhikaku niilola.
44011039 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Fumishenuku ilola. Mata, muhelanowu wafwa, hakumwila ninji, Mwanta, hanu hakununka, mulong'a munahiti jehi mafuku awana.
44011040 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Hinakulezha nami, neyi wukukuhwelela wukumona lubanzhi lwakulema kwaNzambuku, tahinji?
44011041 Afumishaku niilola. Yesu hakufumbula mesu kwiwulu, hakwila ninji, Tata nakusakilili chiwunantiyi.
44011042 Ninami neluka nami eyi wantiyang'a mafuku ezhima, ilang'a natong'ozhoki awa antu amavulu anemani kunu, jichi chinahoshi; kulonja wena akuhweleli nawu yeyi wantemesheli.
44011043 Chanahoshiyi mwenomu, hakubijika nezu jang'ovu ninji, Eyi Lazalu, ijikakumu!
44011044 Muntu wajing'i wafwa hakwijikamu chochamuzhing'azhing'awu kumakasa nikunyenju namahina akuzhiika nachu, kumesu azhing'iluku ihina jacheng'i. Yesu hakuyila ninji, Mukasununenu ayi.
44011045 jichi amavulu ahaji aYujeya énzhili kuji Maliya, ámweni ochu cheliliyi Yesu, hiyakumukuhwelela.
44011046 Ilang'a amakwawu hiyakuya kwawu kuji aFwalisewu, hiyakuyilezha mwaneliyi Yesu.
44011047 jichi akulumpi zhawatuplistu niaFwalisewu hiyakupompesha chota nawu, Tukwila ng'ahi? mulong'a iwu muntu hakukong'a yinzhikizhilu yayivulu.
44011048 Neyi tukumuleka tuhu chochichi, antu ezhima akumukuhwelela, nialoma akenza nakututambula mpata yetu nimunza wetu.
44011049 Ilang'a mwinawu wumu izhina jinji Kayafwasi, wájing'i kaplistu muneni hamwakowu, hakuyila ninji, Himweluka chuma nichimuku.
44011050 Munabuli kushinshika chakwila nenu chinawahi muntu wumu kufwila awa antu, kulonja munza wezhima wubuli kunong'a.
44011051 Chahosheliyi ochu, hahosheli chakumuchima winjuku; wahosheli nanochu chajing'iyi kaplistu muneni hawena mwakowu, hakuplofweta ninji, Yesu akafwili owu munza.
44011052 Hakafwila kwamunzowu hohuku; ching'a akapompesheli hamu anyana kaNzambi anapalang'ani.
44011053 Kufumisha kwifuku oju hiyakutiyang'ana nawu amuzhahi.

44011054 jichi Yesu henjeli nawa cheng'i hatooka mukachi kawaYujeyaku, wafuminuku, hakuya mumpata yiji kwakwihi nachinkalampata, hakwing'ila mumukala wumu izhina jawu Efwelemi, hakulabilaku hamu nawatumbanzhi twinji.
44011055 Chawizha chawaYujeya chaChipanjakenu chinashiki jehi kwakwihi, antu amavulu hiyakufumafuma munyikala, hiyakukanjuka kuYelusalema, hachiji Chipanjakenu kanja, kulonja kujizhilika.
44011056 Hiyakukeng'akeng'a Yesu. Hiyakujihuzhola hajing'i nakwimazhalawu muTembeli, nawu, Munatong'ozhoki nenuji? Nenu hakwinza kuchawizhaku, tahinji?
44011057 Akulumpi zhawatuplistu niaFwalisewu alezha jehi antu nawu, neyi muntu neluki kwajiyi amushimuni kulonja amukwati.
44012001 Hasheli mafuku atanu najimu naChipanjakenu, Yesu hakwinza kuBetani kwajing'iyi Lazalu asang'wiliyi muji afu.
44012002 Hiyakumutelekela yakujya kwenoku. Mata hakuyikalakela, ilang'a Lazalu hakushakama nawakwawu ajing'i nakujya naYesu.

44012003 jichi Maliya hakunona lita yanketenki yamanzhi evumba jajiwahi aswezha kulema wuseya, hakuwayisha majatilu aYesu, hakukombola majatilu inji nansuki zhinji; itala jezhima jiipuka niivumba janowu manzhi.
44012004 Kambanzhi kinji wumu, Yujasi Isakaloti, wukukeng'a kumufukezha,
44012005 hakwila ninji, Alekelaji kulanjisha awa manzhi namali nkulakazhi zhisatu (300), ayinka atuzweng'i?
44012006 Chahosheliyi ichi halonjeli kwakama atuzweng'uku, wahosheli nanochu chajing'iyi ikombi, wajing'i wahemba fuuba, wanonenang'amu mali ashilang'awu mufuuba.
44012007 jichi Yesu hakwila ninji, Muleki kwinji, wakeng'a kunswekela ifuku jakanzhiikawu.
44012008 Atuzweng'i mwekala nawu mafuku ezhima, hakwila ami hinukwikala nenu mafuku ezhimaku.
44012009 AYujeya amavulu nankashi chanatiyuwu nawu wuji kwenoku, hiyakuyaku. Hiyalonjeli kwaYesu hohuku, alonjeli nawu amoni niLazalu asang'wiliyi muji afu.
44012010 Ilang'a akulumpi zhawatuplistu akwatili mpúng'a nawu amuzhahi niLazalu nawa.
44012011 Mulong'a aYujeya amavulu ayili nakumukuhwelela Yesu hansang'u yaLazalu.
44012012 Chikunachi, izaza jeneni jawantu áyili kuchawizha, chanatiyuwu nawu Yesu wuji nakwinza kuYelusalema,
44012013 hiyakunona nyitayi yanyikoma, hiyakuya nakumukinkilila. Hiyakubijika nawu, Kisu kisu, wamwinu winzi! Wakiswilewa iwu wukwinza mwizhina jaMWANTA, jiyi Mwanta waIsalela!
44012014 Yesu chanawaniyi mwana kachimbulu, hakukanjamahu;
44012015 neyi chanasonekuwu nawu, Eyi mwana kaZiyona wamumbanja, Bayi wutiya womaku; Tala, Mwanta weyi hakwinza kujeyi Nakwenjela hamwana kachimbulu.
44012016 Hakusambila atumbanzhi twinji hiyelukili yumiyuku, ilang'a chanamulemeshuwu jehi Yesu, hiyakwanuka chamusonekeluwu, nichamwililuwu yumiyi.
44012017 jichi izaza jawantu ajing'iyi nawu hamutambikiliyi Lazalu afumi mwizhamu hamusang'wiliyi muji afu, hiyakushimuna mwamwenuwu.
44012018 jihu hafumini kumukinkilila kuji izaza jawantu, mulong'a anatiyi jehi nawu nakong'i jehi chinzhikizhilu ichi.
44012019 jichi aFwalisewu hiyakuhosha wumu namukwawu nawu, Talenu chimukumukang'anya; itung'a jezhima hijikumulonjela.
44012020 Mukachi kanowu antu ayili nakujifukula kuji Nzambi kuchawizha, mwajing'i aGliki amu.
44012021 Wena hiyakuya kuji Fwilipu wakuBeteseja wamung'aliliya, hiyakumulomba nawu, Eyi mwanta, tunakeng'i tumumoni Yesu.
44012022 Fwilipu hakuya nakulezha Anjeli; Anjeli nawa hakwinza naFwilipu, hiyakulezha Yesu.
44012023 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Mpinzhi yakulemeshawu Mwana kaMuntu yenza jehi.
44012024 Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, mbutu yatijiku ching'a yiholokela mumaseki yifwa, mukunkulwayi yikushakamang'a inkawayu; ilang'a neyi yikufwa yikusong'a yayivulu.
44012025 Muntu wukukeng'a wumi winji wakawuzhimbesha; muntu wukuhela wumi winji mumpata yamunu mwishina, wakawuhemba nikukuhanja kwahayanyaka.
44012026 Muntu wukunkalakela, anlonjeli; kunakekalami jiku kwakekala ning'amba yami; muntu wukunkalakela, akamulemesha kuji Tata.
44012027 Ichi jinu muchima wami hiwukukaba. Nukuhosha namiji? Nili nami, Eyi Tata, mpulwishi kumpinzhi iyi, tahinji? jichi nenzhilili, nalonjeli mpinzhi yoyeniyi.
44012028 Tata, lemeshaku izhina jeyi. Hikukwinza izu jakufuma mwiwulu ninji, Najilemeshi jehi, nakajilemesha nawa cheng'i.
44012029 jichi izaza jawantu emenuku chanajitiyuwu, hiyakwila nawu kunajijimi. Amakwawu nawu, Kang'elu nahoshi nayena.
44012030 Yesu hakwakula ninji, Izu iji jinenzi hansang'u yenu, bayi hansang'u yamuku.
44012031 Ichi jinu kusompesha mpata yamunu mwishina kunashiki jehi. Ichi jinu mwanta wayuulang'a mpata yamunu mwishina hakwikala chimwang'azhi.
44012032 Neyi akumfumisha heseki annyamuna kwiwulu, nakakokela antu ezhima kujami aweni.
44012033 Chahosheliyi mwenimu, washimwini kufwa kwakukeng'a kufwayi.

44012034 Izaza jawantu hiyakumwakula nawu, Etu twatiyang'a kunshimbi nawu, Klistu washakamang'a hayanyaka; inji eyi wukwila ng'ahi neyi Mwana kaMuntu ching'a akamunyamuna kwiwulu? Inji yeniwu Mwana kaMuntu hinyi?
44012035 jichi Yesu hakuyila ninji, Muchiji nachezhezhi mafuku antesha. Enjenung'a himuchiji nachezhezhi, mwijima keng'a wuyikulukili. Muntu wukwenja mumwijima hakwiluka kwakuyayuku.
44012036 Himuchiji nachezhezhi kuhwelelenu chezhezhi, mwikali akwachezhezhi.
44012037 Hela amumweni nakukong'a yinzhikizhilu yayivulu, alekeli kwawu kumukuhwelela;
44012038 kulonja izu jakaplofwetu Isaya jakalumbuluki jeliliyi ninji, Eyi MWANTA, nákuhweleli mutunashimuni hinyi? Chikasa chaMWANTA anachimwekeshi kujinyi?
44012039 jichi chakang'enyuwu kukuhwelela; neyi cheliliyi cheng'i Isaya,
44012040 ninji, Yizhimi mesu awu, yichinchikishi nyichima yawu, Abuli kumona namesu awu, abuli kushinshika munyichima yawu, Akabuli kubalumuka munyichima yawu nakenja kayuuka.
44012041 Isaya wahosheli mazu awa nanochu chamweniyi lubanzhi lwakulema kwinji, hakumutena niyena.
44012042 Hela chochu, anyuuli amavulu amukuhweleleli; ilang'a abulili kumwitezha nawoma wawaFwalisewu, akenja kayihang'a mushikola yawu.
44012043 Akeng'eli kuyilemesha kuji antu; kuyilemesha kuji Nzambi hiyachikeng'eli chalalaku.
44012044 Yesu hakubijika ninji, Muntu wankuhwelelang'ami, hankuhwelelang'a ami hohuku, wakuhwelelang'a ona wantemesheli.
44012045 Muntu wanmonang'ami, wamonang'a yena wantemesheli.
44012046 Ami nenzi niikali chezhezhi champata yamunu mwishina, kulonja muntu wukunkuhwelela abuli kushakama mumwijima.
44012047 Muntu wukutiya mazu nahoshang'ami, abula kuhembamu, ami hinakamusompeshaku; mulong'a hinenzhili nakusompesha antu ampata yamunu mwishinaku, nalonjeli kwamwina antu ampata yamunu mwishina.
44012048 Muntu wukunleka, wukubula kwitezha munahoshang'a, wukweti nsompeshi yinji; mazu inahoshi wowu amba kamusompesha hefuku jakukuminina.
44012049 Mulong'a hinahoshi chakumuchima wamami awenuku; Tata wantemesheli jiyi nanlezhi munukulezha antu, nimunukuhosha.
44012050 Neluki chachiwahi nami, mwananlezhiyi hiwumi wahayanyaka. Mwezhima munahoshang'a, nahoshang'a mwakunlezha kuji Tata.

44013001 Henohu chawizha chaChipanjakenu chichiji kanja chitachiki, Yesu welukili ninji mpinzhi yami yakufuma mumpata yamunu mwishina niyi kuji Tata yinashiki jehi. Chakeng'eliyi antu inji ajing'i mumpata yamunu mwishina, wayikeng'eli hachikupu njo-o nikunsa.
44013002 Hajing'uwu nakujya, henohu jiyabolu weng'izha jehi mumuchima waYujasi Isakaloti, mwana kaShimona, zhakumufukezha,
44013003 Yesu chanelukiyi ninji Tata nashi yuma yezhima mumakasinji, neluki ninji wafumini kuji Nzambi, hakufunta kuji Nzambi;
44013004 hakunyamuka kukujya, hakutenteka mahininji ahewulu kumbaji, hakunona jitwayi, hakujivwala.
44013005 Hakuhung'ununa menzhi mumbashila, hakutachika kuwelesha nyenju yawatumbanzhi, nakuyikombola najitwayi janavwaliyi.
44013006 Chanashikiyi kuji Shimona Petulu, yena hakumwila ninji, Mwanta, keng'a wuweleshi nyenju yamami?
44013007 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Ichi chinukwilami katataka hiwunachilukuku, ilang'a chamba kakulumbulukila kunyaka yakenza.
44013008 Petulu hakumwila ninji, Hiwamba kawelesha nyenju yamuku. Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Neyi nukubula kukuwelesha, hiwukutwesha kutiyang'ana nanamuku.
44013009 Shimona Petulu hakumwila ninji, Mwanta, bayi nyenju yami hohuku, ilang'a nikumakasami nikumutu.

44013010 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Muntu naweli jehi muzhimba wezhima hakukeng'a kuwela cheng'uku, ching'a kunyenju hohu; natooki jehi muzhimba wezhima. Enu munatooki jehi, ilang'a himunatooki wezhima wenuku.
44013011 Mulong'a welukili muntu wukukeng'a kumufukezha; jihu hafumini kwila ninji, Himunatooki wezhima wenuku.
44013012 Cheliliyi naweleshi jehi nyenju yawu, nanoni jehi yuma yinji yakuvwala, nashakami jehi cheng'i, hakuyila ninji, Ichi chinayili munachiluki, tahinji?
44013013 Enu mwang'ilang'a nenu, Eyi Ntang'ishi; cheng'i nawa nenu, Eyi Mwanta. Mwelang'a chachiwahi, mulong'a jichi chiniji.
44013014 Ami niMwanta wenu niNtang'ishi nawa, naweleshi nyenju yenu, jichi ninenu nawa mwaji kuweleshang'ana nyenju yenu.
44013015 Mulong'a ami nayilezhi chuma chakwimbuzhola, kulonja ninenu nawa mwilang'a neyi munayilenu.
44013016 Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, njung'u habajikang'a nkaka yinjuku; hela muntu atemeshawu habajikang'a wámutemesheluku.
44013017 Neyi muneluki yumiyi himukuyila, munakooleki
44013018 Hinayiteni wezhima wenuku; awa inatonji nayiluki; ilang'a nalonji mukanja wazhila wulumbuluki welawu nawu, Muntu wajyang'a yakujya yami nannyamwini jehi katutu kinji.
44013019 Kufumisha hanu nukuyilezhang'a yuma yichiji kanja yimwekani, kulonja neyi yinamwekani jehi mwakatweshi kukuhwelela nenu, Ami Yami.
44013020 Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, yowu wukutambula muntu nukutemesha, nantambulami; muntu wukuntambulami, natambuli yena wantemesheli.
44013021 Yesu chanahoshiyi ochu, hakukaba muspilitu yinji, hakushimuna ninji, Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, haji mwinenu wumu wukumfukezha.
44013022 Atumbanzhi hiyakujitala wumu namukwawu nawu, Nateninyi?
44013023 Kwajing'i kambanzhi kinji wumu akeng'eluwu kuji Yesu, hakukunjamena hebwambu jaYesu.
44013024 jichi Shimona Petulu hakumukobola yena, hakumwila ninji, Tulezhi muntu anateniyi.
44013025 Iku sang'a akunjamenayi hebwambu jaYesu, hakushetumuka, hakumwihula ninji, Mwanta, hinyi?
44013026 Yesu hakwakula ninji, Muntu nukutantila chibalu chajinkenji hinukumwinka, jiyi. Chanatantiyi hakumwinka Yujasi mwana kaShimona Isakaloti.
44013027 Chanatambuliyi chibalu ochu chajinkenji Satana hakumwing'ila. jichi Yesu hakumwila ninji, Ilaku swayi muwunakeng'i kwila.
44013028 Kumesa hikwajing'i muntu welukili mwanatwaliyuku.
44013029 Amakwawu atong'ozhokeli nawu kwizhi Yesu namwili Yujasi ninji, Yaku wulanji yuma yachijika chachawizha; inji kwizhi ayinki atuzweng'i yuma; mulong'a Yujasi jiyi wasenjelang'a fuuba yamali.
44013030 jichi yena chanatambuliyi chibalu chajinkenji, ejika nihanzi. Henohu kuneli jehi wufuku.
44013031 Chanejikiyi hanzi, Yesu hakuhosha ninji, Ichi jinu Mwana kaMuntu anamulemeshi jehi; niNzambi nawa anamulemeshi muji yena.
44013032 Chanamulemeshuwu Nzambi muji yena, niNzambi keng'a alemeshi Mwana kaMuntu kachawichi.
44013033 Enu anyana anyanya, niji nenu kampinzhi kanti hohu. Mwakankeng'akeng'a; múnahosha nawaYujeya nami, Kunukuya himukutwesha kushika kwoku; jimu nukuhosha nawa nanenu.
44013034 Tiyenu, nukuyilezha nshimbi yayiha nami, Mukeng'ang'ani. Chinayikeng'ami, ninenu nawa keng'ang'anenu.
44013035 Neyi mukukeng'ang'ana, jihu hakayilukilawu antu ezhima nawu muji atumbanzhi twami.
44013036 Shimona Petulu hakumwihula ninji, Mwanta, wukuya kujihi? Yesu hakwakula ninji, Kunukuyami hiwukutwesha kunlonjela katatakaku, ilang'a wamba kanlonjela.
44013037 Petulu hakumwila ninji, Mwanta, nukukang'enyaji kukulonjela katataka? Hela kufwa hamuzhimba weyeyi nukufwa tuhu.
44013038 Yesu hakwakula ninji, Wukufwila hamuzhimba wamami, tahinji? Chalala chalala, nukukulezha nami, henohu ikombu kanja etiyiluku, eyi wakajikala mapampa kasatu neyi, Hinamwiluka Yesuku.
44014001 Bayi mwakama munyichima yenuku. Mwamukuhwelelang'a Nzambi, nkuhwelelenu ninami nawa.
44014002 Mwitala jaTata yami mwakushakama mwekala mwamuvulu; neyi himwajing'i chochochuku naji kuyilezha. Nukuya nakuyilong'eshela mwakushakama.
44014003 Chineli nami nukuya nakuyilong'eshela mwakushakama, Ami aweni nakenza cheng'i nakuyitambula; kulonja kunakekalami, jiku mwakekala ninenu nawa.
44014004 Kunukuyami, nzhila mwayiluka jehi.
44014005 Tomasi hakumwila ninji, Mwanta, hitweluka kuwukuyaku; inji nzhila tukuyiluka ng'ahi?
44014006 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Ami yami nzhila, niwalala, niwumi. Kwosi muntu niwumu wukwinza kuji Tata ching'a hajami.
44014007 Neyi mwang'ilukili, mutenowu mwaji kwiluka niTata yami nawa; kufumisha kulelu munamwiluki, munamumoni jehi.
44014008 Fwilipu hakumwila ninji, Mwanta, tulezhi Tata; jimu tunakeng'i hohu.
44014009 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Eyi Fwilipu, múnashakami nenu mwezhimimu, wubuli kung'iluka? Muntu nanmonami namoni Tata. Wuneliliji neyi, Tulezhi Tata?
44014010 Chinekalami muji Tata, niTata mujami, eyi kukuhwelelamu nehi? Awa mazu nayilezhang'a, himazu akumuchima wamami awenuku, Tata washakama mujami jiyi wuji nakukalakala nyijimu yinji.
44014011 Nkuhwelelenu nenu nekala muji Tata, niTata wekala mujami; hela neyi omu nehi, nkuhwelelenu kwakunyijimu yayeni.
44014012 Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, muntu wukunkuhwelela, nyijimu yinukukong'a niyena wakayikong'a; wakakong'a niyakubajika iyi, nanichi chinukuya kuji Tata.
44014013 Chonsu chimukulomba mwizhina jami nukuchila, kulonja Tata amulemesheli muji Mwana.
44014014 Neyi mukulomba chuma mwizhina jami nukuchila.
44014015 Neyi mwankeng'a, mukuhembang'a munayilezhang'a.
44014016 Ami nakamulomba Tata, wakayinka Nkwashi mukwawu akekali nanenu nyaka yezhima.

44014017 Yowu Spilitu wawalala, abulang'a kutwesha kutambulawu kuji antu ampata yamunu mwishina; mulong'a abulang'a kumumona, hela kumwiluka hiyamwilukaku; ilang'a enu mwamwiluka mulong'a washakama nanenu, wakekala mujenu.
44014018 Hinakayishiya neyi anshonaku; nakenza kujenu.
44014019 Kunashali kampinzhi kantesha hohu, antu ampata yamunu mwishina hiyakanmona nawa cheng'uku; ilang'a enu mwakanmona; chinahanjang'ami, jichi chimwakahanjang'a ninenu.
44014020 Ifuku oju mwakeluka nenu ami nekala muji Tata yami, ninenu mwekala mujami, ninami mujenu.
44014021 Muntu wukweti mazu inayilezhang'a nakuyihemba, jiyi wankeng'a; ninowu wankeng'a akumukeng'a kuji Tata yami, ninami nukumukeng'a, nukujimwekeshang'a kuji yena.
44014022 Yuja wacheng'i, hiIsakalotuku, hakumwihula ninji, Eyi Mwanta, ichi chiwukujimwekesha kujetu, wubuli kujimwekesha kuji antu ampata yamunu mwishina, chikufuma hanka?
44014023 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Muntu wankeng'a wukuhemba mazu ami; Tata yami wukumukeng'a, ninetu tukwinza kuji yena tukushakama ninji.
44014024 Muntu wabula kunkeng'a hahembang'a mazu amuku; nimazu awa imukutiya hiyamuku, aTata wantemesheli.
44014025 Nasambilang'ahu jehi kuyilezha mazu awa hohanu hinichiji kushakama nanenu.
44014026 Ilang'a Nkwashi, jiyi Spilitu Wazhila, akatemeshawu kuji Tata mwizhina jami, jiyi wakayitang'isha yuma yezhima, wakayanukisha yinayilezhi yezhima.
44014027 Kuwunja nayishiyili; kuwunja kunawunjang'ami nayinki. Hinayinki neyi chenkang'awu antu ampata yamunu mwishinaku. Bayi mwakama munyichima yenuku, bayi mutiya hela womaku.
44014028 Munatiyi chinayili nami nukuya kwacheng'i, nakenza kujenu. Neyi mwankeng'a, mutenowu munazang'alali nanichi chinukuya kuji Tata, mulong'a Tata wambajikami.
44014029 Nayilezhang'ahu jehi hohanu hichichiji kanja chinzi, kulonja chichakenza mwakakuhweleli.
44014030 Hinukuhosha cheng'i nanenu mazu amavuluku; mulong'a mwanta wayuulang'a mpata yamunu mwishina hakwinza; niyena hakweti chuma mujamuku.
44014031 Ami nelang'a mwanlezheliyi Tata, kulonja antu ampata yamunu mwishina akeluki nawu nakeng'a Tata. Nyamukenu tuyenu.
44015001 Ami yami muvinyu walala, Tata yami jiyi njimi.
44015002 Nyitayi yezhima yamujami yabulang'a kusong'a nyikabu, wayikunkulang'aku; niyezhima yasong'ang'a nyikabu wayitookeshang'a, kulonja yisong'i nyikabu yayivulu.
44015003 Enu munatooki jehi namazu inahoshi nanenu.
44015004 Shakamenu mujami, ninami nishakami mujenu. Chakang'anyang'a mutayi kusong'a nyikabu inkawawu ching'a wushakama mumuvinyu, chochimu ninenu nawa mukukang'anya ching'a mushakama mujami.
44015005 Ami yami muvinyu, enu munyitayi; muntu washakamang'a mujami ninami muji yena, jiyi wasong'ang'a nyikabu yaswezha kuvula; mulong'a chakaji ami himukutwesha kwila hela chuma nichimuku.
44015006 Neyi muntu nabuli kushakama mujami, akumunata neyi mutayi, wukuuma; akuyikung'ula nakuyinatila mukesi, yikusukuma.
44015007 Neyi mukushakama mujami, nimazu ami ashakama mujenu, mukulomba chonsu chimukukeng'a, akuyililachu.
44015008 Chuma chakumulemesha nachu Tata yami, chochakusong'a nyikabu yayivulu; himukwikala atumbanzhi twami.
44015009 Mwanankeng'uwu kuji Tata, jimu nawa munayikeng'enu; shakamenu mukukeng'a kwami.
44015010 Neyi mukuhembang'a munayilezhang'a mukushakama mukukeng'a kwami; neyi chinahembang'ami mwanlezhang'awu kuji Tata yami, nashakamang'a mukukeng'a kwinji.
44015011 Chinayilezhi yumiyi nalonji muzang'alu wami wikali mujenu, nimuzang'alu wenu wuwanini.
44015012 Nayilezhi nami mukeng'ang'ani, neyi chinayikeng'i jehi ami.
44015013 Hikuji kukeng'a kwabajika kwenikuku, kwakutulayi muntu wumi winji hanyizhimba yawamabwambu zhinji.
44015014 Neyi mukwila munukuyilezha mukwikala amabwambu zhami.

44015015 Hinukuyitena nawa cheng'i nami muyanjung'uku; mulong'a njung'u helukang'a mwelang'ayi nkaka yinjuku. Ilang'a nayiteni jehi nami muji amabwambu, mulong'a nayilezhi jehi yuma yezhima yinatiyili kuji Tata yami.

44015016 Hiyenu mwantonjeli amuku, ami yami nayitonjelenu, nayikunzhiki kumujimu wakuya nakusong'a nyikabu, ninyikabu yenu yakashakami yayiwenyi, kulonja ayinki chonsu chimukulomba Tata mwizhina jami.
44015017 Nukuyilezha mwenimu kulonja mukeng'ang'ani.
44015018 Neyi akuyihela kuji antu ampata yamunu mwishina, ilukenu nenu asambila jehi kunhelami, enu achiji kanja ayiheli.

44015019 Neyi enu mwajing'i ampata yamunu mwishina, akwampata yamunu mwishina aji kukeng'a antu awu. Enu himuji ampata yamunu mwishinaku, ilang'a ami nayitonjeli mukachi kawantu ampata yamunu mwishina; jihu hanafumi kuyihela kuji antu ampata yamunu mwishina.
44015020 Anukenu mazu inayilezha nami, Njung'u habajikang'a nkaka yinjuku. Chanankabishuwu ami, ninenu nawa akayikabisha. Neyi ahembeli mazu ami, akahemba mazu enu nawa.
44015021 Ilang'a yuma yezhimiyi akayilila hansang'u yezhina jami, mulong'a anabuli kwiluka yena wantemesheli.
44015022 Neyi nabulili kwinza nakuhosha nawu, hiyaji kwikala nanshijuku. Hakwilichi hiyakweti mwakuleyela nanshiji yawuku.
44015023 Muntu wukunhelami, naheli niTata yami nawa.
44015024 Neyi nabulili kwila mukachi kawu nyijimu yabulili kukong'ahu jehi muntu wacheng'i, hiyaji kwikala nanshijuku. Hakwilichi anayimoni nikunhelami niTata yami nawa.
44015025 Chumichi chinalonji kulumbulula mazu asonekeluwu munshimbi yawu eliluwu nawu, Ananheli chakaji mulong'a.
44015026 Ilang'a chakenzayi Nkwashi nákayitemeshela wakuji Tata, yowu Spilitu wawalala, wakufuma kuji Tata, jiyi wakela chinsahu chami.
44015027 Ninenu nawa mwakela ayinsahu nanichi chimunekali nanami kufumisha kutachi.
44016001 Chinayilezhi yumiyi nalonji akabuli kuyijimbwisha.
44016002 Akayihang'a mumashikola; eng'a, mpinzhi yakenza yakela muntu wákayizhaha, wakatong'ozhoka ninji wuji nakukalakela Nzambi mujimu.
44016003 Akela yumiyi nanochu chabula kwilukawu Tata hela ami.
44016004 Nayilezhi yumiyi kulonja neyi mpinzhi yawu yinenzi mwakaanukang'a nenu nayilezhelumu jehi. Hatachi hinayilezhelang'a yumiyuku, mulong'a najing'i nenu.
44016005 Katataka hinukuya kuji yena wantemesheli. Kwosi mwinenu wumu wukung'ihula ninji, Wukuya kujihuku?
44016006 Chinayilezhi mazu awa, munyichima yenu muji kwakuneng'a hohu.
44016007 Hela chochu, nukuyilezha mwalala nami, chinukufumahu chikuyiwahilenu; neyi nukubula kufumahu, Nkwashi hakwinza kujenuku; ilang'a neyi nukuya, nakamutemesha enzi kujenu.
44016008 Niyena chakenzayi, wakakonkolola antu ampata yamunu mwishina nansang'u yanshiji, nansang'u yakulong'a, ninansang'u yakusompesha.
44016009 Wakayikonkolola hansang'u yanshiji nanichi chabulang'awu kunkuhwelela;
44016010 hansang'u yakulong'a nanichi chinukuya kuji Tata, himwakanmona cheng'uku;
44016011 hansang'u yakusompesha nanichi chaneliyi mwanta wampata yamunu mwishina anamusompeshi jehi.
44016012 Nichiji nayuma yayivulu yakuyilezha, ilang'a katataka himukuyitweshaku.
44016013 Ilang'a chakenzayi Spilitu wawalala, wakayilombola muwalala wezhima. Hakahoshang'a yakumuchima winji yomwenuku, wakahoshang'a mwatiyang'ayi mwezhima, wakashimunang'ahu jehi yuma yakenza.
44016014 Yena wakanlemeshami, wakatambula yuma yamami, wakayishimwinamu enu.
44016015 Yuma yaTata yezhima yamami; jichi chineli nami wakatambula yuma yamami, wakayishimwinamu enu.
44016016 Mukuhita kampinzhi kanti himukunmonaku; mwakahita kampinzhi kakwawu kanti mwakanmona chalumbuluka.

44016017 jichi atumbanzhi twinji amu hiyakujihula nawu, Chanatulezhiyi ninji, Mukuhita kampinzhi kanti himukunmonaku, mwakahita kampinzhi kakwawu kanti mwakanmona chalumbuluka; cheng'i ninji, Mulong'a nukuya kuji Tata; chaya mujihi?
44016018 jichi hiyakujihula nawu, Chanatulezhiyi ninji, Mukuhita kampinzhi kanti; chaya mujihi? Etu hituneluki mwanatulezhiyuku.

44016019 Yesu neluki jehi chakukeng'a kumwihulawu; hakuyila ninji, Muji nakujihuzhola nsang'u yamazu inahoshi nami mukuhita kampinzhi kanti himukunmonaku, mwakahita kampinzhi kakwawu kanti mwakanmona chalumbuluka; tahinji?
44016020 Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, mukujila, mukululuta, hakwila antu ampata yamunu mwishina akuzang'alala. Enu mukuneng'a, ilang'a kuneng'a kwenu kwakabalumuka muzang'alu.

44016021 Mumbanja waneng'ang'a hafunyishang'ayi, mulong'a mpinzhi yinji yinamuwani jehi; hakwila neyi navwali jehi mwaninji, hakwanuka nawa cheng'i ihung'uku, namuzang'alu wamuntu navwaliki mumpata yamunu mwishina.
44016022 jichi enu muji nakuneng'a katataka, ilang'a nakayimona cheng'i, mwakazang'alala munyichima yenu, nimuzang'alu wenu kwosi wakayitambulawuku.
44016023 jena ifuku oju himwakang'ihula cheng'i chumaku. Chalala chalala, nukuyilezha nami, neyi haji chuma chimwakamulomba Tata, wakayinkachu mwizhina jami.
44016024 Kanja mulombang'ahu jehi chuma mwizhina jamuku. Lombenu mutambuli, kulonja muzang'alu wenu wuwanini.
44016025 Nahoshi nenu mwenimu nayishimu, ilang'a mpinzhi yakenza hinakahosha nenu nayishimuku, nakayilezha zhaTata chalumbuluka
44016026 jena ifuku oju mwakalomba mwizhina jami; hinukuyila nami yami nakayilombela kuji Tataku,
44016027 mulong'a yomweni Tata wayikeng'a nanichi chimunankeng'ami, nanichi chimunakuhweleli nenu ami nafumini kuji Tata.
44016028 Nafumini kuji Tata, nenzi mumpata yamunu mwishina; cheng'i nawa nukufuma mumpata yamunu mwishina, nukuya kuji Tata.
44016029 Atumbanzhi twinji hiyakwila nawu, Ichi jinu hiwukuhosha chalumbuluka, hiwuji nakuhosha nayishimuku.
44016030 Ichi jinu tuneluki jehi netu eyi weluka yuma yezhima, hichikweti kukwihula chuma kuji muntuku. jichi tunakuhweleli netu wafumini kuji Nzambi.
44016031 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Ichi jinu munakuhweleli, tahinji?
44016032 Talenu, mpinzhi yikwinza, eng'a yinenzi jehi, yakuyipalang'eshawu wezhima wenu, muntu nakwinji, muntu nakwinji, mukunshiya kankawami; ilang'a hiniji kankawamuku, niji naTata.
44016033 Chinahoshi nenu mwenimu, nalonji nami mumoni kuwunja mujami. Mukumona lukaji mumpata yamunu mwishina, ilang'a tiyenu kuwaha, ami nemiki mpata yamunu mwishina mushinju.
44017001 Yesu chanahoshiyi mwenimu, hakufumbula mesu kwiwulu, hakwila ninji, Tata, mpinzhi yinashiki jehi. Lemeshaku Mwaneyi, kulonja Mwana akulemesheyi.
44017002 Chiwunamwinki wanta haji antu ezhima, kulonja ana ezhima wunamwinki ayinki wumi wahayanyaka.
44017003 Wumi wahayanyaka woweniwu, wakukwiluka eyi Nzambi walala wumu hohu, niYesu Klistu wátemesheli.
44017004 Ami nakulemeshi hamaseki, namanishi jehi mujimu wanyinkeli kwila.
44017005 Ichi jinu, eyi Tata, anlemesheli kumu naneyi aweni nalubanzhi lwakulema lunajing'i nalu hajing'i mpata yamunu mwishina yichiji kanja.
44017006 Namwekeshi izhina jeyi kuji antu wanyinkeli mukachi kawakwampata yamunu mwishina; ajing'i eyeyi, yeyi wanyinkeluwu, niwena anahembi izu jeyi.
44017007 Ichi jinu aneluki jehi nawu yuma yezhima yiwunanyinki yinafumi kujeyi;
44017008 mulong'a mazu wanyinkeli ami nayinki wena; niwena anayitambuli; aneluki chalala nawu ami nafumini kujeyi, anakuhweleli nawu yeyi wantemesheli.
44017009 Ami nukuyilombelela wena; hinukulombelela akwampata yamunu mwishinaku, ching'a wowu antu wunanyinki, mulong'a wena hiyantu eyi.
44017010 Yuma yamami yezhima yeyeyi, niyeyi jiyi yamami; ninami hinukulemena muji wena.

44017011 Hinukwikala nawa cheng'i mumpata yamunu mwishinaku, ilang'a awa aji mumpata yamunu mwishina; ami hinukwinza kujeyi. Eyi Tata Wazhila, yihembi mwizhina jeyi awa wunanyinki, kulonja ekali wumu neyi chitwekaletu.
44017012 Chinajing'i nawu, nayihembeli awa wunanyinki mwizhina jeyi. Nayihembi; kwosi niwumu nakisikuku, ching'a yowu mukwakunong'a, kulonja mukanja wazhila wulumbuluki.
44017013 Ichi jinu hinukwinza kujeyi. Hinukuhosha mwenimu hinichiji mumpata yamunu mwishina, kulonja muzang'alu wami wuwanini muji wena.
44017014 Ami nayinki izu jeyi; akwampata yamunu mwishina anayiheli nanichi chanabuluwu kwikala ampata yamunu mwishina, neyi chineli ami nawa hiniji wampata yamunu mwishinaku.
44017015 Hinalombi nami wuyifumishi mumpata yamunu mwishinaku, ilang'a nami wuyihembi kuji wátama.
44017016 Wena hiyaji nawa ampata yamunu mwishinaku, neyi chineli ninami hiniji wampata yamunu mwishinaku.
44017017 Yizhiliki nawalala. Izu jeyi jiwu walala.
44017018 Chiwantemeshelami mumpata yamunu mwishina, jichi chinayitemeshi niwena mumpata yamunu mwishina.
44017019 Ami hinukujizhilikila wena, kulonja awenawu akekali azhila nawalala.
44017020 Hinukukumina jakuyilombelela wena hohuku; ilang'a nukulombelela niwena akunkuhwelela namazu awu;
44017021 kulonja wezhima wawu akekali wumu, neyi chiwekala eyi Tata mujami ninami mujeyi; kulonja niwena akekali mujetu, kulonja akwampata yamunu mwishina akakuhweleli nawu yeyi wantemesheli.
44017022 Nilubanji lwakulema luwunanyinki nayinki wena, kulonja akekali wumu neyi chitwekaletu wumu.

44017023 Ami muji wena nineyi mujami, kulonja chakwikalawu wumu hohu eli alala chikupu, kulonja akwampata yamunu mwishina akeluki nawu yeyi wantemesheli, akeluki nawu wayikeng'eli neyi chiwankeng'elami.

44017024 Tata, nakeng'i nami antu wunanyinki akekali chimu nanami kunakekalami, kulonja akabanzhilang'a lubanzhi lwakulema kwami luwunanyinki, nanochu chiwankeng'eli helili chikuku champata yamunu mwishina chichiji kanja.
44017025 Eyi Tata walong'a, antu ampata yamunu mwishina hiyakwilukiluku, ilang'a ami nakwilukili; ninawa aneluki nawu yeyi wantemesheli.
44017026 Nayilumbulwili izhina jeyi kulonja ajiluki, nakayilumbulwilang'aju nawa kulonja akajiluki; kulonja kukeng'a kuwankeng'eli nachu kwakekali muji wena ninami nakekali muji wena.
44018001 Chanahoshiyi mazu awa, Yesu hakwijika nawatumbanzhi twinji, hakuya kwishinaji jakalong'a Kijiloni kwájing'i itempa, hakwing'ilamu yomweni nawatumbanzhi twinji.
44018002 Ilang'a iwu Yujasi wámufukezheli, welukili kwenoku, mulong'a Yesu wayilang'aku kakavulu nawatumbanzhi twinji.
44018003 Yujasi chanatambuliyi chenju chamashijika nianhembi kuji akulumpi zhawatuplistu nikuji aFwalisewu, hakuya kwenoku namanong'u niyimunyi niyitwa.
44018004 jichi Yesu weluka jehi yuma yezhima yikukeng'a kumushikena, hakuyikinkilila. Hakuyihula ninji, Mukukeng'anyi?
44018005 Hiyakumwakula nawu, Yesu wakuNazaleta. Yesu hakuyila ninji, Ami Yami. NiYujasi wámufukezheli, nemani chimu nawu.
44018006 Ochu chayililiyi ninji, Ami Yami; hiyakufunta mankinkanyima, ajimbuka niheseki.
44018007 Hakuyihula cheng'i ninji, Mukukeng'anyi? Nawu, Yesu wakuNazaleta.
44018008 Yesu hakuyakula ninji, Nayilezhi jehi nami, Ami Yami; jichi neyi yami muji nakukeng'a, yilekenu awa ajiyili kwawu;
44018009 kulonja izu jahoshayi jehi jilumbuluki, jeliliyi ninji, Awa wanyinkeli hinazhimbeshuhu hela wumuku.
44018010 jichi Shimona Petulu wajing'i nampoku yakabali, hakuyihola hakutapa njung'u yakaplistu muneni, kutapa kwakumuketula itu jinji jachijiilu. Izhina janowu njung'u Malikusa.
44018011 jichi Yesu hakumwila Petulu ninji, Somekaku mpoku yeyi muchinjalu chayu; lupasa lwananyinkiyi Tata nibuli kulwinwa?
44018012 Ochu chenju, nimukulumpi wawanhembi, nianhembi awaYujeya, hiyakumukwata Yesu, hiyakumukasa.
44018013 Asambilili kumutwala kuji Anasi, mulong'a jiyi mukuwaKayafwasi wajing'i kaplistu muneni hamwakowu.
44018014 Yena Kayafwasi jiyi walezheli aYujeya maana akwila ninji, Chinawahi muntu wumu afwili awa antu.
44018015 Shimona Petulu hakumulonjela Yesu, nikambanzhi mukwawu nawa. Owu kambanzhi mukwawu amwiluka jehi kuji kaplistu muneni, hakwing'ila naYesu muchipang'u chakaplistu muneni.
44018016 Ilang'a Petulu hakwimana hanzi kuchisu. Owu kambanzhi mukwawu elukawu kuji kaplistu muneni, hakwijika, hakuhosha namumbanja wahembelang'a kuchisu, hakumwing'izha Petulu.
44018017 jichi chang'ajima chamumbanja wahembelang'a kuchisu, hakumwihula Petulu ninji, Nineyi nawa wukambanzhi kaniwu muntu, tahinji? Yena hakwila ninji, Nehi, hiyamuku.
44018018 Henohu anjung'u nawanhembi ajing'i nakwimana kwenoku, abutula jehi kesi kamakala. Ajing'i nakwota kesi namashika ajing'uku, niPetulu nawa hakwimana nawu nakwota kesi.
44018019 jichi kaplistu muneni hakumwihuzhola Yesu nsang'u yawatumbanzhi twinji, nintang'ishilu yinji.
44018020 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Ami nahosheli hatooka kumesu awantu ezhima. Natang'ishilang'a mafuku ezhima mumashikola nimuTembeli mwapompelang'a aYujeya ezhima. Hinahoshuhu jehi chuma hambajuku.
44018021 Wukung'ihuzholelaji? Yihuli antu ajing'i nakuntiya chinahoshelang'a. Wena eluka chinahosheli.
44018022 Chanahoshiyi mwenimu, nhembi wemenuku hakumweta Yesu mbang'ala, ninji, Kaplistu muneni wumwakuli chenochu?
44018023 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Neyi nahoshi chatama, shimunaku chinatamishi, ilang'a neyi chachiwahi wunang'eteliji?
44018024 Anasi hakumutemesha kuji kaplistu muneni Kayafwasi chochamukasawu.
44018025 Henohu Shimona Petulu sang'a emenayi nakwota kesi. jichi hiyakumwihula nawu, Nineyi nawa wukambanzhi kinji? Yena hakujikala ninji, Nehi, hiyamuku.
44018026 Kuchinka kambanzhi wumu wakaplistu muneni, ntang'a yanowu muntu aketulawu itu kuji Petulu, ninji, Ami hinakumona chimu ninji mwitempaku?
44018027 jichi Petulu hakujikala cheng'i; ikombu etiyila nihohenohu.

44018028 jichi hiyakumufumisha Yesu kuji Kayafwasi kwajing'iyi, hiyakumwing'izha mwitala jakusompela. Henohu kunachi jehi. Ilang'a awenawu kwing'ila mwitala jakusompela nehi, akenja kajizhilola, kulonja atweshi kujya Chipanjakenu.
44018029 jichi Pilatu hakwijika hanzi haji wena ninji, Iwu muntu munamuholokeli namulong'anyi?
44018030 Hiyakumwakula nawu, Neyi yeniwu muntu hajing'i mukwakutamishaku, twaji kumuleta kujeyi?
44018031 Pilatu hakuyila ninji, Mutambulenu mumusompeshi enu aweni mwaya nshimbi yenu. AYujeya hiyakumwila nawu, Etu kuzhaha muntu chinzhila;
44018032 kulonja mazu ahosheliyi Yesu, ashimwiniyi mwakafwilayi alumbuluki.
44018033 jichi Pilatu hakufunta cheng'i mwitala jakusompela, hakumutambika Yesu, hakumwila ninji, Eyi komana wuMwanta wawaYujeya?
44018034 Yesu hakwakula ninji, Wunahoshi mwenimu eyi aweni, tahinji anakulezhumu kuji antu acheng'i?
44018035 Pilatu hakwakula ninji, Ami nikaYujeya, tahinji? Munza weyeyi aweni niakulumpi zhawatuplistu, jiwu anakuleti kujami. Wuneliji?

44018036 Yesu hakwakula ninji, Wanta wami hiwampata yamunu mwishinaku; neyi wanta wami wajing'i wampata yamunu mwishina, ambung'ami aji kulwa, kulonja abuli kunlubula kuji aYujeya; wanta wami hiwamunuku.

44018037 jichi Pilatu hakumwila ninji, Eyi komana wumwanta? Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Wunahoshi eyi aweni neyi nimwanta; jichi chinavwalikilili, jichi chinenzhilili mumpata yamunu mwishina, kulonja nakeli chinsahu chawalala. Akwawalala ezhima atiyang'a izu jami.
44018038 Pilatu hakumwihula ninji, Walala hichumanyi? Chanahoshiyi mwenimu hakwijika cheng'i haji aYujeya, hakuyila ninji, Ami kwami hinamumoni nachitelaku.
44018039 Ilang'a mukweti chaaku chakwila ching'a niyumbiluku muntu wumu haChipanjakenu. jichi munakeng'i niyumbiluku Mwanta wawaYujeya, tahinji?
44018040 jichi hiyakuvwakuka nakubijika cheng'i nang'ovu nawu, Bayi yeniwuku, ching'a Balaba. Yena Balaba wajing'i kaponju.
44019001 Pilatu hakumukwata Yesu, hakumuvupola nachikoti.
44019002 Mashijika hiyakuyinja chibaaba chanying'a, hiyakumuvwikachu kumutu, amuvwika niihina jawusombu.
44019003 Hiyakuya kuji yena, hiyakumwila nawu, Eyi Mwanta wawaYujeya, kalombu! Hiyakumweta namakasawu.
44019004 Pilatu hakwijika cheng'i, hakuyila ninji, Talenu, hinukuyiijishilayi kulonja mwiluki nenu ami hinamumoni nachitelaku.
44019005 jichi Yesu hakwijika navwali chibaaba chanying'a ninoju ihina jawusombu. Pilatu hakuyila ninji, Talenu iwu muntu!

44019006 jichi akulumpi zhawatuplistu nianhembi chanamumonuwu, hiyakubijika nawu, Mupopelenu hakulusu, mupopelenu! Pilatu hakuyila ninji, Mutambulenu enu aweni, mumupopeli hakulusu; ami kwami hinamumoni nachitelaku.
44019007 AYujeya hiyakumwakula nawu, Etu tukweti nshimbi, nshimbi oyu yelang'a nawu nateli kufwa, mulong'a wajiteneni ninji, niMwana kaNzambi.
44019008 jichi Pilatu chanatiyiyi mazu awa, yotiya niwoma waswezha.
44019009 Hakwing'ila mwitala jakusompela, hakumwihula Yesu ninji, Eyi wafuma kujihi? Yesu kumwakula nehi.
44019010 jichi Pilatu hakumwila ninji, Eyi kuhosha nanami nehi? Eyi kwiluka neyi ami nikweti wanta wakukuumbaku, nikweti niwanta wakukupopela hakulusu, nehi?
44019011 Yesu hakumwakula ninji, Neyi abula kukwinka wanta wakufuma mwiwulu, mutenowu wunakang'anyi kung'ila chuma. jichi iwu nanlubuli kujeyi jiyi wukweti mulong'a wakubajika.

44019012 Henohu Pilatu hakukeng'a ninji amuumbuku. Ilang'a aYujeya hiyakubijika nawu, Neyi wukumuumbaku yeniwu, hiwukwikala ibwambu jaKesaluku; muntu wajitenang'a ninji nimwanta, halemeshang'a Kesaluku.
44019013 jichi Pilatu chanatiyiyi mazu awa, hakumwijisha Yesu, hakushakama hetanja jakusompela kwatenang'awu nawu, Kuchisesa chamalola; muHebelu nawu, KuGabata.
44019014 jenoju jajing'i ifuku jakulong'eshela ifuku jalema jaChipanjakenu; hajing'i neyi kwizhi mpinzhi yamuchitanu nayimu (12:00 hls). Hakuyila aYujeya ninji, Talenu Mwanta wenu!

44019015 Wena hiyakubijika nawu, Waaji! Waaji! Mupopelenu hakulusu! Pilatu hakuyila ninji, Nipopeli Mwanta wenu hakulusu? Akulumpi zhawatuplistu hiyakumwakula nawu, Mwanta wetu Kesali hohu; hitukweti mwanta wacheng'uku.
44019016 jichi hakuyinkayu wena kulonja amupopeli hakulusu.
44019017 jichi hiyakumukwata Yesu, hiyakumutwala. Yena hakwijika, iku najisenjeli kulusu yinji, hakuya kwatenang'awu nawu, Kuchang'u; muHebelu nawu, KuGologota.
44019018 Hiyakumupopela hakulusu kwenoku, hamu nawamakwawu ayeji, wumu hambaji, wumu hambaji, Yesu mukachi.
44019019 Pilatu hakusoneka ninsang'u nawa, hakuyisha hakulusu. Asonekeluhu nawu, YESU WAKUNAZAlETA, MWANTA WAWAYUjEYA.

44019020 jichi nsang'u iyi ayitang'ili kuji aYujeya amavulu; mulong'a oku kwamupopeleluwu Yesu hakulusu kwajing'i kwakwihi nang'anja; ayisonekeli mwijimi jaHebelu, nimwijimi jaLatini, nimwijimi jaGliki.
44019021 jichi akulumpi zhawatuplistu niaYujeya hiyakumwila Pilatu nawu, Bayi wusoneka neyi, Mwanta wawaYujeyaku; ching'a neyi, Yena wajiteneni ninji, Ami niMwanta wawaYujeya.
44019022 Pilatu hakwakula ninji, Mwomu munasoneki mwomu.

44019023 Mashijika chanamupopeluwu Yesu hakulusu, hiyakunona yuma yinji yakuvwala, hiyakwambula muwana, mashijika ezhima hiyakuwanina iwu nachibalu chinji, iwu nachibalu chinji. Ilang'a mupila winji wajing'i wakutung'a kufumisha kwiwulu, wezhima wakaji muchiminu.

44019024 jichi hiyakujila wumu namukwawu nawu, Bayi tuwutabulaku, tujitonjeli nachinzhikizhilu chakusakula nachu, tumoni muntu wukuwutambula; kulonja nyikanja yazhila yilumbuluki, yasonekeluwu nawu, Yuma yami yakuvwala anajanzhang'eni mukachi kawu, Mupila wami hiyakusakula nachinzhikizhilu chakusakula nachu. jihu hafumini mashijika kwila yumiyi.
44019025 Kwakwihi nakulusu yaYesu kwemeni mama yinji namanakwamama yinji wamumbanja, Maliya ing'ojaKilopasi naMaliya Manjaleni.
44019026 jichi Yesu chanamoniyi mama yinji nikambanzhi kinji ákeng'eliyi anemani hamu kwakwihi, hakumwila mama yinji ninji, Eyi mumbanja, talaku mwaneyi owu.
44019027 Hakumwila owu kambanzhi kinji ninji, Talaku mama yeyi owu. Kufumisha kumpinzhi oyu, owu kambanzhi hakumutwala kwiinji.
44019028 Kulonjela henohu, Yesu chanelukiyi ninji yuma yezhima yinamani jehi, hakwila ninji, Natiyi mpwila; kulonja nyikanja yazhila yilumbuluki.
44019029 Kwenoku kwajing'i nsaba yakutenteka, yenzala navinyu yabatuka; hiyakunona sponzhi yenzala navinyoyu yabatuka, hiyakuyisha kwiteti hiyakumushayi kukanwa.
44019030 jichi Yesu chanatambuliyi oyu vinyu yabatuka, hakwila ninji, Chinamani. Yonong'eka nimutu winji, yotula niwumi winji.

44019031 Chijajing'i ifuku jakulong'esha Chipanjakenu, aYujeya hiyakeng'eli nyizhimba yishali hamakulusu haSabatoyuku, mulong'a yenoyu Sabata yajing'i yalema, hiyakumulomba Pilatu nawu ayitezhi kukotola nyenju yawu, ayifumishuku.
44019032 jichi mashijika hiyakwinza, hiyakukotola nyenju yanowu wakusambila, niyamukwawu apopeleluwu hamakulusu hamu ninji.
44019033 Ilang'a chanashikuwu haji Yesu, kumumona nafwi jehi, hiyamukotweli nyenjuku;
44019034 ilang'a ishijika wumu hakumupwika iyong'a kukabavu, henohu hikukwijika nimashi nimenzhi.
44019035 Owu wamweni yumiyi nekali chinsahu, niwunsahu winji walala, yena neluki ninji nahoshi mwalala, kulonja ninenu nawa mukuhweleli.
44019036 Yumiyi ayilili kulonja nyikanja yazhila yilumbuluki, yeliluwu nawu, Hiyakakotola hoku ifwaha jinji nijimuku.
44019037 Nicheng'i mukanja wazhila wukwawu nawu, Akatala haji yena alokweluwu.

44019038 Kulonjela hayumiyi Yosefu wakuAlamateya, wajing'i kambanzhi kaYesu, ilang'a chakuzhinja nawoma wawaYujeya, hakumulomba Pilatu amwitezhi kufumisha muzhimba waYesu. Pilatu hakumwitezha. jichi hakwinza, hakufumisha muzhimba winji.
44019039 Hikukwinza nawa niNikojemu, owu wenzhili hatachi kuji Yesu nawufuku. Hakuleta yihemba yakubomba nimola nialowe, chesekelu chayu chashika mu 34 kg.
44019040 Hiyakunona muzhimba waYesu, hiyakuwuzhing'azhing'a mumahina atooka hamu nanyitonju yamavumba amawahi, mwomuchaaku chazhiikang'awu nachu aYujeya.
44019041 Oku kwamupopeleluwu hakulusu kwajing'i itempa; omu mwitempa mwajing'i izhamu jajiha jakupokola mwilola kanja akamikang'amu jehi muntuku.
44019042 Ochu chajing'i izhamu kwakwihi, hiyakumukamikamu, mulong'a jajing'i Ifuku jaKulong'esha jawaYujeya
44020001 Hamulungu, jojifuku jatachi, Maliya Manjaleni hakuya kwizhamu habujiji kuchiji mwijima, hakumona ilola anajifumishi jehi kwizhamu.
44020002 Hakuya lufuchi kuji Shimona Petulu nikuji owu kambanzhi mukwawu akeng'eluwu kuji Yesu; hakuyila ninji, Anafumishi jehi Mwanta mwizhamu, etu kwiluka kwanamukamikuwu nehi.
44020003 jichi Shimona Petulu hakwijika nayenowu kambanzhi mukwawu, hiyakuya kwizhamu.
44020004 Hiyakuyila hamu lufuchi; kambanzhi mukwawu hakumushiyamu Petulu, hakusambilang'ahu jehi kushika kwizhamu.
44020005 Hakubanjama, hakutalamu, hakumona kwamahina atooka aji heseki awa, ilang'a yena kwing'ilamu nehi.
44020006 Shimona Petulu wajing'i nakumulonjela, ashika nikushika, eng'ila nimwizhamu. Hakumona nakushinshika kwamahina atooka aji heseki awa,
44020007 niihina jajing'i kumutu winji hijiji hamu nanowu mahina atookaku, ilang'a jakuvung'a hakankawaju.
44020008 jichi owu kambanzhi mukwawu, wásambilili kushika kwizhamu, hakwing'ilamu niyena, hakumona chalumbuluka, hakukuhwelela.
44020009 Mulong'a henohu ajing'i kanja eluki mukanja wazhila welili nawu ching'a asang'uka muji afu.
44020010 Atumbanzhi hiyakufunta cheng'i kwaawu.
44020011 Hakwila Maliya chochemanayi hanzi yezhamu nakujila. Chajing'i nakujilayi hakubanjama, hakutala mwizhamu,
44020012 hakumona ang'elu ayeji anavwali yitooka, anashakami wumu kunyitu mukwawu kunyenju, kwakamini muzhimba waYesu.
44020013 Hiyakumwihula nawu, Eyi mumbanja wuji nakujilaji? Hakuyila ninji, Mulong'a anatwali jehi Mwanta wami, ami kwiluka kwanamukamikuwu nehi.
44020014 Chanahoshiyi ochu, hakutala munyima, hakumona Yesu nemani, kwiluka ninji jiyi Yesu nehi.

44020015 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Eyi mumbanja wuji nakujilaji? Wuji nakukeng'anyi? Yena hakutong'ozhoka ninji kwizhi hinjimi yetempoju. Hakumwila ninji, Eyi mwanta, neyi yeyi wunamusenji, nlezhi kuwunamukamiki, nimufumishuku
44020016 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Maliya. Yena hakubalumuka, hakumwila muHebelu ninji, laboni; jaya mukwila nawu, Nkulung'ang'a.

44020017 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Bayi wunkakelaku, mulong'a nichiji kanja nikanjami kuji Tata. Yang'a kuji anakwami, wuyilezhi neyi hinukukanjama kuji Tata yami ninenu Tata yenu, kuji Nzambi yami ninenu Nzambi yenu.
44020018 Maliya Manjaleni hakwinza kuji atumbanzhi, hakuyilezha ninji, Namumoni Mwanta. Hakuyilezha nawa nimwanamulezhiyi.

44020019 Hamulungu, jojifuku jojimu jatachi, chikuneli melela, anapati jehi yenzelu yamwajing'i atumbanzhi mulong'a atiyili aYujeya woma, Yesu hakwinza hakwimana mukachi; hakuyila ninji, Kuwunja kwikali nanenu.
44020020 Chanahoshiyi ochu hakuyilezha makasinji nikabavu kinji. jichi atumbanzhi chanamumonuwu Mwanta, atiya nikuwaha.
44020021 Yesu hakuyila cheng'i ninji, Kuwunja kwikali nanenu; chantemesheluwu kuji Tata, ninami nawa hinukuyitemeshenu.
44020022 Chanahoshiyi ochu hakuyonena, hakuyila ninji, Tambulenu Spilitu Wazhila.
44020023 Antu mukwanakena nshiji zhawu, anayanakenizhu; antu mukulekela nshiji zhawu, anayilekelizhu.
44020024 Ilang'a Tomasi wahekumi nayeji (12), átenang'awu nawu Mpamba, chenzhiliyi Yesu hajing'i nawuku.

44020025 jichi akwawu atumbanzhi hiyakumwila nawu, Tunamumoni Mwanta. Ilang'a yena hakuyila ninji, Ching'a nimona yitu yambwambu mumakasinji, niing'izha nimunu wami muyitu yambwambu, nisha nichikasa chami mukabavu kinji; mukunkulwayi hinukukuhwelelaku.

44020026 Chimunahiti mafuku atanu nasatu, atumbanzhi twinji ajing'i cheng'i mwitala, Tomasi wajing'i hamu nawu niyena. Yesu hakwinza, kuyenzelu sang'a apatilaku; hakwimana mukachi, hakuyila ninji, Kuwunja kwikali nanenu.
44020027 Hakumwila Tomasi ninji, Letaku munu weyi kunu, wushinshiki makasami; ololaku chikasa cheyi, wing'izhi mukabavu kami. Bayi wikala nantajuku, kuhwelelaku.
44020028 Tomasi hakumwakula ninji, Mwanta wami! Nzambi yami!
44020029 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Wunakuhweleli nanichi chiwunanmoni. Ánakuhweleli chakaji kumona anakooleki.
44020030 Yesu welili yinzhikizhilu yikwawu yayivulu kumesu awatumbanzhi twinji, hiyanayisoneki mumukanja iwuku.
44020031 Ilang'a yeniyi anayisoneki kulonja mukuhweleli nenu Yesu jiyi Klistu, Mwana kaNzambi, kulonja chimukukuhwelela mumoni wumi mwizhina jinji.
44021001 Kulonjela hayumiyi, Yesu hakujimwekesha cheng'i kuji atumbanzhi kwizhiya jaTibelasi. Tiyenu mwajimwekesheleliyi.
44021002 Ajing'i hamu niShimona Petulu, niTomasi atenang'awu nawu Mpamba, niNataneli wakuKana wamung'aliliya, nianyana kaZebejewu, niatumbanzhi twinji amakwawu ayeji.
44021003 Shimona Petulu hakuyila ninji, Nukuya nakuta anshi. Hiyakumwila nawu, Ninetu tukuya neyi. Hiyakuya hiyakwing'ila muwatu; wena wufuku owu kukwata hela nikanti nehi.
44021004 Hankunku yakucha, Yesu hakwimana hachikumu, ilang'a atumbanzhi kwiluka nawu jiyi Yesu nehi.
44021005 jichi Yesu hakuyihula ninji, Anyikenu, mukweti inshi? Hiyakumwakula nawu, Nehi.
44021006 Yena hakuyila ninji, Lalumwinenu kaleng'i kumbavu yawatu yakuchijiilu, mukuzhiwana. jichi hiyakulalumuna. Akang'anya nikuwukoka nawanshi kuvula.

44021007 jichi kambanzhi owu akeng'eluwu kuji Yesu hakumwila Petulu ninji, jiyi Mwanta. Shimona Petulu chanatiyiyi nawu jiyi Mwanta, hakujikumbakesha chikowelu chinji, mulong'a wajing'i nzekesi, hakujumbila mwizhiya.
44021008 Ilang'a atumbanzhi amakwawu hiyakwinza mukawatu kanyanya nakukoka kaleng'i kanshi; mulong'a hiyajing'i kwakulehi nachikumuku, ajing'i neyi kwizhi nkulakazhi (100) yayintampu yanyenju.
44021009 Chanakanjukuwu kumpata, hiyakumona kwenoku kesi kamakala, anashuhu inshi, nimankenji.
44021010 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Letenuhu anshi imunakwati.

44021011 jichi Shimona Petulu hakuyaku, hakukokela kaleng'i hachikumu, kato-o nanshi zhamaneni, nkulakazhi namakumi atanu nanshi zhisatu (153); hela zhajing'i zhazhivulu chochochu, kaleng'i kutabuka nehi.
44021012 Yesu hakuyila ninji, Inzenu mujawuli. Atumbanzhi ezhima ajing'i nawoma wakumwihula nawu, Yeyinyi? mulong'a elukili nawu jiyi Mwanta.
44021013 Yesu hakwinza, hakunona mankenji, hakuyinka ninshi kumu.
44021014 jiju ipampa jamuchisatu jajimwekesheliyi Yesu kuji atumbanzhi, kufumisha hasang'ukiliyi muji afu.

44021015 Chanajawuluwu, Yesu hakumwihula Shimona Petulu ninji, Eyi Shimona mwana kaYowanu, wankeng'a chakubajikawa? Yena hakumwakula ninji, Eng'a Mwanta, eyi weluka chinakukunja. Yena hakumwila ninji, jiishang'a twanami twanyikoku.
44021016 Hakumwihula cheng'i kamuchiyeji ninji, Eyi Shimona mwana kaYowanu, wankeng'a? Hakumwakula ninji, Eng'a Mwanta, eyi weluka chinakukunja. Hakumwila ninji, Bing'ang'a anyikoku zhami.

44021017 Hakumwihula kamuchisatu ninji, Eyi Shimona mwana kaYowanu, wankunja? Petulu hakutiya chikela chanamwihuliyi Mwanta ipampa jamuchisatu ninji, Wankunja? Hakumwila ninji, Mwanta, eyi weluka yuma yezhima, eyi weluka chinakukunja. Yesu hakumwila ninji, jiishang'a anyikoku zhami.

44021018 Chalala chalala, nukukulezha nami, chiwajing'i kansi wajivwikilang'a eyi aweni, wajing'i nakuya kwonsu kuwunakeng'i kwoku. Ilang'a chiwamba kekala kashinakazhi, wamba kolola makaseyi, amba kakuvwika kuji wacheng'i, amba kakutwala kuwakabula kukeng'a.
44021019 Chahosheliyi mwenomu, walonjeli kushimuna nachu kufwa kwamba kalemeshayi nachu Nzambi. Chanamanishiyi kuhosha mwenimu, hakumwila ninji, Nlonjelang'a.
44021020 Petulu hakushetumuka, hakumona kambanzhi ákeng'eluwu kuji Yesu, wuji nakulonjela; yowu wákunjameneni hebwambu jinji hajiiluwu chawizha, wéhwili ninji, Mwanta, wúkukufukezha hinyi?
44021021 jichi Petulu chanamumoniyi, hakumwihula Yesu ninji, Mwanta, inji yeniwu niyena wukwilaji?
44021022 Yesu hakumwila ninji, Neyi nakeng'i nami yena akashaluhu nichinakenza, hinsang'u yeyi? Eyi kumina jakunlonjelami.

44021023 jihu hafuma anakwawu kuhoshahosha nawu owu kambanzhi hamba kafwaku. Hakwila Yesu hamwilili ninji, Wakabula kufwaku; wamwilili ninji, Neyi nakeng'i nami yena akashaluhu nichinakenza, hinsang'u yeyi?
44021024 jiyi iwu kambanzhi nashimuni wunsahu wayumiyi, nasoneki yumiyi; etu tweluka netu mwanashimuniyi mwalala.
44021025 Kuji niyuma yayivulu yikwawu yeliliyi Yesu, yenoyu nayitong'ozhoki nami neyi ayisoneka yezhima, mpata yamunu mwishina hiyaji kumona hakutenteka nyikanja yaji kusonekawuku.
45001001 Eyi Tiyofwilu, mumukanja wakusambila nasonekeli nakulumbulula yuma yezhima yatachikiliyi Yesu kukong’a nikutang’isha,
45001002 kushika nikwifuku jamutambwiluwu mwiwulu, heliliyi muji Spilitu Wazhila nasambili jehi kulezha apostolu atonjeliyi.
45001003 Wajimwekesheli kuji wena wamumi nayinzhikizhilu yayivulu, helili nakabi jehi. Wamwekeni kuji wena mafuku makumi awana (40), nakulumbulula yuma yawanta waNzambi
45001004 Chanapompuwu ninji hamu, hakuyilezha ninji, Bayi mufuma kuYelusalemaku, ching’a muching’ilila kukana kwakaniniyi Tata, kumwatiyili kujami.
45001005 Chalala kwaamu, Yowanu wazhimikilang’a mumenzhi, hakwila enu akayizhimika muji Spilitu Wazhila hakaji kuhita mafuku amavulu.
45001006 Cheliluwu anapompi jehi hamu, hiyakwihula nawu, Eyi Mwanta, keng’a wufuntishi chiyuulu kuji Isalela mafuku anu, tahinji?
45001007 Yena hakuyila ninji, Nsang’u zhakwiluka mpinzhi, hela yilaaka, hizhenwenuku, zhambala zhayomweni Tata zhanatong’oliyi mwatwala muchima winji.
45001008 Ilang’a chakenzayi Spilitu Wazhila hajenu, mwakatambula ng’ovu, mwakekala ayinsahu zhami nimuYelusalema, nimwahita Yujeya mwezhima, nimuSamaliya, nikwakumina maseki.
45001009 Chanahoshiyi mwenimu, iku aji nakutala, hiyakumutwala mwiwulu, ivu jimutambula nizhimu, kumumona nawa cheng’i nehi.
45001010 Iku achiji kutala mwiwulu mwanayiyi swi-i, nawu akasumuki, hiyakumona amayala ayeji anemani chimu nawena, avwala mahina atooka.
45001011 Hiyakwila nawu, Enu amayala akuNG’aliliya, munemeniji nakutala mwiwulu? Iwu Yesu anatwaluwu mwiwulu, wakenza neyi chochenichi chimunamumoni nakuya mwiwulu.
45001012 Hiyakufunta kuYelusalema. Kufuma kumpiji yaOliveta nakushika kuYelusalema mwekala chintampu chakweseka mukwenja kwamuSabata (1 km).

45001013 Chanashikuwu, hiyakwing’ila nakukanjama munoju itala jahewulu mwajing’i nakushakamawu; aPetulu naYowanu, niYakoba naAnjeli, niFwilipu naTomasi, niBatolomewu naMatewu, niYakoba mwana kaAlafwewu naShimona kaZeloti, niYuja manakwaYakoba.
45001014 Wenawa ezhima namuchima wawu wumu, hiyakukakela mbe nakulombela, chimu nanowu ambanja, niMaliya mama yaYesu, nianakwinji.
45001015 Hawena mafuku owu Petulu hakwimana mukachi kawanakwinji mwapompela jehi izaza jawantu hamu, kafwampi neyi nkulakazhi namakumi ayeji (120),
45001016 hakwila ninji, Enu anakwetu, mazu amuMukanja Wazhila, ahosheli Spilitu Wazhila kukanwa kaJaviji akutena Yujasi, owu walombweli antu amukwatili Yesu, ching’a alumbuluki chikupu.
45001017 Mulong’a amuchinjilili hamu nanetu; watambwili mujimu winji wowumu nanetu.
45001018 Yena walanjili kampata namali atambwiliyi kukuluwa kwinji, hakuholokelamu chamutu heseki, hakubusika niivumu ntwe-e, ninyizhing’wa yinji yezhima sèku.
45001019 Achiluka nikuchiluka kuji akwaYelusalema ezhima, chakwila mwijimi jawu kampatoku hiyakujitena nawu, Akelejama, jaya mukwila nawu, Kampata kamashi.
45001020 Mulong’a anasoneki mumukanja waMasamu nawu, Mwashakamayi mubalumuki mwikali ihembi, Bayi mushakama mwoku muntuku; cheng’i nawa nawu, Mujimu winji awutambuli kuji wacheng’i.
45001021 Jichi haji awa amayala twenjelang’a nawu mafuku ezhima hajing’i nakuhitang’anayi Mwanta Yesu mukachi ketu,
45001022 kufumisha hachizhimikilu chaYowanu nakushika kwifuku jatutambwiluwu Yesu; haji wenawa hafumi wumu ekali chinsahu chimu nanetu chakusang’uka kwasang’ukiliyi muji afu.
45001023 Hiyakutena ayeji, iwu Yosefu izhina jinji Balasaba, átumbiluwu izhina jikwawu nawu Sakulong’a, niMatiyasi.
45001024 Hiyakulombela nawu, Eyi Mwanta, weluka nyichima yawantu ezhima; atulezhi awa antu ayeji wunatonjuhu wumwojihi?
45001025 Ahing’i mumujimu iwu nimuwupostolu mwasenukiliyi Yujasi kulonja ayi kwiinji kwatela kwikalayi.
45001026 Hiyakuyisakula nachinzhikizhilu chakusakula nachu; chinzhikizhilu hichikuya kuji Matiyasi; hiyakumuchinjila hamu nawapostolu ikumi nawumu (11).
45002001 Chelili ifuku jaPentekosta jinashiki jehi chikupu, wezhima wawu ajing’i hamu mwomumu.
45002002 Kukasumuka mwiwulu himukufuma lushinju luji neyi lwampepela yikukunka nang’ovu yaswezha nankashi, hilukwinzesha itala jezhima mwajing’i nakushakamawu.
45002003 Hikukuyimwekena nyizuzu yakesi yiji neyi majimi; yambukili nakushakama haji wena wezhima wawu, hamuntu hamuntu.
45002004 Wezhima wawu hiyakwinzala naSpilitu Wazhila, hiyakutachika kuhosha majimi acheng’i, mwomwayinkeleluwu kuji Spilitu kuhosha
45002005 Henohu kuYelusalema kunashakami aYujeya, amayala akweti kalemesha kakulemesha Nzambi, anafumafumi kwahita nyunza yamunu mwishina yezhima.
45002006 Chinatiyakani olu lushinju, izaza jawantu hijikupompa, hiyakukumina jakuhayama nikutiya woma, nanichi chajing’i nakuyitiyawu nakuhosha wezhima wawu, iwu mwijimi jinji, iwu mwijimi jinji.
45002007 Wezhima wawu hiyakukasumuka nikuhayama chikupu nawu, Talenu, awa akuhosha, wezhima wawu hiyaNG’aliliyaku?
45002008 Inji tuji nakutiya ng’ahi, wezhima wetu hamuntu hamuntu, iwu mwijimi jinji jachisemwa, iwu mwijimi jinji jachisemwa?
45002009 APalatiya nawaMejiya, niaElamiti nawantu ashakama muMesopotamiya, nimuYujeya, nimuKapajosiya, nimuPontu, nimuAsiya,
45002010 nimuFwilizhiya, nimuPamfwiliya, nimuEzhipitu, nikumutamba waLibiya kwakwihi naKileni; nawantu anafumi kuLoma, aYujeya nawánabalumuki kwikala aYujeya;
45002011 niaKeleta niaAlabiya; hitukuyitiya nakuhosha mumajimi etwetu aweni nakutena nyijimu yaNzambi yang’ovu.
45002012 Hiyakukasumuka wezhima wawu nikuzhinoka chikupu; hiyakujihula muntu namukwawu nawu, Ichi chaya mujihi?
45002013 Ilang’a amakwawu hiyakuseha nawu, Anasheti jehi vinyu yayiha.

45002014 Petulu hakwimana chimu nekumi nawumu (11), hakubijika nakuyilezha ninji, Enu akwetu aYujeya, ninenu ezhima mwashakama muYelusalema, leka niyilezhi chachiwahi mwiluki; ntiyililenu munukuyilezha.
45002015 Nami wenawa hiyanasheti neyi chimuji nakutong’ozhokaku; kutong’a ifuku jichiji mpinzhi yamuchisatu (09:00 hls) hohu.
45002016 Chuma chimunamoni, chochuma chateneni kaplofwetu Yoweli,

45002017 ninji, Nzambi ninji, Chakela hamafuku akukuminina, Nakechila yaSpilitu wami haji antu ezhima; Nianyanenu amayala nawambanja akaplofweta, Anyikwenzi enu akamona yimwenu, Mapalenu amayala akalota yilota
45002018 Mwamweni, nihaji anjung’u zhami amayala nawambanja nakechila Spilitu wami Hamafuku akalonjelamu, akaplofweta.
45002019 Nakamwekesha yuma yakuhayamisha mwiwulu haluzwizu, Niyinzhikizhilu hamaseki mwishina; Mashi nikesi nikufwinja wishi.
45002020 Itang’wa jakabalumuka mwijima, Nikakwezhi kakabalumuka neyi mashi, Hamba kakeng’a kwinza ifuku jaMWANTA jatiyakana jeneni.
45002021 Chakela, muntu wakatambika izhina jaMWANTA wakamwinewa.

45002022 Enu akwetu amayala aIsalela, tiyenu niyilezhi, nami Yesu wakuNazaleta, iyala alemesheluwu kuji Nzambi nanyijimu yang’ovu, niyihayamisha, niyinzhikizhilu yeliliyi Nzambi nayena mukachi kenu, neyi chimuneluki jehi enu aweni;
45002023 Nzambi wayinkeliyi mwaya mpúng’a yinji, chakwilukang’ahu jehi, ilang’a enu mwamupopeleli hakulusu namakasa awantu atama, nakumuzhaha.
45002024 Nzambi chanamusubuliyi mumakabi akufwa, hakumusang’ula; mulong’a kufwa hikwajing’i nang’ovu zhakumukakelaku.
45002025 Mulong’a anamuteni jehi kuji Javiji ninji, Namweni MWANTA kumesu ami mafuku ezhima; Wuji kuchikasa chami chachijiilu, kulonja zhibuli kunkuma.
45002026 Jichi muchima wami hiwukutiya kuwaha, Niijimi jami hijikutena nsang’u yakulung’a, Eng’a, muzhimba wami hiwukushakama nakuching’ezha.
45002027 Mulong’a hiwakanshiya mukalung’aku, Hela kumwitezha weyi wazhila kumona kutokaku.
45002028 Wakanlezha nzhila zhawumi; Hakushakama kumesu eyi wukunzang’alesha chacheni
45002029 Enu anakwami, leka niyilezhi nsang’u yankakulula Javiji, nami wafwili jehi, amuzhiikili jehi, izhamu jinji twekala naju nilelu.
45002030 Jichi chajing’iyi kaplofwetu, nichelukiliyi ninji Nzambi nasanyiki jehi nakukana, ninji kuji anyana akavwalayi wakashakamisha wumu hetanja jinji jawanta;
45002031 chumichi yena wachimwenang’ahu jehi, hakutena nsang’u yakusang’uka kwaKlistu kwamuji afu, ninji hiyamushiyili mukalung’aku, hela muzhimba winji hiwamweni kutokaku.
45002032 Yeniwu Yesu Nzambi wamusang’wili mukufwa, wezhima wetu tunachimoni namesu.
45002033 Jichi chanamutúmbakeshuwu jehi nakumusha kuchikasa chaNzambi chachijiilu, chanatambuliyi jehi kuji Tata Spilitu Wazhila akaniniyi, yena nechili yumiyi yimunamoni nikutiya.
45002034 Mulong’a Javiji hakanjamini mumawuluku; ilang’a yomweni nahoshi ninji, MWANTA wamwilili Mwanta wami,
45002035 ninji, Shakamaku kuchikasa chami chachijiilu Nichinakayilisha akwankunyi neyi itanja jakunyenju yeyi.
45002036 jichi enu akwamutang’a waIsalela ezhima, ilukenu kwenu chalala, iwu Yesu mwápopeleli hakulusu, Nzambi namubalumuni jehi kwikala niMwanta jiyi, niKlistu jiyi.
45002037 Chanatiyuwu mwenimu, atapika nimunyichima yawu. Hiyakuyila aPetulu nawapostolu amakwawu nawu, Enu anakwetu, tukwila ng’ahi?
45002038 Kuchinka Petulu ninji, Balumukenu munyichima yenu, ayizhimiki wezhima wenu mwizhina jaYesu Klistu, kulonja kuyanakena nshiji zhenu; mutambuli chamukunkulu chaSpilitu Wazhila.
45002039 Mulong’a jiyi ayikanawu jehi ninenu nianyanenu, niantu ezhima ekala kwakulehi, ezhima akatambikawu kuji MWANTA Nzambi yetu enzi kuji yena.
45002040 Hakuyishimwina nakuyishinzhila chikupu namazu amakwawu amavulu ninji, Pulukenu kuji antu achisakichi chaheng’a.
45002041 Jichi wena átambwili mazu inji namuzang’alu, hiyakuyizhimika; ifuku jenoju hiyakubombelaku antu kafwampi neyi makombakazhi asatu (3,000).
45002042 Hiyakukakela mbe muntang’ishilu yawapostolu, nimukukunjang’ana nimukuhumuna jinkenji, nimukulombela.
45002044 Antu ezhima atiya niwoma. Apostolu hiyakwila yihayamisha yayivulu niyinzhikizhilu.
45002043 Owu ezhima akuhweleli, hiyakujibomba hamu; niyuma yawu yiikala niyebomba.
45002045 Hiyakulanjisha mahetawu niyuma yawu, hiyakwanzhang’ena akwawu ezhima mwabulililuwu.
45002046 Hiyakukakela kupompa muTembeli hefuku hefuku, namuchima wawu wumu, nakuhumuna jinkenji mumatalawu, nakutiya kuwaha, nakujyang’ana.
45002047 Hiyakuhameka Nzambi namuchima wawuwahi. Hiyakuyimona kuwaha kuji antu ezhima. Mwanta hakubombelaku hefuku hefuku awa ajing’i nakwamwinewa.
45003001 Petulu naYowanu hiyakukanjuka nawu eng’ili muTembeli hampinzhi yakulombela, yoyamuchitanu nachiwana (15:00 hls).

45003002 Kwajing’i iyala wachifwayi chanyenju, wufwayi wakuvwalika nawu; ajing’i nakumutenteka hefuku hefuku kuchisu chaTembeli chatenang’awu nawu Lubanzhi, kulonja alombang’a tuyamukunkulu kuji antu ajing’i nakwing’ila muTembeli.
45003003 Yenowu chanamoniyi aPetulu naYowanu hiyakukeng’a kwing’ila muTembeli, hakuyilomba kachamukunkulu.
45003004 Petulu hakumushinshika swi-i, niYowanu hamu, ninji, Tutali.
45003005 Hakuyitala, ninji keng’a atambuli kachuma kuji wena.
45003006 Ilang’a Petulu ninji, Ami kwami hinikweti hela siliva hela wuluku; chuma chiniji nachu jichi nukukwinka. Nakwili mwizhina jaYesu Klistu wakuNazaleta, nami enjaku.
45003007 Hakumukwata kuchikasa chachijiilu, hakumunyamuna; hohenohu ninyenju yinji nimafwahinji akutupokosu akwata ning’ovu.
45003008 Hakunyamuka, hakwimana, hakutachika kwenja; hakwing’ila nawu muTembeli nakwenja nakukiluka nakuhameka Nzambi
45003009 Antu ezhima chanamumonuwu nakwenja nakuhameka Nzambi,
45003010 hiyakumwiluka nawu, jiyi wajing’i nakushakamina tuyamukunkulu kuchisu chaTembeli chaLubanzhi, hiyakukumina jakujihayamina nikuzhinoka nankashi hachuma chanamonuwu hajiwu muntu.
45003011 Chaneliyi wuchiji wakwata aPetulu naYowanu, antu ezhima hiyakupompa kuji wena lufuchi mwikeki jatenang’awu nawu jaSolomoni, nakuhayama nankashi.

45003012 Petulu chanachimoniyi, hakwakula antu ninji, Enu akwetu amayala aIsalela, chuma chanamwililuwu iwu iyala munachihayaminiji? Mukutushinshikilaji, munatong’ozhoki nenu yetu tunamwenjeshi nang’ovu zhetwetu, inji nakuzhila kwetu, tahinji?
45003013 Nzambi yaAbalahama naIsaka naYakoba, Nzambi yawankakulula zhetu, nalemeshi kambung’inji Yesu mwálubwilenu nakumuleka chemeniyi kumesu aPilatu, chakeng’eliyi kumuumbaku.
45003014 Ilang’a enu mwalekeli Wazhila, Walong’a; mwalombeli kuyinka mbanzhi.
45003015 Himukuzhaha Mwiniwumi ilang’a Nzambi wamusang’wili mujafu; chumochu twachimweni namesu.
45003016 Nakukuhwelela izhina jinji, jimu munakoleli iwu iyala munamoni, mweluka jehi. Eng’a, kukuhwelela kwakukuhwelela Yesu, jiku kunamwinki kukola kwalala kumunamoni namesu enu wezhima wenu.
45003017 Nochu jinu, enu anakwetu, neluki nami enu mwachilili chakuyamba, jichi chelili nianyuuli zhenu nawa.
45003018 Yuma yashimwinang’ahu jehi Nzambi kutunwa twawatuplofwetu ezhima, yakwila ninji Klistu winji akakabi, yinalumbulukili jehi mwenimu.
45003019 Jichi jinu, balumukenu munyichima yenu, mufunti, kulonja akazhimang’eshi nshiji zhenu, kulonja kwinzi yilaaka yakuhizumwisha yakuleta ng’ovu zhakufuma kwekala MWANTA.
45003020 Kulonja akatemeshi Klistu ayifuukwililuwu, jiyi Yesu.
45003021 Yenona ching’a ekala mwiwulu nichamba kafuntishawu yuma yezhima muyajing’i, yoyatenenang’ahu jehi Nzambi kutunwa twawatuplofwetu twinji azhila akufumisha kushankulu.
45003022 Mosi wahosheli chalala ninji, MWANTA Nzambi wakayimwekeshela Kaplofwetu wamuji anakwenu wakekala neyi ami; Mwakamutiyililang’a mwezhima mwakayilezhang’ayi.
45003023 Muntu wakabula kutiyilila mazu aKaplofwetu owu, Akamunong’esha chikupu mumunzowu.
45003024 Eng’a, atuplofwetu ezhima, kufumisha haji Samweli ninawa alonjelelumu, ahoshelumu wezhima wawu, nakushimuna yuma yawena mafuku anu.

45003025 Enu yenu anyana kawatuplofwetu, niachitiyang’enu chatiyang’eniyi Nzambi nawankakulula zhenu, chamwililuwu Abalahama kuji Nzambi ninji, Muji mbutu yeyi mwakakoolekela yisaka yahamaseki yezhima.
45003026 Nzambi chasang’wiliyi Kambung’inji Yesu muji afu, wasambilili kumutemesha kujenu, akayikiswili nkisu, nakuyibalumuna munyichima yenu wezhima wenu, mufumi mukuluwa kwenu.
45004001 Heliluwu achiji kuhosha nawantu, atuplistu nimukulumpi wamashijika amuTembeli, niaSajusi, hiyakuyishintakesha;
45004002 anatiyi jehi kutama chaji nakutang’ishawu antu nawu muji Yesu afu amba kasang’uka.
45004003 Hiyakuyikwata, hiyakuyisha mwakuyihembela, kulonja aching’ilili kucha, mulong’a henohu kuneli jehi melela.
45004004 Ilang’a amavulu anatiyi jehi mazu hiyakukuhwelela, kuchinja amayala ashikili kafwampi neyi makombakazhi atanu (5,000).
45004005 Chikunachi, anyuuli zhawu niakulumpi niansoneki hiyakupompa muYelusalema,
45004006 nikaplistu muneni Anasi, niKayafwasi, niYowanu, niAlesanjeli, nichisaka chakaplistu muneni chezhima.
45004007 Hiyakuyimika aPetulu naYowanu mukachi, hiyakuyihula nawu, Ichi chuma chimuneli munachili nang’ovwinyi? nezhina janyi?
45004008 Petulu, nenzali jehi naSpilitu Wazhila, hakuyila ninji, Enu mwayuulang’a antu, ninenu akulumpi,
45004009 chimuji nakutwihula lelu iwu mujimu wawuwahi wutunakoleshi nachu muntu wajing’i chifwayi;

45004010 tiyenu chachiwahi mwiluki, wezhima wenu mwahita aIsalela ezhima nenu, izhina jaYesu Klistu wakuNazaleta, mwápopelenu hakulusu, ásang’ulawu jehi kuji Nzambi muji afu, muji yena jimu munakoleli iwu muntu nemani kunu kumesu enu.
45004011 Yesu jiyi Ilola jimwajiwili enu akwakutung’a, jojinekali jaswezha kwoloka nankashi jakwiwombu.
45004012 Himwekala wamwinu muji wacheng’uku, mulong’a munu mwishina mukachi kawantu hiyanenkumu izhina jacheng’i jakuhanja nachuku.

45004013 Chamwenuwu kuumika kwawaPetulu naYowanu, kuyitala komana hiyantu akaji kwiluka nyikanja, hela kwing’ila mumashikola amaana, hiyakuhayama. Chanayishinshikuwu ayiluka nikuyiluka, nawu wowu ajing’ilang’a naYesu.
45004014 Chanamonuwu iyala akolesheluwu nemani nawu, hiyamweni mwakutajikilaku.
45004015 Ilang’a chanayilezhuwu kufuma muchota ayi kumbaji, akwachota hiyakushakama hampúng’a.
45004016 Nawu, Awa amayalawa tukuyila ng’ahi? Mulong’a chinzhikizhilu chanakong’uwu hichakuyambaku, chinamwekani kuji antu ezhima ashakama muYelusalema, hitukutwesha kutajikaku.
45004017 Tukuminenu jakuyikonkomwena chakuyizuwila, kulonja kufumisha hanu aleki kuhosha nawantu mwizhina jaYesu, kulonja nsang’u iyi yibuli kutiyakana kwacheng’i mukachi kawantu.
45004018 Hiyakuyitambika, hiyakuyilezha nang’ovu nawu, Bayi muhosha cheng’i hela kutang’isha mwizhina jaYesu, hela hantuku.
45004019 Ilang’a aPetulu naYowanu hiyakuyakula nawu, Chachiwahi kumesu aNzambi kutiyilila enu, tahinji chachiwahi kutiyilila Nzambi? Sompenu ntahi enu aweni.
45004020 Mulong’a kuleka kutena yuma yitwelili nikumona nikutiya, etu kwetu kutwesha nehi.
45004021 Chanayikonkomwenuwu cheng’i chakuzuwa, hiyakuyumbaku, anakang’anyi jehi kumona chuma chakuyibabeshela; anatiyi jehi woma wawantu, mulong’a antu ezhima hiyakulemesha Nzambi hachuma chaneluwu.
45004022 Ona muntu elililuwu chinzhikizhilu chakumukolesha wajing’i wanyaka yakubajika makumi awana (40).
45004023 Chanayumbuwu, hiyakuya kuji akwawu, hiyakushimuna mwezhima mwanayihoshuwu kuji akulumpi zhawatuplistu nikuji akulumpi.
45004024 Chanatiyuwu mwenomu, hiyakubijika kuji Nzambi namuchima wawu wumu hohu nawu, Eyi Mwanta, yeyi waleng’eli niiwulu niiseki nikalung’alwizhi, niyuma yezhima yijumu;
45004025 mwomuwahosheleli muji Spilitu Wazhila kukanwa kankakulula yetu kambung’eyi Javiji neyi, AZHentili anazuwiliji? Antu atong’ozhokeliji chuma chamukunkulwayi?
45004026 Anyanta ahamaseki anatanjami, Anyuuli zhawu hiyakushakama hampúng’a Alwi naMWANTA nawinji awayishayi jehi manzhi.
45004027 Chalala kwaamu, nikambung’eyi wazhila Yesu, iwawayishili manzhi, amushakaminini hampúng’a kuji aHeloji naPontusi Pilatu, hamu nawaZHentili, ninyunza yawaIsalela, mung’anja yinu;
45004028 eli mwakeng’eli kwila chikasa cheyi, muwatong’welang’ahu jehi hampúng’a yeyi
45004029 Ichi jinu Mwanta, talaku chanatukonkomwenuwu chakuzuwa, atwitezhi etu anjung’u zheyi tushimuni izu jeyi chakaji woma,
45004030 iku wuji nakwolola chikasa cheyi nakukolesha antu, nakwila yinzhikizhilu niyihayamisha yakwila nezhina jaKambung’eyi wazhila Yesu.
45004031 Chanalombeluwu, omu mwapompeleluwu himukukanka; wezhima wawu hiyakwinzala naSpilitu Wazhila, hiyakuhosha izu jaNzambi chakaji woma

45004032 Izaza jawantu ákuhweleli, hiyakwikala namuchima wawu wumu, nakufwila kwawu kwokumu, hikwajing’i niwumu welili ninji yuma yahetayi yinji kankawinjuku; ilang’a yuma yawu yezhima hiyikwikala yebomba.
45004033 Apostolu hiyakushimuna nang’ovu yayeni wunsahu wawu wakusang’uka kwasang’ukiliyi Mwanta Yesu muji afu. Luwi lwalweni hilukuwanina wezhima wawu; lwakwila kwosi muntu niwumu wabulili chumaku
45004034 mulong’a antu ajing’i namaha, hela matala, hiyakuyilanjisha, hiyakuleta mali ayuma yanalanjishuwu,
45004035 hiyakutulila kunyenju yawapostolu, hiyakwanzhang’ana hamuntu hamuntu mwanabuliluwu.
45004036 Yosefu, átumbiluwu kuji apostolu izhina jikwawu jaBalanaba, jaya mukwila nawu Sakukunjezha, kaLevi wavwalikili kuKipilosi;
45004037 wajing’i neha, hakujilanjisha, hakuleta owu mali, hakuyitulila kunyenju yawapostolu.
45005001 Ilang’a kwajing’i iyala wumu, izhina jinji Ananiya, nang’ojinji Safwila, hiyakulanjisha iheta jawu.
45005002 Hakunonahu chibalu chawuseya, ing’ojinji nawa niyena nachiluki, hakuleta chibalu chimu, hakuchitulila kunyenju yawapostolu.
45005003 Petulu hakwila ninji, Eyi Ananiya, Satana nenzeliji mumuchima weyi, mwaka wutwambi kuji Spilitu Wazhila, wusweki chibalu chawuseya weheta jeyi?

45005004 Hajing’i iheta kanja wujilanjishi, hijajing’i jeyuku? Hela mali wunajilanjishi jehi, hiyajing’i eyeyi aweni akwila nachu mwezhima muwunakeng’uku? Muchima weyi wunatong’ozhokeliji mwenimu? Hiwunatwambi kuji antuku, wunatwambi kuji Nzambi.
45005005 Ananiya hakutiya mazu awa, ajimbuka niheseki, yofwa nikufwa. Woma waweni wukwata niantu ezhima anachitiyi.
45005006 Anyikwenzi hiyakunyamuka, hiyakumuzhing’azhing’a, hiyakumutwala hanzi, hiyakumutembeka nakumuzhiika.
45005007 Chikuneli munahiti jehi kwizhi mpinzhi zhisatu, ing’ojinji niyena hakwing’ilamu, chakaji kwiluka chuma chinasong’i.
45005008 Petulu hakumwihula ninji, Nlezhi, wuseya wumwalanjisha iheta wowenowu, tahinji? Yena ninji, Eng’a, wowenowu.
45005009 Petulu hakumwila ninji, Munatiyang’eniji kumweseka Spilitu waMWANTA? Tiya nshinju zhanyenju yawantu anazhiiki mfumweyi ozhu zhikwinza kuchisu ozhu, nineyi nawa akukutwala hanzi.
45005010 Hohenohu hakujimbukila kunyenju yinji, hakufwa. Anyikwenzi hiyakwing’ilamu, kumuwana wafwa jehi, hiyakumutwala hanzi nakumuzhiikila hamu namfumwinji.
45005011 Chipompelu chezhima chitiya niwoma waweni, niantu ezhima atiyili yumiyi.
45005012 Apostolu hiyakukong’a namakasawu niyinzhikizhilu niyihayamisha mukachi kawantu. Hiyakupompang’a wezhima wawu namuchima wumu hohu mwikeki jaSolomoni.
45005013 Anashali hiyakutiya woma wakujibomba nawu; ilang’a hiyakuyilemesha kuji antu.
45005014 Akwakukuhwelela aswezha nikuswezha kuvula, ajibombeli kuji Mwanta, mazaza aweni amayala nawambanja.
45005015 Hiyakweleka ákata hanzi nakuyisha munyikwakwa, nakuyikamika hela hatujiji hela hayikang’a, kulonja chakuhitayi Petulu, hela kwamwevulu winji hohu wuyilewukili.
45005016 Hikukupompa izaza jafumini munyikala yajing’i kwakwihi naYelusalema niniku niniku kwi-njo; hiyakuleta antu awu akata, niezhima ajing’i nawaspilitu azonja, hiyakukola wezhima wawu.
45005017 Henohu kaplistu muneni niezhima ajing’iyi nawu, wowu achaaku chawaSajusi, hiyakusang’umoka, anatiyi jehi ichima mbe.
45005018 Hiyakukwata apostolu, hiyakuyisha mukaleya mwashilang’awu antu ezhima.
45005019 Ilang’a kang’elu kaMWANTA wumu hakwinza nawufuku nakwenzulula yenzelu yakaleya, hakuyiijisha hanzi,
45005020 ninji, Yenu mwimani muTembeli, mulezhi antu mazu ezhima awumi wunu.

45005021 Chanachitiyuwu, hiyakwing’ila muTembeli hankunku yakucha, hiyakutang’isha. Ilang’a kaplistu muneni hakuya, ninawa ekalayi nawu; hakupompesha chota, nichota chawaIsalela chikwawu chalema chezhima; hiyakutemesha anhembi kukaleya ayileti.
45005022 Ilang’a chayiluwu anhembi, hiyakuwana mukaleya mwosi, hiyakufunta nakushimuna,
45005023 nawu, Kaleya chalala twawana kakupata chakola, nianhembi sang’a emenawu kuyenzelu; ilang’a chitwela netu twenzululuku, kuwana mukachi nimuntu mwosi.
45005024 Mukulumpi wamashijika akuTembeli, niakulumpi zhawatuplistu, chatiyiluwu mazu awa, hiyakuzhinoka nankashi mukuya yumiyi.
45005025 Hikukwinza muntu nakuyilezha ninji, Tiyenu, awa amayala mwasha mukaleya anemani muTembeli nakutang’isha antu.
45005026 Mukulumpi wamashijika nawanhembi hiyakuya nakuyileta chakaji njombu. Mulong’a hiyakutiya woma wawantu, nawu akenja katwasa malola.
45005027 Chanayiletuwu, hiyakuyimika muchota.

45005028 Kaplistu muneni hakuyila ninji, Twayilezheli chakola, netu bayi mutang’isha mwizhinijuku. Tiyenu ntahi, muYelusalema mwezhima mwawanina jehi kutang’isha kwenu hohu; munatong’ozhoki nenu mutwinki mulong’a wamashi aniwu muntu.
45005029 Ilang’a aPetulu nawapostolu hiyakwakula nawu, Ching’a twovwahila Nzambi, bayi antuku.
45005030 Nzambi yawankakulula zhetu wamusang’wili Yesu muji afu, mwázhahilenu nakumukujika hamutonju.
45005031 Yenowu anamutúmbakeshi jehi kuji Nzambi nachikasa chinji chachijiilu, ekali Mwanta niChamwinu, kulonja aleti kuji Isalela zhakubalumuka munyichima, nikuyanakena nshiji.
45005032 Etu yetu ayinsahu yayumiyi; niSpilitu Wazhila nawa anenkiyi Nzambi akwakumwovwahila.
45005033 Wena chanachitiyuwu, chiyifutwisha nikunyichima, hiyakutong’ozhoka nawu ayizhahi.
45005034 Muchota himukwimana kaFwalisewu wumu, izhina jinji Gamaleli, nkulung’ang’a wanshimbi, amuhameka kuji antu ezhima; hakuyilezha ninji ayiijishi awa apostolu kampinzhi kanti.
45005035 Hakuyila ninji, Enu amayala aIsalela, babalenu chimukukeng’a kuyila awa amayala.

45005036 Mulong’a mafuku ajing’uku, Teyujasa wanyamukili nakujisama ninji nalema; yena hakujibomba nawamayala amakwawu, kwizhi nkulakazhi zhiwana (400). Amuzhahili, niantu ezhima amwovwahilili ayipalang’esheli; akang’anya nipukwa.

45005037 Kulonjela haji yeniwu, hasonekesheluwu antu, Yujasi wakuNG’aliliya niyena nawa, hakwambula antu amakwawu, ninji ajikumi nayena. Yena nawa wanong’a jehi, niamakwawu ezhima amwovwahilili ayipalang’esha jehi nju-nju
45005038 Ichi jinu nukuyilezha nami yambulukenu amayalawa, yilekenu kwawu. Mulong’a neyi mpúng’iyi hela mujimu iwu wawantu, wukwikala wamukunkulwayi.
45005039 Ilang’a neyi himujimu waNzambi, himwakatwesha kuyifwomona awa antuku, mwakenja kela muji nakulwisha naNzambi yomweni.
45005040 Hiyakwitezha mwanahoshiyi. Chanatambikuwu apostolu, hiyakuyivupola, hiyakuyilezha nang’ovu nawu, Bayi muhosha mwizhina jaYesuku. Ayumbaku nikuyumbaku.
45005041 Jichi hiyakufuma muchota nakuzang’alala, nanochu chanayifuukwiluwu kutela kusawuka nakukoola Izhina.
45005042 Hiyalekeli kutang’isha hefuku hefuku muTembeli nikumatalawuku, nakushimuna Yesu nawu jiyi Klistu.

45006001 Hamafuku owu, chelili atumbanzhi hiyakuya nakuvula, hiyakutachika kujitopeka; aYujeya ahoshelang’a Gliki hiyakutopeka aYujeya ahoshelang’a Hebelu, mulong’a abonjeli amfwila zhawu hanzhang’enang’awu yakujya hefuku hefuku.
45006002 Ikumi nayeji (12) hiyakutambika izaza jawatumbanzhi, hiyakwila nawu, Hichachiwahi etu kushiya izu jaNzambi nakukalakela kuzhimesaku.
45006003 Jichi enu anakwetu, talatalenu mukachi kenu amayala atanu nayeji akweti mpuhu yayiwahi, enzala jehi naSpilitu nimaana, tuyikunzhiki kumujimu iwu.
45006004 Ilang’a etu kwetu tukukakela kukulombela, nimujimu wezu jaNzambi

45006005 Omu mwahosheluwu mutiyisha niizaza jezhima kuwaha. Hiyakutonja Stefwanu, iyala waswezha kukuhwelela, wenzala naSpilitu Wazhila; niFwilipu, niPolokolusi, niNikanoli, niTimoni, niPamenasi, niNikola wakuAntiyoki, wabalumukili kwikala kaYujeya.
45006006 Wenawa hiyakuyisha kumesu awapostolu. Chanalombeluwu hiyakuyinang’ika makasawu.
45006007 Izu jaNzambi hijikutanja; niatumbanzhi hiyakuya nakuvula nankashi muYelusalema; mukanka wawatuplistu waweni hiyakwovwahila chikuhwelelu.
45006008 Stefwanu, wenzala nawuselewa waNzambi ning’ovu, hakwila yuma yakuhayamisha, niyinzhikizhilu yamaneni mukachi kawantu.
45006009 Ilang’a hikukusang’umuka antu amakwawu akushikola yawantu anasubuluwu muwujung’u niakwaKileni, niakwaAlesanjeliya, niakwaSilisiya, niakwaAsiya, hiyakutajika ntaji naStefwanu.
45006010 Hiyakumukang’anya hansang’u yamaaninji, naSpilitu wahosheliyi nachu.
45006011 Hiyakwinka antu maseleka kulonja ahoshi nawu, Tunamutiyi nakuhosha mazu akutuka Mosi niNzambi.
45006012 Hiyakusang’umona antu niakulumpi niansoneki; chanamuwanuwu hiyakumukwata nang’ovu nakumutwala muchota.
45006013 Hiyakwimika ayinsahu akutwamba elili nawu, Iwu iyala halekang’a kutena munu mwazhila ninshimbi chatamaku.
45006014 Mulong’a tunamutiyi nakuhosha ninji, Iwu Yesu wakuNazaleta wakakisang’ana Tembeli iyi nakubalumuna yaaku yatulezheliyi Mosi.
45006015 Antu ezhima ashakamini muchota hiyakumushinshika namesu awu swi-i; hiyakumona kumesu inji kuji neyi kumesu akang’elu.
45007001 Kaplistu muneni hakwila ninji, Yumiyi yalala, tahinji?
45007002 Yena ninji, Enu anakwami, ninenu atata, tiyililenu. Nzambi walubanzhi lwakulema wamwekeni kuji nkakulula yetu Abalahama, hajing’iyi muMesopotamiya, wuchiji kanja ashakami muHalana.
45007003 Hakumwila ninji, Fumaku mwitung’a jenu, nikuji antang’a zheyi, Winzi mwitung’a jinakakulezha.
45007004 Hakufuma mwitung’a jawaKalajeya, hakushakama muHalana. Kwenoku, chafwiliyi tata yinji, Nzambi hakumufumishaku nakumuleta mwitung’a jinu jimwashakama lelu.
45007005 Hamwinkeli mwoku wuswana, chalala hela hakujatila mwenju winjuku. Wakanini kumwinka itung’a jinji nawanyaninji amba kalonjelamu, hachijing’iyi kanja avwali mwana
45007006 Nzambi wahosheli mwakwila ninji, Anyaneyi akashakama mwitung’a jawenyi. Ninji akayiheta muwujung’u, nakuyikong’a chatama nyaka nkulakazhi zhiwana (400).
45007007 Nzambi ninji, Owu munza wakayiheta nakawusompesha; Nkumininaku amba kafumamu, amba kankalakela mwenamunu.
45007008 Hakumwinka chitiyang’enu chakwalama. Abalahama wavweli Isaka, hakumwalamisha ifuku jamuchitanu nachisatu, Isaka wavweli Yakoba, Yakoba wavweli ankakulula ikumi nayeji (12).
45007009 Owu ankakulula amutiyilili Yosefu ichima, hiyakumulanjisha kuji antu, amutweli muEzhipitu. Ilang’a Nzambi wajing’i ninji,

45007010 hakumupulwisha kumakabi inji ezhima. Hemeniyi kumesu amwanta waEzhipitu Fwalo, Nzambi hakumutiyisha Fwalo kuwaha nayena namaaninji; yena hakumubalumuna kwikala nyuuli yaEzhipitu, nimukwakuhemba itala jinji jezhima.
45007011 Henohu mumpata yaEzhipitu yezhima nimuKenani, himukuholoka nzala; hiyakumona yihung’u yayeni; ankakulula zhetu hiyamweni yakujyaku.
45007012 Yakoba, chanatiyiyi nawu kuEzhipitu kuji tijiku, hakutemeshaku ankakulula zhetu ipampa jakusambila.
45007013 Chayiluwu kamuchiyeji Yosefu hakujimwekesha kuji anakwinji; nimunza winji awiluka nikuji Fwalo
45007014 Yosefu hakutemesha nakutambika tata yinji Yakoba, niantang’a zhinji ezhima, antu makumi atanu nayeji natanu (75).
45007015 Yakoba hakukunkumukila muEzhipitu. Hakufwa niyena niankakulula zhetu.
45007016 Hiyakuyitwala kuShekemi nakuyikamika mwizhamu jalanjiliyi Abalahama nawuseya wasiliva kuji anyana kaHamoli muShekemi.
45007018 MuEzhipitu muswana nimwanta wacheng’i wabulili kwiluka Yosefu.
45007019 Mwantowu hakukwatila munza wetu maana, hakukong’a ankakulula zhetu chatama, hiyakuyikanzhikizha kunata anyikeki zhawu, kulonja abuli kuhanja
45007020 Wena mwakowu jiwu wavwalikiliyi Mosi, Nzambi hakumumona himwana walubanzhi; hiyakumulelela mwitala jatata yinji tukwezhi tusatu.
45007021 Chamushiluwu mukalong’a, mwana kaFwalo wamumbanja hakumunona, hakumulela neyi mwaninji wakujivwela

45007022 Chamushiluwu mukalong’a, mwana kaFwalo wamumbanja hakumunona, hakumulela neyi mwaninji wakujivwela22 Hiyakumutang’isha Mosi mwaya maana amuEzhipitu ezhima; hakuswezha ng’ovu nikumazu inji nikunyijimu yinji.
45007023 Chashikiliyi Mosi munyaka makumi awana (40), mumuchima winji himukwinza zhakuya nakuhempula anakwinji aIsalela.
45007024 Chanamoniyi mwinawu wumu hiyakumukong’a chatama, hakumwamwina, hakumutenja owu akabishiluwu, hakuzhaha owu kaEzhipitu.
45007025 Watong’ozhokeli ninji anakwinji akwiluka chakuyamwinawu kuji Nzambi nachikasa chinji yena, ilang’a wena kuchiluka nehi.
45007026 Chikunachi, hakuyiwana aji nakulwisha mulwawu, yena hakukeng’a kuyihumang’esha cheng’i ninji, Enu akwetu, ivumu jenu jimu, mulong’anyi muji nakujikong’ela chatama chochichi?
45007027 Owu wamukong’eli mukwawu chatama hakumushinzhika Mosi ninji, Nakwilishi mulopu wetu ninsompeshi yetu hinyi?
45007028 Keng’a wunzhahi neyi chiwazhaha ona kaEzhipitu haloshi, tahinji?
45007029 Mosi chanatiyiyi izu oju hakutemuka, hakushakama mwitung’a jakuMijiyani, hakuvwelaku anyana amayala ayeji.
45007030 Chinamani nyaka makumi awana (40), kang’elu hakumwekana kuji yena muchinkalampata chakumpiji yaSinayi, mumuzuzu wakesi muchiputa
45007031 Mosi chanachimoniyi, hakuhayama; hakwinza nakuswila kwakwihi, ninji atali.
