45007032 Hikukutiyakana izu jaMWANTA ninji, Ami Yami Nzambi yawankakulula zheyi, Nzambi yaAbalahama, niyaIsaka, niyaYakoba. Mosi hakuzaala woma, nikutwesha kutalaku nehi
45007033 MWANTA hakumwila ninji, Subulaku nkwabilu zhiji kunyenju yeyi, mulong’a hiwunemani hiiseki jazhila.
45007034 Chalala namoni chaji nakukabishawu antu ami aji muEzhipitu, natiyi chakwabawu; nasuluki jehi niyipulwishi. Jichi nakeng’i kukutemesha muEzhipitu.

45007035 Yowu Mosi alekeluwu nawu, Nakwinki mujimu wakutuyuula hela kutusompesha hinyi? jiyi atemesheluwu kuji Nzambi ekali nyuuli ninkuuli, nachikasa chayenowu kang’elu wamwekeni kuji yena muchiputa.
45007036 Jiyi muntu wayifumishili muEzhipitu chanakong’iyi yihayamisha nayinzhikizhilu, nimuEzhipitu, nimuKalung’alwizhi Kachinana, nimuchinkalampata, nyaka makumi awana (40).
45007037 Yeniwu jiyi Mosi wayilili anyana kaIsalela ninji, Nzambi wakayimwekeshela Kaplofwetu wahaji anakwenu neyi ami.
45007038 Jiyi wajing’i muchipompelu chamuchinkalampata, hamu nanowu kang’elu wahosheli nayena kumpiji yaSinayi, ninawankakulula zhetu; jiyi watambwili mazu amomi atutang’ishi etu.
45007039 Yowu alekeluwu ankakulula zhetu nawu etu kumwovwahila kwonti kwetu; hiyakumushinzhika nawu tufumi; nyichima yawu hiyikufunta cheng’i kuEzhipitu.
45007040 Hiyakumwila Aloni nawu, Wutwilili anzambi kulonja atwaminini kutukuyetu; Yeniwu Mosi, watufumishili mwitung’a jaEzhipitu, Hituneluki kwanayiyuku.
45007041 Wena mafuku owu hiyakwila mwana kang’ombi, hiyakuketwila yenowu nkishi chimuna, hiyakuzang’alala nanyijimu yakumakasawu.

45007042 Nzambi hakubalumuka, hakuyileka kwinji, ninji apeshang’a yileng’aleng’a yamwiwulu; neyi chasonekeluwu mumukanja wawatuplofwetu nawu, Enu akwamutang’a waIsalela, yami komana mwaketwililang’a yimuna, Mwaletelelang’a nyilambu nyaka makumi awana (40) muna muchinkalampata tahinji?
45007043 Mwanyamwini tabanaka yaMoleki, nikukatumbwa kamukishi Lefwana, Jiyi yuma mwalumbishili kulonja kujifukula kuji wena, Ami nakayitwala kwakubajika Babiloni.
45007044 Ankakulula zhetu ajing’i naTabanaka yawunsahu omu muchinkalampata, yamukunzhikiluwu Mosi kuji owu wahoshelang’a ninji, hakumulezha ninji akatung’i mwaya chifwikizha chanamoniyi.

45007045 Tabanaka yaleteluwu kuji ankakulula zhetu nawa, heng’ililuwu hamu naYoshuwa nakutambula itung’a jawaZHentili atemwiniyi Nzambi kúkuya ankakulula zhetu, njo-o nikumafuku aDavidi, ámwenuwu kuwaha kuji Nzambi.
45007046 Yowu walombeli kumutung’ila Nzambi yaYakoba hakushakama.
45007047 Ilang’a Solomoni jiyi wamutung’ilili itala.
45007048 Hela chochu, Mukwakubajika hashakamang’a mwakutung’a namakasa awantuku;
45007049 mwomwaneliyi kaplofwetu ninji, Iwulu hiitanja jami jawanta, Iseki hiitanja jakunyenju yami. MWANTA ninji, Inji itala mukuntung’ilami kulonja nimoni mwakunookela, jishika hajihi?
45007050 Yuma yezhimiyi hiyayitung’ili kujami nachikasa chamuku?
45007051 Enu mwachinchika! Enu ayijima munyichima namatu! Yenu mwajikang’ang’a naSpilitu Wazhila mafuku ezhima. Chelilang’a ankakulula zhenu, jichi chimwelang’a ninenu.

45007052 Kaplofwetu wumwojihi abulili kukabishawu kuji ankakulula zhenu? Azhahili wena ayilezhelang’ahu jehi chakenzayi Mukwakulong’a; yenowu, yenu mwabalumukili kwikala akwakumufukezha, niambanzhi akumuzhaha.
45007053 Enu mwatambwili nshimbi yayileteleluwu kuji ang’elu, enu kuyihemba nehi.
45007054 Wena chanatiyuwu mazu owu, chiyifutwisha nikunyichima, hiyakumusumang’ena kumazhi.
45007055 Ilang’a yena, wenzala jehi naSpilitu Wazhila, hakutala mwiwulu swi-i, hakumona lubanzhi lwakulema kwaNzambi, niYesu nemani kuchikasa chaNzambi chachijiilu.
45007056 Ninji, Talenu, namoni mumawulu munenzuluki, niMwana kaMuntu nemani kuchikasa chaNzambi chachijiilu.
45007057 Ilang’a wena hiyakubijika nang’ovu, hiyakusha nyinu mumatu awu, hiyakumulotokela namuchima wawu wumu hohu.
45007058 Amukokela nihanzi yang’anja, amwasa nimalola. Ayinsahu hiyakutenteka mahinawu kunyenju yamukwenzi weyala, izhina jinji Sawulu.
45007059 Hiyakumwasola Stefwanu malola, iku wuji nakutambika ninji, Mwanta Yesu, atambuli spilitu yami.
45007060 Hakufukama, hakubijika chakola ninji, Eyi Mwanta ayanakeni mulong’iwu. Chanahoshiyi mwenimu akama nitulu. Sawulu wajing’i nakwitezha chanamuzhahuwu.
45008001 Jena ifuku oju ikabisha jakukabisha chipompelu chajing’i muYelusalema jivulumuka nikuvulumuka. Hiyakupalang’ena wezhima wawu mwahita matung’a aYujeya naSamaliya, kwasheli wowu apostolu hohu.
45008002 Stefwanu hiyakumuzhiika kuji amayala akweti kalemesha kakulemesha Nzambi, hiyakumujila makumbu aweni.
45008003 Ilang’a Sawulu hakukisang’ana chipompelu; hakwing’ila mumatala ezhima nakukokakoka niamayala niambanja, hakuyisha mukaleya.
45008004 Jichi wena apalang’eni hiyakukimbuka nakushimuna izu jaNzambi.
45008005 Fwilipu hakukunkumukila kung’anja yaSamaliya, hakuyishimwina nsang’u yaKlistu
45008006 Mazaza awantu chanatiyuwu mwahosheliyi Fwilipu, nikumona yinzhikizhilu yeliliyi, hiyakumutiyilila namuchima wawu wumu hohu.
45008007 Mulong’a aspilitu azonja, hiyakufuma muji antu amavulu nakukaloka nang’ovu. Antu amavulu ajing’i namusong’u wakalepa, niajing’i nakubalakata, hiyakukola.
45008008 Mung’anjoyu mwajing’i muzang’alu waswezha
45008009 Ilang’a mung’anjoyu mwajing’i iyala wumu, izhina jinji Shimona, yenowu wahong’elang’a nakuhayamisha akwaSamaliya, nakujisama ninji nalema.
45008010 Antu ezhima, kufumisha kuji akaji kulema kushika nikuji alema, hiyakumusha kumuchima nawu, Yeniwu jiyi ng’ovu oyu yaNzambi yatenang’awu nawu Muneni .
45008011 Amushili kumuchima, mulong’a wayihayamishilang’a nang’ombu yinji mafuku amavulu.
45008012 Ilang’a chanakuhweleluwu mwashimwiniyi Fwilipu nsang’u yayiwahi yakutena wanta waNzambi niizhina jaYesu Klistu, hiyakuyizhimika, niamayala niambanja.
45008013 Shimona yomweni niyena nawa hakukuhwelela; chanamuzhimikuwu hakwenja hamu naFwilipu. Chanamoniyi yinzhikizhilu ninyijimu yang’ovu yakong’eliyi, hakuhayama.
45008014 Nochu jinu apostolu ajing’i kuYelusalema, chanatiyuwu nawu aSamaliya anatambuli izu jaNzambi, hiyakutemeshaku aPetulu naYowanu.
45008015 Wena chanashikuwu, hiyakuyilombelela kulonja atambuli Spilitu Wazhila.
45008016 Mulong’a henohu Spilitu wuchiji kanja aholokeli hela haji muntu niwumu wakwenokuku, anakumini jakuyizhimika mwizhina jaMwanta Yesu hohu.
45008017 Hiyakuyinang’ika makasa, atambula niSpilitu Wazhila.
45008018 Shimona, chanamoniyi Spilitu Wazhila ayinkang’ayu hakunang’ika makasa awapostolu, hakwila ninji ayinki mali;
45008019 ninji, Nyinkenu ninami wanta iwu, kulonja yowu nakanang’ika makasami akatambuli Spilitu Wazhila
45008020 Ilang’a Petulu hakumwila ninji, Mali eyi akisikili kumu naneyi, mulong’a wunatong’ozhoki neyi wutambuli namali chamukunkulu chaNzambi.
45008021 Hiwukweti mwakutukwashila hela mujimu kunsang’u iyuku; mulong’a muchima weyi hiwalong’a kumesu aNzambuku.
45008022 Jichi balumukaku mumuchima wuleki ichi chuma chatama, wumulombi Mwanta, wamba kela muwunatong’ozhoki mumuchima weyi akakwanakeni.
45008023 Mulong’a nakumoni wumuntu wunaluli jehi nanjulu mumuchima, anakukasi jehi nakuluwa kweyi.
45008024 Shimona hakwakula ninji, Nlombelelenuku kuji Mwanta, kulonja yumoyu yimunateni yibuli kunwana
45008025 Jichi wena, chanashimunuwu wunsahu wawu nakuhosha izu jaMwanta, hiyakufunta kuYelusalema nakushimuna nsang’u yayiwahi munyikala yawaSamaliya yayivulu
45008026 Ilang’a kang’elu kaMWANTA hakumwila Fwilipu ninji, Nyamukaku, wuyi kukabeta kakuchijiilu, kunzhila yafuma kuYelusalema yakunkumukila kuGaza muchinkalampata.

45008027 Hakunyamuka, hakuya. Kutala iyala wakuEtiyopiya, nhembi yamwanta wamumbanja wawaEtiyopiya Kanjesi, walema nankashi, jiyi wahembelang’a yuma yaKanjesi yalema yezhima. Yenowu wenza jehi kuYelusalema kulonja kujifukula kuji Nzambi;
45008028 wajing’i munzhila yakufunta, washakama mwikálu jinji nakutang’a mukanja wakaplofwetu Isaya.
45008029 Spilitu hakumwila Fwilipu ninji, Yaku kwakwihi, wukunjami kwikálu jina.
45008030 Fwilipu hakuyaku lufuchi, hakumutiya wuji nakutang’a mukanja wakaplofwetu Isaya. Ninji, Chiwuji nakutang’a chinakulumbulukili, tahinji?
45008031 Kuchinka yena nhembi ninji, Chikunlumbulukila ng’ahi chakaji muntu kunlezha? Hakumwila Fwilipu ninji akanjami ashakami hamu.
45008032 Komana wajing’i nakutang’a mwasonekawu nawu, Neyi mwana kamukoku akutwalawu nakuzhaha, Neyi chamwenang’ayi mukoku haji akwakumutewula nzo-o, Jichi niyena haasamini mukanwa kinjuku.
45008033 Chajizozeliyi, hiyakumutambula wuhaku wakeng’eli kumonayi. Iking’u jinji akajishimuna kujinyi? Mulong’a wumi winji ;Najiteni yomweni, tahinji nateni muntu wacheng’i?
45008034 Owu nhembi hakumwihula Fwilipu ninji, Kaplofwetu nateninyi, mwani? Najiteni yomweni, tahinji nateni muntu wacheng’i?
45008035 Fwilipu hakuhosha mazu akutachikila kumukanjiwu, hakumushimwina nsang’u yaYesu.
45008036 Chayilang’awu munzhila hiyakushika kumenzhi. Owu nhembi ninji, Tala menzhi awa; chumanyi chikunlekesha kunzhimika?
45008037 Fwilipu hakwakula ninji, neyi wunakuhweleli namuchima weyi wezhima wukutwesha. Yena hakwakula ninji, Nakuhweleli nami Yesu Klistu jiyi Mwana kaNzambi.
45008038 Hakulezha antu kwimika ikálu. Hiyakukunkumukila mumenzhi mwayeji wawu, niFwilipu ninhembi; hakumuzhimika.
45008039 Chanakanjukuwu mumenzhi, Spilitu waMWANTA hakumuhukula Fwilipu; owu nhembi hamumweni nawa cheng’uku, hakuyang’a kwinji munzhila yinji nakuzang’alala.
45008040 Hakwinza Fwilipu hiyakumuwana kuAzotu; chahitiliyi, hakushimuna nsang’u yayiwahi munyikala yeneni yezhima, nichashikiliyi kuKesaleya
45009001 Ilang’a Sawulu hakwonashanina nikufunyina atumbanzhi twaMwanta zhawubanzhi; hakuya kuji kaplistu muneni,
45009002 hakulomba nyikanja yakuya nachu kumashikola akuJamakasa, kulonja neyi wakawana akwaNzhila amakwawu, hela amayala hela ambanja, akayileti kuYelusalema munyonzhi.
45009003 Chajing’i nakwenjayi hakuya nakushika kuJamakasa, kukasumuka hikukumutong’ekela chezhezhi chakufuma mwiwulu kwi-njo.
45009004 Hakujimbuka heseki, hakutiya izu hijikumwila ninji, Eyi Sawulu, Sawulu, wankabishilang’aji?
45009005 Sawulu ninji, Yeyinyi Mwanta? Mwanta ninji, Yami Yesu wákabishang’a.
45009006 Nyamukaku, wing’ili mung’anja, akakulezhi muwukwila.
45009007 Amayala enjeliyi nawu hiyakwimana, zhinayikang’i jehi zhakuhosha, anatiyi kwezu hohu, kumona muntu nehi.
45009008 Sawulu hakunyamuka hamaseki; ninji atoni, kumona chuma nehi. Hiyakumukwata kuchikasa, hiyakumutwala muJamakasa.
45009009 Hakwikala mafuku asatu chakaji kumona; kujya hela kunwa nehi.
45009010 MuJamakasa mwajing’i kambanzhi wumu, izhina jinji Ananiya. Mwanta hakumwila muchimwenu ninji, Eyi Ananiya. Yena ninji, Yamonu Mwanta.
45009011 Mwanta hakumwila ninji, Nyamukaku, wuyi kumukwakwa wukweti izhina jaWoloka, mwihuli muntu mwitala jaYuja, izhina jinji Sawulu wakuTalusa; mulong’a wuji nakulombela.
45009012 Niyena namoni muchimwenu iyala, izhina jinji Ananiya, hakwing’ila mwajiyi yena, hakumunang’ika makasa kulonja amoni.
45009013 Ilang’a Ananiya hakwakula ninji, Eyi Mwanta, iwu iyala namutiyi kuji antu amavulu, mwanakong’iyi antu eyi azhila kuYelusalema chatama;
45009014 nikunu yena wukweti wanta watambulayi kuji akulumpi zhawatuplistu, kulonja kukasa antu ezhima atambikang’a izhina jeyi.
45009015 Ilang’a Mwanta hakumwila ninji, Yang’a kweyi; yena hinsaba yinatonji ami aweni, kulonja atwali izhina jami kuji aZHentili, nikuji anyanta ankanu, nikuji aIsalela.
45009016 Mulong’a ami nukumulezha yuma yayivulu yakakabayi, yakukoola izhina jami

45009017 Ananiya hakuya, hakwing’ila mwitaloju. Hakumunang’ika makasa ninji, Eyi manakwami Sawulu, Mwanta Yesu, wámwekana kujeyi munzhila yiwenzang’a, nantemeshi kulonja wumoni, winzali naSpilitu Wazhila.
45009018 Hohenohu kumesu inji kuholoka niyuma yiji neyi makàlu, amona nikumona. Hakunyamuka, hiyakumuzhimika.
45009019 Hakutambula yakujya, akwata ning’ovu. Hakushakama mafuku nawatumbanzhi ajing’i kuJamakasa.
45009020 Hohenohu hakutiyakesha nsang’u yaYesu mumashikola, ninji hiMwana kaNzambi.
45009021 Ezhima amutiyili hiyakuhayama nawu, Hijiyi wakabishilang’a antu muYelusalema atambikang’a izhinijuku? Nsang’u yanenzhiliyi kunu yoyu yakuyitwala munyonzhi kuji akulumpi zhawatuplistu.
45009022 Ilang’a Sawulu hakuswezha ng’ovu, hakuyibayisha aYujeya ashakamini kuJamakasa, nakulumbulula chakashinshi ninji chalala iwu Yesu jiyi Klistu.
45009023 Chimunahiti jehi mafuku amavulu, aYujeya hiyakumushakamina hampúng’a yakumuzhaha.
45009024 Mpúng’oyu hiyakuyiluka kuji Sawulu. Hiyakuhemba kuyisu yamukala nimwaana niwufuku kulonja amuzhahi.
45009025 Ilang’a atumbanzhi hiyakumutwala nawufuku, hiyakumuhanwisha mwipwata jamumpwembu nakumuzelumuna muchimpaya.
45009026 Chanashikiyi kuYelusalema hakweseka kujibomba nawatumbanzhi. Wezhima wawu hiyakumutiya woma, hiyakutajika nawu hikambanzhuku.
45009027 Ilang’a Balanaba hakumutambula, hakumutwala kuji apostolu, hakuyilezha chanamumoniyi Mwanta munzhila, nichanahoshiyi Mwanta nayena, nichanashimuniyi izhina jaYesu kuJamakasa chakaji woma.
45009028 Hakwikala nawu kuYelusalema; hakukimbukang’a nawu, hakwing’ilang’a nakwijikang’a hamu nawu.
45009029 Hakushimuna izhina jaMwanta chakaji woma; hakuhosha nakutajika nawaYujeya ahoshang’a Gliki, ilang’a wena hiyakukeng’a mwakumuzhahila.
45009030 Chanachilukuwu anakwinji hiyakumukunkumwisha kuKesaleya, hiyakumutemesha kuTalusa
45009031 Mwahita Yujeya mwezhima nimuNG’aliliya nimuSamaliya, chipompelu hichikumona kuwunja, hichikujitung’a, hichikwenja nawoma waMwanta, nimukuyikunjezha kwaSpilitu Wazhila, hichikutoha.
45009032 Chajing’i nakukimbukayi Petulu kwezhima, hakushika nikuji akwakuzhila ashakama kuLija.
45009033 Kwenoku hakumona muntu wumu, izhina jinji Eneya, wakama jehi hakajiji kinji nyaka yitanu nayisatu; mulong’a wajing’i wakata kalepa.
45009034 Petulu hakumwila ninji, Eyi Eneya, Yesu Klistu hakukukolesha; hinjukaku, alaku kajiji keyi. Ahinjuka nihohenohu.
45009035 Ezhima ashakama kuLija nimuShaloni hiyakumumona, hiyakubalumukila kuji Mwanta.
45009036 Woho, kuYopa kwajing’i kambanzhi wumu, izhina jinji Tabita, muGliki jiyi Jokasi; yenowu mumbanja waswezheli nyijimu yayiwahi, niyuma yaluwi yeliliyi.
45009037 Hamafuku owu hakukata hakufwa. Chanamuweleshuwu, hiyakumukamika mwitala jahewulu.
45009038 KuLija kwajing’i kwakwihi naYopa; jichi atumbanzhi, chanatiyuwu nawu Petulu wuji kuLija, hiyakutemeshaku amayala ayeji nakumulembelela nawu, Bayi wulaba kwinzaku.

45009039 Petulu hakunyamuka hakuya nawu. Chanashikiyi, hiyakumutwala mwitaloju jahewulu. Ambanja amfwila ezhima hiyakwimana kwakwihi nayena nakujila, nakumulezhalezha yikowelu niyuma yakuvwala yachiminiyi Jokasi hachijing’iyi nawu.
45009040 Petulu hakuyiijishamu wezhima wawu, hakufukama nakulombela. Hakubalumuka nakutala kuji mufu ninji, Eyi Tabita, hinjukaku. Atona nikutona. Chanamoniyi Petulu, Tabita hakuhinjuka nakushakama.
45009041 Petulu hakumukwata kuchikasa chinji, hakumuhinjwisha. Hakutambika akwakuzhila nawambanja amfwila, hakuyinkayi wamumi.
45009042 Hichikutiyakana muYopa mwezhima; amavulu hiyakumukuhwelela Mwanta.
45009043 Petulu hakushakama muYopa mafuku amavulu kwamuntu izhina jinji Shimona, mukwakuloomba yitembi.
45010001 MuKesaleya mwajing’i iyala wumu, izhina jinji Konelisu, mukulumpi wamashijika atenang’awu nawu aItaliya;
45010002 muntu wukweti kalemesha kakulemesha Nzambi, waakamang’a Nzambi hamu nawakwetala jinji ezhima, wenkelang’a antu yamukunkulu yayivulu, walombelelang’a kuji Nzambi hefuku hefuku.
45010003 Hakumona muchimwenu chalumbuluka, kang’elu kaNzambi hakwinza kuji yena hampinzhi kwizhi yamuchitanu nachiwana yefuku (15:00 hls), hakumwila ninji, Eyi Konelisu.
45010004 Niyena chanamushinshikiyi kang’elu swi-i, hakutiya woma ninji, Chumanyi Mwanta? Yena hakumwila ninji, Kulombela kweyi kwakuvulu niyamukunkulu yeyi yinashiki kuji Nzambi, anakwanuki nachu.
45010005 Jichi jinu, temeshaku amayala kuYopa, akaleti Shimona atumbiluwu izhina jikwawu jaPetulu;
45010006 washakama kwamuntu wumu izhina jinji Shimona, mukwakuloomba yitembi, wukweti itala jinji kwakwihi nakalung’alwizhi.
45010007 Chanayiyi kang’elu wajing’i nakuhosha ninji, Konelisu hakutambika ang’amba zhinji ayeji, niishijika wumu wukweti kalemesha kakulemesha Nzambi, wowu akwakumwimena hefuku hefuku.
45010008 Hakuyihitila mwezhima mwanamulezhuwu kuji kang’elu, hakuyitemesha kuYopa.
45010009 Chikunachi, achiji kuya munzhila yawu, hiyakuya nakuswila kwakwihi namukalowu, Petulu hakukanjuka hewulu jetala alombeli, kwizhi neyi hampinzhi yamuchitanu nayimu (12:00 hls).
45010010 Hakutachika kutiya nzala, hakukeng’a kujya. Hachiji kulong’eshawu kujya, Petulu hakukeng’a kuya mutulu, hakumona chimwenu.
45010011 Wamweni iwulu hiyakujizhikula, nichuma kwizhi chiji neyi ihina jeneni, hichikuzelumuka, hiyakuchizelumwina kumawombu achu awana, chishika niheseki.
45010012 Mwenomu muji anyama anyichiji yezhima, niyuma yazalalang’a hamaseki, nituja twahaluzwizu
45010013 Kuji yena hikukwinza izu jakwila nawu, Eyi Petulu, nyamukaku, wuzhahi, wujyi.
45010014 Ilang’a Petulu ninji, Anha-a, Mwanta! Kanja jehi nijyi chuma chatama hela chamazhiluku.
45010015 Izu hijikwinza kuji yena ipampa jamuchiyeji nawu, Chuma chanatookeshiyi Nzambi, bayi wuchitena neyi chatamaku.
45010016 Chenichi achilili kasatu; chumochu achitambula nikwiwulu hohenohu.

45010017 Hachijing’iyi Petulu kuzhinoka nankashi, ninji chimwenu ichi chinamoni chinayi mujihi? kukasumuka owu amayala atemesheluwu kuji Konelisu, anehuli jehi kwitala jaShimona, anemani jehi kuchisu chachipang’u.
45010018 Hiyakutambika nakwihula nawu, Shimona atumbiluwu izhina jikwawu jaPetulu, washakama kunu?
45010019 Hachijing’iyi Petulu kutong’ozhoka nsang’u yachimwenu ochu, Spilitu hakumwila ninji, Tala, amayala asatu anakukeng’i.
45010020 Jichi nyamukaku wusuluki, wuyi nawu chakaji ntaji; yami inayitemeshi.
45010021 Petulu hakusulukila kuji owu amayala ninji, Yami muntu muji nakukeng’a; munenzhiliji?

45010022 Nawu, Mukulumpi wamashijika Konelisu, muntu walong’a waakamang’a Nzambi, amuhamekang’a kuji munza wezhima wawaYujeya, anamulezhi kuji kang’elu wazhila nawu akakutambiki wuyi kwitala jinji, kulonja atiyi mazu kujeyi.
45010023 Petulu hakuyitambika mwitala hakuyilezha kwakukama. Chikunachi hakunyamuka hakuya nawu, nianakwinji amakwawu akuYopa hiyakumutwalaku.
45010024 Chikunachi ifuku jikwawu hiyakwing’ila muKesaleya, kuwana Konelisu wuji nakuyiching’ilila, wapompesha jehi antang’a zhinji niamabwambu zhinji ajikunjayi nawu.
45010025 Chaneng’iliyi Petulu, Konelisu hakumubulakana, hakujinata kunyenju yinji nakujifukula kuji yena.
45010026 Ilang’a Petulu hakumuhinjwisha ninji, Imanaku; ninami nawa nimuntu kwami.
45010027 Iku wuji nakuhosha ninji hakwing’ila, hakuwana antu amavulu anapompi jehi.

45010028 Hakuyila ninji, Enu aweni muneluki kaYujeya kushakama namuntu wakumunza wacheng’i hela kwinza kwakwihi ninji, chinzhila. Hela chochu, Nzambi nanlezhi ninji, kutena muntu neyi watama hela wamazhilu, chinzhila.
45010029 Jichi chimwantambika, hinukwinza chakaji ntaji. Jichi nehuli nami mwantambikilaji?

45010030 Kuchinka Konelisu ninji, Munahiti mafuku awana nakushika hampinzhi yinu, najing’i nakulombela mwitala jami hampinzhi yamuchitanu nachiwana (15:00 hls); kukasumuka iyala nemani kuniji, navwali mahina atong’eka chezhezhi.
45010031 Ninji, Eyi Konelisu, kulombela kweyi anakutiyi, niyamukunkulu yeyi anayanuki kuji Nzambi.
45010032 Jichi jinu, temeshaku antu kuYopa wakatambiki Shimona atumbiluwu izhina jikwawu jaPetulu, akenzi kujeyi; yena wekala kwaShimona mukwakuloomba yitembi kuchikumu chakalung’alwizhi.
45010033 Jichi hinukukutemeshela antu hohenohu. Chinawahi mwani chiwunenzi. Jichi jinu, yetu awa tuji kunu kumesu aNzambi wezhima wetu, kulonja tutiyi yezhima yanakulezhuwu kuji Mwanta.
45010034 Putulu hakuhosha ninji, Mwalala, namoni komana Nzambi haakamang’a antu kumesuku,
45010035 hakwila munyunza yezhima, muntu wamwakamang’a yena, welang’a mwalong’a, amutiyang’a kuwaha kuji Nzambi.
45010036 Enu aweni mweluka izu jatemesheliyi Nzambi kuji aIsalela, nakushimuna nsang’u yayiwahi yakuwunja muji Yesu Klistu. Yena jiyi Mwanta wawantu ezhima.
45010037 Nsang’u iyi enu aweni mwayiluka, yatiyakeni mwahita Yujeya mwezhima; yatachikilili kuNG’aliliya hakumishiluwu chizhimikilu chashimwiniyi Yowanu.

45010038 Mwatiya jehi nsang’u yakutena Yesu wakuNazaleta, chamuwayishiluwu kuji Nzambi naSpilitu Wazhila nang’ovu; yena wahitang’enang’a nakwila yayiwahi, nakukolesha antu ezhima akabishilang’awu kuji jiyabolu, mulong’a Nzambi wajing’i nayena.
45010039 Yetu ayinsahu twamweni namesu mwezhima mweliliyi mwitung’a jawaYujeya nimuYelusalema; yena nawa amuzhahili, nakumukujika hamutonju.
45010040 Yena amusang’wili kuji Nzambi muji afu ifuku jamuchisatu;
45010041 hakumumwekesha hatooka, bayi kuji antu ezhimaku, ilang’a kujetu ayinsahu akutonjang’ahu jehi kuji Nzambi, yetu twelili nikujya nikunwa ninji heliliyi nasang’uki jehi muji afu.
45010042 Yena hakutulezha ninji tushimwini antu, tushimuni wunsahu wakutena netu yenowu jiyi anafuukuluwu kuji Nzambi kwikala mukwakusompesha niamomi niafu.
45010043 Amushimunang’a wunsahu kuji atuplofwetu ezhima, nawu mwizhina jinji antu ezhima ákumukuhwelela akamona kuyanakena nshiji.
45010044 Iku Petulu wuchiji kuhosha mazu awa, Spilitu Wazhila hakuholokela haji antu ezhima ajing’i nakutiya.
45010045 Niakwakwalama enzhili naPetulu ajing’i akuhwelela, chanachimonuwu, hiyakuhayama wezhima wawu nawu, Komana haji aZHentili nihena nawa anechiluhu chamukunkulu chaSpilitu Wazhila.
45010046 Mulong’a atiyili hiyakuhosha majimi acheng’i nakumutohesha Nzambi.
45010047 Petulu hakwila ninji, Muntwinyi natweshi kulekesha menzhi, abuli kuyizhimika awa anatambuli Spilitu Wazhila mwomutwatambwili ninetu?
45010048 Hakuyila ninji ayizhimiki mwizhina jaYesu Klistu. Hiyakumulembelela nawu ashakamuku mafuku amakwawu.
45011001 Apostolu nianakwawu amuYujeya, hiyakutiya nawu aZHentili niwena nawa anatambuli jehi izu jaNzambi.
45011002 Chanenziyi Petulu kuYelusalema, akwakwalama hiyakutajika ninji,
45011003 nawu, Eyi weng’ilili mwawayijima, hiwukujya nawu.
45011004 Petulu hakutachika kuyilumbulwila mwahitili nsang’u yezhima.

45011005 Ninji, Chinajing’i kumukala waYopa nakulombela, hinukukeng’a kuya mutulu, muchimwenu hinukumona chuma kwizhi chiji neyi ihina jeneni, hichikuzelumuka, hiyakuchizelumuna kwiwulu kuchajing’i kumawombu achu awana, chishika nikujami.
45011006 Kushinshikamu hinukumona muji anyama ahanu heseki, nianyama amumpata, niyuma yazalalang’a, nituja twahaluzwizu.
45011007 Hinukutiya izu nawu, Eyi Petulu, nyamukaku, wuzhahi, wujyi.
45011008 Ami hinukwila nami, Anha-a, Mwanta, kanja jehi nijyi chuma chatama hela chamazhiluku.
45011009 Izu hijikwakula kwiwulu kamuchiyeji nawu, Chuma chanawahishiyi Nzambi, bayi wuchitena neyi chatamaku.
45011010 Chanachiluwu kasatu ayikokela niyezhima mwiwulu.
45011011 Hohenohu kutala amayala asatu, ánatemeshuwu jehi kujami kufuma kuKesaleya, anemani jehi kwitala kutwajing’i.
45011012 Spilitu hakunlezha kuya nawu, chakubula kwakama. Nayili hamu nanawa anakwetu atanu nawumu; twing’ila nimwitala jayenowu iyala.
45011013 Hakutulezha chamweniyi kang’elu nemani mwitala jinji, nichamulezheluwu kuji owu kang’elu ninji, Temeshaku antu kuYopa, akaleti Shimona atumbiluwu izhina jikwawu jaPetulu;
45011014 akakulezhi mazu akuyamwina nineyi niakwetala jeyi ezhima.
45011015 Chinajing’i nakutachika kuhosha, Spilitu Wazhila hakuholokela haji wena, mwomwaholokeleliyi hajetu hakusambila.
45011016 Hinukwanuka mazu aMwanta eliliyi ninji, Chalala Yowanu wazhimikili mumenzhi, hakwila enu akayizhimika muji Spilitu Wazhila.
45011017 Jichi jinu, Nzambi ayinka nichamukunkulu chochimu chatwinkeliyi etu hitwakuhweleleli Mwanta Yesu Klistu, yaminyi mwaka nimoni kujikang’a naNzambi?
45011018 Chanatiyuwu yumiyi, amwena ninzo-o; hiyakumulemesha Nzambi nawu, Komana Nzambi netezhi aZHentili kubalumuka munyichima amoni wumi.

45011019 Owu apalang’esheluwu nekabisha jasang’umukili hansang’u yaStefwanu hiyakwenja chakushika nikuFwenisiya, nikuKipilosi, nikuAntiyoki, nakushimununa izu jaNzambi kuji aYujeya hohu, bayi kuji acheng’uku.
45011020 KuKipilosi nakuKileni kwajing’i amayala amakwawu avwalikilili kwenoku; wenawa chanashikuwu kuAntiyoki, hiyakuhoshahosha nawaGliki nawa, nakushimuna nsang’u yaMwanta Yesu.
45011021 Chikasa chaMwanta hichikwikala nawena, amavulu nankashi hiyakukuhwelela, hiyakubalumuka nakutala kuji Mwanta.
45011022 Nsang’u yayumiyi yitiyakana nikuji akwachipompelu chajing’i muYelusalema, hiyakutemeshaku Balanaba akashiki nikuAntiyoki.
45011023 Yena chanashikiyi, chanamoniyi wuselewa waNzambi, hakutiya kuwaha; hakuyikonkomwena wezhima wawu ninji akakakeli Mwanta chakutaku muchima.
45011024 Mulong’a wajing’i iyala wamuwahi, wenzala naSpilitu Wazhila nikukuhwelela. Antu amavulu ajibombeli naMwanta.
45011025 Balanaba hakuya nakukeng’a Sawulu kuTalusa. Chanamuwaniyi hakumuleta kuAntiyoki.
45011026 Hiyakupompang’a hamu nachipompelu mwaka wezhima, nakutang’isha antu amavulu nankashi. KuAntiyoki jiku kwasambilili kutenawu atumbanzhi izhina jawakwaKlistu.
45011027 Hamafuku owu, kuYelusalema hikukufuma atuplofwetu hiyakwinza kuAntiyoki.

45011028 Hikukwimana muntu wumu, izhina jinji Agabusi, hakushimunang’ahu jehi naSpilitu ninji kwakenza nzala yeneni mwahita mpata yamunu mwishina yezhima. Nzaloyu yaholokeli hamafuku ajing’iyi Kalujusa mwanta.
45011029 Nochu atumbanzhi ezhima hiyakwila nawu tukwashuku anakwetu aji muYujeya. Hiyakukwasha iwu mwanatwesheliyi, iwu mwanatwesheliyi.
45011030 Chaneluwu mwenimu, hiyakutemesha kuji akulumpi yuma yapompesheluwu, kumakasa aBalanaba naSawulu.
45012001 Kafwampi wowena mafuku owu mwanta Heloji hakwolola makasinji akabishi antu amakwawu amuchipompelu.
45012002 Hakuzhaha Yakoba manakwaYowanu nampoku yakabali.
45012003 Chamweniyi chinatiyishi aYujeya kuwaha, hakubombelaku chuma chikwawu chakukwata niPetulu nawa. Wenowu mafuku ajing’i akujya mankenji akaji ilung’i.
45012004 Chanamukwatiyi, hakumusha mukaleya, hakumwinka kuji mashijika ikumi natanu nawumu (16), amuhembang’a awana awana, ninji Chipanjakenu chisambili kuhita nimwijishi kuji antu.
45012005 Jichi Petulu hiyakumuhembang’a mukaleya; ilang’a akwachipompelu hiyakumulombelelang’a nang’ovu kuji Nzambi.

45012006 Wowena wufuku watong’ozhokelang’ayi Heloji ninji nakamwijisha kumajiki, Petulu wajing’i wakama swatáka mutulu, sang’a amukasilawu mukachi kamashijika ayeji namaleng’i ayeji, anhembi anemani kuchenzelu chakaleya.

45012007 Kukasumuka kang’elu kaMWANTA nemani jehi kwajing’iyi; chezhezhi chitong’eka nimukapeka kamukachi kakaleya. Hakumweta Petulu hakabavu, hakumuhinjwisha mutulu ninji, Nyamukaku swayi. Maleng’i inji aholoka nikumakasinji mbambala.
45012008 Kang’elu hakumwila ninji, Vwalaku, wukasi ninkwabilu zheyi. Hakwila mwenomu. Hakumwila ninji, Jikumbakeshi chikowelu cheyi, wunlonji.
45012009 Ejika nikwijika, hakumulonjela. Chajing’i nakumwilawu kuji kang’elu, yena kwiluka nehi; hakutong’ozhoka ninji namoni chimwenu.

45012010 Chanapanjakanuwu anhembi akusambila niamuchiyeji, hiyakushika kuchenzelu chachikung’u chakuma kung’anja; hichikujenzulukila chacheni. Hiyakwijika, hiyakuya mumukwakwa wumu; hohenohu kang’elu hakujiyila kwinji.

45012011 Petulu chanabazumukiyi ninji, Komana yami! Hakuhosha ninji, Ichi jinu neluki chalala, komana Mwanta natemeshi kang’elu kinji, nampulwishi jehi kuchikasa chaHeloji, nimwezhima mwajing’i nakuching’ezhawu aYujeya.
45012012 Chanatong’ozhokiyi, hakuya kwitala jaMaliya, mama yaYowanu atumbiluwu izhina jikwawu jaMaku, mwapompelawu jehi antu amavulu nakulombela.
45012013 Chanajonjomweniyi kuchenzelu chakuchipang’u, hikukwinza chang’ajima chamumbanja, izhina jinji Loja, kulonja atiyilili.
45012014 Chanelukiyi izu jaPetulu, hamweni zhakumwenzulwilaku nakuzang’alala kwanatiyiyi. Hakufunta lufuchi nakulezha akwawu ninji, Petulu nemani kuchisu iwu.
45012015 Wena hiyakumwila nawu, Eyi wunaanjali! Yena hakukolesha chikupu ninji, Jiyi Petulu. Wena nawu, Kwizhi hikang’elu kinji.
45012016 Ilang’a Petulu sang’a ajonjomwenayi. Chanenzululuwu, hiyakumumona hiyakuhayama.
45012017 Ilang’a yena hakuyimwenesha nachikasa; hakuyilumbulwila mwanamwijishiluwu mukaleya kuji Mwanta. Hakuyila ninji, Mumulezhang’amu Yakoba nianakwetu. Hakufumaku, hakuya kwacheng’i.
45012018 Chikunachi, kuji mashijika hikukuvwakuka ipumba, nawu Petulu nayi kujihi?
45012019 Heloji chanamwiliyi keng’e-e, kumumona nehi, hakuyihuzhola anhembi; hakuhosha ninji yizhahenu. Heloji hakufuma kuYujeya, hakukunkumuka kuKesaleya, ashakama nikwenoku.

45012020 Heloji hakutiya kutama nankashi nawakwaTila naSijoni, wena hiyakuya kuji yena mukanka, asambila jehi kukwata wubwambu naBalasatu, yowu wahembang’a itala jawanta, hiyakulemba nawu ashakami chachiwahi chakaji kumona nzhita; mulong’a itung’a jawu jatambwilang’a kujya kwitung’a jamwanta.
45012021 Hashikili ifuku jakutong’ola jehi, Heloji hakuvwalavwala yuma yinji yawanta, hakushakama hetanja jinji jawanta, hakuhosha hoshe-e.
45012022 Antu hiyakubijika nang’ovu nawu, Hiizu jaNzambi, hijamuntuku.
45012023 Hohenohu amweta nikuji kang’elu kaMWANTA, nanochu chabuliliyi kulemesha Nzambi; hiyakumujya kuji mavunu, afwa nikufwa.
45012024 Ilang’a izu jaNzambi hijikutiyakana nikutanja.
45012025 ABalanaba naSawulu chanamanishuwu mujimu wawu, hiyakufuma kuYelusalema kwayiluwu, hiyakumuhitula Yowanu atumbiluwu izhina jikwawu jaMaku.

45013001 Muchipompelu chajing’i kuAntiyoki mwajing’i atuplofwetu niankulung’ang’a, iwu Balanaba, iwu Simeyona atumbiluwu izhina jikwawu jaNigeli, iwu Lusiyu wakuKileni, iwu Manena aleleleluwu hamu nanowu mwanta Heloji, niSawulu.
45013002 Chajing’i nakujifukulawu kuji Mwanta, nakuzhing’a nakuleka kujya, Spilitu Wazhila hakwila ninji, Ng’ambwilenuku Balanaba naSawulu akeli mujimu wunayitambikilili.
45013003 Chanazhing’uwu cheng’i nakuleka kujya, hiyakulombela, hiyakuyinang’ika makasawu, hiyakuyitemesha nawu ayi.
45013004 Wena cheliluwu anayitemeshi jehi kuji Spilitu Wazhila, hiyakuya kuSelusiya, kufuma kwenoku hiyakuya muwatu kuKipilosi.
45013005 Chanashikuwu kuSalamisa, hiyakushimuna izu jaNzambi mumashikola awaYujeya. Ajing’i naYowanu Maku kulonja ekali nkwashi yawu.
45013006 Chanahituwu muchitutu chezhima nikuPafwosi, hiyakuwana katepa wumu hikaplofwetu wakutwamba, kaYujeya, izhina jinji Balayesu.
45013007 Yenowu wajing’i hamu namwanta wamukala, izhina jinji Selizhi Pawulu, iyala wukweti kashinshi. Yena hakutambika aBalanaba naSawulu, hakukeng’a ninji atiyi izu jaNzambi.
45013008 Ilang’a owu katepa Elimasi, jimu mwalumbulukila izhina jinji, hakujikang’a nawu, ninji aluwang’eshi owu mwanta wamukala abuli kukuhwelela.
45013009 Ilang’a Sawulu, atenang’awu nawu Pawulu, wenzala naSpilitu Wazhila, hakumushinshika swi-i,
45013010 ninji, Eyi mwana kajiyabolu, eyi waswezha kujimbana nikutama, eyi mukwankunyi nakulong’a kwezhima, wamba kaleka kuheng’esha nzhila zhaMwanta zhalong’a mwaakanyi?

45013011 Jichi jinu tiya, chikasa chaMwanta chikukukunka, wakekala mputamesu; múkuhita chilaaka hiwakamona mwaanaku. Hohenohu kúmuholokela nimbunju nimwijima bwi-i; hakukimbuka nakukeng’akeng’a muntu wakumukwata kuchikasa.
45013012 Owu mwanta wamukala, chanamoniyi chaneluwu, hakukuhwelela, nahayami jehi ntang’ishilu yakutena Mwanta.
45013013 Pawulu nawakwawu hiyakufuma kuPafwosi muwatu, ashika nikuPelega muPamfwiliya; kwenoku Yowanu Maku hakuyishiya, hakufunta kuYelusalema.
45013014 Ilang’a wena hiyakuhita muPelega, hiyakushika kuAntiyoki wamuPisijiya. Hiyakwing’ila mushikola haSabata, hiyakushakama.

45013015 Cheliluwu enimbu anakumishi jehi kutang’a nyikanja yazhila yanshimbi niyawatuplofwetu, anyuuli zhashikola hiyakuyitemeshela izu nawu, Enu anakwetu, neyi mukwetuhu izu jakukunjezha hela jakukonkomwena, jihoshenu.
45013016 Pawulu hakwimana, hakwolola chikasa ninji, Enu akwetu aIsalela, ninenu mwaakamang’a Nzambi, tiyililenu.
45013017 Nzambi yaniwu munza waIsalela watonjeli ankakulula zhetu, watuumbakesheli iwu munza hashakaminuwu mwitung’a jaEzhipitu, hakuyiijishamu nachikasa chang’ovu.
45013018 Hakukaba nawu omu muchinkalampata nyaka makumi awana (40).
45013019 Chanazhilumuniyi nyunza yitanu nayiyeji mwitung’a jaKenani, hakuyinka itung’a jawu jiikali wuswana wawu, mwahitili nyaka kafwampi neyi nkulakazhi zhiwana nanyaka makumi atanu (450).
45013020 Mwezhimomu hakuyinkang’a ansompeshi nichashikiluwu haji kaplofwetu Samweli.
45013021 Nkumininaku hiyakulomba mwanta wankanu. Nzambi hakuyinka mwana kaKishi, Sawulu, iyala wakumunza waBenzhamini, himukuhita nyaka makumi awana (40).

45013022 Chanamufumishuwu yena, hakujiishamu Davidi ekali mwanta wawu; niyena nawa wamushimwini wunsahu ninji, Namoni jehi mwana kaZHesi, Davidi, Iyala jamwaya muchima wami, Jiyi wakela munakeng’a mwezhima.
45013023 Kwokuji anyana kayeniwu, mwomwakaniniyi jehi Nzambi, naleteli jehi Isalela Chamwinu, Yesu.
45013024 Hajing’iyi Yesu kanja amwekani, Yowanu wasambililang’ahu jehi kushimwina munza waIsalela wezhima chizhimikilu chakubalumuka munyichima.

45013025 Helili Yowanu hakuya nakumanisha mafuku inji, hakuyila antu ninji, Enu munatong’ozhoki nenu yaminyi? Ami hiniKlistuku. Tiyenu, munyima yami imu muji nakwinza muntu, ami hinatelela hela tuhu kusubula nkwabilu zhakunyenju yinjuku.
45013026 Enu anakwetu, enu anyana akumuchiji waAbalahama, ninenu mwaakamang’a Nzambi, tiyenu, anatutemesheli jehi izu jawamwinu weniwu.

45013027 Chamuyambiluwu Yesu kuji antu ekala muYelusalema, hamu nawanyuuli zhawu, chabuliluwu kwiluka nimazu awatuplofwetu atang’ang’awu haSabata zhezhima, mazu awa analumbuluki jehi nanochu chamuhishiluwu.
45013028 Cheliluwu wena kumumona nachitela chakumuzhahila nehi, hiyakumulomba Pilatu nawu ching’a amuzhahi tuhu.
45013029 Chanamanishuwu yuma yamusonekeleluwu yezhima, hiyakumukulula hamutonju, nakumukamika mwizhamu.
45013030 Ilang’a Nzambi hakumusang’ula muji afu.
45013031 Hiyakumumona mafuku amavulu kuji antu afuminiyi nawu muNG’aliliya nakushika kuYelusalema. Ichi jinu, wena hiyayinsahu zhinji akushimuna kuji antu mwamwenuwu.
45013032 Jiyi nsang’u yayiwahi yitunayileteli, yayikaninuwu ankakulula zhetu.
45013033 Chamusang’wiluwu jehi Yesu muji afu kuji Nzambi, chinalumbulukili jehi anyanetu, mwomwasonekeluwu muIsamu jamuchiyeji nawu, Yeyi Mwanami, nakuvwali lelu.
45013034 Nikweniku kusang’ula kwamusang’wiluwu kuji Nzambi muji afu, kwakubula kufunta cheng’i mukutoka, wahoshelumu jehi mwenimu ninji, Nakakukiswila nkisu yaDavidi, yazhila yalala.
45013035 Nahoshi nawa muIsamu jikwawu ninji, Hiwaketezha weyi Wazhila kumona kutokaku.
45013036 Mulong’a Davidi, chamanishiliyi kukalakela akwawu ahanyaka yinji mwaya mpúng’a yaNzambi, wayili mutulu; hiyakumukamika kwakama ankakulula zhinji, yotoka nikutoka.
45013037 Hakwila iwu asang’ulawu jehi kuji Nzambi hamweni kutokaku.
45013038 Jichi enu anakwetu, leka niyilezhi mwiluki chachiwahi, nami mwizhina jayeniwu muntu itukuyishimwina, jimu mwekala kuyanakena antu nshiji.
45013039 Antu ezhima akukuhwelela, akuyiying’isha nakuyitena along’a kuyuma yezhima mwakang’enyuwu kuyiying’isha nakuyitena along’a nanshimbi yaMosi.
45013040 Jichi babalenu, mubuli kumona mwanahoshuwu munyikanja yawatuplofwetu,
45013041 nawu, Tiyenu jinu, enu akwakajiwu, Muhayami, munong’i. Ami nukukong’a mujimu mumafuku enu, Mujimu owu hela akayilezhawu kuji muntu himwakawitiya nihantuku.
45013042 Chanejikuwu, hiyakuyilembelela nawu akayilezhuhu cheng’i nsang’u iyi haSabata yikulonjelamu.

45013043 Chanamwang’aluwu mwenomu mushikola, aYujeya amavulu ninawa abalumukili kwikala aYujeya, akwakulemesha Nzambi, hiyakulonja aPawulu naBalanaba; wena hiyakuhosha nawu nakuyishinzhila kukakela muluwi lwaNzambi.
45013044 Sabata yalonjelumu, kwasheli hanti nakupompa ng’anja yezhima kulonja atiyi izu jaNzambi.
45013045 Ilang’a aYujeya chamwenuwu antu amavulu, hiyakutiya ichima jaswezha; hiyakutajika yuma yajing’i nakuhoshayi Pawulu, hiyakuhosha mazu atama.

45013046 APawulu naBalanaba hiyakuhosha chakaji woma nawu, Chinawahi chitunasambili kushimuna izu jaNzambi kujenu aYujeya; hakwinzichi chimunayishinzhikili jehi kwakulehi nanenu, munajifuukuli enu aweni nenu himunateli kwenu wumi wahayanyakaku. Talenu, etu kwetu hitukubalumukila kuji aZHentili.
45013047 Mulong’a jichi chanatulezhiyi Mwanta, ninji, Nakushili kwikala chezhezhi chawaZHentili, Kulonja wakeli wakwamwina antu kushika nikwakumina maseki.
45013048 Chanachitiyuwu aZHentili, hiyakutiya kuwaha, hiyakulemesha izu jaNzambi. Wezhima wawu afuukwilawu jehi kumona wumi wahayanyaka hiyakukuhwelela.
45013049 Izu jaMwanta jitiyakana nimwahita mutambowu wezhima, ti-li-li.

45013050 Ilang’a aYujeya hiyakusang’umuna ambanja alumbwa, akwakuhameka Nzambi, niakulumpi amayala amung’anjoyu, hiyakusang’umuna ikabisha jakukabisha aPawulu naBalanaba, hiyakuyihang’a mung’inza zhawu.
45013051 Ilang’a wena hiyakutotomona lunkung’u lwakunyenju yawu, hiyakuya kuIkoniyumu.
45013052 Atumbanzhi aswezheli muzang’alu nikwinzala naSpilitu Wazhila.
45014001 MuIkoniyumu hiyakwing’ila mwayeji wawu mushikola yawaYujeya, hiyakuhosha chakwila niizaza jawaYujeya nijawaGliki jajeni hiyakukuhwelela.
45014002 Hakwila aYujeya, ábulili kwovwahilamu, hiyakusang’umuna aZHentili kulonja atiyi anakwetu kutama.
45014003 Jichi hiyakulabila kwenoku mafuku amavulu nakuhosha muji Mwanta chakaji woma; Mwanta hakukolesha wunsahu wamazu aluwi lwinji; hakwitezha kukong’a yinzhikizhilu niyihayamisha namakasawu.
45014004 Izaza jamung’anjoyu hijikwambuka; awa nakukunjamena aYujeya, awa nakukunjamena apostolu.
45014005 Chanafukuluwu aZHentili nawaYujeya, hamu nawanyuuli zhawu, nawu ayikong’i apostolu chatama, ayasoli malola,
45014006 hiyakuchiluka, hiyakutemukila kung’anja zhamuLikoniya, zhozhaListila naJelibi, nikwilung’a janyeng’umukaku;
45014007 hiyakushimuna nsang’u yayiwahi kwenoku.
45014008 KuListila kwajing’i iyala wabula ng’ovu kunyenju, kanja enjang’ahu jehi kufumisha havwalikiliyi.
45014009 Yenowu hakutiya mwajing’i nakuhoshayi Pawulu. Pawulu hakumushinshika swi-i, hakumumona ninji wukweti kukuhwelela kwakumukolesha;
45014010 hakuhosha nezu jang’ovu ninji, Imanaku zululu. Yotakumuka nikutakumuka, enja nikwenja.
45014011 Mazaza awantu, chanamonuwu chuma chaneliyi Pawulu, hiyakubijika mwijimi jaLikoniya nawu, Akishi anatusulukili nanyizhimba yafwana neyi antu.
45014012 Hiyakutumba Balanaba nawu Zewusi; Pawulu nawu Helemi, mulong’a jiyi waswezhelang’a kuhosha.
45014013 Chikombezhi chaZewusi wukweti Tembeli yinji kwakwihi nang’anjoyu, hakuleta ang’ombi niyibaaba yamafu kuchisu chang’anja, ninji niyena hamu namazaza ayiketwili yimuna.
45014014 Ilang’a apostolu, aBalanaba naPawulu, chanachitiyuwu, hiyakutabola mahinawu, hiyakulunjumukila mwizaza jawantu;

45014015 hiyakubijika nawu, Enu akwetu, iyi yuma yimukwila yanka? Etu nawa tuyantu twatiyang’a mumwatiyang’enu; tunayileteli nsang’u yayiwahi, yakwila netu muleki yumiyi yamukunkulwayi, mubalumuki munyichima, mutali kuji Nzambi wamumi waleng’eli iwulu niiseki, nikalung’alwizhi niyezhima yekalamu.
45014016 Nyaka yinahiti jehi munyima wetezheli nyunza yezhima ninji yenji tuhu munzhila zhawu awenawu.

45014017 Hela chochu, hayilekeli tuhu chakaji kuyishiyila wunsahu winji wakwila chachiwahuku. Wayinkelang’a nvula yakufuma kwiwulu, niyilaaka yakujya, nakuyitiyisha kuwaha nayakujya, nikulung’a mwaya nyichima yenu mwezhima.
45014018 Chahoshelang’awu mazu awa, hasheli hanti nakukang’anya kulekesha mazaza awantu kuyiketwila yimuna.

45014019 Kwenoku hikukwinza aYujeya anafumi jehi kuAntiyoki wamuPisijiya nikuIkoniyumu, wena chanakanzhikizhuwu mazaza awantu, hiyakumwasola Pawulu malola. Chanatong’ozhokuwu nawu wafwa jehi, hiyakumukokela hanzi yang’anja.
45014020 Chajing’i nakwimanawu atumbanzhi kwakwihi nayena kwi-njo, hakunyamuka, hakwing’ila cheng’i mung’anjoyu. Chikunachi hakufumamu naBalanaba, hiyakuya kuJelibi.
45014021 Chanashimunuwu nsang’u yayiwahi mung’anjoyu nakwilisha atumbanzhi amavulu, hiyakufunta cheng’i kuListila, nakuIkoniyumu, nikuAntiyoki wamuPisijiya.
45014022 Hiyakukolesha nyichima yawatumbanzhi, nakuyikonkomwena nawu akakeli muchikuhwelelu, nawu kwing’ila muwanta waNzambi ching’a tusambila kumona lukaji lwaluvulu nankashi.
45014023 Chanayitonjeluwu akulumpi mwahita yipompelu yezhima nakulombela nakuleka kujya, hiyakuyikunzhika kuji Mwanta anakuhweleluwu.
45014024 Hiyakupanjakana muPisijiya, ashika nikuPamfwiliya.
45014025 Chanashimunuwu izu jaNzambi muPelega, hiyakukunkumuka kuAtaliya.
45014026 Kufuma kwenoku hiyakuya muwatu kuAntiyoki, kwayikunzhikiluwu kuluwi lwaNzambi akayi nakwila mujimu waneluwu jehi.
45014027 Chanashikuwu, hiyakupompesha chipompelu, hiyakushimuna yuma yezhima yaneliyi Nzambi nawena, ninichi chanayenzulwiluwu aZHentili chenzelu chakukuhwelela.
45014028 Hiyakushakama nawatumbanzhi mafuku amavulu.
45015001 KuYujeya hikukufuma antu amakwawu hiyakutang’isha akwakukuhwelela nawu, Ching’a akayalamisha mwaya chizhila chaMosi kulonja mwakahanji.
45015002 Chanatajikuwu nawaPawulu naBalanaba tajike-e, nikujihuzhola nawu, hiyakukunzhika aPawulu naBalanaba niakwawu, akayi nansang’u iyi kuYelusalema kuji apostolu nawakulumpi.
45015003 Jichi chipompelu hichikuyishinzhikizhaku munzhila yawu; hiyakuhita muFwenisiya nimuSamaliya nakushimuna chanabalumukuwu aZHentili; hiyakuyilung’isha nankashi anakwawu ezhima.
45015004 Chanashikuwu kuYelusalema, hiyakuyitambula kuji chipompelu nikuji apostolu nawakulumpi, hiyakuyishimwina mwezhima mwaneliyi Nzambi nawena.
45015005 Hikukunyamuka akwachaaku chawaFwalisewu amakwawu akuhwelela jehi, hiyakwila nawu, Ching’a ayalamishi, ayitang’ishi nawa kuhemba nshimbi yaMosi.
45015006 Apostolu nawakulumpi hiyakupompa nakutong’ozhoka nsang’u iyi hamu.

45015007 Chanajihuzholuwu ihuzhole-e, Petulu hakwimana nakuyila ninji, Enu anakwetu, enu aweni mweluka jehi chantonjeluwu kuji Nzambi mukachi kenu hamafuku akusambila, kulonja aZHentili atiyi mazu ansang’u yayiwahi kukanwa kami, amoni kukuhwelela.
45015008 Jichi Nzambi, weluka nyichima yawantu, washimuna jehi wunsahu wakuyinka Spilitu Wazhila mwomwatwinkeleliyi etu.
45015009 Kwambula mukachi kawena nanetu nehi, natookeshi jehi nyichima yawu nakukuhwelela.
45015010 Enu munakeng’eliji kumweseka Nzambi, chakwing’izha nshing’u zhawatumbanzhi mumpanja yakang’enyuwu kusenja hela ankakulula zhetu hela etu aweni?
45015011 Etu tunakuhweleli netu akatuhanjisha naluwi lwaMwanta Yesu, mwomwakayihanjishilawu niwena nawa.
45015012 Izaza jawantu jezhima jimwena ninzo-o. Hiyakutiyilila nsang’u zhajing’i nakushimunawu aBalanaba naPawulu, zhayinzhikizhilu nayihayamisha yanakong’iyi Nzambi nawena mukachi kawaZHentili.
45015013 Chanamwenuwu nzo-o, Yakoba hakwakula ninji, Enu anakwetu, ntiyililenu.
45015014 Shimona nashimuni jehi chasambililiyi Nzambi kuhempula aZHentili, kulonja kutambwilamu antu ambala ezhina jinji;
45015015 mwomwaya mazu awatuplofwetu asonekeluwu jehi,
45015016 nawu, Hakulonjela hayumiyi nakafunta, Nakatung’ulula cheng’i tabanaka yaDavidi yinashiwuki; Nakazhikazhika munahumoki, nakayimika cheng’i;
45015017 kulonja antu anashali akakeng’akeng’i MWANTA, NiaZHentili ezhima anatumbuwu izhina jami.
45015018 Jichi chanahoshiyi MWANTA welukishang’a yuma yezhimiyi kufumisha kushankulu.
45015019 Jichi ami naketuli jehi nsang’u, nami bayi tukabisha aZHentili akubalumukila kuji Nzambuku;
45015020 ilang’a tukuminenu jakuyisonekela netu aleki yuma yakupesha nachu akishi, niwuzhila, nianyama akushotomona, nimashi.
45015021 Mulong’a kufumisha kushankulu Mosi wukweti akwakumushimuna munyikala yezhima, enja atang’a nyikanja yinji yazhila mumashikola Sabata zhezhima.

45015022 Jichi apostolu nawakulumpi, hamu nachipompelu chezhima, hiyakutong’ozhoka nawu, chachiwahi kutonja mukachi ketu amayala, tuyitemeshi kuAntiyoki naPawulu naBalanaba. Hiyakutonja Yuja atumbiluwu izhina jikwawu jaBalasaba, niSilasi; ajing’i amayala alema mukachi kawanakwawu.
45015023 Hiyakuyinka mukanja wakwila nawu, Etu apostolu nawanakwenu akulumpi, Tunayimushi enu anakwetu amuji aZHentili muji nikuAntiyoki, nimuSiliya, nimuSilisiya.
45015024 Tunatiyi nawu kunu kujetu kunafumi antu amakwawu, anenzi nakuyikabisha namazu akuluwang’esha nyichima yenu; etu kwetu hitwayilezheli mwoku.
45015025 Tunatiyang’ani namuchima wumu netu chachiwahi tutonji amayala, tuyitemeshi oku kujenu, hamu nawakwetu aBalanaba naPawulu twakeng’a,
45015026 amayala akeng’eli kufwa kukoola izhina jaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu.
45015027 Jichi tunatemeshi Yuja naSilasi, awenawu akayilezha mukanwa mwomumu.
45015028 Mulong’a Spilitu Wazhila ninetu tunatong’ozhoki netu bayi tuyitwika chisenja chakubajika yumiyi yalemaku.
45015029 Netu, ching’a muleki yuma yakupesha nachu akishi, nimashi, nianyama akushotomona, niwuzhila. Neyi mukujihemba kuyumiyi chikuwaha. Shalenu chachiwahi.
45015030 Jichi wena chanayishinzhikizhuwu, hiyakukunkumukila kuAntiyoki; hiyakupompesha chipompelu, ayinka ninowu mukanja.
45015031 Chanawutang’uwu, hiyakuzang’alala nakukunjezha kwanayikunjezhuwu.
45015032 Yuja naSilasi awenawu ajing’i atuplofwetu nawa, hiyakukunjezha anakwawu namazu amavulu, ayikolesha nikuyikolesha.
45015033 Chanashakamuwu mpinzhi kwenoku, anakwawu hiyakuyishinzhikizha mukuwunja,
45015034 afunti kuji apostolu áyitemesheli.
45015035 APawulu naBalanaba hiyakulabila kuAntiyoki, nakutang’isha nikushimuna izu jaMwanta, hamu nawakwawu amavulu nawa.
45015036 Chimunahiti mafuku, Pawulu hakumwila Balanaba ninji, Tufuntenu nakuhempula hempula anakwetu amunyikala yezhima mutwashimwini izu jaMwanta, twakatali chanashakamuwu.
45015037 Balanaba hakwila ninji ayi hamu naYowanu atenawu izhina jikwawu jaMaku.
45015038 Ilang’a Pawulu hakutong’ozhoka ninji chatama kuya nayenowu wayishiyili kuPamfwiliya, wabulili kuya nawu kumujimu.
45015039 Kúvulumuka nintaji yayeni, hiyakwambuka; Balanaba hakusenja Maku hakuya kuKipilosi muwatu.
45015040 Hakwila Pawulu hakutonja Silasi; chanamukunzhikuwu kuluwi lwaMwanta kuji anakwinji, hakuya munzhila yinji.
45015041 Hakuhita muSiliya nimuSilisiya, nakukolesha yipompelu.
45016001 Hakushika kuJelibi nikuListila. Kutala kuji kambanzhi wumu kwenoku, izhina jinji Timotewu, mwana kamumbanja wakaYujeya mukwakukuhwelela; hakwila tata yinji wajing’i kaGliki.
45016002 Himuntu ahamekawu kuji anakwinji ajing’i kuListila nakuIkoniyumu.

45016003 Hiyakumukeng’a kuji Pawulu ninji ayang’a ninji. Chanamutambuliyi hakumwalamisha, mulong’a waakamini aYujeya ajing’i munyikala yakwenoku, mulong’a antu ezhima eluka jehi nawu tata yinji kaGliki.
45016004 Chayilang’awu nakuhitahita munyikala, hiyakuyilezhalezha yizhila yayilezheluwu kuji apostolu nawakulumpi kuYelusalema, nawu ayovwahili.
45016005 Yipompelu hiyikujikolesha muchikuhwelelu, akwakukuhwelela hiyakuya nakuvula hefuku hefuku.
45016006 Hiyakupanjakana kuFwilizhiya nakuNG’alizha, mulong’a Spilitu Wazhila wayilekesha jehi kushimuna izu jaNzambi muAsiya.
45016007 Chanashikuwu kung’inza yaMisiya, nawu eseki kuya kuBitiniya, Spilitu waYesu kuyitezha nehi.
45016008 Hiyakupanjakana Misiya, akunkumukila nikuTilowasi.
45016009 Pawulu hakumona chimwenu nawufuku; hakumona iyala wakuMasijoniya, nemani nakumulembelela ninji, Zambukilaku kunu kuMasijoniya, wutukwashuku.
45016010 Chanamoniyi chimwenu ochu, hohenohu tukeng’a nikuya kuMasijoniya, tuneluki jehi netu Nzambi natutambiki, kulonja twakashimuni nsang’u yayiwahi kuji antu akwenoku.
45016011 Jichi hitukufuma kuTilowasi muwatu, twimakana nzwa-a nikuSamotilasi; chikunachi tushika nikuNeyapoli.
45016012 Tufuma nikwenoku tuya nikuFwilipi, yoying’anja yamuMasijoniya yalema, mwatung’ishawu jehi aLoma mashijikawu. Hitukulabila mung’anjoyu mafuku amakwawu.

45016013 Hitukwijika kuchisu chamung’anja haSabata, hitukuya kuchikumu chakalong’a, kutwatong’ozhokeli netu kwizhi jiku kwapompelang’awu nakulombela. Hitukushakama nakuhoshahosha nawambanja apompeli kwenoku.

45016014 Mumbanja wumu, izhina jinji Lijiya, wakumukala waTiyatila, mukwakulanjisha mahina awusombu, mukwakuhameka Nzambi, hakututiya. Mwanta hakwenzulula mumuchima winji, kulonja atambuli nsang’u yakuhoshayi Pawulu.
45016015 Chanamuzhimikuwu niyena niakwetala jinji, hakutulembelela ninji, Neyi munanmoni nenu namukuhweleli Mwanta, ing’ilenu mwitala jami tushakami nenu. Hakutushinzhila chakutushinzhila.
45016016 Chelili hitukuya kwalombelelang’awu, hiyakutubulakana kuji chang’ajima chamumbanja, wajing’i naspilitu yakuhong’a, ng’ombu yinji jiyi yaheteshang’ayi nachu anyanta zhinji.
45016017 Yenowu hakulonjang’a Pawulu nanetu nakubijika ninji, Awa amayala hiyang’amba zhaNzambi Mukwakubajika, hiyakuyishimwina nzhila yakuhanjila.

45016018 Hakwilang’a mwenimu mwahita mafuku amavulu. Ilang’a Pawulu hakutiya kumuchima bwi-i; hakushetumuka nakumwila owu spilitu ninji, Nakulezhi mwizhina jaYesu Klistu, nami mufumi. Amufuma nihohenohu.
45016019 Anyanta zhinji, chanamonuwu mwakuhwelelang’awu kuheta munakumi jehi, hiyakukwata aPawulu naSilasi, hiyakuyikokela kuwulanjilu, kumesu awanyuuli.
45016020 Chanayitwaluwu kuji ansompeshi, hiyakwila nawu, AYujeya awa hiyatuvuba aji nakukabisha nankashi ng’anja yetu.
45016021 Hiyakututang’isha yaaku, kuyitambula hela kuyovwahila kujetu aLoma chinzhila.
45016022 Izaza hijikuyilunjumukila nanjombu, ansompeshi hiyakuyitabwila mahinawu, hiyakulezha mashijika nawu yetenu natubama.
45016023 Chanayetuwu tubama twatuvulu hiyakuyinatila mukaleya; hiyakulezha mukwakuhemba kaleya, nawu ayihembi chachiwahi.
45016024 Yena chanamulezhuwu ochu, hakuyishinzhikila mukatala kamukachi kakaleya, hakupata nyenju yawu mumpompa.
45016025 Ilang’a mukachi kawufuku, aPawulu naSilasi ajing’i nakulombela nakwimbila Nzambi tumina, iku antu amukaleya enja ayitiya.
45016026 Kukasumuka himutentanshi waweni; chikuku chetala jakaleya hichikutenta nte-nte, yenzelu yezhima yenzuluka nihohenohu, maleng’i awantu ezhima amukaleya asubuka nikusubuka.
45016027 Mukwakuhemba kaleya hakubazumuka mutulu, hakumona kuyenzelu yakaleya kwachashi; hakuhola mpoku yinji yakabali, ninji ajizhahi, mulong’a natong’ozhoki ninji antu amukaleya anatemuki jehi.
45016028 Ilang’a Pawulu hakubijika nezu jang’ovu ninji, Bayi wujikatishaku, yetu awa wezhima wetu.
45016029 Mukwakuhemba kaleya hakutambika antu aleti yimunyi, hakukilukilamu, iku wuji nakuzaala woma, hakujinata heseki kunyenju yaPawulu naSilasi.
45016030 Hakuyiijishamu ninji, Enu anyanta, nukwila ng’ahi namwinewi?
45016031 Wena nawu, Mukuhweleli Mwanta Yesu, wamwinewi, nineyi niakwetala jeyi.
45016032 Hiyakushimwina yena, niantu ezhima amwitala jinji, izu jaMwanta.
45016033 Yena hakuyitwala yoyena mpinzhi yawufuku oyu, hakukosakosa nyinkakambu yawu; amuzhimika niyena niayinji ezhima hohenohu.
45016034 Hakuying’izha mwitala jinji, hakuyitentekela yakujya. Hakuzang’alala nankashi chanakuhweleliyi Nzambi niayinji ezhima.
45016035 Chelili kunachi jehi, ansompeshi hiyakutemesha anhembi, nawu, Yilekenu amayala ayi tuhu.
45016036 Mukwakuhemba kaleya hakulezhamu Pawulu, ninji, Ansompeshi anatemeshi izu jakwila nawu, Yenu. Jichi jinu fumenumu muyi chachiwahi.

45016037 Ilang’a Pawulu hakuyila ninji, Kutweta anatweteli hatooka chakaji kutuhisha, kutong’a etu tuyaLoma; hiyakutunatila mukaleya, atufumishumu kumbaji? Chinzhila! Enzang’a kwawu awenawu atufumishumu.
45016038 Anhembi hiyakulezha ansompeshi mazu awa. Chanatiyuwu nawu hiyaLoma, atiya niwoma.
45016039 Hiyakwinza nakuyilembelela. Chanayifumishuwu hiyakulomba nawu, Fumenu mwani kung’anja yetu.
45016040 Hiyakufuma mukaleya hiyakuya kwaLijiya. Chanamonuwu anakwetu nakuyikunjezha, hiyakufuma kwenoku.
45017001 Chanapanjakanuwu muAmfwipoli nimuApoloniya, ashika nikuTesalonika kwajing’i shikola yawaYujeya.
45017002 Pawulu hakwing’ilamu neyi chelilang’ayi jikalu, hakujihuzhola nawu mwomwaya nyikanja yazhila, Sabata zhisatu.
45017003 Hakuyilumbulwila nakukolesha chikupu ninji, Chalala chateleleli Klistu kukaba nakusang’uka muji afu; ninji, Iwu Yesu iniji nakuyishimwina, jiyi Klistu.
45017004 Amakwawu hiyakwitezha, hiyakujibomba nawaPawulu naSilasi, niaGliki akwakuhameka Nzambi izaza jajeni, niambanja alema amavulu.

45017005 Ilang’a aYujeya, anatiyi jehi ichima, hiyakufumba amayala atama ayiluwang’imbi, hiyakupompesha izaza jawantu, avwakula niipumba mwahita ng’anja yezhima. Hiyakulotokela kwitala jaYasoni, hiyakukeng’a nawu ayiijishi kuji antu.

45017006 Chanakang’anyuwu kuyiwana, hiyakukokela Yasoni nianakwetu amakwawu kumesu awanyuuli zhang’anja, nakubijeka nang’ovu nawu, Wenawa hiyatuvuba anavunjuli mpata yamunu mwishina yezhima, anenzi nikunu nawa;
45017007 anayitambuli kuji Yasoni. Wezhima wawu hiyovwahilang’a nshimbi zhaKesaluku, elang’a nawu kuji mwanta wankanu wacheng’i, yowu Yesu.
45017008 Izaza jawantu nianyuuli zhang’anja, chanatiyuwu yumiyi, kutiyakana niipumba janjombu.
45017009 Chanatambuluwu kapopu kuji Yasoni nawakwawu, hiyakuyumbaku nawu ayi.
45017010 Hohenohu anakwetu hiyakutemesha aPawulu naSilasi kuBeleya nawufuku. Chanashikuwu, hiyakwing’ila mushikola yawaYujeya.
45017011 AYujeya akwenoku hiyakubajika amuTesalonika kalemesha, mulong’a wena anyakeli kutambula izu jaNzambi; hiyakutalatala munyikanja yazhila hefuku hefuku, amoni neyi yumiyi jimu yaya.
45017012 Jichi amavulu hiyakukuhwelela; niambanja aGliki alumbwa amavulu, niamayala amavulu nawa.
45017013 Ilang’a aYujeya akuTesalonika, chanelukuwu nawu Pawulu nashimuni jehi izu jaNzambi muBeleya nawa, hiyakuya kwenoku nakuyibobwesha, kulonja afutwishi nyichima yezaza jawantu.
45017014 Anakwetu atemesha niPawulu hohenohu, ayi akashikang’ahu jehi kukalung’alwizhi; aSilasi naTimotewu hiyakushala kwenoku.
45017015 Antu amutweleluku Pawulu hiyakumushikizha kuAtenisi. Chanayilezhiyi ninji aSilasi naTimotewu akanyakali kwinza, hiyakufunta.
45017016 Pawulu chajing’i nakuyiching’ililayi kuAtenisi, spilitu yinji hiyikutiya chikela, chanamoniyi ng’anja yezhima yinenzali ankishi to-o.
45017017 Jichi hakujihuzhola nikutajikang’a mushikola nawaYujeya nawakwakujifukula kuji Nzambi; nikuwulanjilwilu nawantu akujimonayi nawu, hefuku hefuku.

45017018 AEpikuleya nawaSitoki amakwawu ajing’i akwakukeng’akeng’a kwiluka maana, hiyakumubulakana. Amakwawu hiyakwila nawu, Iwu Sakubobola keng’a ahoshi ninjiji? Amakwawu nawu, Kwizhi hakushimuna akishi akwitung’a jacheng’i; nanochu chajing’i nakushimunayi Yesu, nikusang’uka muji afu.
45017019 Hiyakumukwata kuchikasa, hiyakuya ninji hampiji yaMalasa; hiyakumwila nawu, Iyi nsang’u yayiha yiwuji nakushimuna, etu nawa tukutwesha kuyiluka, tahinji?
45017020 Wunaleti nsang’u yacheng’i kumatu etu; jichi tunakeng’i twiluki nsang’u iyi.
45017021 AkwaAtenisi ezhima, hela enyi, hiyelili chuma chacheng’uku, akuminini jakushimuna hela kutiya chuma chachiha hohu.
45017022 Jichi Pawulu hakwimana hakachi kawu hampiji yaMalasa, hakwila ninji, Enu akwetu amayala akwaAtenisi, namoni mwaswezha kukeng’a kupeshapesha.

45017023 Mulong’a chinajing’i nakuhitahita hinukumona yuma yimwapeshang’a; hinukuwana nawa kameng’a kakusoneka nawu, KAMENG’A KANZAMBI WAKAJI KWILUKEWA. Jichi yeniwu mwapeshang’a chakuyamba, jiyi nukuyishimwina.
45017024 Yowu Nzambi waleng’eli mpata yamunu mwishina niyuma yezhima yijumu, jiyi Mwanta wamwiwulu niweseki. Hashakamang’a kwinji mumatembeli akutung’a namakasa awantuku;
45017025 hela kumukalakela hiyamukalakelang’a namakasa awantu, mwaka eli ninji nakeng’i chumaku. Mulong’a yena jiyi wenkang’a antu wumi nimuuya niyuma yezhima.
45017026 Wafumishili kuji muntu wumu nyunza yawantu ezhima, kulonja ashakami heseki jezhima. Hakuyitong’wela yilaaka yawu, ning’inza zhawu mwakushakaminawu.
45017027 Ninji akakeng’akeng’i Nzambi, hamwaha akamupapata, akamuwana; kutong’a yena hekala kwakulehi nanetu ezhimaku.
45017028 Mulong’a muji yena jimu mutwahanjilang’a, jimu mutwenjelang’a, jimu mutwekalilang’a. Mwomwaneluwu akwakusoneka enwenu aweni amakwawu nawu, Twafuma kuji yena.
45017029 Ichi jinu chituneli twafuma kuji Nzambi, wuNzambi hitwaji kuwutong’ozhoka netu wuji neyi wulu inji kwizhi siliva, inji kwizhi ilola jabazang’awu nawukalawenu wamaana amuntuku.
45017030 Nzambi wajiwili oyu nyaka yakuyamba; hakwinza katataka nalezhi antu ezhima kwezhima kwezhima, ninji abalumuki munyichima.
45017031 Mulong’a nashumu jehi ifuku jamba kasompeshayi matung’a mwalong’a, neyala anafuukuliyi jehi. Mwenomu nakoleshumu jehi kuji antu ezhima, nanochu chanamusang’uliyi muji afu.
45017032 Jichi wena chanatiyuwu nsang’u yakusang’uka mukufwa, amakwawu hiyakuseha; hakwila amakwawu nawu, Tunakeng’i kutiya cheng’i nsang’u iyi.
45017033 Jichi Pawulu hakufuma mukachi kawu.
45017034 Amayala amakwawu hiyakumukakela, hiyakukuhwelela; ajing’i iwu Jiyonisi mukwampiji yaMalasa, nimumbanja wumu izhina jinji Jamalisi, hamu nawamakwawu nawa.
45018001 Kulonjela hayumiyi, Pawulu hakufuma kuAtenisi, hakushika kuKolinja.

45018002 Kwenoku hakuwanaku kaYujeya wumu, izhina jinji Akwila, wavwalikili muPontu, yena mwomukufuma kuItaliya nang’ojinji Plisila; mulong’a Kalujusa nalezhi jehi aYujeya ezhima, ninji afumi muLoma. Jichi yena Pawulu hakuya kuji wena;
45018003 hakushakama nawu mulong’a mujimu wawu wowumu nayena. Hiyakukalakela hamu, mulong’a mujimu wawu wowu wakuchima matenti.
45018004 Hakujihuzhola nikutajikang’a nawantu mushikola Sabata zhezhima; hakushinzhilang’a aYujeya nawaGliki.
45018005 Cheliluwu aSilasi naTimotewu anafumi jehi kuMasijoniya, Pawulu hakutiya iyena muspilitu. Hakushimwina aYujeya ninji Yesu jiyi Klistu.
45018006 Chanajikang’uwu nakuhosha chatama, hakutotomona mahininji, hakuyila ninji, Mashi enu ayikumini enu aweni, ami kwami hinikweti mulong’aku. Kufumisha kulelu nukuya kwami kuji aZHentili.
45018007 Hakufumaku, hakwing’ila mwitala jamuntu wumu, izhina jinji Titusa Yusitu, mukwakuhameka Nzambi, wukweti itala jinji jajikuma nashikola.
45018008 Nyuuli yashikoloyu Kilisipu hakumukuhwelela Mwanta nawakwetala jinji ezhima. AKolinja amavulu niwena chanatiyuwu, akuhwelela nikukuhwelela, hiyakuyizhimika.
45018009 Mwanta hakumwila Pawulu muchimwenu nawufuku ninji, Bayi wutiyang’a womaku, hoshang’a kweyi, bayi wumwenang’aku;
45018010 mulong’a ami niji naneyi, hikukwikala muntu wakukuzung’isha hela kukukatishaku; nikweti antu amavulu mung’anja yinu.
45018011 Hakushakama kwenoku mwaka wumu natukwezhi tutanu nakamu, nakutang’isha izu jaNzambi mukachi kawu ho-o.
45018012 Hajing’iyi Galiyo mwanta wamukala wamuAkaya, aYujeya hiyakumunyamukila Pawulu namuchima wawu wumu, hiyakumutwala kwitanja jakusompela.
45018013 Nawu, Iwu iyala wuji nakushinzhila antu kujifukula kuji Nzambi mwacheng’i, mwabula kuya nshimbi.
45018014 Heliliyi Pawulu ninji akwati kuhosha, Galiyo hakuyila aYujeya ninji, Enu aYujeya, iyi nsang’u neyi yajing’i yakwila chatama, hela yakubazhama, naji kwitezha tuhu kunkabisha kujenu;
45018015 kwinzichi chiyineli nsang’u yamazu namazhina nanshimbi zhenwenu aweni, yiketulenu enu aweni; ami naleki kusompesha nsang’u iyi.
45018016 Hakuyihang’a kwitanja jakusompela.
45018017 Wena ezhima amukwata ninyuuli yashikola Soseteni, amwetela nikwenoku kwitanja jakusompela. Ilang’a Galiyo kubang’aku nehi.

45018018 Kufumisha henaha heliluwu yumiyi, Pawulu hakulabilaku mafuku amakwawu amavulu. Nkumininaku hakushalisha anakwinji, hakuya kuSiliya muwatu, wuji nawaPlisila naAkwila; watewula jehi mutu winji muKenikili, mulong’a wajing’i nansang’u yajikaniniyi.
45018019 Chanashikuwu kuEfwesesa, hakushiya akwawu kwenoku, ilang’a yena yomweni hakwing’ila mushikola, hakujihuzhola nikutajika nawaYujeya.
45018020 Chanamulombuwu nawu ashakamuku mafuku amakwawu, yena kwitezha nehi.
45018021 Hakuyishalisha ninji, Neyi Nzambi netezhi, nakafunta kunu kujenu. Hakufuma kuEfwesesa muwatu.
45018022 Chanashikiyi kuKesaleya, chanafumiyi muwatu owu, hakukanjuka kuYelusalema nakwimusha chipompelu; hakukunkumuka kuAntiyoki.
45018023 Chanashakamuku mafuku, hakufumaku, hakuhita mwitung’a jaNG’alizha nijaFwilizhiya, nakukolesha atumbanzhi ezhima hamukala hamukala.
45018024 KuEfwesesa hikukwinza kaYujeya wumu, izhina jinji Apolosi, wavwalikili kuAlesanjeliya; muntu waswezha maana nankashi, waswezha ng’ovu zhakwiluka mwalumbulukila nyikanja yazhila.
45018025 Yena amutang’isha jehi mwaya nzhila yaMwanta; wekala neyena muspilitu yinji. Hakuhosha nakutang’isha nsang’u yaYesu chakashinshi, weluka kwachizhimikilu chaYowanu hohu.
45018026 Hakutachika kuhosha mushikola chakaji woma. Chanamutiyuwu aPlisila naAkwila, hiyakumutwala kwitala jawu, hiyakumulumbulwila mwaya nzhila yaNzambi, chakashinshi hanashali hanashali.
45018027 Chakeng’eliyi kuya muAkaya, anakwinji hiyakumukwashaku nakumusonekela mukanja wakulezha atumbanzhi nawu mutambulenu. Chanashikiyi hakuyikwashaku nankashi antu anakuhweleli naluwi lwaNzambi.
45018028 Mulong’a waswezheli kuyibayisha aYujeya nang’ovu hatooka, nakuyilezha munyikanja yazhila ninji Yesu jiyi Klistu.
45019001 19Helili Apolosi wuji kuKolinja, Pawulu hakuhita mwitung’a jakunjunjamu, hakushika kuEfwesesa, hakuwana atumbanzhi amu.
45019002 Hakuyihula ninji, Enu chimwakuhweleleli mwatambwili Spilitu Wazhila? Hiyakumwila nawu, Nehi, hitunatiyi nawu kuji Spilitu Wazhilaku.
45019003 Yena ninji, Inji ayizhimikili nachizhimikilu chanyi? Nawu, Nachizhimikilu chaYowanu.
45019004 Pawulu hakwila ninji, Yowanu wazhimikilang’a nachizhimikilu chakubalumuka mumuchima; walezhelang’a antu ninji akuhweleli owu wukumulonjela munyima, yowu Yesu.
45019005 Chanatiyuwu mwenimu, hiyakuyizhimika mwizhina jaMwanta Yesu.
45019006 Pawulu chanayinang’ikiyi makasinji, Spilitu Wazhila hakwinza haji wena; hiyakuhosha majimi acheng’i nakuplofweta.
45019007 Kuyichinja wezhima wawu, ajing’i amayala neyi ikumi nayeji (12).
45019008 Pawulu hakwing’ila mushikola, hakuhoshang’a chakaji woma mwahita tukwezhi tusatu, nakujihuzhola nikutajika nakuyishinzhila mwaya nsang’u yawanta waNzambi.

45019009 Chanajikang’uwu amakwawu, kwonti kwawu kwovwahila, hiyakutena Nzhila chatama, iku izaza jawantu jitiyang’a, Pawulu hakufuma kuji wena, hakufumishaku atumbanzhi, hakutang’isha nakujihuzhola nawu mushikola yaTilanusa hefuku hefuku.
45019010 Welilang’a mwenomu nyaka yiyeji, chakwila aYujeya nawaGliki ezhima ashakama muAsiya hiyakutiya izu jaMwanta.
45019011 Nzambi wakong’elang’a nyijimu yang’ovu yacheng’i chikupu kumakasa aPawulu.
45019012 Ákata ayitwelelang’a hela yitambala hela mahina akufuma kumuzhimba winji, nyisong’u yawu hiyikuyifuma, niaspilitu atama hiyakuyifuma.

45019013 Hakwila aYujeya amakwawu, akwakutambatamba, akwakufumisha anjemoni, hiyakukwata ng’ovu zhakutenena antu akweti aspilitu atama izhina jaMwanta Yesu, nawu, Tunayisanyikishi mwizhina jaYesu ashimunang’ayi Pawulu, netu fumaku.
45019014 Mukulumpi wawatuplistu wumu izhina jinji Seva, kaYujeya, wajing’i nawanyaninji amayala atanu nayeji elilang’a mwenomu.
45019015 Spilitu watama hakuyakula ninji, Yesu namwiluki, Pawulu nawa namwiluki, ilang’a enu yenu anyi?
45019016 Owu iyala wukweti spilitu watama hakuyimotokela, hakuzhama nawu; ayimika nimushinju wezhima wawu, hiyakutemoka mwitaloju nzekesi, ayikatisha jehi.
45019017 Chumichi hichikutiyakana kuji aYujeya nawaGliki ashakama kuEfwesesa ezhima; wezhima wawu hiyakutiya woma, izhina jaMwanta Yesu jitoha nikutoha.
45019018 Chanakuhweleluwu antu amavulu, hiyakwitezha mwatamishiluwu, nikushimuna mweliluwu.

45019019 Amakwawu amavulu élilang’a tufuta twacheng’i natwacheng’i, hiyakupompesha nyikanja yawu nakuyochela hatooka; kweseka wuseya wanyikanjoyu kumona wunashiki mumali asiliva makombakazhi makumi atanu (50,000).
45019020 Jichi izu jaMwanta hijikukula nikwimika mushinju.
45019021 Kulonjela hayumiyi, Pawulu hakutong’ozhoka muji Spilitu ninji, Neyi nahiti jehi muAkaya nimuMasijoniya, nakaya nikuYelusalema; chinakela nayi jehi kwenoku, ching’a nimona kuLoma nawa.
45019022 Chanatemeshiyi muMasijoniya ankwashi zhinji ayeji, iwu Timotewu, iwu Elasitusi, yomweni hakulabila muAsiya mafuku amakwawu.
45019023 Hamafuku wowenowu hikukuvulumuka ipumba jajeni hansang’u yaNzhila.
45019024 Mulong’a iyala wumu, izhina jinji Jemetelusa, muchizhi wasiliva, wachililang’a ankishi zhaJiyana zhasiliva, hakuheteshang’a ankong’i maheta amavulu.
45019025 Hakupompesha ankong’i owu, hamu nawakwawu akong’elang’a mujimu wowumu, hakuyila ninji, Enu akwetu, mweluka nenu kumujimu iwu jiku kutwahetelang’a.

45019026 Munamoni, munatiyi, hikuEfwesesa hohuku, ilang’a kunashali kwanti nakwila mwahita Asiya mwezhima, iwu Pawulu wakanzhikizha jehi antu amavulu, nakuyibalumuna munyichima yawu, ninji ankishi zhakutung’a namakasa hijiwu anzambuku.

45019027 Chuma chitukukeng’a kumona kukala, chakwila mujimu wetu iwu keng’a awujiwuli; himwenomu hohuku, tembeli yambala yamukishi wamumbanja walema Jiyana, keng’a yisawuki. Kuji chuma chikwawu nawa, wanta winji waweni walemeshang’awu muAsiya mwezhima, chalala hela mumpata yamunu mwishina yezhima keng’a wili chimwang’azhi.
45019028 Chanatiyuwu mwenimu, nyichima yawu hiyikukuma mbe nakuzuwa; hiyakuvwakuka nawu, Jiyana wawaEfwesesa muneni!
45019029 NG’anja yezhima yiluwang’ana nikuluwang’ana; hiyakulotokela mwibulu jawu jeneni namuchima wawu wumu, anakwati jehi aGayusi naAlisitaka, amayala akuMasijoniya akwakwenja naPawulu.
45019030 Cheliliyi Pawulu ninji eng’ili mwibulu mwanapompeluwu antu, atumbanzhi kumwitezha nehi.
45019031 Atulamba amakwawu akuAsiya, ajing’i amabwambu zhinji, hiyakumutemeshela izu jakumulembelela nawu, Bayi weseka kwing’ila mwibuluku.
45019032 Amakwawu hiyakubijeka chuma chimu, amakwawu chuma chikwawu; mulong’a chipompelu chezhima chaluwang’ana jehi, amavulu nikwiluka nsang’u yanapompeluwu nehi.
45019033 Hiyakufumisha Alesanjeli mwizaza jawantu, aYujeya hiyakumusha kumbiji. Alesanjeli hakweseka kuyimwenesha nachikasa chinji, ninji akwati kukulumbulwila antu nsang’u oyu.
45019034 Ilang’a chanelukuwu nawu hikaYujeya, hiyakuvwakuka wezhima wawu izu jawu jimu hohu, mwahita mpinzhi zhiyeji, vwakuke-e, nawu, Jiyana wawaEfwesesa muneni!

45019035 Nsoneki wang’anjoyu chanamweneshiyi izaza hakwila ninji, Enu akwetu amayala aEfwesesa, haji muntu wayamba ng’anja yawaEfwesesa chiyahembang’a tembeli yaJiyana muneni, nimukishi waholokeli kwiwulu kuji Zewusi, tahinji?
45019036 Chineli yumiyi, kwosi muntu natweshi kutajika mwokuku, komana enu mwaji kumwena, himwaji kunyakala kwila chumaku.
45019037 Munaleti kunu awa amayala anabuli hela kwiya yuma yamumatembeli, hela kutena chatama mukishi wetu wamumbanja.
45019038 Jichi Jemetelusa nawantu akong’elang’a mujimu wowumu, neyi akweti nsang’u yakujiholokela, yota yiji kwoku, ansompeshi aji kwoku, ajiholokeli kwawu.
45019039 Ilang’a neyi munakeng’i kuhosha nsang’u yacheng’i, akuyisompeshela muchota chawakulumpi awantu ezhima chalumbuluka.

45019040 Mulong’a keng’a tumoni mulong’a nansang’u yanjombu yalelu; neyi twakamona mwenomu, hitwakatwesha kulumbulula chachiwahi nsang’u yitunapompeluku. Chanahoshiyi mwenomu hakumwang’a chipompelu ochu.
45020001 Ipumba chijinamweni, Pawulu hakutambika atumbanzhi; chaneliyi nayikunjezhi jehi, hakuyishalisha chachiwahi, hakufumaku ninji ayi muMasijoniya.
45020002 Chanahitiyi mumpatoyu, chanayikwashiyi namazu amavulu, ashika nimumpata yawaGliki.

45020003 Chanashakamiyi kwenoku tukwezhi tusatu, wajing’i namuchima wakukeng’a kuya kuSiliya muwatu; ilang’a chanatiyiyi nawu anamushakamini jehi hampúng’a kuji aYujeya, hakukinkang’ana nakuya cheng’i muMasijoniya.
45020004 Wenjelang’a hamu namwana kaPilihusi, Sopateli wakuBeleya; niAlisitaka naSekunju akuTesalonika; niGayusi wakuJelibi naTimotewu; niTikikusa naTlofwimusa antu akuAsiya.
45020005 Hiyakuyang’ahu jehi kumbiji, hiyakutuching’ilila kuTilowasi.
45020006 Chanamanuwu mafuku amankenji akaji ilung’i, hitukufuma muFwilipi muwatu, chimunahiti mafuku atanu hitukujiwana nawu kuTilowasi. Kwenoku hitukulabilaku mafuku atanu nayeji.
45020007 Hamulungu jojifuku jatachi, chitunapompi nakuhumuna jinkenji, Pawulu hakuyitang’isha, natong’ozhoki jehi ninji nukunyamuka hankunku yakucha, hakwila hoshe-e nimukachi kawufuku.
45020008 Mwitala jahewulu mutwapompeleli mwajing’i manong’u amavulu.

45020009 Munjanina mwashakamini mukwenzi weyala, izhina jinji Yutikusa, hakuya mutulu twatweni; chaneliyi Pawulu hakushaku mazu amakwawu, yena hakukunjuka, hakuholoka kufuma hetala jahewulu jamuchisatu, hiyakumunona wafwa jehi.
45020010 Pawulu hakusuluka, hakumubanjamina nakumukumbata, ninji, Bayi mwakamaku, himumi.
45020011 Hakukanjama cheng’i hakuhumuna jinkenji, hakujya nawu. Chaneliyi hanzhike-e nichikunachi, hakufumaku.
45020012 Owu mukwenzi hiyakumutwala wamuwenyi, hiyakutiya kuwaha nankashi.
45020013 Etu hitukuyang’ahu jehi kuwatu, hitukuya kuAsosa muwatu owu, netu jiku kutwakamwing’izhila Pawulu; mulong’a jimu mwatulezheliyi yomweni ninji, Ami nukuya heseki.
45020014 Chanatuwaniyi kuAsosa, hitukumwing’izhamu, hitukushika nikuMitilene.
45020015 Hitukufuma kwenoku muwatu; chikunachi tushika nikwatalang’ana naChiyosi; chikunachi nawa tujata nikuSamosi; chikunachi nawa cheng’i tushika nikuMiletusa.
45020016 Mulong’a Pawulu nakeng’i jehi kupanjakana Efwesesa muwatu, kulonja abuli kulabila muAsiya. Hakujihinja ninji wamba kela nakatwesha kushika kuYelusalema hefuku jaPentekosta.
45020017 Chajing’iyi kuMiletusa, hakutambika akulumpi achipompelu chakuEfwesesa.
45020018 Chanenzuwu kuji yena hakuyila ninji, Enu aweni mweluka jehi munashakaminang’a nenu mafuku ezhima, kufumisha kwifuku jinasambilili kujata mwenju muAsiya;
45020019 nakukalakela Mwanta nakujizoza mumuchima, namajilu niyuma yakala yinamweni hanshakamininuwu hampúng’a kuji aYujeya.
45020020 Chinabulili kuheng’uka nakuleka kushimuna yuma yakuyikwasha nachu yezhima; nayitang’ishili hatooka hetala hetala,
45020021 nakushimwina niaYujeya niaGliki kubalumuka munyichima nakutala kuji Nzambi, nikumukuhwelela Mwanta Yesu Klistu.
45020022 Ichi jinu tiyenu, yami nukuyiwu kuYelusalema, anankasi jehi muji Spilitu. Yuma yakanwana kwenoku hinayilukuku.
45020023 Nakumini jakwiluka mwanlezhang’awu munyikala yezhima kuji Spilitu Wazhila, ninji kumbiji kunanshakamini nyonzhi niyuma yakala.
45020024 Hela chochu, wumi wami hinawumoni kulemaku; chakala nakamanishi nzhila yami, nimujimu wanyinkeliyi Mwanta Yesu kukalakala, nikushimuna nsang’u yayiwahi yaluwi lwaNzambi.
45020025 Ichi jinu tiyenu, neluki jehi nami enu akwetu ezhima, mwanmwenang’a nakukimbuka nakushimuna wanta waNzambi, himwamba kanmona nawa cheng’uku.
45020026 Jihu hanafumi kuyilezha lelu, nami nabuli mulong’a wamashi awantu ezhima.
45020027 Mulong’a hinaheng’ukili nileka kuyishimwina mwaya mpúng’a yaNzambi yezhimaku.

45020028 Jihembenu enu aweni, hembenu ninyikoku yezhima yanayikunzhikuwu kuji Spilitu Wazhila kwikala anhembi, mwikali atubing’a nakujiisha chachiwahi chipompelu chaNzambi chalanjiliyi namashi inji yomweni.
45020029 Ami neluki nami chinakafumahu, atung’wiji azuwa akeng’ila mukachi kenu, hiyakaanakena nyikokuku.
45020030 Hela mukachi kenwenu aweni mwakanyamuka antu akuhosha yuma yaheng’a, akajikokela atumbanzhi awenawu.
45020031 Jichi jinu tonenu, mwanukang’a mwahita nyaka yisatu hinalekeli kuyikonkomwena wezhima wenu niwufuku nimwaana namajiluku.
45020032 Ichi jinu, hinukuyikunzhika kuji Nzambi, nikwizu jaluwi lwinji jinatweshi kuyitung’a nakuyinka wuswana nawantu azhila ezhima.
45020033 Hinajing’i nalwisu lwasiliva yamuntu niwumu, hela lwawulu hela lwamahinaku.
45020034 Enu aweni muneluki makasami awa jiwu ajing’i nakukalakela yuma yinabulili, niyabulili akwetu najing’i nawu.

45020035 Yuma yezhimiyi nelili kulonja mutaliluhu, kulonja enu aweni mwakakalakali mukwashi akwenu abula ng’ovu; mwanukang’a mazu aMwanta Yesu chahosheliyi ninji, Chikweti kukooleka yowu kwinka akwenu, kutambula chakuminamu.
45020036 Chanakumishiyi kuhosha mwenimu hakufukama, hakulombela nawu wezhima wawu.
45020037 Wezhima wawu hiyakujila nankashi, hiyakujinata hanshing’u yaPawulu nakumupwepuzhola.
45020038 Chuma chaswezheluwu kutiya wushona jojizu jahosheliyi ninji, Himwamba kanmona nawa cheng’uku. Hiyakumutwalaku munzhila yinji yakuya kuwatu.
45021001 Chitunaambuki nawu, hitukutachika kwenja muwatu, hitukwimakana nikuKosi nzwa-a; chikunachi tushika nikuLoji, kufuma oku tuya nikuPatala.
45021002 Hitukuwana watu wacheng’i wuji nakuzambukila kuFwenisiya, hitukwing’ilamu, tutachika nikwenja muwatu owu.

45021003 Chitunashiki kwela chitutu chaKipilosi hichikumwekana, hitukuchibakila kuchikasa chachimunswa, hitukuyang’a tuhu muwatu kuSiliya. Hitukushika kuTila, tufuma nimuwatu; mulong’a kwenoku jiku kwakeng’eli kulong’ololawu yuma yajing’i muwatu.
45021004 Chitunawani atumbanzhi, hitukulabila kwenoku mafuku atanu nayeji. Wenawa hiyakumwila Pawulu muji Spilitu nawu bayi akajata mwenju muYelusalemaku.

45021005 Chinamani mafuku owu, hitukunyamuka nakuya munzhila yetu; akwetu ezhima, niang’ojizhawu nianyanawu, hiyakututwalaku munzhila yetu. Chitunafumi mung’anjoyu, hitukufukama kuchikumu chakalung’alwizhi nakulombela.
45021006 Chitunajishaliki chachiwahi, hitukuya cheng’i muwatu owu, wena afunta nikumatalawu.
45021007 Chitunakumishi nzhila yetu yamuwatu yakufuma kuTila, tushika nikuTolemayi. Hitukuyimusha anakwetu, tuzhing’ilaku niifuku jimu.

45021008 Chikunachi hitukunyamuka, tushika nikuKesaleya. Kwenoku hitukwing’ila mwitala jamukwakushimuna nsang’u yayiwahi, Fwilipu, jiyi wajing’i wanawa ankwashi atanu nayeji atonjeluwu; hitukushakama ninji.
45021009 Yenowu iyala wajing’i nawanyaninji awambanja azhiki awana, aplofwetelang’a.
45021010 Chitunalabili kwenoku mafuku amavulu, kuYujeya hikukufuma kaplofwetu wumu, izhina jinji Agabusi.

45021011 Hakwinza kujetu, hakutambula muya waPawulu, hakujikasawu kunyenju nikumakasa; hakwila ninji, Spilitu Wazhila ninji, Jichi chakakasawu muntu wukweti muyiwu kuji aYujeya akuYelusalema; akamulubula kuji aZHentili.
45021012 Chitunatiyi mwenimu, etu nawakwetu akwenoku hitukumulembelela Pawulu, netu bayi akanjuka kuYelusalemaku.
45021013 Pawulu hakwakula ninji, Aka! Muji nakujilaji? Mukumbalula muchima? Netezhi kwami hela kunkasa, hela kukumina jakufwa kuYelusalema, kukoola izhina jaMwanta Yesu.
45021014 Chaneliyi kumulekesha kwonti kwinji, hitukumwena netu, Eli muchima waMwanta.
45021015 Mafuku alonjelumu, hitukulong’ezha yuma yetu, tukanjuka nikuYelusalema.
45021016 Hitukuya nawakwetu atumbanzhi akuKesaleya, nimuntu wumu wakuKipilosi, izhina jinji Manasoni, kambanzhi wamukulu itukukeng’a kushakama ninji.
45021017 Chitunashiki kuYelusalema, anakwetu hiyakutiya kuwaha kututambula.
45021018 Chikunachi hitukuya naPawulu kwaYakoba; kwajing’uwu niakulumpi ezhima.
45021019 Chanayimushiyi, hakuyishimwinamu mwezhima mwakong’eliyi Nzambi mukachi kawaZHentili kumujimu winji, hachuma hachuma.

45021020 Wena chanachitiyuwu, hiyakulemesha Nzambi. Hiyakumwila nawu, Eyi manakwetu, wunamoni chanakuhweleluwu aYujeya makombakazhi namakombakazhi; wezhima wawu aswezha ng’ovu yakujizhilika nanshimbi zhawu.

45021021 Nsang’u yeyi yatiyakana jehi, anatiyi nawu watang’ishang’a aYujeya ezhima ekala mukachi kawaZHentili, neyi ambuki naMosi. Nawu wayitang’ishang’a neyi bayi aalamishang’a anyanawu, hela kwenja mwaya yizhila yaMosuku.
45021022 Tukwila ng’ahi jinu? Chalala izaza keng’a jitiyi nawu wenza jehi.
45021023 Jichi ilaku mutukukulezha. Tukweti amayala awana anajishiilumu jehi;
45021024 yikwashuku kufweta kulonja atewuli nyitu yawu. Mwenomu antu ezhima eluki nawu nsang’u yeyi yanayilezhuwu yakutwamba; komana eyi aweni wenjang’a chachiwahi mwaya nshimbi.
45021025 Hakwila hansang’u yawaZHentili akuhwelela jehi, twasonekeli jehi. Twaketwili jehi netu aleki yuma yakupesha nachu ankishi, nimashi, nianyama akushotomona, niwuzhila.
45021026 Pawulu hakutambula wenowu amayala; chikunachi hakujizhilika nawu hamu, hakwing’ila muTembeli kulonja alezhi mwakamanina mafuku akujizhilikila; hakayikwashayi namulambu wawu wezhima wawu.
45021027 Chaneluwu mafuku atanu nayeji hiyakuya nakumana, aYujeya afumini kuAsiya, chanamonuwu Pawulu muTembeli, hiyakusang’umuna izaza jawantu jezhima, amukwata nikumukwata.

45021028 Hiyakubilela nawu, Enu akwetu amayala aIsalela, tukwashenuku! Yeniwu jiyi iyala watang’ishang’a antu ezhima kwezhima, nakutung’ula niaIsalela ninshimbi niTembeli iyi. Nabombeluku chuma chikwawu nawa, neng’izhi aGliki muTembeli; nazhiloli jehi munu mwazhila.
45021029 Mulong’a henohu amumona jehi mung’anja hamu nakaEfwesesa, Tlofwimusa; anatong’ozhoki nawu Pawulu namwing’izhi muTembeli.
45021030 Ng’anja yezhima yivwakuka niipumba; antu hiyakupompa lufuchi, hiyakumukwata Pawulu, hiyakumukokela hanzi yaTembeli. Enzela niyenzelu hohenohu.
45021031 Heliluwu hiyakukeng’a kumuzhaha, nsang’u oyu yishika nikuji mukulumpi wamashijika ikombakazhi (1,000), nawu Yelusalema yezhima yavwakuka jehi kwepumba hohu.
45021032 chanamonuwu mukulumpi muneni wamashijika nimashijika, aleka nikumweta Pawulu.
45021033 Mukulumpi muneni wamashijika hakwinza kwakwihi, hakumukwata, hakuyila ninji mukasenu namaleng’i ayeji. Hakwihula ninji, Yeniwu hinyi? Neli ng’ahi?
45021034 Ámwizaza amakwawu hiyakubijeka chuma chimu, amakwawu nawa chuma chikwawu. Chanabuliyi kwiluka chakashinshi nepumba jajing’uku, hakuyilezha ninji mutwalenu mwitala jamashijika.
45021035 Chanashikuwu kuwukanjaminu, hiyakumweleka Pawulu kuji mashijika, nanochu chaswezheluwu antu kuzuwa.
45021036 Mulong’a izaza jawantu hijikuyilonjela nakubijeka nawu, Waaji! Waaji!
45021037 Hakeng’eluwu kumwing’izha mwitala jamashijika, Pawulu hakumwila owu mukulumpi muneni, ninji, Wukung’itezha chuma chimu? Yena ninji, Komana wahoshang’a ijimi jaGliki?
45021038 Ami nami kwizhi yeyi kaEzhipitu wafumbili nzhita mafuku awa ajing’uku, watweli atuponju makombakazhi awana (4,000) muchinkalampata.
45021039 Pawulu hakwakula ninji, Ami yami kaYujeya wakuTalusa muSilisiya, nimwining’anja yalema. Nakulembeleli nami ang’itezhi mwani nihoshi nawantu.
45021040 Chanamwitezhiyi, Pawulu hakwimana hawukanjaminu, hakuyolwela antu chikasa kwiwulu; chanamwenuwu chacheni nzo-o, hakuhosha nawena mwijimi jaHebelu.
45022001 Ninji, Enu anakwetu, ninenu atata, tiyenu munukujihakwila kujenu.
45022002 Chanatiyuwu wuji nakuhosha nawu mwijimi jaHebelu, aswezha nikumwena.

45022003 Hakuhosha ninji, Ami nikaYujeya, navwalikilili kuTalusa muSilisiya, ilang’a najizilili mung’anja yinu kunyenju yaGamaleli; amfumbilang’a mwalong’ela nshimbi yawankakulula zhetu chikupu; najing’i nakumukalakela Nzambi nang’ovu neyena kumuchima, neyi chimuji nakwila wezhima wenu lelu.
45022004 Nakabishilang’a akwaNzhila yinu hela kuyizhaha; najing’i nakukasakasa amayala nawambanja nakuyisha mutuleya.

45022005 Hela kaplistu muneni hichinsahu wukushimuna tuhu, niakulumpi ezhima. Wowu anyinkeli nyikanja yakuji akwetu aYujeya, kulonja nakayi mulwenju lwakuJamakasa, nakayileti akwakukuhwelela munyonzhi kuYelusalema, kulonja akayibabeshi.
45022006 Chinajing’i nakuya munzhila yami, hinukushika kwakwihi naJamakasa, itang’wa mwiwulu; kukasumuka chezhezhi cheneni chakufuma mwiwulu hichikuntong’ekelami kwi-njo.
45022007 Hinukujimbuka hamaseki, nitiya niizu hijikung’ila ninji, Eyi Sawulu, Sawulu, wankabishilang’aji?
45022008 Hinukwakula nami, Yeyinyi Mwanta? Yena hakung’ila ninji, Yami Yesu wakuNazaleta, yami wakabishang’a.
45022009 Akwetu twajing’i nawu, chalala chezhezhi achimweni, hakwila izu janowu wajing’i nakuhosha nanami hiyajitiyiluku.
45022010 Hinukwila nami, Nukwila ng’ahi, Mwanta? Mwanta hakung’ila ninji, Nyamukaku, wuyi muJamakasa, jiku kwakakulezhelawu mujimu wezhima wanakukunzhikuwu.
45022011 Chinakang’enyi kumona hansang’u yakuswezha kwachezhezhi chalubanzhi lwakulema, akwetu najing’i nawu hiyakunkwata kuchikasa, hinukwing’ila muJamakasa.
45022012 Muntu wumu izhina jinji Ananiya, iyala wukweti kalemesha kakulemesha nshimbi, amuhamekelang’a kuji aYujeya ezhima ashakamini muJamakasa;
45022013 hakwinza kujami, hakwimana kwakwihi, hakung’ila ninji, Eyi manakwami Sawulu, tonaku. Hohenohu hinukutona, hinukumumona.
45022014 Yena hakwila ninji, Nzambi yawankakulula zhetu nakukunzhiki kukwiluka muchima winji, wumoni Mukwakulong’a, wutiyi izu jakukanwa kinji.
45022015 Mulong’a wakekala chinsahu chinji chakushimuna kuji antu ezhima yuma yiwunamoni nikutiya.
45022016 Wukulabilaji jinu? Nyamukaku, akuzhimiki, wutooki kunshiji zheyi chiwukutambika izhina jinji.
45022017 Chineli nafunti jehi kuYelusalema, hinajing’i nakulombela muTembeli, hinukwila neyi nayi mutulu.
45022018 Hinukumumona Yesu, hakung’ila ninji, Nyakalaku, wufumi swayi muYelusalema, mulong’a hiyakwitezha wunsahu weyi wakunshimunaku.
45022019 Hinukwila nami, Mwanta, awenawu aneluki chinashilang’a akwakukukuhwelela amumashikola ezhima mukaleya, nikuyeta chikupu.
45022020 Chamwang’iluwu mashi achinsahu cheyi Stefwanu, ami kwoku nemeni, hinukwitezhamu, hinukuhemba mahina anawa ajing’i nakumuzhaha.
45022021 Hakung’ila ninji, Yaku tuhu, mulong’a ami nakakutemesha kuji aZHentili kwakulehi.
45022022 Hiyakumutiya kushika nihezu oju; henohu hiyakuvwakuka nawu, Muntu wuji ichi haji kwikala hamasekuku. Hanateli kuhanjaku.
