45022023 Iku aji nakubijeka nang’ovu, nakutabola mahinawu, nakunata lunkung’u kwiwulu,
45022024 mukulumpi muneni wamashijika hakuyila mashijika ninji mwing’izhenu mwitala jenu, ninji muvupulenu nachikoti kulonja niluki nsang’u yakumubijekawu.
45022025 Chanamukasuwu nanyisulu, Pawulu hakumwila mukulumpi wamashijika wajing’i nakwimana kwakwihi, ninji, Kuvupula kaLoma chakaji kumuhisha, hichinzhilaku?
45022026 Chanachitiyiyi, owu mukulumpi hakuya kuji mukulumpi muneni wamashijika, hakumulezha ninji, Keng’a wili chumanyi? Yeniwu muntu hikaLoma.
45022027 Mukulumpi muneni wamashijika hakwinza, hakumwila ninji, Nlezhi, eyi wukaLoma? Yena ninji, Eng’a.
45022028 Mukulumpi muneni wamashijika hakwakula ninji, WuLomiwu ami nawulanjili namali amavulu nankashi. Pawulu ninji, Hakwila ami kwami jimu munavwalikila.
45022029 Henohu wena akeng’eli kumuvupula amufuma nikumufuma. Mukulumpi muneni wamashijika niyena, chanelukiyi ninji Pawulu hikaLoma hakutiya woma, nanochu chanamukasiyi.

45022030 Chikunachi, hakukeng’a kwiluka chakashinshi nsang’u zhanamumonuwu nazhu kuji aYujeya; hakumwijisha, hakulezha akulumpi zhawatuplistu nichota chezhima ninji akapompi hamu; hakumutwala nakumwimika Pawulu kumesu awu.
45023001 Pawulu hakushinshika akwachota swi-i ninji, Enu anakwami, ami nenzi kumesu aNzambi nachinlezhi chamuchima chachiwahi hohu, kushika nikwifuku jalelu.
45023002 Kapilistu muneni Ananiya hakuyila antu emeni kwajing'iyi, ninji amweti kukanwa.
45023003 Pawulu hakumwila ninji, Nzambi wakakweteyi, yeyi mbang'u yakupembezha! Eyi wushakami nakunsompesha mwaya nshimbi, wulezhi antu neyi mwetenu, chakumotoka nshimbi?
45023004 Antu emenuku hiyakumwila nawu, Wutuki kapristu muneni wambala waNzambi?
45023005 Pawulu nindi, Enu anakwetu, hinamwiluki nami jiyi kapilistu munenuku. Mulong'a anasoneki nawu, Kutena nyuuli yawantu enu chatama, chinzhila.

45023006 Pawulu chanelukiyi ninji komana aneli awa aSadusi, awa aFwarisewu, hakubijika mwenomu muchota ninji, Enu anakwetu, ami nikaFwarisewu, nimwana kawaFwarisewu! Nsang'u yaji nakunsompeshelawu yoyakuchiŋeja kusang'uka kwamba kasang'uka afu.
45023007 Chanahoshiyi chochochu, aFwarisewu nawaSadusi hiyakuvwakuka ntaji, nichota chambuka nihakachi.
45023008 Mulong'a aSadusi elaŋa nawu hikwekala kusang'ukaku; nawu hikwekala hela kang'elu, hela spilituku. Hakwinza aFwarisewu etiyang'a mwejima.
45023009 Henohu avwakuka niipumba fwi-i. Ansoneki zhawaFwarisewu hiyakwimana, hiyakuzuwa nawu, Iwu muntu hitunamumoni nachuma chatamaku. Kwiji kang'elu jiyi nahoshi nayena, inoji kwizhi spilitu.

45023010 Chihanamwekani ndombu yasweja, mukulumpi muneni wamashidika hakwakama ninji keng'a amusansoli Pawulu. Hakulezha mashijika ninji, Kunkumukenu mumwamuki nang'ovu mukachi kawu, mumuleti mwitala jenu.
45023011 Wufuku walondeluku, Mwanta Yesu hakwimana kwadiŋi Pawulu, hakumwila nindi, Tiyaku kuwaha; mulong'a chiwunanshimuni wunsahu muYerusalema, jichi wamba kashimuna nikuRoma nawa.
45023012 Chikunachi, aYudeya hiyakujipompesha, hiyakusanyika naŋovu nawu, Etu kudya hela kunwa ching'a tunajahi Pawulu.
45023013 Wenawa ashakamini hampúng'oyu ading'i abadika makumi awana (40).
45023014 Hiyakuya kuji akulumpi zhawatupiliistu nikuji akulumpi, hiyakuyila nawu, Tunasanyiki jehi kusanyika kwakujishing'a netu, Etu kutompa kudya ching'a tunasambili jehi kuzhaha Pawulu.

45023015 Jichi jinu enu niakwachota, mumulezhang'a mukulumpi muneni wamashidika nenu akenzi naPawulu kudenu kumajiki; chiji neyi munakeng'i kwihula nsang'u yindi chakashinshi. Etu twakela kanja tuhu aswili nikwakwihi, mwaka twamuzhaha jehi.
45023016 Komana mwiha kaPawulu chanatiyiyi chakukeng'a kumubelaminawu, hakwing'ila mwitala jamashijika nakumulezha Pawulu.
45023017 Pawulu hakutambika mukulumpi wumu wamashijika ninji, Mutwali iwu mukwenzi kuji mukulumpi muneni wamashidika; wukweti kansang'u kakukeng'a kumulezhayi.

45023018 Jichi hakumutwala nakumushikizha kuji mukulumpi muneni wamashijika. Hakumwila ninji, Pawulu, muntu wamukaleya, nantambiki, nang'ili ninji nikuleteli iwu mukwenzi, wukweti kansang'u kakukeng'a kukulejayi.
45023019 Mukulumpi muneni wamashijika hakumukwata kuchikasa, hakuya ninji hambaji. Hakumwihula kwakankawawu ninji, Wuji nansang'winyi yiwukukeŋa kunlezha?
45023020 Hakumulezha ninji, AYudeya anatiyaŋani kukulomba nawu wakakunkumuki naPawulu kuchota kumajiki, chiji neyi anakeng'i kwihula nsang'u yinji chakashinshi.

45023021 Hakwila eyi bayi wuyitezhaku, mulong'a kunamubelamini deji amayala akubajika makumi awana (40); anadishing'i nawu, kudya hela kunwa ching'a tunamuzhahi jehi. Chituji nakuhosha ichi anabatami jehi, aji nakutalila chimukukeng'a kujikana nawu.
45023022 Mukulumpi muneni wamashidika hakufuntisha yenowu mukwenzi, hakumwila ninji, Yaŋa kweyi; ichi chiwunanleji, bayi wulejamu muntu niwumuku.

45023023 Hakutambika akulumpi ayeji amashijika ninji, Long'eshenu mashijika nkulakazhi zhiyeji (200), niakwatuwalu makumi atanu nayeji (70), niakwamayong'a nkulakazhi jiyeji (200), akayi kuKesareya; akanyamuki mpinji yawufuku yamuchisatu (21:00 hrs).
45023024 Ninji, Mukeng'a nianyama akwendela, mushuhu Pawulu, akamutwali chachiwahi kudi nyuuli Filiksi.
45023025 Hakusoneka mukanda wakwila ninji,
45023026 Ami Kalujusa Lisiya, Nidi nakusoneka mukanda weyi eyi nyuuli Filekisi walema nankashi. Tunayimushi mwani.
45023027 Yeniwu iyala amukwatili kudi aYudeya, akeng'eli kumuzhaha; hinukuyikasumwisha namashijika, hinukumupulwisha, mulong'a natiya nawu hikaRoma.
45023028 Chinakeŋeli kwiluka mulong'a wanamwinkuwu, hinukumukunkumwisha kuchota chawu.
45023029 Kutiya komana anamwinki mulong'a wansang'u janshimbi jawu, himuloŋa wakutela kufwa hela kumukasaku.
45023030 Chananlezhuwu nawu anamushakamini muntu iwu hampúng'a, hinukunyakala kumutemesha kudeyi, hinukuleja ánamuholokeli nami akenzi nakumuholokela kujeyi. Shalenu chachiwahi.
45023031 Jichi mashijika hiyakwila mwayilezheluwu, hiyakumutambula Pawulu nakumutwala kuAntipatila nawufuku.
45023032 Chikunachi, hiyakumushiya nawakwatuwalu; wena hiyakufunta kwitala jamashijika.
45023033 Chanashikuwu kuKesaleya, hiyakumwinka nyuuli mukanja, ashikizha niPawulu kuji yena.
45023034 Chanawutang’iyi hakwihula ninji, Himuntu wakwilung’anyi?
45023035 Chanelukiyi ninji himuntu wakuSilisiya, hakwila ninji, Nakatiya nsang’u yeyi chachiwahi chakenzawu anakuholokeli. Hakulezha mashijika ninji muhembenu mwitala jaHeloji jawanta.
45024001 Chimunahiti mafuku atanu, kaplistu muneni Ananiya hakushika nawakulumpi amu, niihaku jawu izhina jinji Telitulu. Hiyakumulezha nyuuli mulong’a waPawulu.

45024002 Chanamutambikuwu Telitulu, yena hakutachika kushimuna mulong’a waPawulu. Ninji, Chiwunatushakamishi chachiwahi chamwena, niyuma yatama yayivulu yamwenang’a munza wetu wunayololi jehi namaaneyi,
45024003 twachitambulang’a mafuku ezhima mwezhima, eyi Filiksi waswezha kulema nankashi, twasakililang’a nankoshi zhazhivulu.
45024004 Ilang’a hinakeng’i mwani kukulabishaku, nakenja kakuzeyesha. Nikumini jakukulembelela wututiyi tumazu twanti naluwi lwambala wekala nalu.
45024005 Iyaliwu tunamumoni hikavuba, wasang’umunang’a mazhita mwahita aYujeya mumpata yamunu mwishina yezhima. Himukulumpi wawakwachaaku chawaNazaleta
45024006 Yeniwu wajing’i nakweseka ninji azhiloli Tembeli; tumukwata nikumukwata netu tumusompeshi mwaya nshimbi yetu.
45024007 Ilang’a mukulumpi muneni wamashijika Lisiya hakwinza nanjombu yayeni, hakutwamukayi.
45024008 Hakulezha etu tunamuholokeli, ninji twinzi kujeyi. Mwihuli tuhu eyi aweni, wiluki chachiwahi mwezhima mutunamwinkeli nyilong’a.
45024009 AYujeya niwena hiyakukoleshamu nawu chalala kwaamu.
45024010 Nyuuli chanamulezhiyi nachikasa ninji ahoshi, Pawulu hakwakula ninji, Chineluki nami eyi wunasompeshi jehi munza wetu nyaka yayivulu, jichi natiyi kuwaha kujihakwila.
45024011 Eyi aweni wukushinshika tuhu chinayili kuYelusalema nakujifukula kuji Nzambi, kanja muhiti nimafuku ikumi nayeji (12).
45024012 Hiyanweni muTembeli nakutajika namuntu niwumuku; hela kuvulumuna ipumba mumashikola aweni, hela tuhu mung’anja nehi.
45024013 Hiyakutwesha kunhisha nayuma yananholokeluwuku.
45024014 Hela chochu, nukwitezha tuhu kujeyi nami nakalakelang’a Nzambi yawankakulula zhetu mwaya chaaku chatenang’awu nawu Nzhila; netiyang’a yuma yezhima mwaya nshimbi, niyanasonekuwu atuplofwetu.
45024015 Namukuhwelelang’a Nzambi mwomwakuhwelelang’awu niwena nawa, nami kwamba kekala kusang’uka kwawalong’a nikwawabula kulong’a.
45024016 Chinaching’ezhang’a mwenimu najikwatishang’a nankashi, kulonja nijimoni nawa, nami kuji Nzambi nikuji antu nabuli mulong’a mafuku ezhima.
45024017 Jichi jinu chiyahitili nyaka yayivulu, chinajing’i nakuletela akwetu akwamunza wami yamukunkulu, nikulambula Nzambi,
45024018 aYujeya akuAsiya hiyakunwana najizhilika jehi muTembeli, chakaji izaza hela tuhu ipumba.
45024019 Wenowu jiwu atezhi kwinza kunu nakunholokela kujeyi, neyi akweti nsang’u nanami.
45024020 Hela wenowu ashimuni tuhu chuma chatama chamwenuwu chinemani muchota;
45024021 kwizhi jojizu jinemeni nakubijika nang’ovu mukachi kawu nami, Muji nakunsompesha lelu nsang’u yakusang’uka kwawafu.
45024022 Filekisi, nanochu chelukayi jehi nsang’u yaNzhila chakashinshi, hakuhachika nsang’u ninji, Chakenzayi mukulumpi muneni wamashijika Lisiya, nakasompa nsang’u yenu.
45024023 Hakumulezha mukulumpi wamashijika kumuhemba chachiwahi mukaleya chakaji kumukabisha; ninji bayi alekesha amabwambu zhinji kwinza nakumukalakelaku.
45024024 Chimunahiti mafuku amakwawu, Filiksi hakwinza nang’ojinji Jlusila, yena nawa hikaYujeya, hakutambika Pawulu, hakumutiya chakushimunayi nsang’u yinji yakukuhwelela Klistu Yesu.
45024025 Chashimwiniyi zhakulong’a, nizhakujihemba, nizhakusompa kwamba kenza, Filiksi hakuzaala woma; hakwakula ninji, Lelu yang’a kweyi; neyi namoni hahawahi nakakutambika.
45024026 Hakukuhwelela ninji akumwinka mali kuji Pawulu; jihu hafuminang’a kumutambika nakuhanzhika ninji hanti nahanti.
45024027 Chimunahiti nyaka yiyeji, Filiksi hiyakumuswana kuji Polokiwu Festusi. Chakeng’eliyi Filiksi kutiyisha aYujeya kuwaha, hakumulekela Pawulu mukaleya.
45025001 Chanenziyi Festusi mwilung’a oju, chimunahiti mafuku asatu hakufuma kuKesaleya, hakuya kuYelusalema.
45025002 Akulumpi zhawatuplistu niakulumpi zhawaYujeya alema, hiyakumuholokela Pawulu kuji yena.
45025003 Hiyakumulembelela nawu, Atwanakeni mwani, atukwashuku; mumuleti Pawulu enzi kuYelusalema. Elili nawu amubelamini, akamuzhahili munzhila.
45025004 Ilang’a Festusi hakwakula ninji, Pawulu wuji mukaleya kuKesaleya, ami aweni keng’a niyi kwenoku.
45025005 Jichi niyi nawakwenu alumbuluka; neyi haji chuma chatama chaneliyi akamuholokeli tuhu.
45025006 Chimunahiti jehi mafuku atanu nasatu inji kwizhi ikumi, hakuya kuKesaleya. Chikunachi, hakushakama hetanja jakusompela, hakulezha antu kumuleta Pawulu.
45025007 Chanenziyi, owu aYujeya afumini naFestusi kuYelusalema hiyakwimana kuji Pawulu kwi-njo, nakumwinka nyilong’a yatama yayivulu. Hela chochu, hiyatwesheli kumuhishaku.
45025008 Pawulu hakujihakwila ninji, Hela nshimbi yawaYujeya, hela Tembeli, hela Kesali, hinayitamishi nihantuku.
45025009 Ilang’a Festusi, wakeng’a jehi kuyitiyisha aYujeya kuwaha, hakumwihula Pawulu ninji, Wukwitezha kukanjuka kuYelusalema, akakusompesheluku yumiyi kumesu ami, tahinji?
45025010 Pawulu hakwila ninji, Nemani kwami kwitanja jaKesali jakusompela, kwatela kunsompeshelawu. Hinakong’eli aYujeya chatamaku; hela eyi aweni wunelukumu chikupu,

45025011 Neyi ami nakong’ang’a chatama, hela neyi nela jehi chuma chatela kufwa, hinakaani kufwaku. Ilang’a neyi yananholokeluwu yakutwamba, hikuji muntu wukutwesha kunlubula kuji wenaku. Niyi kwami kuji Kesali.
45025012 Festusi, chanashakamiyi hampúng’a nachota chinji, hakwakula ninji, Chiwunalombi kuya kuji Kesali, wakaya kuji Kesali.
45025013 Chimunahiti mafuku antesha, Aglipa hakushika kuKesaleya naBelenisi, nawu amwimushi Festusi.
45025014 Chaneluwu achiji kulabalaba mafuku amavulu, Festusi hakumwawila mwantowu nsang’u yaPawulu, ninji, Kunu kuji iyala alekelawu munyonzhi kuji Filiksi.
45025015 Chinajing’i kuYelusalema, akulumpi zhawatuplistu niakulumpi zhawaYujeya hiyakumuholokela kujami, nawu nimuhishi.
45025016 Hinukuyakula nami, kusha muntu mukaleya chakaji kujimona nawakwakumuholokela mesu namesu, amoni zhakujihakwila nansang’u yanamuholokeluwu, hichaaku chetwetu aLomaku.
45025017 Chapompeluwu kunu, hinalabiluku, ilang’a jojifuku jalonjelumu, hinukushakama hetanja jakusompela; hinukulezha antu kumuleta yenowu iyala.
45025018 Chanemanuwu akwakumuholokela, hiyateneni nyilong’a yatama yiji neyi munatong’ozhokeluku;
45025019 komana anamuholokeli tusang’u twayizhila yawu, nimuntu izhina jinji Yesu wafwili, atenang’ayi Pawulu ninji wamumi.
45025020 Chinelili nami nizhinoki mwakwihwila nsang’u iyi, hinukumwihula nami, Wukwitezha kuya kuYelusalema, akusompesheluku nsang’u iyi, tahinji?

45025021 Ilang’a chaneliyi Pawulu nalombi jehi ninji amuhembang’a nichamba kamuketwilawu mulong’a kuji Agusitusi, hinukulezha antu nami amuhembi tuhu mukaleya, nichinakamona zhakumutemesha kuji Kesali.
45025022 Aglipa hakumwila Festusi ninji, Ninami nakeng’i kumutiya yeniwu iyala. Festusi ninji, Kumajiki wakamutiya.
45025023 Chikunachi Aglipa hakwinza naBelenisi, nawanta waweni; hakwing’ila mwitala jakuhoshela nyilong’a, hamu nawakulumpi anzhita, niantu amung’anja alema. Festusi hakulezha antu kuleta Pawulu.

45025024 Festusi hakuhosha ninji, Eyi mwanta Aglipa, ninenu amayala ezhima tuji nenu munu, iwu iyala munamoni iwu, anamuholokeli kujami kuji aYujeya ezhima. KuYelusalema, nikunu nawa, hiyakumbijika nawu hatela kuhanja nawa cheng’uku.
45025025 Ami hinamumoni namulong’a wakutela kufwaku; jichi chaneliyi yomweni nalombi jehi ninji ayi kuji Agusitusi hohu, ami hinukwila nami nimutemeshi tuhu.
45025026 Hinamoni nsang’u yalumbuluka yinukusoneka kuji mwanta wamuku; jihu hanafumi kumuleta kumesu enu, nankashi kumesu eyeyi mwanta Aglipa, kulonja tumwihuzholi, tumoni mwakusonekela.
45025027 Mulong’a natong’ozhoki nami hichikweti maana kutemesha muntu wamukaleya chakaji mukanja wakushimuna nyilong’a yamuholokeleluwuku.
45026001 Aglipa hakumwila Pawulu ninji, Anakwitezhi kujihakwila eyi aweni. Pawulu hakwolola chikasa hakujihakwila;
45026002 ninji, Eyi mwanta Aglipa, natiyi kuwaha mwani kujihakwila kumesu eyi ifuku jalelu, nihiti mwezhima mwananholokeluwu kuji aYujeya.
45026003 Mulong’a eyi aweni weluka jehi nankashi yaaku yawaYujeya yezhima, nimwehuzholang’awu; jichi nalembi mwani, jung’umiki wuntiyilili chachiwahi.
45026004 AYujeya ezhima aneluki munekalilang’a mwezhima kufumisha kuwukwenzi wami, mukachi kamunza wetu nimuYelusalema.
45026005 Awenawu aneluki kufumisha kutachi, chinajing’i kaFwalisewu, chochaaku chakwitiya kwetu kwaswezha kuzhila. Neyi etezha kushimunamu, aji kushimuna tuhu.
45026006 Nsang’u yinemeni nakunsompesha yoyakuching’ezha chuma chakaniniyi Nzambi ankakulula zhetu.
45026007 Chochakalakelang’a nyichiji yetu ikumi nayiyeji (12) nang’ovu, niwufuku nimwaana, nawu amba kachimona. Kuching’ezhoku jiku kunanholokeluwu aYujeya, eyi mwanta.
45026008 Mulong’anyi mwamonang’a kukala kukuhwelela chasang’ulang’ayi Nzambi afu?
45026009 Chalala ami aweni natong’ozhokelang’a nami chachiwahi kwila yuma yayivulu nakujikang’a nezhina jaYesu wakuNazaleta.

45026010 Eng’ang’i, nelilang’a muYelusalema mwenimu nawa. Chinatambwili wanta kuji akulumpi zhawatuplistu, hinukukasakasa akwakuzhila amavulu, hinukuyisha mutuleya. Chajing’i nakuyizhahawu, ami najing’i nakwitezhamu.

45026011 Nayibabeshelang’a kakavulu mwahita mashikola ezhima; nesekelang’a kuyikanzhikizha kulonja atuki Nzambi. Chinaswezhelang’a kuzuwa nankashi, hinukuyikabishang’a hela kunyikala yakumatung’a acheng’i.
45026012 Eyi mwanta, chinajing’i munzhila yami yakuya kuJamakasa namukanja wawanta wakunyinka kuji akulumpi zhawatuplistu,

45026013 iku niji munzhila, itang’wa jinashiki jehi mukachi kewulu, hinukumona chezhezhi chiji nakufuma mwiwulu, chakubajika kutong’eka kwamwaana wetang’wa, hichikutong’ekela hinajing’i ami nawakwetu nenjelang’a nawu kwi-njo.
45026014 Chitunajimbuki wezhima wetu hamaseki hinukutiya izu jakung’ila mwijimi jaHebelu nawu, Eyi Sawulu, Sawulu, wankabishilang’aji? Ochu chiwuji nakusobola kunyumba, yiji nakukulemeka.
45026015 Nami, Yeyinyi Mwanta? Mwanta ninji, Yami Yesu wakabishang’a.
45026016 Nyamukaku jinu wimani; chinamwekani kujeyi nalonji nikukunzhiki kumujimu wakwikala mukwakukalakala nichinsahu, nanochu chiwunanmonami, nichiwamba kanmona.
45026017 Nakakupulwisha kuji aYujeya nikuji aZHentili kunukukutemesha,

45026018 kulonja wutoneshi mesu awu, abalumuki afumi kumwijima eng’ili muchezhezhi; afumi kuwanta waSatana ayi kuji Nzambi; kulonja amoni kuyanakena nshiji, atambuli wuswana hamu nanawa aneli azhila nakunkuhwelelami.
45026019 Eyi mwanta Aglipa, chimwenu chamwiwulu chinamweni hinachijiwiluku.

45026020 Hinukutachika kushimuna kuJamakasa, nimuYelusalema, nimwahita itung’a jaYujeya jezhima, nikuji aZHentili nawa, nami abalumuki munyichima atali kuji Nzambi, akong’i nyijimu yatelela kubalumuka mumuchima.
45026021 Jiyi nsang’u yankwatililuwu aYujeya muTembeli, hiyakweseka nikunzhaha.

45026022 Chanankwashuwu kuji Nzambi, jichi chinamoni kukakela kushika nikwifuku jalelu, nakushimwina nianyanya niamaneni. Hinashimunang’a yacheng’uku, ching’a yoyashimwinuwu jehi atuplofwetu naMosi nawu yakenza;
45026023 yoyu nsang’u yakwila nawu Klistu ching’a akakabi, akekali wakusambila kusang’uka muji afu, kulonja kumwekesha nachu chezhezhi kuji aYujeya nikuji aZHentili.
45026024 Chajing’i nakujihakwilayi Pawulu mwenomu, Festusi hakuhosha nezu jang’ovu ninji, Eyi Pawulu, waanjala! Maaneyi aswezha jiwu anakukozhezhi kwanjala.
45026025 Kuchinka Pawulu ninji, Eyi Festusi waswezha kulema, hinaanjaluku; ilang’a hinukuhosha mazu alala, amumesu mwawunja.
45026026 Mulong’a mwanta wambala niji nakuhosha ninji chakaji chibeng’u, yena nayiluki yumiyi, ninami nawa neluki chikupu nami yumiyi hiyakuyamba yenaku, mulong’a yumiyi hiyayilili kumbajuku.
45026027 Eyi mwanta Aglipa, atuplofwetu wayikuhwelelang’a? Neluki nami wayikuhwelelang’a.
45026028 Aglipa hakumwila Pawulu ninji, Nakunshinzhila chenochu chantesha hohu, keng’a wumbalumuni niikali mukwaKlistu!

45026029 Pawulu ninji, Hela chantesha hohu, hela chaswezha kuvula, nalombi kuji Nzambi nami, akubalumuni nineyi, niantu ezhima aji nakuntiya lelu, mwikali neyi chinekalami; ilang’a chakubula kwanawa maleng’i hohu.
45026030 Mwanta hakunyamuka, ninyuuli, niBelenisi, niakwawu ajing’i nakushakama nawu.
45026031 Chanayuwu kumbaji, hiyakuhanzhika nsang’u oyu mukachi kawu. Hiyakutiyang’ana nawu, Iwu muntu haneli yuma yakutela kufwa hela yakumukasa munyonzhuku.
45026032 Aglipa hakumwila Festusi ninji, Iwu muntu, neyi wabula kwila ninji niyi kuji Kesali, mutenowu aji kumuumbaku tuhu kwinji.
45027001 Chaneluwu nawu twakayi kuItaliya muwatu, hiyakuyinka Pawulu nawakwakaleya amakwawu kuji mukulumpi wumu wamashijika, izhina jinji Yuliyusi, wamuchenju chaAgusitusi.

45027002 Hitukwing’ila muwatu wakufuma kuAjamitumi, wukukeng’a kunyamuka henohu nakuya munzhila yakukulisha Asiya, nakukunkakunka kunyikala yakwenoku. Hitukuya hakalung’alwizhi muwatu owu tuji naAlisitaka, kaMasijoniya wakuTesalonika.
45027003 Chikunachi tujata nikuSijoni. Yuliyusi wamwilili Pawulu chachiwahi, hakumwitezha kuya nakujya nawamabwambu zhinji.
45027004 Hitukufuma kwenoku muwatu nakukulisha Kipilosi, mulong’a mpepela zhajing’i nakukeng’a kutufuntisha munyima ho-o.
45027005 Hitukuketula muhong’i wamukalung’alwizhi, wela Silisiya iku, Pamfwiliya iku; tushika nikuMila wamuLisiya.
45027006 Kwenoku mukulumpi wamashijika hakumona watu wakuAlesanjeliya wuji nakuya kuItaliya; hakutwing’izhamu.

45027007 Watu wetu hiwukwenja chovu chakukabakana hohu mafuku amavulu, tushika nikwatalang’ana naKinijusi. Chiyineli mpepela yichiji kukeng’a kutufuntisha munyima, hitukuya nakukulisha Keleta kwatalang’ana naSalimoni.
45027008 Kwenoku twakulishili chakukabakana hohu, tushika nikwatenang’awu nawu kuMenzhi Awunja, kwakwihi namukala waLaseya.
45027009 Chimunahiti mafuku amavulu, nikwenja kwela jehi kwafwana, mulong’a mafuku akuleka kujya achijika Chakubuta Nshiji anahiti jehi,

45027010 Pawulu hakuyikonkomwena ninji, Enu akwetu, natong’ozhoki nami lwenju lwetu lwakekala lwakala, lwakukisang’ana yuma nankashi, hiyikumba yiji muwatu hohuku, hela ninetu aweni kwizhi twakafwa tuhu.
45027011 Mukulumpi wamashijika wabang’ili chalala mukwakwenjesha watu nimwiniwatu, hakwila chahosheliyi Pawulu yena kubang’amu nehi.

45027012 Mulong’a mwenomu mwawong’akana mwabulili kuwaha kuchelukilamu tukwezhi twamashika, jichi amavulu hiyakwila nawu tufumi kwenakunu muwatu, tuyi tukabili kushika kuFwenisi, tuchelukili kwenoku. Fwenisi himukala wakuchikumu chakuKeleta, kwatala iku kukabeta, iku kumusela, iku nawa kukabeta kakwawu kwekala kwawong’akana.

45027013 Chitunamoni mpepela yakukabeta kakuchijiilu hiyikukunka chovu chovu, atong’ozhoka nawu anamoni mwakeng’awu; hiyakufumisha mumenzhi chikung’u chakwimikisha nachu watu, hiyakukulisha Keleta kwakwihi nachikumu.
45027014 Ilang’a chakaji nikuleha, hikukwinza haji watu mpepela yaswezha ng’ovu yakufuma kumusela.
45027015 Chiyinakwati hawatu wetu, hiwukukang’anya kutala kukwinza mpepela, hitukukumina jakuyovwahila, tuhung’umuka nikuhung’umuka tuhu.
45027016 Chitunahiti mumukulishu wakachitutu kanyanya izhina jaku Kawuja, hitukukasa kawatu ketu kakwawu chakukabakana hohu;

45027017 chanakikokuwu kwiwulu hiyakuzhing’azhing’a watu weneni nanyonzhi yamaneni nankashi nawu awukoleshi. Chanatiyuwu woma nawu keng’a atunatili hawusekulula namalola kuSilitisi. Hiyakulemuna mahina akwenjesha nachu watu, hitukukumina jakuhung’umuka.
45027018 Chikunachi, tuchiji kukabakana nankashi nanoyu mpepela yaswezha, hiyakutachika kunata yuma yamuwatu mumenzhi.
45027019 Hefuku jamuchisatu hiyakunata yuma yakwenjesha nachu watu namakasawu aweni.
45027020 Chineli nimutena nitutumbwa kututong’ekela mafuku amavulu nehi, oyu mpepela yeneni yichiji kukunka, kukuhwelela kwezhima kwakwila netu tukuhanja hikukutufuma.

45027021 Chanashakamuwu nanzala mafuku amavulu, Pawulu hakwimana mukachi kawu ninji, Enu akwetu, neyi mwantiyilili, mutenowu mwabulili kufuma kuKeleta, mubuli kumona kukabakana kwezhimiku, nikuzhimbesha yuma.
45027022 Ichi jinu nukuyikunjezha nami tiyenu kuwaha, hikukufwa mwinenu hela wumuku, ching’a yowu watu hohu.
45027023 Mulong’a wufuku wowenawunu kang’elu kaNzambi yami, wánheta inakalakelang’a nawa, wemana kunijami.
45027024 Hakung’ila ninji, Eyi Pawulu, bayi wutiya womaku; ching’a wakemani kumesu aKesali hohu. Tiya, Nzambi nakwinki jehi akwenu ezhima wuji nakwenja nawu muwatu.
45027025 Jichi jinu enu akwetu, tiyenu kuwaha mulong’a namukuhweleli Nzambi, neluki chikupu nami mwanahoshiyi mwakamwekana mwezhima.
45027026 Hela chochu, akatunatila hachitutu chimu.

45027027 Chiwunashiki wufuku wekumi nachiwana (14), hitukuhung’umuka niniku niniku mukalung’alwizhi kaAjiliya. Kwizhi kwela jehi mukachi kawufuku, akwakwenjesha watu hiyakutong’ozhoka nawu hiyakuya nakuswila kwakwihi nampata yimu.
45027028 Hiyakweseka namwonzhi mwakunamina menzhi, hiyakuwana kuji zhimita 37. Chihanahiti mpinzhi yanti hiyakweseka cheng’i, hiyakuwana kuji zhimita 27.
45027029 Hiyakutiya woma, nawu keng’a atunati hamalola akuchikumu; hiyakuzelumuna yikung’u yiwana yakwimikisha nachu watu kuntong’i yakunyima; hiyakulombela nawu kuchi.
45027030 Akwakwenjesha watu hiyakukeng’a kutemuka, anazelumuni jehi kawatu kanyanya mumenzhi, kulonja ajimbani nawu tukukeng’a kuzelumwina yikung’u yakwimikisha nachu kuntong’i yakumbiji.
45027031 Jichi Pawulu hakumwila mukulumpi wamashijika nimashijika ninji, Neyi wenawa akubula kushala muwatu himukutwesha kuhanjaku.
45027032 Mashijika aketula ninyonzhi yakawatu oku, hikakuholoka mumenzhi.
45027033 Chikwakeng’eli kucha, Pawulu hakuyilembelela wezhima wawu, ninji jyenu. Ninji, Lelu ifuku jekumi nakawana (14) jimunashakami nanzala, kujyahu chuma nehi.
45027034 Jichi nalembi mwani, jyenu muhanji; hikwakazhimbala hela lusuki lwamuntu nilumuku.
45027035 Chanahoshiyi ochu, hakutambula jinkenji, hakumusakilila Nzambi, iku wezhima wawu amutiyang’a; hakujihumuna nakutachika kujya.
45027036 Wezhima wawu hiyakutiya kuwaha, hiyakujya niwena nawa.
45027037 Kubomba etu antu ezhima twajing’i muwatu owu, twashika munkulakazhi zhiyeji namakumi atanu nayeji nawantu atanu nawumu (276).
45027038 Chanekutuwu, hiyakunata tijiku mumenzhi kulonja kupepelesha watu.
45027039 Chikunachi, hiyelukili mpatoyuku. Nawu atali, hiyakushinshika kumu kwawong’akana, kuji wusekulula kuchikumu; hiyakutiyang’ana nawu tukung’ikiluku watu, neyi tunatweshi.

45027040 Chanaketuluwu nyonzhi yayikung’u yakwimikisha nachu watu, hiyakuyilekela mumenzhi; hiyakukasununa yilapu yajing’i yakwolola nachu watu, hiyakulema ihina jakumbiji kulonja jikwati mpepela, hiyakweseka kuya kuchikumu.
45027041 Ilang’a chanashikuwu halunjuka wusekulula,watu hiwukukakela hawusekulula; ntong’i yakumbiji hiyikukakela mbe, ilang’a ntong’i yakunyima hiyikutachika kubaluka nang’ovu zhamankanja.
45027042 Mashijika atiyang’ana jehi nawu akazhahi akwakaleya, nawu akenja kela amakwawu akasala, hiyakapuluka.
45027043 Ilang’a mukulumpi wamashijika wakeng’eli kumuhanjisha Pawulu, jichi hakuyilekesha kwila mwenomu. Hakuyilezha ninji, antu ezhima anatweshi kusala ajumbi mumenzhi akashikang’ahu jehi kumpata.
45027044 Anabuli kutwesha kusala akwati kumapulang’a, hela kuyuma yakuwatu, chaneluwu mwenomu hiyakupuluka chachiwahi, ashika nikuchikumu.
45028001 Chituneli tunapuluki jehi, hitukwiluka izhina jachitutu ochu netu Melita.
45028002 Enimbu hiyakututambula wezhima wetu naluwi nankashi, hiyakubutula kesi mulong’a kwajing’i nakunoka nvula, nichishika hamu.
45028003 Pawulu chanakung’uliyi chita chansonsu, nachishi jehi hakesi, kabanjayula chanatiyiyi iyena, hikakufuma hakesi hikakulamata kuchikasa chinji.

45028004 Enimbu chanamonuwu kapela nalamati jehi kuchikasa chinji, hiyakujilezha muntu namukwawu, nawu, Chalala iyaliwu himbanzhi, hela wapuluka jehi mukalung’alwizhi, Mukwakulong’a hanamwitezhi kuhanjaku.
45028005 Ilang’a yena hakumujikumwina kapela mukesi, kutiya kukata nehi.

45028006 Wena enimbu atong’ozhokeli nawu keng’a hanani, inji kwizhi tukukasumuka najimbuki nafwi jehi. Chaneluwu talile-e, kumumona yena hanatiyi chuma chatamaku, hiyakubalumuka munyichima yawu, nawu komana himukishi.
45028007 Kwenoku kwajing’i mpata yamwanta wachitutu ochu izhina jinji Pubilusi. Yena hakututambula hakutujiisha chachiwahi mafuku asatu.
45028008 Chelili tata yaPubilusi nakami jehi nayikatu yamusong’u wamashika nikapokota, Pawulu hakwing’ila mwajing’iyi, hakulombela, chanamunang’ikiyi makasa, hakumukolesha.
45028009 Chaneliyi mwenimu, antu amakwawu ahachitutu ochu ajing’i nanyisong’u, hiyakwinza, hiyakuyikolesha nawa.
45028010 Hiyakutulemeshang’a nakutwinka yuma yayivulu; chitwakeng’eli kuya muwatu hiyakushamu yuma yayivulu yakujiila munzhila.
45028011 Chimunahiti tukwezhi tusatu, hitukuya muwatu wakufuma kuAlesanjeliya, wukweti chinzhikizhilu chawakishi ampamba, Kasto niPoluki, wachelukilaku jehi nvula kuchitutu ochu;
45028012 tujata nikuSilakusa, hitukuzhing’ilaku mafuku asatu.

45028013 Kufuma kwenoku hitukuya niniku niniku, tunyeng’umuka nakushika nikuLegumi. Chikunahiti ifuku jimu, mpepela yakukabeta kakuchijiilu hiyikutachika kukunka, tushika nikuPuteyoli mumafuku ayeji hohu.
45028014 Kwenoku hitukuwana anakwetu, hiyakutulembelela tushakami nawu mulungu wumu. Nkumininaku tushika nikuLoma.
45028015 Chanatutiyuwu kuLoma, anakwetu hiyakwinza nakutukinkilila kuwulanjilwilu waApiyusi, nikuYisolu Yisatu. Pawulu chanayimoniyi, hakusakilila Nzambi, akwata ning’ovu.
45028016 Chituneng’ili muLoma, hiyakumwitezha Pawulu kushakama kankawinji neshijika wamuhembelang’a.

45028017 Chimunahiti mafuku asatu, Pawulu hakutambika akulumpi zhawaYujeya. Chanapompuwu hamu, hakuyilezha ninji, Enu akwetu amayala, ami hinakong’i chuma chakutamisha akwetu aYujeya, hela yaaku yawankakulula zhetuku. Hela chochu, ankwatili kuYelusalema nakunlubula kuji aLoma; wena hiyakung’usha mukaleya.
45028018 Wena chanang’ihuzholuwu, hiyakukeng’a nawu ang’umbuku, mulong’a hiyanmweni nachitela chakufwaku.
45028019 Chanatiyuwu aYujeya kutama mwenomu, ami hinukumona nami kunashali zhakulomba kuya kuji Kesali hohu; ilang’a hinikweti mulong’a wakuholokela akwamunza wetuku.
45028020 Jihu hanafumi kuyitambika, nami niyimoni nihoshi nenu. Anankasili ileng’i iji nsang’u yakuching’ezha kwaching’ezhang’awu aIsalela.
45028021 Wena hiyakumwila nawu, Hitunatambuli nyikanja yakufuma kuYujeya yakukuteneyuku. Hela anakwetu enzhili kunu, kukushimuna hela kukutena chatama nehi.
45028022 Ilang’a tunakeng’i tukutiyi muwatong’ozhokang’a eyi aweni; hakwila chaaku ichi tweluka jehi netu achitenang’a chatama kwezhima kwezhima.

45028023 Chiyanatiyang’anuwu ifuku, aYujeya amavulu nankashi hiyakwinza kwitala kwashakaminiyi. Yena hakuhita munsang’u oyu, hakushimuna wanta waNzambi, hakuyilumbulwila nsang’u yaYesu, chakufumisha munyikanja yanshimbi yaMosi, niyawatuplofwetu, kufumisha kubujiji njo-o nikumelela.
45028024 Amakwawu hiyakwitezha mwahosheliyi, amakwawu hiyakuleka.
45028025 Chanabuluwu kutiyang’ana mulwawu, hiyakujifuminamu. Henohu Pawulu nahoshi jehi izu jimu ninji, Mwalala mwahosheli Spilitu Wazhila nawankakulula zhenu muji kaplofwetu Isaya,
45028026 cheliliyi ninji, Yaku wakalezhi antu awa neyi, Kutiya mukutiya, himwakashinshika nihantuku; Kumona mukumona, himwakeluka nihantuku.

45028027 Mulong’a nyichima yawantu awa yinasupi jehi, matu awu anazhiki, Nimesu awu anazhimi; akenja kamona namesu awu, Akenja katiya namatu awu, akenja kashinshika munyichima yawu, Akenja kabalumuka hinukuyuuka.
45028028 Jichi ilukenu nenu iwu wamwinu waNzambi anawutemeshi kuji aZHentili; komana wena akatiya.
45028029 Chanahoshiyi mazu awa, aYujeya hiyakufumaku hiyakutajika nankashi mukachi kawu.
45028030 Pawulu washakamini nyaka yiyeji yamana chikupu mwitala jinji jakujifwetela, hakutambula antu ezhima ayilang’a mwajing’iyi.
45028031 Hakushimunang’a wanta waNzambi, nakutena nsang’u yaMwanta Yesu Klistu chakaji woma; kwosi nawa wamulekesheluku.
46001001 Ami Pawulu njung’u yambala yaYesu Klistu, antambikili niikali kapostolu, ang’ambwili nakunkunzhika kunsang’u yayiwahi yaNzambi,
46001002 yakaniniyi jehi Nzambi nawatuplofwetu twinji munyikanja yazhila;
46001003 yakumulumbulula Mwaninji, wavwalikili kumutang’a waDavidi chakumuzhimba;
46001004 átenenuwu nawu jiyi Mwana kaNzambi nang’ovu, mwaya Spilitu wakuzhila nakusang’uka kwinji muji afu, yowu Mwanta wetu Yesu Klistu.
46001005 Twatambwili luwi niwupostolu kuji yena, kulonja kuleta kwovwahila kwakukuhwelela mukachi kanyunza yawantu ezhima, hansang’u yezhina jinji;
46001006 mumwekala ninenu nawa, enu atambikawu jehi mwikali ambala aYesu Klistu.

46001007 Niji nakuyisonekela mukanja, enu ezhima muji muLoma ákeng’awu kuji Nzambi, átambikawu kwikala akwakuzhila. Luwi lwikali nanenu nikuwunja kwakufuma kuji Nzambi, Tata yetu, nikuji Mwanta Yesu Klistu.
46001008 Nukusambila kuyilezha chinayisakililang’a wezhima wenu kuji Nzambi yami muji Yesu Klistu, nanochu chikunatiyakani kukuhwelela kwenu mumatung’a ampata yamunu mwishina ezhima.
46001009 Nzambi, inakalakelang’a naspilitu yami munyijimu yansang’u yayiwahi yaMwaninji, hichinsahu chami chinabulang’a kukang’anya kuyitena mukulombela kwami kwezhima.
46001010 Hinukulomba nami, neyi Nzambi netezhi akang’enjeshi chachiwahi nakashiki kujenu mafuku anu.
46001011 Mulong’a nakeng’ang’a nankashi kuyimona, kulonja nakayinki chamukunkulu chakuji Spilitu kulonja kuyikolesha.
46001012 Kulonja twakakwashang’ani nakukuhwelela kwetu, nikwenwenu nikwamami.

46001013 Nochu enu anakwetu, nakeng’i nami mwiluki chinakeng’eli kakavulu kwinza kujenu, kulonja nakamoni nyikabu kujenu, neyi chinamonang’a muji aZHentili amakwawu acheng’i, ilang’a anamfuntishumu nihanu.
46001014 Ami niji namukuji wakuyishimwina aGliki, niantu ampata zhacheng’i, niakwamaana, niabula maana.
46001015 Jichi ami nakeng’i nankashi, mwashikila ng’ovu zhami zhezhima, kuyishimwinenu mwashakama muLoma nsang’u yayiwahi nawa.
46001016 Mulong’a hinatiyang’a nsonyi yansang’u yayiwahuku; jiyi ng’ovu yaNzambi yakwamwina nachu antu ezhima akukuhwelela, kusambila aYujeya, niaGliki nawa;
46001017 mulong’a jimu munamwekeni kulong’a kwaNzambi nakukuhwelela kwakutwala kukukuhwelela; mwomwanasonekuwu nawu, Mukwakulong’a wakahanjila kukukuhwelela.
46001018 Mulong’a kuzuwa kwaNzambi kunamwekani kwiwulu, kwakuzuwila kajiwu kakujiwula Nzambi kezhima, nikuheng’a kwawantu awa akang’eshang’a walala nakuheng’a kwawu.
46001019 Mulong’a yuma yaNzambi yinatwesheki kwilukewa, yamwekana jehi mukachi kawu, mulong’a yomweni Nzambi nayimwekeshi kuji wena.

46001020 Kufumisha haleng’eluwu mpata yamunu mwishina, yuma yinji yakaji kumonewa, yinamonewi chalala, yinalumbuluki nayuma yaleng’eliyi, zhozhu ng’ovu zhinji zhahayanyaka niwuNzambi winji; kulonja abuli mwakuleyela.

46001021 Mulong’a chamwilukiluwu Nzambi, hiyamulemesheli nawu jiyi Nzambuku, hela kumusakilila hiyamusakilililuku, ilang’a abalumukili kwikala antu akuhemesha muyitong’ozhoka yawu; munyichima yawu mwajing’i mwakaji maana himukwikala mwijima.
46001022 Hiyakujishimuna nawu tukweti maana, komana anabalumuki jehi ayisupi.
46001023 Lubanzhi lwakulema kwaNzambi wakátokang’a hiyakulubalumuna nakulumbisha nkishi yafwana neyi muntu watokang’a, hela atuja, hela anyama, hela yuma yakayilang’a.
46001024 Jichi Nzambi wayilekeli kwinji, akong’ang’a mwafwilang’a nyichima yawu yazonja, nakusawula nyizhimba yawu awenawu wumu namukwawu.
46001025 Mulong’a ahimpili walala waNzambi nakutwamba, hiyakujifukula kuyuma yaleng’eluwu kuji Nzambi nakuyikalakela, hiyakuleka Nleng’i wakiswilewa hayanyaka. Amena.
46001026 Jihu hafumini kuyileka kuji Nzambi akong’ang’a mwafwilang’awu mwatama; mulong’a ambanja amukachikawu, hiyakushiya mwayileng’eleluwu nakwila yuma yabulili kuyileng’elawu.
46001027 Amayala nawa hiyakushiya mwamuleng’eleluwu mumbanja, hiyakuswezha lwisu lwakujitamisha nawakwawu amayala, hiyakutambwilamu wulooku watelela kuluwa kwawu.
46001028 Chalekeluwu kwikala namaana akwiluka Nzambi, Nzambi hakuyileka ekali kwawu nayitong’ozhoka yatama, akong’ang’a yuma yakaji kutela.
46001029 Hiyakuswezha kukong’a yuma yaheng’a yezhima, nikutama, nilwisu, ninkunyi. Hiyakuswezha ichima, niwubanzhi, nikuzung’a, nimakasu, nimuchima wakuhela akwawu.

46001030 Hiyakwakushawula, akwakutung’ula akwawu; ahelewa kuji Nzambi. Hiyakwakasawuntu, akwakujinka wanta, akwakuha mukanwa, akwakubusa yaaku yayiha yatama yeng’i nayeng’i, akwakubula kwovwahila anvwali zhawu.
46001031 Abula kashinshi, hiyakakelang’a muyatiyang’anang’awu nawakwawuku, hiyakeng’ang’anang’a mwasemwakenawuku, akaji luwi.
46001032 Wenawa hela eluka jehi nawu Nzambi nahoshi ninji antu ezhima akong’ang’a yumiyi anateli kufwa, hiyakuminang’a jakuyila hohuku, atiyang’a kuwaha nanawa ayikong’ang’a nawa.
46002001 Jichi eyi muntu wasompeshang’a akwenu, hiwukweti mwakuleyelaku; mulong’a muwasompeshang’a mukwenu jimu muwajitanyishang’a eyi aweni, mulong’a eyi wasompeshang’a welang’a mwomumu.
46002002 Etu tuneluki chasompeshang’ayi Nzambi mwaya walala, wahishang’a antu elang’a yuma yiji neyiyi.
46002003 Inji eyi muntu wasompeshang’a wena akong’ang’a yumiyi, iku eyi aweni welang’a mwomumu, wunatong’ozhoki neyi wakapuluka kukuhisha kwamba kahishayi Nzambi, tahinji?

46002004 Eyi wunajiwuli maheta akuwaha kwinji, nichabulang’ayi kuzuwa swayi, nanichi chetezhang’ayi kujung’umika nansang’u zheyi, tahinji? Eyi hiwuneluki neyi kuwaha kwaNzambi kuji nakukukoka ninji wubalumuki mumuchimaku, tahinji?
46002005 Ilang’a chiwachinchikang’a mumuchima nakubula kubalumuka, eyi wukujilumbikila kuzuwa kuwamba kamona hefuku jamba kamwekeshayi Nzambi kuzuwa kwinji nikusompesha kwinji kwalong’a.
46002006 Wamba kayinka antu ezhima mwesekela nyijimu yawu;
46002007 átatakenang’a munyijimu yayiwahi, ákabilang’a lubanzhi lwakulema nimpuhu nikubula kutoka, wenawa wakayinka wumi wahayanyaka;
46002008 ilang’a akwantaji abulang’a kwovwahila walala, ovwahilang’a yaheng’a hohu, wena akamona ninjombu nikuzuwa.
46002009 Kuji antu ezhima elang’a yatama kwakekala lukaji nimakabi, kusambila aYujeya, niaGliki nawa,
46002010 hakwila kuji antu ezhima elang’a yayiwahi, kwakekala lubanzhi lwakulema nimpuhu nikuwunja, kusambila aYujeya, niaGliki nawa.
46002011 Mulong’a kuji Nzambi hikwekala kwakama antu kumesuku.
46002012 Antu ezhima anaputoli chakaji nshimbi, akanong’a chakaji nshimbi; antu ezhima anaputoli chakwiluka nshimbi, akayisompesha nanshimbi.
46002013 Mulong’a akwakutiya nshimbi chakutiya hohu, hijiwu along’a kumesu aNzambuku, ching’a akwakukong’a nshimbi jiwu akaying’ishawu nakuyitena along’a.
46002014 Hela aZHentili abula nshimbi, chakwilawu yuma yekala kunshimbi mwaya chisemwa chawu, wenawa ábula nshimbi anajilili jehi nshimbi awenawu;

46002015 amwekeshang’a nachu nyijimu yanshimbi zhakusoneka jehi munyichima yawu, chinlezhi chawu chamuchima hichikwikala chinsahu, niyitong’ozhoka yawu hiyikuya ninimu ninimu, hekwawu kuyitanyisha, hekwawu kuyiying’isha;
46002016 hefuku jamba kasompeshayi Nzambi naYesu Klistu yuma yawantu yakuzhinja, mwaya nsang’u yayiwahi yinashimunang’ami.
46002017 Eyi wekala nezhina jakaYujeya, wakuhwelelang’a nshimbi, wajisamang’a naNzambi yeyi,
46002018 weluka mwakeng’ayi, wetezhang’a yuma yaswezha kuwaha, akutang’ishang’a yuma yekala munshimbi.
46002019 Eyi wajikuhwelelang’a neyi walombolang’a mputamesu, neyi wuchezhezhi chawena ekala mumwijima.
46002020 Eyi neyi wuntang’ishi yawákaji maana, wunkulung’ang’a yawanyikeki. Kunshimbi wamonang’a mwekalila maana, niwalala.
46002021 Eyi watang’ishang’a mukwenu, hiwajitang’ishang’a eyi awenuku, tahinji? Eyi washimunang’a neyi wukombi watama, eyi aweni weyang’a, tahinji?
46002022 Eyi wahoshang’a neyi kwila wuvumbi chinzhila, eyi welang’a wuvumbi, tahinji? Eyi wahelang’a ankishi, wabuwang’a mumatembeli awu, tahinji?
46002023 Eyi wajisamang’a nanshimbi, eyi aweni chiwamotokang’a nshimbi wasawulang’a Nzambi.
46002024 Mulong’a Izhina jaNzambi enja ajituka mukachi kawaZHentili hansang’u yenwenu, mwomwanasonekuwu.
46002025 Chalala kwalama kwakwashang’a neyi welang’a nshimbi; hakwila neyi wamotokang’a nshimbi, kwalama kweyi kuneli jehi kubula kwalama.
46002026 Jichi neyi chijima wukwila mwaya nshimbi, chabulayi kwalama hichikwikala neyi amwajika jehuku?
46002027 Inji neyi chijima wachisemwa wukwila mwaya nshimbi chalala, abuli kukusompesha eyi wukweti nyikanja yakusoneka jehi nikwalama, nanochu chiwamotokang’a nshimbi, tahinji?
46002028 Mulong’a kaYujeya hikaYujeya wakujitena tuhuku, nikwalama kwakumuzhimba hijiku kwalama kwalalaku.
46002029 KaYujeya walala ching’a wamumuchima, nikwalama kwalala hichuma chakumuchima, chamuSpilitu, hichanshimbi yakusonekaku, wahamekewa kuji Nzambi, bayi kuji antuku.
46003001 Inji kaYujeya wabajikila hanka? Mukwalama muji kumwenamu chumanyi?
46003002 Kwabajika muyuma yayivulu. Chuma chakusambila chochayishililuwu kuhemba mazu aNzambi.
46003003 Inji neyi amu abulili kukuhwelela, chanabuluwu kukuhwelela chikuzhaha kashinshi kaNzambi, tahinji?
46003004 Chinzhila! Chalala, Nzambi ekali walala, antu ezhima ekali antwambi; chochasonekawu jehi nawu, Chiwakahosha akakumoni nawu walong’a, Chakakusompeshawu wakayihishi.
46003005 Neyi kuluwa kwetu kukumwekesha kulong’a kwaNzambi, tukwila netuji? Chazuwang’ayi Nzambi halong’aku, komana? Nahoshi mwahoshang’awu antu.
46003006 Chinzhila! Neyi ochu, Nzambi wakasompesha ng’ahi antu amunu mwishina?
46003007 Neyi kutwamba kwami kunaswezhi kulemesha walala waNzambi, inji ami akunsompeshelaji nawu nimukwanshiji?

46003008 Neyi tukuhosha netu, Twilenung’a chatama kulonja kwinzi kuwaha, kuhosha mwenimu chinawahi tahinji? Mulong’a atutwambilang’a nawu jimu twahoshang’a. Antu ahoshang’a mwenimu, anateli kuyitanyisha.
46003009 Jichi jinu, etu aYujeya twayibajika wena, tahinji? Nehi, hela hanti! Mulong’a twasambila jehi kutanyisha niakwetu aYujeya, niaGliki nawa, netu wezhima wawu aji muchiyuulu chanshiji.
46003010 Mwomwanasonekuwu nawu, Kwosi walong’a, hela niwumuku;
46003011 Kwosi washinshikaku; Kwosi wakeng’akeng’ang’a Nzambuku.
46003012 Wezhima wawu anasenuki jehi hambaji; Wezhima wawu anekali amukunkulwayi hohu; Kwosi welang’a chachiwahi hela niwumuku.
46003013 Nyijiwu yawu hiizhamu jachashi; Ajimbekang’a akwawu namajimi awu; Wulembi watubanjayuula wuji kunyivumbu yawu.
46003014 Mutunwa twawu mwenzala kushing’ana ninjulu.
46003015 Nyenju yawu yanyakashanang’a kuya nakupwekesha mashi;
46003016 Munzhila zhawu mwekala kwakukisang’ana hohu nikuzhilumuna.
46003017 Hiyaneluki nzhila yakumona kuwunjaku.
46003018 Kumesu awu woma waNzambi kwosi.

46003019 Jichi jinu, etu tweluka netu nsang’u yahoshang’a nshimbi yezhima, yahoshang’a nawena ekala muchiyuulu chanshimbi; kulonja kuzhika tunwa twawantu ezhima, niantu ampata yamunu mwishina ezhima akahi namulong’a kumesu aNzambi.
46003020 Mulong’a hikuji muntu akuying’ishawu nakumutena walong’a kumesu inji nanyijimu yanshimbuku; mulong’a kunshimbi jiku kwelukilang’awu antu chiyekala nshiji.
46003021 Ilang’a hanu, kulong’a kwaNzambi kwakaji nshimbi kunamwekani jehi, anakúshimuni nikunshimbi nikuji atuplofwetu;
46003022 kwokulong’a kwaNzambi kwenzang’a kuji akwakukuhwelela ezhima mukukuhwelela Yesu Klistu, mulong’a hikwekala kwambula antuku.
46003023 Mulong’a antu ezhima anaputoli, anakang’anyi kushika mwashikila lubanzhi lwakulema kwaNzambi,
46003024 akuyiying’isha nakuyitena along’a naluwi lwinji chamukunkulu, nakukuula kwekala muji Klistu Yesu.
46003025 Nzambi wamutong’weli yena kwikala itanja jaluwi namashi inji hakukuhwelela, kulonja kumwekesha kulong’a kwinji, chajiwiliyi Nzambi nshiji zhakong’eluwu jehi chachikulu, nawushona winji;
46003026 amwekeshi kulong’a kwinji hamafuku anu; kulonja yomweni ekali walong’a, ekali nawa mukwakuying’isha nakumutena walong’a, muntu wukukuhwelela Yesu.
46003027 Inji tukujisama nanka? Anafumishi jehi kujisama. Anachifumishi nanshimbinyi, yanyijimu tahinji? Nehi, nanshimbi yakukuhwelela hohu.
46003028 Jichi jinu, tunafuukuli netu muntu anamuying’ishi nakumutena walong’a nakukuhwelela chakaji kwila nyijimu yanshimbi.
46003029 Nzambi hiNzambi wawaYujeya hohu, tahinji? HiNzambi yawaZHentili nawaku? Nehi, hiNzambi yawaZHentili nawa.
46003030 Tunamoni netu hiNzambi yowumu wukuying’isha nakutena along’a, niakwakwalama nakukuhwelela, niayijima nawa nakukuhwelela.
46003031 Komana jinu, nshimbi tukuyilisha kwikala yamukunkulwayi nakukuhwelela, tahinji? Chinzhila! Chalala tukukolesha nshimbi.
46004001 Ichi jinu tukwila netu ankakulula zhetu akuchisemwa cha Abalahama, amwenidi?
46004002 Mulong'a neyi Abalahama amuying'ishili nakumutena nawu walong'a nanyijimu yindi, mutenowa ching'a wamweni mwakudisamina, baji dinu kumensu azambiku.
46004003 Mulong'a mumukanda wazhila nawuji?" Abulahama wamukuhweleleli Nzambi, amufukwililichu nawa waling'a."
46004004 Muntu wakong'ama mujimu, wuloku winji hiyawufukulang'a nawu chawanaku, ilang'a chakumukongwesha.
46004005 Ilang'a owu wabulanga kuzata mudimu ilang'a wakumininang'a hohu jakukuhwelela mukwakuying'isha nakutena kulong'a ajiwulang'a Nzambi, kukuhwelela kwanowa Muntu akachichinda nawu hikulonga.
46004006 Mwomwateneneng'ayi Davida, kukoleka kwa Muntu afukwila lang'ayi Nzambi kulonga kwakati nyidimu.
46004007 Wahoshang'a ninji," anokoleki owu Antu ananakewi kuluwa kwawu, ni anabutiliwa nshidi zhawu.
46004008 Nakoleki owu Muntu wukubula kufukwilawu nshidi kudi mwanta."
46004009 kukoleka iku anakuteneni kuji akwakwalama hohu, intahiji nikuji anyang'adima?" mulong'a netu kukuhwelela kwa Abalahama afufukwililichu nawa hikulong'a.
46004010 Achifukwilili nawuji kuji yena? chajing'a mukwalama tahinji mukubula kwalama? himukwalamaku ilang'a mu kubula kwakama.

46004011 Chatambwiliyi  chizhikishilu chakwalama hiwuswu wakulong'a kwatambwiliyi nakukuhwelela chading'iliyi nachu henohu kanda alami. Kulonda akekali Tata yawantu owu ezhina akuhwelela ki abula kwalama, mulong'a along'a achindiwi kuji wena.
46004012 Ilang'a cheng'i hitata yawakwakwalama hela abula kwalama ilang'a ninowu edelang'a mwaya kukuhwlela mwakaluluka yeta Abalahama nahajigaji kanda alami.
46004013 Mulonga ichi chikaninu chamukaninuwu Abalahama nianyaninji, nawu akaswani mpata yamunu mwishina ezhili kuhitila mushimbiku ilang'a kuhitila mukulong'a kwachikuhwelela.
46004014 Neyi akwanshimbi aneli answana, komana kukuhwelela kuneli dehi kwamukumunkulwayi, ni chikaninu chineli dehi chamukunkylwayi.
46004015 Mulong'a nshimbi yaletang'a kuzuwa, ilang'a hanabuli ishimbi, hekalang'a kuputolaku.

46004016 Mulong'a wanichi chinahitili mukukuhwelela, kulonda chili chaluwi kulonda chikakoli nawanyanindi ezhima_baji nawanyana akunshimbi hohuku, Ilang'a nikuji owu anzang'anang'a chikuhwelelu cha Abalahama. Diyi invwali yetu etu onsu,
46004017 Chinasonekewi nawu," nakusakuli kwikala Tata yakayi kejima." Abalahama wajing'a mudi yena wakuhweleleliyi, afu nikwila yuma yabulaku kwikalaku.
46004018 Wakuminini dakuching'eja chakadi hakuching'ezhela, kulonda akekali Tata yakayi kelima, kulondela nanochu chamulezheliwu," Dichu chakekala anyaneyi".
46004019 Chakubula kuzeya muchi kuhwelela,  wamwenu muzhimba winji neyi  wafwa(mulong'a yakayindi yashikili kafwampi neyi nkulakaji), ni hakwiluka ninji Sala wachinuka dehi.
46004020 Ilang'a mulong'a wakuyishika Abalahama wazeyeli muchikuhwelela chindiku. Ilang'a, watambwili  eng'vu nakukuhwelela hadingayi nakumulemesha Nkambi.
46004021 Zhezhima Nzambi zhamushikiliyi, yena wakazhishikizha.
46004022 Dichi" amufukwililichu nawu hikulong'a."
46004023 Ilang'a muzu amuchindililili ading'i  akusoneka mulong'a wayena inkawidiku.
46004024 Atusonekeleli ninetu nawa, etu akuleng'a kufukukwilawu kudi etu tunakuhweleli netu Nzambi diyi wasanwili Yesu mwanta wetu mudi afu.
46004025 Iwu diyi ona wulubwiliwu mulong'a yasang'u zhetu amusnwili kulonda atuyingishi nakututna along'a.
46005001 Jichi chanatuying’ishuwu jehi nakututena along’a nakukuhwelela, tukweti kuwunja naNzambi muji Mwanta wetu Yesu Klistu.
46005002 Kuji yena nawa jiku tunamweni kwing’ila muluwi ilu mutwekala nakukuhwelela. Twazang’alalang’a chitwaching’ezhang’a lubanzhi lwakulema kwaNzambi.
46005003 Hijimu hohu bweng’uku, twazang’alalang’a nankashi nawa nimulukaji lwetu; mulong’a tuneluki netu lukaji lwaletang’a kutatakena;
46005004 kutatakena kwaletang’a kwilukamu; kwilukamu kwaletang’a kuching’ezha;
46005005 kuching’ezha hikwatiyishang’a nsonyuku, mulong’a anechili jehi kukeng’a kwaNzambi munyichima yetu, kuji Spilitu Wazhila anatwinkuwu.
46005006 Hitwachijing’i twabula ng’ovu, hashikili mwaka watelela, Klistu wafwilili ajiwula Nzambi.
46005007 Kufwila muntu walong’a chakala, ilang’a muntu wamuwahi, kwizhi kukumwekana wumu wukubula woma wakumufwila.
46005008 Ilang’a Nzambi wamwekeshang’a kukeng’a kwinji yomweni kujetu, hohitwachijing’i akwanshiji Klistu watufwilili.
46005009 Jichi jinu, chanatuying’ishuwu jehi nakututena along’a namashi inji, twakabajika kupuluka kukuzuwa kwaNzambi hamuzhimba wayena.
46005010 Chatukunjamishiluwu kuji Nzambi hakufwa kwaMwaninji, hitwajing’i ayilumbu, ichi chanatukunjamishuwu jehi, tukuswezha nankashi kuhanja nawumi winji.
46005011 Hijimu hohu bweng’uku, twazang’alalang’a muji Nzambi muji Mwanta wetu Yesu Klistu, kutunatambuli kukunjamisha.
46005012 Jichi kuji muntu wumu nshiji yeng’ilili mumpata yamunu mwishina, ninshiji yaleteli kufwa, chochenochu nawa nikufwa kwashikeneni antu ezhima, mulong’a wezhima wawu aputoleli.
46005013 Nshiji yajing’i mumpata yamunu mwishina henohu nshimbi yichiji kanja yinzi; neyi nshimbi kwosi hiyaji kwinka muntu mulong’aku.
46005014 Ilang’a jinu, kufumisha kuji Ajama njo-o nikuji Mosi, kufwa kwelili mwanta wawantu ezhima hela abulili kuputola neyi chaputoleliyi Ajama, chifwikizha chanowu eliluwu nawu wakenza.

46005015 Ilang’a chamukunkulu chaluwi hichinesekani namulong’aku. Chafwiluwu antu amavulu nakuputola kwamuntu wumu, komana luwi lwaNzambi nichamukunkulu chenzhili naluwi lwamuntu wumu, yowu Yesu Klistu, chikuyiswezhela nankashi antu amavulu.

46005016 Chamukunkulu hichenzhili nayena waputoleluku. Kusompesha kwenzhili hansang’u yaputoleliyi muntu wumu kulonja kuhisha, ilang’a chamukunkulu chaluwi chenzhili hansang’u yanyilong’a yayivulu, kulonja kuyiying’isha nayikutena along’a.

46005017 Chaputoleliyi muntu wumu, kufwa hikukwila mwanta hansang’u yamuntu wumu, jichi antu akutambula luwi olu lwaswezha kuvula, nichamukunkulu chakulong’a, akubajika nankashi kwikala anyanta muwumi hansang’u yawumu, yowu Yesu Klistu.
46005018 Jichi jinu, neyi mulong’a wumu waleteli kuhisha kuji antu ezhima, mwomumu nawa, mujimu wumu wakulong’a hiwukuleta kulong’a kwawumi kuji antu ezhima.
46005019 Chelili amavulu hiyakwikala akwanshiji nakuzhikwa kwamuntu wumu, jichi nawa antu amavulu akayiying’isha kwikala along’a hakwovwahila kwawumu.
46005020 Nshimbi hiyikwinza nakutohesha mulong’a; komana kwáswezheli nshiji, hikukubajika nankashi luwi, lúswezha nikuswezha.
46005021 Kulonja chelili nshiji mwanta mukufwa, chochenochu nawa luwi hilukwikala mwanta nakulong’a, lwaya kuwumi wahayanyaka, muji Mwanta wetu Yesu Klistu.
46006001 Tukwakula neteji, tukakelenu munshiji kulonda luwi luswezhi ntahinji?
46006002 Chijila, etu twafwili nakwambuka kuwanta washili, tukutwesha kuhanjilaku cheng'ing'ahi?
46006003 Enu munayambi tahinji, Etu ezhima azhimikiliwu muji Kilisitu Yesu, atujikwing'ili mukufwa kwiji.
46006004 Dichi kuchizhimikilu atizhikili hamu ninji twinili mufufwa kulonda chasang'ukili kilisitu muji afu nalubanji lwakulema kwatata, dichi ninetu nawa twji kwenja muwimi wawuha.
46006005 Mulong'a chitunajibombi jehi ninji, nachifwikizha chakufwa kwinji, jichi chitukwikala nachifwikizha.
46006006 Chituneluki jehi netu, mutu wamukulu netu amupopeli jehi hamu naYesu hakulusu kulonda kufimisha henohu tubuli kwikala nawa cheng'i mujimu wanshiji.
46006007 Mulong'a muntu nafwi nasubuki jehi kuchiyulu chanshiji.
46006008 Ilang'a neyi tunafwi naKilisitu, tunakuhweleli netu tukahajila nawa hamuniji:
46006009 Tunekuki netu,chineli kilisitu amusanwili muji afu,heteli kufwa kamuchiyejiku; kufwa hikukutela kuyula haji yenaku
46006010 Chafwiliyi yena wafwili nakwambuka kuwanta wanshiji, kamu  hohu bweng'i, hakwila ichi chahandayi wamuhanjilang'a Nzambi.
46006011 Nimunzhila yoyimu ninenu aweni jifukulenu nenu, muafu mwambuka kuwanta wanshiji, hakwila muji Kilisitu munekala amwomi muji Kilisitu Yesu.
46006012 Jichi jinu bayi mwitezha nshijikwikala nawanta mimizhimba yenu, mwakamovwahila kufwila kwayu.
46006013 Bayi mulabila yiji yenu yamuzhimba kunshijiku, ching'a muzhilubili kuji Nzambi nenu muyantu anasang'ukijehi mukufwa; mulubuli yiji yenu yikali yakumukalakela Nzambi mijimu yalong'a.
46006014 Bayi mwitezha nshiji kuyula mujenuku. Mulong'a himuji kunshimbiku, ilang'a muji kuluwi.
46006015 Uchijinu tukwakula netuji? tutwalekihu kuvulumona mulong'a hituji kunshimbiku, nikuluwi? hichikutweshakaku.
46006016 Mweluka jehi nawu neyi mujilubula kuji muntu mwikala andung'u zhinji hakumovwahilang'a, hela zhanshiji nakutwala kukufwa, hela zhakovwahila, nakutwala kukulong'a.
46006017 Ichi jinu tumusakilili Nzambi! hela mwajing'i andung'u zhanshiji, munekali jehi akakovwahila mumichima yenu, kuntang'ishilu yayitang'ishiliwu.
46006018 Anakwilishi kwikala wakasuluka munshiji, ichi jinu wunakali jehi ndung'u yakulong'a.

46006019 Nahosheli neyi muntu, hansang'u yakuzeya kwamuzhimba mulong'a chimwalubwili yiji yenu yikala andung'u zhawuzondu nizhakuluwa kwakulunjika hakuluwa, dichi jinu lubukenu yiji yenu yikali andung'u zhakulong'a mukalakali azhila.
46006020 chimwajing'a andung'u zhanshiji, mwabulili wudung'u wakulong'a.
46006021 Hayenoyu mpinji, mikabwinyi jinu yamwajing'a nayu hayuma oyu yitiyili nsonyi? mulong'a kwakukumina yumoyu kuji kufwa.
46006022 Ichi jinu munafumi mumwijima wanshiji, munabalumuki kwikala andung'u zhaNzambi. mukusongelamu mikabu yaya kukuzhila. wunsahu wachi hiwumi wahaya nyaka.
46006023 Mulong'a wuloku wanshiji hikufwa, ilang'a chamukunkulu chaNzambi huwumi wahayanyaka muji mwanta Yesu Kilisitu.
46007001 Hinikuhosha nawantu eluki nshimbi enu anakwetu, munayambi chiyineli nshimbi yikweti chiyuulu haji muntu neyi wuchinji.
46007002 Mumbanda wasumbuka neyala, amubombela jehi hamu kuji iyala kulushimbi hachinjiyi iyala waweni ilang'a neyi iyala nafwi yena mumbanda nakasuliki jehi, kuchiyulu chamfumwinji.

46007003 Jichi jinu neyi Yena mumbanda wukusumbuka neyala wacheng'i, imfumwinji wunji wamuweni hakumutena nawu chivumbi, ilang'a neyi mfumwinji nafwi jehi mumbanda nafumi jehi kunshimbi oyu hela wusumbuka neyala wacheng'i haji chivumbiku.

46007004 Enu ayetu enu nawa mwelajehi muyafu nakwambuka kuchiyulu chanshinji kumuzhimba waKilisituwafwili hamutondu wakusempakesha kulonda mwakekali nawaching'i nayenowu asang'wiliwu muji afu, kulonda tumusonekeli Nzambi nyikabu yinji.
46007005 Mulong'a chitwajing'i muchisemwa chashinji kwanji na kwetwetu kunshimbi hakukukong'a nyikabu yakutwala kukufwa.

46007006 Ichi jinu atufumishili kunshimbi kuyumoyu yatukakeleli tuyafu, kulonda twakakalakali munzhila yayiha yoyaSipilitu bayi munzhila yayikulu yanjikiliwu. Ichi jinu tukwakula netuji? Nshimbi hishinji tahinji? chinzhila ilang'a jinu, hanaji kwiluka nshiji chakaji nshimbiku. Mulong'a neyi nshimbi yabulili kwila nawu, kwikala nalwisu chazhila, hinaji kwiluka lwisuku.

46007007 Ichi jinu tukwakula netuji? Nshimbi hishinji tahinji? chinzhila ilang'a jinu, hanaji kwiluka nshiji chakaji nshimbiku. Mulong'a neyi nshimbi yabulili kwila nawu, kwikala nalwisu chazhila, hinaji kwiluka lwisuku.
46007008 Ilang'a nshinji yinakwitili ing'ovu kunshimbi, hiyakukong'ala mujami lwisu lwezhima lweng'i nalweng'i, mulong'a kwakubula nshimbi nshiji yafwa.
46007009 Chinabulili najing'i mumu, ilang'a chenjili nshimbi, inshinji hinukuzang'alala, ami nawa hinukufwa.
46007010 Ishimbi yajing'i yakuleta wumi hinukuyimomna yatela kufwa.
46007011 Mulong'a nshimbi yashila yinakwatili ing'ovu kunshimbi, hiyakujimba, hikuzhaha.
46007012 Nochu jimu nshimbi yazhila, nikulezha kwazhilakwalong'a kwakuwahi.

46007013 Inji chuma chachiwahi chatelela kuleta kufwa, tahinji? Chatela wanyi alonjeli nshinji yimwekani nawu hinshiji yaleteli kufwa munjami nachuma chachiwahi kulonda nshiji yiikali yaswezha nankanshi kutama nanshiji yineli yawuSipilitu, ilang'a niji wachisemwa chaheseki, alanjishajehi kuchisemwa chanshinji.
46007014 Tweluka netu nshiji yineli yawuSipilitu, ami niji wachisemwa chaheseki, analanjishi jehi kuchisemwa chanshiji.
46007015 Munelang'a hineluka mwoku, munakeng'ang'a kwila hinelang'a mwoku munahelang'a jimu nelang'a.
46007016 Neyi nelang'a munabulang'a kukeng'a, netezhang'a nshiji nami yayiwahi.
46007017 Jichi jinu, hiyami nawa nelang'a mwoku, nshiji yekala munjami jiyi yenana.
46007018 Mulong'a neliki nami mujami, nakeng'i chisemwa chami chaheseki, nami mwekala chuma chachiwahi hela nichimuku, mulong'a muchima kwilamu kutwesha nehi.
46007019 Kuwaha kunakeng'ang'a kwila hinakwilang'aku, ilang'a kutama kunabula kukeng'a kwila, jiku nelang'a.
46007020 Neyi nelang'a chuma nabulang'a kukeng'a kwila chachiwahi, komana hiyami nachilang'aku, achilang'a kuji nshiji yashakama muji ami.
46007021 Namoni komana kuji chinzhililu chakwila neyi nakeng'i kwila chachiwahi, kumona kutama kuji kwoku.
46007022 Mulong'a muntu wami wamukachi watiyang'a kuwaha nsnshimbi yaNzambi.
46007023 Ilang'a namoni chinzhililu chacheni muyiji yami chalwishang'a nachinzhililu chiyitongozhoka yami, chinakeng'i kuying'izha muwujung'u wachinzhililu chanshiji chekala muyiji yami.
46007024 Ami nshona! o'kukala kunakamonang'a ; wukung'amwina kumuzhimba iwu wakufwa, hinyi?

46007025 Nasakiliki Nzambi nami Yesu Kilisitu mwanta wetu jiyi natweshi. Jichi jinu ami aweni, nayiting'ozhoka nakalakelang'a nshimbi yaNzambi, hikwinza nachisemwa chaheseki nakalakelang'a chinzhililu chanshinji.
46008001 Jichi jinu, antu ekala muji Klistu Yesu hikwekala kuyihisha namulong’aku.
46008002 Mulong’a chinzhililu chaSpilitu chawumi wekala muji Klistu Yesu, chinang’amwini jehi kuchinzhililu chanshiji nakufwa.

46008003 Mulong’a nshimbi chiyakang’enyi nanochu chiyazeyeli hansang’u yachisemwa chaheseki, Nzambi hakutemesha Mwaninji yomweni akajifwani namuntu wachisemwa chanshiji, akekali mulambu wahanshiji, akatanyishi nachu nshiji muchisemwa chaheseki.
46008004 Kulonja mwalong’ela nshimbi mulumbuluki mujetu twabulang’a kwenja mwaya chisemwa chaheseki, ching’a mwaya Spilitu.
46008005 Mulong’a antu enjang’a mwaya chisemwa chaheseki atong’ozhokang’a yuma yachisemwa chaheseki. Antu enjang’a mwaya Spilitu atong’ozhokang’a yuma yaSpilitu.
46008006 Yitong’ozhoka yachisemwa chaheseki hikufwa, ilang’a yitong’ozhoka yaSpilitu hiwumi nikuwunja.
46008007 Mulong’a yitong’ozhoka yachisemwa chaheseki yekala nawulumbu naNzambi; hiyovwahilang’a nshimbi yaNzambuku, hela kutweshamu nehi.
46008008 Antu achisemwa chaheseki hiyakutwesha kumutiyisha Nzambi kuwahaku.
46008009 Neyi Spilitu waNzambi washakama mujenu, komana muji áSpilitu himuji áchisemwa chahesekuku. Neyi muntu wabula Spilitu waKlistu, himuntu winjuku.
46008010 Neyi Klistu wekala mujenu, muzhimba wafwa jehi hansang’u yanshiji; hakwila spilitu nahanji hansang’u yakulong’a.
46008011 Neyi Spilitu wayenowu wasang’wili Yesu muji afu washakama mujenu, yena wasang’wili Klistu Yesu muji afu wukuhanjisha nawa ninyizhimba yenu yakufwa, naSpilitu winji washakama mujenu.
46008012 Nochu jinu, enu anakwetu, hitukweti mukuji nachisemwa chaheseki mwaka twenji mwaya chisemwa chahesekuku.
46008013 Mulong’a neyi mukwenja mwaya chisemwa chaheseki, mukufwa; ilang’a neyi mukufwisha nyijimu yachisemwa chaheseki naSpilitu, mukuhanja.
46008014 Mulong’a antu ezhima alombolang’awu kuji Spilitu waNzambi, jiwu anyana kaNzambi ashinshika.
46008015 Mulong’a himwatambwili spilitu yawujung’u mwaka mutiyi cheng’i womaku; mwatambwili Spilitu wakwikala anyana, yowu twatambikang’a nachu netu, Tata Yami!
46008016 Yomweni Spilitu washimunang’a wunsahu hamu naspilitu yetu, ninji muyanyana kaNzambi.
46008017 Neyi tuyanyana komana tuji answana; answana aNzambi akuswana chimu naKlistu, neyi tukumona ninji makabi, kulonja akatulemeshi chimu ninji nawa.
46008018 Nafuukuli nami makabi akatataka hiyanateli kweseka nalubanzhi lwakulema lwamba kamwekana kujetuku.
46008019 Kuleng’a kwezhima kwaching’ililang’a nakwakama nichamba kamwekanawu anyana kaNzambi.
46008020 Mulong’a kuleng’a kwezhima akwilishili kwakujikabisha tuhu, hichakujikeng’elaku, ching’a mwomwaya muchima wanowu wakwilili chochochu ilang’a washilumu hakuching’ezhela.
46008021 Kulonja kuleng’a kwakweni kufumi muwujung’u wakutoka kwing’ili mukusubuka kwaswezha kwalubanzhi lwakulema kwawanyana kaNzambi.
46008022 Tuneluki netu kuleng’a kwezhima kwabang’a nakufunyisha hamu, nikulelu.

46008023 Hijimu hohu bweng’uku, ninetu aweni, túkweti nyikabu yatachi yaSpilitu, twaabang’a munyichima yetu nawa, nakuching’ilila chitwakela anyana chikupu, kwokukuula kwamba kakuulawu nyizhimba yetu.
46008024 Tunahanjili kuching’ezha; ilang’a kuching’ezha chuma chakumona jehi hikuching’ezhaku. Hinyi waching’ezhang’a chuma chamonayi jehi?
46008025 Ilang’a neyi twaching’ezhang’a chuma chakubula kumona, henohu jinu tukutatakena nakuching’ilila.
46008026 Mwomumu nawa niSpilitu watukwashang’a hitwazeyazeyang’a; mulong’a hituneluki mutwaji kulombelaku, ilang’a Spilitu yomweni watulembelelang’a nakwaba kwakweni kwakukang’anya kushimuna.
46008027 Niyena wáshinshikang’a munyichima yawantu, neluki mwatong’ozhokang’ayi Spilitu, mulong’a walembelelang’a akwakuzhila mwaya muchima waNzambi.
46008028 Tuneluki netu, kuji antu akeng’a Nzambi, yena wakalakelang’a muyuma yezhima nakuyiletela kuwaha, wowu atambikiliyi mwafuukwiliyi jehi.
46008029 Mulong’a antu asambililang’ayi jehi kwiluka, wayikunzhikilang’ahu jehi nawa, ninji abalumuki kwikala neyi chekalayi Mwaninji; kulonja yena akekali weji mukachi kawanakwinji amavulu.
46008030 Awa asambililang’ayi jehi kukunzhika, wayitambikili nawa; awa atambikiliyi, wayiying’ishili nakuyitena along’a nawa; awa aying’ishiluwu nakuyitena along’a, wayilemesheli nawa.
46008031 Ichi jinu, yumiyi tukwakula netuji? Neyi Nzambi nekali wetwetu, wukwikala chilumbu chetu hinyi?
46008032 Yena wabulili kwanakena Mwaninji omweni, hakumulubula hajetu ezhima wetu, abuli kutulunzhikila haji yena yuma yezhima makasa ayeji?
46008033 Antu atonjayi Nzambi, akuyiholokela kujinyi? Yomweni Nzambi jiyi wayiying’ishang’a nakuyitena along’a.
46008034 Akuyihisha kujinyi? Yomweni Klistu Yesu jiyi wafwili, eng’a chalala, jiyi asang’wiluwu muji afu, jiyi wekala kuchikasa chaNzambi chachijiilu, jiyi watulembelelang’a nawa.
46008035 Wukutwambula kukukeng’a kwaKlistu hinyi? Yihung’u tahinji? Kumona kukala tahinji? Makabisha tahinji? Nzala tahinji? Wuvu tahinji? Yuma yafwana tahinji? Mpoku yakabali tahinji?
46008036 Chochanasonekuwu nawu, Hansang’u yeyi atuzhahang’a mwaana wezhima, Atufuukulang’a neyi anyikoku atezhi kuzhahewa.
46008037 Kwakulehi! Muyuma yezhimiyi tunekali akwakwimika mushinju nikubajikamu, nang’ovu zhayena watukeng’eli.
46008038 Mulong’a neluki chikupu nami hela kufwa, hela wumi, hela ang’elu, hela mawanta, hela yuma yakatataka, hela yuma yamba kenza, hela yuma yikweti ng’ovu,
46008039 hela kuleha kwakwiwulu, hela kukunama, hela chuma chacheng’i chaleng’eluwu chimu, hiyikutwesha kutwambula kukukeng’a kwaNzambi kwekala muji Klistu Yesu, Mwanta wetuku.
46009001 Nahoshi walala muji KIlisitu. Hinatwambiku, chinlezhi chami chamuchima hichinsahu hamu naSipilitu wazhila.
46009002 Nami kuji chuma chimu chanengeshang'a nankashi nikukata kwabulang'a kumwena mumuchima wami.
46009003 Naaji kukeng'a nami nikumini jakushing'ewa nakukinjikewa nifumi kuji Kilisitu Kukoola anakwami, antang'a zhami inasemuka nawu.
46009004 Wowu aIsarela enkeliwu kwikala anyana kambala, nilumbanji, lwakulema niyitiyangenu ninshimbi, nikukalakela Nzambi, niyikaninu.
46009005 Jiwu akweti ankakulula kuji wena jiku kwenzhili Kilisitu nimwaya muzhimba-hiNzambi jinabuli wabajika ezhima. Wakiswilewa hayanyaka. Amen.
46009006 Ilang'a hichiji neyi izu jaNzambi jinabuli ng'ovuku. mulong'a antu ezhima avwalika kumutang'a wa Isarela wezhimawawuku.
46009007 Hela chanekaluwu mbutu ya Abarahama. Wezhima wawu hiyanyanaku; ilang'a, wawu mbutu yeyi akayitenena muji Isaka"
46009008 Chaya mukwila nawu, anyana avwalika kumuzhimba hijiwu anyana kaNzambi. Ilang'a anyana achikaninu jiwu afukulang'a nawu hiyanyana.
46009009 Mulomg'a Izu jachikaninu jojeniji: "Hichilaaka chikwawu nakenza, Sara wakavwala mwana"
46009010 Hijimu hohu mwenimuku, Ilang'a nichababiliyi Rabeka ivumu naiyala wumu, yowu tata yetu Isaka-
46009011 Hajing'iwu anyana achijikanda hela kwila chachiwahi hela chatama kanja, mijimu yaNzambi kwesekezha nang'ovu yikwimana,
46009012 Bayi mulong'a wayilwiluku, ilang'a kulonda mwatongweliyi Nzambi mukoli- yena, "mukulumpi wakakalakela kansi",
46009013 Mwomwanjikiliwu nawu; nakengeli "Yakoba, naheleli Esawu".
46009014 Ichi jinu tukwakula netuji? Nzambi wukweti habulilayi kulonda tahinji? chinzhila.
46009015 Mulong'a wamwilili Mosi ninji, "muntu inukukeng'a kutiya luwi jiyi inukutiyila Luwi, muntu inikutiyila wushona nawa jiyi inukutiiyila wushona".
46009016 Jichi, hichiji kuji wakeng'ang'a, hela kuji wajikwatishang'a, ching'a kuji Nzambi wukweti luwu hohu.
46009017 Mulong'amumukanda wazhila amwilili Fwalo nawu, "Jichi chimanakulemesheli; kulonda nimwekesheli ng'ovu zhami mujeyi, kulonda izhina jami jitiyikani mwezhima mwahita iseki jezhima".
46009018 Nochu yowu, anakeng'i kutiyilayi luwi, wukumutiyila luwi, yowu anakengiyi kuchinchikishayi wukumuchinchikisha.
46009019 Eyi wukung"ila neyi, "mulong'anyi sang'a enkelayi antu nyilong'a? wukujikang'a namuchima wambala hinyi?"
46009020 Aka, eyi wumuntu tuhu, wumwakuli Nzambi nawinyi? "inji chuma chatung'awu jehi, chimwili mukawukalawinu, ninji wunatung'iliji chenichi?"
46009021 Kang'emi watweshang'a kuwumba mwanakeng'iyi kuchikanka chimu abuli kuwumbaku chuma chimu chamujimu walema, nichuma chekwawu chamujimu wekwawu wabula kulema?
46009022 Nzambi chakengeliyi kumwekesha kuzuwa kwinji nakuyitiyakesha ng'ovu zhinji, wetezheli kujing'umika nansang'u yayuma yatela kuzuwila, yalong'eshelang'ayi jehi kuzhilumuka?
46009023 Kulonda akatiyakesha maheta alubanji lwakulema  kwinji nayuma yatong'weliyi jehi, yalong'eshelang'ayi jehi yikali nalubanji lwakulema.
46009024 Inji neyi ichi watwilili etu, yetu atamikiliyi mukachi kawa zhentili? himukachi kawaYudeya hohuku.
46009025 Chochanahoshiwu kumukanda waHoseya nawa nawa nawu: "Abulili kwikala antu ami nakayila nami antu zhami, ni mumbanda wabulili kukeng'ewa nakamwila nami wakeng'ewa.
46009026 Chakekala neyi kwayiteneniwu nawu himuji antu zhamiku, jikwayitenang'aku nawu muji anyana kaNzambi wamumi".
46009027 Isaya hakubijika nakutena aIsarela ninji, "Hela anyana kaIsarela akavula neyi wusekullula wakukalung'alwizhi, chibalu chawantu antesha hohu jiwu akamwinewa,
46009028 Mulong'a mwanta wakakong'a mwaya izu jinji heseki. Wakaketula nsang'u nakuyikumisha".
46009029 Chocheleliyi jehi Isaya nanji, "Neyi Mwanta wamazaza wabulili kutushila mbutu, mutenowu tunekali neyiSadomi, hela kutwufwanisha neyi Gomola".
46009030 Ichi jinu tukwakula netuji? Azhentili, abulili kulondela mwaya kulong'a anatambuli jehi kulon'ga, kulong'a koku kukuhwelela.
46009031 Kwinza Isarela, alonjelang'a nshimbi yakulong'a anabuli kushika kunshimbi yakulong'a.
46009032 Mulong'anyi? mulong'a chabuliluwu kuyikang'akeng'a nakukulwelela, ching'a nanyijimu hohu. Wena ahukeni kwilolwa oji jakuhukama.
46009033 Mwomwananjikiwu nawu, "talenu, ami hinukukwasha muziyona ilolwa jakuhukana nilwilolwa lwakujimbwisha. Muntu wukumukuhwelela hiyakamutiyisha nsonyiku".
46010001 Enu anakwetu, kukeng'a kwa Muchima wami nikutembelela kuji Nzambi yowu nami, a Isalela amwinewu.
46010002 Ami nichinsahu chawu nami aswezha iyeng'a, hasang'u ya Nzambi ilang'a chakuya mbashana.
46010003 Mulong'a, wena chayambanawu kulong'a kwa Nzambi, hiyakukeng'a nawu akoleshi kulong'a kwawu, anehi kwovwahila kulong'a kwa Nzambi nehi.
46010004 Mulong'a Kilisitu jiyi kukuma kwanshimbi nakuleta kulong'a kuji  Antu ezhima akumukuhwelela.
46010005 Mosi nasoneki ninji  muntu welang'a kulong'a kwamushimbi: Wakahanjilamu.

46010006 Hakwila kulong'a kwafuma kukukuhwelela kwelang'a nawu: " chinzhila mu Muchima weyi neyi, wukukanjama mwiwuluhinyi? chafwana neyi kuleta Klistu mwishina.Hela kwila neyi, Wukukunkumuka mukalung’a hinyi?
46010007 chafwana neyi kumusang’ula Klistu muji afu.
46010008 Ilang’a nawuji? Nawu, Izu jiji kwakwihi naneyi, Jiji mukanwa keyi nimumuchima weyi, jojizu jakukuhwelela jitwashimunang’a.
46010009 Mulong’a neyi wukwitezha nakanwa keyi neyi Yesu jiyi Mwanta, nakukuhwelela mumuchima weyi neyi Nzambi wamusang’wili muji afu, eyi wukwamwinewa.
46010010 Mulong’a namuchima muntu wakuhwelelang’a nakutambula kulong’a; nakanwa wetezhang’a nakutambula wamwinu.
46010011 Mukanja wazhila nawu, Muntu wukumukuhwelela hiyakamutiyisha nsonyuku.
46010012 Mulong’a nikaYujeya nikaGliki hiyanaambukuku; Mwanta yowumu jiyi Mwanta wawu ezhima wawu; mahetinji ezhima ambala awantu ezhima akumutambika.
46010013 Mulong’a Muntu wukutambika izhina jaMWANTA wukwamwinewa.
46010014 Akumutambika ng’ahi chakaji kumukuhwelela? Akumukuhwelela ng’ahi chakaji kutiya mpuhu yinji? Akutiya ng’ahi chakaji mukwakushimuna?
46010015 Akushimuna ng’ahi chakaji kuyitemesha? Mwomwanasonekuwu nawu, O lubanzhi lwanyenju yawantu akuleta nsang’u yayiwahi yayuma yakulung’isha!
46010016 Hekala amakwawu abulili kutiyilila kunsang’u yayiwahi. Mulong’a Isaya ninji, Eyi MWANTA nakuhweleli mutunashimuni, hinyi?
46010017 Jichi kukuhwelela kwafumang’a hakutiya, nikutiya kwenzang’a nezu jaNzambi.
46010018 Ilang’a ami nami abulili kutiya, tahinji? Nehi mwani. Nawu, Lushinju lwawu lwatiyakeni munu mumpata yamunu mwishina mwezhima, Nimazu awu ashikili kwakumina matung’a.
46010019 Ilang’a ami nami aIsalela abulili kwiluka, tahinji? Hakusambila Mosi ninji, Ami nukuyivuloka mutiyi mukáwu nawantu anabuli kwikala munza; Nukuyizuwisha namunza wakaji maana.
46010020 NiIsaya naswezhi kuumika ninji, Anweni kuji antu abulili kunkeng’akeng’a, Namwekeni kuji antu abulili kung’ihula.
46010021 Ilang’a hakuhosha nawaIsalela ninji, Mwaana wezhima nolweli makasami kuji antu ajikang’a, akweti nintaji.
46011001 Ami nami, Nzambi nayumbi antu zhinji? chinzhila! ninami nikaIsarela nawa, nimwana kaAbarahama, wakumuchiji waBenjamini.
46011002 Nzambi hombang'a antu zhinjiku, ana elukiliyi jehi. Himweluka nenu mukanda wazhila wahosha haji Elizha chalemeleliyi Nzambi nakutena aIsarela, enu kwenu kulukamu nehi?
46011003 Ninji, eyi Mwanta, anzhahi jehi tumeng'a tweyi twakulambwila, Ami yami anashalihu kankawami hohu, Ninami nawa hiyakukeng'a kunzhaha.
46011004 Ilang'a Nzambi hakumwakula ninjinji? Ninji, nashali namakombakazhi atanu nayedi wantu (7000) anabuli kufukamina Bayali.
46011005 Hela katataka nawa haji chibalu chawantu antesha mwaya kutonda kwaNzambi kwaluwi.
46011006 Ilang'a neyi chineli chaluwi, hichamijimu, mukunkulwayi luwi hilukwikala luwiku.
46011007 Jichu jinu, chakeng'eluwu aIsalela, hiyachitambwiliku, hakwinza atonjeliwu achitambwili, ilang'a ashalilihu ayichinhikishili.
46011008 Neyi momwananjikiwu nawu, "Nzambi nayinki Sipilitu yakunong'oka, nimensu akubula kumona, nimatelu akubuka kutiya nikwifuku jalelu.
46011009 NiDavidi ninji, mesa yawu yiikali muhetu nikapama, nikwakujimbukila yakuyifweta nachu.
46011010 Mensu awu ayiyishili kulonda kubula kumona ni nikuzembang'isha manyima awu mafuku ezhima.
46011011 Jichi hinukwila nami, ajimbukili kulonda azhimbali chikupu, tahinji? chinzhila, chanajimbukuwu wena, azhentili anamoni kwamwinewa, kulonda kuyivuloka atiyi mukawu.
46011012 Neyi jinu chijimbukuwu wena, antu amunu mwishina  anaheteluku, nikuhalwa kwahu kunaheteshi azhintili, inji chamba kawaninawu chikupu hichakaswezhaku?
46011013 Ami nahoshi nanenu azhentili, nanichi chiniji kapositolu kawazhentili nenda nilemesha mujimu wami.
46011014 Hamwaka kuvulokahu akwetu inasemuka nawu, kulonda atiyi mukawu, nitweshi kwamwina amakwawu.
46011015 Mulong'a neyi chanayikunjikiwu chanakunjamishi antu amunu mwishina, inji chakayitambulawu cheng'i chakela ng'ahi? Hikusang'uka muji afuku?
46011016 Neyi wung'a wazhila, ninshima nawa yikwikala yazhila, neyi muzhi wazhila nimiyi nawa yikwila yazhila.
46011017 Ilang'a neyi mitayi yikwawu akuyikunkulaku, nineyi mutondu wamu oliva  wamumasang'a akunung'ili makachi kayu, hiwukujiila hamu  nayu nikumuzhi akumutondu wa oliva,
46011018 Bayi wajivwimbaku hamitayiku. Ilang'a neyi wukujivwimba, hiyeyi wakwashang'a mizhiku, Ilang'a mizhi jiyu yakukwashang'a eyi.
46011019 Eyi keng'a wili neyi, mitayi ayikunkwiluku kulonja anung'ilumu ami.
46011020 Eng'a chalala. mulong'a chakubula kukuhwelela ayikunkwili, ilang'a eyi wunemani  chalola mulong'a wachikuhwelelu cheyi. Bayi wujinka wantaku chang'a wutiya woma
46011021 Chabuliliyi Nzambi kwanakena mitayi yikweti mutonda, nineyi nawa.
46011022 Talenu kuwaha nikuzuwa kwaNzambi, wena ajimbukili amweni kuzuwa, ilang'a neyi akabula wukumona kuwaha kwaNzambi, neyi wukukalakela mukuwaha kwinji, mukunkulwayi nineyi nawa akakukunkulaku.
46011023 Niwena nawa, Neyi akabula kukakela muntanji zhawu, akayinung'ilamu, mulong'a Nzambi: natweshi kuyinung'ilamu cheng'i.

46011024 Inji neyi eyi akukunkwili kumutondu wamu Oliva wameneni mumpata, akunung'ili mumutondu wamu  Oliva wakujima, wabula kwikala chisemwa cheyi, inji mitayi yambala yamu Oliva wakujima akabuli kuyinung'a cheng'i mumitondu wawu, tahinji?
46011025 Enu anakwetu, hinakeng'aku kuyamba chinjikizhilu leluku, mwakenda kajisama nenu tukweti mana.Nami kuchinchika kunawani aIsalela amakwawu, ninichi chamba kawanine  azhentili.
46011026 Chachimu nina Isalela ezhima anakulewi, neyi chochu chanafunjikiwu: ''kufuma muziyona kwakenza nkuuli. Wakafumisha kajiwu muji Yakoba,
46011027 Ninji ichi jichu chakekala chitiyang'enu chami nawena, hinakafumisha nshinji zhawu.''
46011028 Kunsong'a yayiwahi aneli ayilumbu, kulonda kuyikwashaku enu, ilang'a kutong'ola kwaNzambi achiji kuyikeng'a, hansang'u zhawankakulula zhawu.
46011029 Mulang'a yamukunkulu nikutambika kwaNzanbi hikwabalumukang'aku.
46011030 Chimwelili enu hanyaka yamunyima kwovwahila Nzambi nehi, hakwala katataka munamoni jehi luwi hansang'u yakuzhikwa kwawu.
46011031 Jichi niwena nawa anekali azhikwa akamona luwi lumunamonenu.
46011032 Mulong'a chanenzeleliyi Nzambi antu azhima mukuzhikwa, nalonji kwanakena antu ezhima.
46011033 Maheta amaana nayuma yelukayi Nzambi, O chiyakunama! Wuhaku winji, O chiwakang’anya kuwiluka! Nzhila zhinji, O chizhakang’anya kuzhishinshika!
46011034 Mwatong’ozhokayi MWANTA welukamu hinyi? Hinyi nashakami ninji hampúng’a?
46011035 Muntwinyi wasambilahu jehi Kumwinka chuma, mwaka akamufuntishilichu?
46011036 Mulong’a yuma yezhima yafumang’a kuji yena, ayilang’a muji yena, amwililang’a yena. Kuji yena kwikali lubanzhi lwakulema hayanyaka. Amena.
46012001 Jichi, enu anakwetu, hansang'u yaluwi lwanzambi, nami lambulenu nyijimba yenu yili mulambu wamumi, wajila, wakutiyisha nachu Nzambi kuwaha. Jinu mujinu wenu wawu Sipilitu wamaana.
46012002 Bayi mulonjezha mwelang'awu antu amwitung'a, ilang'a yitong'ozoka yenu yibalumuki kwikala yayiha. Elenu ngana kulonja mweseki nikwetezha zhazhiwahi, zhitezhewa, zhashikila muji Nzambi.
46012003 Kwisekezha naluwi wanyikawu nahoshe hakachi kenu: Bayi mutong'ozhika kelema kwakubajika kutong'ozhoka, ilang'a atongozhiki nachima wawunja.
46012004 Hilang'a chitukweti yiji yayijulu mumujamba wumu, niyiji yejima hiyikweti mujinu wowumuku.
46012005 Muzhila yimu, amajulu tuji mujimb wamu muji Kilisitu, Muntu himuntu nichiji chamunimbowu.
46012006 Enu chitukweti yamukunkulu yambuka mwaya Luwi lwatwinkeluwu. Hela Wupolofwetu, Tupolofweti mwatwesekelewu kukuhwelela  kwetu.
46012007 Hela kukalakela akwetu, tushi Muchim nukuyikalakela. Muntu watang'isha kwinji, ashi Muchima kukutang'isha kwinji.
46012008 Muntu mukwakukonkomwena, ashi Muchima kukukonkomwena kwinji. Muntu wenkanga, enki namakosa ayeji. Muntu wayulang'a, ayuli nakashinshi. Muntu welang'a nyijimu yaluwi, eli namuzang'ahi.
46012009 Mukeng'a kwenu kunuli wufwikizhi. Tiyenu kutama nayuma yatama, kakelenu yuma yayiwahi.
46012010 Kanganganenu nawanakwenu, nawashona, itezhinu mwinenu abajiki kulema.
46012011 Hansang'u yatela kujikwatisha, bayi mulobuku, ikalenu neyena mu kilisitu, nakumukalakela mwanta.
46012012 Zangalalenu mukuchingezha, tatakenenu hakumona yihung'u, kakelenu mukulombela chakaji kuzeya.
46012013 Kwashenu akwakujila nayuma yabulawu.. Shenu Muchim kukutambula enyi.
46012014 Kiswilenu ayikabishang'a nkisu. Kumina jakukiswila nkisu. Bayi kushing'anaku.
46012015 Zangalalenu nawakwakuzang'alala, jilenu nawakwakuzang'alala, jilenu nawakwakujila.
46012016 Ikalenu nayitongozhoka yoyimu Muntu namukwawu, bayi mujinka wantaku. Jikunjenu na Wantu abula kulem. Bayi mujitongozhoka nenu, yetu tweluka hohuku.
46012017 Bayi mwila mwinenu chatama nakatama kanayiliyuku. Keng'enu kwila yuma yalumbwa ku Meso a Wantu ejima.
46012018 Neyi chikutwesheka, shakamenu chachiwahi na Wantu ejima, mwejima mumukutweshela enu awenu.
46012019 Enu akwetu twakeng'a, bayi mujitenjaku. Mushili Nzambi ilung'a jakuzuwa, mulonga anasoneki nawu, Mwanta nahoshi ninji, yami nukutenja, yami nukufweta.
46012020 Neyi chilumbu cheyi natiyi Nzala, mwinki yakuja aji. Neyi natiyi  Mpwila, mwinki Menzhi anwi. Mulog'a neyi mukwila mwenomu, wukumulumbikila Makala a kesi Hamutu winji.
46012021 Kutama bayi kuyimika mushinjuku. Fwomonenu yatama nayayiwahi.
46013001 Antu ejima ovwahili anyantu, mulonga kwosi wantu wabula kufuma kuji Nzambuku. Mawanta ekalamu anayishuma kuji Nzambi.
46013002 Jichi Muuntu waji kanganga na Mwanta, waji anganga nanshimbi ya Nzambi; Niwena akuji kanga akumona mulongo.
46013003 Mulonga akwakuyula hiyatiyishaanga Antu wooma  nanyijimu yayiwahuku, chinga nayatama. Wunakengi neyi wubuli kutiya mwaantu  woma tahindi? ilaku chachiwahi, nineyi akakuhamekaekkuji yeena.

46013004 mulonga niyena hingamba ya Nzambi kulonda akukwaasha. Ilanga neyi welanga chatama, tiya ku woma; Mulonga wunaseji Mpoku yakabali  tuhuku jilyena hingamba ya Nzambi, hintenji kukwelila mwaamu welanga chatama.
46013005 Jichi kuminemu jakwovwahila, baji nakwakama kuzuwa hohuku, chinga nimwalejanga chinieji chamuchima.
46013006 Hasangu iyi hafumanga kusonka nyisonku. Nawa, mulonga wena hiyangamba akalakanga mujimu wa Nzambi, atalanga yumiyi mafuku ejima.
46013007 Ikenu Antu Ejima yetela kuyinka: Muntu weteji kutiya wom mutiyenu woma; Muntu wuteji kulemesha mulemeshenu.
46013008 Bayi mwikala namukuji namuntuku, chinga yowu kukengangana. Mulonga Muntu wakenganga mukwawu nawanishi nshimbi.
46013009 Nshimbi jakwila nawa," kwila wuvumbi chinjila, kujaha Muntu chijila; Hela neyi kwekala nshimbi yikwawu, jejima jinawanini mwizhu iji nawu, kengaku mukwenu neyi chiwadikenga eyi aweni."
46013010 Kukenga hikwakonganga mukwawu nshimbi.
46013011 Muneluki jehi ola yakuhinjuka mutulu hiya kuya nakupanjakana; Mulonga katataka wamwiinu wetu wunswili jehi kwakwihi, kuhuma henahana hitwakuhweleleli.
46013012 Wufuku wamana jehi hanlehi, mwaana kenga wuchi. jichi tulekenu nyiji mu yamwijima, tuvwalnu yitwa yamwana.
46013013 Twenjenu chalumbuluka, neyi chahamwana; Bayi nayisela nakushetaku; Baji nawuzondu nakubajamaku, bayi nanjombi nechimaku.
46013014 Ilanga jivwikenu mwantu Yesu kilishitu, bayi mukenga yakukwasha nachu chisemwa chaheseki, kulonja muwanishi kufwila kwachuku.
46014001 Tumbulenu Muntu wazeya mukukuhwelela, ilang'a bayi chakutajika nijuku.
46014002 Muntu wumu wekala nakukuhwelela kwakuja una yezhima, mukwawu wazeya wajan'ga kwamafu hohu.
46014003 Muntu wajang'a yezhima, baji aswula mukwawu waleka kuji yikwawu; Muntu wakang'a kuja yikwawu, bayi asompesha  mukwawu kuji yikwawu wajang'a yezhimaka. Mulong'a Nzambi namutambili.
46014004 Eyi yeyinyi wukusompesha ng'amba yambala? hela nemani hela najimbuki, ilang'a mukatwesha kwimana, mulong'a mwata natweshi kumwimika.
46014005 Muntu wumu walemeshang'a ifuku jimu niji  jabajika jikwawu, mukwawu niji mafuku ezhima wowamu hohu. Chachiwahi Antu ezhima eluki chakala awenawa. Iwu mwantong'ozhokiyilwu mwanatong'ozhokiyi,
46014006 Muntu wazhikilang'a Ifuku, wajizhikilang'a mwanta; Wajang'a, wajilang'a mwanta, mulong'a wamusakililang'a Nzambi. Muntu walekang'a kuji wamusakililang' Nzambi.
46014007 Akwila kwosi mwinetu wajihajilang'a yomwenaku, ni kujifwila yomwenaku.
46014008 Mulong'a hela tukuhang'a, tukumuhajila mwanta, jichi hela tukuhaja hela tukufwa, tuji ambala amwata.
46014009 Jihu hafwililiyi Kilisitu hakuhaja cheng'i, kuloja akekali mwanta wawafu niamoni.
46014010 Ilang'a wasompeshelang'aji manakweyi? cheng'i nawa, eyi mukwawu, wasawilang'aji manakweyi mulong'a wezhima wetu twamba kamona kwitaja ja Nzambi jakusompela.
46014011 Mulong'a anasoneki nawu, Mwanta nahoshi ninji "chinahajami kwamu, manang'a ezhima amba kamfukamina, majimi ezhima amba ketezha kaji Nzambi."
46014012 Jichi jinu wezhima wetu twamba kalumbulula kuji Nzambi mutwelang'a ha Muntu.
46014013 Bayi tusomesha akwetu nawa cheng'uka, chakala tubabalenu tubuli kumushila manakwetu chuma chakujimbukila hela chakahakena muzhila yiji.
46014014 Neluki muji mwanta Yesu nami hikwekala chuma, chajitaminang'a chachenuka, ilang'a Muntu watong'ozhokang'a niji chatama, chikwikala chuma chatama kuji ynowu.
46014015 Neyi waneng'eshang'a manakweyi nakuja kweyi, wunaleki jehi kweja mukukeng'a bayi wukisang'ana mukwenu afwililiyi Kilisitu, nakuya kweyuku.
46014016 Chimwelang'a chachiwahi baji achitenang'a nawu chatamuka.
46014017 Mulong'a wantu wa Nzambi hiwalemena mukuja nakunwaku, ilang'a walemrna  kulong'a, nikuwunda, ni mumuzang'ali wamaji Sipilitu wazhila.
46014018 Akwila Muntu wakalakelang'a Kilisitu mwenemu wamutiyishang'a Nzambi kuwaha amuhamekang'a nikuyi Antu.
46014019 Jichi, tushenu Michima hakwila yuma yaletang'a kuwundu niyuma yakujikoleha nachu wamu namukwawu.
46014020 Bayi mukisan'ana mujimu wa Nzambi na mulong'a wayakujaku. Chalala yumi yezhima yayiwahi, ilang'a chatama Muntu kujimbwisha mukwawu nachuma chajang'ayi.
46014021 Chachiwahi kuleka kuja Mbizhi, hela kunwa vinyu, hela kwila chuma chimu chakujimbwisha nachu manakweyi.
46014022 Kukuhwelele kweyi, kuwekala naku, ikalaku naku eyi awni na Nzambi yeyi. Wakokela Muntu wabalang'a kuji bayisha nachuma chetezhang'ayi.
