46014023 Hakwila wukuja nakuzhinoka nabayi, mulong'a naji chakayi kukuhwelela. Niyezhima yakubula mukukuhwelela hinshiji.
46015001 Jinu etuwa twakola twaji kusenda kuzeyazeya kwawantu abula ng'ovu, bayi kujitiyisha kuwaha etu aweniku.
46015002 Twayenu tutiyishi anakwetu kuwaha hamuntu hamuntu, mulong'a wakujitung'a.
46015003 Mulong'a Kilisitu hajitiyishili kuwaha yomweniku, Ilang'a, chiji neyi chanjikewa, matuka atukiliwu anashali haji ami".
46015004 Mulong'a yuma yonsu yanjikiliwu hashankulu, ayanjikili mulong'a wakolola ni kuching'ezha nikujikolesha chanyikanda kulonda kuching'ezha.
46015005 Jichi Nzambi wakutatakena ni wakukundezha ayilishi kwikala nayitong'ozhoka yimu muntu namukwawu kwesekezha na Yesu Kilisitu yomweni.
46015006 Kulonda kwila chenichi muyitong'ozhoka yakulemesha Nzambi tata yamwanta wetu Yesu Kilisitu.
46015007 Jichi jinu yitambwilenu wumu namukwawu, neyi chayitambwililiyi Kilisitu, kulonda kulemesha Nzambi.
46015008 Mulong'a nahoshi nami kilisitu welili kwikala wakukalakela (hela ng'amba) yawakakwalama kulonda kushimuna walala waNzambi, kulonda kukolesha nachu yikaninu yakaninuwu ankakulula zhetu.
46015009 Kulonda Azhentili kulemesha Nzambi ha luwi lwinji. Neyi chinanjikiwu, " Hohenohu nukusakilila mukachi kawaAzhentili nikwimba nakulemesha izhina jeyi.
46015010 Neyi cheng'i ninji, "Zang'alalenu, nenu Azhentili, nawantu ninji".
46015011 Neli cheng'i ninji, Hamekenu mwanta, enu Azhentili ezhima; lekenu nyunza yezhima yimuhameki".
46015012 Cheng'i nawa, Isaya ninji, Kumuzhi waJesi kwamba kenza, wumu wamba kekala nyuuli yawa Azhentili, muji yena Azhentili amba kekalamu na chikuhwelelu.
46015013 Nzambi wakuching'ezha ayinzeshi namuzang'alu ni kuwunda kwezhina nakukehwelela, kulonda kuching'ezha kwenu kuswezhi kwikala nang'ovu zha Sipilitu wazhila.
46015014 Ninami nawa enu anakwami, hansangu yenu. Neluki chukupu nami munenzali nakuwaha, munenzali namaana. Neluki chikupu nami mutweshi kuji kolesha wumu namukwawu.
46015015 Ilang'a ami niji, nakuyanjikila mazu antesha kulonda kujanukisha cheng'i, mulong'a anayinki luwi kuji Nzambi.

46015016 Nikali mukwamujimu wa Kilisitu Yesu Azhentili, nili mujimu wazhila wakushimuna Isang'u yayiwahi ya Nzambi, kulonda Azhentili ekali mukabu wakutisha Nzambi kuwaha, wakuzhilika kuji Sipilitu Wazhila.
46015017 Jichi nikweti nsan'gu yakusama nachu muji Kilisitu Yesu, namujimu wama wakukalakela Nzambi.

46015018 Mulong'a ami kutwesha kutena yuma yakong'eluwu antu acheng'i nehi, kutena yuma yakong'eliwu Kilisitu nanami, yakushimuna izu jinji, nikukong'a nyijimu yinji nawa, kulonda kovwahisha nachu Azhentili,

46015019 Mung'ovu yayinjikizhilu nayihayamisha nimung'ovu yaSipilitu wazhila. Jichu chinashimuni chalala nsang'u yayiwahi yaKilisitu, kufumisha kuYelusalema na kunyeng'umuka ndo-o Kullirikumi, nikusenda nsang'u yayiwahi yaKilisitu Yesu.
46015020 Muniyi nzhila, nonashana nukufwila kushimuna nsang'u yayiwahi, bayi kwamwilukawu izhina hohu, chakubula kwila nawu natumbakeshi izhina jamuntu mukwawu.
46015021 Mwomwananjikiwu nawu, "antu abulili kutiya nsang'u yinji akamona, niwena abulili kumutiya akeluka chalumbuluka!
46015022 Jihu hanfumi kumfuntishamu kakavulu, mwaka nikani kushika kujenu.
46015023 Ichi jinu, katataka hinikweti cheng'i nsang'u yakukalakala kumutamba wunuku, ninyaka yinafwilang'a kwinza kujenu yineli jehi yayivulu.

46015024 Chinamba kaya kwitung'a jaSipeni nakahitila kujenu, nakuhweleli nami nakayimwena munjila yami ninenu mwakatwaliku muji yami hinakela nasambila jehi kutiya kuwaha nakuhanjika nenu mafuku antesha.
46015025 Ilang'a katataka ninji ninzhila yakuya kuYelusalema nayuma yakukwashaku akwakuzhila.
46015026 Mulong'a akwaMasidoniya niakwaAkaya atiyili kuwaha kupung'isha yuma yakukwasha nachu atuzweng'i haji antu along'a aNzambi ajing'a muYelusalema.
46015027 Engang'i, anitiyi kuwaha, mulong'a chanatambuluwu aZhentili yuma yaSipilitu, mwena akwetimukuji kuji aYudeya kuyitang'isha nayuma yawu yakumuzhimba.
46015028 Jichi neyi, neli jehi, mwenimu, neyi  nayishizhili jehi wena yumiyi, nakahitila kuji enu nakuya kuSipeni.
46015029 Neluki nami neyi nenzi jehi kuji enuwa nakwinzala kwaswezha munkisu zhaKusipilitu to-o.
46015030 Jichi jinu, enu anakwami, niji nakuyilembelela hamuzhila wamwanta wetu Yesu Kilisitu, nihakukeng'a  kwaSipilitu wazhila, nami kabakanenu chimu nanami mukulombela kwenu muji Nzambi.
46015031 Kulonda akampulwishi kuji antu amuYudeya onsu, abula kukuhwelela, kulonda mudimu wami wakuYelusalema akawutambuli chachiwahi kuji akwakuzhila a Nzambi.
46015032 Lombenenu kulonda nakenzi kuji, enu namuzang'alu kuhitila mukukeng'a kwaNzambi, cheng'i nwaw, nikekali hamu nanenu, kulonda nikawani kunoka.
46015033 Nzambi wakuwunda ekali nanenu onsu wenu. Amena.
46016001 Nakunjiki muhelenu Fwibi kujenu, mukwakukalakela muchipompelu kuKenikeli,
46016002 mukamutambwili muji mwanta watelela akakuzhila; mwakamukwashiku namujimu winji wezhima mwakakeng'elayi. Yena nakwashi nankanshi atu amavulu ninami aweni nawa.
46016003 Imushenu aPilisila niAkwila, hiyawakwakukalakela hamu nanami muji Kilisitu Yesu,
46016004 Wena akeng’eli kufwa kukoola wumi wami; hiyami nayisakililang’a kankawami hohuku, niyipompelu yawaZHentili yezhima nawa.
46016005 Imushenu nichipompelu chekala mwitala jawu. Imushenu Epenetu nákeng’a, jiyi wasambilili kukuhwelela Klistu muAsiya.
46016006 Imushenu Maliya, wayikabakeneni nyijimu yayivulu.
46016007 Imushenu antang’a zhami Anjiloniku naYuniya, twajing’i nawu mukaleya; atiyakana mukachi kawapostolu, asambilili kukuhwelela Klistu, ami kanja.
46016008 Imushenu Ampiliyasu, nákeng’a muji Mwanta.
46016009 Imushenu Ulibani, mukwakukalakala hamu nanami muji Klistu, niStakisi nákeng’a.
46016010 Imushenu Apelesi, esekawu jehi muji Klistu. Imushenu niakwetala jaAlisitobolu.
46016011 Imushenu ntang’a yami Helojiyoni. Imushenu akwetala jaNalakisu, aji muji Mwanta.
46016012 Imushenu aTilifwena naTilifwosa, akabakanang’a namujimu muji Mwanta. Imushenu niPelisa wákeng’ewa, wakabakeni nyijimu yayivulu muji Mwanta.
46016013 Imushenu niLufusa watonjewa muji Mwanta, nimama yinji, nimama yami nawa.
46016014 Imushenu niAsinkilitu, niFwelegona, niHelemesi, niPatiloba, niHelema, nianakwetu ezhima aji chimu nawu.
46016015 Imushenu Fwilologu naYuliya, niNeleyusi namuhelinji, niOlimpasa, niakwakuzhila ezhima aji chimu nawu.
46016016 Jimushenu wezhima wenu nachikasa chazhila. Yipompelu yaKlistu yezhima yinayimushi.
46016017 Enu anakwetu nayilembeleli, babelenu antu aletang’a kwambuka ninsang’u yakujimbwisha akwawu, hiyayang’a mwaya ntang’ishilu yimwajiziluku. Yitonjolwelenu,
46016018 mulong’a antu aji ochu hiyamukalakelang’a Mwanta wetu Klistuku, akalakelang’a mavumu awu awenawu; enja ajimbeka nyichima yawantu akaji maana namazu awu amwovu akulambisha.
46016019 Kwovwahila kwenu kunatiyakani jehi kuji antu ezhima; jichi nazang’alali hansang’u yenu. Nakeng’i nami mwikali akwamaana nayuma yayiwahi, mubuli maana nayuma yatama.
46016020 Nzambi wakuwunja keng’a achiki Satana mwishina janyenju yenu. Luwi lwaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu lwikali nanenu.
46016021 Timotewu, mukwakukalakala nanami, nayimushi. Antang’a zhami aLusiyu naYasoni niSosipata anayimushi.
46016022 Ami Teletiyu, násoneki mukanjiwu, nayimushi muji Mwanta.
46016023 Gayusi, mukwakujiisha ninami nichipompelu chezhima, nayimushi. Elasitusi, mukwakuhemba mali ang’anja, nayimushi, nimanakwetu Kwotusi.
46016024 Luwi lwaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu lwikali nanenu wezhima wenu. Amena.
46016025 Kisu kisu yena natweshi kuyikolesha mwaya nsang’u yayiwahi yinashimunang’ami yakushimuna Yesu Klistu, mwaya kumwekesha kwanamwekeshuwu chizhinjilu chazhinjiluwu munyaka yamunyima yezhima,

46016026 hakwinza katataka anachimwekeshi jehi, anachitiyakeshi jehi nanyikanja yazhila yawatuplofwetu, mwahita nyunza yezhima, mwaya kulezha kwaNzambi wahayanyaka, kulonja kuleta kwovwahila kukuhwelela.
46016027 Kuji yena Nzambi, mwinimaana kankawinji, kwikali lubanzhi lwakulema muji Yesu Klistu hayanyaka. Amena.
47001001 Ami Pawulu, antambikili niikali kapostolu kaYesu Klistu mwaya muchima waNzambi, nimanakwetu Soseteni,

47001002 tuji nakuyisonekela mukanja, enu akwachipompelu chaNzambi chekala kuKolinja, azhilikawu muji Klistu Yesu, atambikawu kwikala akwakuzhila, hamu nawantu ezhima aji kwezhima atambikang’a izhina jaYesu Klistu, Mwanta wawu ninetu Mwanta wetu.
47001003 Luwi lwikali nanenu, nikuwunja kwakufuma kuji Nzambi, Tata yetu, nikuji Mwanta Yesu Klistu.
47001004 Nasakililang’a Nzambi yami hansang’u yenu mafuku ezhima, naluwi lwaNzambi lwanayinkuwu muji Klistu Yesu,
47001005 chanayiheteshuwu muyuma yezhima muji yena, mukuhosha kwezhima nimukwiluka kwezhima,
47001006 nanochu chanakoleshuwu wunsahu waKlistu mujenu.
47001007 Himunabuli chamukunkulu nichimuku, chimuchiji kuching’ilila kumwekana kwaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu,
47001008 yowu wakayikolesha njo-o nikukukuminina, mwakekali akaji mulong’a mwifuku jaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu.
47001009 Nzambi washinshika, yowu wayitambikili kulonja mukunjang’ani naMwaninji Yesu Klistu, Mwanta wetu.

47001010 Enu anakwetu, nayilembeleli mwizhina jaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu, nami hoshenu mazu wowamu wezhima wenu; bayi mwambuka aha chenju chimu, aha chenju chikwawuku; ching’a kujibomba hamu nayitong’ozhoka yimu nikutiyang’ana kumu.
47001011 Mulong’a enu anakwetu, ananlezhi kuji akwetala jaKolowe, nawu mukachi kenu muji kufwilang’ana.
47001012 Natiyi nawu mwelang’a nenu, Ami nimuntu waPawulu; mukwawu ninji, Ami nimuntu waApolosi mukwawu ninji, Ami nimuntu waKefwasi; (jiyi Petulu) mukwawu ninji, Ami nimuntu waKlistu.
47001013 Komana Klistu anamwambuli? Pawulu jiyi apopeleluwu hakulusu kukoolenu? Ayizhimikili mwizhina jaPawulu?
47001014 Namusakililang’a Nzambi chinabulili kuzhimika hela mwinenu wumu, ching’a yowu Klisipu naGayusi hohu;
47001015 akenja kahosha nawu nayizhimikili mwizhina jami.
47001016 Eng’ang’i, nazhimikili nawa niakwetala jaStefwanasi; inji neyi kuji amakwawu inazhimikili chinanhiti kumuchima.
47001017 Mulong’a Klistu hantemesheli nakuzhimikaku, ching’a kushimuna nsang’u yayiwahi; bayi namaana akuhoshaku, kulusu yaKlistu yakenja kekala yamukunkulwayi.
47001018 Mulong’a antu aji nakuya nakunong’a, nsang’u yakulusu ayitong’ozhoka nawu hiwusupi; hakwila etu twahanjang’a, netu jiyi ng’ovu yaNzambi.
47001019 Mulong’a anasoneki nawu, Nukukisang’ana maana awakwamaana, Nukujiwula kubabala kwawakwakubabala.
47001020 Mukwamaana wuji kujihi? Nsoneki wuji kujihi? Mukwakutajika wamakonu wuji kujihi? Nzambi hanasupishi jehi maana ampata yinu yamunu mwishinaku, tahinji?
47001021 Mulong’a Nzambi cheliliyi namaaninji ninji, antu amumpata yamunu mwishina abulili kumwiluka Nzambi namaanawu, Nzambi natiyi kuwaha kwamwina antu akukuhwelela nansang’u yakushimuna kwawusupi.
47001022 Mulong’a aYujeya alombang’a yinzhikizhilu, aGliki akeng’a kujiza maana;
47001023 hakwila etu twashimunang’a Klistu apopeleluwu hakulusu; aYujeya nawu hichuma chakujimbukila, aGliki nawu hiwusupi;
47001024 ilang’a antu atambikawu, hela aYujeya hela aGliki, nawu Klistu jiyi ng’ovu yaNzambi, jiyi maana aNzambi.
47001025 Mulong’a wusupi waNzambi wabajika maana awantu; kuzeya kwaNzambi kwabajika ng’ovu yawantu.
47001026 Enu anakwetu, tong’ozhokenu kutambika kwenu kwayitambikiluwu; hiyanatambiki antu amavulu akweti maana awuntu, hela amavulu akwang’ovu, hela alemaku.

47001027 Ilang’a Nzambi watonjeli yuma yampata yamunu mwishina yabula maana, kulonja atiyishi nachu akwamaana nsonyi. Nzambi watonjeli yuma yampata yamunu mwishina yabula ng’ovu atiyishi nachu akwang’ovu nsonyi.
47001028 Nzambi watonjeli yuma yamunu mwishina yabula kulema niyuma yajiwulewa; eng’ang’i, watonjeli niyuma yabula kwikala kwoku, kulonja elishi yamukunkulwayi yuma yiji kwoku;
47001029 kulonja kubuli muntu wukujisama kumesu aNzambi.
47001030 Ilang’a kuji yena enu mwekala muji Klistu Yesu, yena anamwilishi kujetu maana akufuma kuji Nzambi, nikulong’a, nikuzhila, nikukuula;
47001031 kulonja, Muntu wukujisama ajisamini muji MWANTA; mwomwanasonekuwu.
47002001 Enu anakwetu, chinenzhili kujenu nakushimuna nsang’u yaNzambi, hinenzhili namazu aswezha kuwaha, hela akuyihayamisha namaanaku.
47002002 Mulong’a nalekeli kwiluka chuma chacheng’i mukachi kenu, ching’a yowu Yesu Klistu hohu, nami jiyi apopeleluwu hakulusu.
47002003 Najing’i nenu nakuzeya niwoma nikuzaala kwakweni.
47002004 Chinayilezhelang’a, nichinashimwinang’a nsang’u, hichajing’i chakuyikanzhikizha namazu amaanaku, ilang’a chajing’i mukujimwekesha kwaSpilitu ning’ovu;
47002005 kulonja kukuhwelela kwenu kubuli kukolela kumaana awantu, ching’a kwikali kwamung’ovu yaNzambi.
47002006 Twahoshang’a yamaana nawakula jehi; himaana amakonu, hela awanyanta amakonuku, wenawa keng’a ahiti.
47002007 Twashimunang’a maana aNzambi akuzhinja, azhinjiluwu jehi. Nzambi wayitong’welang’ahu jehi henohu mpata zhichiji kanja azhileng’i, kulonja kutulemesha.
47002008 Anyanta ampata yinu hiyeluka wena maanawaku; neyi ayilukili, mutenowu hiyapopeleli Mwanta waLubanzhi lwakulema hakulusuku.
47002009 Chanasonekuwu nawu, Nzambi walong’eshela jehi antu amukeng’a yuma yabulili kumona mesu, Yabulili kutiya matu, Yabulili kwing’ila mumuchima wamuntu.
47002010 Ilang’a Nzambi natumwekesheliyi naSpilitu. Mulong’a Spilitu washinshikang’a yuma yezhima, chalala yuma yaNzambi yayeni yakunama.
47002011 Muntwinyi welukang’a yitong’ozhoka yamuntu? ching’a spilitu yayomweni muntu. Chochina niyitong’ozhoka yaNzambi, kwosi wayilukaku, ching’a Spilitu waNzambi hohu.
47002012 Etu hitunatambuli spilitu yamunu mwishinaku, tunatambuli Spilitu wakuji Nzambi, kulonja twiluki yuma yanatwinkuwu kuji Nzambi chamukunkulu.
47002013 Jiyi yuma yitwahoshang’a, hitwahoshang’a namazu akutang’isha namaana awantuku, ching’a namazu atutang’ishang’awu kuji Spilitu, nakulumbulula yuma yaSpilitu kuji antu aji naSpilitu.
47002014 Hakwinza muntu wachisemwa hatambulang’a yuma yaSpilitu waNzambuku, mulong’a yena wukuyimona ninji hiwusupi; hakutwesha kuyilukaku mulong’a ayishinshikang’a naSpilitu hohu.
47002015 Hakwila muntu waSpilitu washinshikang’a yuma yezhima, yena yomweni hiyamwiluka chekalayi kuji muntuku.
47002016 Hinyi weluka mwatong’ozhokang’ayi MWANTA, mwaka amutang’ishi maana? Ilang’a etu tukweti yitong’ozhoka yaKlistu.
47003001 Enu anakwetu, ami nahosheli nenu chiji neyi nawantu achisemwa chaheseki, neyi anyikeki amuji Klistu; hinatwesheli kuhosha nenu neyi chahoshang’awu nawantu akweti Spilituku.
47003002 Nayinwishili mayeli, hinayijiishili mbizhuku, mulong’a himwayitwesheluku; hela nihanu muchiji kanja muyitweshi;
47003003 mulong’a muchiji antu achisemwa chaheseki. Neyi mukachi kenu mwekala ichima nikuzung’a, himuchiji antu achisemwa chahesekuku? Himwelang’a mwelang’awu antuku, tahinji?
47003004 Chimuji nakwila iwu ninji, Ami nimuntu waPawulu; mukwawu ninji, Ami nimuntu waApolosi; himuyantu achisemwa chahesekuku?
47003005 Apolosi jiyinyi, hela Pawulu jiyinyi? Wezhima wetu tuyakwakukalakala kumwakuhweleleli, mwomwatukunzhikililuwu kuji Mwanta.
47003006 Ami natumbili, Apolosi watukumwinini; hakwila wákulishili jiyi Nzambi.
47003007 Ichi jinu wátumbang’a hela wátukumwinang’a hiyalemaku; wálema jiyi Nzambi wakulishang’a.
47003008 Ichi jinu, wátumbang’a niwátukumwinang’a anekali wowamu; ilang’a wezhima wawu akatambula wulooku wawu weseka nanyijimu yawu aweni, muntu nawulooku winji, muntu nawulooku winji.
47003009 Mulong’a tuyakwakukalakala ambala aNzambi; enu muji iha jaNzambi, muji itala jaNzambi.
47003010 Ami nimukwawukalawenu wakutung’a, mwaya luwi lwaNzambi lwanyinkeluwu; ami naalili chikuku, wacheng’i hakutung’ilahu. Ilang’a antu ezhima aji kubabala mwakutung’ilawu hachikuku ichi.
47003011 Chikuku chaalawu jehi, jiyi Yesu Klistu. Kwosi muntu wukutwesha kutung’a chacheng’uku.
47003012 Muntu wukutung’ilahu wulu hachikuku ichi, hela siliva, hela malola awuseya weneni, hela nyitonju, hela matahu, hela nswaji;
47003013 akamwekesha nyijimu yawantu ezhima. Ifuku oju jakayimwekesha, mulong’a yakamwekana mukesi; kesi kakeni kakeseka nyijimu yawantu ezhima, mwayili mujimu, mwayili mujimu.
47003014 Neyi mujimu wamuntu watung’iliyi hachikuku ichi wakashalahu, yena wakatambula wulooku.
47003015 Neyi mujimu wamuntu wakasukuma, yena hakatambula wulookuku; hakwila yena yomweni wakaamwinewa neyi chakuhita mukesi.
47003016 Himuneluki nenu muji Tembeli yaNzambi, niSpilitu waNzambi washakamang’a mujenuku, tahinji?
47003017 Muntu wukutamisha Tembeli yaNzambi, akamutamisha kuji Nzambi; mulong’a Tembeli yaNzambi yazhila, enu yenu Tembeli oyu.
47003018 Bayi muntu ajijimbaku. Mwinenu wumu watong’ozhokang’a ninji niji namaana amakonu, ekali chisupi kulonja abalumuki kwikala mukwamaana.
47003019 Mulong’a Nzambi wamonang’a maana amakonu ninji hiwusupi. Mulong’a anasoneki nawu, Akwamaana wayikwatilang’a kwoku kukubabala kwawu awenawu;
47003020 nicheng’i nawu, MWANTA weluka yitong’ozhoka yawakwamaana ninji yakuhemesha hohu.
47003021 Jichi bayi muntu ajisamang’a nawantuku, mulong’a yuma yezhima yenwenu;
47003022 niPawulu, niApolosi, niPetulu, nimpata yamunu mwishina, niwumi, nikufwa, niyuma yamafuku anu, niyuma yamba kenza; yezhimiyi yenwenu hohu;
47003023 ninenu muji ambala aKlistu; niKlistu nawa wambala waNzambi.
47004001 Antu atwiluki nawu tuyakwakukalakela Klistu, tuyanhembi yayizhinjilu yaNzambi.
47004002 Antu akuhwelelang’a anhembi nawu ching’a ayimoni kushinshika.
47004003 Kunsompesha kujenu hela kuji antu acheng’i, hichuma chakuhemesha hohu; eng’ang’i, hela ami aweni hinajisompeshang’aku.
47004004 Mulong’a ami hineluki chuma chakujinka nachu mulong’aku; hela chochu, hijichi chinaying’iluku; Mwanta jiyi wansompeshang’a.

47004005 Jichi bayi munyakala kusompeshaku, ching’a Mwanta nenzi; yena jiyi wakaleta yuma yakuzhinja yamumwijima kuchezhezhi, wakamwekesha niyitong’ozhoka yamumuchima. Henohu jihu hakamonawu antu ezhima kuyihameka kuji Nzambi, hamuntu hamuntu.

47004006 Enu anakwetu, yumiyi nayibalumuni kufwikizha nachu chituneli ninami niApolosi hansang’u yenu, kulonja mwilukili hajetu mubuli kumotoka yuma yasonekawu jehi munyikanja yazhila; kulonja mukachi kenu mubuli kwikala muntu wukulemesha wumu, asekesha mukwawu.
47004007 Hinyi nakwili ninji wunabajiki mukwenu? Chuma chiwukweti chiwunabuli kutambula hichumanyi? Inji neyi wachitambwili wukujisaminaji, neyi hiwachitambwiluku?
47004008 Komana munawanini jehi, muneli jehi akwakuheta, munajyi jehi wanta chakubula etu. Eng’ang’i, nakeng’i nami, mwaji kuyuula, kulonja ninetu tuyuuli hamu nanenu.
47004009 Mulong’a natong’ozhoki nami Nzambi natumwekeshi etu apostolu hanu hakukuminina, neyi tuyantu atelela kufwa hohu. Mulong’a anatwilishi atushinshikang’a kuji ezhima, wowu ang’elu niantu.
47004010 Etu tuji ayisupi hansang’u yaKlistu, ilang’a enu muji akwamaana muji Klistu. Etu twabula ng’ovu, ilang’a enu muji nang’ovu. Enu mwalema, ilang’a etu twaseka.
47004011 Nihanu tuji nanzala nimpwila, tuji nawuvu, atukofwolang’a, hitukweti nimukala wakwiluka chikupuku;
47004012 twakabakanang’a nakukalakala nyijimu namakasetu. Chatutukang’awu twayikiswilang’a nkisu; chatukabishang’awu twakuminang’a jakwitezha;
47004013 chatutung’ulang’awu twakuminang’a jakulemba; tunekali jehi neyi wuzonju wampata yamunu mwishina, hela neyi nswaji hohu, nihanu.
47004014 yi yuma yinayisonekeli, hinayisonekeli nami niyitiyishi nachu nsonyuku, nalonji kuyikonkomwena, nanichi chimuneli muyanyanami nakeng’a.
47004015 I Hela mukweti ikumi jamakombakazhi (10,000) jawantang’ishi amuji Klistu, himukweti atata amavuluku; mulong’a ami nayivweleli muji Klistu Yesu nansang’u yayiwahi.
47004016 Jichi nayilembeleli nami ikalenu akwakung’imbuzhola.
47004017 Jihu hanafumi kuyitemeshela Timotewu, himwanami nakeng’a wamuji Mwanta, washinshika; jiyi wakayanukisha munelang’a muji Klistu, mwomunatang’ishang’a kwezhima muyipompelu yezhima.
47004018 Ilang’a enu amakwawu munajinki jehi wanta, nenu ami hinakenza kujenuku.
47004019 Hakuleha chanti nakenza kujenu, neyi Nzambi netezhi. Jihu hinakeluka ng’ovu zhawenowu anajinki wanta, bayi mazu awu hohuku.
47004020 Mulong’a wanta waNzambi walemenang’a kung’ovu, bayi kumazuku.
47004021 Munakeng’iji? Ninzi kujenu nakabama, tahinji nakukeng’a naspilitu yakujizoza?
47005001 Chalala, tunatiyi nawu mukachi kenu muji wuzhila wakwila nawu mwinenu wumu natambuli ing’ojatata yinji; wena wuzhila owu hiwekala hela mukachi kawaZHentiluku.
47005002 Ninenu himukujinka wanta! Mutenowu mwaji kuneng’a, kulonja owu mwinenu nakong’i chumichi, amufumishi mukachi kenu.
47005003 Chalala ami, hela mumuzhimba niji kwacheng’i, niji nenu muspilitu, nasompesha jehi muntu nakong’i chumichi, neyi kafwampi niji nenu.
47005004 Chimukupompela hamu, mwizhina jaMwanta wetu Yesu, nispilitu yami, nang’ovu yaMwanta wetu Yesu,
47005005 nami, lubulenu muntu wuji ochu kuji Satana kulonja akisang’ani muzhimba winji, kulonja spilitu yinji yakamwinewi mwifuku jaMwanta Yesu.
47005006 Kujisama kwenu hikunawahuku. Mweluka jehi chananishang’a ilung’i jantesha chikanka chezhima.
47005007 Fumishenu ilung’i jajikulu, kulonja mwikali chikanka chachiha; mulong’a munekali jehi chakaji ilung’i. Chipanjakenu chetu chanatuzhahiluwu jehi jiyi Klistu.
47005008 Jichi tuhembenu chawizha najinkenji jakaji ilung’i, jamuchima wutooka, jalala; kuchijya nelung’i jajikulu, hela nelung’i jankunyi nikutama, chinzhila.
47005009 Nayisonekeleli jehi mumukanja wami nami, bayi mujibombang’a nawayivumbuku.
47005010 Hinateni ayivumbi, hela akwalwisu, hela akwanyilami, hela akwakupesha amunu mwishinaku. Neyi ochu mwaji kufuma chikupu mumpata yamunu mwishina.

47005011 Ilang’a katataka niji nakuyisonekela nami, neyi muntu anatenuwu nawu himanakwenu wukwikala chivumbi, hela mukwalwisu, hela mukwakupesha, hela mukwakutukana, hela mukwakusheta, hela mukwanyilami, nami muntu wuji ochu, bayi mujibomba ninjuku, hela kujya ninji chinzhila.
47005012 Ami hinikweti nsang’u yakusompesha antu abula kwikala muchipompeluku. Mujimu wenu wakusompesha antu aji muchipompelu;
47005013 hakwila antu abula kwikala muchipompelu, ayisompeshang’a kuji Nzambi. Fumishenu owu muntu watama mukachi kenu.
47006001 Mwinenu kuya nakuholokela manakwinji muchota chawabula kulong’a, chinzhila chacheni. Wukulekelaji kuya muchota chawakwakuzhila?
47006002 Himuneluki nenu akwakuzhila jiwu amba kasompesha mpata yamunu mwishinaku, tahinji? Chineli enu yenu mwakasompesha mpata yamunu mwishina mubuli kutela kusompesha tusang’u twantesha?
47006003 Himuneluki nenu yetu twamba kasompesha ang’eluku, tahinji? Inji tukukang’enyaji kusompa nsang’u zhakumina muwumi wunu?
47006004 Neyi mukusompa nsang’u zhakumina muwumi wunu, mukukunzhika mujimu wakusompesha akwenu kuji antu aseka muchipompelu, tahinji?
47006005 Ichi chinahoshi nalonji mutiyi nsonyi. Mukachi kenu mubuli kumwekana mukwamaana wumu natweshi kuketula mulong’a mukachi kawanakwinji, tahinji?
47006006 Mwaka mwilang’a mukwakukuhwelela wumu hakuholokelang’a mukwakukuhwelela mukwawu muchota chawakwakubula kukuhwelela.

47006007 Nehi jinu! Ochu chimukujiholokela muntu namukwawu, chikwikala chuma chatama mukachi kenu. Mwalekelang’aji kukumina jakwitezha kuyikong’a chatama? Mwalekelang’aji kukumina jakwitezha kuyijiila yuma yawukombi?
47006008 Aka! Enu aweni mwatamishang’a, mwajyang’a yawukombi; eng’a, hela yuma yawanakwenu.

47006009 Enu himunelukuku nenu abula kulong’a hiyamba kaswana wanta waNzambuku. Bayi ayijimbaku; hela ayivumbi, hela akwakupesha, hela amayala ajilisha neyi ambanja, hela ájitamishang’a nawakwawu amayala,
47006010 hela amakombi, hela akwalwisu, hela akwakusheta, hela akwakutukana, hela akwanyilami, hiyamba kaswana wanta waNzambuku.
47006011 Ninenu amakwawu jichi chimwajing’i. Ilang’a ayiwelesheli, ayizhilikili, ayiying’ishili nakuyitena along’a mwizhina jaMwanta Yesu Klistu, nimuji Spilitu waNzambi yetu.
47006012 Ami namonang’a yuma yezhima nami yalong’a; ilang’a yuma yikwawu hiyakwashanang’aku. Ami namonang’a yuma yezhima nami yalong’a, ilang’a hinetezhi chuma nichimu kwikala mwanta wamuku.
47006013 Kujya kwambala kwevumu niivumu jambala jayakujya; ilang’a Nzambi wakakisang’ana niivumu niyakujya. Muzhimba hiwakwila nachu wuvumbuku, wambala waMwanta niMwanta wambala wamuzhimba.
47006014 Nzambi wasang’wili Mwanta, wakatusang’ula ninetu nang’ovu zhinji.
47006015 Himuneluki nenu nyizhimba yenu yinekali yiji yambala yaKlistuku, tahinji? Inji ami nitwali yiji yaKlistu niyibalumuni kwikala yachivumbi, tahinji? Chinzhila!
47006016 Himuneluki nenu muntu wakamang’a nachivumbi nekali ninji muzhimba wumuku, tahinji? Mulong’a ninji, Mwayeji wawu anekali wumu.
47006017 Hakwila muntu wajibomba naMwanta nekali jehi spilitu wumu nayena.
47006018 Temukenu wuzhila. Chaputolang’awu antu nyilong’a yikwawu chakuminang’a hanzi yanyizhimba yawu; hakwila muntu welang’a wuzhila watamishang’a muzhimba winji yomweni.
47006019 Himuneluki nenu nyizhimba yenu yinekali jehi Tembeli yambala yaSpilitu Wazhila wuji mujenu, imwatambwili kuji Nzambuku, tahinji?
47006020 Himwajihetaku, ayilanjili jehi nawuseya. Jichi lemeshenu Nzambi munyizhimba yenu.
47007001 Nsang’u yimwasonekeli nenu, Chachiwahi iyala abuli kukwata hamumbanja?
47007002 Ilang’a hansang’u yawuzhila, amayala ezhima aji kwikala nawang’ojizhawu, niambanja ezhima aji kwikala nawamfumu zhawu iwu nawinji, iwu nawinji.
47007003 Iyala amwili ing’ojinji mwatela, nimumbanja nawa mwomumu.
47007004 Mumbanja hakweti chiyuulu chamuzhimba winjuku, ching’a mfumwinji; chochimu niiyala hakweti chiyuulu chamuzhimba winjuku, ching’a ing’ojinji.
47007005 Bayi mujibonjaku, ching’a mutiyang’ana, mushamu mafuku akutong’ola, kulonja mujinki kukulombela, muhumang’ani cheng’i, kulonja Satana abuli kuyitesha hansang’u yakubula kujihemba.
47007006 Chinahoshi mwenimu, nakumini jakuyikwasha hinayilezhi nshimbuku.
47007007 Ilang’a natong’ozhoki nami chachiwahi amayala ezhima aji kwikala neyi chinekalami. Antu ezhima akweti mwayitong’welawu kuji Nzambi, iwu namwinji, iwu namwinji.
47007008 Hinukuyilezha azhiki nawamfwila, nami chachiwahi wena ekali neyi chinekalami.
47007009 Neyi hiyakutwesha kujihembaku, asumbuli tuhu. Chinawahi kujisumbula, hichinawahi kukabakana nakufwilang’a wuvumbuku.
47007010 Antu ajisumbula jehi nukuyilezha; hiyami nukuyilezhaku, anayilezhi kuji Mwanta; ninji mumbanja bayi ashiya mfumwinjuku.
47007011 Neyi wukumushiya, ashakami kwinji chakubula kusumbuka cheng’i; neyi nehi, akunjami cheng’i kuji mfumwinji; niiyala bayi aseng’a ing’ojinjuku.

47007012 Hakwinza akwenu anashali, yami nukuyila, hiMwantaku; nami neyi haji manakwetu wukweti ing’ojinji wabula kukuhwelela, niyenowu mumbanja natiyi kuwaha kushakama namfumwinji, iyala bayi amuseng’aku.
47007013 Nimumbanja wukweti mfumwinji wabula kukuhwelela, niyena iyala natiyi kuwaha kushakama ninji, bayi ashiya mfumwinjuku.

47007014 Mulong’a iyala wabula kukuhwelela anamuzhilikili muji ing’ojinji; nimumbanja wabula kukuhwelela anamuzhilikili muji mfumwinji. Mukunkulwayi anyanenu akwikala akaji kuzhila; ilang’a ichi jinu, anekali kwawu azhila.
47007015 Ilang’a neyi muntu wabula kukuhwelela nakeng’i kuya, muleki ayi. Manakwetu weyala hela wamumbanja hiyanamukasi hansang’u iyuku; Nzambi natutambikili kuwunja.
47007016 Eyi mumbanja, wukwiluka ng’ahi, hamwaha wukwamwina mfumweyi? Hela eyi iyala, wukwiluka ng’ahi, hamwaha wukwamwina ing’ojeyi?
47007017 Antu ezhima ching’a ashakami mwomwanayitong’weluwu jehi kuji Mwanta, mwomwanayitambikiluwu kuji Nzambi. Jimu nayuulang’a muyipompelu yezhima.
47007018 Muntu atambikawu iku waalama jehi, bayi abalumuka kwikala neyi chijimaku. Muntu atambikawu iku kanja aalami, bayi amwalamishaku.
47007019 Kwalama hichumaku, nikubula kwalama hichumaku; chuma chalema yowu kuhemba mwayilezhawu kuji Nzambi.
47007020 Antu ezhima ekali mwomwajing’ililuwu hayitambikiluwu.
47007021 Eyi hakutambikiluwu, wajing’i njung’u tahinji? Bayi wuwubang’aku; ilang’a neyi wukutwesha kufumamu, fumakumu tuhu.
47007022 Mulong’a muntu atambikiluwu muji Mwanta hajing’iyi njung’u, nekali jehi mwana kambala kaMwanta. Nimuntu atambikiluwu hajing’iyi mwana, nekali jehi njung’u yaKlistu.
47007023 Ayilanjili jehi nawuseya; bayi mwikala anjung’u zhawantuku.
47007024 Enu anakwetu, antu ezhima ashakami naNzambi mwomwayitambikililuwu.
47007025 Nsang’u yakutena ambanja abula kujimonang’ahu jehi neyala; hiyananlezhi kuji Mwantaku, ilang’a nukuyilezha muchima wami, mulong’a nimuntu natambuli jehi luwi kuji Mwanta kulonja nishinshiki.
47007026 Hansang’u zhakumona kukala kwamafuku anu, natong’i nami chachiwahi muntu akumini jakwikala mwomwekalilayi.
47007027 Eyi wakasika kuji mumbanja, tahinji? Bayi wukeng’a kukasunukaku. Eyi wakasunuka kuji mumbanja, tahinji? Bayi wukeng’a kusumbula mumbanjaku.
47007028 Hela wukusumbula hiwuneli nshijuku; hela mumbanja wukusumbuka haneli nshijuku. Ilang’a jinu, wenawa akamona yihung’u mumuzhimba; nalonji nami niyikwashuku.
47007029 Enu anakwetu, ami nami mpinzhi yinakehi jehi; jichi kufuma hanu ákweti ambanja ekali neyi hiyakwetuku;
47007030 ájilang’a ekali neyi hiyajilang’aku; ázang’alalang’a ekali neyi hiyazang’alalang’aku, álanjang’a ekali neyi hiyakweti yumaku;
47007031 ákwatang’a kuyuma yamunu mwishina ekali neyi abulang’a kukwataku chikupu. Mulong’a yuma yampata yinu chiyijichi, yahitang’a.
47007032 Nakeng’i enu mubuli kwakama. Muntu wabula kusumbula waakamang’a yuma yaMwanta, kulonja amutiyishi Mwanta kuwaha.
47007033 Ilang’a muntu wasumbula waakamang’a yuma yamunu mwishina, kulonja amutiyishi ing’ojinji kuwaha.

47007034 Cheng’i nawa, mumbanja wasumbuka hesekana namumbanja wabula kusumbukaku. Mumbanja wabula kusumbuka waakamang’a yuma yaMwanta, kulonja azhili nimumuzhimba nimuspilitu; hakwila wásumbuka waakamang’a yuma yamunu mwishina, kulonja amutiyishi mfumwinji kuwaha.
47007035 Chinahoshi ichi nalonji nami niyikwashi; hinalonji kuyikasaku, nalonji kuyilezha yuma yayiwahi, kulonja mukalakelang’a Mwanta chakaji kuyikang’esha.

47007036 Neyi haji iyala natong’ozhoki ninji haji nakumwila chachiwahi muzhiki winji anatonjiyuku, mulong’a mumbanja hakuswezha kukula, namoni ninji, hichinateluku, akumini jakwila mwakeng’ayi, ajisumbuli tuhu; haneli nshijuku.

47007037 Hakwila iyala wajikang’a mumuchima winji, hikuji nsang’u zhakumukanzhikizhaku, wukweti nawa ng’ovu yakujihemba, nakoleshi mumuchima winji ninji muzhiki winji ashakami tuhu, jiyi wukwila chachiwahi.
47007038 Nochu jinu, muntu wukusumbula wukwila chachiwahi; ilang’a muntu wukubula kusumbula jiyi nabajiki kwila chachiwahi.
47007039 Mumbanja wakasika kuji mfumwinji mafuku ezhima hachijiyi iyala wamumi; ilang’a neyi mfumwinji nafwi nakasunuki jehi, natweshi kusumbuka neyala anakeng’iyi; ching’a jinu muji Mwanta hohu.
47007040 Ilang’a ami natong’ozhoki nami wukuswezha kutiya kuwaha neyi wukushakama chochenochu. Natong’ozhoki nami, nikweti niSpilitu waNzambi mwenimu.
47008001 Nsang’u yayuma yanapeshuwu nachu ankishi. Tuneluki netu wezhima wetu tweluka. Kwiluka kwaletang’a kujinka wanta; hakwila kukeng’a kwakoleshang’a.
47008002 Muntu natong’ozhoki ninji neluki, kanja eluki mwaji kwilukayuku.
47008003 Muntu wakeng’a Nzambi, jiyi elukawu kuji Nzambi.
47008004 Jichi hansang’u yakujya yuma yanapeshuwu nachu ankishi; etu tuneluki netu nkishi hichuma chalala munu mwishinaku; hikwekala wacheng’uku, ching’a Nzambi wumu hohu.
47008005 Hela mwiwulu hela hamaseki, kuji atenang’awu nawu anzambi, mulong’a kwekala amavulu alumbishawu neyi Nzambi, nianyanta amavulu;

47008006 hakwinza kujetu kuji Nzambi wumu hohu, jiyi Tata; kuji yena jiku kwafumang’a yuma yezhima, jiku twahanjilang’a. Kuji niMwanta wumu hohu, jiyi Yesu Klistu, muji yena jimu mwekala yuma yezhima, jimu twahanjilang’a nawa.

47008007 Antu amakwawu hiyeluka chenochuku; ilang’a amu, enzhilila jehi ankishi neyi chalala hiyuma yiji kwoku, ajyang’a yakujya yawu kafwampi neyi hichuma chanapeshuwu nachu ankishi; hiyakutamisha nachu chinlezhi chawu chamuchima chazeya.
47008008 Kujya hikwatuwahishang’a kumesu aNzambuku. Neyi tukubula kujya hichikututamishaku, hela neyi tukujya nawa hichikutuwahishaku.
47008009 Ilang’a babalenu, kusubuka kwenu iku kubuli kwikala chuma chakujimbwisha nachu akwenu azeya.
47008010 Mulong’a neyi muntu wukukumona eyi weluka wunashakami mwitala jakupeshela ankishi nakujya, kwizhi chinlezhi chinji chamuchima chikukwatilaku ng’ovu yakujya yuma yanapeshuwu nachu ankishi.
47008011 Kwiluka kweyi hikukunong’esha manakweyi wazeya, áfwililiyi Klistu.
47008012 Chimwaputolang’a anakwenu nakukatisha chinlezhi chawu chamuchima chazeya, mwaputolang’a Klistu.
47008013 Jichi neyi yakujya yikujimbwisha manakwami, nukuleka kujya mbizhi chikupu hayanyaka, nakenja kajimbwisha manakwami.
47009001 Hinimwana wachisemwaku, tahinji? Hinikapostoluku, tahinji? Hinamumoni Mwanta wetu Yesu namesuku, tahinji? Enu himuji mujimu wami wamuji Mwantaku, tahinji?
47009002 Hela neyi nabuli kwikala kapostolu kumesu awantu acheng’i, hakwila kumesu enu nikapostolu chalala. Mulong’a enu yenu wunsahu wawupostolu wami wamuji Mwanta.
47009003 Jichi chinajihakwilang’a kuji antu ansompeshang’a,
47009004 nami, tunabuli wanta wakujya hela wakunwa, tahinji?
47009005 Nabuli wanta wakusumbula mumbanja wakuhwelela niyang’a ninji munzhila, neyi chelang’awu apostolu amakwawu, nianakwaMwanta, niPetulu, tahinji?
47009006 Ami naBalanaba, yetu hohu tukubula kutwesha kuleka kukalakala nyijimu yakujikwasha nachu, tahinji?

47009007 Mwamonahu jehi ishijika wakalakalang’a, hakujifwetang’a yomweni, tahinji? Hela muntu wakuminang’a kwakujima itempa janyivinyu hohu, kujiilaku nyikabu nehi? Hela muntu wajiishang’a nyikoku, abuli kunwinaku mayeli?
47009008 Chinukuhosha mwenimu nahoshang’a mwanlezhang’awu antu, tahinji? Hela nshimbi yahoshang’a mwomumu;
47009009 mulong’a munshimbi yaMosi anasoneki nawu, Kukasa kukanwa kang’ombi hakuhulayi tijiku, chinzhila.
47009010 Nzambi waakamang’a ang’ombi, tahinji wahosheleli hansang’u yetwetu? Eng’a, yetu asonekeleluwu, kulonja mukwakujima ajimi nakuching’ezha. Nimukwakuhula aching’ezhi kujiilamu.
47009011 Etu twayikuwilili yuma yaSpilitu, komana chikukala neyi tukujya yuma yenu yakumuzhimba, tahinji?
47009012 Chatweshang’a antu amakwawu kutambula yuma yenu, etu tubuli kubajikamu, tahinji?
47009013 Mweluka jehi wena akalakeshang’a yuma yazhila ajyang’a yuma yakuTembeli, niwena emanang’a kukameng’a kakulambwila ajyang’a yakukameng’a.
47009014 Jimu nawa mwalong’esheliyi Mwanta, ninji antu ashimunang’a nsang’u yayiwahi akajyi kunsang’u yayiwahi.

47009015 Ami kwami hinakwati kuyumiyuku, hela chinasoneki ichi hinasoneki nami akankwashuku. Ami nakeng’i nami chachiwahi nikumini jakufwa hohu, habuli kumwekana muntu wukunlekesha kujisama kunajisamang’a.
47009016 Chinashimunang’a nsang’u yayiwahi, hichikweti hakujisaminaku; anankunzhiki mujimu wakushimuna, ching’a nishimuni hohu. Oyu yihung’u yinukumonami neyi nukubula kushimuna nsang’u yayiwahi!
47009017 Mulong’a neyi nachilang’a chakufuma kumuchima wamami aweni, komana chikweti wulooku wachu, ilang’a neyi hichakumuchima wamami awenuku, anankunzhiki mujimu wambala wakushimuna.
47009018 Inji wulooku wami hiwulookwinyi? Wowu wakushimuna nsang’u yayiwahi chakaji wuseya, kulonja nibuli kujya mwezhima munatweshang’a kujya kunsang’u yayiwahi.
47009019 Hela hininjung’u yawantuku, najinki ami aweni wujung’u wakushimwina antu ezhima, kulonja nikokoli nachu amavulu.

47009020 Kuji aYujeya nelili neyi nikaYujeya, kulonja nakakokoli nachu aYujeya, kuji antu aji kunshimbi nelili neyi niji kunshimbi, kutong’a ami hiniji kunshimbuku, kulonja nakakokoli nachu antu aji kunshimbi.
47009021 Kuji antu abula nshimbi nelili neyi nabula nshimbi, kulonja nakakokoli nachu antu abula nshimbi; hinabula nshimbi kuji Nzambuku, nekala munshimbi yaKlistu.
47009022 Kuji antu azeya nelili muntu wazeya, kulonja nakakokoli nachu antu azeya. Nekali jehi wesekana nawantu ezhima muyuma yezhima, kulonja mwezhimimu nitweshi kwamwina nachu amakwawu.
47009023 Yuma yezhima yinelang’a, nayililang’a nsang’u yayiwahi kulonja nitambwilumu nkisu yayu.
47009024 Muneluki nenu antu ajesekang’a lufuchi lwawu atemukang’a wezhima wawu, kwinza kusomwena, akusomwena wumu hohu. Ninenu temukenu kulonja akayisomweni.
47009025 Antu ezhima ahemang’a nakujipaka ajihembang’a muyuma yezhima. Wena alonjang’a kutambula chibaaba chatokang’a, hakwila etu twalonjang’a kutambula chakátokang’a.
47009026 Jichi ninami chinatemukang’a mwenomu, hinatemukang’a nakululutaku; chinalwang’a hinetang’a hampepelaku.
47009027 Ilang’a nafumbang’a muzhimba wami nakuwukofwola, kulonja abuli kunkinzhika ami aweni nashimwinang’a antu acheng’i.
47010001 Enu anakwetu, hinakeng’enu kuyamba cheliluwu ankakulula zhetuku; ajing’i mwishina jevu wezhima wawu; ahitili mukalung’alwizhi wezhima wawu;
47010002 ayizhimikili muji Mosi nimwivu nimukalung’alwizhi wezhima wawu;
47010003 ajiili yakujya yawuspilitu yoyimu wezhima wawu;
47010004 anwini yakunwa yawuspilitu yoyimu wezhima wawu. Mulong’a anwini kwilola jawuspilitu jayilonjeli, iloloju yowu Klistu.
47010005 Hela chochu, Nzambi hatiyili kuwaha nawakwawu amavuluku; wayizhilumwini muchinkalampata.
47010006 Hiyuma yakutalilahu etu kulonja tubuli kufwila yuma yatama yafwililuwu wena.
47010007 Bayi mwikala akwakufukamina ankishi, neyi chayifukaminuwu wena amakwawuku; neyi chanasonekuwu nawu, Antu ashakamini nakujya nakunwa, Hiyakunyamoka nakuhema.
47010008 Bayi twila wuzhila neyi cheliluwu wena amakwawuku; hiyakufwa makombakazhi makumi ayeji namakombakazhi asatu (23,000) ifuku jawu jimu.
47010009 Bayi tumweseka Mwanta neyi chamwesekeluwu wena amakwawuku; hiyakuyizhilumuna kuji atupela.
47010010 Bayi mutoba neyi chatobeluwu wena amakwawuku; hiyakuyizhilumuna kuji mukwakuzhilumuna.
47010011 Yumiyi jinu yayishikeneni wena kulonja etu tutaliluhu; ayisonekeli kulonja kutukonkomwena, etu tuji kunu kunsa yanyaka yamakonu.
47010012 Jichi yowu natong’ozhoki ninji nemani, ababali wakenja kajimbuka.

47010013 Hikunayiwani kutesha kwabulang’a kutweshawu antu ezhimaku; ilang’a Nzambi washinshika, hakwitezha kuyitesha chabajika mung’ovu zhenuku; chakuyiteshawu wukubusilaku nzhila yakupulukila, kulonja mutweshi kukakela.
47010014 Jichi enu akwetu twakeng’a, temukenu kufukamina ankishi.
47010015 Chinahoshang’a nanenu nelang’a nami muyakwamaana; shinshikenu munukuhosha.
47010016 Nami ilu lupasa lwankisu lutwakiswilang’a, hikukunjang’ana mumashi aKlistu hamu. Jinkenji iji jitwahumunang’a, hikukunjang’ana mumuzhimba waKlistu hamu.
47010017 Hela tunekali amavulu, tuji jinkenji jimu, tuji muzhimba wumu; mulong’a wezhima wetu twatambulang’a jinkenji jimu, hamu.
47010018 Talenu chelang’awu aIsalela kumuchiji wawu. Wena ajyang’a yimuna yaketulang’awu anazhilili hamu nakameng’a kakulambwila.
47010019 Nukuhosha namiji? Nami, chimuna chaketwilang’awu ankishi hichuma, tahinji? Hela nkishi hichuma chalala, tahinji?
47010020 Nehi, ami nami yimuna yaketulang’awu aZHentili aketwilang’a anjemoni, hiyamuketwilang’a Nzambuku. Hinakeng’enu kutambula hamu nawanjemonuku.
47010021 Himukutwesha kwila munwa mulupasa lwaMwanta, munwa nawa mulupasa lwawanjemonuku. Himukutwesha kwila mutambula kumesa yaMwanta, mutambula nawa kumesa yawanjemonuku.
47010022 Tumutiyishi Mwanta mukáwu, tahinji? Twamubajika ng’ovu, tahinji?
47010023 Yuma yezhima yalong’a; ilang’a yuma yikwawu hiyakwashanang’aku. Yuma yezhima yalong’a, ilang’a yuma yikwawu hiyakoleshang’aku.
47010024 Bayi muntu alonja yakujiwahisha nachu yomwenuku, ching’a yakuwahisha nachu mukwawu.
47010025 Yuma yalanjishang’awu kwakulanjila yezhima, kuminenu jakujya chakaji kwihula, mulong’a chinlezhi chamuchima hichikuyibayishaku.
47010026 Iseki jezhima jambala jaMWANTA, niyuma yalumbamamu.

47010027 Neyi muntu wabula kukuhwelela wukuyitambika kuya nakujya ninji, neyi munakeng’i kuya, kuminenu jakujya yakuyitentekelawu yezhima, chakaji kwihula, mulong’a chinlezhi chamuchima hichikuyibayishaku.
47010028 Kwinza neyi akuyilezha kuji muntu wumu ninji, Iyi ayipeshela ankishi; bayi mujyaku, hansang’u yayenowu nayilezhi, nihansang’u yachinlezhi chamuchima.
47010029 Ami nami chinlezhi chamuchima chamukwenu, bayi cheyeyi awenuku. Mulong’anyi wakunsompeshelawu chuma chinetezhi nachinlezhi chamuntu wacheng’i?
47010030 Neyi natambulang’a nakusakilila, mulong’anyi wakuntenenawu chatama nachuma chinasakililang’a?
47010031 Jichi jinu, hela mukujya hela mukunwa, mumwelang’a mwezhima ilenung’a kulonja kulemesha Nzambi.
47010032 Bayi mwila chuma chakujimbwisha hela aYujeya, hela aGliki, hela chipompelu chaNzambuku.
47010033 Chochinatiyishang’a antu ezhima kuwaha muyuma yezhima, hinakeng’i kwami kujikwasha ami awenuku; ching’a yowu kukwasha antu amavulu, kulonja amwinewi.
47011001 Ikalenu akwakung’imbuzhola ami, neyi chinelang’a ami nawa nembuzholang’a Klistu.
47011002 Nayihameki chimwang’anukang’a muyuma yezhima, nichimwakakelang’a yaaku, mwomunayilezheli ninami.
47011003 Nakeng’i mwiluki nenu, mutu weyala jiyi Klistu; mutu wamumbanja jiyi iyala; mutu waKlistu jiyi Nzambi.
47011004 Iyala wukulombela hela kuplofweta, kumutu kwakubuta, nasawuli mutu winji.
47011005 Ilang’a mumbanja wukulombela hela kuplofweta, kumutu kwakaji kubuta, nasawuli mutu winji, mulong’a hichuma chochimu neyi natewuli nkumbu.
47011006 Mulong’a neyi mumbanja wukubula kubuta kumutu, aleli nsuki; ilang’a neyi mumbanja namoni kumulela nsuki, hela kumutewula kawewula, chikweti nsonyi, ching’a ajibuti.
47011007 Iyala kubuta kumutu chinzhila, mulong’a yena hichimfwana nilubanzhi lwakulema kwaNzambi; hakwila mumbanja hilubanzhi lwakulema kweyala.
47011008 Mulong’a iyala hafumini kuji mumbanjaku, mumbanja jiyi wafumini kuji iyala.
47011009 Iyala hiyamuleng’eleli mumbanjaku, hakwila mumbanja jiyi aleng’eleluwu iyala.
47011010 Jichi hachumichi mumbanja waji kwikala nachinzhikizhilu chawanta kumutu winji, hansang’u yawang’elu.
47011011 Hela chochu, muji Mwanta mumbanja hekala kankawinji chakaji iyalaku, hela iyala hekala kankawinji chakaji mumbanjaku.
47011012 Mulong’a mumbanja amufumishili kuji iyala, niiyala nawa amuvwalang’a kuji mumbanja; ilang’a yuma yezhima yafumang’a kuji Nzambi.
47011013 Sompenu enu aweni; chatela mumbanja kulombela kuji Nzambi chakaji kubuta kumutu, tahinji?
47011014 Chisemwa chacheni hichayitang’ishang’a ninji iyala wukweti nsuki zhazhilehi nasawukuku, tahinji?
47011015 Ilang’a mumbanja neyi wukweti nsuki zhazhilehi, hilubanzhi lwakulema kwinji; mulong’a amwinkeli nsuki zhikali zhakujibuta nachu.
47011016 Neyi kuji muntu wukuleta ntaji, etu, hela yipompelu yaNzambi, hitwelang’a chochochuku.
47011017 Chinukuyitang’isha mwenimu, hichakuyihameka nachuku; mulong’a mwapompang’a chakutamisha, hichakuwahishaku.
47011018 Chuma chakusambila chinatiyi, nawu chimwapompang’a mwambokang’a mukachi kenu, ninami mwekwawu netezhi nami mwalala.
47011019 Mulong’a ching’a hamwekana kujambula mukachi kenu, kulonja álumbuluka amwekani.
47011020 Jichi chimwapompang’a mwakang’anyang’a kujya chawizha chaMwanta.
47011021 Mulong’a chimwajyang’a wezhima wenu, mwasambilang’a kujijiila yakujya yenu; wumu hakutiya nzala, mukwawu hakusheta.

47011022 Aka! Ochu chimukusekesha chipompelu chaNzambi nakutiyisha antu abula yuma nsonyi, himwaheta matalenu akujiila hela akunwinaku, tahinji? Niyili namiji? Niyihameki nanochu chimwelang’a mwenimu, tahinji? Nehi, hinayihamekuku.
47011023 Chuma chinayilezheli enu, nachitambuli kuji Mwanta; cheliliyi Mwanta Yesu wufuku wamufukezheluwu,
47011024 wanoneni jinkenji, chanasakililiyi hakujihumuna, hakwila ninji, Weniwu jiwu muzhimba wami wanenkuwu hanyizhimba yenwenu; ilenung’a mwenimu mung’anakanang’a nachu.

47011025 Jichi cheliliyi nawa ninalupasa, chaneluwu anajyi jehi, hakwila ninji, Lupasilu jichi chitiyang’enu chachiha chamumashi ami; ilenung’a mwenimu, chezhima chimukunwang’a, mung’anakanang’a nachu.
47011026 Mulong’a chezhima chimukujyang’a jinkenji iji, nichimukunwang’a mulupasilu, himukutiyakesha kufwa kwaMwanta nichakenzayi.
47011027 Jichi muntu wukujya jinkenji iji, hela wukunwa mulupasa lwaMwanta chakaji kutela, wukumona mulong’a wakusawisha muzhimba nimashi aMwanta.
47011028 Muntu ajeseki yomweni, kulonja atweshi kujya kujinkenji iji, nikunwa mulupasilu.
47011029 Mulong’a muntu wukujya nakunwa chakubula kumwenamu Muzhimba, wukujya nakunwa chakujiletela mulong’a.
47011030 Jihu hanafumi antu amavulu kuzeya mukachi kenu, nikukatakata, niamakwawu kuya mutulu.
47011031 Neyi twajishinshikang’a etu aweni hiyaji kutusompeshaku.
47011032 Ilang’a chatusompeshang’awu, atufumbang’a kuji Mwanta, kulonja tubuli kumwena mulong’a hamu nawantu ampata yamunu mwishina.
47011033 Enu anakwami, chimukupompang’a nakujya, jiching’ililenung’a muntu namukwawu.
47011034 Muntu natiyi nzala akajyang’ahu jehi kwitala jinji; kulonja chimukupompa chibuli kuyiletela mulong’a. Nsang’u zhinashaluku nakalong’esha hinamba kenza.
47012001 Enu anakwetu, hinakeng’enu kuyamba yuma yaSpilituku.
47012002 Muneluki jehi chimwajing’i aZHentili mwalumbukili nakulonjela ankishi abulang’a kuhosha, mwezhima mwayitweleluwu mwomu.
47012003 Jichi nakeng’enu mwiluki muntu wukuhosha ninji Yesu washing’ewa, hahoshang’a muji Spilitu waNzambuku. Muntu wukuhosha ninji Yesu jiyi Mwanta, kuchihosha ching’a muji Spilitu Wazhila.
47012004 Kuji yamukunkulu yamboka, ilang’a Spilitu yowumu.
47012005 Kuji nyijimu yamboka, ilang’a Mwanta yowumu.
47012006 Kuji kukalakala kwamboka, ilang’a Nzambi yowumu wakalakalang’a yuma yezhima muji ezhima.
47012007 Ilang’a haji muntu wezhima, anamwinki mwamwekena Spilitu, kulonja kukwashang’ana.
47012008 Mulong’a muntu wumu anamwinki izu jamaana naSpilitu; mukwawu anamwinki izu jakwiluka, mwaya Spilitu yowumu;
47012009 mukwawu anamwinki kukuhwelela, naSpilitu yowumu; mukwawu anamwinki yamukunkulu yakuuka, naSpilitu yowumu;
47012010 mukwawu anamwinki kwila yihayamisha; mukwawu anamwinki kuplofweta; mukwawu anamwinki kushinshika aspilitu amboka; mukwawu anamwinki majimi amboka; mukwawu anamwinki kulumbulula majimi.
47012011 Yamukunkulu yezhimiyi ayikalakeshang’a kuji Spilitu yowumu, wayambwilang’a hamuntu hamuntu mwaya muchima winji.
47012012 Muzhimba chiwuneli wumu, wekala nayiji yayivulu, niyiji yamumuzhimba yezhima, hela yayivulu, yineli muzhimba wumu; jichi chekalayi niKlistu nawa.
47012013 Mulong’a wezhima wetu atuzhimika jehi muji Spilitu wumu twikali muzhimba wumu, hela aYujeya hela aGliki, hela anjung’u hela hiyanjung’uku, wezhima wetu atunwisha jehi kuji Spilitu wumu.
47012014 Mulong’a muzhimba hiwekala chiji chimu hohuku, yekala yayivulu.
47012015 Neyi mwenju wukuhosha ninji, Chinabula kwikala chikasa hiniwamuzhimbaku; chalala kwaamu, hanekali wamuzhimbaku, tahinji?
47012016 Neyi itu jikuhosha ninji, Chinabula kwikala jisu hiniwamuzhimbaku; komana hanekali wamuzhimbaku, tahinji?
47012017 Neyi muzhimba wezhima wukwikala jisu hohu, wukutiya nanka? Neyi muzhimba wezhima wukwikala itu hohu, wukutiya nanka ivumba?
47012018 Ilang’a Nzambi nashi mumuzhimba yiji yezhima, hachiji hachiji, mwomwatiyililiyi kuwaha.
47012019 Inji neyi yezhima yinekali chiji chimu hohu, muzhimba waji kwikala kujihi?
47012020 Jichi jinu kwekala yiji yayivulu, ilang’a muzhimba wumu.
47012021 Jisu hijikutwesha kwila chikasa ninji, Eyi hiwukweti mujimuku! Hela mutu hiwukutwesha kwila nyenju ninji, Enu himukweti mujimuku!
47012022 Eng’a, mwalala yiji yamumuzhimba yinekali neyi hiyaheta ng’ovuku, jiyi yikweti nyijimu.
47012023 Niyiji yitwatong’ozhokang’a netu yabula kulema chalala, jiyi twalemeshang’a nankashi; niyiji yetu yikweti nsonyi, jiyi yabajika kulema,
47012024 hakwila yiji yetu yalubanzhi hiyakalaku. Ilang’a Nzambi napati chachiwahi muzhimba, naswezhi kulemesha yiji yabula kulema;
47012025 kulonja mumuzhimba mubuli kwikala kwambuka, ching’a yiji yezhima yihembang’ani.
47012026 Neyi chiji chimu chikukaba, yiji yezhima yamwenang’a hamu kukaba; hela chimu akuchilemesha, yiji yezhima yazang’alelang’a hamu
47012027 Enu muji muzhimba waKlistu, muntu himuntu hichiji chamuzhimbowu. .

47012028 Nzambi nashi muchipompelu, ákusambila apostolu, ámuchiyeji atuplofwetu, ámuchisatu antang’ishi; himukulonjela akwayihayamisha; kufumahu akwayamukunkulu yakuuka, niankwashi, niakwakuyuula, niáhoshang’a majimi amboka.
47012029 Antu ezhima hiyapostolu, tahinji? Antu ezhima hiyatuplofwetu, tahinji? Antu ezhima hiyantang’ishi, tahinji? Antu ezhima hiyakwakukong’a yihayamisha, tahinji?
47012030 Ezhima akweti yamukunkulu yakuuka, tahinji? Ezhima ahoshang’a majimi, tahinji? Ezhima alumbululang’a majimi, tahinji?
47012031 Ilang’a fwilenu nankashi yamukunkulu yabajika. Jichi nukuyilezha nzhila yabajikamu nankashi kuwaha.
47013001 Neyi ami nahoshang’a majimi awantu niawang’elu, ilang’a nabula kukeng’a, neli jehi neyi chikung’u chikuvuma, hela neyi mpwambu yikutiyakana ngoo-ngoo-ngoo.

47013002 Neyi neluka kuplofweta, nimwalumbulukila yizhinjilu yezhima, nimaana ezhima; hela neyi nikweti kukuhwelela kwezhima nikwakututulula nachu mapiji, ilang’a nabula kukeng’a, niwamukunkulwayi tuhu.
47013003 Neyi nukwinka mahetami ezhima nijiishi atuzweng’i, hela neyi nukwinka muzhimba wami awochi, ilang’a nabula kukeng’a, hichikunkwasha nihantuku.
47013004 Kukeng’a kwajung’umikang’a, kukweti niluwi; kukeng’a hikwahetang’a ichimaku; kukeng’a hikwajinkang’a wantaku; hikwajitoheshang’aku;
47013005 hikwelang’a chuma chabula kutelaku; hikwakokwelang’a kwinji hohuku; hikwanyakalang’a kuzuwaku; hikwafuukwilang’a mukwawu chuma chatamaku;
47013006 hikwazang’alalang’a nayuma yabula kulong’aku, kwazang’alalang’a nawalala.
47013007 Kwaking’ang’a ho-o, kwakuhwelelang’a ho-o, kwaching’ezhang’a ho-o, kwatatakenang’a ho-o.
47013008 Kukeng’a hikwakang’anyang’aku. Ilang’a hela kuplofweta kwamba kahita; hela majimi amba kamwena; hela kwiluka kwamba kahita.
47013009 Mulong’a twelukang’a mwanti, twaplofwetang’a nawa mwanti;
47013010 ilang’a chamba kenza chuma chalala chashikilamu chikupu, yuma yakumininamu akayifumishamu.
47013011 Chinajing’i kansi nahoshelang’a yawansi, natiyilang’a mwawansi, natong’ozhokelang’a yawansi; ilang’a hanu hinakuli jehi, naleki jehi yuma yawansi.
47013012 Mulong’a hanu tuchiji kumona muchibanzhilu neyi mumbunju, ilang’a henohu twamba kajimona mesu namesu; hanu neluka hanti, ilang’a henohu nakeluka chikupu neyi chanang’ilukuwu ami.
47013013 Ichi jinu kwekala kukuhwelela, nikuching’ezha, nikukeng’a, yumiyi yisatu; chaswezha kulema yowu kukeng’a.
47014001 Lonjenu kukeng’a. Fwilenu nawa niyamukunkulu yaSpilitu, ching’a muswezheshi kuplofweta.
47014002 Muntu wahoshang’a mwijimi jacheng’i wahoshang’a naNzambi, hahoshang’a nawantuku; mulong’a kwosi muntu wukuchitiyaku, ilang’a wahoshang’a nsang’u zhakuzhinja muSpilitu.
47014003 Hakwinza muntu waplofwetang’a wahoshang’a nawantu kulonja kuyikolesha, nikuyikonkomwena, nikuyikunjezha.
47014004 Muntu wahoshang’a mwijimi jacheng’i wajikoleshang’a yomweni hohu; hakwinza muntu waplofwetang’a wakoleshang’a chipompelu.

47014005 Ami nakeng’i muhoshi majimi wezhima wenu; hakwila chuma chinakeng’i nankashi nami muplofweti. Mulong’a muntu waplofwetang’a wabajika muntu wahoshang’a majimi, ching’a yolumbulula kulonja kukolesha chipompelu.
47014006 Jichi jinu enu anakwetu, neyi nukwinza kujenu nakuhosha majimi, chakaji kuhosha munayi chimwekeshu, hela munabuli kuya kwiluka hela kuplofweta hela kutang’isha, chikuyikwasha ng’ahi?
47014007 Niyuma yakaji wumi, yiji neyi chimama nikajaja, neyi yikuvuma chakaji kulumbuluka, akwiluka ng’ahi mwanembuwu chimama hela kajaja?
47014008 Neyi mpùng’a yikuvuma chakaji kulumbuluka, hinyi wukumanyeka ayi kunzhita?
47014009 Ninenu nawa chochimu; neyi mukubula kuhosha mazu alumbuluka, akwiluka ng’ahi mumukuhosha? Chiji neyi mukuhosha kwamumpepela hohu.
47014010 Chalala mumpata yamunu mwishina mwekala majimi amavulu amboka; hikwekala nijimu jabula mujayaku.
47014011 Jichi jinu, neyi nabuli kwiluka mwaya ijimi jamuntu wukuhosha, nukwikala kuji yena neyi mwenyi, niyena nawa wukwikala neyi mwenyi kujami.
47014012 Yamukunkulu yaSpilitu yimuji nakufwila, fwilenu nankashi yakukolesha nachu chipompelu.
47014013 Jichi muntu wukuhosha mwijimi jacheng’i, alombeli kulonja atweshi kulumbulula.
47014014 Mulong’a neyi nukulombela mwijimi jacheng’i, spilitu yami jiyi yiji nakulombela, ilang’a kashinshi kami hikakumwenamu chumaku.
47014015 Ching’a nila ng’ahi? Ching’a nilombeli naspilitu ninakashinshi nawa; ching’a niimbi naspilitu ninakashinshi nawa.
47014016 Mukunkulwayi neyi wukukiswila nkisu naspilitu hohu chiwukusakilila, mukwenu wabula kwiluka muyalumbulukila wukwitezha ng’ahi ninji, Amena? Mulong’a yena kwinji hanatiyi muwunahoshuku.
47014017 Chakusakilila wunasakilili chachiwahi, hakwinza mukwenu hiwunamukoleshuku.
47014018 Nasakililang’a Nzambi nami nahoshang’a majimi chakubajika enu ezhima;
47014019 hakwinza muchipompelu nakeng’a nankashi kuhosha nakashinshi kami hela mazu atanu akutang’isha nachu akwetu; kubajika kuhosha mwijimi jacheng’i ikumi jamakombakazhi (10,000) amazu.
47014020 Enu anakwetu, bayi mutong’ozhoka yawansuku; kunsang’u yankunyi ikalenu anyikeki, muyitong’ozhoka ikalenu akula jehi.
47014021 Munshimbi anasoneki nawu, Nakahosha namunziwu nawantu amajimi acheng’i, nanyivumbu yawenyi; MWANTA ninji, Hela chochu, hiyakantiyaku.
47014022 ichi majimi hichinzhikizhilu kuji antu abula kukuhwelela, hichawakwakukuhwelelaku; hakwinza kuplofweta hichinzhikizhilu kuji akwakukuhwelela, hichawantu abula kukuhwelelaku.
47014023 J Jichi neyi chipompelu chezhima chinapompi, ninenu ezhima himukuhosha majimi, neyi mukwing’ila antu abula kwiluka muyalumbulukila, hela abula kukuhwelela, hiyakuhosha nawu mwanjalaku?
47014024 Hakwila neyi ezhima aji nakuplofweta, himukwing’ila muntu wabula kukuhwelela hela wabula kwiluka muyalumbulukila, akumukonkolola hela kumusompesha kuji antu ezhima.
47014025 Yuma yanazhinjiyi mumuchima winji yikumwekana, wukubulamana heseki nakujifukula kuji Nzambi, wukwila ninji, Chalala Nzambi wekala mukachi kenu

47014026 Nochu jinu enu anakwetu, mukwilang’a ng’ahi? Chimwapompang’a, iwu wukweti isamu, iwu wukweti nsang’u yakutang’isha, iwu wukweti chuma chanamumwekesheluwu, iwu wukweti ijimi jacheng’i, iwu wukweti kulumbulula. Ilenung’a yuma yezhima kulonja mukoleshi akwenu.
47014027 Neyi akuhosha mwijimi jacheng’i, ahoshi hela antu ayeji, bayi abajika asatuku, iwu alonjeli mukwawu, wumu, wumu; muntu wumu alumbululi.
47014028 Neyi hikuji mukwakulumbululaku akumini jakumwena muchipompelu, ahoshi naNzambi mumuchima winji.
47014029 Niatuplofwetu ahoshi ayeji hela asatu, akwawu ashinshikumu.
47014030 Neyi muntu nashakamuku jiyi anamwekesheluwu chuma chimu, muntu watachi asambili kumanisha.
47014031 Mulong’a chachiwahi kuplofweta wezhima wenu, wumu alonjeli mukwawu, kulonja ezhima akwati maana, ezhima akwati ng’ovu.
47014032 Aspilitu awatuplofwetu ovwahilang’a atuplofwetu.
47014033 Mulong’a Nzambi hiNzambi wakuluwang’eshaku, hiNzambi wakuwunja; neyi chekala muyipompelu yawakwakuzhila yezhima.
47014034 Ambanja amweni muyipompelu, mulong’a chinzhila wena kuhosha; akumini jakwovwahila, neyi chinahoshi nshimbi nawa.
47014035 Neyi akukeng’a kwiluka chuma, ehuli amfumuzhawu aweni kumatalawu; mulong’a mumbanja kuhosha muchipompelu chikweti nsonyi.
47014036 Komana izu jaNzambi jafumini kujenu, hela jashikili kujenu kankawenu hohu, tahinji?
47014037 Muntu natong’ozhoki ninji nikaplofwetu, inji kwizhi nimuntu waSpilitu, eluki chikupu ninji iyi yuma yinasoneki, hinshimbi yaMwanta.
47014038 Ilang’a muntu nayambi, ayambi kwinji.
47014039 Jichi jinu enu anakwami, fwilenu kuplofweta, bayi mulekesha kuhosha mumajimuku.
47014040 Ching’a yuma yezhima ayili mwatelela nakulong’a.
47015001 Nochu enu anakwetu, nukuyilezha nsang’u yayiwahi yinayishimwinini, yimwatambwili, mwomu mwemana.
47015002 Yoyi nsang’u yakuyamwina, neyi mukukakelamu; neyi nehi, kwizhi mwakuhweleli chamukunkulwayi.
47015003 Mulong’a nasambilili kuyilezha nsang’u yanlezheluwu ami, yeliluwu nawu, Klistu wafwili kukoola nshiji zhetu, mwomwaya nyikanja yazhila,
47015004 nawu, amuzhiikili, amusang’wili muji afu hefuku jamuchisatu, mwomwaya nyikanja yazhila;
47015005 nawu, wamwekeni kuji Petulu, kulonjelamu nikuji ikumi nayeji (12).
47015006 Kulonjelamu hakumwekana kuji anakwetu apompeli hamu, kuyichinja abajikili nkulakazhi zhitanu (500); amavulu achiji kwoku nikulelu, amakwawu anakami jehi tulu.
47015007 Kulonjelamu hakumwekana kuji Yakoba, kulonjelamu hakumwekana kuji apostolu ezhima.
47015008 Nkumininaku hakumwekana nikujami nawa, nafwana neyi mwana wakusulumuna mwivumu.
47015009 Mulong’a ami yami nakehelamu haji apostolu ezhima, hinatela kuntena nawu kapostoluku mulong’a nakabishili chipompelu chaNzambi.

47015010 Ilang’a mwezhima munekali imu, nekalumu naluwi lwaNzambi hohu; niluwi lwinji lwantiyililiyi hilunayi mwamukunkuluku. Eng’a, najikiti chakubajika ezhima, ilang’a hiyamuku, lwoluwi lwaNzambi najing’i nalu.
47015011 Jichi twashimunang’a, hela ami hela wena, enu himukukuhwelela.
47015012 Inji neyi Klistu amushimunang’a nawu amusang’ula jehi muji afu, enu amakwawu mwahoshelang’aji nenu afu hiyakuyisang’ulaku?
47015013 Jichi neyi afu hiyakuyisang’ulaku, komana niKlistu hiyamusang’wiluku.
47015014 Neyi Klistu hiyamusang’wiluku, komana kushimuna kwetu kunekali jehi kwamukunkulwayi, nikukuhwelela kwenu kunekali jehi kwamukunkulwayi nawa.
47015015 Neyi afu hiyakuyisang’ulaku, komana niKlistu hiyamusang’wiluku, ninetu, twashimunang’a netu Nzambi wamusang’wili Klistu muji afu, tunekali jehi ayinsahu akutwambila Nzambi.
47015016 Mulong’a neyi afu hiyakuyisang’ulaku, komana niKlistu nawa hiyamusang’wiluku.
47015017 Neyi Klistu hiyamusang’wiluku, kukuhwelela kwenu kunekali jehi kwamukunkulwayi, muchiji munshiji zhenu,
47015018 niantu anakami jehi tulu muji Klistu ananong’i jehi kwawu.
47015019 Neyi tunakuhweleli Klistu muwumi wunu hohu, komana yetu tunabajiki antu ezhima wushona.
47015020 Ilang’a Klistu amusang’ula jehi muji afu, nekali jehi nyikabu yatachi yawenawa anakami tulu.
47015021 Mulong’a chaleteluwu kufwa kuji muntu, kuji muntu nawa jiku kwenzhili kusang’uka kwawafu.
47015022 Mulong’a chafwang’awu antu ezhima muji Ajama, jichi nawa antu ezhima akayihanjishila muji Klistu.
47015023 Ching’a muntu nachenju chinji, muntu nachenju chinji; Klistu jiyi nyikabu yatachi, nkumininaku niantu ambala aKlistu hakenzayi.
47015024 Henohu jihu hakenza kukumisha, hakalubulayi Klistu wanta kuji Nzambi, yowu Tata; hamba kela nanong’eshi jehi chiyuulu chezhima, niwanta wezhima, ning’ovu zhezhima.
47015025 Ching’a akayuula yuule-e, nichamba kajatayi ayilumbu zhinji ezhima.
47015026 Chilumbu chakukuminina akanong’eshayi, yowu kufwa.

47015027 Mulong’a mumukanja wazhila aneli nawu, Anamwovwahishili yuma yezhima nakuyisha mwishina janyenju yinji. Ochu chaneliyi ninji anamwovwahishili yuma yezhima, hiyanateni niwámwovwahishilili yuma yezhimaku.
47015028 Chakela yuma yezhima yinamwovwahili jehi yena, henohu niyomweni Mwana nawa wakamwovwahila Mukwakwovwahisha yuma yezhima; kulonja Nzambi akekali jiyi hohu kankawinji chikupu, mwezhima
47015029 Neyi nehi, inji awa azhimikilang’awu afu analonjiji? Neyi afu hiyakayisang’ulaku, ayizhimikilang’aji?
47015030 Iku kufwa kutwakeng’ang’a kumona hefuku hefuku, tukukúmwenaji?
47015031 Enu anakwetu, nukuyilezha chakola, nanochu chinajisaminang’a hansang’u yenu muji Klistu Yesu Mwanta wetu, nami nafwang’a hefuku hefuku.
47015032 Chinalwili kuEfwesesa neyi chalwang’awu antu nawanyama ayisumi, chikunheteshaji neyi afu hiyakuyisang’ulaku? Komana tukumini jakujya nakunwa, Mulong’a kumajiki tukufwa.
47015033 Bayi ayijimbaku; kujikunja nawantu atama kwatamishang’a maana amawahi.
47015034 Tonenu mwikali along’a, mubuli kuputola; mulong’a kuji antu amu hiyamwiluka Nzambuku. Chinahoshi ichi nalonji kuyitiyisha nsonyi.
47015035 Muntu wumu wukwihula ninji, Afu akuyisang’ula ng’ahi? akenza namuzhimba wuji ng’ahi?
47015036 Eyi wabula maana, oyu yiwukutumba, ching’a yisambili kufwa kulonja yihanji.
47015037 Ninoyu mbutu yiwukutumba, hiwukutumba chuma chamba kekalaku, ching’a inawu jajeni, hela jatijiku hela jambutu yacheng’i.
47015038 Ilang’a Nzambi hakuyimenesha mwakeng’elayi yomweni, mbutu namwayu, mbutu namwayu.
47015039 Nyizhimba yezhima hinyizhimba yoyimuku; kuji yawantu, kuji nyizhimba yacheng’i yawanyama, kuji nyizhimba yacheng’i nawa yawatuja, niyacheng’i yawanshi.
47015040 Kuji nyizhimba yamwiwulu, ninyizhimba yahanu hamaseki. Kuji lubanzhi lwachuma chamwiwulu, kuji lubanzhi lwacheng’i lwachuma chahanu hamaseki.
47015041 Kuji lubanzhi lwetang’wa, kuji lubanzhi lwacheng’i lwakakwezhi, nilubanzhi lwacheng’i lwatutumbwa; mulong’a nitutumbwa twaambuka, aka nalubanzhi lwaku, aka nalubanzhi lwaku.
47015042 Jichakekala kusang’uka kwawafu. Ákutumbawu nakutoka, akamusang’ula nakubula kutoka.
47015043 Ákutumbawu nakusawuka, akamusang’ula nalubanzhi lwakulema. Ákutumbawu nakubula ng’ovu, akamusang’ula nang’ovu.
47015044 Muzhimba waheseki wakutumbawu, akawusang’ula himuzhimba waspilitu. Kwekala muzhimba waheseki, kwekala nawa muzhimba waspilitu.
47015045 Jichi anasoneki nawa nawu, Ajama watachi welili muntu wamumi; Ajama wakukuminina welili spilitu wahanjishang’a.
47015046 Waheseki jiyi wasambilang’a, bayi waspilituku, himukulonjela waspilitu.
47015047 Muntu watachi wahamaseki hilunkung’u; Muntu wamuchiyeji wamwiwulu.
47015048 Chineli muntu wahamaseki hilunkung’u, chochajuwu ninawa ahamaseki nawa; chekalayi wamwiwulu, jichi chajuwu ninawa amwiwulu nawa.
47015049 Chitunekali mwekalayi muntu wahamaseki, jimu mutwakekalila nawa neyi chekalayi Muntu wamwiwulu.
47015050 Ichi jinu enu anakwetu, nukuhosha nami muzhimba waheseki hiwukutwesha kuswana wanta waNzambuku; hela kutoka hikukuswana kubula kutokaku.
47015051 Tiyenu niyilezhi chizhinjilu. Wezhima wetu hitwakakama tuluku, ilang’a akatubalumuna wezhima wetu;
47015052 hohenohu, mukulabula kwajisu, hampùng’a yakukuminina. Mulong’a mpùng’a yakavuma, niafu akayisang’ula nakubula kutoka, ninetu akatubalumuna.
47015053 Mulong’a ichi chatokang’a ching’a chakavwala kubula kutoka, niniwu wafwang’a ching’a akavwala kubula kufwa.
47015054 Ichi chatokang’a chichakavwala kubula kutoka, niniwu wafwang’a chakavwalayi kubula kufwa, henohu jihu jinu hakalumbuluka ichi chanasonekuwu nawu, Mushinju wunaminyi kufwa.
47015055 Eyi kufwa, mushinju weyi wowujihi? Eyi kufwa, kusumana kweyi kwokujihi?
47015056 Imuna yakufwa yoyi nshiji; ng’ovu yanshiji nshimbi.
47015057 Tumusakililenu Nzambi watwimikilang’a mushinju muji Mwanta wetu Yesu Klistu.

47015058 Jichi enu anakwetu twakeng’a, ikalenu akola mbe chakaji kuswizhewa. Swezhenu kukalakala mujimu waMwanta mafuku ezhima, mulong’a mweluka jehi kukalakala kwenu kumwakabakanang’a muji Mwanta hikwamukunkulwayuku.
47016001 Nsang’u yakupompesha yamukunkulu yakukwasha nachu akwakuzhila. Munalezheleli yipompelu yamuNG’alizha, jimu mumukwila ninenu nawa.
47016002 Hamulungu, jojifuku jatachi, jihu himukutentekela hambaji mali wezhima wenu, iwu mwanaheteliyi, iwu mwanaheteliyi, kulonja chinakenza nakawani yakupompesha jehi.
47016003 Chinakashika nakatemesha antu imukwitezha munyikanja yenu, akatwali yamukunkulu yenu kuYelusalema.
47016004 Neyi chakawaha kuya ninami, nakaya nawu.
47016005 Ami nakenza kujenu neyi nahiti jehi muMasijoniya, mulong’a chalala jimu nakahitila.
47016006 Kwizhi nakashakama nenu hela kuchelukilaku nvula, kulonja mwakanshinzhikizhuku munzhila yami kwezhima kunakaya.
47016007 Hinakeng’i kuyimona katataka chakuhita munzhilaku; mulong’a nakuhweleli nami, neyi Nzambi netezhi nakashakama nenu mafuku.
47016008 Ching’a nakalabila kuEfwesesa nichakashika Pentekosta
47016009 mulong’a chenzelu cheneni chanyijimu chinang’enzulukili; kuji nawa ayilumbu amavulu.
47016010 Neyi Timotewu wakashika oku, akashakami nanenu chakaji woma; mulong’a wakalakalang’a mujimu waMwanta neyi chinelang’a ami nawa.
47016011 Bayi amujiwula kuji muntuku. Ilang’a mwakamushinzhikizhang’aku nawa chachiwahi munzhila yinji, kulonja akenzi kujami, mulong’a niji nakumutalila nami wakenza hamu nawanakwetu.
47016012 Nsang’u yamanakwetu Apolosi. Namulembeleli nankashi nami enzi kujenu nawanakwetu, ilang’a yena hanakeng’i kwinza oku katatakaku; ninji wakenza hichakamuwahila kwinza.
47016013 Tonenu, imanenu chakola muchikuhwelelu, jikwatishenuku kuzhawuyala, ikalenu nang’ovu.
47016014 Yuma yezhima yimukwila, yilenu mukukeng’a.
47016015 Enu anakwetu, muneluki akwetala jaStefwanasi, jiyi nyikabu yamuAkaya yatachi; muneluki chanashuwu muchima kumujimu wakukalakela akwakuzhila.
47016016 Jichi nayilembeleli nami mwovwahilang’a wena ajochu, niantu ezhima ankwashang’a mumujimu nikukabakana.
47016017 Natiyi kuwaha chanenzuwu aStefwanasi naFwotunatu niAkayikusi, mulong’a wena anang’ilili yimwabulili kung’ililenu.
47016018 Wena anatulishi muchima wamami niwenwenu nawa. Jichi tambulenung’a antu ajochu.
47016019 Yipompelu yamuAsiya yinayimushi. Akwila naPlisila anayimushi nankashi muji Mwanta, nichipompelu chekala mwitala jawu.
47016020 Anakwetu ezhima anayimushi. Jimushenu muntu namukwawu nachikasa chazhila.
47016021 Ami Pawulu, hinukusoneka kwimushiku nachikasa chamami aweni.
47016022 Muntu wabula kukeng’a Mwanta Yesu ekali washing’ewa. Mwanta hakwinza.
47016023 Luwi lwaMwanta Yesu Klistu lwikali nanenu.
47016024 Kukeng’a kwami kwikali nanenu ezhima muji Klistu Yesu. Amena.

48001001 Ami Pawulu, kapostolu kaKlistu Yesu mwaya muchima waNzambi, nimanakwetu Timotewu, tudi nakuyisonekela mukanda, enu akwachipompelu chaNzambi chekala kuKolinda, hamu nawakwakuzhila ezhima ekala muAkaya mwezhima.
48001002 Luwi lwikali nanenu nikuwunda kwakufuma kudi Nzambi, Tata yetu, nikudi Mwanta wetu Yesu Klistu.
48001003 Amukiswili Nzambi yaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu, yowu Tata yindi, diyi Tata wavulishang’a luwi, Nzambi wakukundezha kwezhima,
48001004 watukundezhang’a mulukadi lwetu lwezhima, kulonda tutweshi kukundezha akwetu adi mulukadi nakukundezha kwanatukundezhuwu nachu kudi Nzambi.
48001005 Mulong’a chatuswezhelang’a makabi aKlistu, nikukundezha kwatukundezhang’awu mudi Klistu kwatuswezhelang’a nawa.

48001006 Chakutukabishawu etu, chikwikala chuma chakukundezha nachu enu nikuyamwina. Chakutukundezhawu etu, chikwikala chuma chakuyikundezha enu nawa. Kukundezhiku kwaletang’a kutatakena mumakabi itwamonang’etu nawa.
48001007 Kukuhwelela kwetu hadenu kwakola, mulong’a tuneluki netu chimwatambwilang’a makabi hamu, mwatambulang’a nikukundezha hamu.

48001008 Enu anakwetu, hitunakeng’enu kuyamba nsang’u yalukadi lwetu lutwaweni muAsiyaku; chitwatiyili kulema kwabadikili nankashi mung’ovu zhetu; lukadi lwaswezha nankashi lwakwila netu hitukuhanda nawaku.
48001009 Eng’ang’i, etu aweni twatiyili neyi anatuhishi namulong’a wakufwa hohu, kulonda tubuli kudikuhwelela etu aweni, tukuhweleli Nzambi wasang’ulang’a afu.
48001010 Diyi watupulwishili mukufwa oku kwaswezha kutoha, ninochu sang’a atupulwishilayi ho-o; tunakuhweleli yena netu diyi wamba katupulwisha.
48001011 Ninenu nawa tukwashenung’a nakulembelela, kulonda amavulu akasakilili hansang’u yetu, nanochu chanatukwashuwu nakulombela kwawantu amavulu.

48001012 Tukudisama nanochu chitukweti chinlezhi chamuchima chatulezhang’a nindi, twashakamang’a mumpata yamunu mwishina nikumesu enu nawa nankashi mukuzhila nakashinshi kaNzambi; bayi namaana achisemwaku, ching’a naluwi lwaNzambi hohu.
48001013 Mulong’a hitukuyisonekela yuma yacheng’uku, ching’a yoyimunatang’i yimunetezhi dehi, nakuhweleli nami mwakayitezha ndo-o nikunsa.
48001014 Chimwatwitezheli dehi chanti nenu twadisaminang’a hansang’u yenu, dichi chimwakadisama nawa ninenu hansang’u yetwetu mwifuku daMwanta wetu Yesu.
48001015 Chinelukili mwenimu, nakeng’eli nisambili kwinza kudenu nami nakayikwashi kamuchiyedi.
48001016 Nami nakahitili kudenu munzhila yami yakuya muMasidoniya; hakufunta kuMasidoniya kunakaya nakahitili kudenu cheng’i nawa, kulonda mwakanshinzhikizhuku munzhila yami yakuya kuYudeya.
48001017 Dichi chinafuukwili mwenomu chading’i chakuhemesha, tahindi? Chinatong’ozhokang’a natong’ozhokang’a mwaya chisemwa chaheseki, mwaka nili nami aha eng’a, aha nehi, tahindi?
48001018 Chochashinshikayi Nzambi, mazu etu itwayilezhang’a hiyakwila aha eng’a, aha nehuku.
48001019 Mwana kaNzambi Yesu Klistu, ashimwinuwu mukachi kenu kudetu, kudami nawaSilasi naTimotewu, hading’i mukwantadi wakwila aha nindi eng’a, aha nindi nehuku, yena yowu eng’a chikupu.
48001020 Mulong’a hela yikaninu yaNzambi yaswezha kuvula, mudi Yesu diyi eng’a, mudi yena dimu mwekala Amena, kulonda kudi Nzambi kwikali lubanzhi lwakulema hansang’u yetwetu.
48001021 Ichi dinu, wátukoleshang’a nanenu mudi Klistu, wátuwayishili, diyi Nzambi.
48001022 Diyi nawa watufundili mufunda, watwinkeli chizhiikilu chaSpilitu munyichima yetu.
48001023 Nasanyiki Nzambi wamonang’a muchima wami, nami chinalekeli kwinza kuKolinda nalondeli kuyanakena.
48001024 Hituyanyanta akukuhwelela kwenuku, tuyankwashi amuzang’alu wenu; mulong’a mwakolelang’a mukukuhwelela.
48002001 Nelili nami hinakenza cheng’i kudenu nakuneng’aku.
48002002 Mulong’a neyi nukuyineng’esha, wukuntiyisha kuwaha nawa hinyi? Netu yowu muntu inaneng’eshi dehi.

48002003 Chinasonekeli mwenomu, nalondeli hinakenza akabuli kunneng’esha kudi antu atezhi kuntiyisha kuwaha; mulong’a natong’ozhoki chalala nami chinatiyang’a ami kuwaha, ninenu ezhima nawa mwatiyang’a kuwaha.
48002004 Nayisonekeleli namadilu amavulu nilukadi lwakutiya nikumuchima bwi-i; hinalondeli kuyineng’eshaku, nalondeli nami mwiluki kukeng’a kunaswezhang’a kuyikeng’a.
48002005 Neyi hadi muntu naneng’eshi akwawu hiyami ananeng’eshiyuku, naneng’eshi ninenu ezhima nawa; nateni tuhu kulonda nibuli kuyikalisha.
48002006 Owu muntu chanamubabeshuwu dehi kudi amavulu, chinawanini dehi.
48002007 Ichi dinu, balumukenu mumwanakeni nikumukundezha, kulonda muntu wudi ochu abuli kuchikika nehung’u odu danamoniyi.
48002008 Dichi nayilembeleli nami mumwekeshelenu cheng’i kukeng’a kwenu.
48002009 Chinayisonekeleli nsang’u oyu, nelili nami niyeseki nachu, nitali neyi mukwovwahila muyuma yezhima.
48002010 Muntu mukwanakenenu nsang’u, ami nawa nukumwanakena. Nsang’u yinamwanakeni, namwanakeni hanyizhimba yenu kumesu aKlistu,
48002011 kulonda Satana abuli kutukwata nansang’u oyu, mulong’a hitunayambi maaninduku.
48002012 Chinashikili kuTilowasi nakushimuna nsang’u yayiwahi yaKlistu, Mwanta wang’enzulwilili chenzelu.
48002013 Ami kutwesha kudiwundisha mumuchima wami nehi, nansang’u yakubula kuwana manakwami Titusa, hinukuyishalisha, hinukuya kuMasidoniya.
48002014 Tumusakililenu Nzambi, watulombolang’a mafuku ezhima mukwimika mushindu mudi Klistu. Watiyishang’a mudetu ivumba dadiwahi dakumwiluka yena kwezhima.
48002015 Mulong’a etu tudi nakwipuka kudi Nzambi ivumba daKlistu dadiwahi, nikudi antu akuhanda, nikudi antu akunong’a.
48002016 Kudi amu tudi nakwipuka ivumba dakufuma kukufwa nakuya kukufwa; kudi amakwawu tudi nakwipuka ivumba dakufuma kuwumi nakuya kuwumi. Yeniyi yuma yakutwesha anyi?
48002017 Etu hitudi neyi antu amavulu adiheteshang’a namazu aNzambuku; ilang’a twahoshang’a nanyichima yalala, chakudi Nzambi, kumesu aNzambi, mudi Klistu.
48003001 Tutachiki cheng’i kudishimuna kudenu, tahindi? Hela tutambulang’a nyikanda yakwinza nachu kudenu, hela yakufuma nachu kudenu, neyi chelang’awu antu amakwawu, tahindi?
48003002 Enu yenu mukanda wetu wakusoneka munyichima yetu, awiluka, awutang’ang’a kudi antu ezhima.

48003003 Munamwekani neyi mumukanda waKlistu wakukalakala kudetu, hiwakusoneka nawulombuku, wakusoneka kudi Spilitu waNzambi wamumi, bayi hamalola awubasaku ilang’a hanyikanda yanyichima yetu yamusunyi.
48003004 imu mutwakuhwelelang’a Nzambi mudi Klistu.
48003005 Hitunatweshi kuhosha netu tukwila chuma nang’ovu zhetwetu awenuku; ng’ovu zhetu zhafumang’a kudi Nzambi hohu.
48003006 Yena diyi watwinkeli ng’ovu zhakwikala akwakukalakala nsang’u yachitiyang’enu chachiha. Hichansonaku, ching’a chaSpilitu, mulong’a nsona yazhahang’a, hakwila Spilitu wahandishang’a.

48003007 Ilang’a mudimu wakufwa wakusoneka, wakubazila hamalola, wenzhili nalubanzhi lwakulema, mwaka anyana kaIsalela hiyakukang’anya kushinshika kumesu aMosi, nalubanzhi lwakulema lwatong’ekeli kumesu indi, kutong’a nilwena lubanzhi olu lwading’i nakuhita kwalu.
48003008 Mudimu waSpilitu hiwukubadika nankashi lubanzhi lwakulemaku?
48003009 Neyi mudimu wakuhisha antu wekala nalubanzhi lwakulema, komana mudimu wakuleta kulong’a wukubadika nankashi lubanzhi lwakulema.
48003010 Chalala chuma chalemesheluwu kunyaka, chinekali dehi chakadi lubanzhi lwakulema nanilu lubanzhi lwakulema lwaswezha nankashi.
48003011 Neyi chuma chading’i nakuhita chading’i nalubanzhi lwakulema, komana chuma chikushakama chikubadika lubanzhi lwakulema nankashi.
48003012 Dichi chitwaching’ezhang’a lubanzhi lwakulemiku, twahoshang’a chakadi woma.
48003013 Hitudi neyi Mosi wabutili ihina kumesu indi, kulonda anyana kaIsalela akang’anyi kushinshika hakuya nakukumina chuma chading’i nakuhitaku.
48003014 Yitong’ozhoka yawu yachinchikili; hela kwifuku dalelu kwaamu, hatang’ang’awu chitiyang’enu chachikulu, ihinodu dichidi kuyibuta; katataka dinatwesheki kufuma mudi Klistu.
48003015 Chatang’ang’awu Mosi, ihina dakubuta sang’a dekalila kunyichima yawu nikwifuku dalelu.
48003016 Hamba kabalumukawu nakutala kudi Mwanta, dihu hakafumishawu ihinodu.
48003017 Mwanta diyi Spilitu; kwekala Spilitu waMwanta diku kwekala kukasunuka.

48003018 Hakwinza etu ezhima, namesu akadi kubuta, twakezhimang’a nalubanzhi lwakulema kwaMwanta; twenda tubalumuka neyi chekalayi Mwanta, tufuma kulubanzhi lwakulema lumu tuya nikulubanzhi lwakulema lukwawu, chakufuma kudi Mwanta diyi Spilitu.
48004001 Dichi chitukweti mudimu iwu, mwomutunatambwili luwi, hitwazeyang’aku.

48004002 Tunaleki yuma yansonyi yakuzhinda. Hitwendang’a nakudimbanaku; hitwaheng’eshang’a izu daNzambi nakutwambaku. Ilang’a chitwashimunang’a walala waNzambi chalumbuluka, twadimwekeshang’a kuyinlezhi yanyichima yawantu ezhima, niNzambi namoni.
48004003 Neyi nsang’u yetu yayiwahi yinabutewi, yinabutewi kudi antu adi nakuzhilumuka.

48004004 Mudi wena Satana, nzambi yampata yamakonu naputishi mesu ayitong’ozhoka yawantu abula kukuhwelela; kulonda mwaana wansang’u yayiwahi yalubanzhi lwakulema kwaKlistu chimfwana chaNzambi, wubuli kuyitong’ekela.
48004005 Mulong’a hitwadishimunang’a etu awenuku, twashimunang’a Klistu Yesu netu diyi Mwanta. Etu kwetu tuyandung’u zhenu hansang’u yaKlistu.

48004006 Mulong’a Nzambi welili nindi, Chezhezhi chimwekani hading’i mwidima; diyi natong’eki munyichima yetu nakushamu chezhezhi chakwiluka nachu lubanzhi lwakulema kwaNzambi, lwamwekanang’a kumesu aKlistu.
48004007 Ihetidi tudi nadu munsaba zhamawumba, kulonda ng’ovu zhabadika nankashi zhiikali zhambala zhaNzambi, zhibuli kwikala zhetwetu aweni.
48004008 Atukabishang’a mbadi zhezhima, kutuchika nehi; twenda tuzhinoka, kutukuma nehi;
48004009 enda atuhang’a, kutushiya kankawetu nehi; anatubuli dehi hamaseki, etu kunong’a nehi.
48004010 Twasendang’a munyizhimba kufwa kwafwiliyi Yesu kutwayang’a kwezhima, mafuku ezhima; kulonda wumi waYesu wumwekanang’a nawa munyizhimba yetu.
48004011 Mulong’a etu twahanjang’a atwinkang’a kukufwa mafuku ezhima hansang’u yaYesu, kulonja wumi waYesu wumwekani munyizhimba yetu yanong’ang’a.
48004012 Jichi kufwa kwakong’ang’a mujetu, ilang’a wumi wakong’ang’a mujenu.
48004013 Twahoshang’a nanichi chitukweti spilitu yakukuhwelela yowumu, mwomwasonekeluwu nawu, Nahoshi nanichi chinakuhweleli.
48004014 Mulong’a tweluka netu iwu wasang’wili Mwanta Yesu muji afu, wakatusang’ula ninetu chimu naYesu, wakatwimika kumesu inji chimu nanenu.
48004015 Yuma yezhimiyi tunayimweni hansang’u yenwenu, kulonja luwi chilukuvulila antu amavulu, lwakavulishi kusakilila nankashi nawa, kulonja Nzambi alemi.
48004016 Jihu hafuma kubula kuzeya; mulong’a hela muntu wetu wahanzi wuji nakuya nakunong’a, muntu wetu wamukachi wuji nakuya nakubalumuka wamwiha hefuku hefuku.
48004017 Mulong’a lukaji lwetu lwakatataka lwapepela, lwatukong’elang’a lubanzhi lwakulema kwahayanyaka lwakubajika nankashi.
48004018 Hitwatalang’a yuma yamonewang’aku, twatalang’a yuma yanabuli kumonawu; yuma yamonewang’a yakatataka, hakwila yuma yabulang’a kumonawu yahayanyaka.
48005001 Tuneluki netu itala jetu jahanu hamaseki jetenti, neyi jikushiwuka, tukweti itala jakutung’a kuji Nzambi, jakaji kutung’a namakasa, jahayanyaka mumawulu.
48005002 Mulong’a chalala mwitenti iji twaabang’a, twakeng’ang’a nankashi netu akatuvwiki itala jetu jamwiwulu;
48005003 kulonja chakatuvwikawu, akabuli kutuwana nzekesi.
48005004 Mulong’a chalala etu tuji mwitenti iji twaabang’a, twatiyang’a kulema; hitunakeng’i netu akatuvuuluku, ilang’a netu akatuvwiki, kulonja ichi chanong’ang’a akachiminyi kuji wumi.
48005005 Iwu watwilili chumichi Nzambi, watwinkeli chizhiikilu chaSpilitu.
48005006 Jichi jinu, twajinkang’aku mafuku ezhima, mulong’a tuneluki netu, hituchiji kushakama mumuzhimba, hitwashakamang’a naMwantaku;
48005007 mulong’a twenjang’a kwanakukuhwelela hohu, hichakumona namesuku.
48005008 Neli nami etu twajinkang’aku, tunakeng’i netu chachiwahi tubuli kushakama mumuzhimba, tushakami kwetu naMwanta.
48005009 Jichi hela tuji kwetu, hela tuji kwacheng’i, twashang’a muchima netu tumutiyishang’a yena kuwaha.

48005010 Wezhima wetu ching’a twakamwekana kwitanja jaKlistu jakusompela; kulonja twakatambuli yuma yitwelili hitwajing’i munyizhimba hamuntu hamuntu, iwu mweliliyi, iwu mweliliyi, hela yayiwahi hela yatama.
48005011 Chitweluka kutiya Mwanta woma, jihu hanafumi kushinzhila antu; ilang’a tunamwekani kuji Nzambi, nakuhweleli nami tunamwekani nikuchinlezhi chanyichima yenu nawa.
48005012 Hitukujishimuna cheng’i kujenu netu mutwitezhuku, ilang’a tukuyilezha nsang’u yakujisamina hajetu, kulonja mwakamoni chakuyakula nachu antu akujisama chakumesu, bayi chakumuchimaku.
48005013 Mulong’a hela twaanjala, twamwaanjela Nzambi; hela twawunjisha mumesu, tunalonji enu.
48005014 Kukeng’a kwaKlistu kwatukakezhang’a; mulong’a tuneluki chalala netu wumu chafwililiyi antu ezhima, jichi niezhima afwili.
48005015 Wafwilili ezhima kulonja antu akuhanja abuli kujihanjila cheng’i awenawu, amuhanjilang’a yena wayifwilili, wasang’ukili muji afu.
48005016 Jichi kufumisha kulelu hituneluki muntu chajiyi mumuzhimbaku; hela twelukili Klistu chajing’iyi mumuzhimba, katataka hitwamwiluka nawa cheng’i chochochuku.
48005017 Jichi muntu wuji muji Klistu, anamuleng’i jehi chachiha; yuma yayikulu yinahiti jehi, komana yuma yezhima yinabalumuki jehi yayiha.
48005018 Ilang’a yuma yezhima yakuji Nzambi, watukunjamishili kuji yomweni muji Klistu, watwinkeli mujimu wakukunjamisha.
48005019 Mulong’a Nzambi wajing’i muji Klistu nakukunjamisha antu ampata yamunu mwishina kuji yomweni, nakubula kuyifuukwila nyilong’a yawu; natukunzhiki nsang’u yakukunjamisha.
48005020 Jichi etu tuji ang’imeni zhaKlistu; chiji neyi Nzambi hakuyilembelela mujetu. Hitukuyilembelela hamuzhimba waKlistu netu, kunjamenu kuji Nzambi.
48005021 Iwu Yesu wabulili kwikala nanshiji, jiyi elishiliyi ekali mulambu wanshiji kukoola etu, kulonja etu twikali kulong’a kwaNzambi muji yena.
48006001 Chitukukalakala chimu ninji, hitukuyilembelela netu, bayi mutambula luwi lwaNzambi chamukunkulwayuku.
48006002 Mulong’a yena neli ninji, Nakwakwili hampinzhi yayiwahi, Nakukwashili mwifuku jawamwinu. Tiyenu, hanu jihu hampinzhi yayiwahi; Tiyenu, hanu hiifuku jawamwinu.
48006003 Bayi mwila chuma chakujimbwisha nachu muntu hela chimuku, kulonja mujimu wetu abuli kuwumona kutama
48006004 Twajimwekeshang’a mwakwila nawu tuyakwakukalakala mujimu waNzambi muyuma yezhima; mukutatakena nankashi, nimuyihung’u, nimukubula yuma, nimukukala,
48006005 nimunyinkakambu, nimutuleya, nimumapumba, nimukukabakana, nimukukonkama, nimukubula kujya;
48006006 nansang’u yakutooka muchima, nakwiluka, nakujung’umika, nakukokwezha, naSpilitu Wazhila, nakukeng’a kwakaji kujimbana;
48006007 nimwizu jawalala, nang’ovu zhaNzambi; ninayitwa yakulong’a yachikasa chachijiilu, niyachikasa chachimunswa.
48006008 Aha kutulemesha, aha kutusawula, aha kututena chatama, aha kututena chachiwahi. Nawu twajimbanang’a, komana tuyantu alala;
48006009 nawu tuyantu abula kwilukewa, komana yetu elukawu jehi; nawu tuyantu akufwa, komana twahanja. Tuji neyi antu akubabeshewa, komana kutuzhaha nehi;
48006010 tuji neyi antu aneng’ang’a, komana etu twazang’alalang’a mafuku ezhima; tuji neyi atuzweng’i, komana yetu twaheteshang’a antu amavulu; tuji neyi antu abula yuma, komana twaheta yuma yezhima.
48006011 Enu akwetu aKolinja, hitukuyizhinja chumaku, muchima wetu wunaswezhi kuyikeng’a.
48006012 Himunakang’enyi mujetuku, munakang’enyi mukukeng’a kwenwenu aweni.
48006013 Ninenu nawa swezheshenumu, nahoshi neyi chakuhosha nawanyana.
48006014 Bayi mujibombang’a nawabula kukuhwelela mumpanja yoyimuku. Kulong’a nakuluwa akutwesha kukunjang’ana? Hela chezhezhi namwijima akutwesha kutiyang’ana?
