48006015 Klistu najiyabolu akutwesha kutiyang’ana? Mukwakukuhwelela wukutwesha kujibomba ng’ahi namuntu wabula kukuhwelela?

48006016 Hela Tembeli yaNzambi yikutwesha kutiyang’ana ng’ahi nawankishi? Mulong’a etu yetu Tembeli yaNzambi wamumi, mwomwahoshayi jehi Nzambi ninji, Nukushakama mukachi kawu, nukwenja mukachi kawu, Nukwikala Nzambi yawu, niwena akwikala antu ami.
48006017 Jichi jinu MWANTA nahoshi ninji, Fumenu mukachi kawu, ambukenumu, Bayi mukunka kuchuma chatamaku, Ninami nukuyitambula;
48006018 nukwikala Tata yenu, Ninenu mukwikala anyanami amayala nawambanja; Jichi chanahoshiyi MWANTA Watwesha yezhima.
48007001 Enu akwetu twakeng’a, ichi chanatukanuwu mwenimu, tujitookeshenu kutama kwamuzhimba nikwaspilitu; tukoleshenu kuzhila nawoma waNzambi.
48007002 Tutambulenu munyichima yenu. Hitwakong’eli muntu chatamaku; hitwaluwang’esheli muntuku; hitwajiili yuma yamuntuku.
48007003 Chinukuhosha mwenimu hinalonji kuyinka mulong’aku; mulong’a nahosha jehi hakusambila nami mwekala munyichima yetu, kulonja hela kufwa tufwili hamu, hela kuhanja tuhanjili hamu.
48007004 Naswezhi wulobu wakuhosha nanenu, najisamang’a nankashi hansang’u yenu; anaswezhi kunkunjezha, muzang’alu wami wuji nakusumpoka mulukaji lwetu lwezhima.
48007005 Hela hitwenzhili muMasijoniya, hitwamweni hakunookeshela nyizhimba yetuku; ilang’a atukabishili niniku niniku, hanzi hajing’i majombu, mukachi kutiya woma.
48007006 Hakwila Nzambi, wakunjezhang’a akwakululuta, jiyi watukunjezheli henzhili Titusa.

48007007 Hakuminini jakutukunjezha henzhiliyi hohuku, watukunjezheli nawa nanoku kukunjezha kumwamukunjezheli yena, chatulezheliyi chimwafwilang’a kunmona, nichimwanjilang’a, nichimwantiyang’a iyena kumuchima; jichi jinu, nitiya nikuwaha kwaswezha.

48007008 Mulong’a hela nayineng’esheli namukanja wami, hinatiyi chikelaku, kutong’a hakusambila natiyili chikela; mulong’a namoni nami mukanjowu wayineng’esheli, eng’a, ilang’a jinu hihaleheli chalalaku.

48007009 Ichi jinu natiyi jehi kuwaha, nanochu chimwaneng’eli chakubalumuka mumuchima, bayi kwakuneng’a tuhuku. Mulong’a mwaneng’eli chakuyineng’esha kuji Nzambi, kulonja mubuli kumona chuma chakuyihalwisha kujetu.

48007010 Mulong’a kuneng’a kwaneng’eshang’ayi Nzambi, kwaletang’a kubalumuka mumuchima, kwashikang’a kuwamwinu, hikwaletang’a chikelaku; hakwinza kuneng’a kwampata yamunu mwishina, jiku kwaletang’a kufwa.

48007011 Jichi munamoni chimwaneng’eli chakuyineng’esha kuji Nzambi, chaleteli kwakama mujenu; talenu oku kujiying’isha, ninoku kutiya kutama, ninowu woma, ninoku kufwila, ninoju iyena, ninoku kutenja! Munajiying’ishi chikupu munsang’u yezhimiyi.
48007012 Jichi hela nayisonekeleli mukanja, hinahakwilili muntu welili chatama, hela muntu eliluwu chatamaku, nalonjeli kwakama kumwaswezha kutwakama kumwekani kujenu, akúmoni kuji Nzambi.
48007013 Jichi chumichi chinatukunjezhi. Chatukunjezhawu jehi twatiyili kuwaha nankashi namuzang’alu waTitusa; mulong’a mwamutulishili mumuchima wezhima wenu.

48007014 Mulong’a chinajisamini kuji yena nansang’u yakutena enu, hinatiyili nsonyuku. Mutwahosheli nanenu mwezhima twahosheli mwalala; nimutwajisamini kumesu aTitusa mwomu nawa munamwekani jehi chalala.
48007015 Waswezha kuyikeng’a nankashi, haanukayi chimwovwahilili enu ezhima, himukumutambula nawoma nikuzaala.
48007016 Ami natiyi kuwaha chinatweshi kuyikuhwelela chikupu munsang’u zhezhima.
48008001 Jichi jinu enu anakwetu, hitukuyilezha luwi lwaNzambi lwanenkuwu kuyipompelu yamuMasijoniya.
48008002 Luwi lwakwila, iku aji nakuyeseka nankashi nalukaji, hela neyi aswezheli wuzweng’i, hiyakutiya muzang’alu wakwinka mahetawu.
48008003 Mulong’a ami nukutwesha kushimunamu nami enkeli chakunyichima yawu mwatwesheleluwu, hela chakubajika mwatwesheleluwu.
48008004 Hiyakutulembelela nakulembelela kwakweni nawu ayitezhi kukunjang’ana nawu nakukwasha akwakuzhila.
48008005 Bayi mutwakuhweleleli etu hohuku, asambilili jehi kujilubula awenawu kuji Mwanta, nikujetu nawa chakumuchima waNzambi.
48008006 Jichi hitukumushinzhila Titusa, netu amanishi mujenu iwu mujimu waluwi watachikiliyi jehi.
48008007 Ichi chimuneli munabajiki jehi muyuma yezhima, nimukukuhwelela, nimukuhosha, nimukwiluka, nimukuswezha ng’ovu, nimukukeng’a kumwatukeng’ang’a, netu bajikenu nimuluwi ilu nawa.
48008008 Hitunayilezhi chanshimbuku, ilang’a chinamoni ng’ovu zhawantu amakwawu zhinaswezhi, natong’ozhoki nami neseki nachu kukeng’a kwenu nawa, nimoni neyi kwalala.
48008009 Muneluki luwi lwaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu, lwakwila hela wajing’i waheta, hakwikala kazweng’i kukoolenu, kulonja kuwuzweng’i winji enu mwakekali aheta.
48008010 Nukuyilezha munatong’ozhokeli nsang’u iyi, nami, chinawahi kumanisha chuma chimwatachikili kwila munahiti jehi mwaka, nikukeng’a kwilamu nawa;
48008011 kulonja muchima wakukeng’a kwila wesekani nakumanisha kwila, mwesekela yuma yimuji nayu.
48008012 Mulong’a neyi kuji muchima wakwinka, akutambula mwahetelayi muntu, bayi mwabulilayuku.
48008013 Hinalonji nami antu amakwawu atiyi kuwaha enu mutiyilumu kukalaku.
48008014 Hinsang’u yakwesekana. Yuma yenu yayivulu yakatataka, yikwashi akwenu mwonsu mwanabuluwu, kulonja yuma yawu yayivulu yakakwashi enu himwakabula nawa, kulonja chakesekani.
48008015 Anasoneki mumukanja wazhila nawu, Muntu wakung’wili yayivulu hiyamuswezheleluku, Muntu wakung’wili yantesha hiyamukeheleluku.
48008016 Tumusakililenu Nzambi washili mumuchima waTitusa chakuyakama mwenimu.
48008017 Mulong’a hakuminini jakwitiya mutwakeng’eli etu hohuku, yomweninji waswezheli kutiya kuwaha kwinza kujenu chakumuchima winji.
48008018 Tunamutemeshi chimu namanakwetu watiyakana jehi muyipompelu yezhima, nawu waswezha kushimuna nsang’u yayiwahi.
48008019 Hijimu hohu bweng’uku, niakwayipompelu anamukunzhiki kuya nanetu mumujimu iwu waluwi wutukwila, kulonja Mwanta alemi, kulonja kumwekesha nachu muchima wetu wakukeng’a kwila.
48008020 Kulonja kubula kutwinka mulong’a wansang’u yachenichi chamukunkulu cheneni chitukutwala.
48008021 Twalonjang’a yuma yalumbuluka kumesu aMwanta nikumesu awantu nawa.
48008022 Tunayitemeshi chimu namanakwetu ituneseki jehi kakavulu, netu washang’a muchima kunsang’u zhazhivulu, katataka nabajiki jehi, mulong’a naswezhi jehi kuyikuhwelelenu.

48008023 Neyi akwihula nsang’u yaTitusa, jiyi mukwetu najikwashang’a ninji mujimu wakuyikalakelenu; ninowu anakwetu nawa, hiyantemesha ayipompelu, wena nawa amwekeshang’a lubanzhi lwakulema kwaKlistu.
48008024 Jichi mwekeshenu kukeng’a kwenu muyipompelu, nanichi chitwajisamang’a hansang’u yenu.
48009001 Nsang’u yakukwasha akwakuzhila; ami hinamoni nsang’u yakuyisonekela mukanjaku.

48009002 Mulong’a neluka jehi nami nyichima yenu yaya jehi mukwila chumichi, jichi chinajisamang’a nachu kuji akwaMasijoniya, nami akwaAkaya along’esha jehi munahiti jehi nimwaka; ning’ovu zhenu zhimunakalakali nachu zhinaleteshi ng’ovu muji antu amavulu.
48009003 Ilang’a natemeshang’ahu jehi manakwetu kulonja mujilong’eshang’ahu jehi neyi chinahosheli; nalonji nami chinajisamang’a hansang’u yenu chibuli kusawuka.
48009004 Hakenja kela neyi nakenza nawakwetu akuMasijoniya, akayiwana kanja mupompeshi yuma, etu twakatiya nsonyi, ninenu nawa, nanichi chitwajing’i nakuyikuhwelela nankashi.

48009005 Jichi natong’ozhoki nami chachiwahi kuyilembelela anakwetu akenzang’ahu jehi kujenu, kulonja akalong’eshang’ahu jehi chamukunkulu chenu chimwakanini, kulonja chakeli chakulong’esha jehi, chiikali chaluwi hohu, bayi chakukanzhikizhaku.
48009006 Ilang’a muntu wukukuwa yantesha wakaang’ula nawa yantesha; muntu wukukuwa yayivulu wakaang’ula nawa yayivulu.
48009007 Antu ezhima atong’ozhoki chachiwahi munyichima yawu hamuntu hamuntu, enki chakaji kuneng’a hela kumukanzhikizha; mulong’a Nzambi wakeng’a muntu wenkang’a namuzang’alu.
48009008 Nzambi natweshi kuyivulishila luwi lwezhima, kulonja enu anaheteshuwu yuma yezhima mafuku ezhima, mutweshi kukwasha nachu akwenu nawa nanyijimu yayiwahi yezhima.
48009009 Mwomwanasonekuwu nawu, Yena napalang’eshi kwezhima, Nenki atuzweng’i; Kulong’a kwinji kwekala kwoku chahayanyaka.
48009010 Yena wenkang’a mukwakukuwa mbutu niyuma yakujya, wakayinka mbutu zhakukuwa, hakuyivulishilazhu; hakuyivulishila ninyikabu yakulong’a kwenu nawa.
48009011 Hakuyihetesha yuma yezhima, kulonja mumonang’a yakwinka; chimukwinka hichikuletesha kumusakilila Nzambi mujetu.
48009012 Mulong’a kukwasha akwenu chochichi kwaswezha kuletesha kumusakilila Nzambi, hikwakumina jakuwanisha mwabulilawu akwakuzhila hohuku.
48009013 Chakulemeshawu Nzambi nakukwashiku, akwila nawu mwaswezha kwovwahila nsang’u yayiwahi yaKlistu, nanichi chimukuswezha kuyikwasha niwena niantu ezhima.
48009014 Wena nawa hiyakuyilembelela, nikufwila kuyimona nawa, nanolu luwi lwaNzambi lunaswezhi nankashi mujenu.
48009015 Tumusakililenu Nzambi nansang’u yachamukunkulu chinji chakang’anya kushimunewa.
48010001 Ami aweni Pawulu, nayilembeleli nakwovwaha mumuchima ninawushona waKlistu, ami chinekalang’a mukachi kenu najizozang’a, ilang’a chinukwikala kwacheng’i hinayitiyang’a womaku.
48010002 Eng’a, hinukuyilembelela nami chinamba kashakama nenu nakabuli kuyizuwila, munatong’ozhoki nami nakazuwila amakwawu atumonang’a nawu twelang’a chakuchisemwa chaheseki.
48010003 Mulong’a hela twenjang’a mumuzhimba wachisemwa chaheseki, nzhita yetu hiyachisemwa chahesekuku.
48010004 Mulong’a yitwa yanzhita yetu hiyachisemwa chahesekuku; hiyitwa yaswezha ng’ovu kumesu aNzambi yakusanja nachu mpwembu zhakola,
48010005 nikufumba nachu yitong’ozhoka, niyuma yezhima yajimika kwiwulu yajikang’ang’a nakubula kumwiluka Nzambi; kulonja kutwala yitong’ozhoka yezhima muwujung’u wakwovwahila Klistu.
48010006 Neyi enu munovwahili jehi, tukubabesha antu azhikwa ezhima.

48010007 Mwatalang’a yuma yamwekanang’a kumesu, tahinji? Neyi kuji muntu wajimonang’a ninji nimuntu waKlistu, atong’ozhoki cheng’i mumuchima winji, ninji neyi yena himukwaKlistu, mwomumu ninetu nawa tuyakwaKlistu.
48010008 Hela neyi nukujisama kakavulu hansang’u yawanta wetu hinukutiya nsonyuku; Mwanta Yesu watwinkeli wanta owu kulonja kuyikolesha, bayi kuyikisang’anaku.
48010009 Hinakeng’i kumwekana neyi nakeng’i kuyitiyisha woma nanyikanja yamuku.
48010010 Mulong’a nawu, Nyikanja yinji yalema, yikweti ning’ovu; hakwila chamwekanayi mumuzhimba wuji neyi muntu wazeya, nimazu inji akuhemesha.
48010011 Muntu wukuhosha mwenomu, eluki ninji chituji munyikanja yetu hituji kwacheng’i, jichi chitwakela hitwakenza.
48010012 Hitukweti ng’ovu yakujibomba nawu, hela yakujesekezha nawakwetu amakwawu ajishimunang’aku; wena chajipimang’awu mulwawu, nichajesekezhang’awu mulwawu chochochu, hiyakweti maanaku.
48010013 Etu kwetu hitukujisama chakubajika mwatwesekelawuku, ching’a mwomwatwesekelawu jehi kuji Nzambi, jiyi watubalwilili ng’inza yashika njo-o nikujenu.
48010014 Hitukumotoka mung’inza yetuku; hituneli netu tukukang’anya kushika kujenuku, mulong’a twashikili nansang’u yayiwahi yaKlistu njo-o nikujenu.

48010015 Hitukujisama nakubajika mwatwesekelawu jehuku, mwaka tujisami nanyijimu yawantu acheng’i; ilang’a twaching’ezhang’a netu neyi kukuhwelela kwenu kunakuli jehi, twakamotwesha ng’inza yetu, twakaya kumbiji,
48010016 kulonja twakashimuni nsang’u yayiwahi mumpata zhikwawu zhiji kumbiji yenu, twakabuli kujisama namujimu walong’eshawu jehi kuji muntu wacheng’i.
48010017 Muntu wukujisama ajisamini muji Mwanta.
48010018 Mulong’a muntu wajishimunang’a yomweni, hijiyi etezhang’awuku; ching’a muntu akushimunawu kuji Mwanta.
48011001 Kuminenu jakung’itezha kawusupi kanti; chalala, kuminenu jakung’itezha.
48011002 Mulong’a nayitiyilang’a mukáwu, mukáwu waNzambi, mulong’a nayotesheli kuji mfumwenu wumu, yowu Klistu, kulonja nakayitwali kuji yena neyi chang’ajima walumbuluka wabulahu jehi iyala.
48011003 Ilang’a natiyi woma, nami hamwaha yitong’ozhoka yenu yakayiluwang’esha, yifumi munsang’u yalala nimukuzhila kwekala muji Klistu, neyi chamujimbiluwu Eva kuji kapela namaaninji.

48011004 Mulong’a neyi kukwinza muntu wukushimuna Yesu wacheng’i itwabulili kushimunetu, hela mukutambula spilitu yacheng’i yimwabulili kutambula, hela nsang’u yayiwahi yacheng’i yimwabulili kutambula, mwanyakalang’a kwitezhamu.
48011005 Natong’ozhoki nami hinekala munyima yawapostolu aswezha kulema, hela hantuku.
48011006 Hela nabulang’a kuhosha chachiwahi, hinabula maanaku; tunayimwekeshelichu chalala, mwahita yuma yezhima, mukachi kawantu ezhima.
48011007 Komana chinajizozeli, hana hinajing’i nakuyishimwina nsang’u yayiwahi yaNzambi chakaji wulooku nami enu mulemi, natamishili, tahinji?
48011008 Neyili yuma yayipompelu yikwawu, hinukutambula wulooku kuji wena kulonja niyikalakelenu.

48011009 Chinajing’i nanenu chakaji yuma, hinajiili yuma yamuntuku; mulong’a chenzhiluwu anakwetu afumini kuMasijoniya, anyinkeli yuma yinabulili. Munsang’u yezhima najilekesheli nami nibuli kujya yuma yenu, nihanu sang’a najilekeshela
48011010 Chineli walala waKlistu wuji mujami, kwosi muntu wukunlekesha kujisama munu mumpata yaAkayaku.
48011011 Mulong’anyi? Mulong’a nabula kuyikeng’a, tahinji? Nzambi neluki.
48011012 China chinelang’a jikalu, jichi chinukwila nawa, kulonja owu akeng’a kunyinka mulong’a akang’anyi, nalonji nimwekeshi nachu wena ajisamang’a nawu elang’a neyi chitwelang’a etu.
48011013 Mulong’a wenowu hiyapostolu akutwamba, hiyakwakukalakala akujimbana, ajifwikizhang’a neyi hiyapostolu zhaKlistu.
48011014 Hichakuhayamaku, mulong’a hela yomweni Satana wajifwikizhang’a neyi kang’elu kachezhezhi.
48011015 Jichi neyi ang’amba zhinji akujifwikizha neyi akalakalang’a nyijimu yalong’a, hichuma chakalaku. Kukumisha kwawu kwakekala mwomwaya nyijimu yawu.
48011016 Nahoshi cheng’i nami bayi antong’ozhoka kuji muntu ninji nasupaku; hela chinekali chochu, antambuli tuhu mukusupa, kulonja ami nawa nijisamuhu chanti.
48011017 Chinukuhoshichi hiniji nakuhosha chakunlezha kuji Mwantaku, chiji neyi chawusupi nanichi chinukukolesha kujisama.
48011018 Chajisamang’awu antu amavulu mwaya chisemwa chaheseki, ninami nawa nukujisama.
48011019 Mulong’a chineli enu aweni muyakwamaana, mwatiyang’a kuwaha nakwitezha ayisupi.
48011020 Mulong’a neyi muntu wukuying’izha muwujung’u, hela wukuyijiila yuma yenu, hela wukuyiya yuma yenu, hela wukujinka wanta, hela wukuyibafula mumesu, mwamwitezhang’a tuhu.
48011021 Nahoshi chakujisekesha nachu, chiji neyi hitukweti ng’ovuku.
48011022 HiyaHebelu tahinji? Ninami nawa. HiyaIsalela tahinji? Ninami nawa. Hiyanyana kaAbalahama tahinji? Ninami nawa.

48011023 Akalakelang’a Klistu tahinji? Ami nayibajiki. Nukuhosha chiji neyi muntu waanjala. Yami muntu inakabakani chaswezha, nituleya twaswezha kuvula, ninyinkakambu yakang’anya kuchinja, nikufwa kwamapampa kakavulu.
48011024 Ang’eteli mapampa katanu kuji aYujeya yikoti makumi awana kubula chimu (39);
48011025 anhumpwili natubama kasatu; ang’asili malola kamu; najing’i mumaatu afwilili mumenzhi kasatu; ifuku jimu najing’i nimwaana niwufuku hakachi kakalung’alwizhi.

48011026 Ninzhila zhazhivulu, niwoma wahatulong’a, niwoma watuponju, niwoma wawakwamunza wami, niwoma wawaZHentili, niwoma wamumukala, niwoma wamwisang’a, niwoma wahakalung’alwizhi, niwoma wamukachi kawanakwetu akutwamba
48011027 Nikukabakana nakumona yihung’u, nikukonkama mafuku amavulu, ninzala nimpwila, nikubula kujya kakavulu, nimashika, niwuvu.
48011028 Chuma chakubombela kuniyi yuma yahanzi chanlemenenang’a hefuku hefuku, chochakwakama yipompelu yezhima.
48011029 Hinyi nazeyi chakaji kuzeyami? Hinyi anajimbwishuwu chakubula ami kutiya iyeng’esha jakutama?
48011030 Neyi chinawahi ami kujisama, nukujisama nansang’u yakuzeya kwami.
48011031 Nzambi yaMwanta Yesu, yowu Tata yinji, wakiswilewang’a hayanyaka, neluki ninji hinatwambuku.
48011032 MuJamakasa nyuuli yamwanta Aletasi, wahembeli ng’anja yaJamakasa, ninji ankwati;
48011033 ilang’a hiyakunhanwishila munzhanina nakunzelumuna hampwembu muchimpaya, nipuluka nikupuluka.
48012001 Ching’a nijisamang’a, hela chabula kutela. Nukukwata kukutena yuma yinamweni, niyanmwekesheleluwu kuji Mwanta.

48012002 Munahiti jehi nyaka ikumi nayiwana (14), neluki iyala wamuji Klistu amuhukwili nakumutwala mwiwulu jamuchisatu; kwizhi wajing’i mumuzhimba, inji kwizhi hajing’i mumuzhimbaku, hinelukuku, Nzambi jiyi neluki.
48012003 Neluki yena muntu owu, kwizhi wajing’i mumuzhimba inji kwizhi hajing’i mumuzhimbaku, hinelukuku, Nzambi jiyi neluki;
48012004 chamuhukwiluwu lwe-e nikwaNzambi mupalajisa, hakutiya mazu akang’anya kuhoshewa, azhila kuyitena kuji muntu.
48012005 Nukujisama nansang’u yayenowu; hinukujisama nansang’u yamami awenuku, ching’a yowu kuzeyazeya kwami.
48012006 Mulong’a hela nukukeng’a kujisama hinukusupaku, mulong’a nukuhosha mwalala; ilang’a naleki kwami, antu akenja kanlemesha chakubajika mwanmonang’awu hela mwantiyang’awu.
48012007 Anshili mwing’a wanlemekang’a mumuzhimba wami, hintemesha yakufuma kuji Satana, kulonja nibulang’a kujilemesha chakubajika; nayimwekeshu yaswezha
48012008 Chena chumichi namulembelelichu Mwanta mapampa kasatu, nami amfumishi mwing’iwu.

48012009 Ilang’a yena nang’ili ninji, Luwi lwami lunakuwanini, mulong’a ng’ovu yami yalumbulukang’a chikupu hakuzeya. Jichi hinukutiya kuwaha nankashi, nami komana chuma chachiwahi chochakujisama nakuzeyazeya kwami, kulonja ng’ovu yaKlistu yakekali hajami.
48012010 Jichi nukukumina jakutiya kuwaha nakuzeyazeya, nikung’ila chatama, nikubula yuma, nimakabisha, niyuma yakala, hansang’u yaKlistu; mulong’a hinukuzeya, jihu hinukutiya ng’ovu
48012011 Neli jehi chisupi, yenu munansang’umuni; mutenowu enu aweni, yenu mwaji kuntena nenu nateli, mulong’a hinekala munyima yawapostolu aswezha kulema hela hantuku, hela nimuntu wamukunkulwayi.
48012012 Mwalala yinzhikizhilu yakapostolu ayikong’eli mukachi kenu nakutatakena kwakweni, niyinzhikizhilu, niyihayamisha, ninyijimu yang’ovu yayeni.
48012013 Chumanyi chayikang’esheli kwesekana nayipompelu yikwawu? Kwizhi chochinabulili kuyijiila yuma yenu? Neyi jichi, ng’anakenenu mulong’iwu.

48012014 Tiyenu, yami nukwinzowu kujenu, kapampa kamuchisatu. Ami hinakeng’i kuyijiila yuma yenuku; nakeng’a enu antu aweni, hinakeng’a yuma yenuku. Anyana hijiwu atezhi kuyiswekela anvwali zhawuku, ching’a anvwali jiwu aji kuswekela anyana.
48012015 Nukutiya kuwaha nankashi kujikisang’ana, hela kujinka ami aweni kukoola wumi wenu. Neyi ami nukubajika kuyikeng’enu, enu mukukehesha kunkeng’ami, tahinji?
48012016 Hela chochu, hinajiili yuma yenuku; nababeli, nayikokeli namaana.
48012017 Najiili yuma yenu nawakwetu nayitemesheleli, tahinji?
48012018 Natemesheli Titusa hamu nanowu manakwetu. Titusa wajiili yuma yenu, tahinji? Hitwenjeli kwetu mwaya Spilitu yowumuku? Hitwenjeli kwetu mumahazhi wowamuku?

48012019 Mwezhimimu mwatong’ozhokang’a nenu tunakeng’i kujiying’isha kujenu, tahinji? Twahoshang’a muji Klistu kumesu aNzambi. Ilang’a enu akwetu twakeng’a, yuma yezhima yinekali yakuyikolesha nachu enu.

48012020 Mulong’a natiyi woma, nami chinakenza hajaha nakabula kuyiwana munakeng’ela kuyiwena; inji kwizhi enu mwakabula kunmonami mumwakeng’ela kunmwena. Kwizhi nakawana nikuzung’a, niichima, ninjombu, nikujambola, nimatung’u, nitushawushawu, nikujinka wanta, nimapumba.

48012021 Natiyi woma nami hajaha Nzambi yami wakanzozesha kumesu enu chinakenza cheng’i, nakajilila amavulu anaputoli, anabuli kubalumuka mumuchima nakuleka wuzonju, niwuzhila, nikufwila yatama yakong’eluwu.
48013001 Ichi chinukwinzichi kujenu hikapampa kamuchisatu. Kukanwa kawayinsahu ayeji hela asatu, Mazu ezhima akakoli chikupu.
48013002 Chinayilezheli hinajing’i nenu kapampa kamuchiyeji, hela hanu hinafumuhu ichi, hinukulezha nawa cheng’i wena anaputoli niakwawu ezhima nami, neyi nakenza cheng’i hinakayanakenaku;
48013003 neyi munakeng’i mwiluki chikupu nenu Klistu wahoshang’a mujami. Yena hazeya kujenuku, ilang’a wekala nang’ovu mujenu.
48013004 Mulong’a yena amupopeleli hakulusu nakuzeya, hakwila kuhanja wahanjang’a nang’ovu zhaNzambi. Etu nawa twazeya muji yena, ilang’a twakahanja chimu ninji nang’ovu zhaNzambi hansang’u yenu.
48013005 Jesekenu ntahi, mutali neyi muji muchikuhwelelu; jishinshikenu. Muyambi chakwikala Klistu mujenu, tahinji? Inji kwizhi mwakinzhikewa jehi!
48013006 Ilang’a nakuhweleli nami mwakatwiluka tuhu kwenu nenu hitwakinzhikewaku.
48013007 Hela twamwekana neyi twakinzhikewa, twalombelang’a kuji Nzambi netu mubuli kwila chatama. Hitunalonji kumwekana neyi anatwitezhuku, tunalonji enu mwakeli chalumbwa.
48013008 Hitunatweshi kwila chuma chakukang’esha walalaku, ching’a kukwasha walala.
48013009 Mulong’a twatiyang’a kuwaha chakwila etu twikali azeya, enu mwikali nang’ovu. Twalombelang’a nawa netu enu mwikali alala chikupu.
48013010 Nasambilang’ahu jehi kuyisonekela yumiyi hanu hinichiji kwacheng’i, kulonja chinakekala nanenu nakabuli kuyihoshola mwaya wanta wanyinkeluwu kuji Mwanta, wakuyikolesha, hiwakuyikisang’anaku.
48013011 Nkumininaku enu anakwetu, shakamenu chachiwahi. Ikalenu alala; jikunjezhenung’a; ikalenu nayitong’ozhoka yoyimu; shakamenu nakuwunja; niNzambi wela nikukeng’a nikuwunja wukwikala nanenu.
48013012 Jimushenu nachikasa chazhila.
48013013 Luwi lwaMwanta Yesu Klistu, nikukeng’a kwaNzambi, nikukunjang’ana kwaSpilitu Wazhila, kwikali nanenu ezhima.
49001001 Ami Pawulu kapostolu, hichakufuma kuji antuku, hela chakunlezha kuji muntuku, ilang'a chakunlezha kuji Yesu Kristu, nikuji Nzambi, yowu Tata, wamusang'wili muji afu.
49001002 Ami Pawulu, nianakwetu iniji nawu ezhima, tuji nakuyisonekela mukanja, enu akwayipompelu yamung'alizha.
49001003 Luwi lwikali nanenu nikuwunja kwakufuma kuji Nzambi, Tata, nikuji Mwanta wetu Yesu Kristu;
49001004 wájinkeli yomweni kukoola nshiji zhetu, kulonja atupulwishi kunyaka yamakonu yatama, mwaya muchima waNzambi yetu, yowu Tata.
49001005 Lubanzhi lwakulema lwikali lwinji hayanyaka nanyaka. Amena.
49001006 Nahayami chimunanyakali kuleka yena wayitambikili muluwi lwaKristu, mulonji nsang'u yacheng'i.
49001007 Hinsang'u yayiwahi yikwawuku, aji nakuyikabisha kuji antu amakwawu nawu aheng'eshi nsang'u yayiwahi yaKristu.
49001008 Hakwila neyi etu, hela kang'elu wukufuma mwiwulu, wukuyishimwina nsang'u yayiwahi yacheng'i yitwabulili kuyishimwinetu, ekali washing'ewa.
49001009 Mutunahoshi jehi nukuhoshamu nawa cheng'i nami, muntu wukuyishimwina nsang'u yayiwahi yacheng'i yimwabulili kutambula kujetu, ekali washing'ewa.
49001010 Nelang'a nami anmonang'a kuwaha kuji antu, tahinji kuji Nzambi? Nalonjang'a nami nitiyishi antu kuwaha, tahinji? Neyi nichiji sang'a natiyishila antu kuwaha, hinukwikala njung'u yaKristuku.
49001011 Enu anakwetu, nakeng'i kuyilezha nami nsang'u yayiwahi yinashimwinami, hiyafuma kumuchima wamuntuku.
49001012 Hinayitambwili kuji muntuku, hela kuntang'isha hiyantang'ishili kuji muntuku; yakunmwekeshela kuji Yesu Kristu.
49001013 Enu aweni mwatiya jehi munashakamini hamwaka nakulonja yizhila yawaYujeya, ninichi chinaswezhelang'a nankashi kukabisha chipompelu chaNzambi nikuchikisang'ana.
49001014 Muyizhila yawaYujeya nabajikili akwamunza wami amavulu inabwambukili nawu; mulong'a mumuchima wami naswezheli iyena jakwila mwaya yaaku yawankakulula zhami.
49001015 Ilang'a Nzambi, wanzhilikili jehi kufumisha hinavwalikili, wántambikili mwaya luwi lwinji,
49001016 hatiyiliyi kuwaha kumwekesha Mwaninji mujami, kulonja nimushimunang'a mukachi kawazhentili, hinehwili muntuku.
49001017 Hela tuhu kuya kuYerusalema kuji wena asambililang'ahu jehi kwikala apostolu, ami kanja, hinayili kwoku; nafuminuku hinukuya muArabiya, hinukufunta cheng'i kujamakasa.
49001018 Chimunahiti nyaka yisatu, hinukukanjuka kuYerusalema, nami nakahempuli Petulu, jiyi Kefwasi, hinukushakama ninji mafuku ikumi natanu (15).
49001019 Hakwinza apostolu amakwawu hinayimweni kwamuku, ching'a yowu manakwaMwanta, Yakoba.
49001020 Tiyenu, nsang'u yinukuyisonekela hinatwambuku, Nzambi neluki.
49001021 Nkumininaku nenzhili kumutamba waSiriya niwaSilisiya.
49001022 Henohu akwayipompelu yamuYujeya ajing'i muji Kristu achiji kanja ang'iluki.
49001023 Akuminini jakuntiya hohu, nawu iwu wajing'i nakutukabisha hamwaka, katataka hakushimuna chikuhwelelu chakisang'enang'ayi.
49001024 Hiyakulemeshela Nzambi hamuzhimba wamami.
49002001 Chimunahiti nyaka ikumi nayiwana (14), hinukukanjuka cheng'i kuYerusalema naBaranaba, nisenja niTitusa.

49002002 Nayili chakunlezha nachimwekeshu, hinukuyilumbulwila nsang'u yayiwahi yinashimunang'a mukachi kawazhentili. Ilang'a akwetu alema nayilezheli kwakankawetu, kulonja nibuli kutemuka tuhu chamukunkulwayi, inji kwizhi natemuki jehi chamukunkulwayi.
49002003 Kang'anyahu kaGriki Titusa najing'ilang'a ninji, hiyamukakezheli nawu amwalamishuku.
49002004 Nsang'u oyu yasang'umukili nawanakwetu akutwamba eng'izhiluwu kumbaji. Eng'ilili kumbaji kulonja amoni kukuulika kwetu kwamuji Kristu Yesu, nawu atwing'izhi muwujung'u.
49002005 Hitwayovwahilili hela mpinzhi yanteshaku, kulonja walala wansang'u yayiwahi wutwalekuhu nanenu.

49002006 Hakwila wenawa antu ajing'i atiyakana nawu alema; hela alema hinayishili kwami kumuchimaku, Nzambi haakamang'a antu kumesuku; nami wenawa antu ajing'i atiyakana hiyanshililuku nsang'u yikwawuku.
49002007 Kwakulehi! Ilang'a chamwenuwu nawu anankunzhiki kukushimuna nsang'u yayiwahi kuji ayijima, mwomwamukunzhikiluwu Petulu kukushimuna nsang'u yayiwahi kuji akwakwalama, hiyakutukiswila nkisu.
49002008 Mulong'a iwu wakong'eli muji Petulu nakumutemesha kuji akwakwalama, jiyi nawa wakong'eli mujami nakuntemesha kuji azhentili.

49002009 AYakoba naPetulu niYowanu, amwekeni neyi yishimi, chamwenuwu luwi lwanyinkeluwu, hiyakutwolwela etu naBaranaba makasa achijiilu akukunjang'ana, nawu enu muyi kuji azhentili, etu tuyi kuji akwakwalama.
49002010 Akuminini jakutulezha izu jakwila nawu ching'a twanukang'a atuzweng'i; mwomu najing'i nakufwila ninami nawa.
49002011 Ilang'a chashikiliyi Petulu kuAntiyoki, najikang'ili kumesu inji, mulong'a wajing'i namulong'a.

49002012 Mulong'a heliluwu antu afumini kuji Yakoba achiji kanja enzi, wajiilang'a nawazhentili. Ilang'a chanenzuwu wena, yena Petulu hakufumamu, hakwambuka kuji azhentili, mulong'a natiyi jehi akwakwalama woma.
49002013 NiaYujeya asheluku hiyakujimbana mwomumu nayena, kujimbana kwakwila niBaranaba nawa niyena hakuhung'umuka chimu nawu.

49002014 jichi ami chinamweni aji nakwila mwabula kuya walala wansang'u yayiwahi, hinukumwila Petulu kumesu awakwawu ezhima nami, Eyi kaYujeya hiwashakamang'a mwaya wuYujeyaku, washakamang'a neyi kazhentili, wakakezhelang'aji azhentili, neyi ashakami neyi chashakamang'awu aYujeya?
49002015 Etu twela kuchisemwa chetu tuji aYujeya, hituji kwetu azhentili akwanshijuku.

49002016 Yetu tuneluki netu, muntu hiyakutwesha kumuying'isha nakumutena walong'a nanyijimu yanshimbuku, ching'a nakumukuhwelela Yesu Kristu hohu. Ninetu aweni tunamukuhweleli Kristu Yesu kulonja atuying'ishi nakututena along'a hakukuhwelela Kristu, bayi nanyijimu yanshimbuku. Mulong'a hikuji muntu akuying'ishawu nakumutena walong'a nanyijimu yanshimbuku.
49002017 Etu chitwakeng'eli netu, atuying'ishi nakututena along'a muji Kristu, neyi akutumona nawu tuji akwanshiji, komana Kristu jiyi wakozhezhang'a antu kuputola tahinji? Chinzhila!
49002018 Neyi nukutung'ulula cheng'i yuma yinakisang'eni, najimwekeshi jehi kwikala mukwakuputola.
49002019 Mulong'a ami kunshimbi nimufu hamujimu wanshimbi, kulonja nimuhanjili Nzambi.

49002020 Ampopela jehi hakulusu hamu naKristu, ilang'a nahanja; hiyami nawaku, Kristu jiyi wahanjilang'a mujami. Chinahanjang'a mumuzhimba nahanjang'a nakukuhwelela kwaMwana kaNzambi, wankeng'eli, wajinkeluhu kunkoolami.
49002021 Hinajiwulang'a luwi lwaNzambuku; mulong'a neyi kulong'a kwenzang'a kunshimbi, komana Kristu wafwili tuhu kwinji.
49003001 Enu ang'alizha, O chimwabula maana! Wayiloweli hinyi, enu antu amwekesheleluwu jehi Yesu Kristu hatooka, sang'a amupopelawu hakulusu?
49003002 Nakeng'i kuyihula chuma chimu hohu nami, Spiritu mwatambwili nanyijimu yanshimbi, tahinji nakwitiya kwakukuhwelela?
49003003 Munabuliliji maana? Kutachika mutachiki muji Spiritu, mukumishi kwenu nachisemwa chaheseki?
49003004 Yina yuma yayivulu yimwajing'i nakukabakana, komana mwayikabakenang'a tuhu kwenu, tahinji? Neyi jimu, komana chajing'i chamukunkulwayi.
49003005 jichi yena wáyinkang'a Spiritu, wákong'ang'a nyijimu yang'ovu mukachi kenu, wachilang'a nanyijimu yanshimbi, tahinji nakutiya kwakukuhwelela?
49003006 Abarahama chamukuhweleleliyi Nzambi, Nzambi hakumufuukwilachu ninji hikulong'a.
49003007 jichi ilukenu nenu antu akukuhwelela jiwu anyana kaAbarahama.

49003008 Mukanja wazhila, chiwatenenang'ahu jehi nawu Nzambi wakaying'isha nakutena kulong'a azhentili nakukuhwelela, hakushimunang'ahu jehi kuji Abarahama nsang'u yayiwahi, ninji, Nyunza yezhima yakakoolekela mujeyi.
49003009 Nochu antu akukuhwelela, anakooleki jehi hamu naAbarahama wakuhweleleli.
49003010 Ezhima akuhwelelang'a nyijimu yanshimbi, anekali jehi akwakushing'ewa; mulong'a anasoneki nawu, Muntu wukubula kukakela nikwila yuma yezhima yanasonekuwu mumukanja wanshimbi, amushing'i.
49003011 jichi jinu chinalumbuluki chakwila nawu, hikwekala muntu akuying'ishawu nakumutena walong'a nanshimbi kumesu aNzambuku. Mulong'a nawu, Mukwakulong'a wakahanja nakukuhwelela.
49003012 Nshimbi hikukuhwelelaku; ilang'a nawu, Muntu welang'a nshimbi jiyi wakahanjilamu.
49003013 Kristu watukuulili kukushing'a kwanshimbi kwatushing'iluwu, nanochu chamubalumwinuwu kwikala washing'ewa hansang'u yetwetu. Mulong'a anasoneki nawu, Muntu akukujikawu kumutonju washing'ewa.
49003014 Kulonja kukooleka kwakoolekeliyi Abarahama kwakenzi haji azhentili muji Kristu Yesu kulonja tutambuli Spiritu akaniniyi nakukuhwelela.
49003015 Enu anakwetu, hinukuhosha mwahoshang'awu antu. Hela chitiyang'enu chamuntu, neyi anachikoleshi jehi hiyachijiwulang'a kuji muntu, hela kusha kwokuku.
49003016 Yikaninu, ayikanini Abarahama niMbutu yinji. Hiyateneni mbutu neyi kwizhi zhazhivuluku; ateneni kwayimu hohu nawu, Mbutu yeyi; jiyi Kristu.

49003017 ichi chinukwila nami nshimbi yenzhili munahiti jehi nyaka nkulakazhi zhiwana namakumi asatu (430) nahatiyang'eniyi Nzambi naAbarahama, hiyikutwesha kuzhaha chitiyang'enu chakolesheliyi Nzambuku, mwaka yizeyeshi chikaninu chili chamukunkulwayi.
49003018 jMulong'a neyi wuswana wekala kwawu kunshimbi, komana hiwakukana nawaku; ilang'a Nzambi wamwinkeluwu Abarahama chakukana.
49003019 Nshimbi yanka? Ayishililuku nsang'u zhanyilong'a nichamba kenza Mbutu yakaninuwu jehi kuji Nzambi. Nshimbi yenzhili nawang'elu kuchikasa chehaku.
49003020 Ichi jinu ihaku hiihaku wawumuku; ilang'a Nzambi jiyi wumu.
49003021 Nshimbi yalekeshang'a yikaninu yaNzambi, tahinji? Chinzhila! Neyi kwajing'i nshimbi yatwesheli kuhanjisha, mutenowu chalala kulong'a kwaji kwinza kwokunshimbi.
49003022 Ilang'a mukanja wazhila wunakasi yuma yezhima mung'ovu yanshiji, kulonja chikaninu chakukuhwelela Yesu Kristu chiikali chambala chanawa akukuhwelela.
49003023 Ilang'a hajing'i kukuhwelela kanja kwinzi, atukasili nang'ovu yanshimbi, atupatililumu kushika nihamba kamwekeshawu kukuhwelela.
49003024 jichi nshimbi jiyi nkulung'ang'a yetu njo-o nichenzhiliyi Kristu, kulonja atuying'ishi nakututena along'a nakukuhwelela.
49003025 Ilang'a ichi chinenzi jehi kukuhwelela, hitwekala nawa cheng'i nankulung'ang'aku.
49003026 Mulong'a muji Kristu Yesu enu ezhima mwela jehi anyana kaNzambi nakukuhwelela.
49003027 Mulong'a wezhima wenu áyizhimikili mwing'ili muji Kristu, munajivwiki Kristu.

49003028 Hikukutwesha kwikala cheng'i kaYujeya hela kaGrikuku; hikukutwesha kwikala cheng'i njung'u hela hinjung'uku; hikukutwesha kwikala cheng'i iyala hela mumbanjaku; wezhima wenu munekali wumu muji Kristu Yesu.
49003029 Neyi munekali ambala aKristu, komana munekali jehi mbutu zhaAbarahama, muyanswana achikaninu.
49004001 Ilang'a ami nami, helang'a nswana wuchiji kansi, hashiyang'anang'a nanjung'uku, kutong'a jiyi mwanta wayuma yezhima.
49004002 Ilang'a wakuminang'a jakwovwahila amuhembang'a nikuji anyuuli, nihakashika mwaka watong'olayi tata yinji.
49004003 Ninetu nawa, chitwajing'i atwansi, twajing'i muwujung'u wayuma yampata yamunu mwishina yakuhemesha.
49004004 Ilang'a mwaka chiwashikili chikupu, Nzambi hakutemesha Mwaninji, amuvweli kuji mumbanja, amuvweli kunshimbi;
49004005 kulonja akakuuli antu ajing'i kunshimbi, kulonja akatwing'izhi muchisaka chinji nakwikala anyaninji.
49004006 Chimunekali jehi anyaninji, Nzambi atemesha niSpiritu waMwaninji munyichima yetu ninji, Tata Yami.
49004007 jichi hiwuji nawa cheng'i njung'uku, wumwana; neyi wumwana komana wunswana wakuswanisha kuji Nzambi.
49004008 Hamwaka chimwabulili kumwiluka Nzambi, mwajing'i anjung'u zhawábula kwikala Nzambi.

49004009 Hakwila ichi chimunamwiluki jehi Nzambi, wata Nzambi jiyi wayilukenu, mulong'anyi mukufuntila nawa cheng'i kuyuma yakuhemesha yazeya yawuzweng'i, mwaka mukeng'i kwing'ila cheng'i muwujung'u wayu?
49004010 Mwazhilikang'a mafuku, nitukwezhi, niyilaaka, ninyaka.
49004011 Natiyi woma nami hajaha nayikabakeneni tuhu chamukunkulwayi.
49004012 Enu anakwetu, nayilembeleli nami ikalenu neyi ami, mulong'a ami niji neyi enu. Himwang'ilili chatamaku.
49004013 Enu aweni mweluka jehi chuma chaletesheli kuyishimwina nsang'u yayiwahi hakusambila, chochayikatu yami.
49004014 China chuma chamumuzhimba wami chimwamweni kutama, himwachijiwili, hela kuchisawulaku; mwakuminini jakuntambula neyi chakutambula kang'elu kaNzambi, neyi yomweni Kristu Yesu.
49004015 Kukooleka kumwateneni kunayi jehi mujihi? Tiyenu niyilezhi chuma chinayimweni, nami neyi chatweshekeli, mutenowu mwantubwilili mesu enu himukunyinkawu ami.
49004016 Ami nabalumuki jehi kwikala mukwankunyi nenu nanichi chinayilezhang'a walala, tahinji?
49004017 Kulemesha kwaswezhang'awu kuyilemesha hikwayang'a mwamuwahuku; analonji kuyambula nachu kulonja kuyilemeshang'a wena.
49004018 Chachiwahi kulemesha muchawahila mafuku ezhima, bayi chinukwikala nenu hohuku.
49004019 Enu anyanami anyanya, inukumwena cheng'i nyisong'u yakuvwala nichimwamba kabalumuka nakufwana neyi Kristu!
49004020 Eng'a, neyi najing'i nenu katataka mutenowu nabalumuni jehi niizu jami, mulong'a niji nakuyizhinoka.
49004021 Enu mwakeng'a kwikala kunshimbi, nlezhenu; nshimbi yayeni himwayitiyang'aku, tahinji?
49004022 Mulong'a anasoneki nawu, Abarahama wajing'i nawanyaninji amayala ayeji, iwu wakuji mumbanja wanjung'u, mukwawu wakuji mumbanja wesumbu.
49004023 Iwu wakuji mumbanja wanjung'u wavwalikili chakumuzhimba; hakwinza owu wavwalikili kuji mumbanja wesumbu wajing'i wakukana.
49004024 Yena yumiyi himwevulu; mulong'a wenawa ambanja hiyitiyang'enu yiyeji; chimu chakufuma kumpiji yaSinayi, jiyi Haga wavwalang'a anyana awujung'u.
49004025 Iwu Haga jiyi mpiji yaSinayi yamuArabiya, kafwampi jiyi Yerusalema yamakonu, mulong'a yena wuji muwujung'u nawanyaninji.
49004026 Hakwila Yerusalema yakwiwulu hiyekala muwujung'uku, jiyi mama yetwetu.

49004027 Mulong'a anasoneki nawu, Eyi nshinta, wabulilang'a kuvwala anyana, zang'alalaku. Eyi wabulilang'a kutiya nyisong'u yakuvwala, bulaku nying'ula nikwimba tumina; Mulong'a anyana kamumbanja analekuwu anabajiki anyana kamumbanja wesumbu kuvula.
49004028 Enu anakwetu tuji anyana achikaninu neyi chajing'iyi Isaka.
49004029 Chelili owu wavwalikili chakumuzhimba hakukabisha owu wakuji Spiritu, jichi chelang'awu nilelu.
49004030 Mumukanja wazhila nawuji? Nawu, Mutemuni iwu njung'u nimwaninji hamu; Mulong'a mwana kayeniwu njung'u hakutwesha kuswanina hamu namwana kamumbanja wesumbuku.
49004031 jichi enu anakwetu, etu hituji anyana kamumbanja wanjung'uku, tuji anyana kamumbanja wesumbu.
49005001 Kristu watufumisha jehi muwujung'u; jichi shimatenu chakola, bayi mujikasila cheng'i mumpanja yawujung'uku.
49005002 Tiyenu, ami Pawulu nukuyila nami, Neyi akuyalamisha himwakamwenamu chuma muji Kristuku.
49005003 Mwamweni, nukuyishimwina nawa cheng'i amayala ezhima akwalamishawu, nami anekali akasika kunshimbi yezhima.
49005004 Enu mukukeng'a ayiying'ishi nakuyitena along'a nanshimbi, munambuki jehi kuji Kristu, munasenuki jehi nawa munzhila yaluwi.
49005005 Mulong'a etu kwetu twaching'ililang'a kulong'a kutwaching'ezhang'a, kutunatambwili kuji Spiritu nakukuhwelela.
49005006 Mulong'a muji Kristu Yesu, kwalama hela kubula kwalama hikwakwashang'aku, ching'a yowu kukuhwelela kwakalakalang'a nakukeng'a hohu.
49005007 Mwajing'i nakutemuka chachiwahi, ayilekesheluku kujinyi, mwaka muleki kwovwahila walala?
49005008 Kukanzhikizha kwanayikanzhikizhuwu, hikunafumi kuji yena wayitambikang'aku.
49005009 Ilung'i jantesha jananishang'a chikanka chezhima.
49005010 Nayikuhweleli muji Mwanta, nami himukutong'ozhoka mwacheng'uku; hakwila muntu wayikabishang'a ochu wakawana mulong'a, yowu akawanawu yowu.
49005011 Ilang'a enu anakwetu, neyi ami nichiji kushimuna kwalama, aji nakunkabishilaji nihanu? Neyi chajing'i ochu, komana ninsonyi yakulusu yinahiti jehi.
49005012 Mutenowu áyiluwang'eshang'a aji kujiketula awenawu!

49005013 Mulong'a enu anakwetu, ayitambikilili kwenu kusubuka. Ichi chimunasubuki jehi, bayi muchibalumuna chiikali chakukwasha nachu chisemwa chahesekuku. Ikalenu kwenu akwakujikalakela wumu namukwawu mukukeng'a.
49005014 Mulong'a nshimbi yezhima yinalumbulukili mwizu jimu nawu, Keng'aku mukwenu neyi chiwajikeng'a eyi aweni.
49005015 Kwinza neyi mukujisumona nakujijya wumu namukwawu, babalenu mubuli kujizhilisha wumu namukwawu.
49005016 Ami nami enjenung'a chakuyenjesha kuji Spiritu, kulonja mubuli kwila yáfwilang'a chisemwa chaheseki.

49005017 Mulong'a chisemwa chaheseki chafwilang'a yabula kukeng'ayi Spiritu, niSpiritu nawa wafwilang'a yábula kukeng'a chisemwa chaheseki. Mulong'a wena, chabula kutiyang'anawu wumu namukwawu, alonja kuyikang'esha kwila yuma yimwakeng'ang'a kwila.
49005018 Ilang'a neyi ayilombolang'a kuji Spiritu, himuji nawa kunshimbuku.
49005019 Nyijimu yachisemwa chaheseki hiyakuyambaku. jiyeniyi; wuvumbi, wuzonju wamumuchima, kufwila yatama,
49005020 kupesha, kupanja, kuhelang'ana, kuzung'a, ichima, majombu, kukokwela kwenu, kujambola, kwitiya nsang'u yaheng'a,
49005021 lwisu, kusheta, yisela yatama, niyuma yiji neyi iyi. Yeniyi nukuyilezha munayilezheli jehi, nami antu akwila mwenimu hiyamba kaswana wanta waNzambuku.
49005022 Hakwila mukabu waSpiritu yowu kukeng'a, muzang'alu, kuwunja, kukaba kabe-e, luwi, kuwaha, kushinshika,
49005023 kwovwaha, kujihemba. Hikwekala nshimbi yalekeshang'a yumiyuku.
49005024 Antu ambala aKristu Yesu apopela jehi chisemwa chaheseki hakulusu, niyuma yatiyang'a chisemwa kuwaha, niyafwilang'ayi.
49005025 Neyi tukuhanja chakutuhanjisha kuji Spiritu, twenjenung'a nawa chakutwenjesha kuji Spiritu.
49005026 Bayi tukeng'a kujilemesha chamukunkulwayuku, tubuli kujivuloka, nikujitiyila ichima.
49006001 Enu anakwetu, neyi anawani muntu naputoli, enu mwenjang'a muSpiritu, mufuntishenu muntu wuji ochu naspiritu yakujizoza; babalaku hajaha nineyi akakutesha.
49006002 Senjang'anenu yisenja yenu; neyi mukwila mwenimu, mukwila nshimbi yaKristu chikupu.
49006003 Muntu wajimonang'a yomweni ninji nimuntu walema, iku wamukunkulwayi, najijimbi tuhu kwinji.
49006004 Ilang'a antu ezhima ashinshiki nyijimu yawu, muntu himuntu. Muntu wukwila mwenomu, jiyi wukumona hakujisamina namujimu winji yomweninji, bayi kujisama namujimu wawacheng'uku.
49006005 Mulong'a antu ezhima akajisenjela yisenja yawu, iwu nachinji, iwu nachinji.
49006006 Muntu atang'ishang'awu izu jaNzambi, akwashi owu wamutang'ishang'a nayuma yayiwahi yezhima.
49006007 Bayi mujijimbaku, Nzambi hiyamusehang'aku, yonsu yakujimayi muntu, jiyi yakajyayi.
49006008 Muntu wukukuwila chisemwa chinji chaheseki, wakajya kutoka kuchisemwa chaheseki; hakwila yena wukukuwila Spiritu, wakajya wumi wahayanyaka kuji Spiritu.
49006009 Bayi tuzeyang'a nakwila mwamuwahuku, mulong'a twakajya hachilaaka chakujya, neyi tunabuli kuzeya.
49006010 jichi jinu, neyi tukumona hakwilila, twililenung'a antu ezhima chachiwahi; tubajiki kwilila akwetala jakukuhwelela.
49006011 Talenu izhi nsona zhamaneni zhinayisonekeli nachikasa chamami aweni.
49006012 Antu ezhima ayikakezhang'a nawu ayalamishi kulonja ayilemeshi kuji antu munyizhimba, aji nakufwila abuli kuyikabishila nsang'u yakulusu yaKristu.
49006013 Kutong'a hela awenawu aalama jehi hiyelang'a kwawu nyijimu yanshimbuku; anakeng'i nawu enu ching'a mwalami hohu, kulonja akajisami nansang'u yanyizhimba yenu.
49006014 Hakwila ami kujisama chinzhila, ching'a nakulusu yaMwanta wetu Yesu Kristu hohu. Mpata yamunu mwishina ampopelayi jehi hakulusu, ninami ampopa jehi kunsang'u yampata yamunu mwishina.
49006015 Mulong'a kwalama, hela kubula kwalama, hikukweti chumaku, ching'a yowu kuleng'a kwakwiha hohu.
49006016 Kuwunja niluwi lwikali nawantu ezhima akwila mwenimu mutunayilezhi, niaIsarela ambala aNzambi nawa.
49006017 Kufuma kulelu, bayi ankabisha nawa kuji muntuku, mulong'a ami niji nayibata yaYesu hamuzhimba wami.
49006018 Luwi lwaMwanta Yesu Kristu lwikali naspiritu yenwenu anakwetu. Amena.
50001001 Ami Pawulu, kapostolu kaKlistu Yesu mwaya muchima waNzambi, niji nakuyisonekela mukanja, enu akwakuzhila mwekala kuEfwesesa, akwakushinshika amuji Klistu Yesu.
50001002 Luwi lwikali nanenu nikuwunja kwakufuma kuji Nzambi, yowu Tata yetu, nikuji Mwanta Yesu Klistu.
50001003 Amukiswili Nzambi yaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu, yowu Tata yinji, natukiswili nkisu zhawuspilitu zhezhima mumawulu muji Klistu;
50001004 chatutonjeliyi muji yena henohu chikuku champata yamunu mwishina chichiji kanja, kulonja tuzhili, tubuli hakutwinkela mulong'aa kumesu inji.
50001005 Mukukeng'aa watukunzhikilang'aahu jehi ninji twikali anyana muchisaka chinji muji Yesu Klistu, mwatiyililiyi kuwaha kumuchima winji,
50001006 kulonja kuhameka lubanzhi lwakulema kwaluwi lwinji lwatutiyililiyi chamukunkulu muji yena Wákeng'aewa.
50001007 Muji yena jimu tukweti kukuula kwanatukuuluwu namashi inji, yowu kutwanakena nshiji zhetu, mweseka maheta aluwi lwinji
50001008 lwatuvulishililiyi, namaana ezhima nikashinshi.
50001009 Hakutulezha chizhinjilu chamumuchima winji, mwatiyililiyi kuwaha, mwafuukwiliyi muji Klistu,
50001010 nichamba kawanina nyaka; kulonja Nzambi akapompeshi yuma yamumawulu niyahamaseki yezhima muji Klistu.
50001011 Muji yena nawa jimu mutunatambwili wuswana, mulong'aa atwambwilang'aahu jehi mwatong'aweliyi yena wakong'aang'aa yuma yezhima mwaya mpúng'aa yinji;
50001012 kulonja etu, twásambilili kukuhwelela Klistu, tuleteshi kuhameka kwakuhameka lubanzhi lwakulema kwinji.
50001013 Muji yena ninenu nawa, mwatiyili izu jawalala, yoyu nsang'au yayiwahi yawamwinu wenu, himwamukuhweleleli yena, ayifunjili nawa naSpilitu Wazhila wakukana.
50001014 Yena Spilitu jiyi chizhiikilu chawuswana wetu, nichamba kakuulawu iheta jambala jayena, kulonja kuhameka lubanji lwakulema kwinji.
50001015 jichi ami nawa, chinatiyili nsang'au yenu yakumukuhwelela Mwanta Yesu, nichimwakeng'aang'aa akwakuzhila ezhima,
50001016 hinalekang'aa kuyisakilila chinayitenang'aa mukulombela kwamuku.
50001017 Nalombang'aa, Nzambi yaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu, Tata walubanzhi lwakulema nami, ayinki spilitu yamaana nichimwekeshu kulonja muswezhi kumwiluka.
50001018 Mesu amunyichima yenu atoni, kulonja mwiluki kuching'aezha kwakutambika kwayitambikiliyi, nimaheta alubanzhi lwakulema kwawuswana winji wahetayi muji akwakuzhila;
50001019 nichabajika kututohela ng'aovu zhinji nankashi, etu twakuhwelelang'aa, mweseka ng'aovu zhinji zhaswezha kutoha nankashi.
50001020 ng'aovu zhakong'aeliyi muji Klistu hamusang'awiliyi muji afu, hakumushakamisha kuchikasa chinji chachijiilu mumawulu,
50001021 kwabajika nankashi kuyuula kwezhima, niwanta, ning'aovu, nimawanta antúmba, nimazhina ezhima atenang'aawu, hiwowu amakonu hohuku, nianyaka yakenza nawa.
50001022 Wamwovwahishila jehi yuma yezhima nakuyisha kwishina janyenju yinji; wamukunzhika jehi kwikala mutu wahewulu jayuma yezhima kuchipompelu;
50001023 chipompelu jiwu muzhimba winji, kwinzala kwayena wenzeshang'aa yuma yezhima mwezhima.
50002001 Ninenu ayihanjishili chimwajing'ai afwa nanyilong'aa yenu ninshiji,
50002002 mumwajing'ai nakwenja mwaya mpata yamunu mwishina, mwaya kukeng'aa kwamwanta wamuluzwizu wang'aovu, yowu spilitu wakong'aelang'aa katataka muji akwakuzhikwa.

50002003 Ninetu ezhima nawa mwomutwashakamini nakwila mwafwila chisemwa chetu chaheseki, nakukong'aa mwakeng'aa muzhimba nimuchima. Kuchisemwa chaheseki twajing'ai antu atela kuzuwilewa, neyi antu amakwawu.
50002004 Ilang'aa Nzambi waswezha kuheta luwi, nakukeng'aa kwinji kwabajika kwatukeng'aeliyi nachu,
50002005 hitwachijing'ai twafwa nanyilong'aa, watuhanjishili chimu naKlistu. Anayamwini naluwi hohu.
50002006 Watusang'awili chimu ninji, watushakamishili chimu ninji mumawulu, muji Klistu Yesu;
50002007 kulonja akamwekeshi hanyaka yakenza mahetinji aswezha aluwi lwakutukokwezha muji Klistu Yesu.
50002008 Mulong'aa anayamwini naluwi kwokukukuhwelela; hiyenu awenuku, hichamukunkulu chambala chaNzambi;
50002009 hichakunyijimuku, kulonja kubuli muntu wukujisama.
50002010 Mulong'aa etu tuji wukalawenu winji, atuleng'aeli muji Klistu Yesu twilang'aa nyijimu yayiwahi yatulong'aeshelelang'aahu jehi kuji Nzambi ninji twenjelang'aamu.
50002011 jichi anukenu chimwajing'ai azhentili hamwaka kuchisemwa, ayitenenang'aa kuji akwakwalama namakasa nawu ayijima.

50002012 Mwajing'ai aambuka naKlistu; mwajing'ai aambuka nawenimbu wawaIsalela; mwajing'ai enyi akaji kwiluka yitiyang'aenu yachikaninu; mwajing'ai akaji ninaha hakuching'aezhela; mwajing'ai antu akaji Nzambi munu mwishina.
50002013 Hakwinzichi jinu, enu mwajing'ai kwakulehi anayikunjamishi jehi muji Klistu Yesu namashi aKlistu.
50002014 Mulong'aa yena jiyi kuwunja kwetu, nahumang'aeshi ájing'ai ayeji ekali wumu; nahumuni mbang'au yakwambula yajing'ai hakachi;
50002015 hakufumisha nkunyi yakwata ng'aovu kunshimbi nikuyizhila, mumuzhimba winji; kulonja hajing'ai antu ayeji, aleng'auhu muntu wamwiha wumu muji yomweni, kulonja hekali kuwunja;
50002016 ayikunjamishi kuji Nzambi ezhima ayeji mumuzhimba wumu nakulusu, hakuzhahila nkunyi kwenoku.
50002017 Wenzhili nakushimuna kuwunja kujenu mwajing'ai kwakulehi, nikuji wena ajing'ai kwakwihi.
50002018 Mulong'aa muji yena jimu mutunamweni hawing'aililu wamwaTata, etu ezhima ayeji naSpilitu yowumu.
50002019 jichi jinu, himuji nawa enyi hela akwetung'aa jacheng'auku; munekali jehi enimbu hamu nawakwakuzhila, munekali jehi akwetala jaNzambi.
50002020 Anayitung'ai jehi hachikuku chawapostolu nawatuplofwetu, yomweni Klistu Yesu jiyi ilola jaswezha kwoloka nankashi jakwiwombu.
50002021 Kutung'aa kwezhima kwatung'aang'aawu, kwenja kunung'aang'aana chachiwahi muji yena, kwenja kukula kulonja kwikali Tembeli yazhila muji Mwanta.
50002022 Muji yena nawa jimu mwanayitung'ailuwu jehi ninenu hamu, mwikali itala jakushakama Nzambi muji Spilitu.
50003001 Hansang'au iyi yinateni jehi, ami Pawulu nekala munyonzhi yaKlistu Yesu yakukoola enu azhentili;
50003002 neyi chalala munatiyi chanankunzhikuwu kumujimu wakuyishimwina luwi lwaNzambi,
50003003 chanmwekesheleluwu chizhinjilu chinayisonekeleli jehi namazu antesha.
50003004 Chimukutang'aa, mukutwesha kwiluka kushinshika kwami kunashinshika muchizhinjilu chaKlistu,
50003005 chabulili kutiyakeshawu kuji antu ahanyaka yacheng'ai, neyi chanachimwekeshuwu makonu kuji apostolu zhinji azhila niatuplofwetu twinji muji Spilitu.
50003006 Chakwila nawu azhentili anekali jehi akwakuswanina hamu nawaIsalela, anekali jehi nawa yiji yamuzhimbowu, akwakutambwila hamu chikaninu chamuji Klistu Yesu kwokunsang'au yayiwahi.
50003007 Yena nsang'au yayiwahi iyi, jiyi yankunzhikiluwu kwikala mukwakukalakala, mwaya chamukunkulu chaluwi lwaNzambi lwanyinkeluwu, lunatambwili kung'aovu zhinji.
50003008 Ami nabajika kukeha mukachi kawakwakuzhila ezhima aswezha kukeha, yami enkawu luwi ilu lwakushimwina azhentili maheta aKlistu akang'aanya kwilukewa.
50003009 Kulonja nakamwekeshi kuji antu ezhima mwekalila chizhinjilu chanyaka yezhima muji Nzambi waleng'aeli yuma yezhima.
50003010 Kulonja amwekesheli akwakuyuula niakwawanta ekala mumawulu, maana aNzambi eng'ai naeng'ai, katataka nachipompelu;
50003011 mwomwatong'aweliyi jehi kunyaka yahayanyaka muji Mwanta wetu Klistu Yesu.
50003012 Muji yena jimu mutunabulili woma, tunamoni jehi hawing'aililu wakaji kwakama, nakukuhwelela kutwamukuhwelelang'aa.
50003013 jichi nalembi nami bayi muzeya nayihung'au yami yinamonang'aa hansang'au yenuku; hichuma chenu chakujisama nachu.
50003014 Hayena nsang'au iyi nafukami kuji Tata,
50003015 kwatambwila yisaka yezhima izhina jaTata niyamwiwulu niyahamaseki,
50003016 nami, etezhi muntu wenu wamukachi kukola nang'aovu yaSpilitu winji, mwaya mahetinji alubanzhi lwakulema.
50003017 Kulonja Klistu ashakamang'aa munyichima yenu mukukuhwelela, kulonja enu, munashimati jehi kunyizhi, munakoli jehi mukukeng'aa,
50003018 mukwati ng'aovu yakushinshika mwaya kutoha, nikuleha, nikuleha kwiwulu, nikukunama; hamu nawakwakuzhila ezhima.
50003019 Mwiluki kukeng'aa kwaKlistu kwakang'aanya kwilukewa, kulonja mwinzali nihashika kwinzala kwaNzambi kwezhima.
50003020 Yena natweshi kwila chakubajika nankashi mutukulomba hela mutukutong'aozhoka mwezhima, mwesekela ng'aovu yakong'aang'aa mujetu,
50003021 kuji yena kwikali lubanzhi lwakulema muchipompelu, nimuji Klistu Yesu, múkuhita yisaka yezhima hayanyaka nanyaka. Amena.
50004001 jichi ami ákasawu mukaleya hansang'au yaMwanta, nayilembeleli nami enjenung'aa mwatelela kutambika kwayitambikiluwu,
50004002 nakujizoza kwezhima nakwovwaha munyichima, nakujung'aumika, nakujitiyilila wumu namukwawu nakukeng'aa,
50004003 nakusha muchima hakuhemba kunung'aang'aana kwaSpilitu, nakujikasa mwonzhi wakuwunja.
50004004 Kwekala muzhimba wumu niSpilitu wumu, neyi chayitambikiluwu enu mukuching'aezha kumu kwanayitambikuwu.
50004005 Kwekala Mwanta wumu, nichikuhwelelu chimu, nichizhimikilu chimu,
50004006 niNzambi wumu, yowu Tata yawezhima, wekala hewulu jayuma yezhima; yuma yezhima yekalila muji yena; jiyi wekala muyuma yezhima.
50004007 Ilang'aa anatwinki wezhima wetu luwi lwamwesekela chamukunkulu chaKlistu.
50004008 Chochanahoshiyi ninji, Chakanjaminiyi kwiwulu watweli ankoli muwunkoli, Wayinkeli antu yamukunkulu.
50004009 Chenichi chanatenuwu nawu, Wakanjamini; chaya mujihi? Chaya mukwila nawu wakunkumukili mumatung'aa amwishina jamaseki.
50004010 Iwu wakunkumukili, jiyi nawa wakanjamini nakupanjakana nankashi mawulu ezhima, kulonja yuma yezhima yiinzali yena hohu.
50004011 Washilumu amakwawu ekali apostolu, amakwawu atuplofwetu, amakwawu akwakushimuna nsang'au yayiwahi, amakwawu atubing'aa, amakwawu antang'aishi;
50004012 kulonja kukolesha akwakuzhila ekali alala, akalakeli akwawu, atung'ai chachiwahi muzhimba waKlistu;
50004013 nichitwakashika wezhima wetu mukunung'aang'aana muchikuhwelelu, nimukumwiluka Mwana kaNzambi; twakashiki muwuntu walala chikupu, mwashika chiminu chakwinzala kwaKlistu.
50004014 Kulonja tubuli kwikala cheng'ai atwansi akubankang'aila niniku niniku, nakuleluzhoka nampepela yantang'aishilu yezhima, namaleng'au nimakasu awantu akujimba nachu antu.
50004015 Ilang'aa tuhoshenu mwalala nakukeng'aa; tukulenu muji yena muyuma yezhima, jiyi mutu, jiyi Klistu.

50004016 Kumutu owu jiku kwajinung'aila chachiwahi muzhimba wezhima, hiwukujikwata namanung'ai akukwashang'aana, yiji yezhima hiyikwila nyijimu yawu, iwu nawinji, iwu nawinji, kulonja muzhimba wukulang'aa nakujitung'aa mukukeng'aa.
50004017 jichi jinu, nukuhosha chakola nakushimuna muji Mwanta, nami, bayi mwenja cheng'ai neyi chenjang'aawu azhentili, nayitong'aozhoka yawu yakuhemeshaku.
50004018 Maanawu eyila jehi kwawu, aambuka jehi nawumi waNzambi, nansang'au yakuyamba kwanyichima yawu yachinchika.
50004019 Wena hiyatweshang'aa kutiya nsonyi nawa cheng'auku; ajumbila jehi mukufwila kwatama, nakwila yuma yawuzonju yezhima nalwisu.
50004020 Enu kwenu hijimu mumwajizilili Klistuku;
50004021 neyi munamutiyi chalala, neyi anayitang'aishi muji yena mwaya walala wekala muji Yesu.
50004022 Vuulenu muntu wenu wamukulu wachisemwa chachikulu, wajitamishang'aa mwaya kufwila kwatama kwayijimbilang'aa.
50004023 Mwikali antu amaha muyitong'aozhoka yaspilitu yenu.
50004024 Mujivwiki muntu wamwiha aleng'aeluwu mwekalilayi Nzambi mukulong'aa nakuzhila kwalala.
50004025 jichi lekenu kutwamba, Hoshenung'aa walala nawakwenu; mulong'aa tunekali jehi yiji yimu nawakwetu.
50004026 Zuwenu kuzuwa kwakaji kuputola, bayi muhumisha itang'awa iku sang'aa mwahililaku.
50004027 Bayi mumushila jiyabolu hakushakamaku.
50004028 Muntu wajing'ai ikombi, kwiya nawa cheng'ai chinzhila; akalakali mujimu wawuwahi namakasinji, kulonja aheti yuma yakuyinka akwawu anabuli.
50004029 Kuhosha mazu atama chinzhila, ching'aa mazu amawahi anatweshi kukolesha antu hakumonawu kukala, kulonja akwashi naluwi awa akuyitiya.
50004030 Bayi muneng'aesha Spilitu Wazhila waNzambuku, muji yena jimu mwayifunjawu jehi kulonja mwakashiki nikwifuku jakukuula.
50004031 Lekenu njulu yezhima, ninjombu, nikuzuwa, nimapumba, nikutukana, ninkunyi yezhima.
50004032 jikokwezhenu muntu namukwawu; ikalenu namuchima wawushona; janakenenu muntu namukwawu neyi chayanakenenuwu kuji Nzambi muji Klistu nawa.
50005001 jichi ikalenu akwakwimbuzhola Nzambi, neyi anyana akeng'aewa.
50005002 Enjenung'aa nakukeng'aa neyi chatukeng'aeliyi Klistu, hakujinkahu hansang'au zhetu ekali mulambu, nichimuna chakuketwila Nzambi, kulonja ekali ivumba jajiwahi.
50005003 Hakwila wuzhila, nawuzonju wamumuchima wezhima, hela lwisu, bayi ayitenenang'aa mukachi kenuku, hijimu mwatelela akwakuzhilaku.
50005004 Hela wuzonju, hela kuhosha kwawuhewu, hela kuseng'aula; yumoyu hiyatelaku, ching'aa kusakilila hohu.
50005005 Mulong'aa mweluka jehi chalala nenu chivumbi, hela muntu wazonja mumuchima, hela mukwalwisu, hohamu namukwakupesha, hakweti wuswana muwanta waKlistu naNzambuku.
50005006 Bayi ayijimba kuji muntu namazu akuhemeshaku; mulong'aa hayumiyi jihu henzhilang'aa kuzuwa kwaNzambi haji akwakuzhikwa.
50005007 jichi bayi mujibomba nawuku;
50005008 mulong'aa mwajing'ailang'aa mwijima, kwinza katataka muneli jehi chezhezhi muji Mwanta; enjenung'aa neyi akwachezhezhi,
50005009 nakushinshika yuma yamutiyishang'aa Mwanta kuwaha;
50005010 mulong'aa mukabu wachezhezhi wekala muyuma yayiwahi niyalong'aa niyalala yezhima.
50005011 Bayi mukunjang'aana nayuma yelang'aawu mumwijimaku, ching'aa kuyikonkolola.
50005012 Mulong'aa chikweti nsonyi hela kutena yuma yakuzhinja yelang'aawu.
50005013 Ilang'aa yuma yakukonkololawu yezhima ayimwekeshang'aa kuji chezhezhi; mulong'aa chuma chanamwekeshuwu chinekali jehi chezhezhi.
50005014 jichi nawu, Eyi wakamang'aa tulu tonaku, Sang'aukaku muji afu kulonja Klistu akutong'aekeli.
50005015 jichi babalenu mumukwenjela. Bayi mwenjang'aa neyi antu abula maanaku, enjenung'aa neyi akwamaana.
50005016 Kwatilenu mafuku akuhita maana, mulong'aa himwaka watama.
50005017 jichi bayi mubula maanaku, shinshikenu mwaya muchima waMwanta.
50005018 Bayi musheta vinyuku, chaletang'aa kukisika, ilang'aa inzalenung'aa naSpilitu.
50005019 Hoshenung'aa muntu namukwawu namasamu, nitumina, nitumina twawuspilitu, namuchima wakumwimbila Mwanta chachiwahi;
50005020 nakusakilila Nzambi, yowu Tata, mwizhina jaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu, mwahita yuma yezhima, mafuku ezhima.
50005021 Ilenung'aa iwu ovwahila mukwawu, iwu ovwahila mukwawu, nanochu chimwamwakamang'aa Klistu.
50005022 Enu ambanja, ovwahilenu amfumuzhenwenu aweni neyi chimwovwahilang'aa Mwanta.
50005023 Mulong'aa iyala jiyi mutu wamumbanja, chochajiyi Klistu mutu wachipompelu, jiyi Chamwinu chamuzhimba.
50005024 jichi chovwahilang'aa chipompelu Klistu, niambanja nawa ching'aa ovwahilang'aa amfumuzhawu muyuma yezhima.
50005025 Enu amayala, keng'aenu ang'aojizhenu neyi chakeng'aeliyi Klistu chipompelu, hakujinkahu yomweni kuchikoola.
50005026 Kulonja chanachitookeshiyi jehi, achizhiliki nakuchiwelesha namenzhi amazu;
50005027 kulonja ajinki yomweni chipompelu chalubanzhi, chakaji ihuzhi, hela inyiku, hela yuma yiji ochu; chiikali chazhila, chakaji hakuchinkela mulong'aa.
50005028 Mwomumu niamayala niwena akeng'ai ang'aojizhawu aweni neyi chakeng'aawu nyizhimba yawu. Muntu wakeng'aa ing'aojinji wajikeng'aa yomweni.
50005029 Mulong'aa hikwekala muntu wakwatahu jehi nkunyi namuzhimba winji yomwenuku, wawujiishang'aa nikuwuhemba, chochelang'aayi Klistu nachipompelu nawa;
50005030 mulong'aa etu yetu yiji yamuzhimba winji.
50005031 Hansang'au iyi iyala ching'aa ashiyi tata yinji nimama yinji, Ajibombi nang'aojinji, Niwena ayeji akekali wumu.
50005032 Hichizhinjilu chalema, nateni Klistu nachipompelu.
50005033 Ninenu ezhima, keng'aenu ang'aojizhenu, iwu nakukeng'aa winji, iwu nakukeng'aa winji, neyi chimwajikeng'aang'aa enu aweni; nimumbanja amwakamang'aa mfumwinji.
50006001 Enu anyana, ovwahilenung'aa anvwali zhenu muji Mwanta, jichi chuma chachiwahi.
50006002 Lemeshaku tata yeyi nimama yeyi; jiyi nshimbi yatachi yikweti chikaninu;
50006003 Kulonja wumoni kuwaha, Wuhanji nyaka yayivulu hanu hamaseki.
50006004 Ninenu atata zhawantu, bayi muvulokang'aa anyanenu azuwuku; yilelenung'aa nakuyibabesha nikuyikonkomwena muji Mwanta.
50006005 Enu anjung'au, ovwahilenung'aa anyanta zhenu ahanu hamaseki nawoma nikuzaala, namuchima wumu, neyi chimwamwovwahilang'aa Klistu;
50006006 bayi chakukalakala kumesu kulonja kutiyisha antu kuwaha hohuku; kalakalenu chiji neyi anjung'au zhaKlistu, nakwila mwakeng'aayi Nzambi chakufuma kumuchima.
50006007 Mukalakalang'aa nakutiya kuwaha, neyi chakukalakela Mwanta bayi antuku.
50006008 Mwiluki nenu muntu wukwila chachiwahi, hela hinjung'au hela himwana, wakatambwilamu kuji Mwanta.
50006009 Ninenu anyanta nawa yilenung'aa yuma yoyimu; lekenu kuyifunyina, mulong'aa muneluki jehi nenu Mwanta wawu, yowu Mwanta wenu nawa, wuji mwiwulu, yena kwinji haakamang'aa antu kumesuku.
50006010 Nkumininaku, ikalenu akwang'aovu muji Mwanta, nimung'aovu zhinji zhaswezha nankashi.
50006011 Manyekenu yitwa yaNzambi yezhima, kulonja mutweshang'aa kujikang'aa namaana ajiyabolu akujimbana.
50006012 Mulong'aa hitwalwishang'aa nawantu akweti nyizhimba namashuku, twalwishang'aa nawakwakuyuula, nawakwawanta, nawakwakuyuula mwijima wamakonu, nawaspilitu atama amumawulu.
50006013 jichi kwatenu kuyitwa yaNzambi yezhima, kulonja mutweshi kwimana mwifuku jatama, kulonja chimukukumisha kulwisha chochimwemana.
50006014 jichi imanenu, nakupimpila mahina awalala; vwalenu hebwambu chikung'au chakuzhika chakulong'aa;
50006015 vwalenu kunyenju yenu nkwabilu zhakwenja nansang'au yayiwahi yakuwunja.
50006016 Chuma chinabajiki chochakukwata nkebu yakukuhwelela, yimukutwesha kuzhima nachu nyivu yakesi yamukwakutama yezhima.
50006017 Tambulenu itepa jachikung'au jawamwinu, nimpoku yaSpilitu yakabali, joju izu jaNzambi.
50006018 Lombelenung'aa muji Spilitu mafuku ezhima, nikulombela nikulembelela kwezhima, nikutonenamu mwahita kukakela kwezhima nakulembelela akwakuzhila ezhima.
50006019 Munlombeleli ninami nawa, kulonja nishimuni chizhinjilu chansang'au yayiwahi chakaji woma.
50006020 jiyi nsang'au yinekalili ing'aimeni wakukasa mumaleng'ai, kulonja nihoshi chakaji woma, neyi chinateli kuhosha.
50006021 Manakwetu Tikikusa twakeng'aa, muntu wakalakelang'aa Mwanta nakashinshi, wukuyilezha nsang'au zhezhima, ninichi chinekala.
50006022 jiyi nsang'au yinamutemesheli kujenu, kulonja mwiluki mutunashakamini, kulonja yena ayikunjezhi munyichima yenu.
50006023 Kuwunja kwikali nawanakwetu, nikukeng'aa nikukuhwelela kwakufuma kuji Nzambi, yowu Tata, nikuji Mwanta Yesu Klistu.
50006024 Luwi lwikali nawantu ezhima akeng'aa Mwanta wetu Yesu Klistu chakaji kujimbana.
51001001 Etu aPawulu naTimotewu, anjung'u zhaKlistu Yesu, tuji nakuyisonekela mukanja, enu akwakuzhila ezhima amuji Klistu Yesu ekala kuFwilipi, niatubing'a nawankong'i.
51001002 Luwi lwikali nanenu nikuwunja kwakufuma kuji Nzambi Tata yetu nikuji Mwanta Yesu Klistu.
51001003 Chinaanukang'a nsang'u zhenu zhezhima nasakililang'a Nzambi yami.
51001004 Mafuku ezhima chinayilembelelang'a wezhima wenu, nayilembelelang'a namuzang'alu,
51001005 nanochu chimwankwashang'a kutwala nsang'u yayiwahi kumbiji, kufumisha kwifuku jatachi nikulelu.
51001006 Neluki chikupu chuma chochenichi, nami yena watachikili mujimu wawuwahi mujenu wakawukumisha nikwifuku jaYesu Klistu.

51001007 Chachiwahi ami kutong'ozhoka mwenimu hansang'u yenu wezhima wenu, nanochu chinekala nenu mumuchima wami, mulong'a mwatambwilang'a luwi hamu nanami munyonzhi yami, nimukuhakwila nakukolesha nsang'u yayiwahi.
51001008 Mulong'a Nzambi jiyi chinsahu chami chinafwilang'a kuyimona mukukeng'a kwaKlistu Yesu.
51001009 jichi nalombelang'a kulonja kukeng'a kwenu kuswezhi kuvula mumaana nakashinshi kezhima;
51001010 kulonja mushinshiki yuma yabajika kuwaha; kulonja mwikali alala, akaji nyilong'a njo-o nikwifuku jaKlistu;
51001011 muswezhi kusong'a nyikabu yakulong'a yafumang'a kuji Yesu Klistu; kulonja kulemesha nikuhameka Nzambi.
51001012 Enu anakwetu, nakeng'i nami mwiluki nenu yuma yinamonami yinabalumuki kwikala yakutwala nachu nsang'u yayiwahi kumbiji;
51001013 chakwila chiniji munyonzhi hansang'u yaKlistu chinatiyakani kuji mashijika ezhima ahembang'a mwanta, nikuji antu acheng'i.
51001014 Anakwetu amuji Mwanta amavulu anakwati ng'ovu nanichi chiniji munyonzhi, hiyakuswezha nankashi wulobu wakuhosha izu jaNzambi chakaji woma.
51001015 Amu chalala ashimunang'a Klistu chechima nantaji; amu nawa amushimunang'a namuchima wawuwahi.
51001016 Wenawa jiwu elang'a chakukeng'a, nanochu chanelukuwu nawu anankunzhiki mujimu wakuhakwila nsang'u yayiwahi.
51001017 Hakwinza amakwawu ashimunang'a Klistu chantaji hohu, himwalalaku; anatong'ozhoki nawu asang'umuni kunkabisha nanichi chiniji munyonzhi.
51001018 Nochu jinu chakala Klistu akumutiyakesha mwezhima, hela mwakujimbana hela mwalala; mwenimu nazang'alelang'a, jimu nakazang'alela nawa.
51001019 Mulong'a neluki nami chenichi chikumbalumukila chuma chakumpulwisha nachu, nanochu chimukunlombelela, nichakunyinkang'awu Spilitu waYesu Klistu.

51001020 Natalilang'a nankashi mwenimu nakuching'ezha, nami kubuli chuma chakuntiyisha nsonyi; nikwati ng'ovu, neyi chinelang'a jikalu nikatataka nawa, kulonja amulemesheli Klistu mumuzhimba wami, hela nukuhanja hela nukufwa.
51001021 Mulong'a ami kwami kuhanja yowu Klistu, kufwa yowu kuheta.
51001022 Ilang'a neyi nukuhanja mumuzhimba nukumwenamu nyikabu. Hineluki chuma chinukutonjaku.
51001023 Mulong'a niji nanyichima yiyeji; aha nakeng'i kufumahu niyi nakashakami naKlistu, jichi chaswezha nankashi kuwaha;
51001024 kwinza kushakama mumuzhimba nakuyikwashang'a enu chabajika kulema.
51001025 Neluki chikupu nami nukushakamang'a, eng'a, nukwikala nenu wezhima wenu, kulonja muyang'a kumbiji namuzang'alu muchikuhwelelu;
51001026 kulonja chimwakanmona hinakenza cheng'i kujenu, mwakaswezhi kujisama muji Klistu Yesu.

51001027 Ching'a mushakamang'a mwatelela nsang'u yayiwahi yaKlistu; kulonja hela neyi nakenza nakuyimona, hela neyi nakashakama kwacheng'i, nakatiyi chimwashakamang'a, chimunemani mbe namuchima wenu wumu, nakutong'ozhoka mwomumu, nakuswezha kulwishila hamu chikuhwelelu chansang'u yayiwahi;
51001028 nakubula kutiya woma wawantu akuyilekesha. Kuji wenawa hichuma chakwiluka nachu chamba kazhilumukawu; ilang'a kujenu hichuma chakwiluka nachu wamwinu wakuji Nzambi.
51001029 Mulong'a anayitezhi hansang'u yaKlistu, bayi kukumina jakumukuhwelela hohuku, ching'a nikumumwena ihung'u nawa.
51001030 Mulong'a mwalwishang'a kulwisha kumwamweni mujami, nihanu mwatiyang'a nawu kuji kwoku.
51002001 jichi neyi muji Klistu muji kukunjezha, neyi muji kujikwasha kwakukeng'a, neyi muji kukunjang'ana kwaSpilitu, neyi muji kujikunja niwushona,
51002002 wanishenu muzang'alu wami; mutong'ozhokang'a mwomumu, mwikali nakukeng'a kwokumu, mwikali namuchima wowumu niyitong'ozhoka yoyimu.
51002003 Bayi mwila chuma chakuzung'a hela chakujinka wantaku; ching'a mutong'ozhokang'a yakujizoza, iwu atong'ozhoki mukwawu, ninji wambajikami kuwaha.
51002004 Bayi muntu atong'ozhokang'a nsang'u yinji hohuku, ching'a nsang'u zhawakwawu nawa.
51002005 Yitong'ozhoka yajing'i muji Klistu Yesu yiikali nimujenu nawa.
51002006 Yena wekala mwomwekalilayi Nzambi, watong'ozhokeli ninji kubwambuka naNzambi hichuma chakukakelaku,
51002007 ilang'a wajilishili kwikala wakaji kulema, hakwikala mwekalila njung'u, hakwikala chajuwu antu.
51002008 Chamumwenuwu himuntu, hakujizoza, hakwovwahilang'a ho-o, njo-o nikukufwa, eng'a kwokufwa kwahakulusu.
51002009 jichi Nzambi nawa namutúmbakeshi chakubajika, namwinki izhina jabajika mazhina ezhima;
51002010 kulonja mwizhina jaYesu manung'u ezhima akafukami, niamwiwulu, niahamaseki, niamwishina jamaseki;
51002011 nimajimi ezhima aketezhi nawu Yesu Klistu jiyi Mwanta, kulonja kulemesha Nzambi Tata.

51002012 jichi enu akwetu nakeng'a, chimwovwahilang'a mafuku ezhima, kalakalenu mumwekeshi wamwinu wenwenu aweni nawoma nakuzaala, bayi hinashakamang'a nanenu hohuku, ching'a muswezhi nihanu hiniji kwacheng'i.
51002013 Mulong'a Nzambi jiyi wakong'ang'a mujenu nimuchima wakukeng'a kwila, nikwila kwakweni, mwakutiyayi yena kuwaha.
51002014 Ilenung'a yuma yezhima chakaji kunyinyita hela kufwila ntaji;

51002015 kulonja mwikali akaji hakuyinkela mulong'a, alala, anyana kaNzambi akaji hataminawu, mukachi kawantu amakonu aheng'a achinchika. Mukachi kawu mwatong'ekang'a neyi manong'u mumpata yamunu mwishina,
51002016 nakukwata izu jawumi kwiwulu; kulonja nakajisami mwifuku jaKlistu nami hinatemukili chamukunkuluku, hela kukabakana hinakabakeni chamukunkuluku.
51002017 Eng'a, hela akunhung'unwina hachimuna chakukuhwelela kwenu chimwamuketwilang'a Nzambi, neyi himulambu wakuhung'ununa, nukutiya kuwaha nakuzang'alala hamu nanenu ezhima.
51002018 Mwomumu ninenu mukutiya kuwaha nakuzang'alala hamu nanami nawa.
51002019 Nakuhweleli muji Mwanta Yesu nami niyitemesheli Timotewu mafuku anu, kulonja nitiyi kuwaha chinukwiluka chimwashakama.
51002020 Mulong'a nabuli mukwawu wuji neyi yena wukwakama chalala chimwashakama.
51002021 Mulong'a ezhima ajikeng'elang'a yawu hohu, hiyakeng'a nsang'u yaYesu Klistuku.
51002022 Mweluka jehi chanajimwekeshiyi yena, chanakalakaliyi hamu nanami neyi mwana natata yinji, nakutwala nsang'u yayiwahi kumbiji.
51002023 jichi nukukeng'a kumutemesha neyi neluki jehi chakang'ilawu.
51002024 Ilang'a nakuhweleli muji Mwanta, nami ami aweni nakenza mafuku anu.
51002025 Natong'ozhoki nami chachiwahi niyifuntishili manakwami Epafwajitu, mukwetu nakalakalang'a ninji, ishijika nami, ntemesha yenu, waleteli yuma yakunkwasha hinabulili.
51002026 Mulong'a yena wafwilang'a kuyimona wezhima wenu, watiyili kumuchima bwi-i nansang'u yimwatiyili nawu wakata.

51002027 Chalala yena wajing'i wakata, kwasheli hanti nakufwa; ilang'a Nzambi wamutiyilili luwi; hatiyilili luwi yena hohuku, ilang'a ninami nawa, kulonja kubuli kulunzhika kuneng'a hakuneng'a kwakusambila.
51002028 jichi najihinji kumufuntisha, kulonja chimwakamumona cheng'i mwakatiyi kuwaha nankashi, kuneng'a kwami kwakakehi.
51002029 jichi mutambulenu muji Mwanta nakuzang'alala kwakweni; yilemeshenu antu ajochu;
51002030 mulong'a wakeng'eli kufwa kukoola mujimu waKlistu; haakamini kufwaku, kulonja awanishi nyijimu yimwakang'enyi kung'ilila.
51003001 Nkumininaku, enu anakwami, zang'alalenu muji Mwanta. Kuhitamu nawa cheng'i ami hinamoni kukalaku, hakwila enu chakuyihemba nachu.
51003002 Babelenu atuwa, babelenu niakwakukong'a chatama, babelenu niakwakujiketula.
51003003 Mulong'a etu yetu akwakwalama twajifukulang'a naSpilitu waNzambi, twajisamang'a muji Klistu Yesu; hitwakuhwelelang'a chisemwa chahesekuku.
51003004 Kutong'a ami aweni nikweti hakukuhwelela chisemwa. Neyi kuji muntu mukwawu natong'ozhoki ninji natweshi kukuhwelela chisemwa, ami namubajiki.
51003005 Ang'alamishili ifuku jamuchitanu nachisatu; nikaIsalela wakumuchiji waBenzhamini; nikaHebelu kakeni chikupu.
51003006 Hansang'u yanshimbi nikaFwalisewu; hansang'u yeyena jamuchima nakabishili chipompelu; hansang'u yakulong'a kwekala munshimbi nabulili hakunyinkela mulong'a.
51003007 Ilang'a yumoyu yajing'i yakunhetesha, nayifuukuli nami yakuzhimbang'esha hohu haji Klistu.

51003008 Mwamweni, nafuukulang'a yuma yezhima nami yakuzhimbang'esha hohu, nanochu chaswezha kuwaha kumwiluka Klistu Yesu, Mwanta wami. Haji yena nazhimbang'eshi yuma yezhima, ninochu nayifuukulang'a nami hiwuzonju hohu, kulonja niheti Klistu,
51003009 akanwani niji muji yena, bayi nakulong'a kwamami aweni kwakunshimbuku, ilang'a nakulong'a kwenzang'a kukukuhwelela kwakumukuhwelela Klistu, kulong'a kwaNzambi kwenzang'a kukukuhwelela.
51003010 Nakeng'i kumwiluka yena, ning'ovu yakusang'uka kwinji kwamuji afu, nikukunjang'ana ninji mumakabi inji, nijifwanang'a ninji mukufwa kwinji;
51003011 hajaha nakatwesha kushika kukusang'uka kwamuji afu.
51003012 Hineli nami natambuli jehi, hela nami neli jehi muntu walala chikupuku; ilang'a najikwatishang'a nami hajaha nakakwata hachumochu chankwatililuwu kuji Klistu Yesu.
51003013 Enu anakwetu, hinatong'ozhoki nami nakwatuhu jehuku; ilang'a nelang'a chuma chimu hohu, nalalamenang'a yuma yamunyima, nafwilang'a nami nakashiki kuyuma yakumbiji.
51003014 Najikwatishang'a nankashi, nakukabila nami nakashiki kumufunja, akansomoni kutambika kwaNzambi kwamuji Klistu Yesu kwamwiwulu.
51003015 jichi jinu, etu twakula jehi, tutong'ozhokenu mwenimu. Neyi hansang'u yimu mukutong'ozhoka mwacheng'i, hela nsang'u oyu Nzambi wukuyilezhamu.
51003016 Ilang'a tukakelenu kwenja mutunashiki jehi.
51003017 Enu anakwetu jibombenu wezhima wenu nakung'imbuzhola; shinshikenu antu akwenja neyi etu, nanichi chituji akutalilahu enu.
51003018 Mulong'a nayilezha jehi kakavulu, nukuyilezhamu cheng'i namajilu, nami antu amavulu enjang'a neyi ayilumbu zhakulusu yaKlistu.
51003019 Kukumisha kwawu yowu kuzhilumuka; nzambi yawu jojivumu jawu; ajisamang'a nayuma yansonyi hohu, atong'ozhokang'a yuma yahanu hamaseki.
51003020 Kwinza etu wenimbu wetu wuji mwiwulu, mwomutwatalilang'a Chamwinu, yowu Mwanta Yesu Klistu;
51003021 wakabalumuna nyizhimbiyi yakusawuka kwetu yakesekani namuzhimba winji walubanzhi lwakulema, mwomwakong'ang'a ng'ovu zhinji zhakujovwahishila yuma yezhima.
51004001 Jichi enu anakwami nakeng'a, nafwilang'a kuyimona, yenu muzang'alu wami, yenu chibaaba chami, imanenu chakola mbe muji Mwanta, enu akwetu nakeng'a.
51004002 Nalembeleli Eyojiya, nalembeleli niSintiki, nami ekali nayitong'ozhoka yimu muji Mwanta.

51004003 Eyi nawa nkwashi yami, twekala neyi mumpanja yimu, nami yikwashuku owu ambanja mulong'a akabakeni nanami munsang'u yayiwahi; niKelementa nawa, niakwetu amakwawu akwakukalakala nanami, mazhinawu aji mumukanja wawumi.
51004004 Zang'alalenu muji Mwanta mafuku ezhima. Nukwila cheng'i nami zang'alalenu.
51004005 Mwekeshenu kwovwaha kwenu kuji antu ezhima. Mwanta wuji hahehi.
51004006 Bayi mwakama chumaku; ilang'a mulezhenu Nzambi yuma yezhima yimunakeng'i nakulombela, nakulembelela, nakusakilila.
51004007 Kuwunja kwaNzambi kwabajika maana ezhima kwakahemba nyichima yenu niyitong'ozhoka yenu muji Klistu Yesu.

51004008 Nkumininaku, enu anakwetu, tong'ozhokenu yuma yalala yezhima, yalema yezhima, yalong'a yezhima, yitooka yezhima, yaswezha kuwaha yezhima, yampuhu yayiwahi yezhima. Neyi kuji kashinshi kakeni, neyi kuji yahamekang'awu, tong'ozhokenung'a yumoyu.
51004009 Yuma yimwajizili, yimwatambwili, yimwatiyili yimwamweni mujami, ilenung'a yumoyu, niNzambi wakuwunja wukwikala nanenu.
51004010 Ilang'a nazang'alali nankashi muji Mwanta, nanochu chimunatachiki cheng'i kuntong'a hanahiti jehi mpinzhi; chalala mwantong'eluhu, ilang'a himwamweni hakwililaku.
51004011 Hinateni nsang'u yakubula yumaku; mulong'a najizi jehi kutiya kuwaha munekalila mwezhima.
51004012 Neluki kusawuka hela kwikala nayuma yayivulu. Munsang'u zhezhima anlezha jehi maana akwikuta hela akwikala nanzala; najizi kwikala nayuma yayivulu hela kuyibula.
51004013 Natweshi kwila yuma yezhima muji Klistu wankoleshang'a.
51004014 Hela chochu, muneli chachiwahi chimunankwashi mulukaji lwami.

51004015 Chinafumini kuMasijoniya, hatachikili nsang'u yayiwahi, enu akwaFwilipi mweluka nawa nenu hikwajing'i chipompelu chikwawu chatiyang'eni nanami munsang'u yakwinka nakutambulaku, ching'a yenu hohu.
51004016 Mulong'a hela chinajing'i muTesalonika, mwatemesheli yamukunkulu yakunkwasha hinabulili, hikamu hohuku.
51004017 Hinashi muchima hakunyinka chumaku, ilang'a nakeng'i nyikabu yenu yiyivulilang'a.

51004018 Nekala nayuma yezhima, yanvulila jehi; natiyi jehi kuwaha chinatambuli kuji Epafwajitu yuma yimwantemesheleli, hiivumba jajiwahi, chiji neyi chimuna chakuketula, chatela kutambula, chakumutiyisha Nzambi kuwaha.
51004019 Ilang'a Nzambi yami wakayinka yuma yimunabuli yezhima, mwashikila mahetinji alubanzhi lwakulema ekala muji Klistu Yesu.
51004020 Lubanzhi lwakulema lwikali kuji Nzambi yetu, yowu Tata, hayanyaka nanyaka. Amena.
51004021 Yimushi akwakuzhila ezhima ekala muji Klistu Yesu. Anakwetu iniji nawu anayimushi.
51004022 Akwakuzhila ezhima anayimushi, anabajiki kuyimusha akwetala jaKesali.
51004023 Luwi lwaMwanta Yesu Klistu lwikali naspilitu yenu.
52001001 Ami Pawulu, kapostolu kaKlistu Yesu mwaya muchima waNzambi, nimanakwetu Timotewu,
52001002 tuji nakuyisonekela mukanja, enu akwakuzhila, nianakwetu ashinshika amuji Klistu, ekala kuKolosi. Luwi lwikali nanenu nikuwunja kwakufuma kuji Nzambi Tata yetu.
52001003 Chitwayilombelelang'a mafuku ezhima, twamusakililang'a Nzambi, Tata yaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu,
52001004 nanochu chitwatiyili nsang'u yakukuhwelela kwenu kumwamukuhwelelang'a Klistu Yesu, nikukeng'a kwenu kumwakeng'ang'a nachu akwakuzhila ezhima;
52001005 nanochu chimukweti kuching'ezha kwanayiswekeluwu mumawulu. Kuching'ezhoku mwachitiyili jehi kwizu jawalala wansang'u yayiwahi;

52001006 yinashiki kujenu neyi chiyinashiki mumpata yamunu mwishina mwezhima, hiyikusong'a nyikabu, yiji nakutwalekahu nakuvula. jichi chineli nimujenu nawa, kufumisha kwifuku jimwatiyili himukwiluka nsang'u yaluwi lwaNzambi chalala;
52001007 mwomwayilezheluwu kuji mukwetu njung'u netu Epafwalasa twakeng'a, yena washinshika, himukwakukalakela Klistu, watukalakelang'a ninetu nawa.
52001008 Yena watulezheli nsang'u yakukeng'a kwenu kwamuji Spilitu Wazhila.

52001009 jichi jinu ninetu nawa, kufumisha kwifuku jitwachitiyili hitwalekang'a kuyilombelelaku. Tunakeng'i netu, mwinzali nakwiluka kwalala kwakwiluka mwakeng'ayi Nzambi, namaana ezhima ninakashinshi kaSpilitu;
52001010 kulonja mwenji nakumutelela Mwanta, nakumutiyisha kuwaha kwakweni, nakusong'a nyikabu munyijimu yayiwahi yezhima, nakukula mukumwiluka Nzambi.
52001011 Ayikoleshi nang'ovu zhezhima mwaya ng'ovu zhalubanzhi lwakulema kwinji, kulonja muswezhi kutatakena nakujung'umika namuzang'alu;
52001012 nakumusakilila Tata natwilishi atela kutambula iseka jawuswana wawakwakuzhila muchezhezhi.
52001013 Yena natupulwishi muwanta wamwijima, natutuntululi twing'ili muchiyuulu chaMwaninji akeng'ayi.
52001014 Muji yena tukweti kutukuula, yowu kutwanakena nshiji zhetu.
52001015 jiyi chimfwana chaNzambi wakámonewang'a; jiyi weji wayuma yaleng'eluwu yezhima.

52001016 Mulong'a muji yena jimu mwaleng'eleluwu yuma yezhima, niyamumawulu niyahamaseki; niyuma yamonewang'a, niyuma yakámonewang'a; hela matanja awanta, hela mawanta antúmba, hela akwakuyuula, hela akwang'ovu. Yuma yezhima ayileng'eleli muji yena; jiyi aleng'eleleluwu yuma yezhima.
52001017 Yena jiyi wakusambila, hajing'i yuma yezhima yichiji kanja; muji yena jimu mwakolela yuma yezhima.
52001018 Yena jiyi mutu wamuzhimba yowu chipompelu; jiyi tachi, jiyi weji wamuji afu, kulonja akekali wabajika, yuma yezhima yikuminumu.
52001019 Nzambi watiyili kuwaha nankashi kwinzala kwinji kwezhima kushakama muji Mwaninji;
52001020 kulonja akakunjamishi yuma yezhima kuji yomweni nayena; eng'a, akakunjamishi hela yuma yahamaseki, hela yuma yamumawulu, nanichi chaneliyi mujimu wakuwunjisha namashi akukulusu yinji.
52001021 Ninenu hamwaka mwajing'i aambuka naNzambi, mwajing'i ayilumbu munyichima yenu, munyijimu yenu yatama.
52001022 Ilang'a katataka nayikunjamishi jehi mumuzhimba winji waheseki nakufwa kwinji, kulonja akayimiki kumesu inji nakuzhila, nakubula himwatamina, hela hakuyinkela nyilong'a.

52001023 Chochenochu neyi mukushakama mukwitiya kwakukuhwelela nakushimata, nakukakela mbe, nakubula kufuma mukuching'ezha kwekala munsang'u yayiwahi yimwatiyili, yanashimunuwu mwahita kuleng'a kwezhima kwekala mwishina jewulu. jichi ankunzhikili ami Pawulu kwikala mukwakukalakela nsang'u yeniyi.
52001024 Hinukuzang'alala jinu namakabi inakabang'a hansang'u yenu; nawanishang'a mumuzhimba wami lukaji lwaKlistu lwasheli hansang'u yamuzhimba winji, yowu chipompelu.
52001025 Chochipompelu chananyinkuwu mujimu wakuchikalakela, mwomwankunzhikililiyi Nzambi kujenu, kulonja niwanishi izu jaNzambi;
52001026 chochizhinjilu chazhinjiluwu yisaka yezhima mwahita nyaka yezhima, hakwinza katataka anayimwekesheli antu inji azhila.
52001027 Nzambi watiyili kuwaha kuyilezha wena chekala maheta alubanzhi lwakulema achizhinjilu ichi mukachi kawazhentili, yowu Klistu wuji mujenu, jiyi lubanzhi lwakulema kwaching'ezhang'awu.
52001028 jiyi twashimunang'a etu, nakukonkomwena antu ezhima, nikutang'isha antu ezhima namaana ezhima, kulonja twakashikizhi antu ezhima ela jehi alala chikupu muji Klistu.
52001029 jiyi nsang'u yinakabakenang'a nikulwisha mwomwaya kukong'a kwinji kwakong'ang'a mujami nang'ovu yayeni.
52002001 Mulong'a nakeng'i nami mwiluki chinaswezhang'a kuyilwishila enu ninawa aji kuLayojikeya, niakwetu ezhima anabuli kunmona mesu namesu;
52002002 kulonja ayikunjezhi munyichima yawu, anung'ang'ani mukukeng'a, amoni maheta ezhima akwiluka chalala chikupu mwalumbulukila chizhinjilu chaNzambi, yowu Klistu.
52002003 Muji yena jimu mwanaswekeluwu maheta ezhima amaana nakashinshi.
52002004 Chinukuhosha mwenimu nalonji nami abuli kuyiluwang'esha namazu akujimbeka.
52002005 Hela nabuli kwikala nenu mumuzhimba, ilang'a niji nenu muspilitu, nakuzang'alala chinatalang'a kwoloka kwenu, nichakola kukuhwelela kwenu kwamuji Klistu.
52002006 jichi jinu mwomu mwatambwilili Klistu Yesu, Mwanta, enjelenung'a muji yena mwomwenomu,
52002007 nakushimata nakutung'ewa muji yena, nakukola muchikuhwelelu mwayilezheluwu, nakuswezha kusakilila.
52002008 Babalenu hakenja kamwekana muntu wukuyipuupa namaaninji namakasu amukunkulwayi, mwaya yaaku yawantu, mwaya yuma yampata yamunu mwishina yakuhemesha, hijimu mwaya Klistuku.
52002009 Mulong'a muji Klistu, kwinzala kwawuNzambi wezhima kwashakamang'a mumuzhimba winji.
52002010 Muji yena jimu mwanayiwanishuwu, jiyi wekala wahewulu jawakwakuyuula nawakwawanta ezhima.
52002011 Muji yena nawa ayalamishili bayi nakwalama kwakwila namakasaku, ching'a nakuvuula muzhimba wachisemwa chaheseki nakwalama kwaKlistu.
52002012 Ayizhiikili chimu ninji muchizhimikilu, ayisang'wili chimu ninji nakukuhwelela mujimu wakong'eliyi Nzambi chamusang'wiliyi Klistu muji afu.
52002013 Ninenu mwájing'i afwa nanyilong'a yenu nakubula kwalama kunyizhimba yenu, enu ayihanjishili chimu naKlistu, hakutwanakena nyilong'a yetu yezhima.
52002014 Wazhimang'esheli mukanja wayizhila watusonekeleluwu, wajing'i wakutwinka nachu nyilong'a; hakuwufumisha nakuwupopela hakulusu yinji.
52002015 Wafung'unwini akwakuyuula niakwawanta, hakuyitiyisha nsonyi hatooka, hakuyimika mushinju nakulusu yinji.
52002016 Neyi kuji muntu wukukeng'a kuyisompesha hansang'u yakujya hela yakunwa, hela yefuku jachawizha hela yakwaluka kakwezhi, hela yaSabata, bayi mumwitezhaku.
52002017 Yumoyu himwevulu wayuma yakenza, ilang'a yuma yayeni yambala yaKlistu.

52002018 Neyi kuji muntu wukukeng'a kuyiya yuma yakukeng'a kuyisomwenawu, nanochu chajizozang'ayi, chajifukulang'ayi kuji ang'elu, bayi mumwitezhaku. Himuntu nakuhweleli yuma yanamoniyi, najinki tuhu wanta wayitong'ozhoka yinji yachisemwa chaheseki.
52002019 Wajambulang'a naMutu kwanung'ang'ena muzhimba wezhima, awujiishang'a nakuwunung'a namanung'i nanyizhila, nakuwukulisha kuji Nzambi.
52002020 Neyi mwafwili chimu naKlistu, nakwambuka kuyuma yakuhemesha yamunu mwishina, mulong'anyi mukwovwahila yizhila neyi kwizhi muyantu ampata yamunu mwishina?
52002021 Himukwovwahila yizhila yakwila nawu, Chinzhila kukwata; chinzhila kutompa; chinzhila kukunka;
52002022 mwaya yizhila nakulezha kwawantu. Yuma yezhimiyi chakuyilawu keng'a yinong'i kwayu.
52002023 Yumiyi yamwekanang'a neyi yikweti maana akuwahisha kujifukula, nakujizoza nakukabisha muzhimba; ilang'a hiyikweti ng'ovu yakulekesha yafwilang'a chisemwa chahesekuku.
52003001 Neyi ayisang'wili chimu naKlistu, keng'enu yuma yekala mwiwulu, mwekalayi Klistu nashakami kuchikasa chaNzambi chachijiilu.
52003002 Tong'ozhokenu yuma yamwiwulu, bayi yahamasekuku.
52003003 Mulong'a mwafwa jehi, niwumi wenu anawusweki naKlistu muji Nzambi.
