52003004 Chakamwekeshawu wumi wetu, jiyi Klistu, enu nawa akayimwekesha chimu ninji mulubanzhi lwakulema.
52003005 jichi zhahenu yiji yenu yiji hamaseki, wuzhila, wuzonju wamumuchima, kufwila kwila yuma yatama, kuswezha kukeng'a yatama, nilwisu chochimu nakupesha.
52003006 Hansang'u iyi jihu henzhilang'a kuzuwa kwaNzambi kwakuzuwila akwakuzhikwa.
52003007 Enu nawa jimu mumwenjeleli hamwaka chimwashakamini nakwila yumiyi.
52003008 Ilang'ichi fumishenu yuma yezhimiyi; kuzuwa, ninjombu, ninkunyi, nikutukana; lekenu kuhosha yuma yikweti nsonyi.
52003009 Bayi muhosha yakutwamba muntu namukwawuku, mulong'a munavuuli jehi muntu wamukulu nimwelang'ayi;
52003010 munavwali jehi muntu wamwiha, wayang'a nakubalumuka wamwiha nakwiluka chalala, kulonja afwani neyi wamuleng'eli.

52003011 Mwenomu himwekala kaGliki nakaYujeya, hela kwalama nakubula kwalamaku. Himwekala hela mukwetung'a jacheng'i, hela muchiji waSikita, hela njung'u hela mwanaku, ilang'a Klistu jiyi hohu kankawinji chikupu mwezhima.
52003012 Ochu chimuji antu aNzambi atonjewa, azhila, akeng'ewa, vwalenu muchima wawushona, niluwi, nikujizoza, nikwovwaha mumuchima, nikujung'umika;
52003013 nakujovwahila nikujanakena muntu namukwawu. Neyi kuji muntu wukweti mulong'a namukwawu amwanakeni. Neyi chayanakenenuwu enu kuji Mwanta, ninenu nawa ilenu chochimu.
52003014 Hayuma yezhimiyi alunzhikuhu kukeng'a jiku kwaswezha kunung'a antu hamu.
52003015 Itezhenu kuwunja kwaKlistu kuyuuli munyichima yenu, jichi chayitambikililuwu mumuzhimba wumu; ikalenu akwakusakilila nawa.

52003016 Itezhenu izu jaKlistu jilumbami mujenu namaana ezhima; mujitang'ishang'a, mujikonkomwenang'a muntu namukwawu namasamu, natumina, nitumina twawuspilitu, nakumwimbila Nzambi nakulung'a munyichima yenu.
52003017 Hela mukuhosha hela mukukalakala, ilenu yuma yezhima mwizhina jaMwanta Yesu, nakusakilila Nzambi Tata mwizhina jinji.
52003018 Enu ambanja, ovwahilenu amfumuzhenu, jichi chinateli muji Mwanta.
52003019 Enu amayala, keng'enu ang'ojizhenu, bayi muyitalumokelaku.
52003020 Enu anyana, ovwahilenu anvwali zhenu muyuma yezhima, mulong'a jichi chuma chamutiyishang'a Mwanta kuwaha.
52003021 Enu atata, bayi muvuloka anyanenuku, akenja kamona kukala.
52003022 Enu anjung'u, ovwahilenu anyanta zhenu ahanu hamaseki muyuma yezhima; bayi chakumesu hohu neyi chakutiyisha antu kuwahaku, ching'a namuchima wumu hohu, nanochu chimwamutiyang'a Mwanta woma.
52003023 Yuma yezhima yimukwila yilenu namuchima wakukalakela Mwanta, bayi chakukalakela antu hohuku;
52003024 nakwiluka nenu mwakatambula wuswana wakuyisomwena kuji Mwanta, mulong'a mwakalakelang'a Mwanta Klistu.
52003025 Mulong'a muntu wukwila chatama wakatambwilamu cheng'i chatama cheliliyi; hikwekala kwakama antu kumesuku.
52004001 Enu anyanta, shakamenu nawanjung'u zhenu mwalong'a mwesekana, nanichi chimuneluki nenu enu nawa mukweti Mwanta mwiwulu.
52004002 Kakelenu mbe nakulombela, mutonenumu nakusakilila.
52004003 Chimukulombelang'a mutulombelelang'aku ninetu nawa, kulonja Nzambi atwenzulwili chenzelu chakwing'ila nansang'u, tushimuni chizhinjilu chaKlistu chankasilawu munyonzhi,
52004004 nichimwekeshi muchatelela.
52004005 Enjenung'a namaana kumesu awantu aji hanzi, nakukwatila mafuku maana.
52004006 Kuhosha kwenu kwikali kwakavumbi, kwakutowesha namung'wa mafuku ezhima, kulonja mwiluki mwakwakwila antu ezhima.
52004007 Manakwetu Tikikusa twákeng'a, mukwakukalakala washinshika, mukwetu njung'u netu muji Mwanta, wakayilezha nsang'u zhami zhezhima.
52004008 Ami namutemeshi kujenu hansang'u yoyeniyi, kulonja mwakeluki chitwashakama, akakunjezhi nyichima yenu.
52004009 Namutemeshi hamu namwinenu Onesimusa, manakwetu washinshika twakeng'a. Wena akayilezha nsang'u zhakunu zhezhima.
52004010 Alisitaka twekala ninji mukaleya, nayimushi; niMaku musonyaBalanaba; anayilezhi chimwakamwila, neyi wakashika kujenu mwakamutambuli; niYesu atenang'awu izhina jikwawu nawu Yusitu nayimushi.
52004011 jiwu akwakwalama akalakalang'a hamu nanami mujimu wawanta waNzambi wowenawa hohu, jiwu amayala ankunjezhang'a.

52004012 Mwinenu Epafwalasa, njung'u yaKlistu Yesu, nayimushi; wayilwishilang'a mukulombela kwinji mafuku ezhima, ninji mwimani mbe mwikali antu alala chikupu, mwiluki chikupu mwanakeng'iyi Nzambi mwezhima.
52004013 Mulong'a ami namushimuni wunsahu nami wayikabakenang'a ninenu niwena aji kuLayojikeya nikuHelapoli.
52004014 Ing'ang'a Luka twákeng'a, nijemasi, anayimushi.
52004015 Imushenu anakwetu aji muLayojikeya; imushenu niNyamfwasa nichipompelu chekala mwitala jinji.
52004016 Neyi iwu mukanja munawutang'i jehi, wutemeshenu kuchipompelu chawaLayojikeya akawutang'i nawa; ninenu nawa mwakatang'i mukanja wakafuma kuLayojikeya.
52004017 Mwakamwili Akipusa nenu, Shaku muchima kumujimu wuwunatambuli muji Mwanta, wuwukalakali chalala.
52004018 Ami Pawulu nasoneki kwimushiku nachikasa chamami aweni. Anukenu nyonzhi yami. Luwi lwikali nanenu.
53001001 Etu aPawulu naSilasi niTimotewu, tuji nakuyisonekela mukanja, enu akwachipompelu chakuTesalonika chekala muji Nzambi Tata, niMwanta Yesu Klistu. Luwi lwikali nanenu nikuwunja.
53001002 Twamusakililang'a Nzambi mafuku ezhima hajenu wezhima wenu, nakuyitena mukulombela kwetu.
53001003 Twenja twanuka mujimu wenu wakukuhwelela kumesu aNzambi, yowu Tata yetu, nikukabakana kwenu kwakukeng'a, nikutatakena kwenu kwenzang'a kukuching'ezha kwekala muji Mwanta wetu Yesu Klistu.
53001004 Enu anakwetu ayikeng'a kuji Nzambi, tuneluki kutonja kwayitonjeluwu.

53001005 Hashikili nsang'u yayiwahi kujenu yitwashimwinetu, hiyajing'i yamazu tuhuku, ilang'a yajing'i nimung'ovu nawa, nimuji Spilitu Wazhila, nimwalumbuluka chikupu. Mulong'a muneluki chitwashakamini mukachi kenu chitwajing'i nenu.
53001006 Ninenu mwelili akwakutwimbuzhola etu niMwanta, chimwatambwili izu jaNzambi mulukaji lwalweni, namuzang'alu waSpilitu Wazhila.
53001007 Himukwikala antu akutalilahu akwakukuhwelela amuMasijoniya nimuAkaya ezhima.
53001008 Mulong'a enu mwatiyakesheli izu jaMwanta, bayi muMasijoniya nimuAkaya hohuku, ilang'a kukuhwelela kwenu kumwamukuhwelela Nzambi kunatiyakani kwezhima; ochu hichikweti etu kuhosha mwoku.
53001009 Mulong'a awenawu ashimunang'a nichitwashikili kujenu, nichimwabalumukili nakutala kuji Nzambi nakuleka ankishi, kulonja mukalakeli Nzambi wamumi walala;
53001010 mutalilang'a Mwaninji asang'wiliyi muji afu, wakafuma mwiwulu, jiyi Yesu mukwakutupulwisha kukuzuwa kwamba kenza.
53002001 Enu anakwetu, enu muneluki chitwashakamini mukachi kenu hichajing'i chakuhemeshaku.
53002002 Ilang'a muneluki jehi nenu helili twakaba jehi nakutwila chatama kuFwilipi, hitukuumika muji Nzambi yetu nakuyishimwinenu nsang'u yayiwahi yaNzambi, iku nikumona makabi amavulu.
53002003 Mulong'a kukonkomwena kwetu hikunafumi kukuluwa, hela kukuzonja mumuchima, hela kumakasuku.

53002004 Ilang'a chanatwitezhuwu kuji Nzambi nakutukunzhika kumujimu wakushimuna nsang'u yayiwahi, hitwahoshang'a chakutiyisha antu kuwahaku, ching'a kutiyisha Nzambi kuwaha, yenowu washinshikang'a nyichima yetu.
53002005 Mulong'a enu muneluki nenu hiyatutiyili nakuhosha mazu akulambishaku; hitwajing'i nalwisu lwayuma yenu munyichima yetuku; Nzambi jiyi chinsahu.
53002006 Hitwakeng'eli kutulemesha kuji antu, hela kujenu hela kuji antu acheng'uku; neyi twakeng'eli ochu, mutenowu twatwesheli kutambula yuma kujenu, nanichi chituji apostolu zhaKlistu.
53002007 Ilang'a twajing'i amwovu mukachi kenu, neyi chalelang'ayi mumbanja anyaninji yomweni.
53002008 Chitwaswezheli kuyikunja, hitwakuminini jakutiya kuwaha kuyishimwina nsang'u yayiwahi hohuku, ilang'a twatiyili kuwaha kuyinka niwumi wetwetu aweni nawa, mulong'a twaswezheli kuyikeng'a.
53002009 Enu anakwetu, munaanuki chitwakabakeni nakukalakala niwufuku nimwaana kulonja tubuli kutambula yuma kujenu, iku tuji nakuyishimwina nsang'u yayiwahi yaNzambi.
53002010 Enu aweni muji ayinsahu, niNzambi nawa hichinsahu, chitwayililang'a enu akwetu mwakuhwelela, chitwajing'i azhila, along'a akaji hakutwinkela mulong'a.
53002011 Muneluki wezhima wenu chitwayikonkomweneni, nakuyikunjezha, nakuyilembelela, neyi chelang'ayi tata nawanyaninji;
53002012 kulonja mwenji nakumutelela Nzambi, wayitambikili kwing'ila muwanta winji yomweni nimulubanzhi lwakulema kwinji.

53002013 Hitwalekang'a kumusakilila Nzambuku, nanochu chimwatambwili kujetu izu jaNzambi, himwajitambwili neyi izu jawantuku, ilang'a chochijekala izu jaNzambi chalala, jojizu jakong'ang'a mujenu mwakuhwelela.

53002014 Mulong'a enu anakwetu, mwajing'i neyi yipompelu yaNzambi yamuji Klistu Yesu yekala muYujeya; mulong'a ninenu nawa mwamweni yuma yakala kuji akwenu amwitung'a jenu, neyi chamwenuwu wena kuji aYujeya,
53002015 ázhahili Mwanta Yesu niatuplofwetu, ahang'ili ninetu nawa. Hiyamutiyishang'a Nzambi kuwahaku, aletang'a ntaji nawantu ezhima.
53002016 Atulekeshang'a kuhosha nawazhentili kulonja amwinewi; analonji kuwanisha nshiji zhawu. Ilang'a kuzuwa kwaNzambi kunayishikeni jehi chikupu.
53002017 Enu anakwetu, enu mwajing'i anshona hampinzhi yantesha, chitwaambukili nenu mumuzhimba bayi mumuchimaku; twaswezheli nankashi kuta muchima hakuyimona mesu namesu.
53002018 Twakeng'eli kwinza kujenu, nankashi ami Pawulu, nesekeli kayeji, ilang'a Satana watukang'esheli.
53002019 Inji kuching'ezha kwetu, hela muzang'alu wetu, hela chibaaba chetu chitukujisama nachu, hiyenuku? Eng'a yowenu kumesu aMwanta wetu Yesu hakenzayi.
53002020 Mulong'a enu yenu lubanzhi lwakulema kwetu nimuzang'alu wetu.
53003001 jichi chitwakang'enyi kujitulisha mumuchima, twatong'ozhokeli netu chachiwahi kushala kankawetu kuAtenisi;
53003002 hitukutemesha manakwetu Timotewu, himukwakukalakela Nzambi munsang'u yayiwahi yaKlistu, netu ayikoleshi nakuyikunjezha munsang'u zhakukuhwelela kwenu,
53003003 kulonja kubuli muntu wukutiya kutama nanochu chakumukabishawu. Muneluki mwenomu jimu mwatufuukwililuwu.
53003004 Mulong'a chalala chitwajing'i nenu, twayilezhelang'ahu jehi netu akutukabishang'a; jichi chinamwekani jehi ninenu munelukumu.

53003005 jichi ami, chinakang'enyi kujitulisha mumuchima, hinukutemesha Timotewu, kulonja nakeluki munekali kukuhwelela kwenu; nami hajaha anayiteshi jehi kuji mukwakutesha, nikukabakana kwetu kuneli jehi kwamukunkulwayi.

53003006 Ilang'a chanafumiyi Timotewu kujenu, ashiki kujetu nakutuletela nsang'u yakulung'a yakukuhwelela kwenu nakukeng'a kwenu, ninji mwatwanukang'a chachiwahi mafuku ezhima, ninji mwakeng'a nankashi kutumona neyi chitunakeng'i etu nawa kuyimonenu, tutiya nimumuchima nhi-i.
53003007 jichi jinu enu anakwetu, chitwajing'i nakumona kukala nalukaji, tunajikunjezhi jehi hansang'u yenu nakukuhwelela kwenu.
53003008 Mulong'a hiwumi wetu neyi enu mukushimata muji Mwanta.
53003009 Tukutwesha ng'ahi kumusakilila Nzambi namuzang'alu wezhima wutwayizang'alelang'a kumesu aNzambi?
53003010 Twalombelang'a nankashi wufuku nimwaana netu, tuyimoni mesu namesu, netu twakawanishi chinabuli mukukuhwelela kwenu.
53003011 Yomweni Nzambi yetu, yowu Tata, niMwanta wetu Yesu, atulomboli munzhila yetu yakwinza kujenu.
53003012 Mwanta ayivulishili kukeng'ang'ana kwaswezha, nikukeng'a antu ezhima, neyi chitwelang'a etu nawa nanenu;
53003013 kulonja akoleshi nyichima yenu yibuli hakuyinkela mulong'a mukuzhila kumesu aNzambi yetu, yowu Tata, hakenzayi Mwanta wetu Yesu nawantu inji azhila ezhima.
53004001 Nkumininaku enu anakwetu, tunayilembeleli nakuyikonkomwena muji Mwanta Yesu, netu mwenji nakumutiyisha Nzambi kuwaha mumwatiyili kujetu; ninichi jimu mumwenjelang'a, muswezheshumu.
53004002 Mulong'a muneluki chitwayilezheli muji Mwanta Yesu.
53004003 Mulong'a jimu mwanakeng'iyi Nzambi, nakeng'i ninji muzhili, nakubula kwila wuzhila.
53004004 Wezhima wenu mwiluki chachiwahi kuhemba iwu muzhimba winji, iwu muzhimba winji, nakuzhila nakalemesha;
53004005 bayi nakufwila wuzhila neyi azhentili anabuli kumwiluka Nzambuku;
53004006 kulonja kubuli muntu wukumotoka, hela kumwila manakwinji chatama hansang'u iyi; mulong'a Mwanta jiyi mukwakutenja hansang'u izhi zhezhima, mwomutwayilezheli jehi, mutwakolesheli.
53004007 Mulong'a Nzambi hatutambikilili wuzonjuku, watutambikilili kuzhila.
53004008 jichi yowu wukujiwulamu hanajiwuli muntuku, najiwuli Nzambi wayinkang'a Spilitu winji Wazhila.
53004009 Nsang'u yakukeng'a anakwenu, hichikweti kuyisonekelaku; mulong'a ayitang'isha jehi enu aweni kuji Nzambi, ninji keng'ang'anenu.
53004010 Eng'ang'i, chalala mwakeng'ang'a anakwenu ezhima aji muMasijoniya mwezhima. Ilang'a enu anakwetu, hitukuyilembelela netu muswezheshumu.
53004011 Mukeng'i nankashi kushakama nakumwena, nakujowa, nakukalakala namakasa mwomutwayilezheli jehi;
53004012 kulonja mwenji chalumbuluka kumesu awantu aji hanzi, kulonja mubuli kukaankila chuma nichimu.
53004013 Enu anakwetu, hitunakeng'enu kuyamba nsang'u yawakwetu anakami jehi tuluku, kulonja mubuli kutiya wushona, neyi chatiyang'awu antu acheng'i anabuli hakuching'ezhela.
53004014 Chitunakuhweleli netu Yesu wafwili wasang'ukili, jichi nawa niwena anakami tulu muji Yesu, Nzambi wakayileta chimu ninji.
53004015 Mulong'a tukuyilezha nezu jaMwanta, netu etu amomi, tuchiji hanu kushika hakenzayi Mwanta, hiyetu twakasambilang'ahu jehi kuya, akwetu anakami tulu atulonjeli munyimaku.
53004016 Mulong'a yomweni Mwanta wakasuluka kwiwulu nakabobobu, nezu jamukulumpi wawang'elu, nampùng'a yaNzambi; niafu amuji Klistu jiwu akasambila kusang'uka.
53004017 Hohenohu ninetu amomi tuchiji hanu, akatuhukwila chimu nawu mumavu kulonja twakahumang'ani naMwanta muluzwizu; jichi twakekalang'a naMwanta hayanyaka.
53004018 jichi jikunjezhenu namazu awa.
53005001 Enu anakwetu, nsang'u yanyaka nayilaaka hichikweti kuyisonekela chumaku.
53005002 Mulong'a enu aweni muneluki chakashinshi, nenu ifuku jaMwanta jikwinza neyi chenzang'ayi ikombi nawufuku.
53005003 Chakwilawu nawu, Kwamwena, kwanzo-o; hohenohu kuzhilumuka hikwakayikasumwisha, neyi chakasumwishang'awu mumbanja wuji nevumu kuji nyisong'u yakuvwala; hiyakapuluka nihantuku.
53005004 Ilang'a enu anakwetu, himwekala mumwijima, mwaka ifuku oju jakayishintakeshi neyi ikombuku.
53005005 Mulong'a wezhima wenu muji anyana kachezhezhi, muji anyana kamwaana, hituji akwawufuku hela akwamwijimaku.
53005006 jichi jinu, bayi tukamang'a tulu neyi chelang'awu antu acheng'uku, ching'a tutonenu nakubabala.
53005007 Mulong'a antu akamang'a tulu akamang'a nawufuku, niantu ashetang'a, ashetang'a nawufuku.
53005008 Ilang'a etu antu amwaana tubabalenu, tuvwalenu chikung'u chakuzhika hantulu chakukuhwelela nakukeng'a; niitepa jachikung'u jakuching'ezha wamwinu.
53005009 Mulong'a Nzambi hatutonjeli twakamoni kuzuwa kwinjuku, ilang'a ninji twakatambuli wamwinu muji Mwanta Yesu Klistu,
53005010 watufwilili kulonja hela tukutona hela tukukama tulu, twakahanji chimu ninji.
53005011 jichi jikunjezhenu wezhima wenu nakujikolesha wumu namukwawu, mwomumwelang'a.
53005012 Enu anakwetu, tunayilembeleli netu yishinshikenu akalakalang'a mukachi kenu, áyilombolang'a muji Mwanta nakuyifumba.
53005013 Yifuukulenu kulema nankashi mukukeng'a, hansang'u yanyijimu yawu. Shakamenu chawunja mukachi kenu.
53005014 Enu anakwetu, tunayilembeleli netu, konkomwenenu aluwalala, kunjezhenu akweti woma, koleshenu akwakuzeya, kuminenu jakujung'umika nawantu ezhima.
53005015 Bayi hamwekana muntu wukumwila mukwawu chatama nakatama kanamwiliyuku. Fwilenu kwilila akwenu chachiwahi, niantu ezhima mafuku ezhima.
53005016 Zang'alalenu mafuku ezhima.
53005017 Lombelenung'a mpinzhi yezhima.
53005018 Sakililenung'a mwahita yuma yezhima, jichi chuma chanakeng'iyi Nzambi muji Klistu Yesu.
53005019 Bayi muzhima Spilituku.
53005020 Bayi mujiwula wuplofwetuku.
53005021 Shinshikenu yuma yezhima chiyiji, mukakeli yayiwahi.
53005022 Ambukenu kuyuma yatama yeng'i nayeng'i yezhima.
53005023 Yomweni Nzambi wakuwunja ayizhilikang'a chikupu; nispilitu yenu, nimuchima wenu, nimuzhimba wenu ayihembi yamukuma, yiikali yakaji hakuyinkela mulong'a hakenzayi Mwanta wetu Yesu Klistu.
53005024 Yena wayitambika washinshika, jiyi wakelamu nawa.
53005025 Enu anakwetu tulombelelenu.
53005026 Imushenu anakwetu ezhima nachikasa chazhila.
53005027 Nayilezhi muji Mwanta chakola, nami atang'ili anakwetu ezhima mukanjiwu.
53005028 Luwi lwaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu lwikali nanenu.
54001001 Etu aPawulu naSilasi niTimotewu tuji nakuyisonekela mukanja, enu akwachipompelu chakuTesalonika chekala muji Nzambi, Tata yetu, nimuji Mwanta Yesu Klistu.
54001002 Luwi lwikali nanenu nikuwunja kwakufuma kuji Nzambi, yowu Tata, nikuji Mwanta Yesu Klistu.
54001003 Enu anakwetu, tunatiyi kuwaha kusakilila Nzambi hajenu mafuku ezhima; chinateli nankashi, mulong’a kukuhwelela kwenu hikukuya nakukula nankashi, nikukeng’ang’ana kwenu hikukuya nakukula.
54001004 Jichi etu aweni twajisamang’a hansang’u yenwenu muyipompelu yaNzambi, nakutatakena kwenu, nikukuhwelela kwenu kumwakuhwelelang’a mumakabi enu ezhima, nimulukaji lumwamonang’a.
54001005 Jiyi nsang’u yakumwekesha nachu kusompesha kwaNzambi kwalong’a kulonja ayimonang’a kutelela wanta waNzambi wumwamwenang’a yihung’u
54001006 Nzambi namoni ninji chalong’a kukabisha antu ayikabishang’enu;
54001007 ninenu mwamonang’a lukaji akayihing’ishila kunooka hamu nanetu, hakamwekanayi Mwanta Yesu hakafumayi mwiwulu mukesi kakubijima, hamu nawang’elu zhinji ang’ovu,
54001008 nakujitenja haji antu abula kwiluka Nzambi, nihaji antu abula kwovwahila nsang’u yayiwahi yaMwanta wetu Yesu.
54001009 Wena akayibabesha nakuzhilumuka kwahayanyaka kwakufuma kumesu aMwanta, nikulubanzhi lwakulema kwang’ovu zhinji,
54001010 Hakenzayi kulonja akamulemesheli muji antu inji azhila, akamuhayamini muji akwakukuhwelela ezhima hefuku oju; nanochu chimwakuhweleli wunsahu wetu.

54001011 Jihu hanafumi etu kuyilombelela mafuku ezhima, netu Nzambi yetu ayimoni kutelela kutambika kwayitambikililuwu, awanishi nang’ovu yuma yayiwahi yezhima yimukukeng’a kwila, ninyijimu yakukuhwelela;
54001012 kulonja akalemeshi izhina jaMwanta wetu Yesu mujenu, ninenu muji yena, mwaya luwi lwaNzambi yetu nilwaMwanta Yesu Klistu.
54002001 Enu anakwetu, hakutena nsang’u yakwinza kwaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu, nikupompa kwetu kutwakapompa kuji yena chimu,

54002002 Tunalembi netu bayi munyakala kuzhinoka munyichima yenu nakuyakamisha kuji aspilitu akutwamba, hela namazu hela namukanja wuji neyi wunafumi kujetuku, mwakwila nawu ifuku jaMwanta jashika jehi.
54002003 Bayi ayijimba kuji muntuku; mulong’a kusenuka ching’a kusambila kwinza, ninowu mukwakuluwalala asambila kumumwekesha, yowu mwana kakunong’a.
54002004 Yena wakajikang’a nakujitúmbakesha nawezhima atenang’awu nawu hiNzambi, hela yuma yalemeshang’awu; jichi wakashakama muTembeli yaNzambi, nakujitena ninji yami Nzambi.
54002005 Himunaanuki chinayilezhelang’a yumiyi hinajing’i nenuku?
54002006 Ichi jinu, mweluka jehi chamukang’eshang’a, kulonja akamumwekeshi mumwaka winji.
54002007 Chizhinjilu chakuluwalala chatachika jehi kukong’eka, ilang’a mukwakukang’esha wakakang’eshang’a ho-o nichamba kamufumishawu
54002008 Henohu jihu hakamwekeshawu yenowu mukwakuluwalala, ákanong’eshawu kuji Mwanta Yesu namuuya wamukanwa kinji, ákelishawu wamukunkulwayi chakamwekanayi Mwanta Yesu hakenzayi.
54002009 Chakenzayi owu mukwakuluwalala, wakenza mukukong’a kwaSatana, nang’ovu zhezhima, nayinzhikizhilu, nayihayamisha yakutwamba,
54002010 nikujimbana kwezhima kwakuheng’a kwakujimba nachu antu akunong’a; nanichi chanalekuwu kukeng’a walala, kulonja amwinewi.
54002011 Jichi Nzambi hakuyitemeshela kuluwang’esha kwakweni kulonja akuhweleli kutwamba;
54002012 kulonja akahishi nachu ezhima abulili kukuhwelela walala, atiyili kuwaha nakuheng’a

54002013 Enu anakwetu akeng’awu kuji Mwanta, tunatiyi kuwaha kumusakilila Nzambi hajenu mafuku ezhima, mulong’a ayitonjeli kuji Nzambi hatachi, kulonja mutambuli wamwinu mukuzhila kwakuyizhilika kuji Spilitu, nimukukuhwelela walala.
54002014 Wayitambikililuwu nansang’u yayiwahi yitwashimwini, kulonja mutambuli lubanzhi lwakulema kwaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu.
54002015 Jichi jinu, enu anakwetu, imanenu mbe, kakelenu nzhila zhayilezheluwu, hela nakutang’isha hela namukanja wakufuma kujetu.
54002016 Yomweni Mwanta wetu Yesu Klistu, niNzambi, Tata yetu, wátukeng’eli, wátwinkeli kukunjezha kwahayanyaka, nikuching’ezha kwakuwahi naluwi,
54002017 ayikunjezhi munyichima yenu, ayikoleshi munyijimu yayiwahi nimumazu amawahi ezhima.
54003001 Nkumininaku enu anakwetu, tulombelelenuku kulonja izu jaMwanta jenji lufuchi, jilemi nawa neyi chijinalemi kujenu,
54003002 atupulwishi kuji antu aluwa, atama; mulong’a antu amakwawu hiyakweti kukuhwelelaku.
54003003 Hakwila Mwanta washinshika, wakayikolesha, wakayihemba kuji watama.
54003004 Tunakuhweleli Mwanta hansang’u yenu netu, mwelang’a mutwayilezhang’a, ninochu mukwilang’amu.
54003005 Mwanta alomboli nyichima yenu mukukeng’a kwaNzambi nimukutatakena kwaKlistu.
54003006 Ichi jinu, enu anakwetu, tukuyilezha mwizhina jaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu, netu ambukenu kuji anakwenu ezhima enjang’a chakuluwang’esha, abulang’a kwenja mwaya nzhila yimwatambwili kujetu.
54003007 Enu aweni muneluki chimwaji kutwimbuzhola, mulong’a twashakamini mukachi kenu chakaji kuluwang’esha.
54003008 Hitwajiili yakujya yenu chamukunkuluku, ilang’a twakabakeni nakukalakala mujimu wetu niwufuku nimwaana, kulonja tubuli kuyijiila yuma yenu.
54003009 Chatuteleleli kujya yuma yenu, ilang’a twajilekesheli, twalonjeli enu mutaliluhu mutwimbuzholi.
54003010 Chitwajing’i nenu twayilezheli netu, neyi muntu kwonti kwinji kukalakala, bayi ajyaku.
54003011 Mulong’a tunatiyi nawu mukachi kenu muji amakwawu enjang’a nakuluwang’esha, hiyakalakalang’a mujimuku, hiyatuvuba.
54003012 Jichi jinu, tukuyilezha nakuyikonkomwena muji Mwanta Yesu Klistu antu aji ochu, netu ekali awunja, akalakali mujimu kulonja amoni kujya kwawu awenawu.
54003013 Enu anakwetu, bayi muzeya nakwila yayiwahuku.
54003014 Muntu wukubula kwovwahila mazu amumukanja wetu iwu, mushinshikenu, bayi mujikunja ninjuku, kulonja atiyi nsonyi.
54003015 Bayi mumutong’ozhoka nenu himukwankunyi nenuku, ilang’a mukonkomwenenu nanochu chajiyi manakwenu.
54003016 Yomweni Mwanta wakuwunja ayiwunjishi mafuku ezhima mwezhima. Mwanta ekali nanenu ezhima.
54003017 Ami Pawulu nasoneki kwimushiku nachikasa chamami aweni, hichuma chakwiluka nachu nyikanja yami yezhima; jimu munasonekang’a.
54003018 lwaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu lwikali nanenu wezhima wenu. Amena
55001001 Ami Pawulu, kapostolu kaKlistu Yesu, mwaya kulezha kwanlezheluwu kuji Nzambi Chamwinu chetu, niKlistu Yesu kuching’ezha kwetu,
55001002 niji nakukusonekela mukanja, eyi Timotewu mwanami walala muchikuhwelelu. Luwi nikwanakena nikuwunja kwakufuma kuji Nzambi, yowu Tata, nikuji Klistu Yesu, Mwanta wetu.
55001003 Chinakeng’eli kuya muMasijoniya, nakwilili nami wushali kuEfwesesa, kulonja wulezhi antu amakwawu neyi, chinzhila kutang’isha nsang’u zhacheng’i.
55001004 Yilezhi neyi, chinzhila kutiyilila tushijikilu hela nsang’u zhakákumang’a zhamaking’u, zhaleta kwakwihuzhola hohu, hizhakwashang’a mujimu waya mukukuhwelela, watukunzhikiluwu kuji Nzambuku.
55001005 Nakulezhi mwenimu kulonja chileti kukeng’a kwakufuma mumuchima wutooka, nachinlezhi chamuchima chachiwahi, nikukuhwelela kwakaji kujimbana.
55001006 Chanalekuwu yumiyi, amakwawu anasenukili jehi mumbaji, nakuya nakubobola tuhu;
55001007 anakeng’i kwikala ankulung’ang’a zhanshimbi, kutong’a hiyeluka chakashinshi hela mwahoshang’awu hela mwakoleshang’awuku.
55001008 Ilang’a tuneluki netu nshimbi yayiwahi, neyi muntu wukulonjela muyaya.

55001009 Mulong’a tuneluki netu nshimbi hiyayisonekeleli muntu walong’aku; ching’a akwakuluwalala, niazhikwa, niajiwulang’a Nzambi, niakwanshiji, niakaji kuzhila, niasawulang’a yuma yazhila, niazhahang’a atata zhawu nawamama zhawu, niambanzhi awantu acheng’i,
55001010 niakwawuzhila, niajitamishang’a nawakwawu amayala, nieyang’a antu, niantwambi, niasanyikang’a chakutwamba; hela chuma chikwawu chabula kuya mwaya ntang’ishilu yalala,
55001011 mwomwaya nsang’u yayiwahi yaswezha kuwaha yaNzambi wakiswilewa, yankunzhikiluwu.
55001012 Namusakilili Klistu Yesu, Mwanta wetu, wanyinkeli ng’ovu, nanochu chanmweniyi kushinshika, hakunkunzhika kumujimu winji.
55001013 Kutong’a yami najing’i mukwakutuka Nzambi, mukwakukabisha akwawu, mukwawinyi; ilang’a antiyilili luwi mulong’a nachilili mukuyamba, nichiji kanja nikuhweleli.
55001014 Luwi lwaMwanta wetu lwanswezheleli nankashi nakukuhwelela nikukeng’a kwamuji Klistu Yesu.
55001015 Izu iji jatela kukuhwelela, jatela kutambulewa chikupu, jelawu nawu, Klistu Yesu wenzhili munu mwishina nakwamwina akwanshiji. Haji akwanshiji, yami nabajikahu.

55001016 Hansang’u iyi antiyilili luwi, kulonja mujami nabajika kuluwa, Yesu Klistu amwekeshi mwezhima mwajing’i nakujung’umikayi, niikali wakutalilahu antu akumukuhwelelang’a, atambuli wumi wahayanyaka.
55001017 Kuji Mwanta mukwakubajika, wahayanyaka, wakátokang’a, wakámonewang’a, jiyi Nzambi kankawinji, kwikali nimpuhu nilubanzhi lwakulema hayanyaka nanyaka. Amena.
55001018 Eyi mwanami Timotewu, nakukunzhikili kulezha iku mwomwaya wuplofwetu wakutenenenuwu jehi, wulwi nachu nzhita yayiwahi.
55001019 Wukwati kukukuhwelela nikuchinlezhi chamuchima chachiwahi; amakwawu analekumu jehi, anazhiyishi jehi kukuhwelela kwawu.
55001020 Antu aji ochu jiwu aHimenusa naAlesanjeli, inenkeli Satana kulonja ajizi kuleka kutuka Nzambi.
55002001 Nasambili kuyilezha nami, lembelelenung’a, lombelelenung’a, hakwilenung’a, sakililenung’a antu ezhima;
55002002 nianyanta ankanu, niantu alema ezhima; kulonja tushakami chachiwahi nzo-o, nakwila mwaya kwakama Nzambi nakalemesha.
55002003 Ichi chachiwahi, chinateli kumesu aNzambi, Chamwinu chetu;
55002004 yena wakeng’a antu ezhima ninji amwinewi, eluki walala chikupu.
55002005 Mulong’a kwekala Nzambi wumu, niihaku wumu mukachi kaNzambi nawantu, yena himuntu, yowu Klistu Yesu,
55002006 wajinkeli ekali chikumba chakukuula nachu antu ezhima; wunsahu owu awushimwini hamwaka wawu;
55002007 wowankunzhikililuwu kwikala nimukwakushimuna nikapostolu; nahoshi mwalala, hinatwambuku, niikali ntang’ishi yawaZHentili mukukuhwelela nimuwalala.
55002008 Jichi nakeng’i nami, amayala alombeli kwezhima nakwolola makasa azhila kwiwulu, chakaji njombu, chakaji ntaji.

55002009 Mwomumu nawa niambanja ajiwahishi nakuvwala mahina chalumbuluka, nakalemesha nikuwunjisha mumesu; bayi nakuyinja chakujileng’aleng’a, hela nawulu hela namalola awuseya weneni, hela mahina aswezha kulema wuseyaku;
55002010 ilang’a ajiwahishi nanyijimu yayiwahi yatelela ambanja ajishimunang’a nawu twamwakamang’a Nzambi.
55002011 Mumbanja ajizi namuchima wawunja nakwovwaha kwalala.
55002012 Hinetezhang’a mumbanja kutang’isha nikwikala mwanta weyalaku, ilang’a ekali wawunja.
55002013 Mulong’a Ajama jiyi asambilili kuleng’awu, nkumininaku hiEva.
55002014 Hiyajimbili Ajamaku, hakwila mumbanja chamujimbiluwu hakujimbuka nakuputola;
55002015 ilang’a yena akamupulwisha mukukala kwakuvwala anyana, neyi wena akukakela mukukuhwelela, nimukukeng’a, nimukuzhila nakuwunjisha mumesu
55003001 Izu iji jalala, jelawu nawu, Muntu nafwili mujimu wawunhembi nakeng’i mujimu wawuwahi.
55003002 Jichi nhembi ching’a yobula hakumwinkela mulong’a, washa muchima haji ing’ojinji hohu, wajihembang’a, wawunjisha mumesu, walumbuluka, wajiishang’a enyi, wukweti kashinshi kakutang’isha,
55003003 himukwakushetaku, hetanang’aku; ilang’a wawunja, hakweti ntaji nawakwawuku, wabula kufwila mali;
55003004 muntu wayuulang’a itala jinji yomweni chachiwahi, wukweti anyaninji ovwahilang’a nakalemesha kalala.
55003005 Neyi muntu wabula kwiluka kuyuula mwitala jinji yomweni, inji chipompelu chaNzambi wukuchihemba ng’ahi?
55003006 Bayi muntu nakuhweleli katatakaku, wakenja kajinka wanta, hakuholokela mwatanyinayi jiyabolu.
55003007 Ching’a ashimunang’awu chachiwahi kuji antu aji hanzi, wakenja kaholokela mukusawuka, nakufwa mumuhetu wajiyabolu.
55003008 Mwomumu niankong’i ekali nakalemesha, hiyakwamazu ayejuku, hiyaswezha kunwa vinyuku, hiyafwila kuheta chatamaku;
55003009 akwata chizhinjilu chachikuhwelelu, nachinlezhi chamuchima chitooka.
55003010 Antu owu asambili kuyishinshika; neyi anabuli hakuyinkela mulong’a, akalakali mujimu wawunkong’i.
55003011 Mwomumu niang’ojizhawu ching’a ekali nakalemesha, bayi akwakutung’ula akwawuku, awunja, ashinshika muyuma yezhima.
55003012 Ankong’i ekali asha nyichima haji ang’ojizhawu, iwu nawinji iwu nawinji, nakuyuula anyanawu niakwetala jawu chachiwahi.
55003013 Mulong’a antu akukalakala chachiwahi mujimu wawunkong’i, akuwana kulema kwalala, nikuswezha kuumika mukwitiya kwakukuhwelela kwamuji Klistu Yesu.
55003014 Nakusonekeli yumiyi nakukuhwelela nami nakenza kujeyi mafuku anu.
55003015 Neyi nakaswezha kulaba, nalonji nami wakeluki mwakwililawu antu muchisaka chaNzambi, chochipompelu chaNzambi wamumi, chochishimi nihakolela walala

55003016 Chalala kwaamu, chizhinjilu chakwakama Nzambi chaswezha kukunama nankashi, Yena Nzambi wamwekeni mumuzhimba, Amuying’ishili muji Spilitu, Amumweni kuji ang’elu, Amushimwini munyunza, Amukuhweleleli mumpata yamunu mwishina, Amutambwili mwiwulu mulubanzhi lwakulema.
55004001 Spilitu nahoshi chalumbuluka ninji, kunyaka yakukuminina amakwawu akafuma muchikuhwelelu, akatiyilila aspilitu akutwamba, nintang’ishilu yinafumi kuji anjemoni.
55004002 Yumiyi yenzang’a nawufwikizhi wawantu akutwamba, chinlezhi chawu chamuchima chaha jehi, chiji neyi anachochi nachikung’u chakesi.
55004003 Alekeshang’a kusumbula nakusumbuka, alekeshang’a niyuma yakujya, yaleng’eliyi Nzambi ninji akwakukuhwelela, eluka walala, ayitambuli nakusakilila.
55004004 Mulong’a yuma yezhima yaleng’eliyi Nzambi yayi wahi, kwosi chuma chaji kulekawuku, neyi akuchitambula nakusakilila;
55004005 chikuwaha nezu jaNzambi nikulombela.
55004006 Neyi wukuyanukisha anakwetu yumiyi, wukwikala mukwakukalakala waKlistu Yesu wamuwahi, wakulang’a chachiwahi namazu achikuhwelelu, nintang’ishilu yayiwahi yiwunalonji.
55004007 Bayi witezha tushijikilu twamukunkulwayi, twamazhilu twashimunang’awu ambanja awatushinakazhuku. Jikoleshang’a wushiki mukwakama Nzambi.
55004008 Mulong’a kukolesha muzhimba kwawahishang’a mpinzhi yantesha, ilang’a kumwakama Nzambi kwawahishang’a muyuma yezhima, kukweti kukana kwawumi wakatataka nikwawumi wakenza.
55004009 Izu iji jalala, jatela kutambulewa chikupu.
55004010 Jichi twakabakenang’a nakulwisha, mulong’a tunashi kukuhwelela kwetu haji Nzambi wamumi, jiyi Chamwinu chawantu ezhima, waswezha kwamwina akwakukuhwelela.
55004011 Yilezhi yumiyi nakuyitang’isha.
55004012 Bayi witezha muntu ajiwuli wukwenzi weyuku; ching’a wikali wakutalilahu akwakukuhwelela nimukuhosha, nimukushakama, nimukukeng’a, nimukukuhwelela, nimukubula kubazhama.
55004013 Shaku muchima kukutang’ila amakwawu nikukukonkomwena, nikukutang’isha, njo-o nichinakenza.
55004014 Bayi wujiwula chamukunkulu chiwekala nachu, chakwinkeluwu kuwuplofwetu, chiwatambwili hakukunang’ika makasa awakulumpuku.
55004015 Jikwatishi muyumiyi nakutong’ozhokang’amu, wujinkumu chikupu, kulonja chiwukuyang’a kumbiji chimwekanang’a kuji antu ezhima.
55004016 Jihembi eyi aweni, wuhembi nintang’ishilu yeyi. Kakelaku mwenimu, mulong’a chiwukwilamu wukujamwina eyi aweni niantu akukutiya.
55005001 Bayi wuhoshola mukulumpuku, kumina jakumulembelela neyi hitata yeyi; nianyikwenzi amayala neyi hiyanakweyi;
55005002 niakulumpi awambanja neyi hiyamama zheyi; niansanja neyi hiyaheleyi, nakubula kubazhama hela hanti
55005003 Lemeshaku ambanja anekali amfwila chikupu.
55005004 Neyi mfwila wamumbanja wukweti anyana hela ezukulu, wena asambili kujiza kwilila ayawu chachiwahi, akwashi anvwali zhawu; jichi chuma chamonang’ayi Nzambi kuwaha.
55005005 Mfwila washala kankawinji chikupu, wakuhwelelang’a Nzambi wakakelang’a mukulembelela nakulombela nimwaana niwufuku.
55005006 Hakwila mfwila washakama nakulung’a hohu, wafwa jehi iku wuchiji mumi.
55005007 Yitang’ishi antu yumiyi nawa, kulonja abuli hakuyinkela mulong’a.
55005008 Muntu wukubula kukwasha ayinji, nankashi jinu akwetala jinji, najikali chikuhwelelu, watama kubajika wábula kukuhwelela.
55005009 Kusoneka mumbanja hamukanja wawamfwila, ching’a nabajiki munyaka makumi atanu najimu (60), ching’a wajing’i washa muchima haji mfumwinji wumu hohu,
55005010 áshimunang’awu nawu welang’a nyijimu yayiwahi; naleli anyana, najiishi enyi, naweleshi nyenju yawakwakuzhila, nakwashi amonang’a kukala, nakakeli kwila yayiwahi yezhima.
55005011 Bayi kusoneka amfwila achiji ansanjaku, mulong’a chakulekawu kukeng’a Klistu, akufwila kusumbuka cheng’i;
55005012 akutanya nanochu chakulekawu kukuhwelela kwawu kwatachi.
55005013 Hiyakuleka kukong’a mujimu, hiyakuyang’a nakukimboka kumatala namatala; hiyakukumina jakuleka kukong’a mujimu hohuku; akwikala akwansachi hiyatuvuba nawa, nakuhosha yuma yazhila kuhosha.
55005014 Jichi nakeng’i nami ansanja asumbuki, avwali anyana, ayuuli mumatalawu, abuli kushila chilumbu nsang’u yakutung’ula;
55005015 mulong’a amakwawu anasenuki jehi nakulonja Satana.
55005016 Neyi mukwakukuhwelela wukweti amfwila, ayikwashuku, himujimu wachipompeluku; mujimu wachipompelu wakukwasha amfwila chikupu abula antang’a.
55005017 Akulumpi ayuulang’a chachiwahi, ekali atela kuyilemesha chakubajika, swezhe-e jinu awa akalakalang’a nakushimuna izu jaNzambi nikutang’isha.
55005018 Mulong’a mumukanja wazhila nawu, Bayi wukasa kukanwa kang’ombi hakuhulayi tijikuku. Nawu, Mukwakukalakala nateli wulooku winji
55005019 Bayi witezha muntu kwinka mukulumpi mulong’aku, ching’a kwikala ayinsahu ayeji hela asatu.
55005020 Antu akuputola, yikonkololi kumesu awantu ezhima, kulonja akwawu atiyi woma.

55005021 Nakulezhi kumesu aNzambi, nikumesu aKlistu Yesu, nikumesu awang’elu atonjewa, nami hembaku yumiyi chakaji kutonja hakachi kawantu, wubuli kwila chuma chakulemesha muntu wumu mukwawu wumujiwuli.
55005022 Bayi wunyakala kunang’ika muntu makasaku; bayi wujumbila munyilong’a yawakwenuku; jihembi eyi aweni wikali wazhila.
55005023 Bayi wunwang’a menzhi hohuku, nwang’a nivinyu yanti nansang’u yevumu jeyi nichiwakatakatang’a.
55005024 Nshiji zhawantu amakwawu zhamwekanang’a hatooka, zhayang’ahu jehi kukusompesha; nshiji zhawantu amakwawu zhayilonjelang’a.
55005025 Mwomumu nawa, kuji nyijimu yayiwahi yamwekanang’a hatooka, niyinabuli kumwekana hatooka hiyamba katwesha kuyizhinjaku.
55006001 Antu ezhima ekala mumpanja yawujung’u, alemeshang’a ankaka zhawu chalala, kulonja izhina jaNzambi nintang’ishilu yibuli kutukewa.

55006002 Ákweti ankaka zhawu akuhwelela, bayi ayijiwula nanochu chaneluwu hiyanakwawuku, akumini jakuyikalakela chakubajika, mulong’a wena, ájyang’a kunyijimu yawu, hiyakwakukuhwelela niakeng’ewa. Yitang’ishi yumiyi nakuyikonkomwena.
55006003 Muntu wukutang’isha mwacheng’i, wukubula kwitezha mazu aMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu akukolesha, nintang’ishilu yaya mukwakama Nzambi,
55006004 najinki jehi wanta, heluka chumaku, wata muchima kukwihuzhola nikukufwila ntaji zhansang’u zhamazu, zhaletang’a ichima, ninjombu, nimatuka, nikanang’anang’a kakuta akwawu muchima;
55006005 nintaji zhawantu atoka jehi muyitong’ozhoka yawu, abula kwiluka walala, atong’ozhokang’a nawu kwakama Nzambi hichuma chakuheta nachu
55006006 Kwakama Nzambi, nikutiya kuwaha, hikuheta kwakweni.
55006007 Mulong’a hitwaleteli chuma munu mwishinaku, nichitwakafumamu hitwakatwesha kusenja chumaku.
55006008 Jichi neyi tukweti yakujya niyakujivwika, yumiyi yinawanini
55006009 Ilang’a antu akukeng’a nawu aheti, akujimbukila mukutesha, akufwa mumuhetu, akufwila yuma yawusupi yayivulu yakatishang’a, yazhiyishang’a antu mukukisika nimukunong’a.
55006010 Kufwila mali jiwu muzhi wayuma yatama yezhima; jiyi nsang’u yinasenwishi amakwawu muchikuhwelelu, anajipwiki yihung’u yayivulu, nzwa-a nikwishinaji.
55006011 Ilang’a eyi muntu waNzambi, temukaku yumiyi. Kabilaku nikulong’a, nikwakama Nzambi, nikukuhwelela, nikukeng’a, nikutatakena, nikwovwaha.
55006012 Lwaku nzhita yayiwahi yachikuhwelelu; kwataku kuwumi wahayanyaka wákutambikililuwu, wúwetezheli kwitezha kwakuwahi kumesu awayinsahu amavulu
55006013 Nakulezhi kumesu aNzambi, wahanjishang’a yuma yezhima, nikumesu aKlistu Yesu, wetezheli kwitezha kwakuwahi kumesu aPontusi Pilatu,
55006014 nami, hembaku kulezha iku chakubula kuluwang’esha hela hakukwinkela mulong’a, nichakamwekanayi Mwanta wetu Yesu Klistu.
55006015 Akamumwekesha hampinzhi yinji kuji yena Mukwang’ovu inkawinji wakiswilewa, yowu Mwanta wawanyanta antúmba, yowu Mukulumpi wawakulumpi;

55006016 jiyi kankawinji wakáfwang’a, washakamang’a muchezhezhi chakang’anya muntu kushikaku; hikwekala muntu wamumonahu jehuku, hela kutwesha kumumona nehi. Mpuhu ning’ovu yahayanyaka yiikali yinji. Amena

55006017 Yilezhi akwakuheta amakonu neyi, bayi mujitong’ozhoka nenu mwalemaku, bayi mukuhwelela maheta abulang’a kushakamaku; ching’a kusha muchima haji Nzambi waswezha kutwinka yuma yezhima ninji tulung’i nachu.
55006018 Yilezhi neyi, ilenung’a chachiwahi, swezhenu kwila nyijimu yayiwahi kulonja mumonang’a yakukwasha nachu akwenu, ikalenu nanyichima yakwinka akwenu;
55006019 nakujilumbikila yakutung’a nachu kunyaka yakenza, kulonja mwakakwati kuwumi, wowu wumi walala chikupu.
55006020 Eyi Timotewu, hembaku chikaninu chanakukunzhikuwu; futalelaku kubobola kwakaji kuzhila, nintaji zhamaana akutwamba;
55006021 amakwawu anetezhumu jehi, anasenuki muchikuhwelelu.
56001001 Ami Pawulu, kapostolu kaKlistu Yesu mwaya muchima waNzambi, mwaya kukana kwawumi wamuji Klistu Yesu,
56001002 niji nakukusonekela mukanja, eyi mwanami Timotewu nakeng'a. Luwi nikwanakena nikuwunja kwakufuma kuji Nzambi Tata, nikuji Klistu Yesu, Mwanta wetu.
56001003 Namusakililang'a Nzambi, inakalakelang'a nachinlezhi chamuchima chitooka, neyi chamukalakeleluwu ankakulula zhami, nanochu chinabulang'a kunookesha kukwanuka mukulembelela kwami.
56001004 Wufuku nimwaana, chinaanukang'a majilu eyi, nafwilang'a kukumona, kulonja niswezhi kuzang'alala.
56001005 Naanukang'a kukuhwelela kweyi kwakaji kujimbana; kwokukuhwelela kwasambilili kwikala muji nkaka yeyi wamumbanja Lowisi, nimuji mama yeyi Yunisi, neluki nami kwekala nimujeyi nawa.
56001006 jihu hanafumi kukwanukisha nami wupeepi kesi kachamukunkulu chaNzambi chekala mujeyi, chiwatambwili hinakunang'ikili makasami.
56001007 Mulong'a Nzambi hatwinkeli spilitu yawomaku, ching'a yang'ovu nakukeng'a nikuwunjisha mumesu.
56001008 jichi bayi wutiya nsonyi yawunsahu waMwanta wetu, hela kutiya nsonyi hansang'u yamami muntu winji akasawuku. Kumina jakumona kukala hamu nanami hansang'u yayiwahi, mwaya ng'ovu zhaNzambi.

56001009 Watwamwinini, watutambikili nakutambika kwazhila, bayi chakunyijimu yetuku, ilang'a mwaya kufuukula kwinji kwatufuukwililiyi, niluwi lwatutiyililiyi muji Klistu Yesu henohu nyaka yamunyima yezhima yichiji kanja.
56001010 Hakwila katataka anachimwekeshi jehi nakumwekana kwaChamwinu chetu Klistu Yesu, wabalumwini kufwa kwikali chimwang'azhi, namwekeshi hatooka wumi nikubula kutoka, nansang'u yayiwahi.
56001011 jiyi nsang'u yankunzhikawu niikali mukwakuyishimuna, nikapostolu kayu, nintang'ishi yayu.

56001012 Hansang'u iyi jihu hanafumi ami kukaba mwenimu; hela chochu, hinatiyang'a nsonyuku, mulong'a namwiluka yena nakuhwelela, neluki chikupu nami yena natweshi kuhemba chizhiikilu chinamwinkeli kuhemba, njo-o nikwifuku oju.
56001013 Kwatishaku mazu akukolesha iwatiyili kujami, mwayawu mwayawu, mukukuhwelela nikukeng'a kwekala muji Klistu Yesu.
56001014 Chizhiikilu chachiwahi chakukunzhikiluwu, chihembi naSpilitu Wazhila washakama mujetu.
56001015 Muneluki chananlekuwu jehi kuji ezhima aji muAsiya, niaFwigelu naHemoni hamu.
56001016 Mwanta atiyili wushona akwetala jaOnesifwolu, wankwashili kakavulu, hatiyili nsonyi yeleng'i jankasiluwuku.
56001017 Chajing'iyi muloma wankeng'akeng'eli nankashi, hakunwana.
56001018 Eyi wuneluki chachiwahi yuma yayivulu yankalakeleliyi kuEfwesesa. Mwanta amwitezhi awani luwi kuji Mwanta hefuku oju.
56002001 jichi eyi mwanami, jikoleshi muluwi lwekala muji Klistu Yesu.
56002002 Nsang'u zhiwatiyili kujami mukachi kawayinsahu amavulu, zhikunzhiki kuji antu ashinshika akatwesha kutang'isha akwawu nawa.
56002003 Kumina jakuumika mukukala, neyi ishijika jaKlistu Yesu wamuwahi.
56002004 Hikwekala ishijika wuji kunzhita wajikasang'a nansang'u yamunu mwishinaku, kulonja atiyishi kuwaha yena wamusonekeli muwushijika.
56002005 Neyi muntu wukujipaka nawakwawu, ching'a ajipaka mwaya yizhila yakujipaka, mukunkulwayi hiyakumuvwika chibaabaku.
56002006 Mukwakujima wakalakalang'a, jiyi akasambili kujiilaku.
56002007 Shinshikaku munukuhosha, mulong'a Mwanta wukukulezha mwalumbulukila yuma yezhima.
56002008 Anukaku Yesu Klistu, mwana kajaviji, wasang'uka muji afu, yoyi nsang'u yayiwahi yinashimunang'a ami.
56002009 Nsang'wiyi jiyi yinamwena kukala nikunkasa neyi nimuntu wanyilong'a, ilang'a izu jaNzambi hiyajikasang'aku.
56002010 Hinukukumina jakuyimwena atonjewa yihung'u yezhima, kulonja niwena nawa akatambuli wamwinu wekala muji Klistu Yesu, nilubanzhi lwakulema kwahayanyaka.
56002011 Izu iji jatela kujikuhwelela, jelawu nawu, Neyi twafwili ninji twakahanja ninji nawa;
56002012 Neyi tukukaba, twakayuula ninji, Neyi tukujikala netu hitwamwilukaku, niyena nawa wakajikala ninji hinayilukaku;
56002013 Neyi tukubula kushinshika, yena kwinji sang'a ashinshikilayi; Yena hakutwesha kujikala yomwenuku.
56002014 Yanukishi yumiyi; yilezhi kumesu aMwanta neyi, bayi mufwilang'a ntaji yamazuku, hiyakwashang'aku, yaluwang'eshang'a antu akutiyang'amu.
56002015 Kabilaku kujimwekesha kumesu aNzambi, wumuntu anesekuwu jehi, mukwakukalakala wakaji hakutiyila nsonyi, nakulumbulula izu jawalala mujaya, mujaya.
56002016 Tonjolwelaku kubobola kwakaji kuzhila, mulong'a antu abobolang'a ochu akuyang'a munzhila yakujiwula Nzambi ho-o.
56002017 Mazu awu akuya nakutotoloka neyi chelang'a jimbong'ola; jichi chajuwu aHimenusa naFwiletu.
56002018 Antu owu anasenuki jehi munzhila yawalala, chaneluwu nawu kusang'uka kwawafu kunahiti jehi, anakunjuli kukuhwelela kwawakwawu.
56002019 Hakwila chikuku chaNzambi sang'a chakolela mbe, chikweti nsona zhakwila nawu, Mwanta weluka antu inji; nawu, Ezhima akutena izhina jaMwanta afumi kukuheng'a.
56002020 Mwitala jeneni himwekalang'a yuma yawulu nasiliva hohuku, mwekalang'a nawa yanyitonju namawumba; yikwawu yamujimu walema, yikwawu yamujimu waseka.
56002021 Muntu wukujitookesha nakwambuka kuyumiyi, wukwikala chuma chamujimu walema, chazhila, chatelela Mwanta kukong'a nachu, chalong'eshelawu nyijimu yayiwahi yezhima.
56002022 Temukaku kufwila kwatama kwawukwenzi; kabilaku kulong'a, nikukuhwelela, nikukeng'a, nikuwunja, hamu nanawa atambikang'a Mwanta nanyichima yitooka.
56002023 Lekaku kwihuzhola kwawusupi kwakaji maana, mulong'a wuneluki jehi kwaletang'a kwantaji hohu.
56002024 Njung'u yaMwanta, chinzhila kufwila ntaji, ching'a ekali wamwovu nawantu ezhima, wukweti kashinshi kakutang'isha, ekali mukwakutiyilila akwawu,
56002025 afumbi akwantaji nakuyolola namuchima wawunja; hajaha Nzambi wakabalumuna nyichima yawu akeluki walala chikupu;
56002026 ákwatawu jehi kuji jiyabolu asomoki mumuhetu winji, eli muchima waNzambi.
56003001 Ilukaku chumichi, kumafuku akukuminina kwakenza nyaka yakala.
56003002 Antu akekala akwakujikeng'a, akwakufwila mali, akwakujisama, akwakujinka wanta, akwakutukana; akekala antu abulang'a kwovwahila anvwali zhawu, abulang'a kusakilila, abula kuzhila,
56003003 abulang'a kukeng'ang'ana mwasemwakenawu, oma muchima, akwakutung'ula akwawu, abulang'a kujihemba, aswezha kuzuwa, abulang'a kukeng'a yayiwahi,
56003004 amfukezhi, achinchika, akwakujitohesha, antu akeng'ang'a yakujitiyisha aweni kuwaha, kukeng'a Nzambi nehi.
56003005 Kuyitala afwana neyi amwakama Nzambi, hakwinza kwitezha ng'ovu yinji kwonti kwawu. Ambukaku kuji antu aji chochochu.
56003006 Mulong'a wenawa jiwu eng'ilang'a mumatala hambaji, nakujikokela namaanawu ambanja akenkama, ajitwika jehi nayisenja yalema yanshiji, alumbukila jehi mukufwila yuma yatama yeng'i nayeng'i.
56003007 Wena ajizang'a mafuku ezhima, hela chochu, akang'anyang'a kushika mukwiluka walala chikupu.
56003008 Chajikang'iluwu aYanesa naYambelesa naMosi, jichi chakujikang'awu niwena amayala nawalala, antu atoka jehi muyitong'ozhoka yawu; kunsang'u yachikuhwelelu anekali akinzhikewa.
56003009 Hiyakaya kumbijuku, mulong'a wusupi wawu wakamwekana kuji antu ezhima; neyi chamwekeni wawenawa nawa.
56003010 Hakwila eyi Timotewu, weluka jehi kutang'isha kwami, nikwenja kwami, ninsang'u yinata muchima, nikukuhwelela kwami, nikujung'umika kwami, nikukeng'a kwami, nikutatakena kwami,
56003011 nimakabisha namweni, nimakabi ami. Weluka jehi niyuma yanweni kuAntiyoki, nikuIkoniyumu, nikuListila; ana makabisha namweni. Mwanta wampulwishili muyuma yezhimiyi.
56003012 Eng'ang'i, antu ezhima akeng'a nawu ashakami muji Klistu Yesu nikwakama Nzambi, akumona makabisha.
56003013 Antu atama niakwakutwamba akuyang'a nakuswezha, wena akujimba akwawu, niwena akuyijimba.
56003014 Hakwila eyi, shakamaku muyuma yiwajizili nakushinshikamu, mulong'a wuneluki antu akulezheliyu.
56003015 Mulong'a kufumisha kuwansi wuneluki Nyikanja yazhila yinatweshi kukulezha maana akumona nachu wamwinu, kwokukukuhwelela Klistu Yesu.
56003016 Mukanja waNzambi wezhima awonena jehi kuji Nzambi; wawaha kutang'isha nachu, nikutanyisha nachu, nikwolola nachu, nikufumba nachu mwalong'a;
56003017 kulonja muntu waNzambi awanini chikupu, ashikili munyijimu yayiwahi yezhima.
56004001 Nakulezhi kumesu aNzambi nikumesu aKlistu Yesu, wakasompesha amomi niafu, nanochu chakamwekanayi nawanta winji,
56004002 nami, shimunaku izu jaNzambi nihanawahi nihanakali, kumina jakushimuna ho-o; konkololaku, hosholaku, konkomwenaku, nakutatakena nikutang'isha nawa.
56004003 Mulong'a mpinzhi yakenza hakalekawu kutiyilila kutang'isha kwalala, akaheta matu owana, akajivulishila antang'ishi aya mwaya kufwila kwawu kwatama;
56004004 akatotomona walala kumatu awu, akasenukila mutuheka.
56004005 Ilang'a eyi ikalaku wababala muyuma yezhima. Kumina jakumona kukala, ilaku mujimu wamukwakushimuna nsang'u yayiwahi; wuwumanishi chikupu.
56004006 Ami keng'a antwali niikali mulambu wakuhung'ununa; mpinzhi yami yakuya yinashiki jehi.
56004007 Nalwi nzhita yayiwahi; namanishi nzhila yakutemukila; nahembi chikuhwelelu.
56004008 Kufumisha kulelu anantentekeli chibaaba chakulong'a, chakanyinkayi Mwanta, mukwakusompesha walong'a hefuku oju. Hakanyinkami hohuku, wakenka niantu ezhima atalilang'a kumwekana kwinji.
56004009 Esekaku kwinza swayi kujami;
56004010 mulong'a jemasi nanshiyi jehi, nanochu chanakeng'iyi yamakonu, nayi jehi kuTesalonika. Keleseni nayi jehi kung'alizha, Titusa nayi kujalamatiya.
56004011 Niji naLuka hohu. Inzaku naMaku mulong'a wankwashang'a kumujimu.
56004012 Tikikusa namutemeshi kuEfwesesa.
56004013 Chiwukwinza wunsenjelang'a kahuma kinashiyili kuji Kalapu kuTilowasi, ninyikanja, nakeng'i nankashi yayitembi.
56004014 Muchiji wansumbu Alesanjeli, wankong'eli chatama nankashi, Mwanta wakamulubwila yashikila munyijimu yinji.
56004015 Eyi nawa mubabeli mulong'a waswezheli kujikang'a namazu etu.
56004016 Chinajihakwilili chakusambila, hikwajing'i muntu niwumu wankwashiluku, ezhima anshiyili; nalombi nami bayi ayinkelachu mulong'aku.
56004017  Ilang'a Mwanta wang'imenenuku, wankolesheli, kulonja nsang'u yiswezhi kushimununewa kujami, azhentili ezhima atiyi. Ampulwishili mukanwa kamutupa.
56004018 Mwanta wakampulwisha kunyijimu yatama yezhima, wakanhemba nimoni wanta winji wamwiwulu. Lubanzhi lwakulema lwikali lwinji hayanyaka nanyaka. Amena.
56004019 ng'imushili aPlisila naAkwila niakwetala jaOnesifwolu.
56004020 Elasitusi washeli kuKolinja; Tilofwimusa namushiyili kuMiletusa nayikatu.
56004021 Esekaku kwinza aha hakwila chishika kanja chinzi. Ebulusa, niPujensa, niLinusa, niKalujiya nianakwetu ezhima anakwimushi.
56004022 Mwanta ekali naspilitu yeyi. Luwi lwikali nanenu.
57001001 Ami Pawulu, njung'u yaNzambi, kapostolu kaYesu Kristu mwaya kukuhwelela kwawantu aNzambi atonlewa, nikwiluka chikupu walala waya mukwakama Nzambi,
57001002 nakuching'ezha wumi wahayanyaka, watukaninuwu kuli Nzambi wabula kutwesha kutwamba, haling'i nyaka yamunyima yezhima yichili kanla.
57001003 Ilang'a hamwaka watong'weliyi yomweni, hakumwekesha izu linli munsang'u yankunzhikiluwu kushimuna, mwaya kulezha kwanlezheliyi Nzambi, Chamwinu chetu.
57001004 Nili nakukusonekela mukanla, eyi Titusa mwanami walala mukwitiya kwakukuhwelela kwokumu. Luwi lwikali naneyi nikuwunla kwakufuma kuli Nzambi Tata nikuli Kristu Yesu, Chamwinu chetu.
57001005 liyi nsang'u nakushiyilili muKereta, kulonla wulong'eshi yuma yasheli, wutonli akulumpi munyikala yezhima nakuyikunzhika kumulimu, neyi chinakulezheli.
57001006 Neyi kuli muntu wabula hakumwinkela mulong'a, washa muchima hali ing'olinli hohu, wukweti anyana ashinshika akali kuyitenena nsang'u yakubazhama hela yakuluwalala, mukunzhiki yenowu.

57001007 Mulong'a nhembi, ching'a yobula hakumwinkela mulong'a, nanochu chaliyi ng'amba yaNzambi. Bayi muntu walikang'a, hela wanyakala kuzuwa, hela mukwanlombu, hela mukwakwetana hela mukwakufwila kuheta chatamaku.
57001008 Ching'a ekali waliishang'a enyi, wakeng'a yayiwahi, wawunlisha mumesu, walong'a, wazhila, walihembang'a.
57001009 Ching'a ekali wakakela izu laNzambi latela kukuhwelela layilezheluwu, kulonla atweshi kukonkomwena antu mwaya ntang'ishilu yalala, akonkololi akwantali.
57001010 Mulong'a kuli antu amavulu, aswezha akwakwalama, hiyakwakuluwalala nakutavula mukanwa, nakulimbana; ching'a ayimweneshi.
57001011 Antu awa aluwang'eshang'a matala amavulu, nakutang'isha yuma yabula kutelela; alonla kuheta chatama.
57001012 Kaprofwetu kawu wumu, welili ninli, AKereta hiyantwambi mafuku ezhima, hiyanyama atama, hiyankópi afwa hakulya.
57001013 Wunsahu iwu walala. Yikonkololi nang'ovu hansang'u oyu, kulonla akoli muchikuhwelelu.
57001014 Bayi atiyilila tuheka twawaYuleya, hela kulezha kwawantu anasenuki lehi muwalalaku.

57001015 Kuli antu ali nanyichima yitooka yuma yezhima yikwikala yitooka; kuli antu azhilola abula kukuhwelela, kwosi chuma chitookaku; ilang'a yitong'ozhoka yawu nichinlezhi chawu chamuchima chazhilola hohu.
57001016 Ahoshang'a nawu twamwiluka Nzambi, ilang'a nyilimu yawu yaya mwacheng'i, ashimana, azhikwa; kuyeseka nanyilimu yayiwahi yezhima anekali antu akinzhikewa.
57002001 Hakwila eyi hoshaku nsang'u zhata mukutang'isha kwakoleshang'a.
57002002 Akulumpi amayala ching'a ekali awunlisha mumesu, ashinshika, ekali namaana, akoli mukukuhwelela, nimukukeng'a, nimukutatakena.
57002003 Akulumpi awambanla niwena ching'a enli mwenlelang'awu akwakuzhila; bayi ekali akwakutung'ula akwawuku; bayi ekali anlung'u zhavinyuku; ekali antang'ishi zhayuma yayiwahi,
57002004 afumbi ansanla kukeng'a amfumuzhawu nikukeng'a anyanawu;
57002005 ekali awunlisha mumesu, akali kubazhama, akwakukalakala kumatalawu, akwaluwi, akwakwovwahila amfumuzhawu, kulonla izu laNzambi libuli kutukewa.
57002006 Konkomwenaku anyikwenzi niwena ekali awunlisha mumesu.
57002007 Ikalaku wakutalilahu munyilimu yayiwahi yezhima; kutang'isha kweyi kwikali kwakali kubomba nayatama, kwakalemesha.
57002008 Hoshaku mazu alala akang'anya kutanyishewa, kulonla kutiyisha nsonyi muntu wukukeng'a kuleta ntali, abuli kumona chuma chakututena chatama.
57002009 Yitang'ishi anlung'u ashakami nakwovwahila anyanta zhawu, nakuyitiyisha kuwaha muyuma yezhima, chakali ntali.
57002010 Bayi eya wukombi wawunyemunyemuku, ilang'a amwekeshi kashinshi kakawahi, kulonla awahishi ntang'ishilu yaNzambi, Chamwinu chetu, muyuma yezhima.
57002011 Mulong'a luwi lwaNzambi lwaletang'a wamwinu wawantu ezhima, lunamwekani lehi.
57002012 Lwatufumbang'a nawu tuleki kusekesha Nzambi, nikufwila yatama yampata yamunu mwishina, tushakami nyaka yinu nakuwunlisha mumesu, nimukulong'a, nimukwakama Nzambi;
57002013 nakutalila kuching'ezha kwatiyishang'a kuwaha, nichakamwekana lubanzhi lwakulema kwaNzambi yetu muneni, Chamwinu chetu Yesu Kristu.
57002014 Yowu walinkeli haletu kulonla atukuuli kukuluwa kwezhima, alitookesheli antu akulihetela, akuta nyichima hanyilimu yayiwahi.
57002015 Yitang'ishi yumiyi nakukonkomwena nakukonkolola nang'ovu yezhima. Bayi witezha muntu kukuliwulaku.
57003001 Yanukishi antu ashakami nakwovwahila anyuuli niakwawanta, nakwila mwakuyilezhawu; anyakali kwila nyilimu yayiwahi yezhima,
57003002 nakubula kutena muntu chatama, nakubula kufwila ntali; ekali amwovu alizoza nankashi kumesu awantu ezhima.

57003003 Mulong'a etu aweni hakusambila twaling'i asupa, azhikwa, alimbewa; twaling'i anlung'u zhakufwila kweng'i nakweng'i, nanyizang'alu yeng'i nayeng'i. Twashakamini nankunyi, niichima, nakuhelewa nakuhelang'ana.
57003004 Chikwamwekeni kukokwezha kwaNzambi, Chamwinu chetu, nikukeng'a kwinli kwakeng'ayi antu, watwamwinini.
57003005 Bayi nanyilimu yakulong'a yitwelili etu awenuku, ching'a mwaya luwi lwinli, nakuwelesha kwakuvwalika kwakwiha. Natubalumuni twikali amaha kuli Spiritu Wazhila,
57003006 atwichililuwu nankashi kuli Yesu Kristu, Chamwinu chetu.
57003007 Anatuying'ishi lehi nakututena along'a naluwi lwinli, kulonla twikali answana, akweti kuching'ezha wumi wahayanyaka.

57003008 Izu ili lalala latela kulikuhwelela. lichi nakeng'i nami, yumiyi yinahoshi wuyikoleshi nang'ovu, kulonla antu anamukuhweleli Nzambi, ashi muchima mukwila nyilimu yayiwahi. Yumiyi yayiwahi yakwashang'a antu.
57003009 Tonlolwelaku kwihuzhola kwawusupi. Ninsang'u zhamaking'u, nikufwila ntali, nikutalika zhanshimbi; mwenimu himwakwashanang'aku, himwekala chumaku.
57003010 Muntu akonkomwenawu lehi kamu hela kayeli, chochalikang'ayi hohu, ambukaku ninli.
57003011 Wuneluki lehi muntu wuli ochu nasenuki lehi munzhila, naputoli, nalitanyishi lehi yomweni.
57003012 Chinakakutemeshela Atemasi, hela Tikikusa, wakalihinlang'a kwinza kulami kuNikopoli, mulong'a natong'ozhoki nami liku kwakanchelukila chishika.
57003013 Yishinzhikizhuku chachiwahi aZenasi mukwanshimbi, niApolosi munzhila yawu; bayi abula chumaku.
57003014 Antu etu alizi kulemesha nyilimu yayiwahi, kulonla alikalakeli awenawu, akwashi niakwawu.
57003015 Antu ezhima nili nawu kunu anakwimushi. ng'imushili antu atukeng'a muchikuhwelelu. Luwi lwikali nanenu wezhima wenu.
58001001 Ami Pawulu, muntu wambala waKlistu Yesu akasawu, nimanakwetu Timotewu, tuji nakukusonekela mukanja, eyi Fwilimoni twakeng'a, mukwakukalakala hamu nanetu;
58001002 nimuheletu Afwiya, niishijika netu Akipusa, niakwachipompelu chekala mwitala jeyi.
58001003 Luwi lwikali nanenu nikuwunja kwakufuma kuji Nzambi, Tata yetu, nikuji Mwanta Yesu Klistu.
58001004 Chinakutenang'a mukulombela kwami, namusakililang'a Nzambi yami mafuku ezhima;
58001005 mulong'a natiyang'a nsang'u yakukeng'a kweyi, nikukuhwelela kweyi haji Mwanta Yesu, nichiwasha muchima haji akwakuzhila ezhima.
58001006 Nami, kutiyang'ana kunafumi kukukuhwelela kweyi kuswezhi ng'ovu, mukwiluka chikupu nenu yuma yetu yayiwahi yezhima yiji mujetu yakuji Klistu.
58001007 Eyi manakwami, natiyili kuwaha nankashi nakujikunjezha nakukeng'a kweyi kuwankeng'a, nanichi chiwunatulishi nyichima yawakwakuzhila.
58001008 jichi hela nabuli woma wakukulezha muji Klistu mwatela,
58001009 ilang'a hansang'u yakukeng'a nalembi chakulemba, ami ipala Pawulu, katataka nawa nimuntu wambala waKlistu Yesu akasawu.
58001010 Nakulembeleli hansang'u yamwanami Onesimusa, inavwali munyonzhi yami.
58001011 Hamwaka wajing'i ninji chakuhalwa, ilang'a katataka nekali jehi nkwashi wakukwasha nineyi ninami.
58001012 Nakufuntishiliyi cheng'i muntu yomweni, jiwu muchima wamami aweni.
58001013 Nakeng'a nami nishakami ninji ami aweni, kulonja yena ahing'i mujeyi ankalakelang'a munu munyonzhi yakukoola nsang'u yayiwahi muniji.
58001014 Ilang'a hinakeng'i kwila chuma chakaji kwiluka munayi muchima weyuku; nalonji chiwukung'ila chachiwahi chifumi kumuchima weyeyi aweni, bayi chakukanzhikizhaku.
58001015 Hajaha jihu hafumini kwambuka naneyi mpinzhi yantesha, kulonja wikali ninji hayanyaka;
58001016 hinjung'u nawa cheng'uku, ilang'a nabajiki njung'u, nekali jehi manakwetu wakeng'ewa; eng'a, ami namukeng'i nankashi, hakwila eyi jinu chinabajiki, nimumuzhimba nimuji Mwanta.
58001017 Neyi wantong'ozhokang'a neyi nimukwenu twatiyang'anang'a neyi, mutambuli neyi wunantambuli ami aweni.
58001018 Neyi yena nakukong'i chatama hela chanti, inji kwizhi neyi wukweti mukuji weyi, shaku kumukanja wami.
58001019 Ami Pawulu nasoneki nachikasa chamami aweni, nami nakakufuta; naleki kuhosha nami eyi aweni wukweti mukuji wami wawumi weyi waweni.
58001020 Eng'a, manakwami, nimonuhu kunkwasha kujeyi muji Mwanta; ntulishi muchima muji Klistu.
58001021 Chinakusonekeli mukanjiwu neluki chalala nami wukwovwahilamu, neluki nami wukubajika kwila nimunahoshi.
58001022 Nlong'esheli nawa mwakushakama; mulong'a nakuhweleli nami akamfuntisha kujenu nakulombela kwenu.
58001023 Epafwalasa, twekala ninji mukaleya muji Klistu Yesu, nakwimushi;
58001024 aMaku, naAlisitaka, najemasi niLuka akwakukalakala hamu nanami anakwimushi.
58001025 Luwi lwaMwanta Yesu Klistu lwikali naspilitu yenu.
59001001 Nzambi wahoshelang’a hanshankulu nawankakulula muji atuplofwetu munsang’u zheng’i nazheng’i, mweng’i namweng’i.
59001002 Hamafuku anu akukuminina, nahoshi nanetu muji Mwana ákunzhikiliyi kwikala nswana wayuma yezhima, muji yena jimu mwaleng’eleluwu yuma yamwiwulu niyamunu mwishina yezhima.

59001003 Yena Mwana jiyi kutong’eka kwalubanzhi lwakulema kwaNzambi, jiyi wekala chikupu mwomwekalilayi Nzambi, jiyi wakwatishang’a yuma yezhima nezu jang’ovu zhinji. Chanamanishiyi mujimu wakutookesha nshiji, hakushakama kuchikasa chachijiilu chaMukeleng’i wekala mwiwulu;
59001004 anamwilishi jehi wakubajika ang’elu, nanochu chanaswaniyi izhina jakubajika jawu kuwaha.
59001005 Inji kang’elwinyi keliliyi hela ifuku jimu ninji, Eyi wumwanami, nakuvwali lelu? Cheng’i nawa ninji, Ami nukwikala Tata, yena wukwikala Mwana?
59001006 Chakuletayi Weji mumpata yawantu, hakuhosha cheng’i ninji, Ang’elu zhaNzambi ezhima ajifukuli kuji yena.
59001007 Ang’elu hakuyitena ninji, Ang’elu zhinji wayilishang’a aspilitu, Akwakumukalakela wayilishang’a nyizuzu yakesi;
59001008 hakwinza Mwana hakumutena ninji, Eyi Nzambi, itanja jeyi jawanta jahayanyaka nanyaka; Ninkanu yakulong’a jiyi nkanu yawanta weyi.
59001009 Wunakeng’i kulong’a, wunaheli kuluwa; Jichi Nzambi, yowu Nzambi yeyi, Nakuwayishi manzhi akulung’a chakubajika akwenu.
59001010 Ninji, Eyi MWANTA, hatachi waalili chikuku chakutung’ila iseki jawantu, Nimawulu hinyijimu yakumakaseyi.
59001011 Wena akanong’a, hakwila eyi sang’a wekalila; Wezhima wawu akafuukuluka neyi chikwehina jakuvwala.
59001012 Wakayivung’a neyi kahuma, Neyi chikwehina jakuvwala akabalumuka kwawu; Ilang’a eyi kweyi mwomweyi; Ninyaka yeyi hiyamba kakumaku.
59001013 Inji kang’elwinyi keliliyi hela ifuku jimu ninji, Shakamaku kuchikasa chami chachijiilu nichinakabalumuna akwankunyi neyi kwikala itanja jakunyenju yeyi?
59001014 Wezhima wawu hiyaspilitu anatemeshuwu kukalakela hansang’u yawantu akaswana wamwinu.
59002001 Jichi twaji kuswezha kusha muchima kunsang’u ozhu zhitwatiyili, twakenja kahung’umuka.
59002002 Mulong’a neyi izu jahosheliyi Nzambi muji ang’elu jakoleli, ninyilong’a yezhima nikuzhikwa kwezhima kwatambwili wulooku watelela,
59002003 inji etu tukupuluka ng’ahi, neyi tukusekesha wamwinu watoha chikumahichi? Wamwinu wasambilili kushimunawu kuji Mwanta, atukolesheleluwu kuji antu atiyili.
59002004 Nzambi nawa hakushimuna wunsahu hamu nawena, nayinzhikizhilu, nayihayamisha, nanyijimu yang’ovu yeng’i nayeng’i, nayamukunkulu yaSpilitu Wazhila, mwaya muchima winji yomweni.
59002005 Mulong’a ang’elu hijiwu ovwahishililiyi iseki jawantu jakenza jitwatenang’etuku.
59002006 Muntu wumu washimuna jehi kumukanja wazhila wumu ninji, Muntu hichumanyi mwaka wumushi kumuchima, Hela mwana kamuntu mwaka wumuhempuli?
59002007 Wamwilishili wakuminamu chanti haji ang’elu, Wamuvwikili chibang’ula chalubanzhi lwakulema nimpuhu, Wamushilili kuyuula nyijimu yakumakaseyi.

59002008 Wovwahishili yuma yezhima yiikali kwishina janyenju yinji. Nanochu chanamwovwahishiliyi yuma yezhima, hanashiyi chuma chakubula kumwovwahilaku. Ilang’a katataka kanja tumoni yuma yezhima kumwovwahilaku.

59002009 Ilang’a tunamoni Yesu, elishiluwu wakuminamu chanti haji ang’elu, kulonja akatompeli antu ezhima kufwa naluwi lwaNzambi, anamuvwiki jehi chibang’ula chalubanzhi lwakulema nimpuhu, nanochu chamweniyi makabi akufwa.

59002010 Mulong’a chamuteleleli yena mwiniyuma yezhima, kwekala yuma yezhima, kumutelesha nlomboli yawamwinu wawu namakabi, kulonja ekali welukamu chikupu nanochu chakushikizhayi anyana amavulu kulubanzhi lwakulema.
59002011 Jichi yena wazhilikang’a, ninawa anazhilikuwu, wezhima wawu afuma kuji yowumu hohu; jihu hanafumi kubula kutiya nsonyi yakuyitena ninji anakwami;
59002012 ninji, Nukushimwina anakwami izhina jeyi; Nukukwimbila tumina twakukuhameka mukachi kachipompelu.
59002013 Cheng’i ninji, Ami nakamukuhwelela. Cheng’i nawa ninji, Talaku ninami nianyana ananyinkiyi Nzambi.
59002014 Chelawu anyana ekala nanyizhimba yamashi, jichi niyena nawa hakwikala mwomumu; kulonja chakufwayi yena, abalumuni jiyabolu wajing’i nang’ovu yakufwa ekali chimwang’azhi;
59002015 apulwishi ezhima ajing’i muwujung’u wawoma wakufwa nyaka yawu yezhima.
59002016 Mulong’a chalala hakwatang’a kunsang’u zhawang’eluku, nakwati kunsang’u zhawanyana kaAbalahama.
59002017 Jichi chamuwahilili yena kwikala neyi anakwinji muyuma yezhima, kulonja ekali Kaplistu Muneni waluwi nakashinshi kunsang’u yaNzambi; ekali ifutu janshiji zhawantu.
59002018 Chakabiliyi yomweni nakumutesha, yena natweshi kukwasha antu akuteshawu.
59003001 Jichi enu anakwetu azhila, enu akwakutambwila kutambika kwamwiwulu hamu, shinshikenu Kapostolu, Kaplistu Muneni wakwitezha kwetu, yowu Yesu.
59003002 Yena wajing’i washinshika kumesu aniwu wamukunzhikili kumujimu, neyi cheliliyi Mosi mwitala jaNzambi jezhima.
59003003 Anamufuukuli nawu yena watela kumulemesha chakubajika Mosi, chochahamekang’awu ntung’i yetala chakubajika itala jajeni.
59003004 Mulong’a matala ezhima akweti ayitung’ili, hakwinza watung’ili yuma yezhima jiyi Nzambi.
59003005 Chalala Mosi washinshikili mwitala jaNzambi jezhima neyi ng’amba, nakushimuna nachu yuma yamba katenawu kukukuminina.
59003006 Hakwila Klistu washinshika mwitala jaNzambi nanochu chaneliyi yena hiMwana. Etu yetu itala jinji, neyi tukukakela mukuumika kwetu, nikujisama kwakuching’ezha kwetu njo-o nikunsa.
59003007 Spilitu Wazhila nahoshi ninji, Lelu neyi mukutiya izu jinji,
59003008 Bayi muchinchikisha nyichima yenu neyi haleteluwu ntaji, Cheliluwu hefuku jakweseka muchinkalampataku,
59003009 Hang’esekeluwu ankakulula zhenu, Hantompeluwu hamwenuwu nyijimu yami nyaka makumi awana (40).
59003010 Antu awa nayitiyili kutama, nelili nami, Hiyantu azhimbalang’a munyichima yawu mafuku ezhima, Hiyaneluki nzhila zhamuku.
59003011 Jichi hinukusanyika mukuzuwa kwami nami hiyakeng’ila mukunooka kwamuku.
59003012 Enu anakwetu, babalenu hakenja kwikala mwinenu wumu wukweti muchima watama wakubula kukuhwelela, wakuleka Nzambi wamumi.
59003013 Ching’a kujikonkomwena hefuku hefuku hohanu hachiji kutenawu nawu, Lelu; mwinenu wumu wakenja kachinchika nakujimbana kwanshiji.
59003014 Mulong’a anatwilishi jehi akwakutambwila Klistu hamu, neyi tukukakela mutwatachikili kujikolesha njo-o nikunsa.
59003015 Hohanu hachiji kwilawu nawu, Lelu neyi mukutiya izu jinji, Bayi muchinchikisha nyichima yenu neyi chaleteluwu wena ntajuku.
59003016 Áleteli ntaji hatiyiluwu, ajing’i anyi? Wowu ezhima afumini muEzhipitu naMosi.
59003017 Inji awa atiyiliyi kutama nyaka makumi awana (40), ajing’i anyi? Wowu aputoleli, hiyakunong’ela muchinkalampata.
59003018 Inji awa asanyikililiyi ninji himwakeng’ila mukunooka kwamuku, ajing’i anyi? Wowu azhikwili.
59003019 Tunamoni netu akang’enyi kwing’ilamu mulong’a wakubula kukuhwelela.
59004001 Jichi chanatushiyiluwu chikaninu chakwing’ila mukunooka kwinji, tutiyenu woma hakenja kamwekana mwinenu wumu wukufwana neyi nakang’anyi kushikamu.
59004002 Chalala ninetu anatushimwini nsang’u yayiwahi neyi chayishimwininuwu niwena, ilang’a mazu atiyiluwu hiyayikwashiluku, mulong’a antu atiyili abulili kubombelaku kukuhwelela.

59004003 Jichi etu tunakuhweleli tweng’ilang’a mukunookoku kwateneniyi ninji, Chinazuwili nasanyikili nami hiyakeng’ila mukunooka kwamuku. Kutong’a chalala nyijimu yamanini kufumisha haaliluwu chikuku champata yamunu mwishina.
59004004 Mulong’a hamukanja wazhila hacheng’i nateni ifuku jamuchitanu nachiyeji ninji, Chamanishiliyi Nzambi nyijimu yinji yakong’elang’ayi yezhima, Hakunooka hefuku jamuchitanu nachiyeji.
59004005 Wahoshelumu cheng’i ninji, Hiyakeng’ila mukunooka kwamuku.
59004006 Jichi jinu kunashali kwing’ila amakwawu, hakwila wena asambilili kushimwinawu nsang’u yayiwahi akang’enyi kwing’ila mulong’a wakuzhikwa;
59004007 hakutena cheng’i ifuku jimu muji Javiji, henohu munahiti jehi nyaka, ninji, Lelu. Mwomwanahoshiyi jehi ninji, Lelu neyi mukutiya izu jinji Bayi muchinchikisha nyichima yenuku.
59004008 Mulong’a neyi Yoshuwa wayinkeli kunooka, Nzambi haji kutena nawa cheng’i ifuku jikwawu kukukumininaku.
59004009 Jichi kuji antu aNzambi kunashali kunooka kwaSabata yayeni.
59004010 Mulong’a muntu neng’ili jehi mukunooka kwaNzambi, naleki jehi nawa nyijimu yinji, nanooki jehi neyi chanookeliyi Nzambi hamanishiliyi nyijimu yinji.
59004011 Jichi tushenu muchima hakwing’ila mukunookoku, hakenja kamwekana muntu wukujimbuka nakulonjezha mwazhikwiluwu wena.

59004012 Mulong’a izu jaNzambi jajumi, jikweti ng’ovu, jatwa chakubajika mpoku yakabali yikweti wumwemu kuyeji, japwikang’a nakwambula wumi naspilitu, manung’i namanzhi, jaswezha kushinshika yitong’ozhoka niyafuukulang’a muchima.
59004013 Kwosi chuma chaleng’eluwu chinabuli kumwekana kumesu injuku, yuma yezhima yiji nzekesi, yiji hatooka kumesu ayena itwamba kajimona ninji.
59004014 Jichi chitukweti Kaplistu Muneni waswezha kulema, napanjakani jehi mawulu, yowu Yesu, Mwana kaNzambi, tukakelenu chikuhwelelu chetu mbe.
59004015 Mulong’a tukweti Kaplistu Muneni watweshang’a kutiya wushona chitwazeyazeyang’etu, niyena amutesheli muyuma yezhima neyi chatuteshang’awu etu, ilang’a muji yena nshiji mwosi.
59004016 Jichi tukunjamenu kwakwihi netanja jaluwi chakaji woma, tutambuli kwanakena, tumoni luwi lwakutukwasha hitukumona kukala.
59005001 Mulong’a atuplistu amaneni ezhima atonjang’awu mukachi kawantu, ayikunzhikang’a kumujimu wakukong’ela antu muyuma yaNzambi, kulonja akalambuli yamukunkulu, nakuketula yimuna yahanshiji.
59005002 Awa atuplistu amaneni anatweshi kutiyila wushona antu ayambashanang’a niapwapukang’a, mulong’a niwena aweni azeyazeyang’a.
59005003 Jichi ching’a alambuli niyanshiji zhawu aweni, neyi chalambulang’awu yawakwawu nawa.
59005004 Kwosi muntu wajilemeshang’a yomweni ninji ekali kaplistu munenuku, ching’a amutambika kuji Nzambi, neyi chamwililuwu Aloni.
59005005 Jichi niKlistu nawa hajilemesheli yomweni ninji ekali kaplistu munenuku, ilang’a Nzambi jiyi wámwilili ninji, Eyi wuMwanami, lelu nakuvwali.
59005006 Neyi chaneliyi kwacheng’i ninji, Eyi wukaplistu wahayanyaka wamwaya wuplistu waMelekizejek

59005007 Mumafuku ashakaminiyi Yesu mumuzhimba heseki wamulambwili kulombela nikulembelela nakujila kwakweni namajilu kuji yena watwesheli kumupulwisha afumi mukufwa; amutiyili nanochu chajing’iyi nawoma wakwakama Nzambi.
59005008 Hela wajing’i Mwana, wajizili kwovwahila nayuma yakabiliyi.
59005009 Jichi chanekaliyi walala chikupu, hakwikala mukwakubusa nzhila yawamwinu wahayanyaka kuji ezhima akumwovwahila.
59005010 Hiyakumutena kuji Nzambi ninji Jiyi Kaplistu Muneni wamwaya wuplistu waMelekizejeki.
59005011 Tukweti yuma yayivulu yakumutena yena, yakala kulumbulula mulong’a muneli akwakutiya nakuhuwang’esha.

59005012 Hanu mutenowu mwela jehi antang’ishi, heseka munakeng’i cheng’i wákuyitang’isha mwaya nsang’u zhamazu aNzambi zhatachi; mwabalumuka jehi kwikala akwakukeng’a mayeli hohu bayi kujya kwakolaku.
59005013 Mulong’a muntu wanwang’a mayeli wabula kushinshika mwaya izu jakulong’a, mulong’a himukeki.
59005014 Ilang’a kujya kwakola kwambala kwawantu apama jehi; wowu afumba jehi yitong’ozhoka yawu, enzhilila jehi kwambula yayiwahi nayatama.
59006001 Jichi tulekenu kutang’isha nsang’u zhaKlistu zhatachi, tukulenu tupami. Bayi twala cheng’i chikuku chakubalumuka mumuchima nakuleka nyijimu yaleta kufwa, nichakumukuhwelela Nzambi,
59006002 nichantang’ishilu yakuzhimika, niyakunang’ika makasa, niyakusang’uka afu, niyakusompa kwahayanyakaku.
59006003 Neyi Nzambi netezhi tukwila mwenomu.
59006004 Mulong’a wenawa amweni jehi chezhezhi, atompeli chamukunkulu chamwiwulu, atambwili yaSpilitu Wazhila,
59006005 atompeli izu jaNzambi nawu jajiwahi, ning’ovu zhanyaka yakenza,
59006006 neyi wena akulekamu, hiyakutwesha kuyibalumuna cheng’i munyichimaku, mulong’a aji nakujipopela Mwana kaNzambi hakulusu chachiha, enja amusawula hatooka.
59006007 Mulong’a iseki jinanwi nvula yanokang’a kakavulu, jikusong’esha yisakola yatela kujya awa anajijimi, ajikiswilang’a kuji Nzambi.
59006008 Ilang’a neyi jikusong’esha nying’a nanzonzonzu akujisekesha, keng’a jishing’ewi; kukumisha kweseki oju hikusukuma.
59006009 Hakwila enu akwetu twakeng’a, hela tunahoshi mwenimu, tunayikuhweleli netu mukweti yuma yabajika iyi kuwaha, yuma yenzang’a nawamwinu.
59006010 Mulong’a Nzambi walong’a, hakalalamena mujimu wenu hela kukeng’a kumwakeng’eli izhina jinjuku, nanochu chimwakalakeleli akwakuzhila, nihanu muchiji kuyikalakela.
59006011 Tunakeng’i netu wezhima wenu hamuntu hamuntu mujikwatishi chalala chochimu, kulonja muswezhi kuching’ezha, njo-o nikunsa.
59006012 Mubuli kushimpokela, ching’a mwimbuzholi wenawa akuswana yikaninu nakukuhwelela nakujung’umika.
59006013  Chamukaninuwu Abalahama kuji Nzambi, chabuliliyi mukwawu wamubajika, hakujisanyika yomweni,
59006014 ninji, Chalala kukisula nakakukiswila, Kuvulisha nakakuvulishila anyaneyi.  v 15Chajung’umikiliyi nakutatakena, hakutambula chikaninu.
59006016 Antu asanyikang’a akwawu ayibajika; ntaji zhawu zhezhima azhiketulang’a nakusanyika, kulonja kukoleshamu chikupu.
59006017 Chochimu niNzambi, chakeng’eliyi kulezha chachiwahi answana zhachikaninu chimwabulang’a kubalumuka mwatong’weliyi, hakushaku kusanyika.

59006018 Kulonja nayuma yiyeji yakábalumukang’a, yabulang’a kutweshayi Nzambi kutwamba, tumwenuku kukunjezha kukweti ng’ovu, etu tunatemukili kwakupulukila, tukwati kukuching’ezha kwanatushiluwu kumbiji yetu.
59006019 Kuching’ezhoku kwemikishang’a muchima wetu, neyi chikung’u chakwimikisha nachu watu; kwalala, kwakola, kweng’ila mwamweni mwazhila mwakuzhika nehina;
59006020 mwenomu mweng’ilayi Yesu, mukwakuyang’ahu jehi kumbiji hansang’u yetu, anamukunzhiki jehi kwikala Kaplistu Muneni wahayanyaka wamwaya wuplistu waMelekizejeki.
59007001 Mulong’a yeniwu Melekizejeki, mwanta waSalema, kaplistu kaNzambi Wabajika Kwiwulu, wakinkililili Abalahama hafuntiliyi kwayiliyi nakutapa anyanta, wamukiswilili nkisu.
59007002 Abalahama hakumwambwila yena iseka jamwikumi jayuma yezhima. Kulumbulula izhina jaMelekizejeki, chakusambila nawu, Mwanta wakulong’a; cheng’i nawu, Mwanta waSalema, jiyi Mwanta wakuwunja.
59007003 Wakaji tata yinji hela mama yinji hela iking’u; wakaji hatachikililiyi mafuku inji, hela hakumishililiyi kuhanja; ilang’a amufwikizhili neyi Mwana kaNzambi, wekala kaplistu hayanyaka.
59007004 Tong’ozhokenu chatoheliyi muntu iwu, enkeluwu kuji nkakulula Abalahama iseka jamwikumi jayuma yabajika kuwaha yapuupiliyi kunzhita.
59007005 Chalala anyana kaLevi, átambulang’a mujimu wawuplistu, ayilezhang’a kutambula kuji antu iseka jamwikumi mwaya nshimbi; hiyakutambula kuji anakwawu, kutong’a anayivwali kuji Abalahama.
59007006 Hakwila Melekizejeki, wabulili kufuma kumuchiji wawaLevi, watambwili kuji Abalahama iseka jamwikumi, hakumukiswila nkisu yena wekala nayikaninu.

59007008 Kwosi wukutajika mwoku, wanyanya amukiswilang’a nkisu kuji wamubajika. 8 Mwenimu antu amba kafwa atambulang’a iseka jamwikumi, ilang’a mwenomu owu watambulang’a jiyi anashimunuwu nawu wahanjang’a.
59007009 Chaya mukwila nawu Levi, wátambulang’a yamwikumi, wamwinkeli Melekizejeki yamwikumi muji Abalahama,
59007010 mulong’a Levi wajing’i wuchiji muji Tata yinji Abalahama, hamukinkilililuwu kuji Melekizejeki.

59007011 Ichi jinu, neyi kulong’a chikupu kwenzhili nawuplistu wawaLevi, mulong’a jimu mwatambwililuwu antu nshimbi, kwaji kumwekenaji kaplistu mukwawu wamwaya wuplistu waMelekizejeki, bayi wakumuchiji waAlonuku?
59007012 Chanabalumunuwu wuplistu, ching’a abalumuna ninshimbi nawa.
59007013 Mulong’a iwu anatenenuwu yumiyi, wekala kumuchiji wacheng’i wabulili kukalakala kukameng’a kakulambwila.
59007014 Mulong’a tuneluki netu Mwanta wetu wavwalikili kuji Yuja, muchiji wabulili kutenenayi Mosi wuplistu.
59007015 Chinalumbuluki jehi nankashi ichi chikunamwekani jehi kaplistu mukwawu wafwana neyi Melekizejeki,
59007016 anakunzhikuwu kwikala kaplistu wakung’ovu zhawumi wakánong’ang’a, bayi wakunshimbi yakulezha kwawuntuku.
59007017 Mulong’a anamushimuni wunsahu nawu, Eyi wuKaplistu wahayanyaka Wamwaya wuplistu waMelekizejeki.
59007018 Afumishili nshimbi yakusambila mulong’a yazeyeli, kukwashana nehi;
59007019 mulong’a nshimbi hiyawahishili chikupu chuma nichimuku. Hiyakuletamu kuching’ezha kwabajika kuwaha kutukukunjama nachu kwakwihi naNzambi.
59007020 Hichajing’i chakaji kusanyikaku;

59007021 mulong’a wena ayikunzhikili kwikala atuplistu chakaji kusanyika, hakwila yena ching’a nakusanyika kwanowu welili ninji, MWANTA wasanyikili, hakabalumuka mwoku, ninji, Eyi wuKaplistu wahayanyaka.
59007022 Jichi Yesu nekali jehi chizhiikilu chachitiyang’enu chabajika kuwaha.
59007023 Chalala akunzhikili antu amavulu kwikala atuplistu, nanochu chakang’enyuwu kushakama muwuplistu hansang’u yakufwa;
59007024 hakwila yena wukweti wuplistu winji wakábalumukang’a, nanochu chashakamayi hayanyaka.
59007025 Jichi yena natweshi kwamwina chikupu antu akunjamang’a kwakwihi naNzambi nayena, nanichi chahanjayi yena hayanyaka nakuyilembelela.
59007026 Mulong’a Kaplistu Muneni wuji ochu watuteleleli, wazhila, wakaji makasu, wakaji kuzhilola, waambuka kuji akwanshiji, anamubajishi jehi mawulu

59007027 Hakweti mujimu wakulambula hefuku hefuku neyi awa atuplistu amaneni acheng’uku; wena asambililang’a kuketula yimuna yahanshiji zhawu awenawu, nkumininaku niyawantu amakwawu nawa; Yesu welili mwenimu kamu hohu hajilambwiliyi yomweni ekali mulambu.
59007028 Mulong’a nshimbi yakunzhikang’a antu azeya kwikala atuplistu amaneni, hakwila izu jakusanyika jalonjeleli munshimbi, hijikukunzhika Mwana wela jehi walala chikupu hayanyaka.
59008001 Nochu mwenimu mutunahoshi chaya mukwila netu, tukweti Kaplistu Muneni wuji ochu, washakama jehi kuchikasa chachijiilu chetanja jawanta jaMukeleng’i mumawulu;
59008002 yena Klistu mukwakukalakala mumalala, nimutabanaka yalala yalemenuwu kuji Mwanta bayi kuji muntuku.
59008003 Mulong’a atuplistu amaneni ezhima ayikunzhikang’a kumujimu wakulambula yamukunkulu nikuketula yimuna, jichi chinawahi niyeniwu ekali nachuma chakulambula.
59008004 Neyi wajing’i heseki haji kutwesha kwikala kaplistu nihantuku, mulong’a kwekala amakwawu alambulang’a yamukunkulu mwaya nshimbi.

59008005 Chuma chakalakalang’awu wena hichuma chakufwikizha nachu, himwevulu wayuma yamwiwulu; mulong’a chakeng’eliyi Mosi kutung’a Tabanaka, amukonkomweneni nawu, Wutalang’a ching’a wakela mwezhima mwaya chesekelu chayu, chiyakulezheluwu hampiji.
59008006 Hakwilichi yena natambuli jehi mujimu wabajika nankashi kuwaha, nanochu chaneliyi hiihaku jachitiyang’enu chabajika kuwaha, chanatiyang’anuwu nayikaninu yabajika kuwaha.
59008007 Mulong’a neyi chakusambila chabulili hichatamina hiyaji kukeng’akeng’a chamuchiyejuku.
59008008 Mulong’a chayimweniyi kuluwa, MWANTA hakwila ninji, Tiyenu, kwakenza mafuku inakatiyang’ana chitiyang’enu chachiha Namutang’a waIsalela nimutang’a waYuja.

59008009 Hichakaya mwaya chitiyang’enu chinatiyang’eni nawankakulula zhawu, ifuku jinayikwatili kuchikasa nakuyifumisha mwitung’a jaEzhipituku; chena chitiyang’enochu achizhahili, ninami hinayishili wena kumuchimaku, jimu mwanahoshiyi MWANTA.

59008010 MWANTA ninji, Tiyenu chitiyang’enu chinakatiyang’ana namutang’a waIsalela hakamana mafuku owu; Nakasha nshimbi zhami muyitong’ozhoka yawu, Nakazhisoneka munyichima yawu. Nakekala Nzambi yawu, Niwena akekala antu ami.

59008011 Hiyakajitang’ishatang’isha nawa cheng’i, Iwu nakutang’isha mukwawu, Iwu nakutang’isha manakwinji, ninji, Ilukaku MWANTAku; Mulong’a akang’iluka wezhima wawu, Kufumisha kuji wakaji kulema, Njo-o nikuji waswezha kulema.
59008012 Mulong’a ami nakayanakena kuluwa kwawu, ninshiji zhawu hinakazhanuka nawa cheng’uku.
59008013 Chanateniyi chitiyang’enu ochu ninji chachiha, komana chatachi nachilishi jehi chachikulu. Hakwila ochu chikuya nakunong’a, chela jehi chanyaka, keng’a chizhimini.
59009001 Hela chitiyang’enu chatachi nichena chajing’i nayizhila yakukalakela nachu Nzambi, nimalala akutung’a kuji antu.
59009002 Mulong’a mutabanakoyu yatachi yatung’iluwu mwajing’i wimenu wamanong’u, nimesa, nimankenji akutenteka kumesu aNzambi, mwatenang’awu nawu Mwazhila.
59009003 Kwishinaji jehina jakuzhika jamuchiyeji, kwajing’i kapeka katenang’awu nawu Mwamweni Mwazhila;

59009004 mwajing’i kameng’a kawulu kakwochela insensi, nichimbang’u chachitiyang’enu chakulamika nawulu chezhima kwi-njo, mwajing’i inùng’u yawulu yamanina, nimukombu waAloni wasapukili, nimalola awubasa achitiyang’enu.
59009005 Hewulu jachimbang’u hajing’i akelubi alubanzhi lwakulema abuta hetanja jaluwi. Kutena yumiyi katataka hachuma hachuma, kutwesha nehi.
59009006 Chakwilawu analong’eshi jehi yumiyi, atuplistu hiyakwing’ila mutabanaka yatachi hefuku hefuku nakukalakala nyijimu yayu.

59009007 Ilang’a yamuchiyeji kaplistu muneni hakwing’ilang’amu inkawinji hamwaka wumu kamu, hamwaka wumu kamu, ching’a namashi akulambula hamuzhimba winji yomweni, nihansang’u yakuluwaluwa kwawantu amakwawu.
59009008 Spilitu Wazhila washimwini nachu, ninji nzhila yakwing’ila Mwamweni Mwazhila yachijing’i kanja ayimwekeshi, hachijing’i kwimana tabanaka yatachi.
59009009 Yumiyi himwevulu wamakonu. Alambulang’a yamukunkulu nakuketula yimuna yikukang’anya kuwahisha chinlezhi chamuchima wamuntu wajifukulang’a,
59009010 nanochu chanatenuwu yakujya nakunwa, nakuwelawela kweng’i nakweng’i; hiyizhila yawuntu hohu nichamba kabalumunawu yuma yezhima yiikali yayiha.
59009011 Hakwila chanenziyi Klistu, Kaplistu Muneni wayuma yayiwahi yashika jehi, natabanaka yabajika kulema, yabajika kuwaha, yakaji kwila namakasa, hiyakuleng’a kwamunuku,
59009012 hakwing’ila Mwazhila kamu hohu bweng’i, bayi namashi ampembi nawanyana kang’ombuku, ilang’a namashi inji yomweni, chanamoniyi chakukuula nachu chahayanyaka.
59009013 Neyi mashi awampembi niang’ombi amayala nimawuti eyong’a jang’ombi wamukazhi akusampwilawu antu azhilola jehi, akuzhilika yuma yawuntu.

59009014 Komana mashi aKlistu, wajilambwili kuji Nzambi chakaji hatamayi, mwomuji Spilitu wahayanyaka, akubajika nankashi kutookesha chinlezhi chenu chamuchima, chambuki kunyijimu yaleta kufwa kulonja kukalakela Nzambi wamumi.

59009015 Jichi yena neli jehi ihaku jachitiyang’enu chachiha, kulonja awa anatambikuwu akatambuli chikaninu chawuswana wahayanyaka, nanochu chikunafwi jehi muntu wakuyikuula kunyilong’a yajing’i yakuchitiyang’enu chatachi.
59009016 Mulong’a kuji kukana kwakanang’ayi muntu henohu kanja afwi; kukanoku kwilamu ching’a yenowu muntu nafwi jehi.
59009017 Mulong’a kukanoku kwikala nang’ovu ching’a yenowu muntu nafwi jehi; hachijiyi muntu wamumi hikwekalang’a nang’ovuku.
59009018 Jichi hela chitiyang’enu chatachi, hiyachizhilikili chakaji mashuku.

59009019 Cheliliyi Mosi nayilezhi jehi antu ezhima nshimbi yezhima, hakunona mashi awanyana kang’ombi niawampembi, namenzhi, nawanja wuchinana, nachiputa chamutuntamu, hakusampwila mukanja waweni niantu ezhima.
59009020 Hakwila ninji, Talenu mashi achitiyang’enu chanatiyang’aniyi Nzambi nanenu.
59009021 Jichi niTabanaka niyuma yanyijimu yayu yezhima, hakuyisampwila mashi mwomumu.
59009022 Ami nami, mwaya nshimbi hanashali hanti nakutookesha yuma yezhima namashi. Chakaji kupwekesha mashi kwosi kwanakenaku.
59009023 Jichi chawahili kutookesha yifwikizha yayuma yamumawulu nayizhiliyi, hakwinza yuma yamumawulu yayeni, ching’a ayitookeshi nayimuna yakuketula yabajika yeniyi kuwaha.
59009024 Mulong’a Klistu heng’ilili mumalala akutung’a namakasa, akufwikizha neyi malala awenuku, ilang’a weng’ilili mwiwulu mwamweni, kulonja kutumwekena katataka kumesu aNzambi.
59009025 Bayi nakujilambula yomweni kakavuluku, neyi cheng’ilang’ayi kaplistu muneni mwazhila hamwaka hamwaka, namashi akwila himashi injuku.
