59009026 Neyi jimu, mutenowu wakaba jehi kakavulu kufumisha haaliluwu chikuku champata yamunu mwishina. Ilang’a katataka anamumwekeshi kamu hohu, kunu kunsa yanyaka, kulonja afumishi nshiji nakujilambula yomweni neyi chimuna chakuketula.
59009027 Jichi jinu chaneluwu antu anayifuukwili kufwa kamu, nkumininaku hikusompesha;
59009028 mwomumu niKlistu nawa chanamulambuluwu kamu kukoola nshiji zhawantu amavulu, wakamwekana kamuchiyeji, bayi hansang’u yanshijuku, ilang’a kulonja akayamwini antu amutalilang’a

59010001 Munshimbi muji mwevulu wayuma yayiwahi yikwinza, hijiyi yuma yayeni muyekalilaku. Jihu hafumang’a kukang’anya kuwahisha chikupu antu akunjaminang’a kwakwihi, nayimuna yaketulang’awu yoyimu hohu hamwaka hamwaka.
59010002 Mutenowu aleka jehi kuyilambula. Akwakujifukula, neyi anayitookeshi jehi, chinlezhi chawu chamuchima hichikuyihisha cheng’i nanshijuku.
59010003 Muyimunoyu mwekala kwanukisha nshiji hamwaka hamwaka.
59010004 Mulong’a mashi awang’ombi amayala niawampembi hiyanatweshi kufumisha nshiji hela hantuku.
59010005 Jichi chenzhiliyi mumpata yamunu mwishina hakwila ninji, Kukuketwila chimuna hela kukulambula mulambu, Hiwayikeng’eli kweyuku, Hiwukunlong’eshela muzhimba.
59010006 Eyi hiwunakeng’i nyilambu yamukuma yakushita, Hela nyilambu yahanshijuku.
59010007 Hinukwila nami, Tala, Ami nenzi jehi nakwila muchima weyi, eyi Nzambi; Chochanasonekuwu mumukanja wakuvung’a nakuntenami

59010008 Chanasambiliyi jehi kuhosha ninji, Yimuna yakuketula nanyilambu, Hela nyilambu yamukuma yakushita niyahanshiji, hiwayikeng’eli kweyuku; hela kuyitiya kuwaha hiwayitiyili kuwahaku. Nyilambu yeniyi ayilambulang’a mwaya nshimbi.
59010009 Hakuhosha cheng’i ninji, Tala, ami nenzi jehi nakwila muchima weyi. Hakufumisha chatachi kulonja akoleshi chamuchiyeji.
59010010 Nawena muchimowu anatuzhiliki namulambu wamuzhimba waYesu Klistu walambwiliyi kamu hohu bweng’i.
59010011 Chalala atuplistu ezhima emanang’a hefuku hefuku nakukalakala, nakulambula kakavulu yimuna yakuketula yoyimu, yabulang’a kutwesha kufumisha nshiji hela hanti;
59010012 hakwila yena, chanajilambuliyi ekali chimuna chimu chakuketula chahanshiji chahayanyaka, hakushakama kuchikasa chaNzambi chachijiilu;
59010013 kufumisha henohu hakutalila hamba kabalumunawu akwankunyi ninji kwikala itanja jakunyenju yinji.
59010014 Namulambu wumu hohu yena nawahishi chikupu antu anazhilikuwu, chahayanyaka.
59010015 NiSpilitu Wazhila nawa hakutushimwina wunsahu,

59010016 mulong’a chanahoshiyi jehi ninji, Tiyenu chitiyang’enu chinakatiyang’ana nawu hakamana mafuku owu; Jimu mwaneliyi MWANTA ninji, Nakasha nshimbi zhami muyitong’ozhoka yawu, Nakazhisoneka munyichima yawu.
59010017 Hakuhosha cheng’i ninji, Hinamba kaanuka nawa cheng’i nshiji yawu hela kuluwa kwawuku.
59010018 Kwekala kwanakena antu yumiyi hikwekala nawa cheng’i kulambula mulambu wahanshijuku.
59010019 Jichi jinu enu anakwetu, chitunabuli woma wakwing’ila mwazhila namashi aYesu,
59010020 nanzhila yayiha yatubusililiyi, yayumi, yamwihina jakuzhika, namuzhimba winji;
59010021 chitukweti kaplistu wakubajika wakuyuula mwitala jaNzambi,

59010022 tukunjamenu kwakwihi namuchima walala, nakukuhwelela kwakweni, nanyichima yetu yakusampwila jehi, kulonja chinlezhi chamuchima chatama chitooki, nanyizhimba yetu yakuwelesha jehi namenzhi amawahi.
59010023 Tukakelenu kwitezha kwakuching’ezha kwetu mbe, chakubula kuzhinoka, mulong’a wákanini washinshika.
59010024 Tujitong’ozhokenu muntu namukwawu, kulonja tusang’umuni kukeng’ang’ana nakwila nyijimu yayiwahi.
59010025 Bayi tuleka kupompa hamu neyi chelang’awu amakwawuku, ching’a kujikolesha wumu namukwawu, chiswezhi nankashi nanichi chimunamoni Ifuku Oju hijikwinza nakuswila kwakwihi.
59010026 Mulong’a neyi tukuputola chakukeng’amu, iku tweluka jehi walala, hikunashali chimuna chikwawu chakuketwila hanshijuku;
59010027 kunashali kwawoma waweni wakutalila kusompesha nikesi kabijimang’a kakanong’esha ayilumbu.
59010028 Muntu najiwuli nshimbi yaMosi, chakumushimunawu kuji ayinsahu ayeji hela asatu, wukufwa chakaji luwi.

59010029 Muntu najati Mwana kaNzambi, nátong’ozhoki mashi achitiyang’enu amuzhilikiluwu nachu ninji hiyazhilaku, násawuli Spilitu waluwi, munatong’ozhoki nenu akabula kumufuukula nawu nateli kubabesha chakubajika, tahinji?
59010030 Mulong’a twamwiluka yena welili ninji, Yami nukutenja, yami nukufweta. Cheng’i nawa ninji, MWANTA wakasompesha antu inji.
59010031 Hichuma chikweti woma kuholokela mumakasa aNzambi wamumi.
59010032 Ilang’a anukenu mafuku akusambila, himwelili munamoni jehi chezhezhi, chimwatatakeneni mukulwisha nankashi namakabi;
59010033 iku antu aji nakutala chakuyisawulawu nakuyikabisha, iku munajibombi nawakwenu amweni mwomumu.
59010034 Mwatiyilili luwi antu ajing’i munyonzhi; chayibuwiluwu mahetenu kuji antu, mwovwahililumu nakuzang’alala, nakwiluka enu aweni nenu mukweti iheta jabajika kuwaha jakákumang’a.
59010035 Jichi bayi muleka kuumika kwenuku, kukweti masomu abajika akayisomwenawu.
59010036 Ching’a mutatakena kulonja chimukwila muneli jehi muchima waNzambi mwakatambuli yayikaninuwu.
59010037 Nawu, Hanashali hanti nakwinza yena elang’awu nawu wakenza, hakalabaku
59010038 Cheng’i nawu, Muntu wami walong’a wukuhanjila kukukuhwelela; Hakwila neyi yena wukufuntamu, muchima wami hiwukumutiya kuwahaku.
59010039 Hakwila etu kwetu hituji akwakufuntamu nakunong’aku, mulong’a tukweti kukuhwelela kwakuheta wamwinu.
59011001 Nochu kukuhwelela yowu kwiluka chalala netu yuma yitwaching’ezhang’a yiji kwoku, yowu kumona yuma yakaji kumonewa.
59011002 Mulong’a jimu mwatiyakeneni akulumpi mpuhu yayiwahi.
59011003 Nakukuhwelela tuneluki netu yuma yezhima ayileng’eli nezu jaNzambi, chakwila yuma yamonewang’a hiyayileng’eli nayuma yamwekanang’aku.

59011004 Nakukuhwelela Abeli wamulambwili Nzambi mulambu wakubajika wálambwiliyi Kena, jichi hakutiyakana mpuhu nawu walong’a. Chatambwiliyi Nzambi yamukunkulu yinji wamushimwini wunsahu; jichi hela wafwa wuchiji kuhosha nihanu.

59011005 Nakukuhwelela amutuntulwili Enoki kulonja abuli kumona kufwa. Hiyamumwenuku mulong’a amutuntulwili kuji Nzambi. Helili kanja amutuntululi amushimwini wunsahu nawu wamutiyishilang’a Nzambi kuwaha.
59011006 Chakaji kukuhwelela hichinatweshi kumutiyisha Nzambi kuwahaku; mulong’a muntu wukwinza kuji Nzambi ching’a akuhweleli ninji wuji kwoku, ninji wasomwenang’a antu amukeng’akeng’ang’a.

59011007 Nakukuhwelela Nowa, chamusong’amishiluwu kuji Nzambi hansang’u yayuma yachijing’i kanja yimwekani, chamwakaminiyi Nzambi, hakulong’esha watu wakwamwina nachu akwetala jinji; hakuhisha nachu antu ampata yamunu mwishina, hakwikala nswana yakulong’a kwakufuma kukukuhwelela.
59011008 Nakukuhwelela Abalahama, chamutambikiluwu hakwovwahila, hakufuma mwajing’iyi, hakuya kwakukeng’a kutambwilayi wuswana, hakufuma mwajing’iyi chakaji kwiluka kwakuyayi.
59011009 Nakukuhwelela hakwikala mwenyi mwitung’a jamukaninuwu, neyi mwambala hohu, nakushakama mumatenti naIsaka naYakoba, answana akuswana ninji chikaninu chochimu;
59011010 mulong’a wajing’i nakutalila ng’anja yikweti yikuku, yakwila mukwakuyeseka nikuyitung’a yowu Nzambi.
59011011 Nakukuhwelela hela Sala yomweni watambwili ng’ovu yakubaaba ivumu heliliyi nakuli jehi, napanjakani jehi havwalilang’awu anyana; mulong’a watong’ozhokeli ninji wákanini washinshika.
59011012 Jichi kuji muntu wumu, wela jehi neyi mufu, kwavwalikili antu avula neyi tutumbwa twamwiwulu, neyi wusekulula wakuchikumu chakalung’alwizhi wakáchinjewang’a.

59011013 Wenawa ezhima afwili mukukuhwelela chakaji kutambula yayikaninuwu, akuminini jakuyimwena maaya, nakuyisambilila iku yichiji kwakulehi, hiyakwitezha nawu tuji enyi niakwakwenja mwambala hanu hamaseki.
59011014 Mulong’a antu akuhosha mwenimu hiyakushimuna chalumbuluka nawu tunakeng’i itung’a jetwetu aweni.
59011015 Mwalala neyi ashili muchima hetung’oju jafuminuwu, mutenowu atwesheli kufunta cheng’i.
59011016 Ilang’a katataka anakeng’i itung’a jabajika kuwaha, jojamwiwulu; jichi Nzambi hanatiyi nsonyi yakumutena nawu Nzambi yawuku, mulong’a wayilong’eshela jehi ng’anja.
59011017 Nakukuhwelela Abalahama, chamwesekeluwu, hakulambula Isaka. Eng’ang’i, yena watiyili kuwaha kutambula yikaninu, hakulambula mwaninji wumu hohu;
59011018 yowu atenenuwu nawu, Mbutu yeyi akayitenena muji Isaka.
59011019 Welili ninji, hela mukufwa, Nzambi natweshi kumusang’ula; jimu mwamutambwililiyi muchifwikizha.
59011020 Nakukuhwelela Isaka wakiswilili Yakoba naEsawu nkisu, nakutena yuma yamba kenza.
59011021 Nakukuhwelela Yakoba, heliliyi hakukeng’a kufwa, hakukiswila anyana kaYosefu nkisu mwayeji wawu; hakujifukula nakunong’amina hamukombu winji.
59011022 Nakukuhwelela Yosefu, heliliyi hakukeng’a kufwa, hakutena chamba kejikawu anyana kaIsalela muEzhipitu; hakuyilezha mwamba kelawu namafwahinji.
59011023 Nakukuhwelela, havwalikiliyi Mosi, anvwali zhinji amuswekeli tukwezhi tusatu, nanochu chamumwenuwu nawu himwana walubanzhi; hiyatiyili woma wanshimbi yamwantaku.
59011024 Nakukuhwelela Mosi, heliliyi nakuli jehi, hakuleka kumutena nawu mwana kamwana kaFwalo wamumbanja.
59011025 Hakutonja kumona ihung’u chimu nawantu aNzambi, hakuleka kulung’a mpinzhi yantesha nachiseki chanshiji.
59011026 Wafuukwili kusawuka kwaKlistu ninji himaheta abajika yuma yalema yamuEzhipitu yezhima, nanochu chatalililiyi masomu amba kamusomwenawu.
59011027 Nakukuhwelela wafumini muEzhipitu chakaji kutiya woma wanjombu yamwanta; chajing’i nakumonayi wakámonewang’a hakutatakena.
59011028 Nakukuhwelela hakwila Chipanjakenu nakusampwila mashi, kulonja mukwakuzhilumuna anyana aweji abuli kuyila chuma.
59011029 Nakukuhwelela ahitili muKalung’alwizhi Kachinana nakwenja hamaseki awuma, cheliluwu aEzhipitu nawu esekumu hiyakuzhilumukilamu.
59011030 Nakukuhwelela mpwembu zhaYeliku zhakunjokeli, cheliluwu anazhinyeng’umuki jehi mafuku atanu nayeji kwi-njo.
59011031 Nakukuhwelela chivumbi Lahaba hanong’eli chimu nawantu azhikwaku, mulong’a watambwili akwakwenjesha mukumwena.
59011032 Inji nukuhosha mwekwawu mujihi? Mulong’a nabuli mpinzhi yakushimuna nsang’u zhaGijeyona, naBalaka, naSamisoni, naYefwata; nizhaJaviji naSamweli nawatuplofwetu.
59011033 Wenawa emikili mawanta mushinju nakukuhwelela, elili mwaya kulong’a, atambwili yikaninu, azhikili tunwa twawanyitupa,
59011034 azhimini ng’ovu zhakesi, apulukili kukuyitapa nampoku yakabali, hazeyeluwu akwatili ng’ovu, elili ayilobu kunzhita, atemwini mazhita awantu akumatung’a acheng’i.
59011035 Ambanja atambwili afu awu chakusang’uka mukufwa.
59011036 Amakwawu ayikabishili nakuyiying’ila nikuyizhipola yikoti, eng’ang’i, ninyonzhi nituleya.

59011037 Ayasoleli malola, ayiketwoleli ketu ketu, ayesekeli, ayitapoleli nampoku yakabali. Akimbokeli nakuvwala yitembi yawanyikoku niyawampembi; asheli kwamakasa munshing’u; ayimwesheli lukaji, ayikong’eli chatama.
59011038 Mpata yamunu mwishina hiyateleleli wena kushakama mwoku. Akimbokelang’a nakululuta mwakaji menzhi, nihamapiji, nakwing’ela mumayeng’u nimumena amumaseki.
59011039 Wena ezhimawa, hela atiyakeni mpuhu yayiwahi yakukuhwelela hiyatambwili yayikaninuwuku,
59011040 mulong’a Nzambi watumwenenang’ahu jehi chuma chabajika kuwaha, kulonja abuli kuyiwahishang’ahu jehi chikupu chakaji etu.

59012001 Jichi jinu ninetu nawa, chanatunyeng’umukuwu kuji ivu jawayinsahu jikumaha, tunatenu yuma yikutulemenang’a yezhima, ninshiji oyu yanyakalang’a kutulamata, tutatakenenu nakutemuka munzhila yanatwesekeluwu.

59012002 Nakutalisha mesu kuji Yesu, jiyi mukwakubusa, jiyi mukwakuwanisha kukuhwelela kwetu. Yena hansang’u yamuzang’alu wamushililuwu kumesu inji hakuumikila kulusu, hakujiwula nsonyi, nashakami kuchikasa chachijiilu chetanja jaNzambi jawanta tenta-a.
59012003 Tong’ozhokenu yeniwu wetezheli ntaji zhawakwanshiji zhaswezha zhajikang’iluwu ninji, kulonja mubuli kuzeya nakuyekela munyichima yenu.
59012004 Muchiji kanja mujikang’i nakulwa nanshiji nakumwang’a mashi enu.
59012005 Munalalameni chayikonkomwenenuwu neyi chayilezhang’awu anyana nawu, Eyi mwanami, bayi wujiwula mwakufumbang’ayi MWANTAku; Chakukukonkololawu kuji yena bayi wuzeyaku;
59012006 Mulong’a MWANTA wafumbang’a antu akeng’ayi, Wazhipulang’a anyana ezhima atambulang’ayi.
59012007 Itezhenu kuyifumba, mulong’a Nzambi wayifumbang’a neyi chafumbang’awu anyana; inji mwananyi abulang’a kufumbawu kuji tata yinji?
59012008 Ilang’a neyi abulang’a kuyifumba kufumba kwamonang’awu antu ezhima, komana himuji anyana amwitalaku, muji anyana amuchiputa.
59012009 Cheng’i nawa, atata zhetu ahamaseki atufumbilang’a, twayilemeshelang’a; komana tubuli kubajika kwovwahila Tata yawaspilitu kulonja tuhanji?
59012010 Chalala wena atufumbili mafuku antesha mwamwenuwu kuwaha; hakwila yena nalonji kutukwasha, kulonja tutambuli kukuzhila kwinji.
59012011 Kufumba kwezhima hikwatiyishang’a kuwaha hanuku, kwaneng’eshang’a; hakwila kukukuminina kukusong’esha nyikabu yakuwunja yaleta kulong’a, kuji antu akwovwahilamu.
59012012 Jichi koleshenu makasa analepuki nimanung’u anabuli ng’ovu.
59012013 Ololenu nzhila zhimukwenja kulonja ábalakatang’a abuli kuching’umuka, ching’a ayuuki.
59012014 Lonjenu kuwunja nawantu ezhima nikuzhila, muntu wukuchibula hamba kamona Mwantaku.
59012015 Shinshikenu habuli kwikala muntu wukukang’anya kutambula luwi lwaNzambi, habuli kumena muzhi walula hiwukuyikabisha, niantu amavulu hiyakuzhilola;
59012016 habuli kwikala mukwawuzhila, hela muntu wasekesha yazhila, neyi Esawu walanjishili wuswana winji nakujya kwakujya hohenohu.
59012017 Muneluki nkumininaku chakeng’eliyi ninji aswani nkisu, hela wayikeng’eli chacheni namajilu, amulekeli; mulong’a hamweni muwubalumwinuku.
59012018 Himunenzi kumpiji yatweshekeli kukwata nachikasa, yabijimini kesuku; himunenzi kukwiyila, nikumwijima, nikumpepela yenenuku;
59012019 himunenzi kwizu jampùng’a yikuvuma, nikwizu jahosheli mazuku; izu oju chajitiyiluwu alembeli nawu bayi jihosha nanetu mazu amakwawuku.
59012020 Mulong’a ochu chayilezheluwu nawu, Hela neyi kanyama wukujata kumpiji oyu, akamwasoli malola; Hiyatwesheli kwitezha mwoku.
59012021 Kutalaku kwajing’i kukweti woma nankashi; jichi Mosi welili ninji, Natiyi woma waweni, hinukuzaala nikuzaala.
59012022 Ilang’a enu munenzi kumpiji yaZiyona kung’anja yaNzambi wamumi, yowu Yelusalema yamwiwulu, kumazaza awang’elu aweni akáchinjewang’a.
59012023 Munenzi kwanapompeluwu ezhima, kwokuchipompelu chawaweji asonekawu jehi mwiwulu, kuji Nzambi mukwakusompesha antu ezhima, kuji aspilitu zhawantu along’a anawahishuwu jehi chikupu,
59012024 kuji Yesu ihaku jachitiyang’enu chachiha, kumashi akusampwila ahoshang’a yuma yayiwahi yakubajika yahoshang’a mashi aAbeli.
59012025 Babalenu mwakenja kaleka wúkuhosha. Mulong’a wena chalekeluwu wáyikonkomweneni hamaseki abulili kupuluka, inji etu tukupuluka ng’ahi neyi tukufutalela yena wukukonkomwena kwiwulu?
59012026 Henohu izu jinji jakankishili iseki, hakwila hanu nakani ninji, Kunashali kapampa kakwawu kamu hinakakankisha iseki hohuku, nakakankisha niiwulu.
59012027 Ichi chaneliyi ninji, Kunashali kapampa kamu; chaya mukwila nawu oyu yuma yakakankishawu, kafwampi yuma yaleng’eluwu, ninji akayifumishaku, kulonja yuma yikubula kukanka yakashaluhu.
59012028 Jichi chitukutambula wanta wakákankishewang’a, tusakililenu kulonja tukalakeli Nzambi nakumutiyisha kuwaha nawoma wakumwakama.
59012029 Mulong’a Nzambi yetu hikesi kanong’eshang’a.
59013001 Kakelenu kukeng’ang’ana nawanakwenu.
59013002 Bayi mulalamena kukeng’a enyuku; mulong’a amakwawu ajiishili jehi ang’elu chakaji kuyiluka.
59013003 Anukenu áji munyonzhi, neyi kafwampi muji nawu munyonzhi. Anukenu ánakabishuwu, nanochu chimuneli ninenu aweni muji mumuzhimba nawa.
59013004 Wulu wikali walema kuji antu ezhima, nikajiji kekali kazhila; mulong’a Nzambi wakasompesha akwakuwuzhila niayivumbi.
59013005 Ikalenu nanyichima yakaji kufwila mali; tong’ozhokenu yuma yimuji nayu nenu yinawanini jehi; mulong’a yomweni nahoshi ninji, Hinamba kakulekaku, Hela kukushiya hinakakushiyaku.
59013006 Jichi twahoshang’a chakaji woma netu, MWANTA jiyi nkwashi yami, Hinukutiya womaku, Antu akung’ila chumanyi?
59013007 Anukenu anlomboli zhenu ayilezheli izu jaNzambi; shinshikenu chashakaminuwu, imbuzholenu kukuhwelela kwawu.
59013008 Yesu Klistu yowumu nihaloshi, nilelu, nihayanyaka.
59013009 Bayi muleluzhoka nakutang’isha kwakwiha kwacheng’i nakwacheng’uku; chachiwahi kukolesha muchima naluwi, bayi nayizhila yakujya yabulili kukwasha antu ashiluku muchimaku.
59013010 Etu tukweti kameng’a kakulambwila kakwila antu akalakalang’a mujimu waTabanaka kujiilaku chinzhila.
59013011 Mulong’a nyizhimba yawanyamowu akweti mashi awu, atwalang’awu mumalala kuji kaplistu muneni nakulambula hansang’u yanshiji, ayiijishili mumusumba hiyakuyishita.
59013012 Jichi Yesu niyena wejikili kuchisu hakumona yihung’u, kulonja azhiliki antu namashi inji.
59013013 Jichi ninetu tuyenu kuji yena wejika jehi mumusumba, tusenjenu kusawuka kwinji.
59013014 Mulong’a hanu hitukweti ng’anja yakushakama nyaka yezhimaku, ilang’a twatalilang’a ng’anja yamba kamwekana.
59013015 Jichi tumulambulenu Nzambi mulambu wakumuhameka mafuku ezhima muji Yesu, yoyu nyikabu yakunyivumbu yakwitezha izhina jinji.
59013016 Hakwinza kwila yuma yayiwahi nikujyang’ana bayi muchilalamenaku; mulong’a Nzambi watiyang’a kuwaha nanyilambu yiji chochochu.

59013017 Ovwahilenu anlomboli zhenu nakuyitiyilila, mulong’a ahembang’a nyichima yenu, mulong’a wena akashimunamu. Yovwahilenu kulonja eli mwenimu namuzang’alu bayi nakuneng’aku, mulong’a neyi akuneng’a hichikuyikwasha enuku.
59013018 Tulombelelenuku. Tuneluki chalala netu tukweti chinlezhi chamuchima chachiwahi, tunakeng’i kushakama chakashinshi muyuma yezhima.
59013019 Nayilembeleli nami swezhenu kulombela kulonja anyakali kumfuntisha kujenu.
59013020 Ichi jinu, Nzambi wakuwunja, wasang’wili Kabing’a Muneni Kawanyikoku muji afu, yowu Mwanta wetu Yesu, namashi achitiyang’enu chahayanyaka,

59013021 ayiwahishi chikupu munyijimu yayiwahi yezhima, mwili muchima winji. Akalakali mujenu yuma yikumutiyisha kuwaha kuyimona, muji Yesu Klistu. Lubanzhi lwakulema lwikali kuji yena hayanyaka nanyaka. Amena.
59013022 Enu anakwetu, nayilembeleli nami ilukenu jakwitezha mazu awa akukonkomwena; nayisonekeli mukanja wamazu antesha hohu.
59013023 Nayilezhi nsang’u yamanakwetu Timotewu, anamuumbuku jehi; neyi wukwinza swayi twakenza hamu ninji kujenu.
59013024 Ng’imushili anlomboli zhenu ezhima, niakwakuzhila ezhima. AkwaItaliya anayimushi.
59013025 Luwi lwikali nanenu ezhima. Amena.
60001001 Ami Yakoba, njung’u yaNzambi niyaMwanta Yesu Klistu, niji nakuyisonekela mukanja, enu akwanyichiji ikumi nayiyeji (12) munapalang’ani. Nayimushi.
60001002 Enu anakwami, tiyenu kuwaha nankashi chimukushika mukweseka kweng’i nakweng’i;
60001003 mulong’a muneluki kutompa kwatompang’awu kukuhwelela kwenu kukuleta kutatakena
60001004 Kutatakena kukalakali mujimu walala chikupu, kulonja enu mwikali awanina chikupu, mulumbuluki, mubuli chuma chimukukaankila hela chimu.
60001005 Mwinenu nabuli maana, alombi kuji Nzambi, wenkang’a antu ezhima makasa ayeji, hahosholang’aku; akumwinkawu
60001006 Ilang’a jinu alombi nakukuhwelela chakaji ntaji; mulong’a watajikang’a wuji neyi jinkanja jahakalung’alwizhi jahung’umukang’a nampepela nakubwankang’ila.
60001007 Muntu owu bayi atong’ozhoka ninji wukutambula chuma kuji Mwantaku.
60001008 Muntu wanyichima yiyeji wazhilazhilang’a mwelang’ayi mwezhima.
60001009 Manakwetu wakaji kulema atiyi kuwaha chanamulemeshuwu;
60001010 nimukwakuheta atiyi kuwaha chanamuzozeshuwu; mulong’a wakahita neyi wuluya wamwisang’a.
60001011 Mulong’a chashikang’a itang’wa mwiwulu nankanza yayeni, hiyikuumisha matahu, niwuluya hiwukuhuluka, nilubanzhi lwawu hilukukisika; jichi chakalepukayi mukwakuheta mwenjelang’ayi
60001012 Muntu watatakenang’a chamonang’ayi kweseka, nakooleki; mulong’a neyi anamutompi jehi wakatambula chibaaba chawumi, chakaniniyi Mwanta kuyinka antu amukeng’a.
60001013 Muntu anateshuwu, bayi ela ninji, Ananteshi kuji Nzambuku; mulong’a Nzambi hiyamuteshang’a nayatamaku, hela yena yomweni hateshang’a muntuku.
60001014 Muntu himuntu amuteshang’a chamukokolang’awu nakumujimbeka nakufwila kwinji yomweni kwatama.
60001015 Jichi kufwila kwatama chikukubaaba ivumu hikukuvwala nshiji; nshiji chiyikukula hiyikuvwala kufwa.
60001016 Enu anakwetu nakeng’a, bayi mujijimbaku.
60001017 Yamukunkulu yayiwahi yezhima, niyamukunkulu yawanina yezhima, yasulukang’a kwiwulu kuji Tata yayezhezhi; kuji yena hikwekala kubalumuka, hela kushetumuka neyi mwevuluku.
60001018 Watuvweli nezu jawalala mwomwafuukwiliyi yomweninji, ninji twikali neyi nyikabu yatachi yahayuma yinji yaleng’eliyi
60001019 Tiyenu enu anakwami nakeng’a. Antu ezhima anyakali kutiya, ilang’a alabi kuhosha, alabi kuzuwa.
60001020 Mulong’a kuzuwa kwawantu hikwakong’ang’a kulong’a kwaNzambuku.
60001021 Jichi fumishenu mazhilu ezhima nikutama kwakusumpoka; tambulenu izu janatumbuwu mujenu nakwovwaha munyichima, jinatweshi kwamwina wumi wenu.
60001022 Ikalenu akwakwila mwaya izu, bayi akwakukumina jakutiya hohu nakujijimba enu awenuku.
60001023 Mulong’a muntu wakuminang’a jakutiya izu, ilang’a kwilamu nehi, wuji neyi muntu najimoni chamesu muchibanzhilu;
60001024 chanajimoniyi hakufumahu, nalalameni jehi chekalayi.
60001025 Ilang’a muntu wukutala munshimbi yawanina chikupu yaletang’a kukasunuka hakukakelamu, hanekali mukwakutiya walalamenang’aku, neli mukwakwilamu, yenowu muntu wakakooleka mwakwililayi
60001026 Muntu wajimonang’a ninji nimukwakuzhila, iku kufumba ijimi jinji nehi, wuji nakujijimba mumuchima, kuzhila kwayeniwu muntu kwamukunkulwayi.
60001027 Kuzhila kwamonang’ayi Nzambi Tata yetu ninji kwalala kwakuwahi, kwokwakuhempula anshona, niamfwila hamonang’awu lukaji, nakujihemba abuli kusampukila kuyuma yampata yamunu mwishina.
60002001 Enu anakwami, chimwekala akwakukuhwelela Mwanta wetu Yesu Klistu, Mwanta walubanzhi lwakulema, bayi mwakamang’a antu kumesuku.
60002002 Mulong’a neyi muchipompelu chenu mukwing’ila muntu wavwala kazeya kawulu nimahina amawahi, mwing’ila nawa nikazweng’i wavwala mahina atama,
60002003 enu himukulemesha owu wavwala mahina amawahi, himukwila nenu, Shakamaku hanu hahawahi; himukumwila kazweng’i nenu, Imanaku oku; inji kwizhi, Shakamaku hamaseki kunyenju yami.
60002004 Chimwelang’a mwenomu, mwaambulang’a mukachi kenu, munekali akwakusompesha nayitong’ozhoka yatama.
60002005 Tiyenu enu anakwami nakeng’a, Nzambi watonjeli atuzweng’i abula yuma yamunu mwishina kwikala akwakuheta mukukuhwelela, nianswana awanta wakaniniyi antu amukeng’a.
60002006 Hakwila enu, munajiwuli kazweng’i. Akwakuheta hijiwu ayikabishang’enu nakuyikokela muyota yakusompelaku?
60002007 Hijiwu nawa atukang’a izhina jalema jayitenang’awuku?
60002008 Neyi mwovwahilang’a nshimbi yawanta wankanu yamwaya Mukanja waNzambi yakwila nawu, Keng’aku mukwenu neyi chiwajikeng’a eyi aweni; mwelang’a chachiwahi.
60002009 Hakwila neyi mwaakamang’a antu kumesu mwaputolang’a, nshimbi iyi yinayihishi, munekali jehi akwanyilong’a.
60002010 Mulong’a muntu wukuhemba nshimbi yezhima, ilang’a hakuluwa muchuma chimu, nahi kunshimbi yezhima.
60002011 Mulong’a yena welili ninji, Kwila wuvumbi chinzhila; jiyi nawa welili ninji, Kuzhaha muntu chinzhila. Nochu neyi wunabuli kwila wuvumbi, ilang’a wunazhahi mukwenu, wunamotoki jehi nshimbi
60002012 Hoshenung’a nakwila mwatelela antu akasompeshawu nanshimbi yaletang’a kukasunuka.
60002013 Muntu wukubula kutiyila akwawu luwi akumusompesha chakaji luwi; luwi lwemikang’a kusompesha mushinju
60002014 Enu anakwami, neyi muntu wukwila ninji nikweti kukuhwelela, ilang’a kwila nyijimu nehi, chikukwashana ng’ahi? Kukuhweleloku kukutwesha kumwamwina, tahinji?
60002015 Neyi manakwenu hela muhelenu wuji nawuvu, nabuli yakujya yalelu,
60002016 mwinenu wumu hakumwila ninji, Enjaku chachiwahi, tiyaku iyena, ikutaku; hakwila kumwinka yuma yakumuzhimba yanakaankiliyi nehi, chikukwashana ng’ahi?
60002017 Jichi nikukuhwelela kwakaji nyijimu kukujifwila kankawaku
60002018 Kwizhi kukwikala muntu wukuhosha ninji, Eyi wukweti kukuhwelela, ami nikweti nyijimu; nlezhi kukuhwelela kweyi kwakaji nyijimu yeyi, ninami nukukulezha kukuhwelela kwami nanyijimu yami.
60002019 Eyi wakuhwelelang’a neyi Nzambi wekala wumu; welang’a chachiwahi. Anjemoni niwena etezhang’a, hiyakuzaala nikuzaala.
60002020 Eyi muntu wabula maana, ilukaku neyi kukuhwelela kwakaji nyijimu kwamukunkulwayi.
60002021 Nkakulula yetu Abalahama, chalambwiliyi mwaninji Isaka hakameng’a kakulambwila hiyamuying’ishili nakumutena walong’a nanyijimuku, tahinji?
60002022 Wunamoni kukuhwelela kwakong’eli chimu nanyijimu yinji, nikukuhwelela kwawaninini nanyijimu.
60002023 Jimu mwalumbulukila Mukanja waNzambi welili nawu, Abalahama wamukuhweleleli Nzambi, Amufuukwililichu nawu hikulong’a, hiyakumutena nawu ibwambu jaNzambi.
60002024 Munamoni, komana muntu amuying’ishang’a nakumutena walong’a nanyijimu, bayi nakukuhwelela hohuku.
60002025 Mwomumu nichivumbi Lahaba nawa amuying’ishili nakumutena walong’a nanyijimu, hatambwiliyi akwakwenjesha itung’a nakuyifuntisha nzhila yacheng’i.
60002026 Chafwa muzhimba wakaji wumi, jichi nikukuhwelela kwakaji nyijimu kwafwa
60003001 Enu anakwetu, bayi mwikala ankulung’ang’a amavuluku; mulong’a tuneluki netu twakamona kusompesha kwakubajika.
60003002 Mulong’a wezhima wetu twaluwang’a muyuma yayivulu. Muntu wukubula kuluwa mukanwa jiyi muntu walala chikupu, natweshi kufumba nimuzhimba wezhima.
60003003 Jichi chitwashilang’a mutunwa twawatuwalu yikung’u yakuteng’ulula nachu kulonja atwovwahili, hitukuteng’ulula ninyizhimba yawu yezhima.

60003004 Tong’ozhokenu nimaatu nawa; hela aswezha kutoha, ahung’umukang’a nampepela zhaswezha ng’ovu, ilang’a ayiteng’ululang’a natuyilapu twanyanya nankashi, kwezhima kwanakeng’i kuyawu akwakuteng’ulula
60003005 Jimu nawa niijimi hikachiji kamuzhimba kanyanya, kajisamang’a yuma yamaneni. Tong’ozhokenu mpata kutoha yahang’a nakesi kantesha!
60003006 Ijimi hikesi, himpata yaheng’a mukachi kayiji yetu, jatamishang’a muzhimba wezhima, jabutulang’a kesi kayuma yamuzhimba yezhima, jabutuka jehi kesi kakalung’a kachinana.
60003007 Mulong’a antu afwomona jehi nyichiji yawanyama niyawatuja yezhima, niyuma yakayilang’a, niyuma yamukalung’alwizhi; yezhimiyi anayifwomoni.
60003008 Hakwinza ijimi kwosi muntu watweshang’a kujifwomonaku; hichuma chatama chakánookang’a, jenzala jehi wulembi wafwana.
60003009 Twakiswilang’a nachu Mwanta, yowu Tata, twashing’ang’a nachu antu aleng’eluwu ajifwana naNzambi.
60003010 Kukanwa kokamu hikukwijika ninkisu nikushing’ana. Enu anakwami, kwila mwenimu chinzhila.
60003011 Kaseloki kasefukang’a menzhi amawahi nialula mujisu jojimu, tahinji?
60003012 Enu anakwami, mutonju wachikuyu wukutwesha kusong’a maolive? hela muvinyu wukutwesha kusong’a mawunju achikuyu, tahinji? Nochu hela menzhi alumpuka hiyakutwesha kubalumuka amawahuku.
60003013 Wuji namaana nakashinshi mukachi kenu hinyi? Amwekeshi nyijimu yinji nanochu chashakamang’ayi chachiwahi, nakwovwaha mumuchima mwaya maana.
60003014 Hakwinza neyi mukweti njulu nikufwilang’ana munyichima yenu, bayi mujisama hela kuheng’esha walalaku.
60003015 Maanawa ahamaseki, amuzhimba, awanjemoni; hijiwu afumang’a mwiwuluku.
60003016 Kwekala ichima nakufwilang’ana, jiku kwekala nikuluwang’ana ninyijimu yatama yezhima.
60003017 Hakwila maana afumang’a mwiwulu, kusambila amawahi, nkumininaku awunja, ovwaha, anyakala kutiya, enzala luwi nanyikabu yayiwahi, hiyaheta ntaji hela wufwikizhuku.
60003018 Antu awunja akuwang’a kuwunja, aang’ulang’a kulong’a.
60004001 Inji mazhita namajombu mukachi kenu afumang’a hanka? Afumang’a kuyuma yimwafwilang’a yaletang’a nzhita muyiji yenu.
60004002 Mwafwilang’a yuma, kuyimona nehi; mwajizhahang’a nikutiya lwisu, kutwesha kumwenamu yuma nehi; mwalwishang’a nakulwa nzhita. Chimwabulang’a kutambula, mulong’a mwabulang’a kumulomba Nzambi.
60004003 Chimwalombang’a, kutambula nehi, mulong’a mwalombang’a chatama, kulonja mwakayikisang’ani nayuma yimwafwilang’a.

60004004 Enu ayivumbi, himuneluki nenu wubwambu wampata yamunu mwishina wukweti wulumbu naNzambuku? Jichi muntu wukukeng’a kukwata wubwambu nampata yamunu mwishina, najibalumuni jehi kwikala chilumbu chaNzambi.
60004005 Mwatong’ozhokang’a nenu Mukanja waNzambi wahoshang’a tuhu, tahinji? Spilitu washakamang’a mujetu wafwilang’a ninji, etu twikali inji chikupu.
60004006 Hakwila yena wavulishang’a luwi. Jichi chakwilayi ninji, Nzambi wajikang’ang’a nawakwakujinka wanta, Hakwila akwakujizoza wayinkang’a luwi.
60004007 Jichi mwovwahilenu Nzambi, hakwinza jiyabolu jikang’enu ninji, niyena wukuyitemuka.
60004008 Kunjamenu kwakwihi naNzambi, niyena wukukunjama kwakwihi nanenu. Enu akwanshiji, isukenu kumakasenu; enu akwanyichima yiyeji, tookeshenu munyichima yenu.
60004009 Tiyenu kumuchima bwi-i, neng’enu, jilenu. Kuseha kwenu kubalumuki kuneng’a, nikuzang’alala kwenu kubalumuki kujihomba kumesu.
60004010 Jizozenu kumesu aMwanta, niyena wukuyitohesha

60004011 Enu anakwetu, bayi mujitenang’a chatamaku. Muntu wukutena manakwinji chatama hela kumusompesha, nateni nshimbi chatama nikuyisompesha. Neyi eyi wukusompesha nshimbi, hiwuneli mukwakwovwahila nshimbuku, wuneli jehi mukwakuyisompesha.
60004012 Mukwakwinka nshimbi nikusompesha yowu wumu hohu bweng’i, yowu natweshi kwamwina nikukisang’ana; inji eyi yeyinyi mwaka wusompeshi mukwenu?
60004013 Ehe-e! Enu mwelang’a nenu, Hela lelu, hela kumajiki tukuya kumukala wakampanja, twakashakamaku mwaka wumu, twakalanjuzhola nakuhetelaku;
60004014 kutong’a yimukumona kumajiki himunayilukuku. Wumi wenu wuji ng’ahi? Enu muji mbunju, yamwekanang’a mpinzhi yantesha, kukasumuka yinahiti jehi.
60004015 Chachiwahi kwila nenu, Neyi Mwanta netezhi tukuhanja, tukwila mwenimu hela mwenomu.
60004016 Ichi jinu, chimwajinkang’a wanta himukujisama; kujisama kwezhima kumwajisamang’ochu kwatama.
60004017 Jichi muntu neluki kwila mwamuwahi, yena kwilamu nehi, kuji yena chinekali hinshiji.
60005001 Ehe-e, enu akwakuheta! Tumpenu nakukaluka nyiteti nayihung’u yimukukeng’a kumona.
60005002 Mahetenu atoka jehi, mahinenu ajiika jehi kuji tunzembula.
60005003 Wulu wenu nisiliva yenu yakwata jehi njala, ninjala yayu yakayishimuna wunsahu watama, yakajya nyizhimba yenu neyi kesi. Munajilumbikili maheta mumafuku akukumisha
60005004 Tiyenu, mbila yawulooku wawantu akalakeli, ámunini mumahenu, wúmunakakeli chawukombi. Tiyenu nimbila zhanawa amunini zhineng’ili jehi mumatu aMWANTA Wamazaza.
60005005 Munashakami nakulung’a hanu hamaseki; munajitiyishi kuwaha; munajitoheshi neyi yimuna yikukeng’a kuzhahawu.
60005006 Munahishi mukwakulong’a, munamuzhahi; yena kujikang’a nanenu nehi.
60005007 Jichi enu anakwetu, tatakenenung’a nichakenzayi Mwanta. Tong’ozhokenu njimi chatalilang’ayi nyikabu yayiwahi yahamaseki, wahembelang’a nichiyakayinokela nvula yatachi niyakukuminina.
60005008 Jichi ninenu tatakenenung’a, jikoleshenu munyichima yenu, mulong’a kwinza kwaMwanta kuji kwakwihi
60005009 Enu anakwetu, bayi mujitobeshang’aku, kulonja abuli kuyisompesha; talenu, mukwakusompesha nemani kuchisu kachi.
60005010 Enu anakwetu, imbuzholenu atuplofwetu ahosheli mwizhina jaMWANTA chamwenuwu yihung’u nichatatakenenuwu.
60005011 Tong’ozhokenu chitwatenang’a antu atatakeneni, netu akooleka. Munatiyi mwatatakeneniyi Yoba; munamoni nimwakumishang’ayi MWANTA, chaswezhang’ayi MWANTA kutiyila antu wushona niluwi.

60005012 Enu anakwami, chuma chaswezha kulema yowu kubula kusanyika hela iwulu hela iseki hela yuma yacheng’i; kwitezha kwenu ching’a kwikala yowu, Eng’a; nikukanisha kwenu ching’a kwikala yowu, Nehi; kulonja abuli kuyisompesha
60005013 Omu mukachi kenu muji wamonang’a yihung’u, tahinji? Alombeli kwinji. Muji wázang’azhalang’a tahinji? Embang’a kwinji nakusakilila.
60005014 Omu mukachi kenu muji wákata, tahinji? Atambiki akulumpi achipompelu, amulombeleli, amuwayishi manzhi mwizhina jaMwanta.
60005015 Kulombela kwakukuhwelela kukuhanjisha wakata, niMwanta wukumukolesha; neyi naputoli akumwanakena.
60005016 Itezhenu mumunaputoli, muntu ashimuni kuji mukwawu; jilombelelenu muntu namukwawu kulonja mukoli. Kulembelela kwamuntu walong’a kwekala nang’ovu yakukong’a nachu yuma yayivulu.
60005017 Elizha wajing’i muntu watiyang’a mutwatiyang’etu; walombeleli nankashi ninji nvula yibuli kunoka; hiyanokeli hamaseki nyaka yisatu natukwezhi tutanu nakamuku.
60005018 Walombeleli cheng’i, niiwulu hijikunokesha nvula, nimaseki hiyakusong’esha nyikabu yawu.
60005019 Enu anakwami, neyi mukachi kenu muji muntu nasenuki muwalala, mukwawu hakumubalumuna mumuchima,
60005020 owu muntu wukubalumuna mukwanshiji munzhila yinji mwanasenukiyi, eluki ninji namwamwini muntu mukufwa, nabuti nshiji zhazhivulu.
61001001 Ami Petulu kapostolu kaYesu Klistu niji nakuyisonekela mukanja, enu atonjewa munekali enyi munapalang’eni muPontu, nimuNG’alizha, nimuKapajosiya, nimuAsiya, nimuBitiniya,
61001002 mwaya kwiluka kwelukilang’ahu jehi Nzambi Tata, mukuzhila kwaSpilitu, kulonja kwovwahila nikusampwila mashi aYesu Klistu. Luwi lwikali nanenu, nikuwunja kuyivulili.
61001003 Amukiswili Nzambi yaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu, yowu Tata yinji watuvweli chachiha tukwati kukuching’ezha kukweti wumi nakusang’uka kwaYesu Klistu muji afu, mwaya luwi lwinji lwaswezha.
61001004 Kulonja twakaswani wuswana wakátokang’a, wakaji kuzhilola, wabulang’a kuzhimuka, wanayiswekeluwu enu mwiwulu.
61001005 Enu anayihembi nang’ovu yaNzambi nakukuhwelela, kulonja akamwekeshi wamwinu hanyaka yakukuminina.
61001006 Mwomu mwazang’alelang’a, hela katataka anayineng’eshi mpinzhi yantesha nakweseka kweng’i nakweng’i, neyi kwakuyikwasha nachu.

61001007 Kulonja kweseka kwesekang’awu kukuhwelela kwenu, kwabajika kulema kwawulu wanong’ang’a, hela awesekang’a nakesi, akúmoni nawu kwaleta kuhameka nilubanzhi lwakulema nimpuhu hakamwekanayi Yesu Klistu.
61001008 Yenowu munabuli kumona mwamukeng’a; hela katataka himwamumonang’aku, chimwamukuhwelelang’a mwazang’alalang’a namuzang’alu waweni wakang’anya kushimunewa, wenzala nalubanzhi lwakulema.
61001009 Himukutambula chimwakuhweleleli wowu wamwinu wawumi wenu.
61001010 Atuplofwetu aplofweteli nakuyitenena luwi, ehuzholelumu nakukabila, nawu ashinshiki mwaya wamwinowu.
61001011 Akabilili nawu ashinshiki chuma hela mwaka wenyikiliyi Spilitu waKlistu wajing’i muji wena, chashimwinang’ahu jehi makabi aKlistu nilubanzhi lwakulema lukukeng’a kulonjelamu.

61001012 Ayilezheli nawu hiyajing’i nakujikalakela awenawuku, ajing’i nakuyikalakelenu nsang’u iyi yakuyilezhawu katataka, kuji awa ayishimwinang’a nsang’u yayiwahi naSpilitu Wazhila atemesheluwu chakufuma mwiwulu. Nsang’u iyi ang’elu akeng’ang’a nawu abanjami atalumu.
61001013 Jichi jikwatishenu munyichima yenu, babalenu, ching’ezhenu chalala luwi lwakayiletelawu hakamwekanayi Yesu Klistu.
61001014 Neyi anyana ovwahilang’a, bayi mulonjezha mwaya kufwila kwakukulu kwakuyamba kwenuku;
61001015 hakwila chelayi yena wayitambikili wazhila, enu nawa ikalenu azhila mumwelilang’a mwezhima;
61001016 mulong’a anasoneki nawu, Ikalenu azhila, mulong’a ami nazhila.
61001017 Jichi neyi mukumutambika nenu Tata, yena wasompeshang’a antu ezhima mwaya nyijimu yawu chakaji kwakama kumesu awu, komana shakamenu nyaka yenu yawenyi nawoma hohu.
61001018 Nakwiluka nenu, chayikuuliluwu kukwenja kwenu kwamukunkulwayi kumwatambwili kuji ankakulula zhenu, hiyayikuulili nayuma yatokang’aku, hela siliva nawulu,
61001019 ayikuulili namashi alema, aji neyi amwana kamukoku wakaji hatamayi hela ihuzhi, wowu mashi aKlistu.
61001020 Yena amwilukilang’ahu jehi henohu chikuku champata yamunu mwishina chichiji kanja, ilang’a anamumwekeshi kunsa yanyaka hansang’u yenu.
61001021 Muji yena enu munakuhweleli Nzambi wamusang’wili muji afu, wamulemesheli; kulonja kukuhwelela kwenu nikuching’ezha kwenu kwikali muji Nzambi.
61001022 Keng’ang’anenu chakumuchima chacheni, mulong’a munatookeshi jehi nyichima yenu nakwovwahila walala; kulonja mukeng’i anakwenu chakaji kujimbana.
61001023 Mulong’a munavwaliki chachiha, bayi nambutu yatokang’aku, ching’a nambutu yabulang’a kutoka, joju izu jaNzambi jahanjang’a, jashakama hayanyaka.
61001024 Mulong’a Antu ezhima aji neyi matahu, Nilubanzhi lwakulema kwawu lwezhima luji neyi wuluya wamumatahu. Matahu omang’a, niwuluya wahulukang’a,
61001025 Hakwinza izu jaMWANTA sang’a jakolela hayanyaka. Joju izu jansang’u yayiwahi jayishimwininuwu.
61002001 Jichi lekenu nkunyi yezhima, nimakasu ezhima, niwufwikizhi, niichima, nikuhosha kwatama kwezhima.
61002002 Fwilenu mayeli aweni awuspilitu, neyi anyikeki anavwaliki katataka, kulonja mukuli nachu muwamwinu wenu.
61002003 Neyi jimu, munatompi nenu Mwanta himuwahi.
61002004 Mwenzang’a kuji yena ilola jajumi, chalala ajilekeli kuji antu, ilang’a kuji Nzambi jakutonja, jalema.

61002005 Enu nawa neyi malola amomi, hiyakuyitung’a mwikali itala jawuspilitu, kulonja mwikali wuplistu wazhila, mulambulang’a yimuna yakuketula yawuspilitu yakumutiyisha nachu Nzambi kuwaha muji Yesu Klistu.
61002006 Mulong’a muMukanja waNzambi nawu, Tiyenu hinukusha muZiyona ilola Jaswezha kwoloka nankashi Jakwiwombu, jatonjewa, jalema wuseya; Muntu wukumukuhwelela, hiyakumutiyisha nsonyuku.
61002007 Jichi enu mwakuhwelelang’a mwamumona kulema nankashi; hakwila kuji antu azhikwa, Ilola jalekeli antung’i, Jinekali jehi jatachi joloka jakwiwombu.
61002008 Ilola jakuhukena, Nilwilola lwakujimbwisha. Mulong’a wena ajimbukilang’a kwizu nansang’u yakuzhikwa kwawu; mwenomu jimu mwayifuukwililuwu.

61002009 Hakwila enu mumunza watonjewa, muwuplistu wawanta wankanu, mumuchiji wazhila, mumunza wambala waNzambi; kulonja mutiyakeshang’a kashinshi kakeni kayena wayitambikili ninji mufumi mumwijima, mwing’ili muchezhezhi chinji chakuhayama.
61002010 Enu hamwaka himwajing’i antu injuku, ilang’a katataka munekali jehi antu ambala aNzambi; hiyayitiyilili luwuku, ilang’a katataka anayitiyili jehi luwi.
61002011 Enu akwetu twakeng’a, nayilembeleli chimuneli enyi niakwakwenja mwambala, nami lekenu kufwila kwachisemwa chaheseki kwatama, kwalwishang’a nawumi.
61002012 Hela aZHentili ayitung’ulang’a nawu mwelang’a chatama, shakamenu chalumbuluka mukachi kawu; kulonja chakumonawu nyijimu yenu yayiwahi akamulemeshi Nzambi mwifuku jakusompesha.
61002013 Ovwahilenu mawanta ezhima awantu, hansang’u yaMwanta Yesu; hela mwanta wankanu, mulong’a jiyi wabajika;
61002014 hela ayilolu akutemeshawu kuji yena mwanta, ninji ababeshi akwakwila chatama, ahameki akwakwila chachiwahi.
61002015 Mulong’a jichi chanakeng’iyi Nzambi, ninji mumweneshi kuyamba kwawantu akaji maana nakwila chachiwahi.
61002016 Chimwekala antu asubuka, bayi muchibalumuni chikali chakubuta nachu kuluwaku; shakamenu neyi anjung’u zhaNzambi.
61002017 Lemeshenu antu ezhima. Keng’enu anakwenu. Mutiyenu Nzambi woma. Lemeshenu mwanta wetung’a.
61002018 Enu ang’amba, ovwahilenu anyanta zhenu nakalemesha kezhima; bayi amawahi nawawunja hohuku, ching’a niazuwa nawa.
61002019 Neyi muntu wukwitezha kumona yihung’u, nakukaba chakaji mulong’a, nanochu chajiyi kumesu aNzambi, jichi chachiwahi.
61002020 Neyi mukujung’umika hakuyetawu hansang’u yakuluwa kwenu, hichikweti kuyihamekaku; hakwila neyi mukujung’umika chakuyikabishawu hansang’u yakulong’a, chumochu chamutiyishang’a Nzambi kuwaha.
61002021 Jichi chayitambikililuwu, mulong’a Klistu niyena wayimweneni yihung’u, wayishiyilili chuma chakutalilahu, kulonja mwenji mumahazhi inji.
61002022 Yena haputoleluku; Mukanwa kinji himwajing’i makasuku.
61002023 Yena chamutukiluwu, hafuntishili cheng’i matukaku; chamweniyi yihung’u hazuwiluku, ilang’a wajikunzhikili kuji yena wasompeshang’a chalong’a.
61002024 Yena yomweni wasenjeli nshiji zhetu mumuzhimba winji hamutonju, kulonja etu tunafwi jehi nakwambuka kuwanta wanshiji tuhanjili kulong’a; anayikuswishi nanyinkakambu yinji yena.
61002025 Mulong’a mwapwapukilang’a neyi anyikoku, ilang’a katataka munafunti jehi kuji Kabing’a, Mukwakuhemba wumi wenu.
61003001 Mwomumu ninenu ambanja, shakamenu nakwovwahila amfumuzhenwenu aweni; kulonja, hela amu anabuli kwovwahila izu jaNzambi, akayikoki chakaji izu, nanochu chakushakamawu ang’ojizhawu;
61003002 chakumonawu chimukushakama nakalemesha, chakubula kubazhama.
61003003 Lubanzhi lwenu bayi lwikala lwakujiwahisha chakumuzhimba nakuyinjayinja nsuki nankashi, hela nakujikujeka yingelingeli yawulu, hela nakuvwalavwala mahina eng’i naeng’uku.
61003004 Ching’a mujiwahishang’a mumuchima wamuntu wamukachi wakabula kukisika, naspilitu yayovu niyawunja, jichi chuma chalema nankashi kumesu aNzambi.
61003005 Jimu mwajiwahishililuwu nawa ambanja azhila ahamwaka, amukuhweleleli Nzambi, ovwahilili amfumuzhawu aweni;
61003006 neyi chovwahililiyi Sala Abalahama, hakumutena ninji mwanta. Enu muneli anyaninji, neyi mukwila chachiwahi chakubula kutiya woma hela kufwa mutentu.

61003007 Mwomumu ninenu amayala, shakamenu nawang’ojizhenu mwaya maana, nakulemesha mumbanja nenu jiyi wakuminamu ng’ovu, nanochu chimunekali akwakuswanina hamu luwi lwawumi; kulonja mubuli kukang’esha kulombela kwenu.
61003008 Nkumininaku, tong’ozhokenu wezhima wenu mwomumu, nakutiyila akwenu wushona, nakukeng’ang’ana neyi chamwivumu jenu, nakwikala nanyichima yaluwi, nayitong’ozhoka yakujizoza.
61003009 Bayi mutamisha mukwenu nanochu chanakutamishiyuku, hela kumutuka nanochu chanakutukiyuku. Chinzhila kwila mwenomu, ching’a kukiswila nkisu; mulong’a anayitambikili kuswana nkisu
61003010 Mulong’a anasoneki nawu, Muntu wukutonja wumi nikumona mafuku akuzang’alala, Ahembi ijimi jinji jibuli kuhosha yatama, Ninyivumbu yinji yibuli kuhosha yamakasu;
61003011 Aambuki kuyuma yatama, eli mwamuwahi; Akeng’akeng’i kuwunja nakuchikabila.
61003012 Mulong’a mesu aMWANTA atalang’a antu along’a, Nimatu inji atiyililang’a chakulembelelawu; Ilang’a mesu aMWANTA ajikang’ang’a nawantu elang’a chatama.
61003013 Neyi mukukabila kwila mwamuwahi, ochu wukuyila chatama hinyi?
61003014 Hakwila neyi mukumona yihung’u hansang’u yakulong’a, munakooleki; Bayi musha muchima hawoma wayitiyishang’awuku, hela kuyakama;
61003015 ching’a muzhiliki Klistu munyichima yenu nenu jiyi Mwanta, mutweshi mafuku ezhima kwakula antu ezhima akuyihula nsang’u yakuching’ezha kumwaching’ezhang’a; nakujizoza nakalemesha.
61003016 Ikalenu nachinlezhi chamuchima chachiwahi; kulonja, chakuyitung’ulawu nakutena chatama kushakama kwenu kwakuwahi kwamuji Klistu, atiyi nsonyi.
61003017 Mulong’a neyi muchima waNzambi wunetezhi ninji mumoni yihung’u nanochu chimwelang’a chachiwahi, jichi chinabajiki kuwaha; bayi nanochu chimwelang’a chatamaku.
61003018 Mulong’a Klistu nawa wamweni yihung’u hansang’u yanshiji, kamu hohu, wálong’a kukoola áheng’a, kulonja atushikizhi kuji Nzambi. Amuzhahili mumuzhimba ilang’a amuhanjishili muspilitu,
61003019 mwayililiyi nakushimuna kuji aspilitu amukaleya.
61003020 Wenawa wowu azhikwili hamwaka, hajung’umikiliyi Nzambi nakuching’ilila mafuku along’eshelang’ayi Nowa watu, mwamwininuwu antu antesha, wowu atanu nasatu, mumenzhi.

61003021 Chizhimikilu chamumenzhi hichinzhikizhilu chikwawu nawa chawamwinu wetu mukusang’uka kwaYesu Klistu mujafu. Hichakufumisha nachu mazhilu achisemwa chahesekuku ilang’a chakulembelela nachu Nzambi atookeshi chinlezhi chamuchima.
61003022 Yena waya jehi mwiwulu, wekala kuchikasa chaNzambi chachijiilu; anamwovwahishili ang’elu niakwawanta niakwang’ovu.
61004001 Ochu chamweniyi Klistu yihung’u mumuzhimba, ninenu nawa jikoleshenu nayitong’ozhoka yoyimu; mulong’a muntu namoni yihung’u mumuzhimba naleki jehi nshiji;
61004002 kulonja mafuku anashali mumuzhimba mubuli kushakama mwaya kufwila kwawantu kwatama, ching’a mwaya muchima waNzambi.

61004003 Mulong’a mafuku ahamwaka awanini nakukong’a mwakeng’ang’awu aZHentili, nakwenja nakubazhama, nakufwila kwatama, nakuswezha kunwa walwa, nakuhang’ana yisela yatama, nakufwa hakujya, nakwila yishimashima yakufukamina ankishi.
61004004 Jichi wena anahayami chimwabulang’a kuya nawu lufuchi mukubazhama kwaswezha; enja ayitena chatama.
61004005 Wena amba kashimunamu kuji yena wuji nakuhembela kusompesha amomi niafu.
61004006 Jihu hafumini kushimuna nsang’u yayiwahi hela kuji afu, kulonja akayisompeshi chasompeshang’awu antu mumuzhimba, akahanjili Nzambi muspilitu.
61004007 Ilang’a yuma yezhima keng’a yikumi; jichi wunjishenu mumesu, babalenu kulonja mulombeli;
61004008 chaswezha kulema yowu kukeng’ang’ana chacheni mukachi kenu; mulong’a Kukeng’a kwabutang’a nshiji zhazhivulu.
61004009 Ikalenu nakujyang’ana chakaji kutoba.
61004010 Wezhima wenu kalakelenu akwenu mwaya chamukunkulu chenu chimunatambuli, neyi ankong’i amawahi aluwi lwaNzambi lweng’i nalweng’i.

61004011 Muntu wukuhosha, ahoshi neyi Nzambi jiyi wuji nakuhosha; muntu wukukalakala, akalakali nang’ovu yanamwinkuwu kuji Nzambi; kulonja muyuma yezhima Nzambi amulemeshi muji Yesu Klistu, jiyi wukweti lubanzhi lwakulema niwanta hayanyaka nanyaka. Amena.
61004012 Enu akwetu twakeng’a, bayi muhayama chakuyesekawu nakesi kanenzi mukachi kenu nakuyikabisha, nenu kunatuwani chuma chacheng’uku.
61004013 Ching’a kuzang’alala nanochu chimuneli akwakutambwila makabi hamu naKlistu, kulonja hakamwekanayi mulubanzhi lwakulema kwinji, mwakazang’alali namuzang’alu waswezha nankashi.
61004014 Neyi akuyisawula hansang’u yezhina jaKlistu, munakooleki; mulong’a Spilitu waNzambi walubanzhi lwakulema wekala hajenu.
61004015 Ilang’a mukachi kenu bayi mwikala muntu wukumona yihung’u nansang’u yakwikala mbanzhi, hela ikombi, hela mukwakukong’a chatama, hela kavubaku;
61004016 ilang’a neyi wukumona yihung’u hansang’u yakwikala mukwaKlistu, bayi atiya nsonyuku; amulemeshi Nzambi mwizhiniji.
61004017 Mulong’a mwaka washika jehi wakwila kusompesha hikukutachikila kwitala jaNzambi. Jichi neyi chikusambila kujetu, inji awa akubula kwovwahila nsang’u yayiwahi yaNzambi akakumina hajihi?
61004018 Neyi mukwakulong’a wukwamwinewa chakukabakana hohu, Inji muntu wakaji Nzambi, mukwanshiji, wakakumina hajihi?
61004019 Jichi antu akumona yihung’u mwaya muchima waNzambi elang’a mwamuwahi, akunzhiki wumi wawu kuji Nleng’i washinshika.
61005001 Jichi nayilembeleli akulumpi aji mukachi kenu, ami mwinawu mukulumpi, nichinsahu chamakabi aKlistu, nimukwakutambula lubanzhi lwakulema lwamba kamwekana.

61005002 Nami bing’enu mukanka wanyikoku yaNzambi wuji mukachi kenu, nakuyitala; bayi chakukanzhikizhaku, ching’a nakutiya kuwaha mwaya muchima waNzambi; bayi nakulonja kuheta kwatamaku, ching’a namuchima wakukeng’amu;
61005003 bayi nakwikala anyanta anawa ayishililuwu kuhembaku, ching’a nakwikala akutalilahu anyikoku.
61005004 Chakamwekanayi Kabing’a muneni, mwakatambula nichibaaba chalubanzhi lwakulema chakálepukang’a.

61005005 Mwomumu ninenu akwenzi, ovwahilenu akulumpi. Eng’ang’i, wezhima wenu jikumbakeshenu kujizoza, kulonja mukalakeli akwenu; mulong’a Nzambi wajikang’ang’a nawakwakujinka wanta, Hakwila akwakujizoza wayinkang’a luwi.
61005006 Jichi jizozenu muchikasa chaNzambi chang’ovu, kulonja yena akayitoheshi hamwaka wanafuukuliyi.
61005007 Mutwikenu Nzambi kwakama kwenu kwezhima, mulong’a wayishang’a kumuchima winji.
61005008 Babalenu, tonenu; mukwankunyi nenu jiyabolu wuji nakuya nakutambatamba nakukeng’akeng’a akujyayi, neyi mutupa wabulumang’a.
61005009 Jikang’enu ninji, nakukola muchikuhwelelu chenu mbe, nakwiluka nenu anakwenu aji mumpata yamunu mwishina niwena enja amona makabi wowamu.

61005010 Chimukukaba mpinzhi yantesha, Nzambi waluwi lwezhima, wáyitambikilili lubanzhi lwakulema kwinji lwahayanyaka lwekala muji Klistu, yomweninji wakayilisha alala, wakayikolesha, wakayinka ng’ovu.
61005011 Wanta wikali winji hayanyaka nanyaka. Amena.
61005012 Nayisonekeli mazu antesha akuyikwasha nikuyilezha. Nayitemeshi namanakwetu Silasi inamoni kushinshika, nami jilu luwi lwaNzambi lwalala. Imanenu mwenomu mbe.
61005013 Iwu watonjewa chimu nanenu, wekala muBabiloni, nayimushi; nimwanami Maku nawa.
61005014 Jimushenu nakwimusha kwakukeng’a. Kuwunja kwikali nanenu ezhima mwekala muji Klistu.

62001001 Ami Shimona Petulu, njung'u nikapostolu kaYesu Kristu, nidi nakuyisonekela mukanja, enu munatambuli kukuhwelela kwalema wuseya, kwokumu naniku kutunatambuletu nawa, mukulong'a kwaNzambi yetu nikwaChamwinu Yesu Klistu.
62001002 Luwi lwikali nanenu, nikuwunda kuyivulili mukwiluka kwakumwiluka Nzambi niMwanta wetu Yesu.
62001003 Ng’ovu yawuNzambi winji yinatwinki yuma yezhima yaya mumu nawumi nikwakama Nzambi, ichi chitunamwiluki yena watutambikili kulubanzhi lwakulema kwinji yomweni, nakashinshi kinji kakeni.

62001004 Kanatwinkiyi nachu yikaninu yinji yaswezha kutoha, yikweti wuseya walema; kulonja mwikali akwakutambula chisemwa chakuji Nzambi nayikaninu oyu; nanochu chimunapuluki jehi kukutoka kwekala mumpata yamunu mwishina, kwafumang’a kukufwila kwatama.
62001005 Eng’a, jikwatishenu nankashi hansang’u yeniyi; mukukuhwelela kwenu vulishilenumu kashinshi kakeni; mukashinshi vulishilenumu kwiluka;
62001006 mukwiluka vulishilenumu kujihemba; mukujihemba vulishilenumu kutatakena; mukutatakena vulishilenumu kwakama Nzambi;
62001007 mukwakama Nzambi vulishilenumu kukeng’ang’ana; mukukeng’ang’ana vulishilenumu kukeng’a kwakweni.
62001008 Jichi neyi yumiyi yikwikala mujenu nakuvulilamu, yikuyilekesha kwikala ankópi, hela akwakubula kusong’a nyikabu, mushiki mukumwiluka Mwanta wetu Yesu Klistu.
62001009 Mulong’a muntu wukubula yumiyi napuuti mesu, wamonang’a yakwakwihi hohu, nalalameni jehi chamutookesheluwu nshiji zhinji zhazhikulu.
62001010 Jichi enu anakwetu, jikwatishenu nakukolesha kutambika kwayitambikiluwu, nikutonja kwayitonjeluwu; mulong’a neyi mukwila yumiyi himwamba kajimbukaku.
62001011 Neyi mukwila mwenimu akayenzulwila muwing’ililu wakwing’ila chachiwahi muwanta wahayanyaka, waMwanta wetu yowu Chamwinu Yesu Klistu.
62001012 Jichi nakeng’i nami niyanukishi yumiyi mafuku ezhima, hela mwayiluka, hela mwakola jehi muwalala wumwekala nawu.
62001013 Natong’ozhoki nami chachiwahi kuyihizumwisha nakuyanukisha hinichiji mwitenti jamuzhimba iwu;
62001014 mulong’a neluki nami keng’a nifumi swayi mwitenti jami iji, mwomwanlezheliyi Mwanta wetu Yesu Klistu.
62001015 Eng’a, nukujikwatisha, kulonja chinakafumahu mwakatweshi kwanuka yumiyi mafuku ezhima.
62001016 Chitwayilezheli ng’ovu nikwinza kwaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu, hitwalonjeli mwaya tuheka twakufuukula namaanaku; ilang’a twajing’i ayinsahu akumona wukeleng’i winji namesu.

62001017 Mulong’a watambwili kuji Nzambi Tata mpuhu nilubanzhi lwakulema, henzhili kuji yena izu jafumini mulubanzhi lwakulema kwabajika, jelili ninji, Jiyi Mwanami nakeng’a, natiyang’a kuwaha nankashi muji yena.
62001018 Izu oju jafumini mwiwulu, twajitiyili etu aweni hitwajing’i ninji hampiji yazhila.
62001019 Tukweti izu jawuplofwetu jakola chakubajika; chachiwahi enu kushinshikamu neyi hiinong’u jatong’ekang’a mumwijima nichikukucha, nichikusela ntanja munyichima yenu.
62001020 Sambilenu kwiluka nenu kwosi wuplofwetu wahamukanja waNzambi wukweti kuwulumbulula namaana awuntuku.
62001021 Mulong’a kwosi wuplofwetu wenzahu jehi chakufuma kumuchima wamuntuku; ilang’a antu ahosheli chakufuma kuji Nzambi, chakuyihoshesha kuji Spilitu Wazhila.

62002001 Ilang’a mukachi kawantu mwanyamukili niatuplofwetu akutwamba, nimukachi kenu nawa mwakekala antang’ishi akutwamba, akaletelamu munzhila yakuzhinja, kutang’isha kwawu kwaluwa kwakukisang’ana kwitiya kwakukuhwelela, hiyakujikala niMwanta wayilanjili, nakujikokela kuzhilumuka kwaswayi.
62002002 Amavulu akalonja muyuma yakubazhama yelang’awu; hansang’u yawenowu akatena nzhila yawalala chatama.
62002003 Nalwisu akahetela hajenu, namazu akujimbana; kusompesha kwawu kwakufuma kumwaka hikukulabaku, nikuzhilumuka kwawu hikukuya mutuluku.
62002004 Nzambi walekeli kwanakena ang’elu haputoleluwu, hakuyumbila mukalung’a nimumena amwijima wabwi-i, kulonja kuyisweka akashiki kukusompesha.
62002005 Walekeli kwanakena mpata yamunu mwishina yahashankulu, hakuhemba Nowa mukwakushimuna kulong’a, nawakwawu atanu nayeji, haleteliyi jibazhi mumpata yawantu ajiwulang’a Nzambi.
62002006 Wabalumwini nyikala yaSojoma naGomola hiyikwikala kwawuti hohu, hakuyihisha yizhilumuki, nakuyilisha chuma chakutalilahu antu akujiwula Nzambi.
62002007 Wapulwishili Loti muntu walong’a, wátiyilang’a kubazhama kwawantu atama kumuchima bwi-i.
62002008 Mulong’a yena muntu walong’a, chashakaminiyi mukachi kawu nakumona nikutiya, watiyilang’a kutama nankashi kumuchima winji walong’a hefuku hefuku, nanyijimu yakuluwalala yakong’elang’awu.
62002009 Komana MWANTA weluka kupulwisha akwakumwakama mukutesha, weluka nawa kusweka ábula kulong’a, njo-o nikwifuku jakusompesha akayibabeshi;
62002010 chikuswezhela antu enjang’a mwaya chisemwa chaheseki, nakufwila yamazhilu, akujiwula wanta. Akola hamesu, akeng’a mwaya nyichima yawu, hiyazaalang’a woma wakutena álema chatamaku;
62002011 kutong’a ang’elu ayibajika kukola ning’ovu, hiyayisompeshang’a nakuyihosha chatama kumesu aMWANTAku.
62002012 Hakwila wena aji neyi anyama akaji maana, asemukila yowu kuyikwata nakuyizhaha, atenang’a yuma yabula kwilukawu chatama, akanong’ela mukunong’a kwawu;
62002013 hiyakutambula wulooku wanyijimu yawu yatama. Atiyang’a kuwaha nakuluwalala hamwaana, himahuzhi namabeng’a, alung’ang’a kumawizhawu nakuyijimba chiyajyang’awu nanenu.
62002014 Akweti mesu aswezha wuvumbi; abulang’a kutwesha kuleka nshiji; akokolang’a akwawu azeya munyichima; akweti nyichima yenzhilila lwisu, hiyakwakushing’ewa.
62002015 Anashiyi nzhila yalong’a, anapwapuki, analonji nzhila yaBalami mwana kaBeyoli, wakeng’eli wulooku wakuluwa;
62002016 hiyakumukonkolola namulong’a winji, kuji chimbulu wakáhoshang’a hakuhosha nezu jamuntu, hakulekesha kwanjala kwaanjeliyi yena kaplofwetu.
62002017 Antu awa hituseloki twakaji menzhi, himbunju yalelokang’a nampepela yang’ovu; wena jiwu anaswekeluwu mwijima wamukalung’a wiyila bwi-i.
62002018 Mulong’a chahoshang’awu mazu akuhemesha akujisama, hiyakukoka antu anakeng’i kupuluka muji awa ashakama mukuluwang’esha nakufwila kwatama kwachisemwa chaheseki nikubazhama.
62002019 Ayikanang’a nawu mukufuma muwujung’u, kutong’a awenawu hiyanjung’u zhakutoka. Mulong’a neyi muntu anamwimiki mushinju kuji mukwawu, neli jehi njung’u yanowu namwimiki mushinju.

62002020 Mulong’a antu anapuluki jehi kumazhilu ampata yamunu mwishina, nanochu chanamwilukuwu Mwanta, yowu Chamwinu Yesu Klistu, neyi akuyikasamu cheng’i ayimika mushinju, kukuminina kwawu kukubajika kutama hajing’uwu hakusambila.
62002021 Neyi abulili kwiluka nzhila yakulong’a mutenowu jihu; ilang’a chatama chakwila wena ayiluka jehi, hiyakufuntamu nakushiya kulezha kwazhila kwayilezheluwu.
62002022 Aneli mwaya chishimu ichi chalala chakwila nawu, Kawa nafuntili cheng’i masanzhilinji, nimukazhi wang’ulu anaweleshuwu nafuntili cheng’i malowa ajilambang’ayi.
62003001 Enu akwetu twakeng’a, iwu himukanja wamuchiyeji wuniji nakuyisonekela. Munyikanja yezhima yiyeji nalonji kuhizumwisha nachu nyichima yenu yalala nakuyanukisha,
62003002 kulonja mwanuki mazu ahosheluwu jehi atuplofwetu azhila, nikulezha kwaMwanta yowu Chamwinu, kwahosheliyi muji apostolu zhenu.
62003003 Sambilenu kwiluka nenu hamafuku akukuminina kwakenza akwakuseha nakuseha, nakwila mwaya kufwila kwawu aweni kwatama;
62003004 nawu, Inji kwinza kwinji kwakaniniyi kwokujihi? Mulong’a chochakaminuwu ankakulula tulu, yuma yezhima chochiyekala, neyi chiyajing’i hatachi haleng’eluwu yuma.
62003005 Mulong’a kwonti kwawu kwanuka nawu mawulu ajing’i kwoku chachikulu, niiseki jatung’ilewi namenzhi mukachi kamenzhi, nezu jaNzambi.
62003006 Mpata yamunu mwishina yajing’uku yazhiminini mumenzhi, yanong’eli nezu oju;
62003007 hakwinza mawulu niiseki ajuku katataka, anayiswekeli kesi nezu jojimu, anayiswekeli ifuku jakusompesha nikuzhilumuka kwawantu ajiwulang’a Nzambi.
62003008 Hakwila enu akwetu twakeng’a, bayi mulalamena ichi chuma chimuku, MWANTA wamonang’a ifuku jimu jiji neyi ikombakazhi janyaka (1,000), niikombakazhi janyaka jiji neyi ifuku jimu.
62003009 Mwanta halabang’a kwila chuma chakaniniyi, neyi chatenang’awu antu kulabaku, ilang’a hakujung’umika hajenu, hanakeng’i muntu niwumu kunong’aku, nakeng’i antu ezhima abalumuki munyichima.
62003010 Ilang’a Ifuku jaMWANTA jakenza neyi chenzang’a ikombi; jenoju ifuku mawulu akahita nalushinju lwalweni, niyuma yezhima yakasung’unuka neyena jakesi, niiseki niyuma yijumu yakasukuma bwi-i.
62003011 Ochu chineli yumiyi yezhima yakasung’unuka chochichi, shakamenu nakuzhila nakwakama Nzambi,
62003012 nakutalila nikukeng’a nankashi chakenza Ifuku jaNzambi jakasung’unuka mawulu hakabutukawu kesi, jakasung’unuka yuma yezhima neyena jakesi.
62003013 Hakwila etu twatalilang’a mawulu amaha niiseki jajiha, mwakekala kulong’a neyi chakaniniyi.
62003014 Jichi enu akwetu twakeng’a, chimwatalilang’a yumiyi, jikwatishenu kulonja akayiwani munashakami chachiwahi nzo-o, chakaji ihuzhi, nakubula hakuyinkela mulong’a kumesu inji.
62003015 Tong’ozhokenu nenu chakubulayi Mwanta kuzuwa swayi hiwamwinu; mwomwayisonekeleliyi nimanakwetu Pawulu twakeng’a, namaana amwinkeluwu.

62003016 Watenang’a yumiyi munyikanja yinji yezhima; muji niyuma yikwawu yakala kwiluka, yenoyu antu akaji maana, azeya mukwitiya kwakukuhwelela ayiheng’eshang’a, neyi chaheng’eshang’awu Mukanja waNzambi wezhima, hiyakujikisang’ana awenawu
62003017 Jichi enu akwetu twakeng’a, chimuneli mweluka jehi, babalenu mubuli kuhung’umuka nakuluwang’esha kwawantu atama, mubuli kufuma mukukola kwenwenu aweni.
62003018 Kulenu muluwi nimukumwiluka Mwanta wetu Chamwinu Yesu Klistu. Lubanzhi lwakulema lwikali lwinji nikatataka nihayanyaka. Amena.
63001001 Ochu chajing'i chakufuma kutachi, chitunatiyi, chitunamoni namesu etu, chitwashinshikili, tuchikwata ninamakasetu, yowu Izu jaWumi.
63001002 Wumi wamwekeni, twawumweni, hitukushimuna wunsahu, hitukuyishimwina wumi wahayanyaka wajing'i naTata, watumwekesheleluwu.
63001003 Ochu chitunamoni, chitunatiyi, jichi chitukuyishimwina ninenu, kulonja mwakakunjang'ani nanetu; chalala kukunjang'ana kwetu yowu kukundang'ana naTata ninaMwanindi Yesu Klistu.
63001004 Hitukusoneka yumiyi kulonda muzang'alu wenu wakawanini
63001005 Nsang’u yitwatiyili kuji yena jiyi tukuyishimwinenu, netu Nzambi hichezhezhi, muji yena himwekala mwijima hela wantuku.
63001006 Neyi tukwila netu twajikunja ninji, iku sang’a twenjela mumwijima, tunatwambi, hitwelang’a mwaya walalaku.
63001007 Neyi twenjang’a muchezhezhi, neyi chekalayi yena muchezhezhi, twakunjang’anang’a wumu namukwawu, nimashi aMwaninji Yesu Klistu atutookeshang’a nshiji yezhima.
63001008 Neyi tukwila netu hitukweti nshijuku, tunajijimbi, niwalala hiwekala mujetuku.
63001009 Neyi tukwitezha nshiji zhetu, yena washinshika, walong’a, wukutwanakena nshiji zhetu nakututookesha kuheng’a kwezhima.
63001010 Neyi tukwila netu hitunaputoluku, tunamutwambishi Nzambi, niizu jinji hijekala mujetuku.
63002001 Enu anyanami anyanya, yuma yinukuyisonekela nalonji mubuli kuputola. Neyi kuji muntu naputoli, tukweti Ihaku kwaTata, yowu Yesu Klistu walong’a.
63002002 Yena jiyi ifutu janshiji zhetu; hizhetwetu hohuku, nizhawantu ezhima ampata yamunu mwishina.
63002003 Neyi twahembang’a mwatulezheliyi, kweniku jiku kutukwilukila netu twamwiluka yena.
63002004 Yowu wukwila ninji namwiluka, ilang’a kuhemba mwatulezheliyi nehi, hintwambi, niwalala hiwekala muji yenaku.
63002005 Hakwinza muntu wahembang’a izu jinji, chalala nikukeng’a kwaNzambi kunawanini chikupu muji yena. Kweniku jiku kutukwilukila netu twekala muji yena.
63002006 Muntu wukwila ninji nashakama muji yena, enjang’a neyi chenjeliyi yena.
63002007 Enu akwetu twakeng’a, hinukuyisonekela nshimbi yayihaku, yoyayikulu yimwajing’i nayu kufumisha kutachi; nshimbi yayikulu joju izu jimwatiyili. 8
63002008 Cheng’i nawa, hinukuyisonekela nshimbi yayiha, yela jehi yalala nimuji yena nimujetu, mulong’a mwijima keng’a wuhiti, chezhezhi chalala chinatong’eki jehi.
63002009 Yowu wukwila ninji niji muchezhezhi, iku wuji nakuhela manakwinji, wuchiji mumwijima nihanu.
63002010 Muntu wakeng’a manakwinji washakama muchezhezhi, hakweti chakuhukeshaku;
63002011 hakwinza muntu wahela manakwinji wekala mumwijima, wenjang’a mumwijima, helukang’a kwakuyayuku, mulong’a mwijima wunamupuutishi mesu.
63002012 Enu anyanami anyanya, niji nakuyisonekela nanichi chanayanakenuwu nshiji zhenu mwizhina jinji.

63002013 Enu atata zhawantu, niji nakuyisonekela nanichi chimwamwiluka yena wekala kwoku kufumisha kutachi. Enu anyikwenzi, niji nakuyisonekela nanichi chimunamwimiki jehi mukwakutama mushinju. Enu anyana anyanya, nayisonekeli nanichi chimwamwiluka Tata.

63002014 Enu atata zhawantu, nayisonekeli nanichi chimwamwiluka yena wekala kwoku kufumisha kutachi. Enu anyikwenzi, nayisonekeli nanichi chimukweti ng’ovu, niizu jaNzambi jashakama mujenu, nichimunamwimiki owu watama mushinju.
63002015 Bayi mukeng’a mpata yamunu mwishina, hela yuma yamunu mwishinaku. Neyi muntu wukukeng’a mpata yamunu mwishina, kukeng’a kwaTata hikwekala muji yenaku.
63002016 Mulong’a yuma yampata yamunu mwishina yezhima, kufwila kwachisemwa chaheseki, nikufwila kwamesu, nikujisama kwamukunkulwayi kwawumi wunu, hiyakuji Tataku, yamumpata yamunu mwishina.
63002017 Mpata yamunu mwishina yikuhita, nikufwila kwayu kwatama, hakwinza muntu welang’a muchima waNzambi washakamang’a hayanyaka.

63002018 Enu anyana anyanya, mpinzhi yakukuminina yinashiki jehi, yimwatiyili nawu mukwankunyi naKlistu wukwinza; katataka kunamwekani jehi akwankunyi naKlistu amavulu, jihu hitunelukili netu mpinzhi yakukuminina yinashiki jehi.
63002019 Afumini mukachi ketu, ilang’a hiyajing’i ayetuku; neyi ajing’i ayetu mutenowu tuji nawu nihanu; ilang’a chafuminuwu, chinalonji kuyimwekesha nawu wezhima wawu hiyajing’i ayetuku.
63002020 Hakwila enu awayishawu jehi kuji Wazhila, mweluka jehi yuma yezhima.
63002021 Hinayisonekeli nami munabuli kwiluka walalaku, mulong’a munawiluki. Muwalala himwekala kutwambaku.
63002022 Ntwambi hinyi? Yowu wahoshang’a ninji Yesu hijiyi Klistuku. Yenowu wahoshang’a ninji hikwekala Tata naMwanaku, jiyi mukwankunyi naKlistu.
63002023 Muntu wajikalang’a Mwana hakweti Tataku; yowu wetezhang’a Mwana jiyi wukweti niTata nawa.
63002024 Hakwinza enu aweni, ochu chimwatiyili kufumisha kutachi chishakami mujenu. Neyi ochu chimwatiyili kufumisha kutachi chikushakama mujenu, enu nawa mukushakama muji Mwana nimuji Tata.
63002025 Chenichi jichi chikaninu chatukaniniyi, yowu wumi wahayanyaka.
63002026 Yumiyi nayisonekeli hansang’u yawena akukeng’a kuyilumbula.

63002027 Kuwayisha kwayiwayishiluwu kuji yena kwekala mujenu; jichi himunakeng’i wakuyitang’isha yumiyuku. Chela kuwayisha kwayiwayishiluwu kuji yena kwayitang’ishang’a yuma yezhima, kwalala, hikwatwambang’aku. Jichi shakamenu muji yena mwomwayitang’ishililuwu.
63002028 Ichi jinu, enu anyanami anyanya, shakamenu muji yena, kulonja chakamwekanayi twakabuli kutiya woma ninsonyi kumesu inji hakenzayi.
63002029 Neyi muneluki nenu yena walong’a, mukwiluka antu ezhima elang’a yalong’a nenu anavwaliki kuji yena.

63003001 Hayamenu oku kukeng’a kwanatukeng’iyi Tata kwakutwitezha kututena nawu anyana kaNzambi; jichi chitwekala! Chabulang’a kutwilukawu kuji antu ampata yamunu mwishina, chinafumi habulili kumwilukawu yena.
63003002 Enu akwetu twakeng’a, hohanu tuji anyana kaNzambi; chitwakekala kanja chimwekanuku, ilang’a tuneluki netu chakamwekanayi twakafwana neyi yena, nanochu chitwakamumona chekalayi.
63003003 Ezhima akweti kuching’ezhoku chakumuching’ezha yena, ajitookeshang’a neyi chatookayi yena.
63003004 Ezhima akong’ang’a nshiji hiyakwakuputola nshimbi, mulong’a nshiji hikuputola.
63003005 Muneluki chamumwekesheluwu yena, amumwekesheli kulonja afumishi nshiji. Muji yena himwekala nshijuku.
63003006 Muntu washakamang’a muji yena hatwalang’ahu nakuputolaku; muntu watwalang’ahu nakuputola hanamumonuku, hela kumwiluka hanamwilukuku.
63003007 Enu anyanami anyanya, bayi mwitezha kuyiluwang’esha kuji muntuku; muntu welang’a yalong’a walong’a, chochalong’ayi yomweni.

63003008 Muntu waputolang’a wakuji jiyabolu kwinji; mulong’a jiyabolu watwalang’ahu nakuputola ho-o kufumisha kutachi. Jichi chamumwekesheleluwu Mwana kaNzambi, kulonja akisang’ani nyijimu yajiyabolu.
63003009 Muntu wavwalika kuji Nzambi hatwalang’ahu nakuputolaku, mulong’a muji yena mwekala chisemwa chakuji Nzambi; jichi hanatweshi kutwalahu nakuputolaku, mulong’a wavwalika kuji Nzambi.
63003010 Kweniku jiku kwamwekenang’a anyana kaNzambi nianyana kajiyabolu; muntu wabulang’a kwila yalong’a, hela wabulang’a kukeng’a manakwinji, hiwakuji Nzambuku.
63003011 Jiyi nsang’u yimwatiyili kufumisha kutachi, nawu tukeng’ang’ani.
63003012 Tubuli kwikala neyi Kena wajing’i wanowu watama, wazhahili manakwinji. Wamuzhahililiji? Mulong’a nyijimu yinji yajing’i yatama, yamanakwinji yalong’a.
63003013 Enu anakwami, neyi akuyihela kuji antu amunu mwishina bayi muhayamaku.
63003014 Tuneluki netu tunafumi mukufwa tuneng’ili muwumi, nanochu chitwakeng’ang’a anakwetu. Muntu wabulang’a kukeng’a washakamang’a mukufwa.
63003015 Muntu wahelang’a manakwinji himbanzhi; muneluki jehi muji mbanzhi himwashakamang’a wumi wahayanyakaku.
63003016 Chatutulililiyi wumi winji, jiku kutunelukili kukeng’a; chachiwahi ninetu kutulila anakwetu wumi wetu.
63003017 Muntu wukweti yuma yampata yamunu mwishina, wukumona manakwinji nayibuli, hakumuumina muchima winji mwivumu, kukeng’a kwaNzambi kukutwesha kushakama muji yena ng’ahi?
63003018 Enu anyanami anyanya, bayi tukeng’a akwetu chamukanwa, hela chamukuhosha hohuku; ching’a tuyikeng’i chalala nakwila mutwahoshang’a.
63003019 Kweniku jiku kutukwilukila netu tuji akwawalala, jiku kutukujikoleshela munyichima yetu kumesu inji mwezhima mukututanyishila nyichima yetu;
63003020 mulong’a Nzambi wabajika nyichima yetu, weluka yuma yezhima.
63003021 Enu akwetu twakeng’a, neyi nyichima yetu yikubula kututanyisha, hitukwikala nawoma kumesu aNzambuku;
63003022 niyezhima yitukulomba tukuyitambula kuji yena, mulong’a twelang’a mwatulezheliyi, twelang’a yuma yamutiyishang’a kuwaha.
63003023 Nshimbi yinji ninji, tukuhweleli izhina jaMwaninji Yesu Klistu, tukeng’ang’ani neyi chatulezheliyi.
63003024 Antu elang’a mwatulezheliyi, jiwu ashakamang’a muji yena, niyena muji wena. Kwiluka netu yena washakamang’a mujetu, tuneluki naSpilitu atwinkeliyi.
63004001 Enu akwetu twakeng’a, bayi mwitezhang’a aspilitu ezhimaku, ching’a kuyeseka mwiluki neyi akuji Nzambi; mulong’a atuplofwetu akutwamba amavulu anayi nakutambatamba mukachi kawantu.
63004002 Spilitu waNzambi mukumwilukila hayumiyi; aspilitu ezhima etezhang’a nawu Yesu Klistu wenzhili mumuzhimba, jiwu akuji Nzambi;

63004003 niaspilitu ezhima abulang’a kwitezha Yesu, hiyakuji Nzambuku. Kubula kwitezha iku hispilitu yamukwankunyi naKlistu imwatiyili nawu yikwinza, nochu katataka yinekali jehi mumpata yamunu mwishina.
63004004 Enu anyanami anyanya, muyantu ambala aNzambi, munayimiki mushinju; mulong’a owu wuji mujenu wabajika iwu wuji mumpata yamunu mwishina.
63004005 Wena hiyakwampata yamunu mwishina kwawu, jichi chahoshelang’awu yamunu mwishina, niantu amunu mwishina ayitiyang’a.
63004006 Etu tuyantu ambala aNzambi; muntu weluka Nzambi watutiyang’a, wabula kwikala waNzambi hatutiyang’aku. Kweniku jiku kutunelukili niSpilitu yawalala, nispilitu yakuluwang’esha.
63004007 Enu akwetu twakeng’a tukeng’ang’anenu; mulong’a kukeng’a kwambala kwaNzambi. Ezhima akeng’ang’ana avwalika kuji Nzambi, aneluki Nzambi.
63004008 Muntu wabula kukeng’a hanamwiluki Nzambuku, mulong’a Nzambi jiyi kukeng’a.
63004009 Kukeng’a kwatukeng’ayi Nzambi kwamwekeni hatemesheliyi Nzambi Mwaninji wumu hohu mumpata yamunu mwishina, kulonja tuhanjili muji yena.
63004010 Kweniku jiku kukeng’a, hiyetu twakeng’eli Nzambuku, yena jiyi watukeng’eletu, hakutemesha Mwaninji ekali ifutu janyilong’a yetu.
63004011 Enu akwetu twakeng’a, chatukeng’eluwu kuji Nzambi chochochu, ninetu twaji kukeng’ang’ana nawa.
63004012 Hikwekala muntu wamonahu jehi Nzambuku; neyi twakeng’ang’anang’a, Nzambi washakama mujetu, nikukeng’a kwinji kunawanini chikupu mujetu.
63004013 Kwiluka netu twashakama muji yena niyena washakama mujetu hohanatwinkiyi yaSpilitu winji.
63004014 Etu tunamoni, hitukushimuna wunsahu, netu Tata watemesheli Mwana ekali Chamwinu chawantu ampata yamunu mwishina.
63004015 Muntu wukwitezha ninji Yesu hiMwana kaNzambi, Nzambi washakama muji yena, niyena washakama muji Nzambi.
63004016 Etu tuneluki, tunakuhweleli kukeng’a kwaNzambi kwanatukeng’iyi. Nzambi jiyi kukeng’a; muntu washakamang’a mukukeng’a washakamang’a muji Nzambi, niNzambi washakamang’a muji yena.
63004017 Jiku kunawanini kukeng’a mujetu chikupu, kulonja tubuli woma mwifuku jakusompesha; mulong’a chajiyi yena, jichi chituji ninetu munu mwishina.
63004018 Mukukeng’a himwekala womaku, kukeng’a kwalala chikupu kwafumishang’a woma, mulong’a woma wababeshang’a. Muntu watiyang’a woma hanashiki mukukeng’a chalala chikupuku.
63004019 Etu twamukeng’a yena nanochu chasambililiyi yena kutukeng’etu.
63004020 Muntu wukwila ninji, Ami nakeng’a Nzambi; iku sang’a ahelelayi manakwinji, hintwambi, mulong’a muntu wukubula kukeng’a manakwinji anamoniyi, hakutwesha kukeng’a Nzambi anabuli kumonayuku.
63004021 Nshimbi yinji yanatulezhiyi, natulezhi ninji, Muntu wakeng’a Nzambi akeng’i nimanakwinji nawa.
63005001 Muntu wakuhwelelang’a ninji Yesu jiyi Klistu, wavwalika kuji Nzambi; muntu wakeng’a nvwali wakeng’a ninowu wavwalika kuji yena.
63005002 Kukeng’a Nzambi nakwila mwatulezhang’ayi, jiku kutukwilukila netu twakeng’a anyana kaNzambi.
63005003 Kumukeng’a Nzambi yowu kwila mwatulezhang’ayi; mwatulezhang’ayi himwakalaku.
63005004 Wávwalika kuji Nzambi wemikang’a mpata yamunu mwishina mushinju; mushinju wunafwomoni mpata yamunu mwishina yowu kukuhwelela kwetu.
63005005 Wemikang’a mpata yamunu mwishina mushinju hinyi? Yowu wakuhwelelang’a ninji, Yesu jiyi Mwana kaNzambi.
63005006 Wénzhili namenzhi ninamashi jiyi Yesu Klistu; henzhili namenzhi hohuku wenzhili namenzhi ninamashi.
63005007 Spilitu jiyi washimunang’a wunsahu, mulong’a Spilitu jiyi walala.
63005008 Kuji ayinsahu asatu, iwu Spilitu, iwu menzhi, iwu mashi; mwasatu wawu atiyang’anang’a mwomumu.
63005009 Chitwetezhang’a wunsahu wawantu, wunsahu waNzambi wabajika; wunsahu waNzambi woweniwu wanashimuniyi Mwaninji.
63005010 Muntu nakuhweleli Mwana kaNzambi wukweti wunsahu mumuchima winji; muntu nabuli kukuhwelela Nzambi, namutwambishi; mulong’a nabuli kukuhwelela wunsahu waNzambi wanateneniyi Mwaninji.
63005011 Wunsahu jiwu weniwu wakwila nawu Nzambi watwinkeli wumi wahayanyaka, niwena wumi iwu wekala muji Mwaninji.
63005012 Muntu wukweti Mwana kaNzambi wukweti wumi iwu; wábula Mwana kaNzambi hakweti wumi iwuku.
63005013 Nayisonekeli yumiyi kulonja mwiluki nenu mukweti wumi wahayanyaka, enu mwakuhwelelang’a izhina jaMwana kaNzambi.
63005014 Jichi chitukubula kumutiya woma, tukwiluka netu neyi tukulomba chuma chamwaya muchima winji, wukututiya.
63005015 Neyi tuneluki netu watutiyang’a mutukulomba mwezhima, tuneluki netu tunatambuli jehi yitunamulombi.

63005016 Neyi muntu wukumona manakwinji naputoli nshiji yakaji kushikizha nikukufwa, amulombi Nzambi, yena wukumwinka wumi wayenowu naputoli chakaji kushikizha nikukufwa. Kuji nshiji yashikang’a nikukufwa, hijiyi yinateni nami ayilombeleluku.
63005017 Kuheng’a kwezhima hinshiji; kuji nshiji yakaji kushika nikukufwa.
63005018 Tuneluki netu muntu wavwalika kuji Nzambi haputolang’aku; muntu wavwalika kuji Nzambi wajihembang’a, owu watama hakumukunkaku.
63005019 Tuneluki netu tuyantu aNzambi; mpata yamunu mwishina yashakamang’a muji owu watama.

63005020 Tuneluki netu Mwana kaNzambi nenzi, natwinki jehi kashinshi kakumwiluka yena walala; ninetu tuji muji yena walala, mwomuji Mwaninji Yesu Klistu. Yeniwu jiyi Nzambi walala, niwumi wahayanyaka.
63005021 Enu anyanami anyanya, jihembenu kunsang’u zhawankishi
64001001 Ami mukulumpi niji nakusoneka mukanja weyeyi mama watonjewa, nawanyaneyi inakeng'a muwalala; hiyami hohuku, niantu ezhima eluka walala.
64001002 Walala washakamang'a mujetu, wakekala nanetu hayanyaka.
64001003 Luwi, nikwanakena, nikuwunja kwikali nanetu, kwakufuma kuji Nzambi Tata, nikuji Yesu Klistu Mwana kaTata, muwalala nimukukeng'a.
64001004 Nazang'alali nankashi chinamoni anyaneyi amakwawu hiyakwenja mwaya walala, mwomwatulezheluwu kuji Tata.
64001005 Ichi jinu eyi mama, nakulembeleli nami tukeng'ang'anenu; hichiji neyi niji nakukusonekela nshimbi yayihaku, yoyatulezheluwu jehi kufumisha kutachi.
64001006 Kukeng'a yowu kwenja mwatulezhang'ayi mwezhima. Yeniyi jiyi nshimbi yimwatiyili kufumisha kutachi ninji mwenjumu.
64001007 Mulong'a akwakujimbana amavulu anayi nakutambatamba mukachi kawantu, alekang'a kwitezha nawu Yesu Klistu wenzhili mumuzhimba. Wujochu himukwakujimbana himukwankunyi naKlistu.
64001008 Babalenu mubuli kuzhimbesha nyijimu yitwakong'eli, kulonja mwakatambuli wulooku washikilamu chikupu.
64001009 Muntu wamotokang'a nakubula kushakama mwatulezheliyi Klistu, hakweti Nzambuku; muntu washakamang'a mwatulezheliyi, jiyi wukweti niTata niMwana.
64001010 Neyi kujenu kukwinza muntu wukubula kuleta ntang'ishilu yeniyi, bayi mumutambula mwitala, hela kumwimushaku.
64001011 Muntu wukumwimusha natiyang'ani jehi ninji munyijimu yinji yatama.

64001012 Nikweti yuma yayivulu yakuyisonekela, ilang'a hinakeng'i kuyisoneka hachipapilu nawulombuku; nakuhweleli nami nakenza kujenu twakahosha hitwakajimona nenu mesu namesu, kulonja muzang'alu wetu wakawanini chikupu.
64001013 Anyana kamanakweyi wamumbanja watonjewa anakwimushi.
65001001 Ami mukulumpi niji nakusoneka mukanja weyeyi Gayusi wakeng'ewa, inakeng'a muwalala.
65001002 Eyi mukwetu twakeng'a, nakulombelelang'a nami wushakami chachiwahi muyuma yezhima, wukoli nimumuzhimba, neyi chekala wumi weyi wamukachi.
65001003 Mulong'a nazang'aleli nankashi henzhili anakwetu nakushimuna wunsahu wawalala wamwenuwu mujeyi, chiwenjang'a mwaya walala.
65001004 Hinikweti muzang'alu wakubajika weniwuku, wakutiya nawu anyanami enjang'a muwalala.
65001005 Eyi mukwetu twakeng'a, washinshikang'a mwezhima muwayikalakelang'a anakwetu, eng'a nienyi nawa.
65001006 Ashimwini kukeng'a kweyi muchipompelu. Neyi wakayenjesha munzhila yawu mwatelela Nzambi, wakela chachiwahi.
65001007 Mulong'a hanyamukiluwu nakuya hansang'u yezhina jaMwanta Yesu, hiyatambwili yuma kuji azhentiluku.
65001008 jichi twaji kutambula antu aji ochu, kulonja twikali akwakukalakela walala hamu.
65001009 Nasonekeleli chipompelu ilang'a jiyotefwesi, wakeng'a kwikala muneni mukachi kawu, hatutambulang'a etuku.

65001010 jichi chinakenza nakaanuka mwelang'ayi, nimazu atama atutavwilang'ayi. Hakuminang'a jakutiya kuwaha mwenomu hohuku, niyomweni hatambulang'a anakwetuku, hela ákukeng'a kuyitambula wayilekeshang'a kwinji, hakuyihang'a muchipompelu.
65001011 Eyi mukwetu twakeng'a, imbuzholang'a yuma yayiwahi, bayi yuma yatamaku. Muntu welang'a chachiwahi wakuji Nzambi, muntu welang'a chatama hanamoni Nzambuku.
65001012 jemetelusa amushimunang'a wunsahu wawuwahi kuji antu ezhima, nikuji walala waweni; eng'a, ninetu nawa twamushimunang'a wunsahu, nineyi wuneluki wunsahu wetu walala.
65001013 Najing'i nansang'u zhazhivulu zhakukusonekela, ilang'a hinakeng'i kukusonekela nawulombu nansonekesuku;
65001014 nakuhweleli nami keng'a tujimoni neyi, tuhoshi mesu namesu.
65001015 Akwetu anakwimushi. ng'imushili akwetu ezhima hezhina hezhina.
66001001 Ami Yuda, njung'u yaYesu Klistu, manakwaYakoba, niji nakusoneka mukanja wenwenu atambikewa, akeng'ewa muji Nzambi Tata, ánahembeluwu muji Yesu Klistu.
66001002 Luwi lwikali nanenu, nikuwunja nikukeng'a kuyivulili.

66001003 Enu akwetu twakeng'a, nakeng'a nami nijikwatishi kuyisonekela nsang'u yawamwinu wetu wamawaninu, ilang'a hinukutiya kumuchima nami ching'a niyisonekeli mazu akuyikonkomwena, nami lwililenu nang'ovu chikuhwelelu chenu chenkeluwu akwakuzhila kamu hohu chahayanyaka yezhima.

66001004 Mulong'a kuji antu amakwawu anajikokelumu hambaji, wowu atong'welawu jehi chachikulu nawu akayihisha. Hiyantu ajiwulang'a Nzambi, abalumunang'a luwi lwaNzambi yetu lwikali kubazhama, nakujikala Mwanta wetu Chinyawezhi, yowu Yesu Klistu.
66001005 Hela mweluka jehi yuma yezhima chikupu, nakeng'i kuyanukisha nami, Mwanta, chapulwishiliyi munza winji mwitung'a jaEzhipitu, nkumininaku hakuzhilumuna antu abulili kukuhwelela.
66001006 Niang'elu abulili kuhemba wanta wawu, hiyakufuma mwaawu mwashakaminang'awu, nayihembi mumaleng'i ahayanyaka mumwijima wiyila bwi-i, nayiswekeli kusompesha kwefuku oju jeneni.
66001007 ASojoma naGomola, nanyikala yanyeng'umukiluku, ajumbilili muwuzhila nakwila yuma yabula kuya mwayileng'eleluwu, chamwenuwu kubabesha kwakesi kahayanyaka, anekali jehi akutalilahu.
66001008 Mwomumu niwenawa nawa atamishang'a nyizhimba yawu namwatong'ozhokang'awu, ajiwulang'a wanta, atenang'a akwakulema chatama.
66001009 Hakwila mukulumpi wawang'elu Mikeli, hafwiliyi ntaji najiyabolu hansang'u yamuzhimba waMosi, hatwesheli kumuhosha chatama nakumwinka mulong'aku; wakuminini jakwila ninji, MWANTA akuhosholi.
66001010 Hakwila wena atenang'a yuma yezhima yabula kwilukawu chatama; hiyakujitokesha nayuma yamwaya chisemwa yeluka nianyama abulang'a kutong'ozhoka.
66001011 Oyu yihung'u yakamonawu! Mulong'a ayili munzhila yaKena; alunjumukilili mwaluwili Balami nakulonja wulooku; anong'eleli muntaji yaKola.

66001012 Wenawa himalola akuhukena akaji kumwekana hatooka mumawizhenu akukeng'ang'ana, hajyang'awu nanenu; hiyatubing'a ajijiishang'a awenawu chakaji woma; himavu akaji menzhi alelokang'a nampepela; hinyitonju yahanong'a yakaji nyikabu, yafwa kayeji, yabwitika nikunyizhi;
66001013 himankanja akukalung'alwizhi azuwa, atupukang'a mafulolu ansonyi yawu aweni; hitutumbwa twahitahitang'a, twanaswekeluwu mwijima wiyila bwi-i wahayanyaka.
66001014 Wenawa jiwu aplofweteleluwu kuji Enoki, wamuchitanu nachiyeji wakufumisha kuji Ajama, ninji, Tiyenu, MWANTA wakenza namakumi amakombakazhi awantu inji azhila,

66001015 nakwila mujimu wakusompesha nakukonkolola ezhima ajiwulang'a Nzambi, nanyijimu yawu yakujiwula Nzambi yakong'eluwu chakujiwula Nzambi, nayuma yakala yezhima yamuhosheluwu akwanshiji ajiwulang'a Nzambi.
66001016 Wenawa hiyakwakunyinyita, hiyakwakutoba, enjang'a mwaya kufwila kwawu kwatama. Tunwa twawu twahoshang'a mazu atiyakana akujinka wanta; alemeshang'a antu kumesu kulonja kujiilaku yuma.
66001017 Ilang'a enu akwetu twakeng'a, anukenu mazu ahosheluwu jehi apostolu zhaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu,
66001018 ayilezheluwu nawu, Kunyaka yakukuminina kwakekala akwakuseha, akenjang'a mwaya kufwila kwawu kwakujiwula Nzambi.
66001019 Wenawa jiwu aambokang'a, ekali yenju; hiyantu elang'a mwaya muzhimba hohu, hiyakweti Spilituku.
66001020 Hakwila enu akwetu twakeng'a, jitung'enu mukukuhwelela kwenu kwabajika kuzhila, nakulombela muji Spilitu Wazhila.
66001021 jihembenu kulonja mushakami mukukeng'a kwaNzambi, nakutalila luwi lwaMwanta wetu Yesu Klistu lwashika kuwumi wahayanyaka.
66001022 Amu azhinokang'a yitiyilenu luwi;
66001023 amakwawu yihanjishenu chakuyihukula mukesi; amakwawu yitiyilenu luwi nawoma, nakuhela niihina jakuvwala jinasampukili mazhilu achisemwa chaheseki.
66001024 Kuji yena natweshi kuyihemba mubuli kujimbuka, Natweshi kuyiimika kwamwekana lubanzhi lwakulema kwinji, Namuzang'alu waswezha, chakaji himwatamina;

66001025 Kuji Nzambi wumu hohu, yowu Chamwinu chetu, Kwokuji Yesu Klistu Mwanta wetu, Kwikali lubanzhi lwakulema, niwukeleng'i, niwanta, ning'ovu; Nihelili nyaka yichiji kanja, nikatataka, nihayanyaka. Amena.

67001001 Chimwekeshu chaYesu Klistu chamumwekesheluwu kuji Nzambi, kulonja alezhi ambung'inji yuma yikukeng'a kumwekana mumafuku akaji kuvula. Watemesheli kang'elu kinji nakuyishimuna kuji kambung'inji Yowanu.
67001002 jiyi washimwini wunsahu waIzu jaNzambi niwaYesu Klistu, yoyuma yamweniyi yezhima.
67001003 Yowu wukutang'ila akwawu nakooleki, ninawa akutiya mazu awuplofwetu iwu anakooleki, ákuhemba yuma yanasonekuwu mwenimu; mulong'a mpinzhi keng'a yishiki.

67001004 Ami Yowanu nasonekeli yipompelu yekala muAsiya yitanu nayiyeji. Luwi lwikali nanenu nikuwunja kwakufuma kuji owu wekala kwoku, wajing'i kwoku, wamba kenza; kwakufuma nikuji Spilitu wekala mutanu namuyeji wekala kumesu etanja jinji jawanta;
67001005 kwakufuma nikuji Yesu Klistu, yowu chinsahu washinshika, yowu weji wamuji afu, yowu nyuuli yawanyanta aheseki.
67001006 Watwilishili twikali anyanta niatuplistu twaNzambi yinji, yowu Tata. Lubanzhi lwakulema niwanta wikali winji hayanyaka nanyaka. Amena.
67001007 Talenu, hakwinza namavu, antu ezhima akamumona namesu, niwena amupwikili; ninyunza yezhima yaheseki yakamujila makumbu. Mwamweni. Amena.
67001008 Mwanta ninji Ami yami Alefwa, yami Omega, wekala kwoku, wajing'i kwoku, wamba kenza, Nzambi Chinyawezhi.
