67001009 Ami manakwenu Yowanu, mukwakumwena nenu hamu niyihung'u niwanta nikutatakena kwamuji Yesu, najing'i hachitutu, izhina jachu Patamosa, kukoola izu jaNzambi, nikushimuna nsang'u yaYesu.
67001010 Najing'i muji Spilitu hefuku jaMwanta; hinukutiya kunyima izu javuma neyi mpùng'a,

67001011 ninji, Ami yami Alefwa, yami Omega, yami Tachi, yami Nkumininaku. Yiwukumona yisoneki mumukanja, wutemeshi kuyipompelu yitanu nayiyeji yekala kuEfwesesa, nikuSimilina, nikuPeligamu, nikuTiyatila, nikuSalajisa, nikuFilajelifiya, nikuLayojikeya.
67001012 Hinukubalumuka nami nitali izu jinahoshi nanami. Chinabalumuki nimona mawimenu amanong'u awulu atanu nayeji.
67001013 Mukachi kamawimenu amanong'u muji wúji neyi Mwana kaMuntu, navwali ihina jakuluka nikunyenju, kwibwambu kuji muya wawulu.
67001014 Mutu winji ninsuki zhinji zhitooka to-o neyi wanja wutooka, chikwanvula yamalola; nimesu inji aji neyi muzuzu wakesi,
67001015 ninyenju yinji yiji neyi wuneng'u wuji nakuyemoka muluteng'u; niizu jinji jiji neyi kuvuma kwamuluumbi.
67001016 Muchikasa chinji chachijiilu muji tutumbwa tutanu natuyeji; mukanwa kinji mwejika mpoku yakabali yatwa, yikweti wumwemu kuyeji; kumesu inji kuji neyi chatong'ekang'a itang'wa nang'ovu.
67001017 Chinamumweni hinukujimbukila kunyenju yinji neyi nimufu hohu. Hakunnang'ika chikasa chinji chachijiilu ninji, Bayi wutiya womaku, yami Tachi, yami Nkumininaku,
67001018 yami Mumi; kufwa nafwili, hakwinzichi nahanja hayanyaka nanyaka. Nsapi zhakufwa nizhakalung'a zhiji nanami.
67001019 jichi sonekaku yuma yiwunamoni, niniyi yijuku, niyuma yamba kenza kukukuminina.

67001020 Nsang'u yakuzhinja yatutumbwa tutanu natuyeji túwunamoni muchikasa chami chachijiilu, niyamawimenu amanong'u awulu atanu nayeji; tutumbwa tutanu natuyeji hiyang'elu ayipompelu yitanu nayiyeji; nimawimenu amanong'u atanu nayeji hiyipompelu yitanu nayiyeji.
67002001 Kang'elu kachipompelu chakuEfwesesa musonekeli neyi:

67002002 ninji, Neluki nyijimu yeyi, nichiwakabakanang'a, nichiwatatakenang'a, nichiwabulang'a kusha antu atama kumuchima, nichiwesekeli antu ajitenang'a nawu tuyapostolu, komana hiyapostoluku, wunayishinshiki neyi hiyantwambi.
67002003 Wunatatakeni, wunakooli izhina jami, hiwunazeyuku.
67002004 Hela chochu, nakumoni namulong'a, nami wunaleki kukeng'a kweyi kwatachi.
67002005 jichi anukaku chiwajing'i, wubalumuki mumuchima, wili nyijimu yiwelilang'a hatachi. Neyi nehi, neyi wukubula kubalumuka mumuchima, nukwinza kujeyi nakufumisha wimenu wenong'u jeyi hiwuji.
67002006 Ilang'a chuma chachiwahi chiwuji nachu, chiwahelang'a nyijimu yawaNikolayitani yinahelang'a ninami.
67002007 Yowu wukweti matu atiyi mwakuhoshayi Spilitu nayipompelu. Yowu wukwimika mushinju nakamwitezha kujya kumutonju wawumi wekala muPalajisa yaNzambi.
67002008 Kang'elu kachipompelu chakuSimilina musonekeli neyi:
67002009 Ninji, Neluki yihung'u yeyi niwuzweng'i weyi, kutong'a waheta, neluki nimatuka anowu elang'a nawu tuji aYujeya, komana hiyaYujeyaku, hishikola yaSatana kwawu.

67002010 Bayi wutiyang'a woma wayuma yiwukukeng'a kukaba nachuku. Tiya, jiyabolu keng'a ashi akwenu amakwawu mukaleya, kulonja ayeseki; mwakamona yihung'u mafuku ikumi. Ikalaku washinshika njo-o nikukufwa, nakakwinka chibaaba chawumi.
67002011 Yowu wukweti matu atiyi mwakuhoshayi Spilitu nayipompelu. Yowu wukwimika mushinju hiyakamukatisha nakufwa kwamuchiyejuku
67002012 Kang'elu kachipompelu chakuPeligamu musonekeli neyi:

67002013 Ninji, Neluki kuwashakama, kwokwekala itanja jawanta waSatana; ilang'a eyi wakakela izhina jami mbe, kujikala kukuhwelela kuwankuhwelela nehi, hela mumafuku ajing'iyi chinsahu chami Antipasi, muntu wami washinshika, azhahiluwu mukachi kenu kwashakamayi Satana.

67002014 Hela chochu, kuji yuma yantesha yinakumoni nachu namulong'a, mulong'a wuji nawakwenu acheng'i kwenoku etezhang'a maana ayilezheluwu kuji Balami, walezheli Balaki mwakutila anyana kaIsalela muhetu akajyi yuma yanapeshuwu nachu ankishi, akeli niwuzhila.
67002015 Wuji nawakwenu acheng'i nawa etezhang'a ntang'ishilu yawaNikolayitani chochimu.
67002016 jichi balumukaku mumuchima. Neyi nehi, nukwinza swayi kujeyi, nakalwi nawu nzhita nampoku yakabali yamukanwa kami.

67002017 Yowu wukweti matu atiyi mwakuhoshayi Spilitu nayipompelu. Yowu wukwimika mushinju nakamwinkahu manina ajing'i akusweka, nakamwinka niilola jitooka, heloloju asonekahu izhina jajiha, jabula kwilukawu antu, ching'a yowu muntu wukujitambula.
67002018 Kang'elu kachipompelu chakuTiyatila musonekeli neyi:
67002019 Ninji, Neluki nyijimu yeyi, nikukeng'a kweyi, nikukuhwelela kweyi, nichiwakalakelang'a akwenu, nikutatakena kweyi, neluki nami nyijimu yeyi yakukuminina yinabajiki yakusambila.

67002020 Hela chochu, nakumoni nami wuji namulong'a, wunamwitezhi owu mumbanja Yezebeli, wajitenang'a ninji nikaplofwetu, hakutang'isha nakujimba ambung'ami akong'i wuzhila, ajyi niyuma yanapeshuwu nachu ankishi.
67002021 Namushili mpinzhi yakubalumuka mumuchima, komana yena kwonti kwinji kubalumuka nakuleka wuzhila winji.
67002022 Tiya, hinukumunatila hakajiji kayikatu, niakwawu elang'a ninji wuvumbi nukuyumbila nawa muyihung'u yaswezha, ching'a abalumuka munyichima nakuleka nyijimu yawu.
67002023 Nakazhaha anyaninji nachipupu; niyipompelu yezhima yakeluka nawu natalatalang'a munyichima mwivumu; nakayinka wezhima wenu hamuntu hamuntu mwesekela nyijimu yenu.
67002024 Ilang'a enu munashali muTiyatila, yenu ezhima munabuli kwitezha maanawa, munabuli kwiluka yuma yaSatana yatenang'awu nawu yakunama; nukuyila nami hinukuyitwika chisenja chacheng'uku.
67002025 Hela chochu, kakelenu mbe chuma chimuji nachu nichinakenza.
67002026 Yowu wukwimika mushinju, wúkukakela nyijimu yami njo-o nikunsa, nakamwinka wanta wanyunza.
67002027 Wakayiyuula nankùnyi yachikung'u. Antu akayifumpa neyi chafumpang'ayi kang'emi nsaba zhinji pwo-pwo, kwayizanja hohu; mwomunatambuli ninami nawa kuji Tata yami.
67002028 Nakamwinka Katumbwa katong'ekang'a nabujiji.
67002029 Yowu wukweti matu atiyi mwakuhoshayi Spilitu nayipompelu.
67003001 Kang'elu kachipompelu chakuSalajisa musonekeli neyi:
67003002 Tonaku, wukoleshi yuma yinashali yinakeng'i kufwa; mulong'a hinamoni nyijimu yeyi kulumbuluka kumesu aNzambi yamuku.
67003003 jichi anukaku chiwatambwili nimuwatiyili, wukakelumu, wubalumuki mumuchima weyi. jichi neyi wakabula kutona, nakenza neyi chenzang'a ikombi, hiwakeluka mpinzhi yinakakukasumwishaku.
67003004 Hela chochu, wuji namazhina antesha awantu muSalajisa anabuli kutamisha mahinawu; wena akenja nanami nakuvwala yitooka mulong'a anateli.
67003005 Yowu wukwimika mushinju, jiyi akavwikawu mahina atooka; hinakazhimang'esha izhina jinji mumukanja wawumuku, naketezha izhina jinji kumesu aTata yami nikumesu awang'elu zhinji.
67003006 Yowu wukweti matu atiyi mwakuhoshayi Spilitu nayipompelu.
67003007 Kang'elu kachipompelu chakuFilajelifiya musonekeli neyi:
67003008 Ninji, Neluki nyijimu yeyi. Tiya, nakushili kumesu eyi chenzelu chachashi, hikwekala wákatwesha kuchenzelaku; eyi wuji nang'ovu yantesha, wunahembi izu jami, wunabuli kujikala izhina jami.
67003009 Tiya, nukutembula akwashikola yaSatana elang'a nawu tuji aYujeya, komana hiyaYujeyaku atwambang'a kwawu, akenzi nakujifukula kunyenju yeyi, akeluki nawu ami nakukeng'a.
67003010 Chiwunahembi izu jami nakutatakena, ami nawa nakakuhemba wakabuli kumona mpinzhi yamba kenza nakushika mumpata yamunu mwishina yezhima, yakuyeseka antu ashakama hamaseki.
67003011 Nukwinza swayi; kwataku chiwuji nachu mbe, kulonja abuli kukutambula chibaaba cheyi.

67003012 Yowu wukwimika mushinju nakamubalumuna kwikala chishimi chamuTembeli yaNzambi yami, hamba kejikamu cheng'uku. Nakasoneka haji yena izhina jaNzambi yami, niizhina jang'anja yaNzambi yami, yowu Yelusalema yayiha yakasuluka mwiwulu nakufuma kuji Nzambi yami, niizhina jami jajiha.
67003013 Yowu wukweti matu atiyi mwakuhoshayi Spilitu nayipompelu.
67003014 Kang'elu kachipompelu chakuLayojikeya musonekeli neyi:
67003015 Ninji, Neluki nyijimu yeyi nami hiwutuuta hela kutataku, nakeng'i nami wikali wutuuta hela wutata.
67003016 Chiwuneli wukanvuyenki hohu, hela wutuuta hela wutata nehi, nukukusanza.
67003017 Chiwuneli neyi, Nimukwakuheta, najiheteshi jehi, hinabuli chumaku; komana zhakukuma jehi, wumulanja, wukazweng'i, wumputamesu, wuji nawuvu.

67003018 Tiya maana inukukulezha, nami lanjaku kujami wulu wakoseka nakesi, wikali mukwakuheta; nimahina atooka, wuvwali kulonja wuvu weyi wubuli kumwekana, wubuli kutiya nsonyi; lanjaku niyihemba, wukwiti kumesu wumoni nawa.
67003019 Antu ami inakeng'a nayikonkololang'a nakuyifumba; jichi shaku muchima wubalumuki.
67003020 Talenu, nemani kuchenzelu nakujonjomwena; neyi kuji muntu wukutiya izu jami, hakwenzulula chenzelu, nukwing'ila muji yena, nukujya ninji, niyena nawa wukujya nanami.
67003021 Yowu wukwimika mushinju, nakamwitezha kushakama nanami hetanja jami jawanta, neyi chinemikili ami mushinju, nashakama naTata yami hetanja jinji jawanta nawa.
67003022 Yowu wukweti matu atiyi mwakuhoshayi Spilitu nayipompelu.

67004001 Chiyakumini yumiyi nami nitali, hinukumona chenzelu chinenzuluki mwiwulu; hinukutiya izu jinasambilili kutiya jajing'i neyi mpùng'a, hijikuhosha nanami ninji, Inzang'a munu mwiwulu, nikumwekesheli yuma yamba kenza kukukuminina.
67004002 Hohenohu niikala nimuji Spilitu; kutala mwiwulu anashumu itanja jawanta; hetanjoju jawanta hashakama wumu.
67004003 Yena washakamahu, kumutala wuji neyi chikwelola jamwekanang'a nikwishinaji nijichinana. Kwitanja jawanta kwanyeng'umuka kansulung'unja, kukatala kaji neyi emelalji.

67004004 Kwitanjoju jawanta kwanyeng'umuka matanja awanta makumi ayeji nawana (24). Hamatanjowu hashakama akulumpi makumi ayeji nawana (24), anavwali mahina atooka; nikunyitu yawu kuji yibaaba yawulu.
67004005 Mwitanja jawanta himukwijika ninzazhi nimazu nikujijima. Kumesu etanja kuji nimanong'u abutuka atanu nayeji, yowu Spilitu waNzambi wekala mutanu namuyeji.
67004006 Kumesu etanja kuji neyi izhiya jachibanzhilu jiji neyi ilola jakezhima. Nimukachi ketanja nikunyeng'umuka itanja kwi-njo kuji amomi awana ela kwamesu hohu, nikwivumu nikunyima.
67004007 Mumi wakusambila wuji neyi mutupa, mumi wamuchiyeji wuji neyi mwana kang'ombi, mumi wamuchisatu kumesu wuji neyi amuntu, mumi wamuchiwana wuji neyi mbuulu wukutuuka.

67004008 Awa amomi awana akweti mpuula, iwu zhitanu nayimu, iwu zhitanu nayimu, muyawana wawu; ela kwamesu hohu hezhima kwi-njo nimukachi. Nimwaana niwufuku hiyanookang'aku nakwila nawu, Wazhila! Wazhila! Wazhila! MWANTA Nzambi Watwesha yezhima, Wajing'i kwoku, wekala kwoku, wamba kenza.
67004009 Awa amomi chakutiyakeshawu lubanzhi lwakulema nimpuhu nakusakilila wáshakama hetanja, wáhanjang'a hayanyaka nanyaka,

67004010 awa akulumpi makumi ayeji nawana (24) hiyakujinata hamaseki kunyenju yanowu washakama hetanja jawanta, nakujifukula kuji yena wahanjang'a hayanyaka nanyaka. Hiyakunatila yibaaba yawu kumesu etanja jawanta,

67004011 nakwila nawu, Eyi MWANTA wetu, eyi Nzambi yetu, Wunateli kutambula lubanzhi lwakulema nimpuhu ning'ovu. Mulong'a yeyi waleng'eli yuma yezhima kulonja yili mwaya muchima weyi; jichi chiyekala, jichi chayileng'eluwu.
67005001 Muchikasa chachijiilu chayena washakama hetanja jawanta hinukumona mukanja, awusoneka nimukachi nihewulu, awulamika chacheni nayilamiki yitanu nayiyeji.
67005002 Hinukumona kang'elu wang'ovu hakubijika nezu jatiyakana ninji, Náteli kubakula mukanjowu nakulamona yilamiki yawu hinyi?
67005003 Nimwiwulu nihamaseki nimwishina jamaseki himwajing'i wátwesheli hela kubakula mukanjowu, hela kuwutalaku.
67005004 Ami hinukujila chacheni chikunabuli kumwekana muntu watela kubakula mukanjowu hela kuwutala.
67005005 Mukulumpi wumu hakung'ila ninji, Bayi wujilaku; tala, Mutupa wakumuchiji waYuja, Muzhi wajaviji, nemiki mushinju wakubakula mukanja nakulamona yilamiki yawu yitanu nayiyeji.

67005006 Hinukumona mukachi ketanja nawamomi awana nimukachi kawakulumpi, munemani Mwana kaMukoku wuji neyi anamuzhahi jehi, wukweti nseng'u zhitanu nazhiyeji, nimesu atanu nayeji, jiyi Spilitu waNzambi mutanu namuyeji anatemeshuwu mwahita iseki jezhima.
67005007 Hakwinza nakuwutambula kuchikasa chachijiilu chayenowu wajing'i washakama hetanja jawanta.

67005008 Chanatambuliyi mukanjowu, awa amomi awana ninawa akulumpi makumi ayeji nawana (24), hiyakujinata chamesu heseki kunyenju yaMwana kaMukoku. Wezhima wawu akweti tujaja niyeng'a yawulu yakunama yenzala insensi, yowu kulombela kwawakwakuzhila.

67005009 Hiyakwimba kamina kakaha nawu, Wunateli kutambula mukanja nakulamona yilamiki yawu; Mulong'a akuzhahili, wunamukuulili Nzambi antu akunyichiji yezhima, Akumajimi ezhima, akumatung'a ezhima, akunyunza yezhima, namashi eyi.
67005010 Anayilishi jehi wanta waNzambi niatuplistu; Hiyakuyuula hamaseki.

67005011 Hinukwila nikumona nikutiya izu jawang'elu amavulu anyeng'umuka itanja jawanta niamomi niakulumpi; kuyichinja makombakazhi ikumi mapampa makombakazhi ikumi, nimakombakazhi amakombakazhi, akaji kuchinjewa.
67005012 Hiyakwila nezu jatiyakana nawu, Mwana kaMukoku wazhahilewi nateli kutambula ng'ovu, Nimaheta, nimaana, niwujumi, nimpuhu, nilubanzhi lwakulema, ninkisu.

67005013 Yuma yezhima yaleng'eluwu yekala mwiwulu nihamaseki nimwishina jamaseki nihakalung'alwizhi, niyuma yezhima yijumu, hinukuyitiya nakwila nawu, Ninkisu, nimpuhu, nilubanzhi lwakulema, niwanta, Yiikali yawáshakama hetanja jawanta, NiyaMwana kaMukoku, hayanyaka nanyaka.
67005014 Niamomi awana hiyakwila nawu, Amena. Niakulumpi hiyakujinata heseki nakujifukula.
67006001 Hinukumona chalamwiniyi Mwana kaMukoku chilamiki chimu chanoyu yilamiki yitanu nayiyeji, hinukutiya mumi wumu wahaji amomi awana hakwila nezu jakujijima ninji, Inzang'a.
67006002 Nami nitali, hinukumona kawalu katooka; mukwakwenjelahu nasenji wuta wamukunzhi. Amwinka chibaaba, hakuya nakwimika mushinju kulonja nawa akemikang'a mushinju ho-o.
67006003 Chalamwiniyi chilamiki chamuchiyeji, hinukutiya mumi wamuchiyeji hakwila ninji, Inzang'a.
67006004 Hikukwijika kawalu kakwawu, kachinana; mukwakwenjelahu amwinka zhakufumisha kuwunja hamaseki, kulonja antu azhahang'ani. Amwinka mpoku yakabali yeneni.
67006005 Chalamwiniyi chilamiki chamuchisatu, hinukutiya mumi wamuchisatu hakwila ninji, Inzang'a. Nami nitali, hinukumona kawalu keyila; mukwakwenjelahu nasenji chesekelu muchikasa chinji.
67006006 Mukachi kawamomi awana hinukutiya neyi izu, hijikwila ninji, Chifwoyu chatijiku wulooku wefuku jimu, niyifwoyu yabali yisatu wulooku wefuku jimu; bayi wukisang'ana manzhi nivinyuku.
67006007 Chalamwiniyi chilamiki chamuchiwana, hinukutiya izu jamumi wamuchiwana hakwila ninji, Inzang'a.

67006008 Nami nitali, hinukumona kawalu katookoloka; mukwakwenjelahu wukweti izhina jinji jiyi Kufwa, nikalung'a kamulonjela munyima. Hiyakuyinka wanta wakuzhaha chibalu chamuchiwana champata yahanu hamaseki, azhahi nampoku yakabali nanzala nayipupu nawanyama ayisuma amwisang'a.
67006009 Chalamwiniyi chilamiki chamuchitanu, hinukumona mwishina jakameng'a antu azhahiluwu, akooleli izu jaNzambi nikushimuna kwashimwinuwu.
67006010 Hiyakubijika nezu jatiyakana nawu, Eyi Mwanta wazhila, walala, wamba kasompesha antu ashakama hamaseki mwaakanyi, kulonja kututenjela mashi etu?

67006011 Hiyakuyinka wezhima wawu hamuntu hamuntu, nyinkukumba yitooka, hiyakuyilezha nawu, Nookenuhu kampinzhi kanti kakwawu, ninichi chakamanishawu kuzhaha akwenu ang'amba, nianakwenu neyi chayizhahiluwu enu nawa.
67006012 Chalamwiniyi chilamiki chamuchitanu nachimu, hikuji mutentanshi weneni; itang'wa hijikubalumuka kwiyila bwi-i neyi chikeleyi chamavuzhi eyila; kakwezhi kezhima hikakubalumuka neyi mashi;
67006013 nitutumbwa twamwiwulu hitukuholokela hamaseki neyi yikuyu yayisu yinawulumuki chanachankang'eshuwu mutonju nampepela yeneni.
67006014 Iwulu hiyakujifumisha neyi mukanja wanavung'avung'uwu; nimapiji ezhima niyitutu yezhima hiyakuyitutulula muyajing'i.
67006015 Anyanta ankanu ahamaseki, niatulamba, niakulumpi zhanzhita, niakwakuheta, niayilobu, nianjung'u ezhima, niabula kwikala anjung'u ezhima, hiyakubatama mumayeng'u nimumalola akumapiji.
67006016 Hiyakuyila mapiji namalola nawu, Tuhinukilenu, mutusweki tubuli kumwekana kumesu anowu washakama hetanja jawanta, abuli kutuzuwila kuji Mwana kaMukoku;
67006017 mulong'a ifuku jeneni jakuyizuwila jinashiki, wukutwesha kwimanaku hinyi?

67007001 Chiyakumini yumiyi hinukumona ang'elu awana anemani kumbang'u zhiwana zheseki, anakwati mpepela zhiwana zheseki, kulonja kukang'esha mpepela kukunka heseki, hela hakalung'alwizhi, hela hamutonju himutonju.

67007002 Hinukumona kang'elu mukwawu hakukanjama nakufuma kwatuntukilang'a itang'wa, wuji nachilamiki chaNzambi wamumi. Hakubijika owu ang'elu awana énkeluwu mujimu wakukisang'ana iseki nikalung'alwizhi nezu jatiyakana,
67007003 ninji, Bayi mukisang'ana iseki hela kalung'alwizhi hela nyitonjuku, ching'a tunalamiki jehi ambung'aNzambi yetu chilamiki hamahamawu.
67007004 Hinukutiya mwachinjililuwu antu alamikiluwu, nkulakazhi yamakombakazhi namakombakazhi makumi awana nawana (144,000), akunyichiji yawanyana kaIsalela yezhima.

67007005 Kumuchiji waYuja alamikiluku makombakazhi ikumi nayeji (12,000): kumuchiji walubeni alamikiluku makombakazhi ikumi nayeji (12,000): kumuchiji waGaji alamikiluku makombakazhi ikumi nayeji (12,000):

67007006 kumuchiji waAsheli alamikiluku makombakazhi ikumi nayeji (12,000): kumuchiji waNafwatali alamikiluku makombakazhi ikumi nayeji (12,000): kumuchiji waManase alamikiluku makombakazhi ikumi nayeji (12,000):

67007007 kumuchiji waSimeyona alamikiluku makombakazhi ikumi nayeji (12,000): kumuchiji waLevi alamikiluku makombakazhi ikumi nayeji (12,000): kumuchiji waIsakali alamikiluku makombakazhi ikumi nayeji (12,000):

67007008 kumuchiji waZebuluni alamikiluku makombakazhi ikumi nayeji (12,000): kumuchiji waYosefu alamikiluku makombakazhi ikumi nayeji (12,000): kumuchiji waBenzhamini alamikiluku makombakazhi ikumi nayeji.(12,000)

67007009 Chiyakumini yumiyi nami nitali, hinukumona izaza jeneni jakaji kutwesha kujichinja kuji muntu, jawantu akunyunza yezhima, akunyichiji yezhima, akumatung'a ezhima, akumajimi ezhima, anemani kumesu etanja jawanta, nikumesu aMwana kaMukoku, anavwali nyinkukumba yitooka, anakwati nyitayi yanyikoma kumakasawu.
67007010 Hiyakubijika nezu jatiyakana nawu, Wamwinu wikali waNzambi yetu washakama hetanja jawanta, niwaMwana kaMukoku.
67007011 Ang'elu ezhima hiyakwimana nakunyeng'umuka itanja jawanta niakulumpi niamomi awana, hiyakujinata chamesu heseki kwitanja, hiyakujifukula kuji Nzambi,
67007012 nawu, Amena; ninkisu, nilubanzhi lwakulema, nimaana, Nikusakilila, nimpuhu, ning'ovu, niwujumi, Yiikali yaNzambi yetu hayanyaka nanyaka. Amena.
67007013 Kuchinka mukulumpi wumu hakung'ihula ninji, Awa anavwali nyinkukumba yitooka anyi? Afuma kujihi?
67007014 Hinukumwila nami, Eyi mwanta wami, yeyi weluka. Hakung'ila ninji, Wenawa anafumi kuyihung'u oyu yeneni, anakosi jehi mahinawu, anayitookeshi namashi aMwana kaMukoku to-o.
67007015 jichi chajuwu kumesu etanja jaNzambi jawanta; hiyakumukalakela nimwaana niwufuku muTembeli yinji; yena washakama hetanja jawanta wakayibuta netenti jinji.
67007016 Hiyakatiya cheng'i nzalaku; hiyakatiya nawa cheng'i mpwilaku; hela itang'wa hijakayiyeng'umukila iyenaku, hela nkanza niyantuku.
67007017 Mulong'a Mwana kaMukoku wekala mukachi ketanja jawanta, wakekala kabing'a kawu, wakayilombolang'a kutuseloki twamenzhi awumi; Nzambi wakakombola majilu ezhima kumesu awu.
67008001 Chalamwiniyi chilamiki chamuchitanu nachiyeji, mwiwulu mumwena ninzo-o, kweseka neyi kwizhi mpinzhi yantesha (30 minutes).
67008002 Hinukumona ang'elu atanu nayeji émanang'a kumesu aNzambi, hiyakuyinka mpùng'a zhitanu nazhiyeji.

67008003 Kang'elu wacheng'i hakwinza nakwimana kukameng'a kainsensi, nasenji cheng'a chawulu chakusenjela insensi. Hiyakumwinka insensi kulonja abombi nakulombela kwawakwakuzhila ezhima hakameng'a kawulu kaji kumesu etanja jawanta.
67008004 Wishi wainsensi yanabombuwu jehi nakulombela kwawakwakuzhila hiwukukakumukila kumesu aNzambi, chakufuma muchikasa chanowu kang'elu.
67008005 Owu kang'elu hakunona cheng'a chakusenjela insensi, hakuchinzesha nakesi kahakameng'a, hakuchinatila hamaseki. Hikukwila kujijima nimazu ninzazhi nimutentanshi.
67008006 Awa ang'elu atanu nayeji akweti mpùng'a zhitanu nazhiyeji, hiyakujilong'esha nawu embi.

67008007 Watachi hakwimba, himukulonjela nvula yamalola nikesi kakubomba namashi, hiyakuyinatila hamaseki. Chibalu chamuchisatu chahamaseki hichikusukuma bwi-i, nichibalu chanyitonju chamuchisatu hichikusukuma bwi-i, nimatahu amunyenvu ezhima asukuma nibwi-i.
67008008 Kang'elu wamuchiyeji hakwimba; nichuma chiji neyi mpiji yeneni yiji nakusukuma, hiyakuchinatila mukalung'alwizhi.

67008009 Chibalu chamuchisatu chakalung'alwizhi hichikubalumuka mashi, chibalu chamuchisatu chayuma yakuleng'a yekala mukalung'alwizhi yikweti wumi, hichikufwa; nichibalu chamaatu chamuchisatu hichikukisika.
67008010 Kang'elu wamuchisatu hakwimba; kwiwulu hikukuholoka katumbwa keneni nankashi, kaji nakuya nakusukuma neyi chimunyi, kaholokela nihachibalu chamuchisatu chatulong'a, nihatuseloki twamenzhi.
67008011 Izhina jakatumbwoku nawu, Mutonju walula. Chibalu chamuchisatu chamenzhi hichikubalumuka mutonju walula; niantu amavulu afwa nawena menzhi owu, nanochu chanabalumukuwu jehi alula.

67008012 Kang'elu wamuchiwana hakwimba; nichibalu chamuchisatu chetang'wa acheta nikucheta, nichibalu chamuchisatu chakakwezhi, nichibalu chamuchisatu chatutumbwa; kulonja chibalu chawu chamuchisatu chibalumuki kwiyila, nimwaana wubuli kumwekana chibalu chawu chamuchisatu, niwufuku chochimu.

67008013 Nila nikumona nikutiya, mbuulu wumu hakutuuka hakachi kaluzwizu, hakuhosha nezu jatiyakana ninji, Ihung'u! Ihung'u! Ihung'u! Mahung'u akamonawu awa ekala hamaseki nanoku kuvuma kwakavuma mpùng'a zhikwawu zhawang'elu asatu anashaluhu.
67009001 Kang'elu wamuchitanu hakwimba, nimona nikatumbwa kanaholoki jehi kwiwulu kanashiki jehi hamaseki; amwinka ninsapi yamwikela.
67009002 Hakwenzulula mwikela nansapi oyu. Mwikeloju himukukakumuka wishi wuji neyi wamuluteng'u lweneni. Niitang'wa niluzwizu hiyikwiyila nanowu wishi wamuwinowu.
67009003 Muwishi himukufuma tubola hitukuya hamaseki; hiyakuyinka ng'ovu yiji neyi yawatunzhimbu twahamaseki.
67009004 Hiyakuyila nawu, Bayi mukisang'ana munyenvu wahamaseki hela chuma chituuta chimu hela mutonju niwumuku, ching'a wowu antu anabuli chilamiki chaNzambi hamahamawu.
67009005 Hiyakuyilezha nawu, Bayi muzhaha antuku; kuminenu jakuyikatisha nankashi tukwezhi tutanu. Kukatisha kwawu kuji neyi kukata kwamuntu anasumuwu kuji kanzhimbu.
67009006 Wena mafuku owu antu akakeng'akeng'a kufwa, hiyakachimonaku; akakeng'a nankashi nawu afwi, kufwa kwakayitemuka.
67009007 Mwamwekeneni atubola ajing'i neyi atuwalu along'eshelawu jehi nzhita; hanyitu yawu haji yuma yiji neyi yibaaba yawulu; nimesu awu aji neyi mesu awantu.
67009008 Aji nansuki neyi zhawambanja, nimazewu awu neyi anyitupa.
67009009 Aji nayibwiiku yakusha hantulu, yiji neyi yachikung'u; lushinju lwampuula zhawu luji neyi lushinju lwamakálu, neyi atuwalu amavulu nawa akulotokela kunzhita.
67009010 Akweti nyikila neyi yawatunzhimbu niimuna. ng'ovu yakukatisha antu tukwezhi tutanu yekala munyikila yawu.
67009011 Akweti mwanta wawu yowu kang'elu wekela; izhina jinji muHebelu jiyi Abajoni, mwijimi jaGliki wukweti izhina jaApoliyoni.
67009012 Ihung'u jamuchimu jinahiti; tiyenu, kunashali mahung'u ayeji
67009013 Kang'elu wamuchitanu nachimu hakwimba. Hinukutiya izu jimu hijikutiyakena kunseng'u zhakameng'a kawulu kekala kumesu aNzambi.
67009014 Wumu hakumwila kang'elu wamuchitanu nachimu wuji nampùng'a ninji, Kasununaku owu ang'elu awana anakasuwu kukalong'a keneni Yufulati.
67009015 Owu ang'elu along'esheleluwu jehi mpinzhi yimu niifuku jimu nikakwezhi kamu nimwaka wumu, kulonja azhahi chibalu chamuchisatu chawantu, ayikasununa nikuyikasununa.
67009016 Kuchinja mashijika anowu akwatuwalu nkulakazhi zhiyeji zhamakombakazhi amakombakazhi (200,000,000). Hinukutiya mwayichinjililuwu.

67009017 Mwenimu jimu munamweni atuwalu muchimwenu; akwakwenjelahu akweti yibwiiku yichinana neyi kesi, yiyila neyi wishi, niyawunsela hantulu. Ninyitu yawatuwalu yiji neyi yanyitupa; mutunwa twawu himukwijika kesi niwishi ninzazhi.
67009018 Hiyakuzhaha chibalu chamuchisatu chawantu nayipupu oyu yisatu, nakesi nawishi ninzazhi yikufuma mutunwa twawu.
67009019 Mulong'a ng'ovu zhawatuwalu zhiji mutunwa twawu nimunyikila yawu; mulong'a nyikila yawu yiji neyi tupela, yikweti ninyitu; jiyi yakatishang'awu nachu.

67009020 Antu asheluhu, abulili kuzhahawu nayipupu oyu hiyabalumukili munyichima yawu aleki nyijimu yamakasawu, aleki kujifukula kuji anjemoni, niankishi zhawulu nizhasiliva nizhawuneng'u nizhamalola nizhanyitonju, zhabulang'a kumona hela kutiya hela kwenjaku.
67009021 Hiyabalumukili munyichima yawu aleki wubanzhi wawu hela kupanja kwawu hela wuzhila wawu hela wukombi wawuku.
67010001 Hinukumona kang'elu wang'ovu mukwawu hakusuluka kwiwulu, navwali ivu, nikansulung'unja kaji kumutu winji; kumesu inji kuji neyi itang'wa; ninyenju yinji yiji neyi yishimi yakesi.
67010002 Muchikasa chinji muji kamukanja kanyanya kakubakula jehi. Hakusha mwenju winji wachijiilu hakalung'alwizhi, mwenju winji wachimunswa heseki.
67010003 Hakubijika nezu jatiyakana neyi chabulumang'a mutupa. Chanabijikiyi yivumina yitanu nayiyeji yivuma nikuvuma.
67010004 Chiyinavumi yivumina yitanu nayiyeji, hinukwila nami nisoneki, hinukutiya izu kwiwulu hijikwila ninji, Lamikaku yuma yinahoshi yivuminoyu yitanu nayiyeji nayilamiki, bayi wuyisonekaku.
67010005 Kang'elu namweni nakwimana hakalung'alwizhi niheseki, hakwolola chikasa chinji chachijiilu kwiwulu.
67010006 Hakusanyika wáhanjang'a hayanyaka nanyaka, wáleng'eli iwulu niyuma yekalamu, niiseki niyuma yekalamu, nikalung'alwizhi niyuma yekalamu, ninji, Hikukwikala kulaba nawaku.
67010007 Ilang'a mumafuku akukeng'ayi kang'elu wamuchitanu nachiyeji kwimba mpung'a yinji, chizhinjilu chaNzambi hichikulumbuluka mwashimwiniyi kuji ambung'inji atuplofwetu.
67010008 Izu oju jinatiyili kwiwulu hinukujitiya cheng'i, hijikuhosha nanami ninji, Yaku wutambuli mukanja wakubakula wuji muchikasa chakang'elu nemani hakalung'alwizhi niheseki.
67010009 Hinukuya kuji kang'elu, hinukumwila nami, Anyinki kamukanjaka. Yena hakung'ila ninji, Tambulaku wukijyi kezhima; kakululisha mwivumu jeyi ilang'a mukanwa keyi kakutowala neyi wuchi.
67010010 Hinukutambula kamukanjoku kuchikasa chakang'elu, hinukukijya kezhima. Mukanwa kami himukutowala neyi wuchi; chinajyi tohu, mwivumu mulula nikulula.
67010011 Hiyakung'ila nawu, Ching'a wakaplofwetelang'a cheng'i yawantu amavulu ninyunza yayivulu niakwamajimi amavulu nianyanta ankanu amavulu.
67011001 Hiyakunyinka iteti jiji neyi chuma chakweseka nachu, nawu, Nyamukaku weseki Tembeli yaNzambi nikameng'a niantu akwing'ilamu nakujifukula.
67011002 Wushiyi chipang'u chekala hanzi yaTembeli, wuchileki tuhu; bayi wuchesekaku, mulong'a anachinki kuji azhentili. ng'anja yazhila akayijatola tukwezhi makumi awana natuyeji (42).
67011003 Ayinsahu ami ayeji nakayitezha kuplofweta ikombakazhi jamafuku nankulakazhi zhiyeji namakumi atanu najimu, (1,260) iku sang'a avwelawu yikeleyi hohu.
67011004 Wenawa jiwu nyitonju yaolive yiyeji, jiwu nawa manong'u ayeji emanang'a kumesu aMwanta weseki.
67011005 Neyi muntu wakakeng'a kuyikatisha, mukanwa kawu mwakejika kesi kakajya ayilumbu zhawu, muntu wakakeng'a kuyikatisha jimu mwakamuzhahilawu.

67011006 Wenawa akweti wanta wakuzhika iwulu, kulonja kukang'esha nvula kunoka mukuhitila mafuku akuplofwetawu. Akweti niwanta hamenzhi amavulu kulonja kuyibalumuna ekali mashi, kulonja kweta iseki nayipupu yezhima mwakukeng'elawu mwezhima.
67011007 Chakamanishawu wunsahu wawu, owu kanyama wákafuma mwikela, wakalwa nawu nzhita, wakayimika mushinju, wakayizhaha.
67011008 Nyizhimba yawu yakashala mumukwakwa wang'anjoyu yeneni yatenang'awu muspilitu nawu, Sojoma naEzhipitu, kwapopeleluwu Mwanta wawu hakulusu.
67011009 Antu akumatung'a, niakunyichiji, niakumajimi, niakunyunza, akatala nyizhimba yawu yafwa jehi mafuku asatu nefuku jachibalu, kuyizhiika mwizhamu kwonti kwawu.
67011010 Antu ashakama heseki akazang'alala nansang'u yawu, akasehaseha, akajitemeshela temeshela yamukunkulu, nanochu chajing'i nakukabishawu antu ashakama heseki kuji wena atuplofwetu ayeji.
67011011 Kulonjela hamafuku owu asatu nachibalu, muuya wawumi wakufuma kuji Nzambi hiwukwing'ila muji wena atuplofwetu, hiyakwimana zulumba; woma waweni wuyiholokela niwena ajing'i nakuyitala.
67011012 Hiyakutiya izu jatiyakana kwiwulu ninji, Inzenu kunu. Hiyakuya mwiwulu mwivu, iku aji nakuyitala kuji ayilumbu zhawu.

67011013 Hampinzhi oyu hikukukanka mutentanshi weneni, nichibalu chamwikumi chang'anja chihumuka nikuhumuka. Mumutentanshi owu himukufwa antu makombakazhi atanu nayeji (7,000). Akwawu asheluhu atiya niwoma, alemesha niNzambi wamwiwulu.
67011014 Ihung'u jamuchiyeji jinahiti. Tiyenu, ihung'u jamuchisatu hijikwinza swayi.

67011015 Kang'elu wamuchitanu nachiyeji hakwimba, hikukulonjela mazu akutiyakana mwiwulu nawu, Wanta wampata yamunu mwishina wunekali jehi wanta waMwanta wetu, niwaKlistu winji; wakayuula hayanyaka nanyaka.
67011016 Owu akulumpi makumi ayeji nawana (24) áshakama kumesu aNzambi hamatanjawu awanta, hiyakujinata chamesu hamaseki, hiyakujifukula kuji Nzambi,
67011017 nawu, Tunakusakilili, eyi MWANTA Nzambi, yeyi Watwesha yezhima, Wekala kwoku, wajing'i kwoku, Mulong'a wunatambuli ng'ovu zheyi zheneni hiwukuyuula.

67011018 Nyunza yazuwili, kuzuwa kweyi kwenzhili; Mwaka wunashiki jehi wakusompesha afu, Nikufweta ambung'eyi atuplofwetu niakwakuzhila Niákamang'a izhina jeyi, anyanya niamaneni; Wowu mwaka wakuzhilumuna ákukisang'ana iseki.

67011019 Hiyakwenzulula Tembeli yaNzambi yekala mwiwulu; muTembeli yinji mumwekana nichimbang'u chachitiyang'enu chinji; múlonjela ninzazhi, nimazu, niyivumina, nimutentanshi, ninvula yeneni yamalola.
67012001 Mwiwulu himukumwekana chinzhikizhilu cheneni; muji mumbanja wavwala itang'wa, mwishina janyenju yinji muji kakwezhi, kumutu winji kuji chibaaba chatutumbwa ikumi natuyeji (12).
67012002 Wuji nevumu, hakukaloka nyiteti, hakufunyisha, hakukata nyisong'u yakuvwala.

67012003 Mwiwulu mumwekana nichinzhikizhilu chikwawu. Nami nitali, hinukumona chanzang'ombi muneni wuchinana, wukweti nyitu yitanu nayiyeji ninseng'u ikumi; kunyitu yinji kuji yibang'ula yitanu nayiyeji.
67012004 Mukila winji hiwukukoka chibalu chamuchisatu chatutumbwa twamwiwulu, hakutunatila heseki. Chanzang'ombi hakwimana kwakwihi namumbanja wuji hanching'a, kulonja chakuvwalayi ajyi mwaninji.
67012005 Hakuvwala mwana, himwana weyala jiyi wamba kayuula nyunza yezhima nankùnyi yachikung'u. Hiyakuhukwila mwaninji kwajiyi Nzambi nikwitanja jinji jawanta.
67012006 Mumbanja hakutemukila muchinkalampata mwamulong'eshelawu jehi kuji Nzambi, kulonja amuhembelumu ikombakazhi jamafuku namafuku nkulakazhi zhiyeji namakumi atanu najimu (1,260).
67012007 Mwiwulu himukwila nzhita; Mikeli nawang'elu zhinji hiyakulwa nzhita nanowu chanzang'ombi; chanzang'ombi niyena nawang'elu zhinji nawa hiyakulwa;
67012008 wena kwimika mushinju nehi; mwiwulu himwamwekeni nawa cheng'i mwakushakama wenaku.

67012009 Owu chanzang'ombi muneni hiyakumunatila heseki; yowu kapela mukulu atenang'awu nawu jiyabolu, jiyi Satana, wajimbang'a antu ampata yamunu mwishina ezhima. Yena hiyakumunatila hamaseki niang'elu zhinji hiyakuyinatila hamu nayena.

67012010 Nitiya niizu jatiyakana mwiwulu ninji, Ichi jinu wamwinu ning'ovu nichiyuulu chaNzambi yetu chinenzi jehi, niwanta waKlistu winji; mulong'a mukwakuyinka anakwetu nyilong'a anamunatili jehi heseki, yowu wayinkang'a nyilong'a kumesu aNzambi yetu nimwaana niwufuku.
67012011 Hiyakumwimika mushinju namashi aMwana kaMukoku, namazu ashimwinuwu. Hiyakeng'eli wumi wawuku; nawu hela kufwa tukufwa tuhu.

67012012 jichi enu mawulu, zang'alalenu, ninenu mwashakamamu. Oyu yihung'u yakamona iseki nakalung'alwizhi! Mulong'a jiyabolu nayisulukili, wuji nanjombu yayeni, chanelukiyi ninji kunashali jehi mpinzhi yinji yantesha hohu.
67012013 Owu chanzang'ombi chanamoniyi anamunatili jehi heseki, hakukabisha mumbanja wavweli mwana weyala.

67012014 Hiyakumwinka mumbanja mpuula zhambuulu muneni zhiyeji, kulonja atuukili muchinkalampata mwamuhembelawu jehi, mwakumujiishilawu mpinzhi yimu, nizhimpinzhi, nimpinzhi yachibalu (3½), kwakubula kumumonawu kuji kapela.
67012015 Kapela hakumupumbila mumbanja menzhi neyi kalong'a, kulonja amukumpuli nampupa.
67012016 Iseki hijikumukwasha mumbanja, hijikwasama mukanwa kaju, jiminya nikalong'a kanapumbiyi chanzang'ombi mukanwa kinji.
67012017 Chanzang'ombi hakuzuwa namumbanja, hakufumaku ninji alwi nzhita nawanyaninji anashali, awa achiji kuhemba mwanayilezhuwu kuji Nzambi, achiji kukakela kushimuna nsang'u yaYesu.
67012018 Chanzang'ombi hakwimana hawusekulula wa kuchikumu chakalong'a.

67013001 Hinukwimana hawusekulula wakukalung'alwizhi. Hinukumona kanyama hakufuma mukalung'alwizhi, wukweti nseng'u ikumi ninyitu yitanu nayiyeji; kunseng'u zhinji kuji yibang'ula ikumi, kunyitu yinji kuji mazhina akutuka nachu Nzambi.
67013002 Hinukumona kanyama wuji neyi chisumpa, nyenju yinji yiji neyi yabela, kanwa kinji kaji neyi kamutupa. Owu chanzang'ombi hakumwinka ng'ovu zhinji, niitanja jinji jawanta niwanta weneni.
67013003 Mutu winji wumu hiwukumwekana neyi anawutapi chakufwa hohu; chilonja chinji chakufwa chakusukili; antu ahamaseki ezhima hiyakulonjela owu kanyama nakuhayama hohu.
67013004 Hiyakujifukula kuji chanzang'ombi nanochu chenkayi jehi wanta winji kuji kanyama. Hiyakujifukula kuji kanyama nawu, Wuji neyi iwu kanyama hinyi? Wukutwesha kulwa ninji hinyi?
67013005 Hiyakumwinka kanyama kanwa kakuhosha nakujisansula nikutuka Nzambi; hiyakumwitezha kukong'a mwaya muchima winji hohu tukwezhi makumi awana natuyeji (42).
67013006 Hakwasama mukanwa kinji kulonja kutuka Nzambi, niizhina jinji, nitabanaka yinji, niáshakamang'a mwiwulu.
67013007 Hiyakumwitezha kulwa nzhita nawakwakuzhila nikuyimika mushinju; hiyakumwinka wanta wanyichiji yezhima, niwamatung'a ezhima, niwamajimi ezhima, niwanyunza yezhima.
67013008 Antu ezhima ashakama heseki hiyakujifukula kuji yena, wowu abuliluwu kusoneka mazhinawu, haaliluwu chikuku champata yamunu mwishina, mumukanja wawumi waMwana kaMukoku azhahiluwu.
67013009 Muntu wukweti matu akutiya atiyi.

67013010 Muntu wukukeng'a kutwala akwawu muwujung'u, niyena nawa wakaya muwujung'u; muntu wukukeng'a kuzhaha akwawu nampoku yakabali, niyena nawa akamuzhaha nampoku yakabali. Kweniku jiku kuji kutatakena nikukuhwelela kwawakwakuzhila.
67013011 Hinukumona kanyama wacheng'i hakwijika mwiseki; wuji nanseng'u zhiyeji neyi zhamwana kamukoku, hakuhosha neyi chanzang'ombi.

67013012 Yena hakukong'ela kumesu anowu kanyama wakusambila mwezhima mwaya wanta wakanyamowu. Hakukanzhikizha iseki niashakamahu ajifukuli kuji kanyama wakusambila, wajing'i nachilonja chakufwa chakusukili.
67013013 Hakukong'a niyinzhikizhilu yeneni, hela yakusulwisha kesi mwiwulu kenzi heseki kumesu awantu.

67013014 Hakujimba antu ashakama heseki nayinzhikizhilu yamwitezheluwu kukong'a kumesu anowu kanyama. Hakuyila antu ashakama heseki ninji atung'i nkishi yakanyama wajing'i nachilonja champoku yakabali wahanjili.
67013015 Hiyakumwitezha kwonesha oyu nkishi yakanyama, kulonja oyu nkishi yakanyama yihoshi, yizhahishi nawa antu ezhima akubula kujifukula kuji oyu nkishi yakanyama.
67013016 Hakuyila antu ezhima, nianyanya niamaneni, niakwakuheta niatuzweng'i, niabula kwikala anjung'u nianjung'u, ching'a ayifunji chinzhikizhilu hachikasa chachijiilu hela hehama,
67013017 kulonja kubuli muntu wukutwesha kulanja hela kulanjisha, ching'a wekala nachinzhikizhilochu, kafwampi hiizhina janowu kanyama, hela mwakumina kuchinja izhina jinji.

67013018 Imu jimu mwekala maana, muntu wukweti kashinshi achinji mwakumina kuchinja kwanowu kanyama; hikuchinja kwezhina jamuntu. Kumuchinja hinkulakazhi zhitanu nayimu namakumi atanu najimu nakatanu nakamu. (666)

67014001 Nami nitali, hinukumona Mwana kaMukoku nemani hampiji yaZiyona, wuji nankulakazhi yamakombakazhi namakombakazhi makumi awana nawana (144,000), akweti izhina jinji niizhina jaTata yinji akusoneka hamahamawu.
67014002 Hinukutiya izu kwiwulu, jiji neyi kuvuma kwamenzhi amavulu, jiji neyi kuvuma nankashi kwachivumina chanzazhi. Natiyili nawa ipumba jawakwakwimba hatujaja twawu.

67014003 Hiyakwimbila kamina kakaha kumesu etanja nikumesu awamomi awana niawakulumpi. Hikwajing'i muntu watwesheli kujiza kaminokuku, ching'a wowu nkulakazhi yamakombakazhi namakombakazhi makumi awana nawana (144,000) anakuuluwu muji antu ahamaseki.

67014004 jiwu abulili kujizhilola nawambanja, mulong'a hiyazhiki. jiwu alonjang'a Mwana kaMukoku kwayang'ayi kwezhima. jiwu akuuliluwu mukachi kawantu ekali nyikabu yaNzambi niyaMwana kaMukoku yatachi.
67014005 Mutunwa twawu himwajing'i makasuku, hiyakweti hataminawuku.

67014006 Hinukumona kang'elu mukwawu hakutuuka hakachi kaluzwizu, nasenji nsang'u yayiwahi yakatwalekahu hayanyaka, ashimuni kuji antu ezhima ashakama heseki, ninyunza yezhima, ninyichiji yezhima, niakwamajimi ezhima, niamumatung'a ezhima.

67014007 Hakwila nezu jatiyakana ninji, Akamenu Nzambi mumulemeshi; mulong'a mpinzhi yinji yakusompesha yinashiki jehi; jifukulenu kuji wáleng'eli niiwulu niiseki nikalung'alwizhi nituseloki twamenzhi.
67014008 Himukulonjela kang'elu mukwawu, wamuchiyeji, ninji, Babiloni Muneni nahumoki, nahumoki! Owu wanwishilang'a nyunza yezhima vinyu yanjombu yawuzhila winji.
67014009 Himukulonjela nikang'elu mukwawu, wamuchisatu, hakuhosha nezu jatiyakana ninji, Muntu wukujifukula kuji owu kanyama nikunkishi yinji, hakwitezha kumufunja hehama jinji hela hachikasa chinji,

67014010 yena nawa wakanwa vinyu yanjombu yaNzambi yemawu jehi, yanahung'ununuwu mulupasa lwakuzuwa kwinji yakaji kufumpula. Akamumwesha yihung'u nakesi ninzazhi, iku ang'elu azhila aji nakutala, niMwana kaMukoku wuji nakutala nawa.
67014011 Wishi wayihung'u yawu hiwukukakumukang'a hayanyaka nanyaka. Awa akajifukula kuji owu kanyama nikunkishi yinji nakutambula mufunja wezhina jinji, hiyakamona kunooka hela mwaana hela wufukuku.
67014012 jihu hatela kutatakenawu akwakuzhila, ahembang'a mwayilezhang'awu kuji Nzambi nikukuhwelela kwamukuhwelelawu Yesu.

67014013 Hinukutiya izu kwiwulu ninji, Sonekaku neyi, Kufumisha kulelu afu akufwa muji Mwanta anakooleki. Spilitu ninji, Mwamweni, kulonja akanooki; kukabakana kwawu kunamani jehi, nyijimu yawu yakayilonjela.
67014014 Nami nitali, hinukumona ivu jitooka. Hevu oju hashakama wumu wuji neyi Mwana kaMuntu; kumutu winji kuji chibaaba chawulu, kuchikasa chinji kuji chikwakwa chatwa.

67014015 Kang'elu mukwawu hakwijika muTembeli nakubijika nezu jatiyakana; hakubijika owu washakama hevu ninji, Shaku chikwakwa cheyi wumuni; mulong'a mpinzhi yakumuna yinashiki jehi; mulong'a yuma yaheseki yakumunawu yaswezha jehi kuha.
67014016 Wáshakama hevu hakuzwiyazwiya chikwakwa chinji heseki; amuna niiseki.
67014017 Kang'elu mukwawu nawa hakwijika muTembeli yekala mwiwulu, niyena nawa wuji nachikwakwa chatwa.

67014018 Kang'elu mukwawu nawa hakufuma kukameng'a, wukweti wanta wakesi; hakutambika owu wukweti chikwakwa chatwa nezu jatiyakana ninji, Shaku chikwakwa cheyi chatwa, wukung'uli yizakafu yamabuzhi amuvinyu waheseki; mulong'a mabuzhi awu aswezha jehi kuha.
67014019 Kang'elu hakuzwiyazwiya chikwakwa chinji omu mwishina, hakukung'ula mabuzhi amuvinyu waheseki, hakuyinatila muwukamwinu, wowu wukamwinu weneni wanjombu yaNzambi.
67014020 Wukamwinu wavinyu hiyakuwujatila kunsembwa yang'anja; muwukamwinu himukufuma mashi ashika nikuyikaba yakunyitu yawatuwalu, kuleha neyi 300 km.
67015001 Hinukumona mwiwulu chinzhikizhilu chikwawu, cheneni, chakuhayama, chawang'elu atanu nayeji akweti yipupu yitanu nayiyeji yakukuminina, mulong'a jimu mwamanina njombu yaNzambi.

67015002 Hinukumona chuma chiji neyi izhiya jakezhima jakubomba nakesi, ninana emikili mushinju haji kanyama, nihaji nkishi yinji, nimwachinjilawu izhina jinji; hiyakwimana natujaja twaNzambi kwizhiyoju jakezhima.

67015003 Hiyakwimba kamina kakambung'aNzambi Mosi, nikamina kaMwana kaMukoku kakwila nawu, Eyi MWANTA Nzambi, Watwesha yezhima, nyijimu yeyi yeneni yakuhayama! Muwayang'a mwalong'a mwalumbuluka, eyi Mwanta wahayanyaka.

67015004 Wukubula kwakama nakulemesha izhina jeyi eyi MWANTA, hinyi? Mulong'a eyi yeyi kankaweyi, yeyi wazhila hohu. Mulong'a nyunza yezhima yakenza nakujifukula kujeyi naniyi nyijimu yalong'a yiwunamwekeshi jehi.
67015005 Chiyakumini yumiyi hinukumona muTembeli yatabanaka yawunsahu yekala mwiwulu munenzuluki.
67015006 MuTembeli oyu himukwijika owu ang'elu atanu nayeji akweti yipupu yitanu nayiyeji, anavwali mahina atooka akezhima; kumabwambu avwala nyiya yawulu.
67015007 Wumu wawenowu amomi awana hakuyinka owu ang'elu atanu nayeji yeng'a yawulu yakunama yitanu nayiyeji yenzala njombu yaNzambi wahanjang'a hayanyaka nanyaka.

67015008 Tembeli hiyikwinzala mbe-e nawishi wunafumi kulubanzhi lwakulema kwaNzambi nikung'ovu zhinji. Hikwajing'i muntu watwesheli kwing'ila muTembeli oyuku, ching'a yipupu yitanu nayiyeji yawang'elu atanu nayeji yinamani jehi.
67016001 Hinukutiya muTembeli izu jatiyakana, hijikuyila owu ang'elu atanu nayeji ninji, Yenu musukwili hamaseki yeng'a yitanu nayiyeji yanjombu yaNzambi.
67016002 Kang'elu wamuchimu hakuya, hakusukwila cheng'a chinji hamaseki. Antu ajing'i namufunja wakanyama ájifukwili kunkishi yinji, hihakuyiholokela kuji mambong'ola anunka aswezha kukata.
67016003 Kang'elu wamuchiyeji hakusukwila cheng'a chinji mukalung'alwizhi. Himukwila mashi neyi amufu, niyuma yezhima yajing'i mukalung'alwizhi yikweti wumi, hiyikufwa.
67016004 Kang'elu wamuchisatu hakusukwila cheng'a chinji mutulong'a nimutuseloki twamenzhi amavulu, mwila nimashi.
67016005 Hinukutiya kang'elu kamenzhi amavulu hakwila ninji, Eyi Walong'a, eyi wekala kwoku, wajing'i kwoku, Eyi Wazhila nanichi chiwunasompeshi mwenimu.
67016006 Niwena nawa amwang'ili mashi awakwakuzhila nawatuplofwetu, Nineyi nawa wunayinwishi mashi; Chinayiteleli.
67016007 Hinukutiya kameng'a hakwila ninji, Mwamweni, eyi MWANTA Nzambi, Watwesha yezhima, kusompa kweyi kuwasompeshang'a kwalumbuluka kwalong'a.
67016008 Kang'elu wamuchiwana hakusukwila cheng'a chinji hetang'wa. Hiyakujinka ng'ovu yakubaba antu nakesi.
67016009 Antu hiyakubabika neyena jaswezha; hiyakutuka izhina jaNzambi wukweti wanta wayipupu oyu. Kwonti kwawu kubalumuka munyichima amulemeshi yena.
67016010 Kang'elu wamuchitanu hakusukwila cheng'a chinji hetanja jakanyama jawanta. Muwanta winji mwiyila nibwi-i; hiyakutafunya majimi awu nayikatu yawu.
67016011 Hiyakutuka Nzambi wamwiwulu nayikatu yawu namambong'olawu. Sang'a alekelawu kubalumuka munyichima aleki nimwelang'awu.

67016012 Kang'elu wamuchitanu nachimu hakusukwila cheng'a chinji hakalong'a keneni Yufulati. Menzhi inji oma nichawu, kulonja kulong'eshang'ahu jehi nzhila yakahitilawu anyanta ankanu akafuma kwatuntukilang'a itang'wa.
67016013 Hinukumona mukanwa kachanzang'ombi, nimukanwa kakanyama, nimukanwa kakaplofwetu wakutwamba, himukwijika aspilitu azonja asatu aji neyi ayuula.

67016014 Mulong'a wenowu hiyaspilitu awanjemoni, enja akong'a yinzhikizhilu; enja aya kuji anyanta ankanu ampata yamunu mwishina yezhima, kulonja akayipompeshi kunzhita yefuku oju jeneni jaNzambi Watwesha yezhima.
67016015 Talenu, nakenza neyi chenzang'a ikombi! Muntu wukutona, wukuhemba mahininji, kulonja abuli kwenja nzekesi antu abuli kumona wusonyi winji, nakooleki.
67016016 Hiyakuyipompeshela kumu kwanatenuwu muHebelu nawu Amagejoni.
67016017 Kang'elu wamuchitanu nachiyeji hakusukwila cheng'a chinji haluzwizu. MuTembeli himukufuma izu jatiyakana, jikufuma kwitanja jawanta ninji, Chinamani.
67016018 Kwila ninzazhi nimazu niyivumina. Hikukukanka mutentanshi weneni wakaji kumonang'ahu jehi mwashakaminawu antu hanu heseki. Kanja kukankang'ahu jehi mutentanshi waswezha wuji ochuku!
67016019 Oyu ng'anja yeneni ayibalula nihasatu; ning'anja zhanyunza hizhikuhumoka; niBabiloni Muneni amwanuka nikuji Nzambi, kulonja amwinki lupasa lwavinyu lwakulenjumuka kwanjombu yinji.
67016020 Yitutu yezhima yitemoka nikutemoka; mpiji zhamaneni kumwekana nawa nehi.

67016021 Ninvula yamalola amaneni, ilola jimu jeseka na 50 kg, hiyikufuma mwiwulu hiyikunoka haji antu. Antu hiyakumutuka Nzambi nachipupu chanvula yamalola, mulong'a chipupu ochu chabajika nankashi kutoha.

67017001 Hikukwinza kang'elu wumu wahaji ang'elu atanu nayeji, akweti yeng'a yakunama yitanu nayiyeji, hakuhosha nanami ninji, Inzang'a kunu nikulezhi chakusompeshawu owu chivumbi muneni, washakama hamenzhi amavulu.
67017002 Anyanta ankanu aheseki aneli ninji wuzhila, áshakama heseki anasheti vinyu yawuzhila winji.
67017003 Hakunsenja muji Spilitu, hakuntwala muchinkalampata. Hinukumona mumbanja nashakami hakanyama kachinana, kenzala mazhina akutuka Nzambi ho-o, kakweti nyitu yitanu nayiyeji ninseng'u ikumi.

67017004 Mumbanja navwali mahina awusombu niachinana, wajileng'aleng'a nawulu natumalola twalema wuseya, nimpelola. Kuchikasa chinji kuji lupasa lwawulu lwenzala yishimashima, yoyuma yawuzonju yawuzhila winji.
67017005 Hehama jinji haji izhina jakusoneka nawu, CHIzhINjILU, BABILONI MUNENI, MAMA YAWAYIVUMBI NIYAYISHIMASHIMA YAHESEKI.
67017006 Hinukumona mumbanja nasheti jehi mashi awakwakuzhila, nimashi awayinsahu akukoola Yesu. Chinamumoni nihayama nikuhayama nankashi.
67017007 Kang'elu hakung'ila ninji, Wunahayaminiji? Tiya nikulezhi chizhinjilu chamumbanja, nichakanyama kanamweleki kaji nanyitu yitanu nayiyeji ninseng'u ikumi.

67017008 Aka kanyama kiwunamoni kajing'uku, katataka hikwosi, keng'a katupuki mwikela, keng'a kayi nakukisika. Antu ashakama heseki, anabuli kusonekawu mazhinawu mumukanja wawumi wásonekeluwu jehi kufumisha haaliluwu chikuku champata yamunu mwishina, akahayama chakamonawu kanyama kajing'uku, katataka hikwosi, hikakwinza.
67017009 Mwenimu muji yitong'ozhoka yamaana. Oyu nyitu yitanu nayiyeji himpiji zhitanu nazhiyeji hashakamang'ayi mumbanja.
67017010 Hiyanyanta ankanu nawa atanu nayeji; atanu anaholoki jehi, wumu wekala kwoku, mukwawu kanja enzi; chakenzayi wakashakama kampinzhi kanti.
67017011 Owu kanyama kajing'uku, katataka hikwosi, yomweninji jiyi mwanta wamuchitanu nachisatu nawa, hiwumu wahaji akwawu atanu nayeji; hakuya nakukisika.
67017012 Ozhu nseng'u ikumi zhiwunamoni hiyanyanta ankanu ikumi, achiji kanja atambuli chiyuulu; ilang'a akatambula wanta neyi anyanta ankanu, hamu nakanyama, mpinzhi yimu.
67017013 Wenawa akweti muchima wawu wumu wakumwinka kanyama ng'ovu yawu niwanta wawu.
67017014 Wenawa akalwa nzhita naMwana kaMukoku; Mwana kaMukoku wakayimika mushinju, mulong'a jiyi Mukulumpi wawakulumpi, jiyi Mwanta wawanyanta; ninawa ajiyi nawu atambikewa, atonjewa, ashinshika.
67017015 Hakung'ila ninji, Menzhi amavulu iwamona hashakamang'ayi chivumbi, hiyantu amumatung'a, himazaza, hinyunza, hiyakwamajimi.
67017016 Ninozhu nseng'u ikumi zhiwamona, ninaka kanyama, akamuhela chivumbi, akamubalumuna kwikala chihembi hohu, akamuleka nzekesi, akajya muzhimba winji, akamushita nakesi shati.
67017017 Mulong'a Nzambi nashi munyichima yawu zhakwila mwafuukulayi, kulonja atiyang'ani amwinki kanyama wanta wawu, njo-o nichakalumbuluka izu jaNzambi.
67017018 Mumbanja wamona hing'anja yeneni yayuulang'a anyanta ankanu aheseki.
67018001 Chiyakumini yumiyi hinukumona kang'elu mukwawu hakusuluka mwiwulu, wuji nawanta waweni, niiseki hijikutamuka nalubanzhi lwakulema kwinji.

67018002 Hakubijika nezu jatiyakana nankashi ninji, Babiloni Muneni nahumoki, nahumoki! Nabalumuki jehi kwikala muwushakaminu wawanjemoni, mwakujikang'ila aspilitu azonja ezhima, mwakujikang'ila nawa atuja azonja ezhima atiyang'awu antu kutama.

67018003 Mulong'a chananwuwu vinyu yanjombu yawuzhila winji, nyunza yezhima yinaholoki. Anyanta ankanu aheseki elili ninji wuzhila, niakwakulanjulula aheseki aheteli kuyuma yajilung'ishilang'ayi nachu.
67018004 Hinukutiya izu jikwawu kwiwulu ninji, Enu antu ami, fumenu mung'anjoyu, mubuli kutiyang'ana nanshiji zhinji, mubuli kutambula ninji yipupu.
67018005 Mulong'a nshiji zhinji zhinatiyakani mwiwulu; Nzambi naanuki jehi mwaluwilang'ayi.
67018006 Mwinkenu mwomwenkeleliyi akwawu, mushilenuku muyeji mwomwesekela nyijimu yinji; mulupasa mwafung'ililiyi akwawu mufung'ilenumu kayeji nawa.

67018007 Mwezhima mwajilemeshelang'ayi, nimwajilung'ishilang'ayi, mufung'ilumu nikumukatisha nikuneng'a; nanochu chelang'ayi mumuchima winji ninji, Ami nashakami nimwanta wamumbanja kwami, hinimfwila kwamuku, hinamba kamona kuneng'aku.
67018008 jichi chakenzhila yipupu yinji mwifuku jojimu, nikufwa, nikuneng'a, ninzala; akamushita nakesi shati, mulong'a MWANTA Nzambi wúkumusompesha himukwang'ovu.
67018009 Anyanta ankanu aheseki aneli ninji wuzhila, ánajilung'ishi ninji, akajila makumbu nikutumpa nansang'u yinji, chakamonawu wishi wakesi kakumwochawu.
67018010 Akemena hahalehi nawoma wayikatu yinji. Akela nawu, Oyu yihung'u! Oyu yihung'u! Eyi Babiloni, ng'anja yeneni, ng'anja yakola! Kusompesha kweyi kunakuwani jehi mumpinzhi yimu hohu.
67018011 Akwakulanjisha aheseki hiyakumujila makumbu nikumuneng'ela chikupu, mulong'a kwosi nawa wakulanja cheng'i yuma yawuku.

67018012 Yuma yawulu, nisiliva, nitumalola twalema wuseya, nimpelola; nimahina amawahi atooka niawusombu niasenena niachinana; ninyitonju yanunka chachiwahi yezhima, niyuma yakutung'a namazhi anzovu ezhima, niyuma yakutung'a nanyitonju yalema wuseya yezhima, niwuneng'u, niyikung'u, nimalola amawahi;
67018013 niyuma yanunka chachiwahi yeng'i nayeng'i, niinsensi, nivinyu, nimanzhi, niwung'a walembuluka, nitijiku, niang'ombi, nianyikoku, niatuwalu namakálu, ninyizhimba niwumi wawantu.
67018014 Yuma yiwafwilili mumuchima weyi yinakufumi jehi, yuma yatowala yezhima, niyuma yakuvwala yalema, yinakukisikili jehi, antu hiyamba kayimona nawa cheng'i nihantuku.
67018015 Akwakulanjisha nakulanjulula yumiyi, áheteleli kuji yena, akemena hahalehi nawoma wayikatu yinji, nakujila makumbu nakuneng'a,
67018016 nakwila nawu, Oyu yihung'u! Oyu yihung'u! ng'anja yeneni yavwikiluwu namahina amawahi atooka niawusombu niachinana. Wajileng'aleng'eli yuma yawulu nitumalola twalema wuseya, nimpelola!

67018017 Mulong'a mumpinzhi yimu hohu maheta aswezha chikumahochu anakisiki jehi zhi-i. Niakulumpi zhamaatu niantu ezhima akwenjelamu kwezhima kwakukeng'a kuyawu, niakwakwenjesha maatu, niantu ezhima ahanjilang'a nyijimu yahakalung'alwizhi,
67018018 hiyakwimena hahalehi nakukaloka nyiteti, chakumonawu wishi wakesi kakumwochawu, nawu, ng'anjanyi yiji neyi ng'anjiyi yeneni?

67018019 Hiyakujisukwila lunkung'u hanyitu yawu, hiyakukaloka nyiteti nikujila makumbu, nikuneng'a nawu, Oyu yihung'u! Oyu yihung'u! ng'anja yeneni, mwajiheteshelelang'awu antu ezhima ajing'i namaatu hakalung'alwizhi nayuma yinji yaswezha kulema wuseya! Mulong'a mumpinzhi yimu hohu anamubalumuni kwikala ihembi.
67018020 Enu mawulu, ninenu akwakuzhila, ninenu apostolu, ninenu atuplofwetu, muzang'alelenu, mulong'a Nzambi namusompeshi jehi, nayitenji jehi.

67018021 Kang'elu wang'ovu wumu hakunyamuna ilola jiji neyi ilola jeneni jakuhalila, iloloju hakujinatila mukalung'alwizhi ninji, jichi chakanatilawu Babiloni, ng'anja yeneni, nang'ovu heseki; hiyamba kayimona nawa cheng'i nihantuku.

67018022 Kuvuma kwatujaja niyisanzhi nimahululu nimpùng'a hikwamba katiyakana nawa cheng'i mujeyi hela ifuku jimuku. Mujeyi himwamba kamwekana nawa cheng'i mukwawukalawenu hiwukalawenuku; hela mushinju wakutwa mwiyanja hiwamba katiyakana nawa cheng'i mujeyi hela ifuku jimuku.

67018023 Hela chezhezhi chenong'u hichamba katong'eka nawa cheng'i mujeyi nichantuku. Hela izu jakalemba hela jakankang'a hijamba katiyakana cheng'i mujeyi hela ifuku jimuku. Mulong'a antu eyi, akwakulanjisha nakulanjulula, ajing'i atulamba ahanu heseki; mulong'a wajimbili nyunza yezhima nakupanja kweyi.
67018024 Muji yena awenumu mashi awatuplofwetu niawakwakuzhila niawantu ezhima azhahiluwu hanu hamaseki.
67019001 Kulonjela hayumiyi hinukutiya neyi izu jatiyakana jaluntu lwaluvulu mwiwulu, hiyakwila nawu, Hamekenu MWANTA! Wamwinu nilubanzhi lwakulema, ning'ovu yambala yaNzambi yetu!
67019002 Mwasompeshang'ayi mwalala mwalong'a; mulong'a nasompeshi jehi chivumbi muneni watokeshelang'a hanu hamaseki nawuzhila winji. Nzambi natenji jehi mashi awambung'inji.
67019003 Hiyakwila kamuchiyeji nawu, Hamekenu MWANTA! Wishi winji wuji nakufwinja hayanyaka nanyaka.
67019004 Owu akulumpi makumi ayeji nawana (24), ninowu amomi awana, hiyakujinata chamesu heseki, hiyakujifukula kuji Nzambi washakamang'a hetanja jawanta nawu, Amena! Hamekenu MWANTA!
67019005 Mwitanja jawanta himukufuma izu ninji, Hamekenu Nzambi yetu, enu ambung'inji ezhima, enu mwamwakamang'a, nianyanya niamaneni.
67019006 Hinukutiya izu jiji neyi jaluntu lwaluvulu, neyi kuvuma kwamenzhi amavulu, neyi yivumina yang'ovu, nakwila nawu, Hamekenu MWANTA! Mulong'a MWANTA Nzambi yetu, Watwesha yezhima, hakuyuula.
67019007 Tuzang'alalenu, tutiyenu kuwaha nankashi, tumulemeshenu; mulong'a kusumbula kwaMwana kaMukoku kunashiki jehi, ning'ojinji najilong'eshi jehi.
67019008 Hiyakumwitezha mumbanjowu kuvwala mahina amawahi atooka, atamuka, akaji hataminawu. Mulong'a mahina amawahi atooka hinyijimu yawakwakuzhila yalong'a.
67019009 Hakung'ila ninji, Sonekaku neyi, ánatambikuwu kuchawizha chaMwana kaMukoku anakooleki. Hakung'ila ninji, Wenawa jiwu mazu alala aNzambi.

67019010 Hinukujinata chamesu heseki kunyenju yinji nami nijifukuli kuji yena. Hakung'ila ninji, Nehi, lekaku. Ami nimukwenu njung'u neyi, ninjung'u hamu nawanakwetu ashimunang'a Yesu; jifukuli kuji Nzambi. Mulong'a kushimuna kwashimunang'awu Yesu hispilitu yawuplofwetu.
67019011 Hinukumona mwiwulu munenzuluki jehi. Kutala hikuji kawalu katooka nimukwakwenjelahu, anamuteni nawu, Washinshika, Walala. Wasompeshang'a, walwang'a nzhita mwalong'a hohu.
67019012 Mesu inji aji neyi chikwamuzuzu wakesi, kumutu winji kuji yibang'ula yayivulu; wukweti izhina jakusoneka jehi, kwosi muntu wajilukaku ching'a yomweni hohu.
67019013 Wavwala ihina jakwombeka mumashi; izhina jinji ajitenang'a nawu, Izu jaNzambi.
67019014 Akwanzhita amwiwulu aji nakumulonjela, aji nakwenjela hatuwalu tutooka, anavwali mahina atooka, akaji hataminawu.

67019015 Mukanwa kinji himukwijika mpoku yakabali yatwa, kulonja akatapi nachu nyunza; wakayiyuula nankùnyi yachikung'u. Hakujata wukamwinu wavinyu yakulenjumuka kwalenjumukang'a kuzuwa kwaNzambi Watwesha yezhima.
67019016 Hachikowelu chinji nihekata jinji haji izhina jakusoneka nawu, MWANTA WAWANYANTA, MUKULUMPI WAWAKULUMPI.
67019017 Hinukumona kang'elu nemani mwitang'wa. Hakubijika nezu jatiyakana, hakuyila atuja ezhima atuukang'a hakachi kaluzwizu ninji, Inzenu mupompi kuchawizha chaNzambi cheneni;
67019018 mujyi mbizhi yawanyanta ankanu, niyawakulumpi anzhita, niyawayilobu, niyawatuwalu nawakwakwenjelahu, niyawantu ezhima, hela hiyanjung'uku hela anjung'u, hela anyanya hela amaneni.
67019019 Hinukumona owu kanyama nianyanta ankanu ahanu hamaseki niakwanzhita zhawu, anapompi jehi hamu, akalwi nzhita nayenowu wuji nakwenjela hakawa.

67019020 Owu kanyama hiyakumukwatila hamu nikaplofwetu wakutwamba, owu wakong'elang'a yinzhikizhilu kumesu akanyama, yajimbilang'ayi nachu antu afunjiluwu mufunja wanowu kanyama, ajifukwilang'a kunkishi yinji. Mwayeji wawu hiyakuyumbila amomi mwizhiya jabutukang'a nakesi kanzazhi. lu, niakwanzhita yinji.
67019021 Asheluhu hiyakuyizhahola nampoku yakabali yejikili mukanwa kayenowu wajing'i nakwenjela hakawalu. Atuja ezhima hiyakwikuta mbizhi yawu.
67020001 Hinukumona mwiwulu himukusuluka kang'elu, wuji nansapi yekela niileng'i jeneni muchikasa chinji.
67020002 Hakukwata owu chanzang'ombi, yowu kapela mukulu, jiyi jiyabolu, jiyi Satana; hakumukasa ekali wakukasa ho-o ikombakazhi janyaka (1,000).

67020003 Hakumuumbila mwikela, hakumupatilamu, hakushilaku nichilamiki, kulonja abuli kujimba cheng'i nyunza, ching'a ikombakazhi janyaka (1,000) jinamani jehi. Kulonjela henohu ching'a akamusubuli kampinzhi kanti.

67020004 Hinukumona matanja awanta niáshakamahu, anayinki jehi ng'ovu yakusompesha. Hinukumona niantu aketwiluwu nyitu kukoola kumushimuna Yesu nezu jaNzambi; hinukumona ninawa abulili kujifukula kuji owu kanyama hela kunkishi yinji, abulili kufunjawu hamahamawu nihamakasawu; hiyakuhanja, hiyakuyuulila hamu naKlistu ikombakazhi janyaka (1,000).
67020005 Afu asheluhu, kuhanja nehi ching'a ikombakazhi janyaka (1,000) jinamani jehi. jiku kusang'uka kwakusambila.

67020006 Muntu wukusang'uka nawu hakusang'uka kwakusambila wakooleka, wazhila. Kufwa kwamuchiyeji hikukwikala nawanta haji wenaku; ilang'a akekala atuplistu ambala aNzambi niaKlistu, akayuulila hamu ninji ikombakazhi janyaka (1,000).
67020007 Chakamana ikombakazhi janyaka (1,000), akamusubula Satana mwamupatililuwu;
67020008 wakafumamu kulonja akayi nakujimba nyunza yekala kunsa zheseki zhiwana, wowu aGogi naMagogi, hakuyipompesha akalwi nzhita. Kuyichinja aji neyi wusekulula wakukalung'alwizhi.
67020009 Hiyakutanjama mwatohela iseki jezhima, hiyakukuchika musumba wawakwakuzhila yoyu ng'anja yakeng'ewa. Wena hiyakuyinong'esha nakesi kakufuma mwiwulu kuji Nzambi.
67020010 jiyabolu wayijimbili hiyakumuumbila mwizhiya jakesi kanzazhi, mwekala owu kanyama nanowu kaplofwetu wakutwamba; akayikatishang'a nimwaana niwufuku hayanyaka nanyaka.
67020011 Hinukumona itanja jawanta jeneni jitooka, ninowu washakamahu; nimaseki nimawulu hiyakutemuka kumesu inji; hiyamweni kwakuyaku.

67020012 Hinukumona afu, niamaneni nianyanya, hiyakwimena kumesu etanja jawanta; hiyakubakula nyikanja; hiyakubakula nimukanja wukwawu, wowu wawumi. Hiyakusompesha afu nansang'u zhayuma yelilang'awu yasonekeluwu jehi munyikanjoyu.
67020013 Kalung'alwizhi hakulubula afu ajing'umu; kufwa nakalung'a hiyakulubula afu ajing'umu; hiyakuyisompesha wezhima wawu hamuntu hamuntu mwomwelililang'awu nyijimu yawu.
67020014 Kufwa nakalung'a hiyakuyumbila mwizhiya jakesi. Kweniku jiku kufwa kwamuchiyeji, yowu izhiya jakesi.
67020015 Muntu abulili kuwanawu wakusoneka mumukanja wawumi, amuumbilili mwizhiya jakesi.
67021001 Hinukumona iwulu jajiha niiseki jajiha; mulong'a iwulu jakusambila niiseki jakusambila ahita jehi, nikalung'alwizhi nawa kwosi.
67021002 Hinukumona ng'anja Yazhila, yowu Yelusalema yayiha, yiji nakusuluka kuji Nzambi kwiwulu, ayilong'esha jehi neyi kankang'a anawahishuwu kulonja asumbuki namfumwinji.

67021003 Hinukutiya izu jatiyakana jikufuma mwitanja jawanta ninji, Tiya, tabanaka yaNzambi hiyiji nawantu; yena wakashakama nawu, niwena akekala antu inji; Nzambi yomweni wakekala nawu, wakekala Nzambi yawu.
67021004 Wakayikombola majilu ezhima kumesu awu; hikwakekala nawa cheng'i kufwaku; hikwakekala nawa cheng'i hela kukata hela kujila hela kuneng'aku. Yuma yakusambila yinahiti jehi.
67021005 Owu washakama hetanja jawanta hakwila ninji, Tiya, hinukubalumuna yuma yezhima yiikali yayiha. Hakung'ila ninji, Sonekaku, mulong'a mazu awa atela kukuhwelela, alala.
67021006 Hakung'ila ninji, Chinamani jehi. Ami yami Alefwa, yami Omega; yami Wakusambila, yami Wakukuminina. Muntu wukutiya mpwila nakamwinkahu menzhi akukaseloki kamenzhi awumi chakaji kulanja.
67021007 Muntu wukwimika mushinju wakaswana yumiyi; nakekala Nzambi yinji, niyena wakekala mwanami.

67021008 Hakwila akwawoma, niabula kukuhwelela, niatama nankashi, niambanzhi, niayivumbi, niakwakuhong'a nakupanja, niakwakupesha, niakwakutwamba ezhima, akwikalang'a mwizhiya jahang'a nakesi kanzazhi. Kweniku jiku kufwa kwamuchiyeji.

67021009 Hikukwinza kujami kang'elu wumu wahaji awa ang'elu atanu nayeji, ajing'i nayeng'a yakunama yitanu nayiyeji, yenzala yipupu yakukuminina yitanu nayiyeji. Hakuhosha nanami ninji, Inzang'a kunu nikulezhi kankang'a, ing'ojaMwana kaMukoku.
67021010 Hakumfumishahu muji Spilitu, hakuntwala kumpiji yela nikutoha nikuleha, hakunlezha ng'anja Yazhila yowu Yelusalema, yiji nakusuluka kuji Nzambi kwiwulu;
67021011 yiji nalubanzhi lwakulema kwaNzambi. Chezhezhi chayu chiji neyi ilola jaswezha kulema wuseya, neyi ilola jamwekana nikwishinaji to-o nakukezhima.

67021012 Yiji nampwembu yeneni yayilehi; kumpwembu kuji yenzelu ikumi nayiyeji (12); kuyenzelu oyu kuji ang'elu ikumi nayeji (12). Hayenzelu oyu asonekahu mazhina anyichiji yawanyana kaIsalela ikumi nayiyeji (12).
67021013 Kumusela yenzelu yisatu; kukabeta kakuchimunswa yenzelu yisatu, kukabeta kakuchijiilu yenzelu yisatu; kumuzhika yenzelu yisatu.
67021014 Oyu mpwembu yang'anja yiji namalola achikuku ikumi nayeji (12), haji nimazhina awapostolu ikumi nayeji (12) aMwana kaMukoku.
67021015 Yena wajing'i nakuhosha nanami wajing'i neteti jawulu, jakweseka nachu ng'anja niyenzelu yayu nimpwembu yayu.
67021016 Oyu ng'anja yekala muwana, yela nikuleha nikutoha kwokumu. Yena hakweseka ng'anja nanoju iteti, 2,200 km. Nikuleha kwayu, nikutoha kwayu, nikuleha kwayu kwakwiwulu kwesekana.
67021017 Hakweseka nimpwembu zhimita 65, mwomwesekelang'a muntu, kafwampi mwomwesekelang'a kang'elu.
67021018 Oyu mpwembu ayitung'a namalola amwekana nikwishinaji to-o. ng'anja yekala yawulu wakoseka, yakezhima neyi chibanzhilu.

67021019 Yikuku yampwembu yang'anja ayiwahisha namalola ezhima alema wuseya eng'i naeng'i. Ilola jakusambila jachikuku jajing'i jamwekena nikwishinaji to-o; jamuchiyeji jawuzeeli; jamuchisatu jawukunju; jamuchiwana jaemelalji;

67021020 jamuchitanu jiyila; jamuchitanu nachimu jichinana; jamuchitanu nachiyeji jawunsela wutokoloka; jamuchitanu nachisatu jamafu anyitonju; jamuchitanu nachiwana jawunsela; jamwikumi jamatahu amunyenvu; jamwikumi nachimu (11) jawuzeeli wiyila; jamwikumi nachiyeji (12) jawusombu.

67021021 Oyu yenzelu ikumi nayiyeji (12) himpelola ikumi nazhiyeji (12), chenzelu mpelola yimu, chenzelu mpelola yimu, yenzelu yezhima ikumi nayiyeji (12) chochimu. Mukwakwa wanoyu ng'anja hiwulu wakoseka wamwekana nikwishinaji to-o.
67021022 Hinamwenumu tembeluku; mulong'a MWANTA Nzambi Watwesha yezhima, niMwana kaMukoku jiwu Tembeli yayu.
67021023 Oyu ng'anja hiyakeng'a hela itang'wa hela kakwezhi kulonja yitong'eki mwoku. Mulong'a lubanzhi lwakulema kwaNzambi jilu lwatong'ekang'amu, niinong'u jayu hiMwana kaMukoku.
67021024 Nyunza yakenjelang'a muchezhezhi chayu, nianyanta ankanu aheseki aletelang'amu yuma yawu yayiwahi yalema.
67021025 Yenzelu yayu hiyamba kayenzela namwaanaku, mulong'a mwenomu wufuku mwosi.
67021026 Akaletelamu niyuma yanyunza yayiwahi yalubanzhi lwakulema kwawu.
67021027 Himwakeng'ila mwoku hela chuma nichimu chazhilola, hela muntu welang'a chishimashima hela kutwambaku, ching'a wowu asonekawu jehi mumukanja wawumi waMwana kaMukoku hohu.
67022001 Hakunlezha kalong'a kamenzhi awumi, kakekema neyi ilola jakezhima, kaji nakufuma mwitanja jaNzambi jawanta, jojaMwana kaMukoku.

67022002 Mukachi kamukwakwa wayu, niishinaji niishinaji jakalong'a, haji mutonju wawumi, wasong'ang'a nyichiji yanyikabu ikumi nayiyeji (12); wasong'ang'a nyikabu yinji hakakwezhi hakakwezhi. Mafu anowu mutonju akuuka nachu nyunza.
67022003 Hikwamba kekala nawa cheng'i ishing'uku. Itanja jaNzambi jawanta, jojaMwana kaMukoku, jakekalang'a mwenomu.
67022004 Ambung'inji amba kamukalakelang'a, amba kamumonang'a kumesu; niizhina jinji jakekalang'a hamahamawu.
67022005 Hikwamba kekala cheng'i wufukuku; hiyakakeng'a nawa hela chezhezhi chenong'u hela mwaana wetang'waku; MWANTA Nzambi jiyi wakayitong'ekelang'a chezhezhi to-o. Akayuulang'a hayanyaka nanyaka.
67022006 Hakung'ila ninji, Mazu awa alala, atela kuyikuhwelela. MWANTA Nzambi yawaspilitu awatuplofwetu natemeshi kang'elu alezhi ambung'inji yuma yikukeng'a kwinza swayi.
67022007 Talenu, yami nukwinzowu swayi. Muntu wukuhemba mazu awuplofwetu wamukanjiwu nakooleki.
67022008 Yami Yowanu nela nikutiya nikumona yumiyi. Chinelili nikutiya nikumona, hinukujinata chamesu heseki nakujifukula kunyenju yayenowu kang'elu wanlezheli yumiyi.
67022009 Hakung'ila ninji, Nehi, lekaku. Ami nimukwenu njung'u neyi; ninjung'u kwami neyi eyi, hamu nawanakwetu atuplofwetu ninawa ahembang'a mazu amukanjiwu; jifukuli kuji Nzambi.
67022010 Hakung'ila ninji, Bayi wulamika mazu awuplofwetu wamukanjiwuku; mulong'a mpinzhi keng'a yishiki.
67022011 Muntu waheng'a aheng'ang'a kwinji; muntu wamazhilu ekalang'a wamazhilu kwinji; muntu walong'a along'ang'a kwinji; muntu wazhila azhilang'a kwinji.
67022012 Talenu, yami nukwinzowu swayi; niji nawulooku wami wakwinka antu ezhima mwesekela nyijumu yawu.
67022013 Ami yami Alefwa, yami Omega; yami Tachi, yami Insa; yami Wakusambila, yami Wakukuminina.
67022014 Ákukosa mahinawu kulonja akatweshi kushika kumutonju wawumi kulonja akeng'ili muyisu yang'anja, anakooleki.
67022015 Atuwa, niakwakuhong'a nikupanja, niayivumbi, niambanzhi, niakwakupesha, niezhima akeng'ang'a nielang'a yakutwamba hiyekala mung'anjaku.
67022016 Ami Yesu natemeshi kang'elu kami kulonja ashimwini yipompelu yumiyi. Yami muzhi, yami wamutang'a wajaviji, yami Katumbwa katong'ekang'a nabujiji.
67022017 NiSpilitu ninsumbuki hiyakwila nawu, Inzang'a. Muntu wukutiya niyena eli ninji, Inzang'a. Muntu wuji nampwila enzi, yowu wukukeng'a kutambula, atambuli menzhi awumi chakaji kulanja.
67022018 Hinukukonkomwena antu ezhima akutiya mazu awuplofwetu wamukanjiwu, nami, neyi muntu wakalunzhika kumazu awa, Nzambi wakamulunzhikila yipupu yanasonekuwu mumukanjiwu.
67022019 Neyi muntu wakafumisha kumazu amukanja wawuplofwetu iwu, Nzambi wakafumisha iseka jinji jakumutonju wawumi, niilung'a jinji mung'anja Yazhila, eng'a, nikuyuma yanasonekuwu mumukanjiwu.
67022020 Wúkushimuna yumiyi ninji, Eng'a, yami nukwinzowu swayi. Amena, inzang'a Mwanta Yesu.
67022021 Luwi lwaMwanta Yesu lwikali nawakwakuzhila. Amena.
